igbo: 'Mkpúrù èdè íke'Elizabeth Balogun bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Naijiria
Ọ na-agba bọọlụ kọleji maka Louisville Cardinals Women's Team na ndị otu mba Naịjirịa
Balogun kwagara Hamilton Heights High SchoolTennessee na klas asatọ ya na Lagos, Nigeria
O nwetara akara 151, 46 rebounds, 27 blocks na 21 assists
O mere ALL-USA Girls Basketball First Team na njedebe nke ịnọ na Highschool

Balogun malitere dị ka onye ọhụrụ na Georgia Tech na 2018, Ọ hapụrụ ndị otu ahụ maka Louisville Cardinals mgbe a kpọrọ ya 2018-19 ACC freshman nke afọ ebe ọ nwetara akara 1464 kwa egwuregwu na oge ọhụrụ ya
N'afọ nke abụọ ya na Louisville, ndị nkuzi na Blue Ribbon Panel kpọrọ ya preseason All-ACC ma kpọkwa ya aha na Citizen Naismith Watch List
A kpọrọ Balogun ka ọ nọchite anya D'Tigress ma sonye na asọmpi 2019 pre Olympic Qualifying na Mozambique mana Louisville ewepụtaghị aha ya
A kpọkwara ya isonye na Tokyo 2020 Olympic Qualifiers na Belgrade
Balogun bụ nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ atọ, nwanne ya nwoke nke kachasị bụrụ okenye, Ezekiel, na-egwu egwu na The Citadel na South Carolina
Nwanne ya nwanyị nke nta, Ruth, na-egwu egwu na Hamilton Heights
Nne ya bụ Justina na-abịa n'oge mgbe nna ya bụ Mark bi na Naịjirịa ebe ọ bụ onye nkuzi basketball na onye uwe ojii
Elizabeth Benson (afọ 1888 rụọ afọ-1976) bụ onye South Africa na-akpụ ihe
Ọrụ ya so na ihe omume ọkpụkpụ na asọmpi nka na 1936 Summer Olympics
Elizabeth (Betty) Ryan (nke bụbu Tylko) bụ onye mmepe egwuregwu na onye mmemme America
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na General Computer Corporation (GCC) n'afọ ndị 1980 ma bụrụ onye ọrụ nke itoolu na nwanyị mbụ na-eme egwuregwu vidio na GCC
Ọ haziri egwuregwu arcade Atari, Inc
nke afọ 1982 Quantum yana ịrụ ọrụ na egwuregwu maka Atari 2600, Atari 5200, na Atari 7800
Ryan nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Injinia na Applied Sciences na Mahadum Harvard ma bụrụ onye otu klas nke afọ 1980
Ryan haziri egwuregwu vidio Atari arcade Quantum, nke General Computer Corporation (GCC) mepụtara maka Atari, Inc
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ nke itoolu na nwanyị mbụ mepụtara egwuregwu na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Nwanne ya nwanyị, Carol Ryan Thomas, ka e mesịrị were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-anwale egwuregwu na onye na-edozi egwuregwu
Mgbe Quantum gasịrị, Ryan rụrụ ọrụ na egwuregwu maka Atari 2600, Atari 5200, na Atari 7800, gụnyere Pole Position, Dig Dug, GCC's unreleased version of Millipede for the Atari 7800
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na AtariLab agụmakwụkwọ software
Ryan ekwuola maka ọrụ ya na mmepe egwuregwu maka American Classic Arcade Museum
Kemgbe afọ 2003, ya na nwa ya nwoke, John Tylko, na-arụ ọrụ na mmepe weebụ
Elizabeth Carter Brooks (1867 ruo 1951) bụ onye nkuzi Amerịka, onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Ọ nwere mmasị n'inyere ndị Afrịka Amerịka ndị ọzọ aka inweta ihe ịga nke ọma onwe onye ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ ghọtara mkpa ọ dị ichekwa ụlọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na United States
Brooks bụ 'otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ojii ole na ole nke oge ahụ nke a pụrụ iwere ma onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ ma onye nkwado'
A mụrụ Brooks na New Bedford, Massachusetts, nke bụ mpaghara nke mba ahụ a maara nke ọma n'oge ahụ maka inye ebe mgbaba, ihe onwunwe, agụmakwụkwọ na ọrụ maka ndị bụbu ndị ohu
Nne ya, Martha Webb, bụbu ohu nke Onye isi ala John Tyler
Webb tinyere aka na Underground Railroad
Nwa ya nwanyị gara n'ihu zụlite 'mmasị maka ịha nhata' nke were ndụ ya niile
Brooks gara New Bedford High School, wee gaa Swain Free School, nke nyere ụmụ akwụkwọ ntọala siri ike na imewe na nkà iwu ụlọ
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye Afrịka Amerịka mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Harrington Normal School for Teachers
Brooks malitere izi ihe na mbido afọ 1890 na Howard's Orphan Home ma ọ bụ Howard Colored Orphan Asylum na Brooklyn, nke ndị Afrịka Amerịka guzobere ma na-elekọta
N'afọ 1895, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na National Association of Colored Women's Clubs (NACWC)
Ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ nke Nzukọ ahụ na 1896 na osote onye isi oche site na 1906 ruo 1908
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke NACWC site na 1908 ruo 1912
Brooks sonyekwara National Association for the Advancement of Colored People (NAACP) n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe e guzobere ya ma mesịa mepụta ngalaba NAACP nke ya na New Bedford
A ga-asọpụrụ ya dị ka onye isi oche emeritus nke New Bedford NAACP na 1948
Brooks bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere New England Federation of Women's Clubs (mgbe e mesịrị Northeastern Federation of Colored Women's clubs)
Ọ bụ onye isi oche ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ na asaa ma n'oge ọ nọ na klọb ahụ, 'na-ahụ maka nkwado nke ụlọ ọrụ obodo, ego agụmakwụkwọ, ụlọ nlekọta ụbọchị, na ọrụ ndị ọzọ obodo chọrọ'
N'afọ 1897, Brooks nyere aka mepee New Bedford Home for the Aged, nke na mbụ nwere ọtụtụ ebe nwa oge
Na mgbakwunye, Brooks kwụrụ ụgwọ ụlọ ahụ n'onwe ya maka ọnwa isii mbụ
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Women's Loyal Union ' weere ọrụ maka idebe New Bedford Home for the Aged
' Brooks mechara chepụta ụlọ na-adịgide adịgide nke Colonial maka ebe ikpeazụ ya na 396 Middle Street
Women's Loyal Union, nke Brooks tinyere aka na ya, gara n'ihu na-enyere aka ịkwado ụlọ ahụ na ebe ọhụrụ ahụ
Brooks ghọrọ onye isi oche mbụ nke ụlọ na nke Women's Loyal Union, ma nọgide na ọrụ ndị ahụ ruo 1930
Ụlọ ahụ n'onwe ya ka na-eguzo na New Bedford ma dị okpukpu abụọ na ọkara n'ogologo, nke nwere elu ụlọ, dormers isii na ihu ihu nwere elu ụlọ dị larịị
Brooks malitere izi ihe ọzọ, n'oge a na 1901 na Taylor School, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi Afrịka Amerịka mbụ na New Bedford
N'afọ 1918, Kansụl Agha nke National board nke YWCA were ya n'ọrụ iji lekọta ma lekọta owuwu nke Phillis Wheatley YWCA na Washington, DC
N'afọ 1929, ọ lara ezumike nká na nkuzi
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ lụrụ W
Sampson Brooks, onye bụ bishọp nke African Methodist Episcopal denomination nke Betel Church
Ya na di ya kwagara San Antonio, ebe ha biri ruo mgbe di ya nwụrụ na 1934
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ laghachiri New Bedford
N'afọ 1939, ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'ichekwa ihe nketa ndị isi ojii
Brooks chere na 'ihe ncheta nke 'akụkọ agbụrụ' bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ala ndị Afrịka Amerịka ma kwesị ka echekwa ya
Ọ zụrụ ụlọ William H
Carney ma gbanwee ụlọ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ ihe ncheta
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị na 1951, obodo New Bedford sọpụrụ ya site n'ịkpọ ụlọ akwụkwọ aha ya na 1957

Elizabeth Catlett, ónyé amụrụ dị ka Alice Elizabeth Catlett (April 15, 1915 ̊ Eprel 2, 2012) bụ onye Africa America na-ese ihe na onye na-ese eserese nke a maara nke ọma maka ngosipụta ya nke ahụmịhe Black-American na narị afọ nke 20, nke na-elekwasịkarị ányà na ahụmịhe nwanyị
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Washington, DC, nne na nna na-arụ ọrụ na agụmakwụkwọ, ọ bụkwa nwa nwa nke ndị bụbu ndị ohu
O siri ike màkà nwanyị ojii n'oge a ịchụso ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe
Catlett tinyere ọtụtụ ọrụ ya n'ịkụzi ihe

Otú ọ dị, otu mkpakọrịta e nyere ya na 1946 nyere ya ohere ịga Mexico City, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Taller de Gráfica Popular ruo afọ iri abụọ wee bụrụ ónyé ísì nke ngalaba ihe ọkpụkpụ maka Escuela Nacional de Artes Plásticas
N'afọ ndị 1950, ụzọ isi ọ na-eji eme ihe osise gbanwere site na mbipụta gaa na ihe ọkpụkpụ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ hapụghị nke mbụ
Ọrụ ya bụ ngwakọta nke abstract na figurative na ọdịnala nke Modernist, na mmetụta sitere na ọdịnala nka Africa na Mexico
Enwere ike ịkọwa ọrụ Catlett dị ka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, n'ihi nraranye ya na nsogbụ na ahụmịhe nke ndị Africa America
Dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe si kwuo, ebumnuche bụ isi nke ọrụ ya bụ izipu ozi mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya karịa ịma mma dị ọcha
Ụmụ akwụkwọ nka na-amụ ọrụ ya nke ọma na-achọ igosi agbụrụ, okike na nsogbu klas

N'oge ndụ ya, Catlett nwetara ọtụtụ onyinye na nkwanye ùgwù, gụnyere ịbụ ónyé otu na Salón de la Plástica Mexicana, Art Institute of Chicago Legends and Legacy Award, nzèrè doctorate nke Pace University na Carnegie Mellon, na International Sculpture Center's Lifetime Achievement Award na ihe ọkpụkpụ nke oge a
A mụrụ Catlett ma zụlite ya na Washington, DC
Ma nne ya na nna ya bụ ụmụ nke ndị ohu a tọhapụrụ, nne nne ya kọkwara ya akụkọ banyéré ijide ndị ha n'Africa na ihe isi ike nke ndụ ugbo
Catlett bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ atọ
Nne na nna ya abụọ na-arụ ọrụ na agụmakwụkwọ; nne ya bụ ónyé ọrụ na-akụzi akwụkwọ na nna ya na-akụziri mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Tuskegee, usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze DC n'oge ahụ
Nna ya nwụrụ tupu a mụọ ya, na-ahapụ nne ya ka ọ rụọ ọtụtụ ọrụ iji kwado ezinụlọ
Catlett gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Howard, gụsịrị akwụkwọ cum laude, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị nhọrọ mbụ ya
A nabatakwara ya na Carnegie Institute of Technology mana a jụrụ ịnabata ya mgbè ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ chọpụtara na ọ bụ onye isi ojii

Otú ọ dị, na 2007, ka Cathy Shannon nke E&S Gallery na-agwa otu ndị ntorobịa okwu na August Wilson Center for African American Culture na Pittsburgh, PA, ọ kọrọ njikọ Catlett na Pittsburgh n'ihi ikpe na-ezighị ezi a
Onye nchịkwa na Mahadum Carnegie Mellon nọ na ndị na-ege ntị ma nụ akụkọ ahụ na nke mbụ ya
Ozugbo ahụ, ọ gwara ónyé isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, Jared Leigh Cohon, onye na-amaghị ma na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ na ihe dị otú ahụ emeela

N'afọ 2008, Onye isi ala Cohon nyere Catlett nzèrè Doctorate nke nsọpụrụ na ihe ngosi otu nwanyị nke nka ya nke E&S Gallery gosipụtara na The Regina Gouger Miller Gallery na campus nke Mahadum Carnegie Mellon
N'oge ọ malitere ọrụ ya, Catlett nabatara ọrụ Public Works of Art Project na gọọmentị etiti maka ndị na-ese ihe na-enweghị ọrụ n'afọ ndị 1930
Otú ọ dị, a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ n'ihi enweghị ebumnuche, ma eleghị anya n'ihi na ọ bụ onye na-eto eto
Ahụmahụ ahụ mere ka ọ mata ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke Diego Rivera na Miguel Covarrubias
N'oge ndụ Catlett, ọ nwetara ọtụtụ onyinye na nkwanye ùgwù

Ihe ndị a gụnyere Ihe nrite Mbụ na 1940 American Negro Exposition na Chicago, ntinye n'ime Salón de la Plástica Mexicana na 1956, Ihe nrite Alumni Distinguished site na Mahadum Iowa na 1996, ihe ngosi njem afọ 50 nke ọrụ ya nke Newberger Museum of Art na Purchase College kwadoro na 1998, ihe nrite NAACP Image na 2009, na ụtụ jikọrọ aka mgbe ọ nwụsịrị nke Salón de the Plástica Mexican na Instituto Politécnico Nacional na 2013

Ndị ọzọ gụnyere onyinye sitere na Women's Caucus for Art, Art Institute of Chicago Legends and Legacy Award, Elizabeth Catlett Week na Berkeley, Elizabeth Catlette Day na Cleveland, nwa amaala nsọpụrụ nke New Orleans, nzere doctorate nsọpụrụ site na Mahadum Pace na Carnegie Mellon, na International Sculpture Center's Lifetime Achievement Award na ihe ọkpụkpụ nke oge a
Taller de Gráfica Popular meriri ihe nrite udo mba ụwa n'otu akụkụ n'ihi ihe ọ rụzuru
Ọ natara onyinye Candace site na National Coalition of 100 Black Women na 1991
Elizabeth Cudjoe (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1992) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana
O mere nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa na FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup New Zealand 2008
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu mba dị elu na 2011 All-Africa Games ebe ọ gbara Algeria na 2014 African Women's Championship
Na klọb, ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Hasaacas Ladies na Ghana
Lady Elizabeth Edem Ironbar (nwụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2021) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria si Cross River Steeti
Ọ bụ onye otu PDP ma nọchite anya Akpabuyo na Cross River State House of Assembly site n'afọ 2015 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Elizabeth Mary Jane Fish (22 Disemba 1860 - 21 Machị 1944) bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ na nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara dịka onye isi oche nke Educational Institute of Scotland, òtù ndị nkuzi kacha ochie n'ụwa
A mụrụ Elizabeth na 83 North Woodside Road na Glasgow, Scotland, na 1860 na Jane McNaughton na William Fish, onye ozi ala ọzọ nke obodo
William bụ ụkọchukwu na Sharp's Institution na Perth ọ bụkwa ebe a ka Elizabeth gụrụ akwụkwọ
Elizabeth laghachiri Glasgow ka ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi ụmụ akwụkwọ, malite na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke Henderson Street ebe ọ bịara nke mbụ na Scotland na ule Queen's Scholarship
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ gara n'ihu na-agụ akwụkwọ na Glasgow Church of Scotland Training College
N'afọ 1885, Elizabeth gụsịrị akwụkwọ na LLA (nwaanyị gụrụ akwụkwọ na nka) na Mahadum St
Andrews, na-amụ French na Italian, nke e nyere ya ihe nrite Society of Arts
N'etiti 1881 na 1895, ọ kụziri maka Glasgow School Board; na-akụzi na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze Runford Street na ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị Shields Road

Elizabeth gara n'ihu na-akụzi na Pupil-Teachers Institute, Glasgow, site na 1895 ruo 1907 tupu ọ gaa na-akwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Whitehill Higher Grade na ụlọ akwụkwọ John Street Higher Grate site na 1907 ruo 1920
Elizabeth na-eduzi klas mgbede iji nyere ndị na-asụ nsụ aka ma na-ekwu okwu gbasara ahụike na ịdị ọcha
Ọ guzogidere oku sitere n'aka ndị eugenicists ka ha webata 'ịmeziwanye agbụrụ' n'ime nkuzi ma kwenyere na 'ịdị ọcha mmekọahụ' bụ ọrụ nne na nna karịa ihe a ga-ewebata na klas

Elizabeth bụ onye isi oche nke Scottish Modern Languages Association (SMLA) ruo afọ abụọ wee bụrụ onye isi nkuzi nke Modern Languages na Bellahouston Academy na 1920 ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 1925

Ọ bụ onye isi ọha na eze na Glasgow ma nwee ọfịs na alaka Glasgow nke Class Teachers' Association na Educational Institute of Scotland (EIS) dị ka onye nhazi nke EIS Central Ladies Committee site na 1902 gaa n'ihu
Na June 1913, a họpụtara Elizabeth dị ka nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi oche nke EIS
O nwetara vootu 4,822 ma e jiri ya tụnyere ụmụ nwoke atọ ndị ọzọ na-azọ ọkwa, ndị ngụkọta vootu ha ruru 3,068

Na Jenụwarị 1914, Elizabeth kwetara na ajụjụ nke ịkwụ ụgwọ nhata bụ nke esemokwu maka ndị otu Scottish na English Teachers' Associations ma kpọọ maka imeziwanye ụgwọ ọrụ ndị nkuzi n'oge okwu onye isi ala ya na nnọkọ kwa afọ
Mgbe ọ na-akatọ ụgwọ ọrụ dị ala nke ụmụ nwanyị nkuzi, ọ rụrụ ụka na

'Ọ bụrụ na anyị ndị nkuzi arịọ ka e bulie ụgwọ ọrụ nke ndị nkuzi niile ugbu a ruo n'ókè nke ihe ndị nkuzi chere na ha kwesịrị ịbụ, anyị ga-ewepụ ọmịiko nke ọha na eze na-ekwenyeghị na ikpe ziri ezi nke ihe anyị chọrọ
Elizabeth Fish nwụrụ na Paisley Infirmary na 21 Machị 1944 mgbe ọ dara n'ụlọ
Ọ dị afọ 83
N'echi ya, akụkọ ọnwụ ya na Glasgow Herald kọwara ya dị ka 'onye mmeri nke ndị nkuzi nwanyị na Scotland'
Elizabeth Gregory OBE (4 Machị 1901-22 Ọktoba 1983) bụ onye prọfesọ mahadum New Zealand nke sayensị ụlọ A mụrụ ya na Dunedin, New Zealand, na 4 Maachị 1901
Na 1961 New Year Honours, a họpụtara Gregory dị ka onye isi nke Order of the British Empire
Elizabeth Habte Wold (a mụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye Ethiopia na-ese ihe nke a maara maka ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya
O nwetara nzere na nka na School of Fine Arts na Addis Ababa na Baltimore City Community College na Maryland, na MFA site na Mahadum Howard
O nwere mmasị na mgbasa ozi dijitalụ site na mmemme asambodo na mmekọrịta multimedia na imewe weebụ na Mahadum George Washington
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ kemgbe etiti afọ 1990 dị ka onye na-emepụta multimedia, ma biri na Addis Ababa

A kọwara ọrụ ya n'ihe ngosi nke afọ 2003 'Wold's small collages, made from torn newspapers and magazines, ponder the fragmented lives of displaced people, both [in the US] and in Ethiopia' E tinyere ọrụ ndị a na ihe ngosi otu akpọrọ 'Ethiopian Passages Dialogues in the Diaspora' na Smithsonian's National Museum of African Art
E gosipụtala ọrụ ya dị iche iche na National Museum of Ethiopia na Gebre Kristos Desta Center
Ọrụ Wold na nso nso a na-agụnye ihe nkiri kọmputa mgbe ụfọdụ
Elizabeth (Lizzie) Harriet Stevens Gray Bowser (1831-1908) bụ ónyé America na-arụ ọrụ aka, nwanyị ọchụnta ego, na onye ọrụ ebere
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'etiti narị afọ nke iri na itoolu na-aga nke ọma na njikọ ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo na Philadelphia, dị ka onye na-eweta ihe ịchọ mma maka ndị otu na dị ka onye nyere aka na òtù ọrụ ebere
Bowser bụ ónyé otu Household of Ruth, alaka ụmụ nwanyị nke Grand United Order of Odd Fellows
Ọ bụkwa onye otu na-arụsi ọrụ ike nke Ladies' Union Association nke Philadelphia, otu ọrụ ebere nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii nweere onwe ha guzobere n'oge Agha Obodo
Òtù Ladies' Union Association nwetara ego iji nye ndị bụbu ndị ohu enyemaka na nkwado màkà ndị agha ojii na-alọta site n'agha
Site n'ọrụ ya na òtù ndị a, Bowser ghọrọ enyi na onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ Emilie Frances Davis, onye ya na ya na-akpakọrịta ma na-aga klas ọmụmụ Bible
Bowser na di ya mụrụ ụmụ atọ Mary, Raphael, na Ida

Raphael Bowser sooro ụzọ nna ya wee ghọọ onye na-ese ihe; Ida Elizabeth Bowser Asbury ghọrọ onye na-eme violin na ónyé nkụzi egwu, ọ bụkwa nwanyị Africa America mbụ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Mahadum Pennsylvania

Elizabeth Klarer ( née Woollatt ; 1 Julaị afo 1910 – 9 Febrụwarị afo 1994) bụ nwanyị South Africa nke malite na afo 1956, kwuputara n'ihu ọha na ndị mba ọzọ kpọtụrụ ya ọtụtụ oge n'etiti afo 1954 na afo 1963
Nleta mbụ Klarer chere na ọ bụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa na ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ kwuru na ha na ndị ọzọ na-enwe mmekọahụ
Ọ kwalitere echiche nke ụwa ka mma na nkwenye na nsụhọ nke mbara igwe
N'akwụkwọ ya Beyond the Light Barrier, ọ gbalịsiri ike iziga ozi udo, ịhụnanya, nghọta na gburugburu ebe obibi, bụ nke ọ kwadoro na amamihe dị elu nke mmepeanya Venusian dị elu na nke na-adịghị mma
Ọ kwalitere echiche izu nzuzo nke mkpuchi mba ụwa nke debere ozi dị mkpa sitere na ọha mmadụ, ma kwuo na a tụrụ ya egwu na a tọọrọ ya iji tinye ya n'ikpughe nkọwa gbasara teknụzụ mba ọzọ
A mụrụ Elizabeth na afo 1910 na Mooi River, Natal, dị ka ada nke SB na Florence Woollatt
SB bụ dọkịta na-awa anụmanụ ọsụ ụzọ nke mechara biri n'ugbo Connington dị nso na Rosetta na Natal midlands
N'ebe a, ọ ghọrọ onye ọrụ ugbo shorthorn na-aga nke ọma, na dịka onye ọkpụkpọ polo raara onwe ya nye, webatara ndị na-eto eto na egwuregwu ahụ
N'ebe a, mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, Elizabeth na nwanne ya nwanyị tọrọ Barbara nwekwara nke mbụ e chere na ha zutere UFO
Mgbe ha na-azụ ụmụ nkịta ha Sealyham n'èzí ụlọ ọrụ ugbo Elizabeth na nwanne ya nwanyị kwuru na ha hụrụ otu diski ọlaọcha na-asa ahụ n'ime ihe na-egbuke egbuke pearly nke kpuchiri ha
N'otu oge ahụ, a hụrụ nnukwu mbara ala, oroma-acha ọbara ọbara na cratered planetoid ka ọ na-agbagharị ma na-atụgharị n'elu ikuku
Diski ahụ gbara ọsọ zute ya, na-agbagharị ma na-eduzi ya n'ebe ugwu, ebe planetoid ahụ hapụrụ ụzọ anwụrụ ọkụ na-ebilite
Naanị ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị, ya na Ladam, bụ́ onye na-elekọta ugbo Zulu ha, hụrụ ọzọ
Ladam kọwara ọhụhụ ahụ n'ihe gbasara akụkọ ifo Zulu
Mgbe ụfọdụ Elizabeth na-ezo aka na ọhụụ mbụ, mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ na afo 1913/14
Elizabeth matriculated si St
Anne's Diocesan College na Pietermaritzburg, ma kwaga na Florence, Italy, na-amụ nka na egwu
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gụchara diplọma afọ anọ na meteorology na Girton College, Cambridge, ma di mbụ ya kụziiri ya ka ọ fega ụgbọ elu Tiger Moth

N'afọ 1932, ụmụnne nwanyị atọ nke Woollatt na Maureen Taylor hiwere otu egwuregwu Polo nke Connington wee see otu egwuregwu megide otu ụmụ nwanyị Durban, nke a na-ahụta dị ka egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị mbụ edekọtara na South Afrika
N'ime ụgbọ elu nke afo 1937 si Durban gawa Baragwanath n'ụgbọelu Leopard Moth, a kọrọ na ya na di ya hụrụ otu saucer nke na-abịaru nso, gawara, wee pụọ n'ebe ha nọ
N'oge Agha IIwa nke Abụọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na RAF Intelligence
Ọ kwenyere na ike telepathic, ma gbalịa ịkwalite ikike ndị a kemgbe ọ bụ nwata
N'afọ 1954, nwanne ya nwanyị May, onye bi n'ugbo Whyteleafe na Natal midlands, gwara ya na ndị Zulu na -akọ banyere ọdịdị nnụnụ na-egbuke egbuke na mbara igwe
Na nzaghachi Elizabeth na ụmụ ya si Johannesburg gaa n'ugbo, ma ọ rịgoro Flying Saucer Hill n'echi ya, Disemba 27
N'ebe ahụ, ọ sịrị na ya ahụla ka ụgbọ mmiri kpakpando na-agbada
Ọ fegoro mita atọ n'elu ala, ebe ọ na-ekupụta naanị obere hum dị nro - anụ ahụ ya na-agbagharị, n'agbanyeghị na dome etiti ya ka guzoro

Onye na-ahụ maka mbara igwe nke mechara mata na ya bụ Akon ka a na-ahụ anya nke ọma site n'otu n'ime oghere atọ, mana mgbochi okpomọkụ sitere na ụgbọ mmiri ahụ gbochiri ya ịbịarute nso, ụgbọ mmiri scout ya gakwara ọzọ
Ihe dị ka ọnwa 18 ka e mesịrị, ọ gara n'elu ugwu ọzọ, ka a kọwakwuru banyere nnụnụ na-amụ amụ
N'oge a, na 7 Eprel afo 1956, Akon kuru ya n'ime ụgbọ mmiri scout ya, ọrụ nka ihe 60 feet (18 m) na dayameta
N'ime ya, ọ zutere onye ọkwọ ụgbọ elu nke abụọ, nke tojuru etoju na akpụkpọ ahụ gbara ọchịchịrị karịa Akon, onye e chere na ọ bụ ọkà mmụta ihe ọkụkụ yana ọkà mmụta mbara igwe
E boro ebubo na egosiri ya lens nke na-enye echiche site n'ala ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'ịbụ ndị nanị hum na-esi n'okpuru pụta na-enweghị mmetụta nke ijegharị, e bugara ha n'ime nnukwu ụgbọ mmiri nne nke yiri sịga nke nwere ime ụlọ dị ka ubi
Mgbe o zutechara ndị bi na ya, e weghachiri ya n'elu ugwu, nhazi yiri nke emere n'etiti Adamski na Orthon na afo 1952
N'oge nzute nsusu ọnụ e gbanwere na Akon kpughere na Elizabeth bụ n'ezie a reincarnated Venusian, na ogologo-efu soulmate
Ọ gara n'ihu kọwa na ha na-ewere ụmụ nwanyị ụwa ka ha bụrụ ndị mmekọ, dịka ụmụ ahụ ji mmịnye ọbara ọhụrụ sikwuo ike agbụrụ ha
O kwukwara na ọtụtụ ndị Venusians na-ebi n'etiti ụmụ mmadụ n'ụzọ aghụghọ
Site na 17 45 na 30 Eprel afo 1956, ndị na-ekiri ihe dị iche iche kwuru na ọkụ na-acha uhie uhie na-adị n'otu akụkụ nkume nke ugwu ahụ, nke dịgidere ebe ahụ ruo elekere 2 00 nke ụtụtụ
Enweghị ike ịhụ ihe ịrịba ama nke ọkụ ma emesịa

Na Julaị 17, afo 1956, mgbe eresịrị ugbo ezinụlọ ha, ọ gara nleta ọzọ na mpaghara ahụ ma kwuo na ya were foto igbe 7 nke Akon na-eji obere igwefoto Brownie (ma ọ bụ nwa nwanyị) nwanne ya nwanyị dị mfe
Ọkụkụ ọkụ na-egbuke egbuke tụgharịrị ghọọ ọrụ isi awọ na-adịghị ahụkebe nke kpuchiri n'ọkụ ọkụ na-egbuke egbuke
Ruo otu elekere, diski ahụ gbapụrụ na nzuzo n'elu ịrị elu dị nso n'ụlọ ọrụ ugbo, na-eme ọtụtụ ụzọ ịkwa akwa, na ọ na-enwu dị ka ọlaọcha na ìhè anyanwụ na-egbuke egbuke tupu ọ pụọ n'anya
Edgar Sievers, onye na-ahụ maka ufoloji si Pretoria, kwuru na ezinụlọ ya hụrụ ka ọ hapụrụ ụlọ naanị ya, ma tụọ aro na Elizabeth na-esighị ike ga-esiri ya ike ịtụba ụgbọ ala wee see ya foto n'otu oge
O kwukwara na ọ nweghị ihe eji eme hubcap egosipụtara nke ọma iji yie diski dị na foto a
N'April afo 1958, a kọrọ na usoro kọntaktị malitere nke mere ka akụkọ ya dị iche na akụkọ UFO bụ ọkọlọtọ na afo 1950s
Nleta nke Akon ejedebe na mkparịta ụka ụbọchị ya na Elizabeth nọ n'elu ugwu dị elu nke Cathkin Peak, bụ ebe o chere na ọ nyere ya mgbanaka ọlaọcha nke mere ka njikọ telepathic ha dịkwuo elu
Ihụnanya ha mezuru wee mụọ nwa
Mgbe afọ ime terrestrial ya na ụgbọ ala MG ya, e bugara ya na afo 1959 na Akon's home planet, Meton, chere na ọ na-agbagharị Proxima Centauri na sistemu ọtụtụ kpakpando dị nso Alpha Centauri
N'ebe ahụ ọ mụrụ nwa nwoke, bụ́ onye aha ya bụ Ayling
Ọ nọrọ n'azụ na Meton ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ, ebe Elizabeth na-enweghị mmasị lọtara n'ụlọ
Ma jijiji nke mbara ala Meton chere na ọ metụtara obi ya, ya mere e kweghị ka ọ laghachi ebe ahụ, kama nata nleta nlebanya sitere n'aka Akon na Ayling
Njem ahụ dum, nnyefe na njem nleghachi ahụ chọrọ ihe na-erughị ọnwa anọ, ogologo oge zuru oke iji mee ka ọ nọrọ afọ itoolu na Meton
Klarer weghaara oge karịa tupu o bipụta akwụkwọ, Beyond the Light Barrier (1980), gbasara ihe nlere anya nke ụwa

Na njem nkuzi ụwa ya na njedebe afo 1950s, George Adamski mere ka ọ gaa na South Afrika ma na-ele anya Klarer maka mkparịta ụka banyere ahụmahụ dịgasị iche iche ha na ndị enyi, ndị maara ihe 'ụmụnna oghere' Ka ọ na-erule oge ahụ, ọ bụghị naanị Klarer bụ onye na-eso Adamski nwetara ohere-nne
Mgbe nwanne ya nwanyị na ọgọ ya nwụsịrị, Elizabeth si Natal lọta na Johannesburg
N'ebe ahụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo oge ụfọdụ n'ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ CNA, mana ọ hụrụ na ndụ obodo na-akụda mmụọ
Site na afo 1950s gawa n'okwu ya na-adịghị mma mere ka ọ bụrụ onye nta akụkọ na-amasị ya, bụ onye na-amasịkwa ịkwa ya emo
Ọ nabatara ndị nta akụkọ ọ bụla, n'ihi na mgbasa ozi Akon bụ ihe kacha mkpa - ọrụ ndụ dị oke mkpa
Edith Nicolaisen ama okụt mbụk aban̄ade mme n̄kpọ oro enye ekenyenede ye edinyene nneme ye enye ke Flying Saucer Review of Nov-Dec afo 1956
Akwụkwọ ozi Nicolaisen na Elizabeth nwere mkpụrụedemede iri abụọ na atọ, nke e dere site na afo 1956 ruo afo 1976
O bipụtara akụkọ Klarer na obere akwụkwọ nta I rymdskepp över Drakensberg na afo 1959, mbipụta nke abụọ pụtara na 1967

Site n'ihe dị ka afo 1960 ruo afo 1966 Elizabeth rụrụ ọrụ na ihe odide maka akwụkwọ ya, nke gụnyere ugbu a Akon love saga, n'ihi na ọ pụghị 'zoo eziokwu n'okwu ndị a' N'afọ 1968, Elizabeth kwetara ka onye ọkà mmụta sayensị bụ Cynthia Hind gbaa ya ajụjụ ọnụ, akwụkwọ Hind dere akụkọ ya pụtara na magazin Fate nke August n'afọ ahụ
Ufologist Kitty Smith guzobere kọntaktị na Elizabeth mgbe ọ gụchara gbasara ya na magazin Outspan, wee kwuo na ọ hụrụ ụgbọ Akon n'onwe ya na Jenụwarị afo 1984
Mgbe South Africa ọzọ, Ann Grevler, kwuru na kọntaktị ọbịa na njedebe afo 1950s, Elizabeth kwusiri okwu ike ma nye ya ihe ịma aka dị iche iche iji chebe nkwupụta ya na nnọkọ mepere emepe
N'otu aka ahụ ọ katọkwara Philipp Human chere na ọ na-akpakọrịta site n'ọhụụ, nke a butere ọgbaghara n'etiti ha
N'echiche ya, ndị mmadụ agaghị adabere na usoro ndị dị otú ahụ
Na 1975 Hermann Oberth kpọbatara ya ka ọ gaa ọgbakọ 11th International Congress of UFO Research Groups na Wiesbaden, Germany
O nyere adreesị n'ebe ahụ na 2 Nọvemba, nke ọ nwetara ekele dị ukwuu maka ya
Na May 1992 Smith haziri okwu nke Klarer na Unidentified Flying Object Club na Pietermaritzburg
Nke a na-ewu ewu nke ukwuu nke na ìgwè mmadụ ahụ toro nke ukwuu nke na ha agaghị enweli ya
Elizabeth ji ikwesị ntụkwasị obi mee ncheta ụbọchị Eprel 7 nke njikọ ya na Akon site na ịlaghachi na Flying Saucer Hill
N'otu oge, ọ bụ ndị na-anya ụgbọ elu helikopta SAAF bụ ndị na-achọ ebe mgbaba n'ugbo n'oge oké ifufe, ha mere ka ha gaa n'ugwu ahụ mgbe ịnya ịnyịnya na-esiri ya ike
Di ya nke atọ Aubrey Fielding nwụrụ na 1981 na ntụ ya na-awụsa n'elu ugwu
Elizabeth nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa kansa ara mgbe ọ dị afọ 84, na-ahapụ akwụkwọ ya nke abụọ The Gravity File emechabeghị
Akwụkwọ ahụ jupụtara na oghere nke mbụ, ewezuga ịkọwapụta akụkụ ndị agha na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke nyocha UFO, na ịkọwa teknụzụ 'electro-gravity propulsion' nke Akon
Tupu ya anwụọ, ọ kọọrọ ndị ọ maara na Ayling (dị ka Akon) bụ onye na-agụ kpakpando ugbu a, bụ onye na-agafe eluigwe na ala ya na nna ya, nwanyị ohere ya Clea, na nwa ha nwoke
Ọkachamara Ufologist Thomas Streicher kwubiri na nkwuputa nke Klarer anaghị akwado nke ọma, n'agbanyeghị na ndị akaebe kwadoro ụfọdụ n'ime ha
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, nwanne ya nwanyị na di mbụ gbara akaebe ihe ngosi UFO abụọ, mana ndị akaebe enweghị nkwenye iji gosi afọ ime ya, amabeghị ma edepụtala ya
Ọ na-eche na ọ bụ na ọ bụ onye na-eche echiche efu nke chepụtara nnọọ ọtụtụ ahụmahụ ya
Nwa Elizabeth David, karịsịa, enweghị ncheta maka ihe omume, ọnụnọ ma ọ bụ afọ ime nne ya nke nwere ike jikọta ya na ihe ngosi mbara igwe a na-ekwu na 1959
Ọkà mmụta Ufologist Cynthia Hind kwuru nkwenye zuru oke nke Elizabeth na ọ na-ekwu eziokwu, ọ dịghịkwa mgbe ọ na-eche na ọ kpachaara anya na-agha ụgha
Hind chere na a ga-ata echiche nke na-arụsi ọrụ ike ma ọ bụ echiche efu sitere na nrọ-ọnọdụ ọṅụ maka enweghị ike na enweghị nkwekọrịta dị na akụkọ ya

Ma Hind na Smith na-ezo aka n'ihe ndị otu ọha na-ahụ Akon, na Hind kwubiri 'Ihe ndị a niile chọrọ nyocha na oge eruola ka anyị kwụsị ịhapụ ikpe [ụdị ahụ] nke, n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-ada ka hoaxes, o doro anya na ọ bụghị otú ahụ' Ufologist Edgar Sievers, onye gbakwara ezinụlọ ya ajụjụ ọnụ, nwere afọ ojuju zuru oke na ahụmịhe ya, opekata mpe ruo yana foto ndị ahụ, bụ nke anụ ahụ kama ịbụ mmụọ mmụọ

Ọkà mmụta Ufologist Philipp Human na mbụ kwakọbara Elizabeth otuto nke ukwuu, ma emesịa gbanwee ọnọdụ ya “Ekwetaghị m otu okwu n'ime ndị o chere na ọ na-akpakọrịta, ọ bụkwa ihe ọchị ka e si nyere ya aka ịse foto ụgbọ ala nkịtị

Ọtụtụ ihe maka foto ya […] Nke ahụ bụ tupu ọ tinyekwuo ihe iji kọwaa afọ ime ya nke onye hụrụ ya n'anya Venusia kpatara, […] M na-ekpe ekpere ka a ghara ibipụta akwụkwọ a' Nke a bụ Edith Nicolaisen zara, sị 'Atụla egwu, anyị agaghị ebipụta [akụkọ nke onye Venusian hụrụ ya n'anya, mana] ọ ga-amasị m ibipụta akwụkwọ nta ahụ gbasara kọntaktị ya
Ekwenyere m na ọ nwere ụdị kọntaktị'
Isi Mensa nke Johannesburg ejighị obiọma kwuo okwu ya ma kpasuru ya iwe n'oge okwu ya
Ihe akaebe siri ike maka nkwupụta ya na ọ na-agwa House of Lords na 1983, nakwa na a gụpụtara akwụkwọ ya n'ime afọ ahụ na nzuko UFO na United Nations
Ihe akaebe siri ike nke Elizabeth gosipụtara gụnyere ihe osise ya nke 1956, mgbanaka ọ nwetara n'aka Akon, nkume oghere ma ọ bụ kristal, na fern sitere na Meton
Di ya na-akwado Aubrey nọgidere na-agbagwoju anya maka ịhụnanya nwunye ya nwere n'ebe Akon nọ, a kọrọ na ọ na-ekwu, 'Nke ahụ dị m mma - ọ bụrụhaala na ọ na-anọ na mbara ebe ọ bụ'
A na-akpọ Elizabeth Klarer na abụ Ọbụna Elizabeth Klarer na album Shakey is Good (2008) nke onye na-agụ egwú South Africa Jim Neversink dere
Elizabeth Klarer bụ isiokwu lekwasịrị anya na Episode 477 Elizabeth Klarer nke pọdkastị ihe ngosi Podcast Ikpeazụ n'aka ekpe
Elizabeth Michael (Lulu) (a mụrụ n'abalị 16, ọnwa April, afọ 1995) bụ onye Tanzania na-eme ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2013, o ritere ihe nrite Zanzibar International Film Festival maka Best Actress maka 'Woman Of Principles'
O nwetakwara ihe nrite Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards nke afọ 2016 maka Best Movie Eastern Africa
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2017, Africa Youth Awards kpọrọ ya n'etiti 100 Most Influential Young Africans
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2017, a mara ya ikpe maka igbu ọchụ n'amaghị ama maka ọnwụ Steven Kanumba n'afọ 2012 ma maa ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ abụọ
N'April 26, 2018, na emume Union nke Tanzania, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị mkpọrọ onye isi ala John Pombe Magufuli gbaghara ebe e belatara ikpe ya
E mechara tọhapụ ya na Mee 9, 2018 mgbe ọ nọsịrị ọnwa isii n'ụlọ mkpọrọ iji rụọ ọrụ obodo maka oge fọdụrụnụ mgbe ọ gosipụtara omume ọma mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ ikpe
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018 ọ gwụchara nnwale ya
A mụrụ Michael ma zụlite ya na Dar Es Salaam, Tanzania
Nna ya bụ Michael Kimemeta, nne ya bụ Lucrecia Kalugira
Ọ gara Remnant Academy maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya, na Perfect Vision High School, St Mary's High School maka agụmakọta sekọndrị ya
Ọ sonyeere Tanzania Public Service College ebe ọ nwetara diplọma ya na Human Resource Management
Michael malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya dịka nwa na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ ise
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Mahasin Awadh (Dr Cheni) bụ onye chọpụtara ya n'oge ọ na-achọ nkà

Ọ kpọgara ya na Kaole Sanaa Group, ebe ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri telivishọn ebe ọ pụtara na Dira ebe ọ na-eme Nemu, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ gụnyere Zizimo, Baragumu, Gharika, Taswira, na Demokrasia nke a maara nke ọma n'afọ 2000
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'okpuru aha Lulu, aha a maara ya taa
N'afọ 2005, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na nkiri a na-akpọ Misukosuko
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2018, Michael kwere Francis Ciza (Dj Majizzo) onye nwe EFM Radio na TVE nkwa ọlụlụ
Di na nwunye ahụ lụrụ n'ụbọchị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2021
N'ọnwa Julaị 2021, ha mụrụ nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Jenesis
Mụ na Diana Kimaro na Hashimu Kambi
Mụ na Flora Mtegoa, Linah Sanga
Mụ na Kulwa Kikumba na Isarito Mwakalikamo
Elizabeth Maruma Mrema bụ onye ndu Tanzania na onye ọka iwu, dabere na Montreal, Canada ugbu a, họpụtara odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) na 2020
Ọ bụ nwanyị Africa mbụ nwere ọrụ a
Ọ nabuburu ọtụtụ ọkwa onye isi na mmemme gburugburu ebe obibi nke United Nations

Mrema nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Iwu na Mahadum Tanzania nke Dar-es-Salaam, wee nweta nzere Master of Law na Mahadum Dalhousie na Halifax, Canada yana Diploma Postgraduate na Mmekọrịta Mba Nile na Diplomacy sitere na Center of Foreign Relations and Diplomacy in Dar- es-Salaam, Tanzania
Tupu ya na UNEP malite ọrụ, Mrema rụrụ ọrụ na Mịnịstrị nke mba ofesi na mmekọrịta mba ụwa na Tanzania, na-eje ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ/onye isi ndụmọdụ gbasara iwu
Ọ gụkwara nkuzi na iwu mba ụwa na ogbako ogbako na Tanzania's Center for Foreign Relations and Diplomacy
Elizabeth Nyamayaro bụ onye sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye bụbu onye ndụmọdụ ukwu nke Under-Secretary-General na Executive Director for UN Women

Nyamayaro bụkwa onye isi nke HeForShe, otu òtù nke ụmụ nwanyị UN guzobere iji nye ụmụ mmadụ niile ike, ọkachasị ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwoke, inwe olu ma mee ihe iji nweta nha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na ndụ ha
A mụrụ Nyamayaro n'aka na Zambia ma ya bụrụ otu n'ime ụmụ anọ
Ọ bụ nne nne ya zụlitere ya n'otu obodo dị na Zimbabwe nke nwere nje HIV na ụnwụ nri
Kama ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ ma na-achọ nri ebe ọ bụla o nwere ike
Mgbe ụkọ mmiri ozuzo n'afọ iri asatọ hapụrụ obodo ya n'agụụ, Nyamayaro zutere UNICEF na nke mbụ ya
Nke a bụ oge mbụ ụnwụ nri dakwasịrị obodo ya ma ọ ritere uru site n'aka ndị ọrụ enyemaka UN na-enye ya nri site n'oge ruo n'oge
Mgbe ahụmịhe ahụ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya ịrụ ọrụ maka United Nations ma nyere aka ma bulie ndị ọzọ dị ka enyere ya aka
Ọ bụ mgbe ụnwụ nri mbụ gasịrị ka ezinụlọ ya kewara ma ya na nne nne ya nọrọ ebe nne na nna ya, nwanne ya nwoke, na ụmụnne ya nwanyị abụọ gara n'isi obodo Harare ịchọ ọrụ na ohere
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, nwanne nne ya nwere ego zuru ezu iji kpọga ya n'isi obodo Harare ma soro ụmụaka Britain gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye nke bụ oge mbụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Nke a bụ oge dị mkpa na ndụ ya ka ọ nwere enweghị nhata na nke mbụ ya n'ihi na ọ dabara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ mana ọ dịkwa ya ka ọ dị elu karịa obodo ya ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ugbu a
Ọ hapụrụ obodo Zimbabwe mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu ịga obere kọleji na Notting Hill Gate, London
Mgbe ọ biri na London na Geneva, Nyamayaro bi ugbu a na mba New York City
Nyamayaro nwetara MSc ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site na London School of Economics and Political Science
Nyamayaro gara Harvard Business School
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Nyamayaro bụ onye ndụmọdụ dị elu nye Under Onye Odide ebe dum na Onye nnọchiteanya na atuzi aka màkà UN Women na onye isi HeForShe Movement
Njikọ mbụ Nyamayaro maka UN Women bụ iwebata onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-arụ ọrụ Emma Watson ka ọ bụrụ ihu nke Njem HeForShe
Tupu ọrụ ya maka UN Women, Nyamayaro rụrụ ọrụ maka Merck, otu n'ime nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ n'ụwa
Dị ka akụkụ nke Senior Leadership n'ime Corporate Strategy Office na Merck, ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji gaa n'ihu n'ọhụụ Merck nke ịgbasa ohere ọgwụ na mba ndị na-emepe emepe

O lekwasịrị anya ma malite atụmatụ ndị inyom dị mkpa gụnyere 'Merck for Mothers,' nkwekọrịta $ 500 nde iji belata ọnwụ nne, 'Saving Mothers, Giving Life', atụmatụ ya na Gọọmentị US na odeakwụkwọ nke steeti Hillary Clinton na-elekwasị anya na ahụike nne na n'ikpeazụ, 'Pink Ribbon Red Ribbon Alliance' nke ya na George W
Bush Institute, UNAIDS, Susan G
Komen na PEPFAR jikọrọ aka na mgbochi ọrịa kansa akpa nwa
N'ime afọ iri na ise gara aga, Nyamayaro anọ kwara n'ọkwa na UNAIDS, World Health Organization na World Bank
N'ebe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji kwado atụmatụ ahụike ọha na eze
Na ma na ngalaba ọha na eze ma nke onwe, Nyamayaro arụwo ọrụ n'ihu mmepe Afrịka ihe karịrị afọ iri
N'ọnwa Mee, n'afọ 2015, Nyamayaro mere ihe nkiri TED Talk maka TEDWomen nke akpọrọ, 'Ọkpụkpọ òkù maka ụmụ nwoke chọrọ ụwa ka mma maka ụmụ nwanyị'
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Machị, na afọ 2016, okwu TED ya enwetala 1,240,141 n'anya
Tụkwasị na nke a, o guzobere IQ Afrịka, ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị uru nke na-achọ inye aka na uto na mmepe akụ na ụba nke Afrika
Nyamayaro bụ onye na-akwado nkà ihe ọmụma Ubuntu
Elizabeth Ogbaga bụ onye ọka ikpe Naijiria, nọọsụ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A hoputara ya n’ime ulo ome iwu nke gọọmentị etiti Naijiria n’afo 2007 ka o nochite anya ndi Ebonyi na Ohaukwu
A hoputara ya n’okpuru otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndi People's Democratic Party (PDP)
Hon
Elizabeth Ogbaga bụ onye otu kọmitii ndị a
N’ọnwa Disemba, afọ 2009, Hon Elizabeth Ogbaga gosipụtara enweghị afọ ojuju ya n’ihe ọ kpọrọ ọkwa dị ala nke mmejuputa atumatu dị n’ime bọjeti afọ 2009
Ọ na-akwado ọtụtụ iwu na atụmatụ ma na-akatọkarị adịghị ukwụu nke ụmụ nwanyị na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na-ekwu na ọ metụtara ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Hon

Elizabeth Ogbaga dọtara ọrụ dị iche iche dịka- Oxygen Plants na igwe Mammogram gaa Federal Medical Centre, Abakaliki, ọrụ nlekọta nwa na-enye ndị nne dị ime site na Ebonyi / Ohaukwu Federal Constituency n'efu, iwu ọtụtụ ụlọ klas atọ, olulu mmiri-mgbapụta na Onuenyim Ishieke, Ndiofia Nkaleke, Igweledoha, Ogbala Parish, Effenyim (Na-aga n’ihu), Oterufie Nkaleke, Ndiechi-Ndiugo Isophumini, Mbeke Isophumini, St
Michael Parish Mbeke Ishieke, Nwonuewo-Effium Ohaukwu, Ogen Ohaukwu na Umugadu Community Secondary School
O wuru National Health Care Centres na Izenyi Agbaja n'okpuru ọchịchị gọọmentị Izzi na Ohagelode (na-aga n'ihu) ma zụọ ihe karịrị ndị ntorobịa 50 na ICT yana inye ha kọmputa na akọrọngwa
Hon
Elizabeth Ogbaga gara n'ihu wuo akwa mmiri gafere osimiri Ebonyi na Odomoke nụzọ Ogene-Abarigwe-Ogwudu-Ano-Unum n'okpuru gọọmentị Ohaukwu

O wuru ulo oru komputa n'ulo akwukwo nke obodo Isophumini Ishieke, weputa oche ulo akwukwo na Umugadu community Primary School (na-aga n'ihu) ma weta tebụl ụlọ akwụkwọ, tebụl na oche na Ogbaga Primary School, Ohagelode Primary School, Girls Secondary School Ndulo Ngbo na Mbeke Isophumini Primary School
Na mgbakwunye, ọ wuru ụlọ ndị fada ụka katọlik nọ na St
Michael Parish Mbeke were nye ụlọ mposi pụrụiche n’ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Ohagelode, Ogbaga na Umugadu

O kwenyere na inye ndi ntorobia ike ma were kwado otutu okwu di iche-iche n'asọmpi egwuregwu bọọlụ na inye onyinye nke trofi, onyinye nke ego na nkesa jenaretọ, kilipa na akọrọngwa ha nye ndị ntorobịa a zụrụ azụ
Ka ọnwa Juun dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na atọ n’afọ 2015, Gọvanọ Dave Umahi nke steeti Ebonyi họpụtara ya dịka kọmishọna
Ndị isi ụlọ ọgbakọ omeiwu nabatara ya ma duo ya n'iyi na ọ ga-abụ onye isi nke Mịnịstrị Azụmaahịa ba ụlọ ọrụ n'ụbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Julaị, afọ 2015
Onuah Elizabeth (amụrụ na ụbọchị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 1995) bụ nwanyị afọ Naijiria na-ebu ibu
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo abụọ na clean na jerk na snatch lifts mgbe o mere nke mbụ ya na-anọchite anya Naịjirịa na 2015 All-Africa Games na Congo Brazzaville

Elizabeth Welch Orr CNZM (29 Ọktoba 1929 - 22 Eprel 2021, née Entrican) bụ onye nkuzi New Zealand na onye bụbu Chancellor nke Mahadum Victoria nke Wellington  Orr bụkwa onye ndu otu ndị ọrụ na onye na-akwado maka ịha nhata ụgwọ

Orr bụ ada onye injinia obodo na onye nchịkwa oke ọhịa Pat Entrican Ọ gara Samuel Marsden Collegiate n'etiti 1936 na 1942, na Nga Tawa Diocesan n'etiti 1944 na 1946 Orr gụchara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na Bekee na French na Mahadum Victoria nke Wellington na 1951
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Master Master's in English na First Class Honors na 1954, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Mahadum n'ime ngalaba Bekee dị ka onye nkuzi abụọ na onye nkuzi

N'agbata 1967 - 1980 Orr bụ nwanyị mbụ jere ozi dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke otu ndị nkuzi mahadum Orr ghọrọ onye otu Victoria University of Wellington Council na 1986, wee gaa n'ihu na-aghọ Pro-Chancellor na 1990
N'etiti 1991 na 1995 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Chancellor University - nwanyị mbụ mere ya

Orr nyere aka na nguzobe nke National Advisory Council for Employment of Women, ebe ọ jere ozi dị ka oche n'etiti 1971 na 1979, na-akwado maka Equal Pay Act na 1972 Orr bụ onye otu ụlọ ikpe nha nhata, na n'etiti 1975 na 1978 ọ jere ozi na kọmitii ịkwụ ụgwọ nha nhata Na mgbakwunye, Orr nyere aka na arụmụka iwu maka ụgwọ nha nhata 2014 Terranova Homes & Care Limited v Service and Food Workers Union Nga Ringa Tota Incorporated

Orr lụrụ odeakwụkwọ maka ikpe ziri ezi na onye otu ụlọ ikpe Waitangi Gordon Orr na 1997 Elizabeth Orr ghọrọ onye mmekọ nke New Zealand Order of Merit, maka ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na obodo N'otu afọ ahụ, Mahadum Victoria nke Wellington Council mekwara ya Dọkịta nke akwụkwọ nsọ Orr nwere echiche nchekwa maka nchekwa nke ụmụ anụmanụ na New Zealand na 2017 o bipụtara akụkọ ihe mere eme nke New Zealand Forest Service, gụnyere ịkọwapụta ọrụ nna ya dị ka onye isi nke oke ọhịa n'etiti 1939 na 1961
Orr nwụrụ na Wellington na 22 onwa Eprel na afo 2021 ọdị afọ 91
Elizabeth Phiri bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị obodo Zambia
Ọ bụbu onye omeiwu nke Kanyama Constituency n'okpuru Patriotic Front (Zambia), Elizabeth jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Mmekọahụ na gọọmentị Zambia
Elizabeth Strutt (1782-1867; fl
1805-1863 ), nke a makwaara dị ka Elizabeth Byron, bụ onye edemede na onye njem Bekee

Ọ bụ nwunye Jacob George Strutt na nne Arthur John Strutt, na onye maara ma na-akatọ Elizabeth Barrett Browning, onye ọ kọwara dị ka onye dere 'abụọ n'ime sonnets kachasị nzuzu na nke kachasị njọ n'asụsụ Bekee
'N'afọ 1820 na 1830 ọ gara France na Switzerland, wee soro di ya na-ebi na Lausanne, ma mesịa kwaga Rome
Ụbọchị ọmụmụ na ọnwụ Elizabeth Strutt ejighị n'aka O yikarịrị ka ọ bụ Elizabeth Frost e mere baptizim na Hull, ugbu a na East Riding nke Yorkshire, na 20 February 1783

Ọ bụ nwanne Charles Frost, Fellow of the Society of Antiquaries, nke Hull, na ada Thomas Frost onye ọka iwu Hull Enyere ya ụgwọ ezumike nka Civil List na 18 June 1863, yabụ enweghị ike ịnwụ tupu ụbọchị ahụ Lewis nyere 1782 maka ọmụmụ ya na 1867 maka ọnwụ ya

Akwụkwọ akụkọ atọ mbụ ya, Anti-Delphine (1806), Drelincourt na Rodalvi (1807) na The Borderers (1812) ka ebipụtara n'okpuru aha 'Oriakụ Byron' N'oge e bipụtara Genevieve, ma ọ bụ nleta Orphan na 1818 ọ bụ 'Oriakụ Strutt' Ruo 1832 ya na di ya Jacob George Strutt bi na Butterwick House na Hammersmith, ebe ọ 'gakwara n'ihu' ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị nke Miss Attwood
Ọrụ Elizabeth Strutt bipụtara gụnyere
Elizabeth Conway Symons, Baroness Symons of Vernham Dean PC (amụrụ 14 Eprel 1951) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Britain na onye otu azụmaahịa
Otu onye otu Labour Party, ọ bụ Minista steeti maka Middle East site na 2001 ruo 2005
Ọ bụbu odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke FDA Trade Union ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke Arab British Chamber of Commerce (ABCC) kemgbe 2010Àtụ Post-nominals
Emepụtara Symons ka ọ bụrụ onye ọgbọ ndụ ọrụ dịka Baroness Symons nke Vernham Dean, nke Vernham Dean na County nke Hampshire, na 7 Ọktoba 1996
Site na Mee 1997 ruo June 1999, ọ were ọkwa gọọmentị mbụ ya, na-eje ozi dị ka onye minista na-ahụ maka mba ofesi
Site na 1999 ruo 2001, ọ bụ onye Minista nke steeti maka ịzụ ahịa nchekwa yana, site na 2001 ruo 2003, onye minista steeti maka azụmaahịa
Site na 2001 ruo 2005, ọ bụ onye isi ala maka mba ofesi nwere ọrụ maka Middle East, Nchebe Mba Nile, Consular na Personal Affairs, na osote onye ndu nke House of Lords
Symons bụ ma ọ bụ ka bụ onye otu British-American Project (BAP)
Ọ nwere ndị otu 600 na ndị na-emepụta echiche, ndị si na mba abụọ ahụ, dị ka The Guardian si kwuo, ma na-enwe nzukọ kwa afọ ebe ihe niile a na-ekwu na-abụghị nke ndekọ
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi na bọọdụ ndị gọvanọ nke Ditchley Foundation
Elizabeth Talford Scott (February 7, 1916 eprel 25, 2011) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, nke a maara màkà akwa ya
A mụrụ Elizabeth Caldwell na nso Chester, South Carolina, ebe ezinụlọ ya bírí dị ka ndị na-ekere òkè na Blackstock Plantation, n'ala ebe nné na nnà ya ochie ghọrọ ohu
Ọ bụ nwa nke isii n'ime ụmụ iri na anọ (ụmụnne nwoke asaa na ụmụnne nwanyị asaa) nke Mary Jane na Samuel Caldwell mụrụ, na nwanyị nke atọ
Elizabeth tolitere n'ezinụlọ ndị omenkà na-eme ite, ígwè, basketry, quilting na ịkpa akwa
Ha bụkwa ndị na-akọ akụkọ
Nne na nna ya abụọ na-eme akwa, Elizabeth mụtara akwa mgbè ọ dị afọ itoolu
Nna ya bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụgbọ okporo ígwè nke na-anakọta ihe mkpofu ákwà na njem ya, ọ na-ejikwa ihe okike na-acha ihe mkpofu ahụ nke o ji mkpụrụ osisi na ụrọ mee
N'afọ 1940, n'oge Nnukwu Migration, Elizabeth kwagara n'ebe ugwu Baltimore, Maryland iji zere nkwenye na ịchọ ohere akụ na ụba ka ukwuu
Na Baltimore, Elizabeth Talford Scott rụrụ ọrụ ogologo ógè dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ, onye na-elekọta ụmụaka, na ónyé na-esi nri, ma kwụsị ịkpa ákwà site na 1940-1970
Mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ ndị ọzọ a, Elizabeth malitere ịkpa ákwà ọzọ, n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ mepụtara ụdị ya pụrụ iche nke gbasaa n'elu ihe ejiji ọdịnala nke ọ mụtara n'aka ezinụlọ ya
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ, akwa ọhụrụ ndị a na-ejikarị akwa, appliqué, ọrụ bead, sequins, net plastik na ihe ndị a chọtara dị ka nkume, bọtịnụ na mkpokoro
Akpụkpọ ahụ ya gbanwere n'ime ihe ndị dị omimi, na-abụkarị ihe na-adịghị ahụ anya na nke na-enweghị atụ, na-ezo aka na ememe ezinụlọ, akụkọ onwe onye, na gburugburu ime ọbọdọ nke nwata ya
Elizabeth na-eme ihe ọmụmụ na ngosipụta mgbe niile, ma na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro na nwa ya nwanyị, onye na-ese ihe Joyce J
Scott, iji kụziere ụmụ akwụkwọ banyere ọrụ ya

E gosipụtara akwa Elizabeth Talford Scott na Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts, Walters Art Museum, Baltimore Museum of Art, na New York na Museum of Biblical Art, Studio Museum of Harlem, Museum of American Folk Art, na Metropolitan Museum of Art
Na 1940 mgbe ọ kwagara Baltimore, Elizabeth Caldwell zutere ma lụọ Charlie Scott, Jr
si Durham, NC
Ha nwere otu nwá nwanyị, onye na-ese ihe Joyce J
Scott (b
Mgbè Joyce dị afọ iri na abụọ, Elizabeth na Charlie kewara

nwụrụ n'afọ 2005
Elizabeth na Joyce nọgidere na-ebi na Baltimore ruo mgbè Elizabeth nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị afọ 95 na 2011

Elizabeth Wanjiru Wathuti (amụrụ n'Ọgọst 1, 1995) bụ onye Kenya na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na ihu igwe na onye guzobere Green Generation Initiative, nke na-azụlite ndị na-eto eto ịhụ okike n'anya ma mara gburugburu ebe obibi n'oge ha dị obere ma ugbu a, ọ kụọla mkpụrụ osisi pụkụ ịrị atọ na Kenya
N'afọ 2019, e nyere ya ihe nrite nke Africa Green Person of the Year Award site na Eleven Eleven Twelve Foundation ma kpọọ ya otu n'ime 100 Most Influential Young Africans site na Africa Youth Awards
Wathuti gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Kenyatta wee nweta nzere bachelọ na Environmental Studies na Community Development
Wathuti tolitere na Nyeri County, nke a ma ama maka inwe oke ọhịa kachasị elu na Kenya

Ọ kụrụ osisi mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa wee gaa n'ihu guzobe klọb gburugburu ebe obibi na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya site n'enyemaka nke onye nkuzi ala ya, onye nyere onwe ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nkwado klọb ahụ

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi nke Kenyatta University Environmental Club (KUNEC) ebe o nwere ike ịhazị ma lekọta ọtụtụ ọrụ; dị ka ịkụ osisi, ihicha na agụmakwụkwọ gburugburu ebe obibi; ihe niile ka ọ na-eme ka mmata banyere nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi ụwa dị ka mgbanwe ihu igwe

N'afọ 2016, o guzobere Green Generation Initiative, nke na-elekwasị anya n'ịzụlite ndị na-eto eto na-anụ ọkụ n'obi maka gburugburu ebe obibi, agụmakwụkwọ gburugburu ebe obibi na ihu igwe, iwulite ikike ihu igwe na ụlọ akwụkwọ akwụkwọ akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ
Vidio ya 'The Forest is a Part of Me' bụ nke Global Landscapes Forum (GLF) gosipụtara dị ka akụkụ nke usoro na Youth Voices in Landscapes
Ọ bụ onye natara ihe nrite Wangari Maathai Scholarship maka mmasị ya pụrụ iche na mkpebi ya maka nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi
Wathuti bụkwa onye otu zuru oke nke Green Belt Movement, nke onye nwụrụ anwụ Prọfesọ Wangari Maathai guzobere bụ onye bụ ihe nlereanya Wathuti na nnukwu mkpali na mmetụta
N'afọ 2019 na International Youth Day, Duke na Duchess nke Sussex nabatara ya site n'ide ihe odide na Instagram ha maka ọrụ ya na nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi
E gosipụtakwara ya na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Queen's Commonwealth Trust
N'otu afọ ahụ, Greenpeace gosipụtara ya na Vanessa Nakate na Oladuso Adenike dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi ojii atọ na-eme ihe gbasara ihu igwe n'Africa na-anwa ịzọpụta ụwa
Elizabeth Weber (amuru June 18, 1923) bu aha pen Elizabeth Marais (née Elizabeth Olivier )

Ọ gara n'ihu n'oge dị mkpirikpi, nke siri ike nke mmepụta akwụkwọ dị elu na Afrikaans n'etiti afọ 1949 na 1952 (lee akwụkwọ akụkọ dị n'okpuru ebe a), mgbe nke a gasịrị, ewezuga nsụgharị nke akwụkwọ ụmụaka sitere na Bekee gaa na Afrikaans, na akụkọ nursery na Afrikaans bipụtara ka oge na-aga, ọ gbapụrụ n'ihu ọha
A mụrụ ya na June 18, 1923 na Germiston, obere obodo dị na East Rand, n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Johannesburg
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na 1939 site na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị bekee, ma mesịa nweta akara ugo BA na Mahadum Witwatersrand na Afrikaans, English na Classics dị ka ndị isi

Mgbe ọ nọsịrị afọ atọ ná mba ọzọ, ọ laghachiri na Johannesburg n’ọrụ ọfịs ya na otu ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na ndị na-ekesa akwụkwọ, ikekwe APB (Afrikaans Pers-Boekhandel) arụrụ arụ ọrụ ugbu a, nke isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na narị asaa, ịrị isii na itoolu na Johannesburg, South Africa
N'ụzọ dị ịrịba ama, odee bipụtara oeuvre ya dum site na APB
Ọ laghachiri n'ịkụzi ihe, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ dịghị ihe ọzọ edekọghị banyere ọrụ ya ma ọ bụ ebe ọ nọ
Ọ lụrụ Mazị Sarel Marais, ma mụọ ụmụ nwoke abụọ nke njikọ ahụ
O nwekwara otu nwanne nwoke, Reverend Phil Olivier nke Cape Town, onye bụkwa onye edemede, na nwanne nwanyị tọrọ, bụ onye raara ndụ ya nye egwu
Ọ natara aha nsọpụrụ site n'aka scions nke akwụkwọ nka nka nke Afrikaans, Nienaber, Senekal, na Bothma, bụ ndị, na-ede na mmalite afọ mgbe 1950s, kwuru, sị, '
n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị edemede (karịsịa ndị edemede) na ngalaba ịhụnanya siri ike

mmekọrịta, Elizabeth Weber, na nghọta ya banyere ka mmekọrịta dị mgbagwoju anya na-esi etolite, na onyinye ya nke inwe ike igosipụta 'onye ikwu' na mmekọrịta mmadụ, ewepụtala akwụkwọ edemede gbara ọkpụrụkpụ
Ikekwe ọrụ ya kacha ewu ewu, Waar bụ anwụ anwụ? APB bipụtara n'afọ 1950 na usoro Môrester ha
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ nwere, dị ka mis-en-scène, ụlọ nzuzo na oche nke liner na-aga Cape Town na-aga England ebe ihe omume na akara aka niile na-akpaghasị alụmdi na nwunye n'okpuru nrụgide
Dị ka akwụkwọ na-akatọ akwụkwọ akụkọ na-abaghị uru ugbu a, Die Vaderland, dere, sị, 'Ihe onye edemede na-enye ebe a bụ ma eleghị anya na-emegharị njem nke ya onwe ya mere
O doro anya na Elizabeth Weber nwere ụzọ abụọ na-amụ anya, anya na-emeghe
O nwere ikike iji ngwa ngwa ditil na hazie ihe ọ chọpụtara, na mgbe ahụ, n'ụdị mara mma, igosipụta ha

Njupụta nke asụsụ, iyi nke nlebara anya dị nro na nke ọma, oke nke uche, mmetụta na mmetụta, na iwe nke ịmara onwe ya na ederede ya bụ ihe niile na-echetara ụdị na ebumnuche nke Marcel Proust na Ncheta Ihe gara aga '
Weber, E
