Johannesburg APB (Afrikaanse Pers-Boekhandel)
Elizabeth 'Tex' Williams (amụrụ na 1924) bụ ónyé America na-ese foto
Ọ sonyeere Women's Army Corps na 1944 mgbè ọ dị afọ 20 dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Africa-America ole na ole na-ese foto na ndị agha
A mụrụ Williams na Houston na 1924, ébé a zụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ na-arụ ọrụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Women's Army Corps, ébé ọ nọ na Iowa na Arizona
O mechara laa ezumike nká na Huachuca City, Arizona

Williams gụrụ akwụkwọ na Photographic Division School na New Jersey na nsọpụrụ ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka ónyé na-ekwu okwu ikpeazụ n'ihi na ndị agha ekweghị ka ndị Africa America nọrọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị agha màkà foto
Williams rụrụ ọrụ na Women's Army Corps dị ka ónyé na-ese foto site na 1944 ruo 1970
E debere ya n'ụlọ ndị isi ojii niile dị na Iowa n'ihi na ndị agha ka na-ekewapụ onwe ha, omume nké na-adịgide ọbụna mgbè ndị agha 1948 kwụsịrị nke ịkpa ókè
Ébé ọ bụ na ndị agha kewara ekewa ruo mgbe Executive Order 9981, o were ọtụtụ foto nke ndị Africa America
N'ime na n'èzí ndị agha, Williams sere foto 'New Negro' nke gbanwere akụkọ ọdịnala nke ndị Afrịka
Williams sere foto ihe niile gbasara agha
O wèrè foto nzuzo, ọgwụ, nchekwa, na foto ID
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese foto nzuzo màkà ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo

Ndị ọkà mmụta dị ka Jeanne Moutoussamy-Ashe na Jacqueline Ellis kọwara Williams dị ka ónyé ọsụ ụzọ, onye agbụrụ ya na okike ya mèrè ka ọ nwee ihe ịga nke ọma dị ka ónyé na-ese foto, ma ya fọdụkwa na ndị agha America, nke ga-anọgide na-ekewapụ iche ruo n'afọ 1980, ọ bụ ezie na iwu gọọmentị kwụsịrị na 1948

A machibidoro ndị Africa America iwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ foto ndị agha na mmemme ọzụzụ, n'ihi ya, ọ ghaghị ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ Photographic Division School na New Jersey, ébé ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na onye Africa America gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ, nke o ji nsọpụrụ mee
Ọ bụ naanị ụmụ nwanyị na-ese foto ndị Air Force
Elizabeth Wyns-Dogbe bụ onye Ghana na-akwụ ụgwọ ụgwọ yana onye otu na Chartered Insurance Institute UK
Akpọrọ ya aha otu n'ime 'Female Trailblazers of the African Insurance Industry' site na African Insurance Bulletin na ọgbakọ 2019 African Insurance Organisation na South Africa
Na 2018, a kwanyere ya ugwu dị ka nwanyị ahịa nke afọ site na Chartered Institute of Marketing Ghana
Wyns-Dogbe gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ Kwame Nkrumah ma nweta nzere bachelọ na Sayensị ihe na Injinia
O jikwa akara ugo mmụta masters na Business Administration (Finance) na The Graduate School of Business of Central University College
O nwetakwara PhD na Theology site na Immanuel Bible Institute and Seminary, Brooklyn na United States
Wyns-Dogbe bu o
onye isi njikwa nke SIC Life Insurance Comp ugbu aanụlọọrụnye na-ahụ maka ndkenre steetwere ni na Ghana
A họpụtara ya ịrụ ọrụ na 2017
Tupu nke a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi njikwa UT Life Insurance na onye njikwa ọrụ ndụ na KEK Insurance Brokers Limited
Ọ bụ Onye Kraịst na onye ozi nakwa ụkọchukwu n'ụlọ ụka Jesus Generation Ministries
Elizabeth Xu bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego nke China, onye edemede, na prọfesọ ọkachamara na mmepe teknụzụ dị elu yana azụmaahịa dijitalụ gụnyere ngwanrọ-dị ka ọrụ, nnukwu data, na ngwanrọ ụlọ ọrụ mkpanaka
A mụrụ Xu na China
Nne ya bụ onye nkuzi mgbakọ na mwepụ na nna ya bụ prọfesọ Bekee
Xu nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na physics mbara mbara yana Master of Science na sayensị gburugburu na Mahadum Peking
Xu wee nweta nzere Master of Science na sayensị kọmputa yana PhD na sayensị ikuku sitere na Mahadum Nevada, Reno
Xu nwetara MBA site na Stanford Graduate School of Business
Xu bụ obere oge Chief Technology Officer maka CP Group, na CEO nke CP R&D, na-enyere ndị Digital mgbanwe maka narị ole na ole enyemaka ego na mkpokọta ego nke $45 ijeri na 350,000 ọrụ n'ụwa nile
Ọ bụ CTO na SVP na BMC Software
Xu bụkwa Group VP Engineering na Acxiom, SVP na Rearden Commerce na Vitria Technology
O jikwa ọkwa nchịkwa na IBM
Xu bụ onye edemede nke akụkọ ifo nke nkwalite Nzọụkwụ 10 iji nweta ọrụ na-aga nke ọma, onye nkuzi na Mahadum Stanford
Xu bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nwe patent na Architecture maka ikike asambodo dijitalụ n'ịntanetị na-anọghị n'ịntanetị
Xu bụ onye nnata nke ọtụtụ onyinye na nkwanye ugwu
Ella Cheever Thayer (September 14, 1849 October 28, 1925) bụ onye America na-ede egwuregwu na onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ
A mụrụ ya na mba Maine, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka telegraph ma bipụta ọtụtụ ọrụ n'oge ndụ ya
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke apothecary George Augusta Thayer (October 19, 1824 na December 13, 1863) na Rachel Ella Cheever Thayer (Ọktoba 18, 1823 - May 15, 1907)
Otu nwanne ya nwanyị, Mary Georgie Thayer (Ọktoba 9, 1869 na Machị 30, 1912), bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ

Thayer mechara bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka telegraph na Brunswick Hotel na Boston, Massachusetts, onye jiri ahụmịhe ya na telegraph dị ka ihe ndabere maka akwụkwọ ya Wired Love, A Romance of Dots and Dashes, nke ghọrọ akwụkwọ kacha ere ahịa ruo afọ (10) iri
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ede egwuregwu, ebe o dere The Lords of Creation n'afọ 1883
A na-enyocha egwuregwu ya n'akwụkwọ On to Victory Propaganda Plays of the Woman's Suffrage Movement nke Bettina Friedl, nke e bipụtara n'afọ 1990 ( ) ọ bụkwa otu n'ime egwuregwu ndị mbụ
O dekwara Amber, a Daughter of Bohemia, ihe nkịrị dị n'ime ihe ise, n'afọ 1883
O dekwara akụkọ mkpịrịkpị maka magazin gụnyere 'The Forgotten Past' na Argosy (Jenụwarị 1897)
O biri na Saugus, Massachusetts
Thayer nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa imeju; e debere ntụ ya n'ọnwa Nọvemba 1, n'afọ 1925 na Bigelow Chapel, dị na Mount Auburn Cemetery, Cambridge, Middlesex County, Massachusetts
Ella Ndatega Kamanya (9 Nọvemba 1961 - 31 Julaị 2005) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na nwanyị ọchụnta ego nke obodo Namibia
Ọ sonyeere South West Africa People's Organization (SWAPO) na afo 1978 ma lanarị Agha Cassinga n'oge esemokwu ya na ndị agha South Afrika
A họpụtara Kamaya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba Namibia n'afọ 2003, na-anọchi anya Hage Geingob
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2004, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Pan-Afrikan
A mụrụ Kamanya na 9 Nọvemba n’afo 1961 na Onangalo, Uukwaluudhi Kingdom, Ovamboland
Nna ya bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọchụnta ego a ma ama
Ọ tolitere n'ezinaụlọ Ndị Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi
N'afọ 1978, ọ sonyeere SWAPO na mba ọzọ, n'oge na-adịghịkwa anya mgbe ọ rutere Cassinga, Angola, ndị agha South African Defence Force wakporo ogige ebe ya na ndị Namibia ọzọ a chụgara mba ọzọ
E jidere ya n'oge Agha Cassinga nke Mee afo 1978, laghachi obodo South-West Afrika, ma mesịa tụọ ya mkpọrọ na Oshakati
Nwanyị ọchụnta ego site na ọrụ, Kamanya na-arụ ọrụ ihe nkiri na Ongwediva ya na Ondangwa tupu ọ banye na National Assembly
Ọ rịọrọ ka e lie ya n'ebe ugwu Obodo Namibia
N'ọnwa Machị nke afọ 2004, Kamanya chere nkatọ ihu maka ebubo nrụrụ aka na nkwekọrịta metụtara azụmahịa Black Economic Empowerment na obodo San nke obodo Namibia
Ọ gọnahụrụ ebubo ahụ wee nwụọ na Onwa Julai afo 2005
Onye isi ala Ella Koblo Gulama OBE, GCOR (26 Jenụwarị na afọ 1921, 9 Septemba, na afọ 2006) bụ onye isi ala na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Sierra Leone
N'afọ 1957, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na Sierra Leone
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'afọ 1962
N'oge ọchịchị Milton Margai, Gulama ghọrọ Sierra Leone na onye isi ala Sahara Africa nke mbụ
Gulama nọchitere anya Sierra Leone na mba ofesi na njem ya kpọgara ya n'Africa, Europe, North America na Middle East
N'afọ 1957 dị ka onye ọbịa nke Ngalaba Steeti, ọ gara mba United States ọnwa anọ n'oge ọ zutere osote onye isi ala Richard Nixon
Na 21 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1921, a mụrụ Gulama n'otu n'ime ezinụlọ ndị kachasị ike na Sierra Leone n'obodo Moyamba, Moyamba District na Southern Province nke British Sierra Leone
Nne ya bụ Lucy Gulama na nna ya bụ Paramount Chief Julius Gulama bụ ndị agbụrụ Mendes
Dị ka nna ya, Paramount Chief Momoh Gulama, Julius bụ Paramount Head of Kaiyamba Chiefdom
Ella gụrụ akwụkwọ na Harford School for Girls na Moyamba, na Women Teacher's College, mgbe ahụ na Fourah Bay College na Freetown
N'afọ 1944, Gulama lụrụ onye isi Paramount dị ike bụ Bai Koblo Pathbana II nke Marampa, Masimera Chiefdom, onye agbụrụ Temne
Njikọ agbụrụ ha bụ ihe atụ na-egbuke egbuke nke ịdị n'otu mba
Site na na afọ 1944 ruo na afọ 1952 Gulama biri na Lunsar ebe ọ bụ onye isi Consort
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ asaa, gụnyere Frances, Francis Obai, Jubilee, Alex Soccoh, June, Julius Maada, na Jilo
Koblo na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ ma na-asị Bekee, Mende, Temne, na Sherbro nke ọma
Gulama nwere ọrụ pụrụ iche na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma bụrụ onye ndu nwanyị ọsụ ụzọ
A na-akọwa ndụ ya site n'ozi
Ọ bụ onye otu Sierra Leone People's Party (SLPP), nke nna ya nyere aka guzobe
N'afọ 1957, Gulama malitere ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị wee bụrụ onye otu Moyamba District Council
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na House of Representatives nke Sierra Leone dị ka onye isi oche nke Moyamba District
N'afọ 1962, a họpụtara ya ọzọ ma Praịm Minista Milton Margai mere ya Minista
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọkwa minista na mpaghara Sahara Afrika
Site na afọ 1960 ruo na afọ 1967 Gulama bụ onye isi oche nke Federation of Women's Organisations na Sierra Leone
N'oge ọ bụ onye isi, o mere ka okporo ámá Moyamba dị mma ma were ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ na Britain n'ọrụ iji wụnye mmiri dị ọcha
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 1967, Gulama weghachiri oche ya ma na-eje ozi na ọchịchị Sir Albert Margai
Otú ọ dị, ndị mmegide All People's Congress (APC) meriri ọtụtụ ndị omeiwu
Esemokwu ike n'etiti ndị na-azọ ọkwa, Margai nke SLPP na Siaka Stevens nke APC sochiri, na-eme ka mba ahụ ghara ịdị mma ma na-akpata ngwa ngwa nke ndị agha
Mgbe ndị otu APC nke Steven mesịrị nweta ike wee malite ijide afọ 30 ha na Sierra Leone
E boro Gulama ebubo na ya na nwanne di ya David Lansana na-arụkọ ọrụ na nnupụisi ya megide Stevens
E jidere ya ma debe ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Pademba Road ihe karịrị otu afọ
E mechara wepụ ya ma tọhapụ ya
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, Stevens họpụtara di ya Paramount Chief Bai Koblo Pathbana II na kọmitii ya
Nnakwere di ya na-anọghị n'ọkwa ahụ mere ka mmekọrịta Gulama na Sir Albert Margai sikwuo ike karịa nke ọkachamara
A manyere Gulama ka ọ gaa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe Sir Albert Margai tụfuru ọchịchị
Na mbido afọ 1970, Gulama gbanwere ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya wee bụrụ onye ndú nke APC Women's Organisation of Moyamba District
Site na afo 1985 ruo na afọ 1991 Gulama jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke National Organization for Women (Sierra Leone)
N'afọ 1992, a họpụtara ya ọzọ dịka onye isi oche nke Kaiyamba Chiefdom
Gulama sooro ọtụtụ NGO rụkọọ ọrụ iji zụlite akụrụngwa na ọrụ ugbo nke Chiefdom na distrikti ya
Ndị mercenary Revolutionary United Front (RUF) bibiri Sierra Leone ma bibie Moyamba District, na-egbu ọtụtụ iri puku mmadụ ma na-ebibi ihe niile Gulama jiri ndụ ya na-ewulite
Mgbe ndị nnupụisi malitere mkpọsa igbu onye isi ọ bụla na mba ahụ
Ndị nnupụisi ji obi ọjọọ gbuo Chief Bunduka nke Kailahun District na Paramount Chief Bonai Fei nke Bo
Mgbe a wakporo ndị isi Gulama ma ndị nnupụisi gbara ụlọ ya ọkụ ma gbaa ya ọkụ
A manyere Gulama ịgbaga n'isi obodo Freetown
Ọ laghachiri Moyamba wee malite iwughachi Chiefdom ya na Moyamba District mana ahụike Gulama malitere ịda ya

Ka o sina dị, o nwere ike ịga n'ihu na-ejere mba ya ozi na Sierra Leone Export Development and Investment Corporation (SLEDIC) (1994X1996) dị ka otu n'ime ndị nduzi nke The Sierra Leone Commercial Bank Limited
Otu n'ime ihe na-atọ Gulama ụtọ bụ ịkwalite agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụ agbọghọ na imeziwanye ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na Sierra Leone
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na alma mater ya, Harford School for Girls dị ka onye otu Board of Governors
Gulama bụkwa onye otu gọọmentị ndị Sierra Leone Scholarship Advisory Board na Bursary Committee nke Fourah Bay College
Gulama bụ Onye Kraịst ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na United Methodist Church
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Nzukọ nke ụka na Finance na Administration site na afọ 1985 ruo na afọ 1991

Ọ bụ onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye gụnyere MBE na afọ 1959, OBE na afo 1965 site n'aka Eze Nwanyị Elizabeth maka 'ọrụ ọha na eze dị ka Minista na-enweghị Portfolio', na Grand Commander of the Order of the Rokel site n'afọ Onye isi ala Ahmed Tejan Kabbah
Gulama nwụrụ na 10 Septemba, na afọ 2006
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2006, ọtụtụ puku ndị na-eru uju gbakọtara iji gaa ememe ncheta ya na Trinity United Methodist Church na Moyamba
N'ozi ahụ, Onye isi ala Ahmed Tejan Kabbah kọwara ya dị ka 'nwanyi nke ihe', onye gbakwụnyere
Madam Ella Koblo-Gulama ebiwo ndụ kwesịrị nṅomi, dị ka nne, nwunye na nwanyị ọchịchị nke ike ya mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a na-akwanyere ùgwù
Ella Mae Irby (1923-2001) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A na-ejikọta ya na ndị Gee's Bend quilting collective, ya na nne ya, Delia Bennett, na nwa ya nwanyị Linda Diane Bennett
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Museum of Fine Arts, Houston
Irby kọwara itolite n'ime ime ọbọdọ na-ada ogbenye n'oge mmalite narị afọ nke 20 dị ka ihe siri ike na ihe na-abaghị uru
Anyị na-arụ ọrụ ugbo
bírí na ubi Brown, n'okpuru ihe ha kpọrọ 'ndị nwe ala'
Ogwe, ọka, ahịhịa, sorghum syrup, ezì, ehi
Laa azụ n'oge ahụ ị na-arụ ọrụ màkà cents iri atọ, cents iri anọ n'ụbọchị, ma site na nke ahụ ị na - akwụ ndị nwe ụlọ ụgwọ
Oge siri ike
Ha na-akpọ ya 'ọganihu' laa azụ n'oge ahụ
A manyere Irby na ezinụlọ ya ịghọrọ ogho iji gbanwere ụgwọ ụlọ n'ubi ha bi na ya ma kesaa ihe ọkụkụ
Irby mụrụ nwa mbụ ya, na ónyé na-eyi akwa, Lou Ida Bennett Mgbè ọ dị afọ 28
Ọ lụrụ Addison Irby mgbè ọ dị afọ 32
Irby mụtara ịkwa ákwà site n'aka nné ya, ónyé na-ete ihe na-acha ma na-emepụta ihe ndị na-eme ka ụmụ ya na-eji akpa fatịlaịza eme ihe
A kụziiri Quilting site n'agbụrụ matriarchal nke ezinụlọ ya ma na-eme ya n'ọtụtụ ebe
Johanna Ellaphie Ward-Hilhorst (n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Julaị 1920 Pretoria rụọ úbọchị irí àtó n'ọnwa June 1994 Cape Town) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe ọkụkụ na South Africa
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Pretoria
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Pretoria Girls' High School, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na 1939 dị ka onye na-ese map na Ngalaba Nnyocha nke Witwatersrand Gold Mines
Na ngwụcha Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ kwagara Netherlands iji mụọ ihe osise mmiri n'okpuru anya nwanne nna ya Gerhardus Hilhorst, ónyé omenkà akụkọ ihe méré eme'

Mgbè ọ laghachiri South Africa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụwa mgbasa ozi dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na-ere ahịa na Cape Town na Johannesburg rụọ mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká na 1970 mgbè o mechara nwee ógè iji tinye áká na nkà ya dị ka ónyé omenkà botanical
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ na-enwe ịhụnanya na mmasị mgbè niile màkà ụdị Pelargonium, ọ malitere igosi ụdị niile a maara
Nnukwu ọrụ a méré ka e bipụta mpịakọta atọ na 1977, 1981 na 1988
Nchịkọta niile nke narị atọ na iri na anọ mbụ mmiri-acha na otu narị na iri isii ejiji sketches na pensụl bụ nke Brenthurst Library na Johannesburg nwetara na 1989
A chọtara efere Pelargonium zuru ezu na ụlọ ọrụ ya mgbè ọ nwụsịrị n'ike
Ọ bụ ónyé ọrụ na-arụpụta ihe, na-emecha ihe karịrị ihe osise mmiri narị asatọ n'ime afọ irí na ànó
Ụdị ndị ọzọ ọ rụrụ ọrụ gụnyere Sarcocaulon, Haemanthus, Rhus, Plectranthus, Hessea, Strumaria, yana Gasteria, Serruria na Diascia
Ọ nọ na nnukwu ọchịchọ site n'aka ndị ọkà mmụta ihe ọkụkụ iji gosipụta osisi site na mpaghara ha

E bipụtara irí ànó na abụọ n'ime ihe osise ya na Fiowering Plants of Africa ma o nyekwara aka ugboro ugboro na Bothalia, Aloe, SA Journal of Botany, National Cactus & Succulent Journal, Cactus & succulent Journal (USA) na Veld & Flora
Ihe atụ nke ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nkè Hunt Institute for Botanical Documentation, Pittsburgh, USA, Shirley Sherwood Collection yana ọtụtụ nchịkọta onwé ónyé dị mkpà

The Botanical Society of South Africa nyèrè ya Cythna Letty Medal na 1988 South African Association of Botanists nyere Certificate of Merit na onyinye ya na usoro botany na 1990 ọ natara Gold Medal màkà ihe osise Haemanthus na Royal Horticultural Society Exhibition na London
A na-echeta ya na Pelargonium ellaphieae E
Marais, Gasteria ellaphiee Evan Jaarsveld na Tylecodon ellaphieceae Van Jaarsv
Purrier gara ma gụchaa na Mahadum New Hampshire, na-amụ ihe oriri
Na-anọchite anya New Hampshire Wildcats, ọ bụ onye NCAA Division I 11-oge All-American
Na 2018 USA Outdoor Track and Field Championship, nke emere ka ọ gụchara, ọ gụchara nke isii na 1500 mita, na-agba ọsọ nke 4 0930
Ọ meriri 2018 NCAA Indoor Track & Field Championship na mile ụmụ nwanyị

Ellen Banks (n'ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Juun, 1938 rụo ụbọchị irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Mée, 2017) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi na-eji naanị egwu e biri ebi dị ka ihe mkpali maka ihe osise ya
A mụrụ ya na Boston, Banks nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na-enyocha ma ihe osise ma egwu ma Piet Mondrian kpaliri ya
Banks nwetara nzèrè bachelọ ya na Massachusetts College of Art, na-amụkwa na School of the Museum of Fine Arts
Ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya mèrè n'onwe ya n'afọ 1962
Naanị afọ ise ka e mesịrị, na 1967, ọ natara Prix de Paris, a na-egosikwa ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ebe
Kemgbe afọ 1981 ọ na-eji egwu egwu dị ka ihe ndabere màkà ọrụ ya
Banks malitere ọrụ ya na 1962 na gallery mbụ ya
Na mgbakwunye na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Massachusetts College of Art, Banks natara ọzụzụ site n'aka César Domela na Hans Jaffé
Ọ na-enweta mkpali site na naanị egwu egwu e biri ebi kemgbe 1981

Ọ na-ezo aka n'onwe ya dị ka 'ónyé na-ese ihe na-anọchite anya ụdị abstracts', a na-egosikwa ọrụ ya pụrụ iche na gallery gafee United States na Europe gụnyere Galerie Spandow, Artu Gallery, na Museum of Modern Art (NYC)
Ọ kụziri ihe osise na School of the Museum of Fine Art na Boston (1974-1996), ébé o nwetara ọtụtụ onyinye na ego enyemaka
Banks anọwo na Brooklyn màkà ọtụtụ ọrụ ya
Ellen Coleman (1886-1973) bụ onye nduzi na onye na-ede egwu n'England
Stainer & Bell bipụtara ọtụtụ ọrụ Coleman
Ellen Gallagher (amụrụ na Disemba 16, 1965) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onwe onye na nke otu ma na-eme ya na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke ọtụtụ nnukwu ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie
Mgbasa ozi ya gụnyere eserese, ọrụ na akwụkwọ, ihe nkiri na vidiyo
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe odide ya na-ezo aka n'ihe gbásárá agbụrụ, ma nwee ike ijikọta usoro na echiche agbụrụ ma gosipụta 'ụkpụrụ iwu' ọha mmadụ na-etinye
A mụrụ Gallagher na Disemba 16, 1965, na Providence, Rhode Island
A na-akpọ ya African American, ọ bụ agbụrụ abụọ; ihe nketa nnà ya sitere na Cape Verde, na Western Africa (ma a mụrụ ya na United States), nné ya bụ Caucasian Irish Catholic
Nne Gallagher bụ ónyé Irish-American na-arụ ọrụ na nna ya bụ ónyé ọkpọ ọkpọ
Gallagher nwetara nkwado dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na 1995
Tupu ihe ngosi Gagosian ya, Gallagher nwèrè ihe ngosi onwé ya na Mary Boone na Soho, New York, na Anthony D'Offay na London
Dị ka ihe ngosi mbụ ya na New York, Gallagher họọrọ ohere Mary Boone n'ihi nnọpụiche ya, ebe o kwuru, 'n'ihi na n'ebe ahụ, àgwà ndị na-adịghị ahụkebe nke ọrụ m pụtara na mbụ'
Otu n'ime nsọpụrụ ndị Gallagher nwetara bụ
E gosipụtara ọrụ Ellen Gallagher n'ihe ngosi onwé ónyé n'ọtụtụ gallery na ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere
Ihe ngosi otu gụnyere
Ellen Gunhilde Hørup (29 Disemba 1871 na 25 March 1953) bụ onye nta akụkọ Danish na onye edemede na-abụghị akụkọ ifo
O dere ọtụtụ ihe na asụsụ dị iche iche dika Bekee iji kwado udo, mmelite na nlekọta ụmụaka, na ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Hørup bụkwa onye na-akwado Mahatma Gandhi, na-arụ ọrụ na ya ruo oge ụfọdụ

A mụrụ ya na Copenhagen, Hørup tọrọ n'ụlọ dị egwu n'oge ahụ ka nne ya nọrọ na-akụzi kama ị zụlite nwa ya nwanyị n'ụlọ ebe nna ya, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Viggo Hørup, bụ onye a maara maka pacificism ya
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ zụrụ dị ka dọkịta ezé, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Denmark (1893) na France (1894), ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka obere oge nke ọzụzụ ọzụzụ
N'afọ 1886, ọ lụrụ onye ọka iwu Vilhelm Nielsen onye n'oge na-adịghị anya ghọrọ onye isi egwuregwu na akwụkwọ akụkọ Politiken
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ọ gara n'ihu n'amaghị ama, ma e wezụga ịgbakwunye aha ya nwere onwe ya site n'ịghọ nwanyị mbụ na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri na onye na-agba ịnyịnya ígwè na Denmark
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri anọ, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ntụgharị, na-emepụta nsụgharị Italian nke akụkọ Hans Christian Andersen
N'afọ 1912, o bipụtara edemede mbụ ya na Tilskueren tupu ọ banye na Politikken dị ka onye ntụgharị
Ọ bụghị ruo 1927 ka o bipụtara nke mbụ n'ime usoro ogologo edemede na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ
N'ihi ihe ọmụma ya dị mma banyere Bekee, Russian na Italian, a na-eche na ọ bụ nwanyị Danish mbụ dere edemede banyere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba ụwa tupu Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
N'afọ 1930, o guzobere Indiens Venner (Ndị enyi nke India) yana akwụkwọ akụkọ nwere otu aha ahụ, na-egosipụta alaka nke òtù ndị enyi nke India gburugburu ụwa
N'afọ 1932, o guzobere Kọmitii Mba Nile maka India nke nwere ọtụtụ nzukọ na Geneva
Ọ nwere onwe ya n'ụzọ ego mgbe nne ya nwụrụ ka ọ keta òkè na akwụkwọ nna ya malitere
N'ịga n'ihu n'ọrụ nna ya, ọ bụ onye na-akwado Indian Congress Party na Mahatma Gandhi
Ya na onye na-ese ihe Cathinca Olsen na onye na na-agụ egwu Norwegian Bokken Lasson, ya na Gandhi rụkọrọ ọrụ na 1920s na 1930s
Mgbe oge dị jụụ n'oge agha ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere iri ide edemede na 1949, na-akatọ karịsịa enweghị nlekọta ụmụaka a haziri ahazi na Denmark na ọnọdụ na-adịghị mma n'ụlọ ụmụaka
O guzobere ụlọ ụmụaka nke ya wee bụrụ onye otu alaka Danish nke Fédération Démocratique Internationale des Femmes, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Danmarks Demokratiske Kvindeforbund
A mụrụ Sirleaf na Monrovia nye nna Gola na nne Kru-German
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na kọleji West Africa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na United States, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Madison Business College na Harvard University
Ọ laghachiri Liberia ịrụ ọrụ na ọchịchị William Tolbert dị ka osote onye minista na-ahụ maka ego site na 1971 ruo 1974
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọzọ na West, maka Ụlọ akụ Ụwa na Caribbean na Latin America
N'afọ
O meriri na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2005 wee banye n'ọkwa na 16 Jenụwarị 2006
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'afọ 2011
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na Afrịka a họpụtara dị ka onye isi ala nke mba ya
O ritere ihe nrite Nobel Peace Prize n'afọ 2011, maka mbọ ọ gbara iji mee ka ụmụ nwanyị banye n'usoro udo
O nwetala ọtụtụ onyinye ndị ọzọ maka ndu ya
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2016, a họpụtara Sirleaf dị ka onye isi oche nke Economic Community of West African States, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ jidere ọkwa ahụ kemgbe e kere ya

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị n'ezie Americo-Liberian n'ihe gbasara ọmụmụ, n'ihi nzụlite nne na nna ya na agụmakwụkwọ nke ya na West, a na-ewere Sirleaf dị ka omenala Americo-Liberian, ma ọ bụ chee na ọ bụ Americo-Liberian
Ndị mụrụ ya abụọ tolitere na Monrovia, bụ ebe etiti mmetụta Americo-Liberia, mgbe amuchara ya n'ime ime obodo dara ogbenye
Sirleaf akọwapụtaghị nke a
Nnoseng Ellen Kate Kuzwayo (29 June 1914 – 19 Eprel 2006) bụ onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na South Africa, bụrụkwa onye nkuzi site n'afọ 1938 ruo 1952
Ọ bụụrụ onye isi otu National Congress Youth League na 1960
N'afọ 1994, a họpụtara ya ịbụ nzuko omeiwu South Africa nke mbụ mgbe apartheid gasịrị
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ndụ ya, Kpọọ M Nwanyị (1985), meriri CNA Literary Award
Amụrụ Nnoseng Ellen Serasengwe, Kuzwayo sitere na ezinaụlọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Nna nna ya, Jeremaiah Makgothi, bụ nne ya si na Orange Free State kpọga na Cape ka ọ gaa ụlọ ọrụ Lovedale, ihe dịka nke afọ 1875
Ọ ruru eru dị ka onye nkuzi ma rụọkwa ọrụ dị ka onye ntụgharị okwu n'ụlọikpe na onye nkwusa Methodist
Makgothi bụ nanị onye nkịtị so Robert Moffat rụkọọ ọrụ na nsụgharị nke Bible gaa na Setswana
Ma Makgothi na nna Kuzwayo, Philip S
Mefare, nọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Makgothi bụ odeakwụkwọ ngalaba Orange Free State nke South African Native National Congress, Mefare bụ onye nọchiri ya, African National Congress
Kuzwayo malitere akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Makgothi wuru n'ugbo ya na Thabapatchoa, ihe dị ka kilomita iri na abụọ site na Tweespruit, Orange Free State
Ọ gara Adams College, Amanzimtoti, wee malite nkuzi nkuzi na Lovedale College na Fort Hare, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 22 wee malite ọrụ nkuzi
Ọ lụrụ Ernest Moloto mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ iri abụọ na abụọ, di na nwunye ahụ nwekwara ụmụ nwoke abụọ, ma alụmdi na nwunye ahụ enweghị obi ụtọ, na mgbe di ya mejọsịrị ọ gbagara Johannesburg
O nwere akụkụ dị ka eze nwanyị shebeen, n'akụkụ Sidney Poitier na ihe nkiri 1951 Cry, Obodo a hụrụ n'anya
Mgbe alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya gbasasịrị, ọ lụrụ Godfrey Kuzwayo n'afọ 1950
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkụzi na Transvaal ruo afọ 1952, na-ahapụ nkuzi na ntinye nke Bantu Education Act, 1953, bụ nke belata ohere maka agụmakwụkwọ nwa ojii
Ọ zụrụ azụ dịka onye ọrụ na-elekọta mmadụ (1953-55)
N'afọ 1940s, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke otu ndị ntorobịa ANC

Mgbe ọgba aghara nke 1976 Soweto gasịrị, ọ bụ naanị nwanyị na kọmitii 10 hibere ịhazi ihe gbasara obodo na Soweto, na ihe omume ya butere njide ya ọnwa ise na 1977-78 n'okpuru Iwu Mgbochi nke Iyi ọha egwu
Ọ ga-akọ akụkọ ejidere ya n'ịgba akaebe 1996 ya na Commission Truth and Reconciliation Commission
Ihe omume obodo ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere ije ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Black Consumer Union nke South Africa na Maggie Magaba Trust
Na mbipụta 1985 nke akụkọ ndụ ya, Call Me Woman, bụ nke ọ kọwara na di ya na-eti ya ihe, Kuzwayo ghọrọ onye edemede ojii mbụ nwetara ihe nrite akwụkwọ edemede South Africa, Award CNA

Ka ewechara Nelson Mandela dị ka onye isi ala South Africa n'afọ 1994, Kuzwayo ghọrọ onye otu nzuko omeiwu izizi nke ọtụtụ agbụrụ nke mba ahụ, ọ dị afọ 79, ma jee ozi afọ ise ruo June 1999, mgbe ọ bụ onye omeiwu South Africa kacha ogologo oge
Ya na onye isi Betty Wolpert, Kuzwayo tinyere aka n'ime ihe nkiri akwụkwọ akụkọ Teta site na iru uju (1982) na Tsiamelo -- A Place of Goodness (1983), nke dọtara na akụkọ banyere ịchụpụ ya
ala ugbo ezinulo
Kuzwayo nwụrụ na Johannesburg, ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na otu, nke nsogbu sitere na ọrịa shuga, nke ụmụ ya nwoke, Bobo na Justice Moloto, ụmụ ụmụ na ụmụ ụmụ nwụrụ
N'afọ 1979 Ellen Kuzwayo bụ nwanyị nke afọ site na akwụkwọ akụkọ Johannesburg The Star, a họpụtara ya ọzọ n'afọ 1984
N'afọ 1987, e nyere ya nzere doctorate nke Iwu sitere na Mahadum Witwatersrand, nwanyị ojii mbụ nwetara akara ugo mmụta nsọpụrụ na mahadum
Ọ nyekwara nzere nzere bachelọ nke Mahadum Natal na Mahadum Port Elizabeth
Nelson Mandela nyere ya Order of Meritorious Service n'afọ 1999
Akpọrọ ụgbọ mmiri nyocha mmiri South Africa aha ya n'afọ 2007
Ellen Mills Scarbrough (13 Nọvemba na afọ 1900, Maachị, na afọ 1983) bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Liberia
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ụlọ na 1959, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ na ndị omeiwu
A mụrụ Mills Scarbrough na Arthington na afọ 1900
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na College of West Africa, ọ gara Mahadum Howard na Washington, DC, ebe ọ nwetara BA
O mechara nweta MA na Mahadum Columbia
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Liberia, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi
N'afọ 1947 ọ bụ onye otu ndị nnọchi anya Liberia na United Nations
N'afọ na edochie ya, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ nke ntụziaka ọha
Afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, e buliri ya n'ọkwa ka ọ bụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ
Mahadum nke Liberia mekwara ya onye Doctor of Education
N'afọ 1959, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchiteanya ụlọ, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ nọdụrụ na ụlọ ma ọ bụ Senate
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke National Federation of Liberian Women
O mechara nye gọọmentị ala, ebe e guzobere ụlọ ọgwụ ndị isi mgbaka Catherine Mills
Ọ nwụrụ na Monrovia na Machị, na afọ 1983
Ellen Powell Tiberino (1937 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1992) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nke na-etinye ọrụ n'ọdịnala ihe atụ na mmụọ ndị Africa America
Isiokwu ndị ọ laghachiri ugboro ugboro n'ọrụ ya gụnyere ndụ na akụkọ ihe méré eme nke ndị Africa America, na ngosipụta nke ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ nwanyị na ọnọdụ ndụ dị ka ime ime na ịbụ nne
O gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ebe na Philadelphia na New York
A na-edebe ihe osise na ihe osise ya na Philadelphia Museum of Art, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ónyé nduzi ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie Anne d'Harnoncourt nwèrè mmasị karịsịa na ikike Powell Tiberino nwèrè iji gosipụta àgwà na ojiji ọ na-eji ahịrị eme ihe, na-akọwa ya dị ka 'dị ndụ ma dị ike'
A na-eto Powell Tiberino dị ka 'ónyé isi nwanyị Africa-America na-ese ihe na Philadelphia'
Ellen Powell bụ nwá nwanyị nke William na Queenie Powell, ndị Baptist sharecroppers bụ ndị si Cape Charles, Virginia kwaga Philadelphia, Pennsylvania na 1937, naanị izu ole na ole tupu amụọ Ellen
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, Ellen ghọrọ ónyé Katọlik
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Overbrook, wee gaa Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts (1956-1961)
Ọ bụ nwanyị ojii nke abụọ natara Cresson Traveling Scholarship, na 1959, nke ọ na-eme njem na Europe
Ọ bírí na New York City màkà afọ isii sochirinụ
N'afọ 1967, ọ lụrụ Joseph Tiberino, onye na-ese ihe na Katọlik nke Itali nke toro na Philadelphia ma gaa Mahadum nke Arts
N'ime ụmụ ha, Raphael Tiberino, Ellen Tiberino na Gabriele Tiberino aghọwokwa ndị omenkà Philadelphia a ma ama
Ellen Powell Tiberino nwụrụ na 1992, mgbè ọ lụchara ọgụ afọ iri na anọ na ọrịa kansa
Ọbụna mgbè ọ nọ n'àkwà, ọ nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ, na mgbawa nke ọrụ okike nke na-emegide ọnwụ
Ọ gwara di ya, 'Ana m agbalị ịrụ ọrụ ngwa ngwa n'ihi na enweghị m ógè dị ukwuu fọdụrụ
' E jirila ụfọdụ n'ime foto onwe ya tụnyere ọrụ Frida Kahlo
Ọrụ ya na-abụkarị ihe gbara ọchịchịrị, gụnyere ihe ngosi nke lynchings na ihe omume akụkọ ihe mere eme na-egbu mgbu
Evelyn Redcross nke October Gallery kwuru 'Ọ nwèrè ike igosi gị akụkụ nke ndụ ị nwèrè ike ọ gaghị achọ ịnagide

' Otu ihe na-ese okwu karịsịa bụ ihe a tụrụ atụ atọ, nke dị mita asaá nke akpọrọ The MOVE Confrontation, nke Powell Tiberino na di ya mepụtara na nzaghachi màkà ọdachi MOVE nke 1985 nke ụmụaka ise nwụrụ
Ihe osise ahụ na-egosi ndị mmadụ na-ere ọkụ, nke Mayor W
Wilson Goode lere anya, ndị na-ekiri ihe na-atụ egwu, na ihe nkpuchi ọnwụ
E gosipụtara ya na Mahadum Temple, a kọrọ na ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ hụrụ ya na-enye nsogbu ma na-enye nchegbu, gụnyere nwa nwanyị Goode
E hotara Powell Tiberino ka ọ zaghachiri na 'M na-ese ndụ, ndụ anaghịkwa mma mgbe niile
N'afọ 1999, ụlọ ya dị na 3819 Hamilton St
na mpaghara Powelton Village nke Philadelphia na mpaghara ogige dị ogologo na Spring Garden na Hamilton Streets, ghọrọ Ellen Powell Tiberino Memorial Museum of Contemporary American Art
Dị ka di ya, Joseph Tiberino, si kwuo, 'Anyị chọrọ igosi ọrụ ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ, kwa, na ngosi pụrụ iche
Anyị chọkwara ịmepụta nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke ọrụ site n'aka ndị ọgbọ Ellen
' Mpaghara ahụ gụnyere ma ihe osise ya na nke ndị ezinụlọ na ndị enyi ndị ọzọ, na-emepụta ọrụ ya 'n'ime ihe okike ya, nke na-atọ ụtọ na okpukpe yana ụdị ọzọ

Ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí na New Jersey bụ Derrick Woodyard esorowo Joseph Tiberino na ndị ọzọ nọ n'ezinụlọ rụọ ọrụ iji mepụta ihe nkiri ogologo oge banyere Ellen na ezinụlọ Tiberino ndị ọzọ, nke akpọrọ Tiberino The Art of Life
Ellen Robinson (14 Machị 1840 6 Machị 1912) bụ onye nkuzi Britain, onye ụkọchukwu Quaker, onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-eme udo
O guzobere Liverpool na Birkenhead Women's Peace and Arbitration Society (LBWPAS) ma jee ozi na kansụl nke International Peace Bureau
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na Peace Society, International Arbitration and Peace Association, na Religious Society of Friends
Robinson jiri nzụlite ya dị ka onye nkuzi kwuo okwu ugboro ugboro na-akwado ụkpụrụ ndị na-emegide agha
Mary Jane Cooke onye bụ osote odeakwụkwọ nke Peace Union kwadoro ya
Robinson, karịsịa, megidere militarism nke Britain nke Agha Boer nke Abụọ na South Africa ma kwuo okwu megide mmegbu ndị Europe na-emebi ikike mmadụ n'Africa na Eshia
Robinson rụrụ ọrụ maka imekọ ihe ọnụ n'etiti òtù udo
Ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na ndị ọzọ na-eme mkpọsa udo na ndị inyom gụnyere Eugénie Potonié-Pierre, onye ya na ya haziri ọtụtụ nzukọ na Paris, na Priscilla Hannah Peckover
Ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 1903 ma Mary Jane Cooke weghaara ọnọdụ ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ na Peace Union
Cooke anọwo na-edezi akwụkwọ akụkọ udo, War or Brotherhood, site n'afọ 1896
Robinson nwụrụ na Liverpool n'ụbọchị 6 Machị 1912
Ellen Thomas (a mụrụ na Jenụwarị 24, afọ 1947) bụ onye America na-ahụ maka udo
O bu ụzọ tinye aka na White House Peace Vigil na Eprel 13, afọ 1984
Nwa nwanyị nke onye agha mmiri US, a mụrụ Thomas na Brooklyn ma too na California
Ọ malitere imegide ngwá agha nuklia n'oge ọ bụ nwata
N'ime mkpesa megide iwu gọọmentị United States, ọ ghọrọ onye na-eguzogide ụtụ isi site n'ibi ndụ n'okpuru ọnụ ọgụgụ ụtụ isi
Na Mee 6, 1984, Ellen Benjamin lụrụ Thomas na agbamakwụkwọ Quaker ka ọ bụrụ Ellen Thomas
Thomas na di ya mere ngagharị iwe ọnụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Jenụwarị afọ 2009 n'ọrịa akpa ume
Ellen na-edukwa The Proposition One Non-Radioactive Nuclear Review, otu ndị na-eme njem multimedia nke na-akụziri ọha na eze ihe ize ndụ nke ọdịnihu nuklia
N'afọ 1993, o nyere aka n'ịhazi atụmatụ ntuli aka nke Washington DC maka Nuclear Disarmament na Economic Conversion
Ellen jere ozi na bọọdụ ndị nduzi nke Washington Peace Center, mana kemgbe ahụ ọ kwagara North Carolina
The Oracles of Pennsylvania Avenue (2012) nke Tim Wilkerson, ihe ngosi nke Al Jazeera Documentary Channel nyere iwu, na-akọ akụkọ ndụ William na Ellen Thomas, Concepción Picciotto na Norman Mayer
Elliot Reed (amụrụ n'afọ 1992) bụ ónyé America na-agba egwu na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọrụ ha na-agụnye ịgba egwu, vidiyo, arụmọrụ na ihe ọkpụkpụ ma na-enyocha mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ahụike, ógè, na usoro
Reed egosila na mba ụwa na ebe ndị dị ka MoMA PS 1, New York, Kunsthaus Glarus, Switzerland, na The Getty Museum, Los Angeles
Reed bụ ónyé ọkà mmụta 2019 danceWEB, 2019X20 Artist in Residence na The Studio Museum na Harlem, na ónyé natara 2019 Rema Hort Mann Emerging Artist Grant
A mụrụ Reed n'afọ 1992
Reed gụsịrị akwụkwọ na The School Of The Art Institute Of Chicago na BFA na 2011 mà ga-agụsị akwụkwọ na Institut Chorégraphique International - CCN Montpellier na MA na Choreography na 2023
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2014, Reed bụ ónyé guzobere, ónyé nduzi, na naanị ónyé ọrụ nke Elliot Reed Laboratories
Nke a bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta dị n'ime ahụ onye na-ese ihe
Elliot Reed Laboratories nwèrè ikike nwebisiinka na The Library of Congress na ikikere azụmahịa Los Angeles County
N'afọ 2017, Reed mere COMEDY na Nous Tous Community Gallery na Chinatown nke Los Angeles

Ihe ngosi Reed nke afọ 2018 gụnyere ihe ngosi otu iji kwanyere nne nne ya, America's Procession, na Ajụjụ narị ise ebe Reed na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-agagharị na Getty Museum na ejiji na-ekwughachi naanị okwu ajụjụ
Ihe ọzọ, Two Business Women Trek To An Undisclosed Location, nwere Reed duziri ụmụ nwanyị azụmaahịa abụọ ka ha si n'otu nsọtụ nke Union Station Los Angeles Metro system gaa na nsọtụ nke ọzọ
Maka ebe obibi Reed's Studio Museum, Reed dere akụkọ banyere ikpe Ed Buck
Ọrụ ahụ gụnyere ihe ngosi onwé ónyé nke ụda olu na mmegharị
Reed bụ ónyé na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri Ron Athey
N'afọ 2021, na Participant Inc, Athey na Reed mepụtara ígwè obibi akwụkwọ mmadụ màkà ndị na-ege ntị nwere ike ịhụ ihe osise ahụ site na windo nke ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị uru
Maka mpempe akwụkwọ MoMA PS1 na-esote, Reed nọ n'uwe kadinal ma kwuo 'ebo ezinụlọ Swarovski ebubo maka nkwekọrịta ya na ndị Nazi n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ'

Màkà mbipụta FIVE nke ónyé na-ese ihe Nina Chanel Abney haziri màkà ónyé nduzi ụlọ ngosi Jack Shainman Joeonna Bellorado-Samuels's roving gallery, We Buy Gold, Reed gosipụtara Quarantine Ballet (2020)
E ji ihe ndekọ smartphone ise wuo vidiyo ahụ
Reed nyèrè ákà na MIT Press's The Dance Review Winter 2020 mbipụta na edemede banyere Performance Art Is
N'afọ 2021, Reed gosipụtara, This Longing Vessel Studio Museum Artists in Residence 2019, n'akụkụ ndị na-ese ihe E
Jane na Naudline Pierre na MoMA PS 1

Ntinye ahụ gosipụtara ọtụtụ ihe a tụrụ atụ, mgbidi ndị e sere ese nke na-ezo aka na agba nke nyocha dijitalụ ya, na vidiyo multichannel dabere na mpụ nke Ed Buck, ónyé nyere aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Democratic na California
E boro Buck ebubo na ọ na-enye ọgwụ ọjọọ nke dugara n'ọnwụ nke ndị isi ojii ọ were n'ọrụ màkà mmekọahụ
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, Reed gosipụtara, Three Works, na OCDChinatown na New York
Ihe ngosi ahụ were isiokwu ma nyochaa nkọwa nke ːDrawing
Na Machị 2021, Reed rụrụ, Enter the Facilitatrix, na Mahadum Monmouth
Ná ngwụcha 2021, Reed gosipụtara na Switzerland na nké mbụ ya na Kunsthaus Glarus

Ihe ngosi ahụ, nke akpọrọ Rhythm, gụnyere ọrụ vidiyo dị íchè íchè, ụlọ na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na-enwu ọkụ na neon, ọgba tum tum Yamaha ànó na ndị ọkà okwu ànó, mgbidi mma nke ọkara etinye n'ime mgbidi ahụ
Ha gosipụtara n'akụkụ Bri Williams na Puppies Puppies

Reed nọ na panel ya na Art + Practice's Public Programs and Exhibitions Manager Joshua Oduga iji kwurịta banyéré akụkọ ihe méré eme Ellliot dị ka onye na-ese ihe na njikọ nke teknụzụ, mmekorita, na ihe ọkpụkpụ
Elliott Jerome Brown Jr
(amụrụ n'afọ 1993) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ihe na onye na-ese foto
N'afọ 2019 ha natara Emerging Visual Arts Grant site na Rema Hort Mann Foundation
N'afọ 2017, Brown gụsịrị akwụkwọ na BFA na Mahadum New York na Tisch School of Arts
Ha gakwara Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture n'afọ 2017
Ọrụ Brown sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ Deana Lawson, Carrie Mae Weems, na Lorna Simpson
Ọrụ ha malitere site n'ilekwasị anya na onyinyo onwe onye iji nyochaa mgbagwoju anya nke okike na njirimara
Ọrụ Brown na-agwa ndị isi ojii okwu site na iji mmekọrịta chiri anya nke ihe osise dị ka ụzọ isi jụọ echiche ndị e chepụtara echepụta banyere ihe ọjọọ na oji
Ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na ndị na-emepụta ejiji nyere Brown ọrụ, gụnyere New York Magazine, Gayletter Magazine, The New Yorker, Vice, Teen Vogue, Dazed, W Magazine, na Telfar Clemens
W Magazine, Vice, na The Fader gosipụtara ọrụ ha
N'afọ 2017, Brown so jịkọ Devin N
Morris duzie 'Zine and Self-Published Photo Book Fair' nke asaa kwa afọ, nke akpọrọ Rock Paper Scissors and a Three-Armed Shovel
Ellis Walter Ruley (ubochí atọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 1882 rụo ụbọchị irí na isii n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1959) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé ọrụ
Ọ malitere ise ihe n'afọ ndị 1930 n'ụlọ ya na Norwich, Connecticut na-eji ágbá ụlọ na katọn na Masonite
N'oge ndụ ya, Ruley rere ihe osise ya n'ógbè ahụ ma bụrụ ónyé a ma ama mgbè ọ nwụsịrị n'afọ ndị 1990
Ruley rụrụ ọrụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndụ ya niile n'ọrụ iwu ụlọ, ma nwee otu nwa nwanyị site na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya
Ruley nwụrụ na 1959 n'ọnọdụ a na-amaghị ama
E nwere esemokwu gbara ọnwụ ya gburugburu, ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụghị ihe doro anya ma ọ nwụrụ site na ihe mberede ma ọ bụ site na igbu ọchụ
A mụrụ Ellis Ruley n'ubochí atọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 1882 na Joshua Ruley na Eudora Robinson
Joshua Ruley na Robinson nwere ụmụ nwoke anọ na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, nke Ellis Ruley bụ nke okenye
Dị ka Diane Laiscell, nwà nwà Ellis Ruley, si kwuo, Ruley etinyeghị oge dị ukwuu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ n'ihi na ọ ghaghị ịmalite ịrụ ọrụ mgbè ọ dị obéré iji nyere aka kwado ezinụlọ ya
Joshua Ruley lụrụ Eudora Robinson, onye amụrụ na Kingston, Rhode Island
Dị ka ụmụ ụmụ Ellis Ruley, Delois C
Lindsey na Sheila L
Traynum si kwuo, a mụrụ Robinson n'afọ 1851 ma bụrụkwa onye Afrịka-Amerịka na ụmụ amaala Amerịka
Otu akụkọ kọwara Joshua Ruley dị ka ohu gbapụrụ agbapụ nkè amụrụ na Wilmington, Delaware na 1847 tupu ọ gbapụ North na njedebe nkè Agha Obodo
Laiscell ekwenyeghị n'ikwu ihe Joshua mere na otu o si rute Norwich, anyị agaghị ama
E nwèrè obéré ihe ọmụma banyéré ndụ Jọshụa
A maghị mgbè Ruley malitere ise ihe, ebe ọ bụ na enweghị ụbọchị ọ rụrụ ọrụ ya
Ónyé na-anakọta ihe osise Glenn Palmedo-Smith na-eme atụmatụ afọ ahụ dị ka 'ihe dịka 1939'
Ka ọ na-erule 1950, Ruley zutere Joseph Gualtieri onye bụ onye nduzi nke Slater Memorial Museum
Gualtieri kwadoro naanị ihe ngosi nka Ruley n'oge ndụ ya na Disemba 1952
Ruley sonyekwara na ihe ngosi nka n'èzí kwa afọ, 'Art in the Open', nke Norwich Art School kwadoro, ebe ọ ga-ere ihe osise ya maka dolla irí na isé nke ọ bụla
Gualtieri gara New York City na mbido afọ 1950 na ụfọdụ ihe osise Ruley iji gbalịa itinye ha na ndị na-ere ihe osise, mana enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma; nke a yiri ka ọ naghị emechu Ruley ihu
A maghị ihe osise ole Ruley mepụtara n'oge ndụ ya, ma ọ bụ ole ka dị
Glenn Palmedo-Smith dere ihe osise 62 dị ndụ n'akwụkwọ ya nke afọ 1993, Discovering Ellis Ruley
Dị ka Kọmitii Ellis Walter Ruley nke ọbọdọ Norwich si kwuo, ka ọ na-erule afọ 2015, ọnụ ọgụgụ a amụbaala ruo ihe osise 64
Ruley na-ese ihe nkírí site na ndụ kwa ụbọchị na Norwich
Dị ka Joseph Gualtieri si kwuo, Ruley 'na-arụ ọrụ mgbè niile na eserese ụlọ, na-ese ihe dịgasị iche site na anụ ọhịa na mmasị màkà ọmarịcha ịsa ahụ, ebe ịta atụrụ, ndị cowboys, na ndị India'
Ruley enweghị ọzụzụ teknụzụ na eserese, ya mèrè ọrụ ya na-egosipụtakarị ụdị dị mfe
Glenn Palmedo-Smith akọwaala ọrụ ya dị ka 'nke ụwa ọzọ', dị ka a ga-asị na 'e jidere ihe oyiyi ahụ na nrọ'
N'echiche Palmedo-Smith, ọrụ Ruley na-ejide akụkọ dị mgbagwoju anya na ihe oyiyi dị mfe
A hụrụ Ellis Ruley nwụrụ anwụ n'ụtụtụ Jenụwarị 17, 1959, na Hammond Avenue 'ihe dị ka mita narị abụọ site n'ụlọ ya'
Ozu ya kpọnwụrụ akpọnwụ
Echiche nke Town Medical Examiner bụ na Ruley 'nwụrụ site na ikpughe, ọ bụ ezie na ọ tụfuru ọbara buru ibu site na mmerụ ahụ n'isi'
Ónyé na-ahụ màkà ndị nwụrụ anwụ kwenyere na ọnwụ Ruley bụ ihe mberede
Ngalaba ndị uwe ojii Norwich chọpụtara na Ruley anọwo na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị na Norwich n'uhuruchi gárá aga, ebe ọ nọ na-aṅụ mmanya
'Ọ hapụrụ ébé ahụ n'ụgbọ tagzi n'elekere asaa nke abalị, ónyé ọkwọ ụgbọala ahụ kpọgara ya na Hammond Avenue ma nyéré ya aka n'ime mita 25 site n'ụlọ ya
Ka ọ na-erule Julaị 2018, Glenn Palmedo-Smith na-arụ ọrụ na 'ihe ngosi banyere ndụ Ruley, nka na ọnwụ ya' nke akpọrọ Unruley Delois C
Lindsey na-arụkwa ọrụ na ngosi nke ya dabere na akwụkwọ ya
Ellis Wilson (ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel 1899 rụo ụbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1977) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe na-ejikọta ya na Harlem Renaissance
A mụrụ Wilson na 1899 na Mayfield, Kentucky
Nné na nnà ya bụ Frank na Minnie Wilson
Frank Wilson bụ ónyé na-akpụ isi na onye na-ese ihe
Wilson gàrà Mayfield Colored Grade School
O mechara gaa Kentucky Normal and Industrial Institute na Frankfort ruo afọ abụọ, mana a hapụrụ ya ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na ọrụ ugbo na agụmakwụkwọ
N'inwe mmasị n'ịmụ nka, Wilson hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu wee kwaga Chicago ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Art Institute of Chicago
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nka ya na 1923 ma bírí na Chicago màkà afọ ise sochirinụ, na-achọ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe azụmahịa
N'afọ 1928, Wilson kwagara Harlem, New York, ébé ọ sonyeere Harlem Artists Guild ma rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọ ahịa
Mgbè Ellis rutere na New York, ndị na-ese ihe ojii enweghị ike igosi ọrụ ha na gallery ndị a ma ama
Ọ ghọrọ ónyé otu na-arụsi ọrụ ike nke Harlem Renaissance, mgbalị jikọrọ aka iji kwalite ma gosipụta ọrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe ojii
Ellis sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi metụtara mmegharị ahụ
Wilson rụrụ ọrụ màkà Federal Art Project site na 1935 ruo 1940
E nyekwara ya ọrụ ịmepụta triptychs màkà ndị ụkọchukwu US Army na Navy
N'afọ 1944, e nyèrè ya Guggenheim Fellowship ma mesịa gaa n'ebe ndịda United States
Wilson nwèrè mmasị dị ukwuu na Haiti ma na-eleta mba ahụ mgbè niile malite na 1952
Mmasị ya màkà mba ahụ na ndị ya gosipụtara na ume nke ihe osise n'oge ahụ

Dị ka onye na-ese ihe, Samella Lewis, si kwuo, 'Wilson na-emepụta ihe zuru oke na usoro nhazi dị mgbagwoju anyaN'iji agba mee ihe n'ụzọ siri ike, ihe osise ya na-egosipụta ụdị dị n'otu na nke onwe ya nke jikọtara akụkụ nke Expressionism na Realism nke oge a
Mgbagwoju anya ya siri ike, otu n'ime akụkụ nke Expressionism, pụtara ìhè n'ihe ndị dị ka Bird Vendor
Ọ bụ ezie na Wilson nwèrè ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ma merie ọtụtụ ihe nrite màkà ihe osise ya, ọ dịghị mgbè ọ bara ọgaranya
Onye bi na Cornish Arms Home for Adults, ọ nwụrụ na French Hospital na Sunday, Jenụwarị 2, 1977 mgbe ọ dị afọ 76, mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa izu abụọ, e lie ya n'ili onye ogbenye
A maghị kpọmkwem ebe ili ya dị
E gosipụtara ihe osise Ellis Wilson 'Funeral Procession' na ihe nkiri telivishọn NBC nke America The Cosby Show, na Oge 2, 'The Auction'
N'ihe omume a, Clair Huxtable, nke Phylicia Rashad gosipụtara, na-etinye ego na ihe osise ahụ site n'aka nwanne nna ya (Ellis Wilson) ma ọ merie na ire ere
Ihe osise ahụ na-anọgide na ụlọ obibi Huxtable n'usoro ahụ dum
Ellsworth Augustus Ausby (ubochí isé n'ọnwa Eprel, 1942 rụo ụbọchị isii n'ọnwa Maachị, 2011) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe nkírí na ónyé nkụzi amaara màkà ọrụ ya na nnwale ya na nkwado na elu
A mụrụ ya na Portsmouth, Virginia, Ausby gàrà ma School of Visual Arts na Pratt Institute, nwéta Bachelor's of Fine Arts site na ụlọ ọrụ nke ikpeazụ
Ruo oge ụfọdụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ere nri na Slugsī Saloon a ma ama, ebe ya na Salvador Dalí zutere, hụ Sun Ra na-arụ ọrụ, ma hụ ka a na-agba Lee Morgan égbè
Ọ kụziri ihe osise na School of Visual Arts site na 1979 ruo mgbè ọ nwụrụ na 2011, ma nọgide na-abụ ónyé na-ese ihe ruo mgbè ọ nwụsịrị
Ausby nwere ụmụ anọ ma lụọ di ugboro abụọ, nke mbụ bụ ónyé na-ahụ màkà nri Vertamae Smart-Grosvenor, na ónyé na-ese ihe Jamillah Jennings, ónyé ya na ya guzobere Nefer International Gallery

E guzobere gallery ahụ, nke sitere n'ụlọ ha dị na Brooklyn, na ebumnuche nke igosi ọrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe ojii na ọbọdọ ha ma gbaa ndị nwere ego ume ịnakọta ọrụ ndị ọzọ site n'aka ndị na-eme ihe nkírí ojii
Ausby rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe, gụnyere ákwà, ihe ọkpụkpụ, iko, na nka arụmọrụ
Ọ na-ejikarị ụdị ọdịnala Africa na palettes arụ ọrụ
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya, dị ka Meditation in Blue, na-eji ụdị ihe osise Hard-edge
Ụfọdụ n'ime nka ya mgbè e mesịrị, dị ka ọrụ ya na enyo, na-egosipụta mmetụta nke Pattern na Decoration movement

Egwú Sun Ra kpaliri ya nke ukwuu, na ngwụcha afọ 1970 ọ malitere usoro ihe osise ya nke geometric nke akpọrọ Space Odyssey, nke akpọrọ dị ka nke a iji gosipụta njikọ a na nkà ihe ọmụma nke Sun Raīs afrofuturist
Ọ ga-anọgide na-arụ ọrụ na usoro ahụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ

Ka oge na-aga, Ausby malitere itinye ihe atọ ọzọ n'ime ọrụ ya, na-agwakọta ihe ndị dị ka sawdust n'ime ihe osise ya iji mepụta ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-agbanwe agbanwe ma na-etinye ihe ndị na-agbatị n'elu ákwà ahụ
Ọ na-ejikarị ákwà a na-agbataghị agbatị n'ọrụ ya, nke a ga-ejikọta ya na mgbidi gallery na ihe nkwado ndị ọzọ iji mepụta ọdịdị atọ dị ike màkà ngosi
Meditation in Blue (1998), a geometric abstraction in acrylic, dị na Saint Louis Art Museum permanent collection
E gosipụtara ọrụ Ausby na ihe ngosi onwe onye na nke otu
General Elly Tumwine (amụrụ na 12 Eprel, na afọ 1954 - 25 Ọgọọst 2022) bụ onye agha Ugandan lara ezumike nká, onye na-ese ihe, na onye nkuzi
Ọ bụbu Minista Nchebe na Cabinet nke Uganda, n'etiti afọ 2019 na afọ 2021
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọchịagha nke National Resistance Army site na afo 1984 ruo na afọ 1987

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị agha Ugandan kachasị elu bụ ndị kpọrọ ndị uwe ojii ka ha gbaa ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe égbè n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, o nyekwara ndị agha iwu ka ha tọọrọ, tụọ ha mkpọrọ n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị ma zipụ ndị mmegide ka a kpee ha ikpe n'ụlọ ikpe ndị agha dabere na ebubo ụgha nke mere ka ndị na-akwado Bobi Wine gbaa akwụkwọ maka mmebi ikike mmadụ
Nke a mere ka mba United States of America nye ndị ọchịagha Ugandan ikike maka mmebi ikike mmadụ
Ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị omeiwu Uganda, na-anọchite anya ndị agha nchekwa nke ndị Uganda
A mụrụ Elly Tumwine na 12 Eprel, na afọ 1954, na Burunga, Mbarara District
Ọ gara Burunga Primary School, Mbarara High School na St
Henry's College Kitovu, tupu ọ banye na Mahadum Makerere, ebe na afọ 1977, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Arts in Fine Art tinyere Diploma in Education; abbreviated BA (FA) / Dip
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke eserese nka
O mechara gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Cadet Officers Course na Tanzania Military Academy na Monduli
Ọ gakwara Senior Command Course na Uganda Senior Command and Staff College na Kimaka, na Jinja, na obodo Uganda, ebe ọ bụ onye otu klas ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 2005
Tumwine nwekwara nzere agha ọzọ site na ụlọ akwụkwọ agha dị na Vystry, na Soviet Union
N'afọ 1978, ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ nkuzi ya iji sonye na ndị agha FRONASA nke Yoweri Museveni duziri iji lụso ọchịchị Idi Amin ọgụ
N'afọ 1981, mgbe Museveni gara n'ọhịa iji guzobe National Resistance Army (NRA), Elly Tumwine sooro ya gaa
A kọrọ na ọ gbagburu égbè mbụ na National Resistance Army War, nke mere ka National Resistance Force na National Resolution Movement banye n'ọchịchị na Uganda n'afọ 1986
N'oge ọgụ dị n'etiti NRA na UNLA, Tumwine nwere mmerụ ahụ ihu nke mere ka ọ ghara ịhụ ụzọ n'otu anya
N'afọ 1984, a họpụtara Tumwine ka ọ bụrụ Commander of the Army, ọfịs ọ nọ na ya ruo n'afọ 1987, mgbe General Salim Saleh nọchiri ya
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọkwa dị iche iche, gụnyere
Ọ nọgidekwara na-anọchite anya UPDF na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Ugandan kemgbe afọ 1986
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2005, e buliri ya n'ọkwa onye ọchịagha na UPDF ma kpọọ ya onye isi oche nke UPDF General Court Marshal
A na-ejikọta Elly Tumwine na ime ihe ike megide ndị Uganda
Mgbe e jidere Bobi Wine na 18 Nọvemba, na afọ 2020 na Luuka, ngagharị iwe malitere nke e ji ime ihe ike gabigara ókè
Elly Tumwine gwara ọha na eze na ndị uwe ojii nwere ikike ịgba gị égbè ma gbuo gị
Ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere na afọ 1977, Elly Tumwine malitere ọrụ nkuzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche na Uganda, na-akụzi nka dị mma
Mgbe mmeri nke National Resistance Movement na afọ 1986, ọ maliteghachiri nka ya
Mgbe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nke NRA, o mepụtara ọkọlọtọ, ihe nnọchianya na uwe ndị agha na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na camouflage
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke ndị nlekọta nke National Cultural Centre
N'afọ 1992, ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ ya, The Creations Limited, iji kwalite ụlọ ọrụ nka na ọrụ aka, na-agba ume ụkpụrụ nka na ihe okike
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ onye otu ọtụtụ òtù Ugandan, gụnyere

Elma Kenechukwu Mbadiwe bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naijiria ama ama dị ka Elma Mbadiwe
Elma bụ onye omere amuru n'Imo steeti na- eme mmemme ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya na Jenụwarị 28, nke afọ ọ bụla
O si Imo State, Nigeria
Elma nwetara nzere bachelọ na Mass Communication si The Redeemer's University Nigeria, Ede, Osun State
O nwekwara diplọma na Acting for Screen si Royal Arts Academy, Surulere, Lagos
Tupu Elma abanye n'ime ime ihe nkiri, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ode akwụkwọ na mgbasa ozi siri ike; ụlọ mgbasa ozi maka SoundCity
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ngalaba mmepụta ihe
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri Elma malitere na 2016 na ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ The Audition
Elma's role in Unbroken where she played the lead role as Talullah brought her to limelight because of the attention she got from fans
Elma also featured as Laraba in EVE
and both movies were produced by African Magic Production
Ọ soro ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood ndị ọzọ mee ihe nkiri n'ime ihe nkiri dịka, Rattlesnake The Ahanna Story, Dysfunction, na ndị ọzọ
Thriller
A họpụtara Elma Mbadiwe maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma n'oge mbipụta 2018 nke Best of Nollywood Awards
Nhọpụta a bụ n'ihi ọrụ ọ rụrụ na ihe nkiri LBGT Anyị anaghị ebi ebe a ọzọ nke nwere nhoputa iri na otu

Elma Postma (amụrụ 6 Septemba 1978), bu onye ome ihe nkiri South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri a ma ama bụ Isidingo, Boer Soek 'n Vrou na 7de Laan
A mụrụ ya na 6 Septemba 1978 na South Africa
Ọ lụrụ Paul Potgieter onye ya na ya na-akpa kemgbe
N'afọ 2000, o mere ihe ngosi telivishọn mbụ ya na soapie 7de Laan a ma ama ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka'Dezi Terreblanche'
O mechara hapụ ihe nkiri ahụ n'onwa Jun 2007
Wepu Ndị ọzọ na-abụghị telivishọn, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ama ama dị ka The Mating Game na 2010, Wonderlus na 2017, na ' n Man Soos My Pa na 2015
N'ihe nkiriThe Mating Game, ọ gosipụtara agwa dị ka onye ndu 'Sara van Graan' nke nwetara nnukwu mata ihe
Na 2011, o sonyeere ndị nsonye nke kykNET soap opera bụ Binneland nke a na-akpọbu Binnelanders
N'ime usoro ihe omume ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ onye ndu dị ka 'Bea'
Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, Postma bụ onye na-agụ egwu nke bụ onye ama ama n'ikpọ egwu cello
O mekwara ihe ngosi na ọtụtụ mkpuchi akwụkwọ akụkọ na South Africa gụnyere Rooi Rose, Huisgenoot, Sarie, TV Plus, Vrouekeur, TimeOut, Tydskrif, Insig, na Leef
O mere ihe nkiri mpụta mbụ ya na 2011 dị ka Sista Suzaan na ihe nkiri Superheroes
Ọ bụkwa onye ngosi usoro 'Ontbytsake en die Boer soek een vrou' na KykNET maka emumere atọ mbụ

O gosipụtakwara n'ọtụtụ mmepụta ihe nkiri na mmemme nka, gụnyere Heart Sins na 2004 nke Henry Mylne duziri, Haaks na 2005, Monsters na 2006 nke Pierre van Pletzen duziri na Hell on Heaven and Earth nke Vicky Davis duziri
Na 2014, o sonyeere mgbasa ozi redio nke Die Nag van Legio
N'ọnwa Febrụwarị abalị iri na asatọ nke afọ 2006, ọdụm tara ya mgbe ndị ezinụlọ ya gara n'ugbo ọdụm dị nso na Klerksdorp
Ọ gakwuuru ọdụm nso imetụ ya aka site na ogige mgbe mgbanaka ya jidere n'otu n'ime aka ọdụm ahụ
Mgbe ọ nwara iwepụ mgbanaka ahụ n'ụkwụ ahụ, ọdụm azụrụ azụ nwere nkụda mmụọ ma taa ya aka
Mkpịsị aka ya mebiri nke ukwuu ebe ndị dọkịta jisiri ike rụkwaa mkpịsị aka ndị a mebiri emebi
Elme de Villiers (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 11 n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 1993) bụ nwanyị South Africa na-egwu badminton
Ọ malitere ịkụ badminton mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na Hennenman, South Africa

N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya n'etiti ndị egwuregwu Afrịka iri na anọ kachasị mma ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Road to Rio Program nke BWF na Badminton Confederation of Africa haziri, iji nye ndị egwuregwu Afrịka nkwado ego na nkà na ụzụ na-eduga na 2016 Olympic Games na Rio de Janeiro O ritere ọla nchara na 2013 African Badminton Championship na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ya na onye ọlụlụ ya bụ Sandra Le Grange

Elmer William Brown (1909 rụo ụbọchị irí atọ n'ọnwa Mee, 1971) bụ onye Africa-America na-ese ihe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ usoro, gụnyere eserese, óbìbì akwụkwọ, murals, imepụta ihe nkiri, ceramics, na enameling
A mụrụ Elmer Brown na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania mà gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ na Columbus, Ohio
Ọ kwagara Cleveland, Ohio na 1929, mgbè ọ dị afọ iri abụo, ya na ónyé na-ese ihe Paul Travis na-amụ ihe na Cleveland School of Art
N'oge na-adịghị ányá mgbè ọ bịarutere Cleveland, ọ sonyeere Karamu House, ebe ya na Langston Hughes ghọrọ enyi
O nyèrè aka na mmepụta nke egwuregwu Hughes na Karamu House, ma mepụta ihe osise màkà ụlọ ezumike n'ebe ahụ
O gosipụtara ihe osise na ihe ngosi mbà ụwa na New York City na Philadelphia, ma gosipụta ọrụ ọtụtụ ugboro na Cleveland Museum of Art's May Show
Ọrụ Brown a kacha màrà amara bụ murals ya nke Works Progress Administration
N'afọ 1940, o sere ihe osise abụọ a maara dị ka Cleveland Past na Cleveland Present màkà ọrụ Valleyview Homes nke Cleveland Metropolitan Housing Authority na mpaghara Tremont nke Cleveland
Mgbè e bibiri ihe owuwu ahụ na 2005, Intermuseum Conservation Association wepụrụ ma weghachite ihe osise ahụ, na 2010, e weghachiri ya n'ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na Mahadum Steeti Cleveland
A kwụnyere ihe ndị ọzọ na Tremont Pointe, nke CMHA nọchiri Valleyview Homes
N'afọ 1942, o mepụtara ihe osise màkà City Club nke Cleveland nke akpọrọ Freedom of Speech

Ihe osise ahụ dị mita irí abụọ na abụọ (67 ) site na mita irí na otu (34 m), nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ọrụ Diego Rivera na ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe na Mexico, gosipụtara ndị ikom nwere ike na akwụkwọ dị mkpa nke nnwere onwé, gụnyere Magna Carta, United States Bill of Rights, United States Declaration of Independence na United States Constitution
A kwagara ya ọtụtụ ugboro mgbè City Club kwagara ebe ọhụrụ, otu ndị otu nke Gail Berg nke Berg na Associates duziri weghachiri ya
Brown ghọrọ onye Africa America mbụ na-ese ihe osise na American Greetings na 1953, ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ebe ahụ afọ irí na asatọ
Ọ kụzikwaara na Cooper School of Art na Cleveland
N'afọ 1971, ọ nwụrụ na Cleveland Clinic mgbè ọ rịasịrị ọrịa ogologo ógè
Nwunye ya, Anna V
Brown, hapụrụ ya, e lie ya na Martha's Vineyard

ZElmo De Witt (nke nwụrụ n'afọ 2011) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ọrụ ya were ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ, site na 1959 ruo 1992
Keyan Tomaselli na-ewere ya dị ka onye nduzi Afrikaans bụ ndị 'mere ihe nkiri nke na-emegide onyinyo 'ugbo' nke Afrikaner'
Elo Edema Edeferioka (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 10 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1993) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ bọọlụ Naịjirịa maka Celta de Vigo Baloncesto na ndị otu Naịjirịa
O sonyere na 2018 FIBA Women's Basketball World Cup
