Enfants Terribles bụkwa Nana ET Matvey bụ ndị na-ese ihe abụọ nke gụnyere Nana Rosenørn Holland Bastrup (obere Nana Bastrup) (amụrụ n'afọ 1987) na Matvey Slavin (amụrụ n'afọ 1987)
E hiwere ha abụọ na Hamburg n'afọ 2012 ma kpọọ aha ha site na ntinye ha Enfants Terribles nke, n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2012, gosipụtara na nnukwu ebe a wụrụ awụ n'èzí Hamburger Kunsthalle na Hamburg
Ntinye Enfants Terribles bụ nsọpụrụ nye ihe ọkpụkpụ ududo Maman nke Louise Bourgeois, ma nwee ụmụ ududo iri na isii gburugburu ihe ọkpụkpụ Bourgeois dị ugbu a
A mụrụ Bastrup na Copenhagen, Denmark na Slavin na Leningrad (nke a gbanwere aha ya na StPetersburg), Russia
Ha zutere mgbe ụmụ akwụkwọ na Hochschule für bildende Künste Hamburg ma kemgbe ahụ, ha mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na omume ọha na eze na Germany, Denmark na Austria n'okpuru aha 'Enfants Terribles'
N'afọ 2014–2015 ha ghọrọ ndị na-ese ihe na ụlọ nka na Meinersen na agụmakwụkwọ nke Foundation Bösenberg na n'afọ 2016 ndị na-ese ihe na ụlọ nka Künstlerhaus im Schlossgarten na Cuxhaven
Kemgbe afọ 2015, ha na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru aha Nana ET Matvey na Berlin na Copenhagen
Ọrụ Enfants Terribles na-ewuli elu na mmegharị Dada
Taboos bụ otu n'ime isi isiokwu ya

N'afọ 2014 ndị na-ese ihe nkiri na-etinye na Hanover obere mmadụ asaa a na-akpọ 'The Seven Matveys' na okpu agba n'ihu ihe ọkpụkpụ Nana nke Niki de Saint Phalle The Admirer, The Critic, The Know-It-All, The Devotee, The Sceptic, The Tourist na The Destroyer
A ghọtara ntinye ihe nkiri ahụ ọ bụghị naanị n'ihi aha mbụ nke Nana Bastrup, kamakwa n'ihi esemokwu banyere ụdị nka na Hanover n'afọ ndị 1970
Ha abụọ na-eme ụdị satire eserese nke na-agbaso ọdịnala nke ndị na-ese ihe Jacques Callot, William Hogarth, ma ọ bụ George Grosz
N'afọ 2014 ha mepụtara ụdị okwu ha kpọrọ 'Laufbilder'

Usoro maka imepụta ọrụ ndị a bụ mbipụta inkjet nke foto nke ihe ngosi ndị gara aga ma ọ bụ arụmọrụ na mpempe akwụkwọ mmegharị, ntinye aka collage nke Nana Bastrup mere, na eserese pensụl nke Matvey Slavin gbakwunyere jikọtara na mbipụta na PVC tarp, na-ahapụ usoro nyocha agba a na-ahụ anya na ala na n'akụkụ
Usoro a na -arụpụta ntụgharị nke 'digital Gobelins' nke na -echeta tapestries oge ochie, mana n'eziokwu, a na -ebipụta ọkọlọtọ mgbasa ozi na loops
The motto of the artist duo is art is footwork
The 'Laufbilder' (running images or run of images) recreate views and situations of exhibitions that Enfants Terribles have realized in the past
The works deal with socially relevant issues and reflect critically the art market, the art scene, and the role the artists adopt in these
Bastrup na Slavin jikọtara ọrụ nka ha, ogige ihe atụ nke ihe na ọnọdụ dị egwu
A na-esite na ntinye aka ha na ihe osise ahụ
N'ihe ngosi Popdada na Berlin 2016 Bastrup na Slavin gosipụtara nhọrọ nke ọrụ popdadaistic Laufbilder (foto ihe nkiri), Mauerwerke (masonry) na ihe ọkpụkpụ vidiyo Dada Child, Little Brother 2014-2016
Nwa ojii a na-akpọ lacquered child nọ ọdụ na plinth na-ejide n'otu aka ihuenyo na vidiyo Popdada 2010-2016 n'akụkụ ihu ya
N'aka nke ọzọ gbatịrị agbatị bụ égbè egwuregwu, nke ọ na-eji eme ihe
Site na ihe ngosi ahụ, ndị na-ese ihe kpọrọ aha ma guzobe ụdị nka Popdada (ọ bụkwa Popdadaism) - 100 afọ mgbe e guzobere Dada (ọ bụkwa Dadaism)
Ebumnuche nke echiche popdadaistic abụghị ịjụ ụwa ajụjụ maka omenala ya na parody, kama ọ bụ n'ihi enweghị isi na njikwa
Aha nna Engelbrecht (ma ọ bụ Englebrecht, Engelbrekt) sitere na obodo German
Aha Engelbrecht nwere ọtụtụ nsụgharị, gụnyere 'Angel Glorious' na 'Bright Angel'
The Surname Database na-ekwu na aha ahụ bụ ụdị Dutch nke Old High German nyere aha mgbe ụfọdụ a na-asụ Ingelbert ma ọ bụ Engelbert
Engel nwere ike ịsụgharị dị ka 'Angle' (aha onye dike German), onye si Angeln, ma ọ bụ 'mmụọ ozi'
Brecht nwere ike ịsụgharị dị ka 'na-egbuke egbuke' ma ọ bụ 'onye ama ama'
Aha ahụ bụ ihe a ma ama na Middle Ages France n'ihi na ọ bụ aha ọgọ Charlemagne
English ma obu Asusu English bu otu asusu ejiri mara ndi ocha Amerika ma obu Ndi British
Na ala Africa otutu obodo na asu asusu English
Obu a nwere ike ibu obodo dika ala Naigeria, Ghana na otutu ala Africa ndi ozo
English Wikipedia bu aha ana-kpo otu Wikipedia bu na olu bekee
Wikipedia ahu vuru ivu, bu nke Wikipedia mbu e mere 15 Jenụwarị na afo 2001
Asụsụ Bekee (Bekee English) bu asụsụ ana-asụ n'Ala Bekee (Bekee England) na ụfọdụ obodo ọzọ dịka Njikọtaọhà Amerika na Ostraliya
Ana-asụkwa ya na Naijiria
Bekee bụ ụdịrị asụsụ ana-akpọ 'West Germanic'
Bekee si ezinaụlọ 'Indo-European'
O si Jemani bịa Ala Bekee mgbe ọ bụ Bekee Ochie
Mgbe Ndị Normani bịa, o bidoro ịgbanwe
Bekee nke oge nka bụ 'Middle English'
Bekee ana-asụ kịta bụ Bekee Ugbu Nka
Engola bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Engsh bụ cant nke malitere na Nairobi, Kenya na 1980s
Mgbe Sheng mepụtara n'akụkụ ndị dara ogbenye nke Nairobi, Engsh mepụtara n'etiti ndị ntorobịa nke ndị bara ọgaranya, ndị bara ọganihu
Engsh dabeere na Bekee, mana ọ na-agwakọta Swahili, na asụsụ agbụrụ ndị ọzọ dị ka Kikuyu na Luo
Otú ọ dị, dịka Sheng, ọ bụ koodu, ya mere enweghị ike ịghọta ya, n'akụkụ ka ukwuu, site n'aka ndị na-asụ Bekee
Ma Engsh ma Sheng malitere dị ka koodu nzuzo megide ndị okenye, iji mee ka ndị ntorobịa Nairobi na-ekwurịta okwu n'asụsụ ndị okenye na-enweghị ike ịghọta
Ndị na-ekwu okwu mbụ abụrụla ndị okenye, na ndị nne na nna
Ma Engsh ma Sheng na-agbanwe ngwa ngwa, na ikike ịgbaso okwu 'n'ime' nke oge ahụ na-esiwanye ike ka mmadụ na-etolite, ya mere a ka na-ewere ha dị ka asụsụ ndị ntorobịa

N'oge gara aga, ọ nweghị ihe dị iche n'etiti Sheng na Engsh, mana ndị ntorobịa na-asụ asụsụ abụọ ahụ chọpụtara na ha enweghị ike ịghọta ibe ha nke ọma, n'ihi na asụsụ ndị ahụ malitere n'ụzọ dị iche iche bụ isi n'ihi ọnọdụ akụ na ụba dị iche iche
Ka o sina dị, a ka nwere ọtụtụ myirịta dị n'etiti Sheng na Engsh, mana Engsh pụrụ iche iji guzoro dị ka onye nwe ya
Enhle Mbali Mlotshwa (amụrụ n'abalị atọ nke ọnwa Machị afọ 1988), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye na-eme nguputa na TV na onye na-emepụta ejiji
A maara ya maka ọrụ ọganihu ya na South African Television Series, Tshisa
Ọ malitere uwe nne mụrụ nwa SE Preggoz na South Africa na New York na 2015
Mlotshwa nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya na usoro South Africa Mtunzinicom nke gosipụtara na South African National Broadcasting Corporation site na afọ 2006 rụọ 2009
Ọrụ ya dị ịrịba ama bụ na usoro telivishọn South Africa, Tshisa

Kemgbe ahụ, a tụbara Mlotshwa na ọtụtụ opera telivishọn South Africa na usoro ihe nkiri gụnyere telenovela iNkaba, Moferefere Lenyalong, Soul City, Sokhulu and Partners, Rhythm City, Rockville, na 7de Laan
N'afọ 2009, Mlotshwa kwadoro usoro Channel O, Young, Gifted and Black wee gaa n'ihu na-akwado ANN710s, Starbiz nke lekwasịrị anya na akụkọ ntụrụndụ obodo na nke mba ụwa
Ọ bụ ọkà okwu na Dstv nke ihe omume In Good Company Experience nke kwadoro onye America na-eme ihe nkiri na onye edemede bụ Issa Rae n'afọ 2018
N'afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Lace
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara Mlotshwa dị ka onye na-akwado usoro The Herd
Mlotshwa malitere uwe nne mụrụ nwa SE Preggoz na South Africa na New York n'afọ 2015
N'afọ 2018, Mlotshwa malitere Enhle Cares Foundation na mmemme Forever Young Gala Dinner n'akụkụ The House of Mandela Family Foundation na Africa Rising, nke ndi ụlọ ọrụ Global Citizen kwadoro
Enhle Cares Foundation bụ òtù nwere ọtụtụ akụkụ na-elekwasị anya na ụmụ agbọghọ na ndị nne nwa agbọghọ nọ n'obodo ndị dara ogbenye
Ebumnuche bụ iji ọdịiche njirimara na inye ọrụ na site na ọrụ mmekorita, nye ngwọta maka nsogbu ụfọdụ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, e nweela ihe na-eme iji nye ụmụ agbọghọ na South Africa ọrụ ezumike bụ ndị na-elekọta ndị ezinụlọ ha na-arịa ọrịa HIV / AIDS, nkwarụ ma ọ bụ agadi
Ntọala ahụ na-elekwasịkwa anya n'ịkwado ịkpa ókè nwoke na nwanyị na South Africa
Enhle Mbali Mlotshwa lụrụ DJ Black Coffee nke south Africa ( ezi aha ya bụ Nkosinathi Innocent Maphumulo) n'afọ 2011
N'ọnwa Julaị 2019, ha kewara ma malite ịgba alụkwaghịm

Enid Stacy (10 June 1868 - 4 Septemba 1903) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị onye bekee A mụrụ Stacy na 10 June 1868 na Westbury, Gloucestershire, ọkpara nke onye na-ese ihe Irish Henry Stacy na nwunye ya bụ Rose Deeley ụmụ anọ Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Bristol na 1881 A zụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ Ndị Kraịst; nwanne ya nwoke nyeere aka chọta Bristol na Clifton Christian Socialist Society na nna ya mechara tinye aka na Bristol Socialist Society Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Bristol, ebe ọ meriri agụmakwụkwọ Whitworth, wee bụrụ onye nkuzi na Redland High School for Girls N'ebe ahụ, ọ zutere Katharine St John Conway, bụ onye ya na ya nwere mmasị na John Ruskin na Anglo-Catholicism
Stacy dekwara akwụkwọ ugboro ugboro maka The Clarion wee sonye na National Union of Women's Suffrage Societies
N'afọ 1896, ọ zutere onye isi ndị Anglo-Catholic Percy Widdrington na International Congress of Socialists
Ha lụrụ na Mee na-esote, na mbụ biri na Newcastle upon Tyne, mgbe e mesịrị na Calderbrook
Ọbụna mgbe ọ mụsịrị nwa, Stacy nọrọ ọnwa isii n'afọ na-eme njem ma na-akụzi ihe gbasara ndị Socialist na ndị inyom, ọ nwụrụ na mberede na 4 Septemba 1903
Eniola Ajao bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri si Epe onye meerela ihe nkiri karịrị iri asaa na ise
A maara ya maka idi ike ya na ọpụrụ iche na nhazi ọrụ ya
Ajao na ejima ya bụ ụmụnne nke ọdụdụ n'ime ụmụ isii nne na nna ya mụrụ
Na ntolite, Ajao gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St Michael's Anglican Primary na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ndị agha na Epe
Dị ka Ajao si kwuo n'agbanyeghị na ọ chọrọ ime nne na nna ya obi ụtọ, ọ rọrọ nrọ ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kemgbe ọ bụ nwata
Ajao gara n'ihu ga Yaba College of Technology wee gaa mahadum Lagos ebe ọ ga-enweta akara ugo mmụta ya na akaụnting
N'agbanyeghị ọtụtụ asịrị, ọ naghị enwe mmekọrịta ya na onye na-emekọ ihe ọnụ bụ Odunlade Adekola
Ajao rụrụ ọrụ ndu dị ka Yele Ara, ewepụtara n'ọnwa Disemba 2018
A họpụtara ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri asụsụ Yoruba na 2015 Best of Nollywood Awards, ma ọ nwetaghị ihe nrite ahụ
Àtụ Infobox football biography
Eniola Aluko (amuru 21 Febrụwarị 1987) bu onyeisi n’egwuregwu bọọlụ, onye nta akụkọ , na onye bụbu onye mara ihe ekwe kụrụ n' egwuregwu bọọlụ
Ọ dị As of May 2021[update] Onye isi egwuregwu nke Angel City FC na Los Angeles, US

Amụrụ na Nigeria, Aluko mere egwuregwu 102 maka otu mba England site na 2004–2016 wee soro na 2007 FIFA Women's Cup in China, 2009 UEFA Women's Euro, 2011 FIFA Women's World Cup na Germany, 2013 UEFA Women's Euro, na 2015 FIFA Iko mba uwa umunwanyi na Canada
N'egwuregwu Olympic nke afọ 2012 na London, ọ nọchiri anya Great Britain
Aluko gbaburu bọọlụ maka Birmingham City, Charlton Athletic, na Chelsea n'asọmpị FA ụmụ nwanyị England
Ọ gbara maka Saint Louis Athletica, Atlanta Beat, na Sky Blue FC na American Women's Professional Soccer (WPS) site na 2009–2011
Mgbe obere oge ya na Birmingham City gasịrị na ọkwa ọhụrụ nke England, FA WSL, ọ bịanyere aka na Chelsea, ebe ọ na-egwuri egwu site na 2012 ruo 2018
Tupu ọ lara ezumike nká na egwuregwu bọọlụ ọkachamara na Jenụwarị 2020, Aluko mechara bụrụ onye na- aga n'ihu maka Juventus
Ebe ọ bụ na 2014 o nyela nkọwa telivishọn na football, gụnyere FIFA ndị ikom na ndị inyom World Cup
Amụrụ ya na Lagos, Nigeria, onye Gbenga na Sileola, Aluko na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Birmingham na mpaghara West Midlands nke England mgbe ọ dị ọnwa isii
Ọ tolitere na nwanne ya nwoke bụ Sone Aluko na ndị enyi ya na-egwu bọọlụ
Ọ gbakwara egwuregwu ndị ọzọ, gụnyere tenis
Na-etolite, Aluko kwadoro Manchester United
Aluko malitere ọrụ ya na Leafield Athletic Ladies wee soro ndị ntorobịa Birmingham City n'okpuru onye njikwa Marcus Bignot ya na onye otu egwuregwu England n'ọdịnihu, Karen Carney
Ọ gbara na mpụta mbụ otu Birmingham megide Leeds United, dị afọ 14
Na 7 Eprel 2002, mgbe Aluko dị afọ iri na ise gbara bọọlụ Birmingham na FA Women's Premier League Cup na Adams Park, ka ndị otu Birmingham na-eto eto meriri 7–1 site n'aka ọkachamara Fulham
Obodo meriri nkwalite dịka ndị mmeri nke Northern Division na Premier League National Division na 2001–02
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya n'oge 2002–03 Premier League sochirinụ mere ka Bignot kwupụta ya ' Wayne Rooney nke bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị'
A gụrụ Aluko onye ọkpụkpọ ntorobịa nke afọ na FA Women's Football Awards na 2003
Aluko hapụrụ Birmingham ka ọ sonyere Charlton Athletic na Jenụwarị 2004
O nyeere Charlton aka imeri Fulham 1–0 iji merie FA Women's Premier League Cup na Underhill Stadium na Maachị 2004
N' afọ 2003–04, Aluko pụtara dị ka onye nọchiri anya ọkara nke abụọ mgbe Charlton tụfuru asọmpi iko ụmụ nwanyị FA na Arsenal, 3–0 na Loftus Road na Mee
Charlton tụfurukwa aha Premier League National Division n'aka Arsenal n'ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke oge, na-eduga n'ọtụtụ oge
Aluko buliri FA Women's Community Shield na Charlton n'August 2004 ka o nyere aka merie otu ahụ
Nhazi nkeji 41st ya maka Ann-Marie Heatherson nyere onye mmeri na 1–0 meriri Arsenal na Broadhall Way
Igbapu bọọlụ ọsọ ọsọ dị ka otu n'ime njirimara ya na nke a pụtara ìhè mgbe ọ gbapụrụ na bọọlụ sitere na Emma Coss iji nweta goolu mmeri na 2005 FA Women's Cup Final na Upton Park
Charlton meriri Everton 1-0 na ngwụcha
Aluko meriri goolu abụọ na ọkara mbụ nke mmeri Charlton 2–1 meriri Arsenal na 2006 FA Women's Premier League Cup na Adams Park

Aluko sokwara gba egwuregwu bọọlụ na 2005 FA Women's Community Shield (4-0 meriri na National Hockey Stadium ), 2005 FA Women's Premier League Cup Final (3–0 meriri na Griffin Park ), na FA 2007 Ikpeazụ iko ụmụ nwanyị (4–1 na City Ground ), Mmeri atọ a bụ ndị Arsenal meriri
Enyemaka o nyere Katie Holtham na nkeji nke abụọ nke egwuregwu ahụ nyere Charlton ụzọ na 2007 FA Women's Cup Final
O sokwa Charlton nweta iko iko FA ụmụ nwanyị London ugboro abụọ, na 2005 na 2006
N'ịgbaso mwepụ nke nkwado ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Charlton site na ụlọ nne na nna, Aluko sonyeere Chelsea Ladies na Julaị 2007
N' ọnwa iri n'afọ 2008, St
Louis Athletica nwetara ikike igwu egwu Aluko bụ onye kpọrọ ya aha dị ka onye na-achọpụta ihe nrịba ama post-draft

Ọ bụ onye na-eduga goolu n'otu egwuregwu n'oge mmalite nke otu egwuregwu na ihe mgbaru ọsọ isii, ma durukwa enyemaka na anọ, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime isi ihe kpatara Athletica ji nwee ike ịrịgo site na ebe ikpeazụ n'ime ọnwa abụọ mbụ nke oge ahụ gaa n'otu ebe
na-enye iwu nke abụọ site na njedebe
Ọ tụfuru asọmpi playoff na egwuregwu All-Star n'ihi ọrụ otu mba
Mgbe Saint Louis Athletica gbakọtara akụkụ nke oge 2010, Aluko bịanyere aka na Atlanta Beat
E mechara zụta ya na Sky Blue FC na Disemba 2010
Mgbe WPS batara maka oge 2012, Aluko ekpebiela ịlaghachi n'England
Ọ bịanyere aka na Birmingham City, na-akọwa ha dị ka 'ndị kwụsiri ike'
Na 2012, Aluko debara aha goolu ise na enyemaka abụọ na 17 FA WSL League na ngosi Cup, ka Birmingham City gụchara ndị gbara ọsọ ruo Arsenal na asọmpi abụọ ahụ
Obodo meriri 2012 FA WSL Cup Final na Arsenal 1–0 na Underhill Stadium na 10 October 2012

Birmingham meriri Chelsea 3-2 na penariti, mgbe ọ nwụsịrị 2–2 na ngwụcha oge mgbakwunye, na 2012 FA Women's Cup Final na 26 Mee 2012 na Ashton Gate iji nweta nkwanye ugwu mbụ nke klọb ahụ na akụkọ afọ 44 ya
Ewebata Aluko dị ka ihe nnọchi nkeji iri isii na atọ
Mgbe otu oge na Birmingham, ọ debanyere aha maka Chelsea na Disemba 2012
N'ime oge mbụ ya na klọb ahụ, Aluko nyere ihe mgbaru ọsọ isii na enyemaka atọ na egwuregwu 17 FA WSL League na Cup
N'ịbụ onye nwere oge dara ogbenye n'ime ụlọ, Chelsea rutere n'ikpeazụ nke ọkpụkpọ òkù 2013 International Women's Club Championship, mana 4–2 meriri INAC Kobe Leonessa
Aluko debara aha onye inyeaka na Final wee nweta mmeri na ọkara ikpeazụ megide Sydney FC
Na 2014, Aluko meriri ugboro asaa wee nye otu enyemaka na 20 FA WSL League na ngosi ngosi

Aluko's Chelsea malitere ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke 2014 FA WSL oge n'elu otu egwuregwu, isi abụọ n'ihu Birmingham City na isi atọ n'ihu Liverpool, mana mmeri 2-1 na Manchester City riri Chelsea Super League aha na ihe mgbaru ọsọ dị iche
Aluko bụ so n' otu n'ime nhọpụta isii maka 2014–15 PFA Women's Player Player of the Year, mana onye otu ya na Chelsea meriri Ji So-yun
Ọ meriri ndị egwuregwu Ladies Chelsea nke afọ maka 2014–15 wee họrọ ya na 2015 PFA WSL Team of the Year
Na 2015, Aluko na-egwuri egwu na mbụ FA Women's Cup Final mere na Wembley Stadium na 1 August 2015 n'ihu ndekọ ndekọ nke 30,710
Ndị otu Chelsea ha meriri Notts County 1–0 iji nweta iko mbụ klọb na akụkọ ntolite ya
N'otu n'otu, Aluko nọ n'obi mmeri Chelsea ka ọ na-etinye ihe ngosi Player-of-the-Match ma nye aka maka onye mmeri nke 39th nke Ji So-yun
Mgbe Chelsea bịanyere aka na Fran Kirby na Ramona Bachmann, ọrụ Aluko na otu ahụ belatara
A mara ọkwa na 16 May 2018 na Aluko ga-enweta n'efu site na Chelsea mgbe oge 2017-18 kwụsịrị ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị
O mere akara ngosi ikpeazụ ya site n'ịgba akara wee mee ihe ngosi oge ụfọdụ, ọkachasị dị ka onye nọchiri anya mbubreyo, n'akụkụ nke enweghị mmeri n'oge egwuregwu niile
Aluko bịanyere aka na klọb Serie A Juventus na 6 June 2018
Agbanyeghị, n'afọ 2019, o kwuru banyere ahụmịhe na-adịghị mma n'obodo ahụ, na-akpọ ya 'afọ iri n'azụ' wee kwuo na emere ya ka ọ dị ya ka Pablo Escobar n'oge ụfọdụ na ọdụ ụgbọ elu Turin

Na Nọvemba 2019, Aluko kwupụtara na ọ ga-ahapụ Juventus ka ọnwa 18 gachara na klọb ahụ, na-ekwu na oge ya na klọb a bụ otu n'ime “nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma na ọtụtụ mmụta” Ọ laghachiri Britain na Disemba ka ọ nwetagoro Serie A, Coppa Italia na Supercoppa Italiana, yana ịbụ onye kacha agba bọọlụ Juventus n'afọ gara aga
Na 15 Jenụwarị 2020, Aluko kwupụtara ịla ezumike nka na bọọlụ ọkachamara
Akpọrọ Aluko n'ime ntọala England ka ọ dị afọ 14
Ọ họọrọ iguzosi ike n'ihe nye ndị nkuzi Bekee nyere ya ohere ịgba bọọlụ mba ụwa, mana o kwuru, sị 'Ihe kacha m mkpa bụ ka ndị mmadụ ghọta na ịhọrọ ịkpọrọ England apụtaghị na anaghị m akwado
Naijiria
Abụ m onye Naijiria dịka m bụ onye Britain
N'ezie Naijiria pụtara m ọtụtụ ihe, ọ bụ akụkụ nke m, mana ndị nkuzi Bekee zụlitere m'
N'ịbụ onye nọchitere anya England na ọkwa Under-17, Aluko meriri na mpụta mbụ ya na ọkwa Under-19 wee pụta na UEFA Under-19 European Championship Finals na Germany na July 2003 mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ 16
O mechara gwuo egwu na ọkwa Under-21, tupu ya emee mpụta mbụ ya, dị afọ 17, megide Netherlands na Septemba 2004
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke izizi ya bịara megide Czech Republic na Walsall na Mee 2005, wee gbakwunyere abụọ ọzọ na mmeri 13–0 pụọ megide Hungary na ọnwa Ọktọba ahụ
Aluko na-egwuri egwu na UEFA Women's Euro 2005, n'agbanyeghị esemokwu ya na ọmụmụ A-Level ya
Ọ nọ ọdụ ule akụkọ ihe mere eme n'ụtụtụ England meriri Denmark 2–1
N'egwuregwu otu ikpeazụ ha na Sweden Aluko fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọkpụkọ dị egwu, mana enwere nkụda mmụọ ka ndị ọbịa England meriri 1-0 wee pụọ na asọmpi ahụ
N'asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke FIFA 2007, Aluko gosipụtara na otu egwuregwu megide Japan na Argentina yana mmeri 3-0 nke United States meriri
Mgbe asọmpi ahụ gachara, ọ katọrọ ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ na ọkwa nkwado ego enyere ndị isi ụmụ nwanyị England
Aluko gosipụtara nke ọma na UEFA Women's Euro 2009, na-enye akara na otu egwuregwu meriri Russia wee gbakwụnye ọzọ na nkeji nkeji iri na ise meriri ndị ọbịa Finland
O nyekwaara enyemaka maka goolu mmeghe Kelly Smith na ọkara nke ikpeazụ megide Netherlands
N'ikpeazụ, Aluko gbara aka ekpe ka Germany ji 6–2 mebie England na Helsinki
Aluko netted megide Switzerland na September 2010 ka England ruru eru maka FIFA Women's World Cup 2011
N'oge asọmpi ikpeazụ, Aluko zara ọnụma maka nkatọ ọha na eze maka arụmọrụ ya na 1-1 sere na Mexico, bụ nke ọ tụfuru ọtụtụ ohere ị nweta goolu
A nọchiri ya na ọkara-oge na egwuregwu otu na-esote megide New Zealand, wee daa n'oche maka egwuregwu ikpeazụ ya na Japan, na-egwu ọkara elekere ikpeazụ nke mmeri England 2–0
Aluko bụ onye nnọchi ejighi ya ka France wepụrụ England na nkeji nkeji ikpeazụ

Dị ka England ruru eru maka 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup, Aluko gụchara dị ka onye na-emekọ ihe ọnụ na iru eru na ihe mgbaru ọsọ 13, nke gụnyere okpu mbụ ya na 10-0 thumping nke Montenegro, na nkwado megide Turkey na Ukraine
N'asọmpi ikpeazụ, Aluko malitere egwuregwu abụọ mbụ nke England, nke France meriri 1–0 na mmeri Mexico 2–1
N'ịbụ onye furu efu egwuregwu otu ikpeazụ na ọkwa ịkụ aka, Aluko pụtara ọzọ dị ka nkeji nkeji 61 na egwuregwu nke atọ na Germany
England meriri Germany na nke mbụ, ọkpụ 1-0 ka oge agbakwunyere were nweta ihe nrite ọla
Akpọghị Aluko ka ọ bụrụ otu mba ka ọnwa Mee 2016 gasịrị

Ndị otu bọọlụ na-akwụ ya ihe dị ka puku £ 80,000 n'agbanyeghị onye ọka iwu kwuru na enweghị akaebe zuru oke na nkwupụta Aluko banyere ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na mmegbu nke onye isi nchịkwa Mark Sampson na ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ kwuru

Ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mechara rịọ Aluko mgbaghara n'ihu ọha na kọmitii ahọpụtara nke Ngalaba Culture, Media na Sport (ya na ụfọdụ ndị omeiwu DCMS na-akpọ maka ndị ọrụ FA dị mkpa ka ha gbaa arụkwaghịm maka njikwa ikpe ahụ) mgbe otu ọka iwu ahụ chọpụtara ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ekwuru ya na onye otu ya Drew Spence okwu, na-esote nyocha nke atọ
Na UEFA Women's Euro 2017, Aluko rụrụ ọrụ dị ka pundit maka Channel 4

Mgbe ndị otu England dum — nke onye isi ojii ojii Nikita Parris na-edu — gbapụrụ ọsọ ọsọ soro onye nchịkwa Sampson mee ememe mgbe ha gbasịrị akara na egwuregwu ha na-esote ha megide Russia, Aluko katọrọ ndị otu ya na mbụ n'ihu ọha, na-ebo ha ebubo ịchọ ọdịmma onwe onye nanị, enweghị nkwanye ùgwù na chọrọ ọzụzụ dị iche iche
Parris mechara rịọ Aluko mgbaghara n'akwụkwọ ozi mepere emepe na June 2020 na-ekweta na mmemme ya na onye nkuzi Sampson bụ “omume enweghị echiche” nke gosipụtara enweghị ọmịiko, nghọta na amaghị ihe
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Daily Telegraph, England na-azụ azụ Lucy Bronze jụrụ ma Aluko dị mma ugbu a iji nọrọ na ndị otu England
Ọ tụrụ Aluko n'anya ma nwee nkụda mmụọ maka enweghị nkwado maka ọnọdụ ya site n'aka ndị egwuregwu England ugbu a
Nnyocha FA enwetala ihe akaebe nke omume 'adịghị mma' Aluko n'onwe ya, nke gụnyere ebubo ebubo ịwakpo onye otu egwuregwu a na-akpọghị aha
Onye na-anọchi Sampson dị ka onye nchịkwa England, Phil Neville, ahọrọghị Aluko
Aluko votu maka Conservative Party na ntuli aka izugbe 2019
E wusiri Iso Ụzọ Kraịst ike n'okpuru mmetụta nke onye a mụrụ ọzọ bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Linvoy Primus
Edekwara Aluko na 2020 Powerlist, amara dị ka otu n'ime 100 ndị Black Britain kacha nwee mmetụta
Na June 2012, a kpọrọ Aluko aha na ndị otu egwuregwu 18 Great Britain maka asọmpi Olympic London 2012

O mere ya Great Britain mpụta mbụ, na mbụ ya mgbe ọchịchị fixture, na enyi na enyi na-enweghị mgbaru ọsọ draw na Sweden na Riverside Stadium, Middlesbrough na 20 July 2012, malite na-egwu dum egwuregwu
N'asọmpi bọọlụ Olympic, Aluko bidoro asọmpi otu atọ niile, nke gụnyere mmeri meriri New Zealand, Cameroon na n'ihu ihe karịrị 70,000 na Wembley, ndị mmeri ọla ọcha Brazil ugboro abụọ
Aluko meriri penariti n'asọmpi Brazil nke Kelly Smith tụfuru
Britain gbagoro na nkeji iri na ise dịka ndị meriri otu
Aluko malitekwara ka Briten meriri Canada 2–0 na nkeji iri na ise, site n'ikike nke ihe mgbaru ọsọ abụọ mbụ, wee kwụsị olile anya ma ọ dịkarịa ala iru egwuregwu maka ohere na nrite
Aluko nwere mkpesa siri ike maka ntaramahụhụ ọkara nke abụọ a chụrụ

N'agbanyeghị na England kwụsịrị ebe nke atọ na 2015 FIFA Women's Cup World, nke Aluko bụ akụkụ nke, na-enweta Great Britain otu n'ime oghere Europe atọ dị maka 2016 Rio Olympics, e kpebielarị Great Britain agaghị eme ya
ziga otu ụmụ nwanyị na mmemme ahụ
Nke a pụtara na Aluko agbakwunyeghị n'ọnụọgụ ise nke Great Britain, yana isonye na asọmpi Tokyo 2020 ohere mbụ enwere
Otu izu ka ọ lara ezumike nka na bọọlụ ọkachamara, a mara ọkwa Aluko dị ka onye isi egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na Aston Villa na Jenụwarị 2020
Na Mee 2021, Aluko ghọrọ onye isi egwuregwu nke Los Angeles Angel City FC tupu oge mbido ha na American National Women's Soccer League (NWSL)
Mgbe ọ na-egwu maka England n'oge Euro 2005 ụmụ nwanyị, Aluko weere ọkwa A na Cadbury College, Birmingham
O mechara gaa mụọ iwu na Mahadum Brunel, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na klas mbụ na 2008

Na Julaị 2009 a mara ọkwa na Aluko ga-eji oge 2009-10 US na-agụ akwụkwọ maka ule ụlọ mmanya New York tupu ya emee ule yiri nke ahụ na England, ebumnuche ya bụ inwe usoro iwu ntụrụndụ na England na United States
Mgbe ọ na-emecha nkuzi nkuzi gbasara iwu na Mahadum Iwu, Aluko nwere ọzụzụ ọzụzụ na Lee & Thompson LLP na Iwu Onside
O kwuputara ebumnuche ya 'ịla azụ' site na ọrụ iwu ya na March 2015 iji lekwasị anya n'ịgba bọọlụ ọkachamara
N'afọ 2016 ndị otu bọọlụ gwara Aluko na ọrụ ndụmọdụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ egwuregwu mebiri iwu ha yana ndị otu otu ahụ na-enyocha ya
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka onye na-ahụ maka igbu egbu na May, tupu ya agbahapụ mgbe ọ kwagara Ịtali na Juventus
Nwanne ya nwoke nke nta bụ Sone na-egwuri egwu maka Ipswich Town ma bụrụ onye ntorobịa mba England, mana na Mee 2009 nabatara oku ka ọ nọchite anya Nigeria
Aluko nyeere nwanne ya nwoke aka n'oge nsogbu ego nke Rangers nwetara na 2012
Nna ya bụbu onye omebe iwu na Nigeria, ebe Bolaji Aluko, onye prọfesọ injinịa kemịkalụ, bụ nwanne nna ya
Aluko votu maka Conservative Party na ntuli aka izugbe 2019
E wusiri Iso Ụzọ Kraịst ike n'okpuru mmetụta nke onye a mụrụ ọzọ bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Linvoy Primus
Edekwara Aluko na 2020 Powerlist, amara dị ka otu n'ime 100 ndị Black Britain kacha nwee mmetụta

Na Mee 2020, Aluko bipụtara usoro tweet nke pụtara na-akatọ ndị etinyere na atụmatụ iwe iwe gọọmentị UK ewepụtara na nzaghachi ọrịa COVID-19 , na-ehichapụ ọtụtụ n'ime ozi ahụ, na-arịọ mgbaghara ma na-ekwupụta nkwado ya maka atụmatụ furlough
O nyere nkọwa maka mkpuchi ITV nke 2018 FIFA World Cup na maka mkpuchi Fox Sports nke 2019 FIFA World Cup
E gosipụtara ya na ndị otu mba ya na usoro egwuregwu vidiyo FIFA nke EA Sports 'FIFA malitere na FIFA 16, oge izizi ụmụ nwanyị so na egwuregwu ahụ
N'August 2016, ọ bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ nkwado ọtụtụ afọ na Under Armor, nwanyị mbụ UK na-eme egwuregwu na-eme ya
Na Jenụwarị 2020 Aluko ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Adidas
Aluko wepụtara akụkọ ndụ ya Ha anaghị akụzi nke a' - nkuzi na egwuregwu nke ndụ n'August 2019
Charlton Athletic
Saint Louis Athletica
Eniola Badmus, (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị 7 nke n'ọnwa Septemba, afọ1983), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa
Ọ bịara pụta ìhè n'afọ 2008 mgbe o gosipụtara na ihe nkiri ahụ Jenifa

A mụrụ Eniola na Legọs nke Naijiria, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Ijebu Ode Ọ gara Mahadum nke Ibadan ebe ọ gụrụ Theater Arts na mahadum nke Lagos Steeti ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nzere masta na Ekọnọmiks
Ọrụ Eniola na ịbụ onye ọkaibe bidoro n’afọ 2000 ruo n’afọ 2008 mgbe ọ pụtara ihe n'ihe nkiri yoroba abụọ a kpọrọ Jenifa na Omo Ghetto

N;ụbọchị nke iri abuo nke onwa Ọktoba nke afọ 2020, ka anụrụ na Eniola ka agbagburu n’oge ogbugbu Lekki nke ndi ngagharị iwe #EndSARS Kosiladị, ọ gbaghaara asịrị ahụ na ọ nwụọla ma kwuo n'eziokwu na ya anọghị n'oge ngagharị iwe ahụ
Àtụ Inc-film
Ndekọ ihe nkiri a ezughi ezu,i nwere ike tinye aka denye ụfọdụ
N'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2016, ka emeputara Eniola dika onye nnochi anya nke ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta Etisalat
Best movie actress city people 2017 Best actress 2018 (Plus size African fashion week)

Ambassador Eniola Olaitan Ajayi (amụrụ na 18 Jenụwarị 1965) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye nnọchianya Naijiria nọ na Hungary na ikikere na Serbia, Croatia, na Bosnia na Herzegovina
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Onye isì ala Muhammadu Buhari zigara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Naijiria na Netherlands
A mụrụ Ajayi na 18 Jenụwarị 1965 na Ipoti Ekiti n'ezinụlọ Late Pawato Oluyin Owolabi Ajayi nke Iyin Ekiti na Chief Mrs
Elizabeth Anike Ajayi nke Ipoti Ekiti
Ndụ ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata malitere na St George Anglican Primary School, Ijero Ekiti tupu ọ gaa Emmanuel Anglican Elementary School, Ado Ekiti
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ Christ, Ado Ekiti
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Optometry na 1986 na Mahadum Benin
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na National Youth Service Corps na Eye Clinic nke Nigerian Airforce

Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ otu afọ ya, e debere ya dị ka onye ọrụ na-adịgide adịgide nke ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ ma rụọ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ ruo mgbe ọ nwetara ezumike ọmụmụ iji mee nyocha na Institute of Ophthalmology, Mahadum London
N'afọ 1994, ọ nwetara Master of Philosophy na Ocular Pathology n'otu mahadum ahụ
Ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa wee gaa n'ihu na ọrụ ya na Nigeria Airforce ruo 1997 mgbe ọ malitere ọrụ onwe ya
O mechara laghachi na Mahadum Benin ebe ọ nwetara Doctor of Optometry n'afọ 2000
Ọ bụ onye na-akpali akpali na onye ozi nke Chineke na nzukọ ndị Kraịst nke obodo ya; na-elekọta ọdịmma nke ndị di na nwunye kwenyere na Chineke maka ụmụaka na-ndị dị ime
Dr Eniola AJAYI lụrụ Adegboyega Oke ma bụrụ nne nwere ọtụtụ ụmụ
Ajayi bịara na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe oge mbụ ya dị ka Kọmishọna maka agumakwụkwọ, sayensị na teknụzụ na steeti Ekiti nke Naijiria ebe o mere mgbanwe dị ịrịba ama na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ
E mechara họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ Kọmishọna maka gburugburu ebe obibi
Dị ka onye kọmishọna maka agụmakwụkwọ na Ekiti site na Disembaa 2010 ruo Jenụwarị 2013, Ajayi so ndị otu Gọvanọ Kayode Fayemi rụọ ọrụ iji mee ka atụmatụ ya dị asatọ
Ọ lekọtara njikọta nke mahadum atọ ahụ n'oge ahụ na Mahadum Ekiti State ọhụrụ na nke nwoke
Ọ bụkwa n'okpuru idu ndú ya ka e mere iwu guzobere kọleji agụmakwụkwọ, Ikere Ekiti
Ajayi jere ozi dị ka onye kọmishọna maka gburugburu ebe obibi site na Febụwarị 2013 ruo Ọktoba 2015
N'okpuru ọrụ a, ọ butere ụzọ na mgbalị ijì belata igbutu osisi n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị, nweta mmelite ọhịa ma melite ego a na-enweta n'ime ụlọ site na ọrụ ọhịa
Ọ malitekwara nguzobe nke Forestry Commission maka nlekọta kwesịrị ekwesị nke Forest site na itinye aka nke ndị ọrụ Forestry niile na Ekiti State
Ajayi malitere ọrụ nnọchiteanya ya mgbe Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara ya na ọrụ ọzọ na Hungary dị ka onye nnọchi anya Naijiria
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya Naijiria na Hungary na ikikere n'otu oge na Serbia, Croatia, Bosnia na Herzegovina, ruo mgbe e zigara ya na Netherlands na nso nso a
Ennica Mukomberanwa (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1978) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Nwa nwanyị Grace Mukomberanwa na Nicholas Mukomberanwa, ọgbọ mbụ nke ihe ọkpụkpụ zụrụ ya
A na-egosipụta ọrụ ya na nchịkọta onwe ya na ụlọ ngosi gburugburu ụwa
Ọ bụ ọgbọ nke atọ nke Zimbabwean sculptor
N'afọ 2004, e nyere ya ihe nrite nke nyere ya ohere ịga Stockholm, Copenhagen, Scotland, na Canada
Ọ bụ onye otu ezinụlọ Mukomberanwa nke ndị na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bụ nwa Grace Mukomberanwa na Nicholas Mukomberanwa, onye jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ya
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị nke ndị na-akpụ ihe bụ Anderson, Netsai, Taguma, Tendai Mukomberanwa nakwa Lawrence Mukomberanwa, na nwa nwanne nne ya bụ Nesbert Mukomberanwa
Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya n'omenala nke Shona bịakwa na-emepụta obere ụkpụrụ ọ bụ ezie na o mepụtara ọtụtụ ndị buru ibu
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na International Sculpture symposium' nke Andres Institute of Art na New Hampshire, CT mere n'afọ 2014 ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na nkume granite
Koleji agụmakwụkwọ ya bụ na agụmakwụkwọ na akụ na ụba mmadụ
Enonchong bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Nkwado bụ ụdị America nke ihe na-edozi ahụ na ihe ndị na-anọchite anya nri nke Abbott Laboratories mepụtara
Otu karama 237-ml (8-fl oz) nke Ensure Original nwere calorie 220, gram isii nke abụba, gram 15 nke shuga, na gram itoolu nke protein
Ihe isii kachasị elu bụ mmiri, ọka maltodextrin, shuga, mmiri ara ehi protein concentrate, mmanụ canola, na protein soy
A na-ewere ya dị ka lactose-free maka ndị na-enweghị lactose
N'afọ 1903, Harry C
Moores na Stanley M
Ross malitere 'Moores & Ross Milk Company', nke na-ahụ maka ịde mmiri ara ehi maka nnyefe ụlọ maka afọ ole na ole mbụ
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1964, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ jikọtara ya na Abbott Laboratories
Ihe ọṅụṅụ a na-akpọ Ensure bụ nke mbụ Ross Laboratories rere na afọ 1973
N'afọ ndị afọ 1990, Ensure na ihe ọṅụṅụ ndị ọzọ na-edozi ahụ dị ka Mead Johnson's Sustacal na Nestlé's Boost and Resource na-asọ mpi siri ike iji nweta òkè ahịa n'etiti ndị okenye nwere ahụike

N'afọ 1996, Ensure nwere ahịa nke ihe dị ka $ 300 nde ma bụrụ 80% nke ahịa protein mgbakwunye; Abbott mefuru $ 454 nde iji kpọsaa Ensure n'ime ọnwa itoolu mbụ nke afọ 1996, ihe dị ka 70% karịa ka o mefuru n'otu oge ahụ nke afọ 1995
N'afọ 1995, Center for Science in the Public Interest kwuru na mgbasa ozi maka Ensure bụ 'mgbasa ozi nri kachasị aduhie eduhie' nke afọ ahụ

N'afọ 1997, Abbott kwụsịrị ebubo sitere na Federal Trade Commission na ọ na-ere ahịa ụgha Assure dị ka inwe vitamin yiri nke ahụ dị ka ihe mgbakwunye multivitamin, yana dịka ndị dọkịta tụrụ aro karịa ihe mgbakwunye nri ọ bụla ọzọ dị ka ụzọ ndị mmadụ ga-esi nọgide na-arụ ọrụ ike ma nwee ahụike
E jirila jide n'aka na a na-enye ndị mkpọrọ na-achọ agụụ na ogige ndị mkpọrọ Guantanamo Bay nke mba United States nri
Mgbe Abbott kewara ngalaba ọgwụ ya, Abbvie, na afọ 2013, usoro ngwaahịa Ensure nọgidere na Abbott tinyere ngwaahịa ndị ọzọ na-edozi ahụ
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2016, ụdị dị iche iche nke Ensure gụnyere
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2016, a kwụsịrị Ensure Complete
Enterprise Bank Limited (EBL), nke a na-akpọkwa Enterprise Bank, bụ ụlọ akụ azụmahịa na Naịjirịa
Central Bank nke Naijiria nyere ya ikikere dị ka ụlọ akụ azụmahịa, onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ nke mba ahụ
Ụlọ akụ Enterprise bụ nnukwu onye na-enye ọrụ ego na Naịjirịa
As of December 2012[update] n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2012, e mere atụmatụ na ngụkọta akụ ụlọ akụ ahụ dị ijeri US $ 163 (NGN 2611 ijeri)
Dị ka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ụlọ akụ ahụ si kwuo, ọnụ ahịa ndị nwere òkè ruru ihe dị ka US $ 1865 nde (NGN 298 ijeri) n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2011
E guzobere ụlọ akụ Enterprise Bank n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2011 site n'iweghara akụ na ụfọdụ ụgwọ nke ụlọ akụ Spring Bank, nke a kagbuola ikike ụlọ akụ azụmahịa ya
E nyere EBL ikike ụlọ akụ azụmahịa na 5 Ọgọst, na afọ 2011
As of September 2013[update], the assets of Enterprise Bank Limited are 100% owned by Asset Management Company of Nigeria (AMCON), an arm of the Federal Gomenti nke Naijiria
Na afọ 2015, azuru Enterprise Bank site na Heritage Banking Company Limited mgbe emere ihe ego ntinye nke nde ₦56
Onye isi oche nke ndị nduzi nke Enterprise Bank Limited bụ Sir
Ogala Osoka MFR Onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi nchịkwa nke ụlọ akụ ahụ bụ Ahmed Kuru
Enterprise Group bụ ụlọ ọrụ mkpuchi ọsụ ụzọ Ghana
Edepụtara ha na ndepụta ngwaahịa nke Ghana Stock Exchange, GSE All-Share Index
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ kemgbe afọ 1924, mgbe Ghana bụ British Gold Coast, n'okpuru aha Enterprise Insurance Company

Entertainment Express bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria tọrọ ntọala na Julaị 2011 site n'aka ndị ọkachamara n'ịkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, ha bu Mike Awoyinfa na pastọ Dimgba Igwe, dabere na fim, egwu na egwuregwu
N'ime ndị ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ ahụ bụ Azuh Amatus (Editor), Femi Salawu, Ameh Comrade Godwin
Akwụkwọ ahụ gbakọtara wee kwaga n'ịntanetị na 2014 ka pastọ nwụsịrị
Entissar Amer (Arabic; amụrụ ya na 3 Disemba 1956) bụ nwanyị mbụ nke Ijipt ugbu a, ebe bụ na di ya Abdel Fattah el-Sisi ghọrọ onye isi ala nke isii nke Ijipt na 8 June 2014
Amer nwetara diplọma ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na El Abbassia High School n'afọ 1977
O nwetara nzere BCom na ndekọ ego na Mahadum Ain Shams
Amer lụrụ nwa nwanne nne ya el-Sisi na 1977 mgbe el-Ssi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Military Academy
Ha nwere ụmụ nwoke atọ na otu nwa nwanyị Mahmoud, Mostafa, Hassan na Aya

Amer ghọrọ Nwunye Mbụ nke Egypt na nhọpụta di ya ka ọ bụrụ Onye isi ala Egypt ka emechara ngagharị iwe ndị Egypt nke June 2013; nke mere ka ndị agha kwatuo Mohamed Morsi n'ọchịchị A họpụtara onye ọka ikpe Adly Mansour dị ka onye isi oche n'oge mgbanwe site na 3 Julaị 2013 ruo 7 June 2014
Mgbe ahụ, el-Sisi meriri ntuli aka onye isi ala nke e mere emesịa, wee ṅụọ iyi nke ọrụ na 8 June 2014

Otu onye Ijipt bụbu onye ọrụ nkwekọrịta agha, Mohamed Ali, boro ebubo na Entissar Amer bụ akụkụ nke 'nrụrụ aka zuru oke' metụtara ndị ọrụ agha na ndị ikwu Sisi Mkpesa n'okporo ámá mere na nzaghachi nye nkwupụta Ali banyere Amer na di ya
Entrena bụ ogbè no na Olile anyaanwu ala ana-kpo La Rioja
O nwèrè mádu rúrú 1,488 na Önwa mbu nke afọr 2008, na ngburu gbúru ya di km 2103
Enu Jacobs bụ onye nwere nka ịchụnta ego na Naijiria bụ onye guzobere Enu Properties
Ọmụmụ na ntolite Jacobs bụchaa na Cross River, Naịjirịa
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke ana akpọ Houdegbe North American University, Benin Republic, ebe onwere asa mbodo na agụmagụ nke ihe gbasara Komputa Sayensi
Enu Jacobs arụwo ọrụ dị ka onye ahịa ahịa dijitalụ maka onye nka Teniola Apata
Ọ na-elekọtakwa ahịa dijitalụ na ụdị ndị ọzọ dị ka Dr
Dolor, Caramel Plugg, Hotkidfire, Broda Shaggi, Nasty Blaq, na ọtụtụ aha ndị ọzọ a ma ama
Enu Jacobs bụ ọkachamara na-ese foto na onye na-emepụta vidiyo, o nwere ọtụtụ oge foto ya na ọtụtụ ndị ama ama
Enuani bụ Igbo olumba n'asu na Nigeria site Igbo ndị mmadụ nke Delta State, Onitsha, Obosi na Ogbaru na Anambra State, Mgbidi na Imo State, Ndoni na Rivers State
Olu asụsụ Enuani n’ozuzu ya dika olundị Igbo nke Anambra Steeti
Enuani tonal dị ka-asụsụ Anioma ndị ọzọ ma metụtakwa ọfụma mkpọpụta asụsụ Igbo n'ọtụtụ ebe
Olundị ndi Enuani bụ olundị dagbuchara olundị Igbo ndị ọzọ na Delta steeti
Enuani bụ otu n’ime isi asụsụ anọ ndi Igbo ndi Anioma na-asụ (ọkachasị na Aniocha na Oshimili Areas) dị na Delta north

Mpaghara ebe ndị a nọ karịchaa gụnyere Akukwu -igbo, Asaba, Ashaba Ubulu-uno, Ejeme-Aniogo, Egbudu-Akah, Ibusa, Idumuje-Uno, Idumuje-Ugboko, Illah, Issele-Azagba, Issele-Uku, Ogwashi- Uku, Ugbodu, Okpanam, Oko obodo, Onicha-Ugbo, Onicha-Uku, Onicha-Olona, Ukwunzu, Ubulu-uno, Ubulu-Uku, Ubulu-okiti, na ndi ozo fọduru
Olu a dị ka a na-asụ n’obodo ndị a niile dị n’ụdị olu na nke nwere nghọta
Ọ dịkwa ịtụnanya na olumba a nwere usoro ide akwụkwọ ahaziri ahazi wee nwee nnukwu nnabata asụsụ
Enugu ( / eɪ ˈnuː ɡ uː / ( / ) ay-NOO -goo ; Igbo ) bụ isi obodo Enugu State na NaijiriaỌ dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria
Obodo ahụ nwere mmadụ 722,664 dịka ngụkọ Naijiria 2006 siri dị
Aha Enugu sitere na okwu Igbo abuo Élu ugwú pụtara “elu ugwu” nke na-egosi ọdịdị ala ugwu obodo
Aha Ochi chi obodo ahụ bụ Enugwu Ngwuo, bụ ebe a chọtara oji n’okpuru ya
Enugwu Ngwuo bụ otu n'ime obodo iri mebere agbụrụ Ngwuo, nke a na-akpọkarị ụmụ Ngwuako, onye nna ochie nke ezinụlọ
Ngwuako doziri Udeneogu, dike ya nwa n'elu ugwu (Enu-Ugwu) ka o chebe ebo na mbuso agha
Enugwu Ama Udeneogu, (Enugwu, ala Udeneogu) Ndị mmadụ bi n'elu ugwu wee na-akọ ugbo na ndagwurugwu gbara gburugburu
Ngwuo nwere oke na ebo Oshie n'ebe ndịda, agbụrụ Ojebeogene n'ebe ugwu yana agbụrụ Nkanu n'ọwụwa anyanwụ

Nchọpụta nke coal n'ugbo Enugwu Ngwuo gbadara na ndagwurugwu ahụ, dọtara ndị mmadụ niile na ụdị akụ ọhụrụ a chọtara, na-achọ ụzọ ndụ, na dị ka e gosiri na map nke atụmatụ mbụ maka ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị, nke aha ya bụ Enugwu

Ọdụdọ gọọmentị Ngwo, nke bụ isi obodo mbụ nke obodo a na-akpọ Enugwu malitere n'ala Ngwuo wee kpọọ ya Enugwu Ngwuo ruo mgbe ọ nwetara ọkwa obodo, e wepụrụ okwu Ngwo maka ịdị mma nke ịkpọpụta okwu, ya mere
obodo nta nke Ngwuo muru obodo nke taa togoro buru nnukwu n'ime obodo, ma na-eto eto, na-ekpube obodo Nkanu di Nike na Akunino gbara ya gburugburu wee gbatịa Neke na Emene
Kamgbe narị afọ nke iri na asaa ebe Enugu dị ugbu a bụ ndị Nike ( /n iː ˈkeɪ / nee-KAY ) nke ndị Igbo bi ; otu n'ime agbataobi Enugu ka na-ejigide aha ochie obodo ahụ Ogui
Na 1900 South Nigeria Protectorate hiwere site n'aka ndị ọchịchị colonial nke Alaeze Ukwu Britain

Nchọpụta nke coal site n'aka ndị colonial mere ka e wuo okporo ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Eastern Line iji buru coal si n'ime ime obodo gaa n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Port Harcourt, obodo e mere maka nzube a dị 243 kilometres (151 mi) south nke ana akpo Enugu Coal Camp
A kpọgharịrị Enugwu aha ya bụ naanị Enugu wee wulite ya dịka otu n'ime obodo ole na ole dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka sitere na kọntaktị Europe
Ka ọ na-erule 1958 Enugwu nwere ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ coal 8,000
As of 2005[update] ọnweghị nnukwu ọrụ ngwupụta coal fọdụrụ n'obodo ahụ
Enugwu ghọrọ isi Ochichi obodo Eastern Region ka Naijiria nwechara nnwere onwe na 1960; mgbanwe mgbanwe mpaghara na 1967, 1976 na 1991 mere ka Enugwu bụrụ isi obodo nke steeti Enugu ugbu a

Na iri ato Mee 1967 ka a kpọpụtara Enugwu isi obodo Republic of Biafra dị mkpụmkpụ; n'ihi na a mara Enugwu ka 'isi obodo Igbo' Ka ndị agha Naịjirịa nwụchiri Enugwu, e bufere isi obodo Biafra n'Umuahia

N'afọ Otu puku nari iiyolu na iri ano na ise ka ndị Briten malitere mkparịta ụka ha na ụmụafọ ala ahụ ga-abụ Enugwu gbasara inweta ya iji dọba okporo ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Eastern Line na ịrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Ụlọ mbụ e wuru n'ebe ahụ bụ na ebe obibi nwa oge nke nwere ụlọ apịtị ndị Igbo nke WJ Leck na ụfọdụ ndị Europe bi na Hill-top, bụ nanị larịị dị n'elu ihe mkpuchi ahụ na-atụgharị n'ihu ugwu Milliken
Ihe ochie nke ebe obibi ochie nke ndị colonial a na-akpọ 'European quarters' ka na-ejupụta na Hill-top, nke dị n'akụkụ obodo Enugwu-Ngwo
Obodo ọzọ a maara dị ka Ugwu Alfred (Igbo Alfred's Hill) ma ọ bụ 'Alfred's Camp', nke otu Alfred Inoma (onye ndu ndị ọrụ amaala si Onitsha ) na ndị ọrụ ya bi, dị n'akụkụ ugwu

Ka ndị Briten nwetachara ala ahụ, Frederick Lugard, bụ Gọvanọ Naịjiria n’oge ahụ, kpọpụtara aha ya bụ colliery wuru n’ala ala Udi Hills Enugu Coal Camp iji mata ọdịiche dị na ya na Enugwu Ngwo nke na-ele obodo ahụ anya site n’elu elu
akpukpa n'odida anyanwu Enugu
Ebe mbụ a na-egwupụta coal na mpaghara Enugwu bụ Udi nke mepere n'afọ 1915 bụ nke e mechiri afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị were dochie anya ogbunigwe Iva Valley
Enugwu ghọrọ nnukwu ebe a na-egwupụta coal na naanị nke dị mkpa na West Africa
Ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Eastern Line nke jikọtara Enugu na Port Harcourt bụ nke arụchara n'afọ 1916 iji bupụ coal site n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ya nke e ji mee obodo ahụ maka nke a
Enugwu ghọrọ otu n'ime obodo ole na ole dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka emepụtara site na mmekọrịta ya na ndị Europe
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1916, gọọmentị colonial hibere akụkụ nke Enugwu edobere maka ndị Europe

Ebe a maara ugbu a dị ka Government Reserved Area (GRA) ghọrọ European Quarters nke dị n'ebe ugwu nke Osimiri Ogbete; N'akụkụ nke a bụ akụkụ e mepụtara maka ndị bi n'Africa nke dị na ndịda nke osimiri ahụ
Mpaghara a wuru n'Enugwu nwere mpaghara abụọ a, ma ka ọ na-erule afọ 1917 obodo ahụ nwetara ọkwa obodo
N'akụkụ Africa nke obodo ahụ ngwa ngwa nke ndị ọrụ na-akwaga mba ọzọ kpalitere mmepe nke ogige squatter na Udi Hills n'akụkụ ebe a na-egwupụta coal na Ndagwurugwu Iva
Na 1938 Enugwu ghọrọ isi obodo nchịkwa nke Eastern Region
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-egwu kol n'Enugwu tolitere site na puku isii (n'ime ọtụtụ ndị Udi ) na 1948 ruo 8,000 na 1958
Ndị obodo Enugwu gbagoro nke ukwuu site na nrụpụta ya; Ndị bi n'obodo ahụ ruru 62,000 na 1952

Ngwuputa ogbunigwe n'Enugwu na-enwe ọgba aghara mgbe ụfọdụ, dịka ihe mere na 18 Nọvemba 1949 gosipụtara mgbe ndị uwe ojii gbagburu ndị ogbunigwe 21 ma gbuo mmadụ iri ise na otu merụrụ ahụ n'okpuru ọchịchị Britain
Mgbuchapụ a bịara mara dị ka 'Mgbapụ Ndagwurugwu Iva' kpalitere echiche ndị mba ma ọ bụ 'Zikist' n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria, ma karịsịa n'etiti ndị Naijiria ọwụwa anyanwụ
'Zikisim' bụ otu mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị nke e mere site na mmasị Mmahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe bụ onye ama ama na National Council of Naijiria na Cameroons (NCNC)

Mgbụgba égbè ahụ ziri ezi mgbe oge ọgba aghara gasịrị mgbe ndị na-egwupụta akụ́kụ́ kpasuru iwe n'ihi nkwenkwe bụ́ na ndị ọrụ nchịkọta na-egbochi ụgwọ ọrụ ha zuru ezu, bụ́ nkwenkwe nke ndị nta akụkọ na-akwado mba ahụ kwadoro
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị Zikists gbalịrị iji égbè Iva Valley gbaa ebumnobi ime obodo ha ma chụpụ ọchịchị alaeze ukwu Britain, na Naijiria
E bipụtakwara nkọwa gbasara ihe ahụ merenụ n’akwụkwọ ndekọta onye Britain bi n’Enugwu n’oge ahụ bụ James Stewart Smith
Enugwu ghọrọ obodo n'afọ 1956 ebe Umaru Altine buru onye isi obodo mbụ
Ka afọ anọ gachara, Naịjirịa nwetara nnwere onwe na 1960
Na 27 Mee 1967 ọchịchị Naijiria kewara mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ, ugwu na ọwụwa anyanwụ gaa na steeti iri na abụọ wee mee Enugwu isi obodo steeti Ọwụwa Anyanwụ ọhụrụ
Na 30 May 1967 ka a kpọpụtara Enugwu isi obodo Republic of Biafra nke dị mkpụmkpụ, nke e mebere na steeti ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria nke East Central, Cross River na Rivers

Ojukwu kwuputara Biafra n'ihi Eastern Nigeria ka ndị otu ha wakporo ma merụọ ahụ ma gbuo n'ụdị mwakpo agbụrụ nke ụfọdụ agbụrụ ndị ọzọ malitere n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke mba ahụ na-esochi mbuso agha nke mbụ nke ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ Igbo kpara, bụ nke ndị isi ugwu
Egburu ndị ndu Naijiria na ndị ọzọ
Ndị na-amakarị ndị Igbo ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria bụ ndị Hausa / Fulani bi na ugwu Naijiria

Agha nke sitere n'ebe ugwu na nkewa (1967-1970) na mwakpo na-aga n'ihu na-awakpo ndị Igbo nọ n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Nigeria na-eduga Igbo ndị si ugwu na ọdịda anyanwụ Nigeria ịlaghachi na mpaghara 'ụmụ amaala' ha na ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria na Enugwu ghọrọ ebe njem

Radio Biafra, ọzọ bụ Voice of Biafra (nke bụbu East Nigerian Broadcasting Service), bụ nke hiwere isi n'Enugwu; site na ebe a ka onye ndu Biafra, Chukwuemeka Odumegwu Ojukwu, kwusara okwu na okwu nduhie nye Biafra na Naijiria
N'ihi agha ahụ, Enugwu hụrụ mbelata na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-abụghị ndị Igbo, karịsịa ndị na-abụghị ndị ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria

N'abalị anọ nke ọnwa Ọktoba Otu puku nari itolu iri ano na ano ndị agha Naịjirịa jiri ngwa agha tụgbuo Enugwu n'ebe dịpụrụ adịpụ n'ókè ha tupu ha eweghara ya ka otu izuụka gachara, obere oge ka nke a gachara Umuahia ghọrọ isi obodo ọhụrụ nke mba ahụ
Ọtụtụ afọ ka Republic of Biafra laghachiri na Naijiria, a ka na-ewere Enugwu ka 'isi nime obodo Igbo'
N'agbanyeghị aha ya pụtara ugwu ugwu n'asụsụ Igbo, Enugu dina n'ụkwụ escarpment ọ bụghị ugwu
Enugwu dị na gafere mmiri oku mmri na ọdọ mmiri Benue ma nwee coal kachasị mma na mpaghara a
Nkume okpuru ulo Precambrian dị na mpaghara a ka ejiri sedimenti na-ebu coal sitere na afọ Cretaceous na Tertiary machie
Oghere coal na mpaghara Enugu dị n'agbata 1 and 2 metres (33 and 66 ft) na ọkpụrụkpụ ma ekwuru na ihe nchekwa ihe karịrị nde tọn 300
Ugwu Enugu nke dị na oke nwere ike iru 1,000 metres (3,300 ft)
Ugwu elu gbara Enugwu gburugburu ka ọtụtụ akụkụ bụ n'okpuru nkume aja, ebe ala dị larịị bụ n'okpuru ala site na shale
Ọtụtụ n'ime escarpment nke sitere Enugwu ruo Orlu bụ nke ala na ebili mmiri mebiri
Akụkụ ala ndị ọzọ dị n'Enugwu gụnyere ọdọ mmiri Nike dị nso nke arụrụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Nike Lake
Osimiri Ekulu, Asata, Ogbete, Aria, Idaw na Nyaba bụ osimiri isii kacha ukwuu dị n'obodo ahụ
Osimiri Ekulu bụ mmiri kachasị ukwuu n'ime obodo Enugwu na mmiri mmiri ya na-enye aka n'akụkụ akụkụ mmiri nke obodo ahụ
Enugu ( / eɪ ˈnuː ɡ uː / ( / ) ay-NOO -goo ; Igbo ) bụ isi obodo Enugu State na NaijiriaỌ dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria
Obodo ahụ nwere mmadụ 722,664 dịka ngụkọ Naijiria 2006 siri dị
Aha Enugu sitere na okwu Igbo abuo Élu ugwú pụtara “elu ugwu” nke na-egosi ọdịdị ala ugwu obodo
Aha Ochi chi obodo ahụ bụ Enugwu Ngwuo, bụ ebe a chọtara oji n’okpuru ya
Enugwu Ngwuo bụ otu n'ime obodo iri mebere agbụrụ Ngwuo, nke a na-akpọkarị ụmụ Ngwuako, onye nna ochie nke ezinụlọ
Ngwuako doziri Udeneogu, dike ya nwa n'elu ugwu (Enu-Ugwu) ka o chebe ebo na mbuso agha
Enugwu Ama Udeneogu, (Enugwu, ala Udeneogu) Ndị mmadụ bi n'elu ugwu wee na-akọ ugbo na ndagwurugwu gbara gburugburu
Ngwuo nwere oke na ebo Oshie n'ebe ndịda, agbụrụ Ojebeogene n'ebe ugwu yana agbụrụ Nkanu n'ọwụwa anyanwụ

Nchọpụta nke coal n'ugbo Enugwu Ngwuo gbadara na ndagwurugwu ahụ, dọtara ndị mmadụ niile na ụdị akụ ọhụrụ a chọtara, na-achọ ụzọ ndụ, na dị ka e gosiri na map nke atụmatụ mbụ maka ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị, nke aha ya bụ Enugwu

Ọdụdọ gọọmentị Ngwo, nke bụ isi obodo mbụ nke obodo a na-akpọ Enugwu malitere n'ala Ngwuo wee kpọọ ya Enugwu Ngwuo ruo mgbe ọ nwetara ọkwa obodo, e wepụrụ okwu Ngwo maka ịdị mma nke ịkpọpụta okwu, ya mere
obodo nta nke Ngwuo muru obodo nke taa togoro buru nnukwu n'ime obodo, ma na-eto eto, na-ekpube obodo Nkanu di Nike na Akunino gbara ya gburugburu wee gbatịa Neke na Emene
Kamgbe narị afọ nke iri na asaa ebe Enugu dị ugbu a bụ ndị Nike ( /n iː ˈkeɪ / nee-KAY ) nke ndị Igbo bi ; otu n'ime agbataobi Enugu ka na-ejigide aha ochie obodo ahụ Ogui
Na 1900 South Nigeria Protectorate hiwere site n'aka ndị ọchịchị colonial nke Alaeze Ukwu Britain

Nchọpụta nke coal site n'aka ndị colonial mere ka e wuo okporo ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Eastern Line iji buru coal si n'ime ime obodo gaa n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Port Harcourt, obodo e mere maka nzube a dị 243 kilometres (151 mi) south nke ana akpo Enugu Coal Camp
A kpọgharịrị Enugwu aha ya bụ naanị Enugu wee wulite ya dịka otu n'ime obodo ole na ole dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka sitere na kọntaktị Europe
Ka ọ na-erule 1958 Enugwu nwere ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ coal 8,000
As of 2005[update] ọnweghị nnukwu ọrụ ngwupụta coal fọdụrụ n'obodo ahụ
Enugwu ghọrọ isi Ochichi obodo Eastern Region ka Naijiria nwechara nnwere onwe na 1960; mgbanwe mgbanwe mpaghara na 1967, 1976 na 1991 mere ka Enugwu bụrụ isi obodo nke steeti Enugu ugbu a

Na iri ato Mee 1967 ka a kpọpụtara Enugwu isi obodo Republic of Biafra dị mkpụmkpụ; n'ihi na a mara Enugwu ka 'isi obodo Igbo' Ka ndị agha Naịjirịa nwụchiri Enugwu, e bufere isi obodo Biafra n'Umuahia

N'afọ Otu puku nari iiyolu na iri ano na ise ka ndị Briten malitere mkparịta ụka ha na ụmụafọ ala ahụ ga-abụ Enugwu gbasara inweta ya iji dọba okporo ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Eastern Line na ịrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Ụlọ mbụ e wuru n'ebe ahụ bụ na ebe obibi nwa oge nke nwere ụlọ apịtị ndị Igbo nke WJ Leck na ụfọdụ ndị Europe bi na Hill-top, bụ nanị larịị dị n'elu ihe mkpuchi ahụ na-atụgharị n'ihu ugwu Milliken
Ihe ochie nke ebe obibi ochie nke ndị colonial a na-akpọ 'European quarters' ka na-ejupụta na Hill-top, nke dị n'akụkụ obodo Enugwu-Ngwo
Obodo ọzọ a maara dị ka Ugwu Alfred (Igbo Alfred's Hill) ma ọ bụ 'Alfred's Camp', nke otu Alfred Inoma (onye ndu ndị ọrụ amaala si Onitsha ) na ndị ọrụ ya bi, dị n'akụkụ ugwu

Ka ndị Briten nwetachara ala ahụ, Frederick Lugard, bụ Gọvanọ Naịjiria n’oge ahụ, kpọpụtara aha ya bụ colliery wuru n’ala ala Udi Hills Enugu Coal Camp iji mata ọdịiche dị na ya na Enugwu Ngwo nke na-ele obodo ahụ anya site n’elu elu

Enugu North LGA nwere ala dị square kilomita 106, yana ndị mmadụ 244,852 na ọnụ ọgụgụ 2006 na nkezi okpomọkụ dị ogo 27 Celsius
Nkezi iru mmiri nke mpaghara ahụ bụ pasenti 69, LGA nwekwara oge abụọ dị iche iche ọkọchị na mmiri ozuzo, yana harmattan dị nkenke n'oge ọkọchị
Enugu North LGA nwere akụ na ụba siri ike, gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ ọha na nke onwe dịka ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ụlọ akụ, ebe ntụrụndụ, na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
Enwekwara ọtụtụ boutiques, nnukwu ụlọ ahịa (gụnyere Polo Park Mall a ma ama, nke bụ ụlọ ahịa ShopRite ugbu a), na ebe ahịa (gụnyere Ahịa Artisan) na mpaghara ahụ
Enugu South bụ ọchịchị ime obodo na steeti Enugu, Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Uwani, Nnobi Street Enugu, ma na-ekpuchi obodo Akwuke, Amechi, Ugwuaji, Obeagu, Awkunanaw na Amechi-Uwani
Ókèala Enugu South n'ebe ugwu site n'Enugwu North nakwa n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ site n'okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo Nkanu East
Ọ dabara n'ime mpaghara senatorial Eastern nke Enugwu
O nwere mpaghara nke 67 km2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 198,723 na ọnụ ọgụgụ afọ 2006, a na-etinye ya 267,300 dịka atụmatụ ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke afọ 2016 si dị
Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bi na ya sitere n'agbụrụ Igbo, ya mere Igbo na Bekee bụ asụsụ ndị bụ isi na Enugu South
Koodu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 400
Enugwu South na-ekpuchi ala dị square kilomita 67 ma na-enwe nkezi okpomọkụ nke 27 Celsius C kwa afọ
Mpaghara ahụ nwere nkezi iru mmiri nke 69%, ebe LGA nwere nnukwu oge abụọ bụ oge ọkọchị na oge mmiri ozuzo nwere obere oge harmattan n'oge ọkọchị
Ihe akara ala dị na mpaghara ahụ gụnyere n'etiti ndị ọzọ, ụlọ ahịa Roban na-echekwa ụlọ ahịa n'okporo ụzọ Agbani, Holy Rosary College na ogige ntụrụndụ Ngwo
Gọọmentị ime obodo Enugu South (dị ka Enugu City) nwere nnukwu ego coal ma si otú a bụrụ akụkụ nke ebe a na-akpọ 'Coal City'
A makwaara mpaghara ahụ n'ịkọ nri na ihe ọkụkụ ego dịka ọka, yam na cassava
Gọọmentị ime obodo bụkwa ebe obibi nke ọtụtụ ahịa mepere emepe dịka ahịa Kenyatta na ahịa Mayor
Enugu South bụ mpaghara gọọmentị dị na steeti Enugu nke na-eje ozi dị ka ọkwa dị ala nke gọọmentị na steeti ahụ
