United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP) kwupụtara na ọ na aghọ onye na anọpụ iche ihu igwe na 2008 wee guzobe netwọk Climate Neutral iji kwalite echiche na February 2008
Ihe omume dị ka G8 Summit na otu dị ka World Bank na ejikwa atụmatụ nkwụghachi ụgwọ iji bụrụ onye na-anọpụ iche carbon

Ndị na ese ihe dịka The Rolling Stones na Pink Floyd emeela ọba ma ọ bụ njegharị carbon na anọpụ iche, ebe Live Earth na ekwu na ihe nkiri asaa ya mere na 7 Julaị 2007 bụ ihe omume ọha na eze na anọpụ iche nke carbon na akụkọ ntolite

Ụlọ, na 2019, mejupụtara 21% nke ikuku griin haus zuru ụwa ọnụ 7 The American Institute of Architects 2030 Nkwenye bụ mmemme afọ ofufo maka ụlọ ọrụ ndị otu AIA na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na gburugburu ebe a wuru ewu na arịọ ndị otu a ka ha kwe nkwa imepụta ụlọ ha niile
ga anọpụ iche carbon site na 2030

N'afọ 2010, ụlọ ọrụ na ahụ maka ụkpụrụ ụlọ HOK rụrụ ọrụ na onye na ahụ maka ume na ìhè ụbọchị The Weidt Group iji chepụta 170,735 square foot (15,8618 m2) net efu carbon emission prototype Class A ụlọ ọrụ na St
Louis, Missouri, US
Goodvalley ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ na anọpụ iche carbon dị ka onye mbụ na emepụta anụ ezi anụ ezi
O kwere omume site n'ibelata ikuku ikuku na ekuku n'oge ọ bụla nke mmepụta
Na mgbakwunye na ibelata akara ukwu carbon ya, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na enweta nnọpụiche carbon site n'iwepụta ume ndụ ndụ site na osisi biogas nke ugbo ya
NIRAS na agbakọ nchikota nke mwepu na mbelata CO2 na kemgbe afọ 2018, ngụkọ ahụ akpọpụtala Goodvalley Group Corporate Carbon Neutral
A na eme asambodo ahụ dabere na ISO-14064 ma kwenye na TÜV Rheinland
Kemgbe 2019, ọnụ ọgụgụ na abawanye ụba nke ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa agbaala mbọ nweta nnọpụiche carbon site, ma ọ bụ tupu, 2050, dị ka Microsoft (2030), Amazon (2040), na L'Oreal (2050)

N'afọ 2020, BlackRock, nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ itinye ego n'ụwa, mara ọkwa na ọ ga amalite ime mkpebi n'uche mgbanwe ihu igwe na nkwado, wee malite ịpụ apụ nke ọ kwenyere na ọ nọchiri anya 'ihe egwu dị elu na akwado nkwado'
Ndị na eme ihe ike boro ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ebubo na ọ na asa akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, ebe ọ ka nwere nnukwu ego etinyere na ụlọ ọrụ coal
N'ime akwụkwọ ozi afọ 2021 nke CEO Larry Fink, ọ gara n'ihu kpalie maka azụmahịa ka ha malite ịtọpụta atụmatụ doro anya ka ha ga esi na anọpụ iche carbon site na 2050
Mba asatọ enwetala ma ọ bụ karịa nnọpụiche carbon Bhutan, Comoros, Gabon, Guyana, Madagascar, Niue, Panama, Suriname
Mba ndị ahụ na echekwa gburugburu ebe obibi ha ma nwee obere ngalaba ụlọ ọrụ
A kọwawo Gabon dị ka ihe atụ maka nchekwa gburugburu ebe Suriname amalitela iji oke ọhịa ya mee ka carbon kredit
Mba 3 carbon na adịghị mma hiwere otu obere njikọ na 2021 United Nations Climate Change Conference ma rịọ maka enyemaka ka mba ndị ọzọ sonye na ya
As of October 2021[update], numerous countries/nations have pledged carbon neutrality, including
Na 24 Septemba 2019, Prime Minista Justin Trudeau kwere nkwa ime ka Canada na anọpụ iche carbon site na 2050 ma ọ bụrụ na a họpụtara ya ọzọ
Na 21 October 2019, a họpụtara Trudeau ọzọ, na na Disemba 2019, gọọmentị Canada kwupụtara n'ụzọ doro anya ebumnuche ya maka Canada ịnọpụ iche carbon site na 2050
N'okwu ya sitere n'ocheeze, nke ewepụtara na 23 Septemba 2020, gọọmentị etiti
ekwela nkwa iwepụta ebumnuche ya ime ka Canada ghara ịnọpụ iche na carbon site na 2050
Obodo Edmonton, Alberta, na etolite ugbu a obodo na anọpụ iche carbon a na akpọ Blatchford, na ala nke ọdụ ụgbọ elu City Center mbụ ya
Ka ọ na erule afọ 2020, China ekwupụtala ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya nke inweta nnọpụiche carbon ma kpebie imezu atụmatụ atụmatụ a ka ọ na erule 2060
Ọ na atụ aro na uto akụ na ụba agaghị adị ngwa ngwa iji nweta ebumnuche ahụ
Kemgbe Mgbakọ Mba nke iri na asatọ nke ndị Kọmunist, C1hina emechaala 960 nde mu (ihe dị ka nde hectare 64)
Mkpuchi ọhịa na-abawanye site na 268%-2304%
Ndị EU nwere ebumnuche etiti yana na 2019 mgbochi ahụ, ewezuga Poland, kwetara ịtọ ebumnuche 2050 maka nnọpụiche carbon
European Union abụrụla mpaghara izizi nabata nnọpụiche ihu igwe site na 2050 site na European Green Deal, na agba mbọ na emebe Green Alliance na mba na mpaghara ndị mmekọ n'ofe ụwa
Na 29 Septemba 2021, EU Commission weputara 100 Climate Neutral na Smart Cities site na 2030, otu n'ime ọrụ EU ise
Ebumnuche EU a bụ inwe obodo 100 na anọpụ iche na carbon na smart site na 2030 yana kwa, kpalie obodo ndị ọzọ maka ebumnuche EU nke nnọpụiche carbon site na 2050

Na 27 June 2019, Mgbakọ Mba France tozuru oke n'ime iwu edemede mbụ na ngwugwu ihu igwe na ike nke na esetịpụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ France igbutu ikuku ikuku griin ha wee na anọpụ iche carbon site na 2050 n'ikwekọ na nkwekọrịta ihu igwe Paris 2015
Ndị ụlọ omebe iwu French kwadoro nke a na 18 Julaị 2019
N'Ọktoba 2020, Japan kwupụtara atụmatụ ya iru nnọpụiche carbon n'ezie site na 2050, nke a gafere National Diet wee bụrụ nke edobere ya na iwu na 26 Mee 2021
Na Maachị 2009, Mohamed Nasheed, onye isi ala Maldives mgbe ahụ, kwere nkwa ime ka obodo ya ghara ịnọpụ iche na carbon n'ime afọ iri site na ịkwaga ikuku na ike anyanwụ
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, ndị ọchịchị na esote ha hapụrụ atụmatụ ahụ

Na 7 Nọvemba 2019, New Zealand gafere ụgwọ chọrọ ka obodo ahụ bụrụ efu efu maka gas niile griin haus site na 2050 (ewezuga methane biogenic, yana atụmatụ ibelata nke ahụ site na 24-47% n'okpuru ọkwa 2017 site na 2050)
Na Spain, na 2014, agwaetiti El Hierro ghọrọ carbon na anọpụ iche (maka mmepụta ike ya)
Ọzọkwa, obodo Logroño Montecorvo dị na La Rioja ga anọpụ iche na carbon ozugbo emechara
Na May 2021, Spain nakweere iwu mgbanwe ihu igwe na ike mgbanwe ike iji nweta nnọpụiche carbon site na 2050
N'October 2021, Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez wepụtara akụkọ Spain 2050 nke na esetịpụ 50 milestones na ebumnuche Spain iji nweta nnọpụiche carbon
Sweden aims ịghọ carbon na anọpụ iche site 2045

The Climate Act nke na amanye omume kwupụta ihe mgbaru ọsọ ahụ e guzobere na June 2017 na emejuputa atumatu na mmalite nke 2018, na eme Sweden mba mbụ na a iwu na adịgide adịgide carbon nnọpụiche iche
Ọhụụ a bụ na ikuku ikuku ikuku griin ha kwesịrị ịbụ efu
Ebumnobi n'ozuzu ya bụ na mmụba nke okpomọkụ zuru ụwa ọnụ kwesịrị ịbụ nanị na ogo abụọ, yana na ntinye nke gas na ekpo ọkụ na ikuku na eme ka ọ dịkwuo elu 400 ppm

N'April 2022 nkwekọrịta dị n'etiti ndị isi na nzuko omeiwu Sweden gụnyere oriri na mbupụ na ebumnuche nnọpụiche carbon ya, nke ga eme ka Sweden bụrụ mba mbụ n'ụwa na etinye ikuku sitere na ahia mba ụwa na nkwa iji belata mgbanwe ihu igwe
South Korea bu n'obi ịnọpụ iche carbon site na 2050, wee wepụta ya, na 31 Ọgọst 2021, mmebe nke Carbon Neutral and Green Growth Basic Act, nke na akọwapụta mmezu nke mbelata gas griin haus
Ụgwọ a, nke a na akpọkwa 'Climate Crisis Response Act', iwu, ka ọ na erule 2030, mbelata gas griin 35% na mba ahụ tụnyere 2018
Na Julaị 2007, Vatican City kwupụtara atụmatụ ịbụ mba mbụ na anọpụ iche carbon n'ụwa, na agbaso ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Pope iji kpochapụ okpomoku zuru ụwa ọnụ
A gaara erute ihe mgbaru ọsọ ahụ site n'oké ọhịa nke ụlọ ọrụ na emepụta carbon na enye onyinye, bụ́ nke dị na Bükk National Park, Hungary
N'ikpeazụ ọ dịghị osisi a kụrụ n'okpuru ọrụ ahụ na carbon offsets emeghị
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2008, steeti obodo ahụ wụnyekwara ma tinye ogwe anwụ nke 2,400 n'elu ụlọ nke Paul VI Center nke ndị na-ege ntị

Dịka kọmitii na ahụ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe (CCC) tụrụ aro, gọọmentị etinyela aka n'ụzọ iwu na United Kingdom ga esi na ikuku ikuku griin ha pụta n'afọ 2050 yana Ngalaba ọgụgụ isi nke ike na ihu igwe (ECIU) ekwuola na ọ ga adị ọnụ ala
A ga achọrọ usoro dị iche iche gụnyere carbon siks (mwepụ gas griin) iji chịkwaa ikuku sitere na ọrụ ugbo na ụgbọ elu
Igwe ikuku carbon ndị a nwere ike ịgụnye mkpụgharị osisi, mweghachi ebe obibi, nrụpụta carbon ala, bioenergy na ijide carbon na nchekwa yana ọbụna ijide ikuku ozugbo
N'afọ 2020, gọọmentị UK ejikọtala inweta ebumnuche efu dị ka usoro nwere ike ime ka ikuku dị mma dị ka uru bara uru
Gọọmenti UK mere atụmatụ na iwepụ mmanụ ọkụ maka ikpo ọkụ n'ụlọ na njem ụgbọ njem nwere ike ime ka ọchịchọ ọkụ eletrik dị okpukpu atọ
Scotland ewepụtala ebumnuche 2045
Agwaetiti Orkney nwere nnukwu ikuku na ike mmiri, na ume ọhụrụ abatala n'isi nso nso a
Agbanyeghi na Orkney jikọtara ya na ala, ọ na ewepụta ihe karịrị 100% nke ike net ya site na mmeghari ohuru
] Nke a na abịa tumadi site na ikuku ikuku dị n'ofe Orkney
Thailand bu n'obi imezu nnọpụiche carbon site n'afọ 2050
Dị ka atụmatụ maka ebumnuche nnọpụiche carbon, Ministry of Natural Resources and Environment nke Thailand wepụtara mbụ Carbon Credit Exchange na 2022
Taiwan nwere ebumnuche 2050 iji nweta nnọpụiche carbon

Ngalaba nke oke ohia na nchekwa ihe okike, Mahadum Omenala China na ngalaba Economics nke oke ohia, Taiwan Forestry Research Institute weputara ihe omumu n’August 2012 na egosi na igbu osisi nwere ike mebie akara ukwu carbon iji mejuputa nnọpụiche carbon
Ha nyochara uru mbelata carbon nke mpaghara nkwalite ịdị mma ikuku (AQEZ) nke gọọmentị hibere na 1995
United States etinyela usoro nnọpụiche carbon na ọkwa gọọmentị etiti na steeti
A na- enejere anya na ụkọ mmiri n'Africa ga-eru n'ókè dị elu n'afọ 2025 mgbe a na-eme atụmatụ na ihe dị ka ụzọ abụọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ndị bi n'ụwa nwere ike ịta ahụhụ site na ụkọ mmiri dị ọcha
Isi ihe na-akpata ụkọ mmiri n'Africa bụ ụkọ ihe ndị a n'ahụ anya na ụkọ akụ na ụba, mmụba ngwa ngwa nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ, na mgbanwe ihu igwe
Enweghị mmiri bụ enweghị mmiri dị ọcha iji gboo mkpa mmiri dị mma
Ọ bụ ezie na Sub-Saharan Africa nwere ọtụtụ mmiri ozuzo, mana ọ dịghị ezo oge niile, nkesa ya adịghị mma, nke a na ebute idei mmiri na ụkọ mmiri ozuzo ugboro ugboro

Tụkwasị na nke a, mmepe akụ na ụba zuru oke na nsogbu ịda ogbenye, tinyere mmụba ngwa ngwa nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na isi ime obodo na-akwaga obodo ndi mepere emepe n'ime emeela ka Sub-Saharan Africa bụrụ mpaghara kachasị daa ogbenye na nke na-emepebeghị emepe n'ụwa
Ozi ana enweta site na otu n'ahụ maka Nri na Ọlụ Ugbo 2012 nke United Nations na-egosi na ụkọ mmiri na-arịwanye elu bụ otu n'ime ihe ịma aka n'ihe gbasara mmepe na-adịgide adịgide
Nke a bụ n'ihi na ọnụ ọgụgụ na-arịwanye elu nke ọdọ mmiri ahụ eruola ọnọdụ nke ụkọ mmiri site na ngụkọta nke ọrụ ugbo na ngalaba ndị ọzọ
Mmetụta nke ụkọ mmiri n'Africa sitere na ahụike (ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka na-emetụta karịsịa) na agụmakwụkwọ, mmepụta ọrụ ugbo, mmepe na-adịgide adịgide yana ikike maka esemokwu mmiri

Iji dozie nsogbu nke ụkọ mmiri n'Africa n'ụzọ zuru oke, United Nations Economic Commission for Africa na-ekwusi ike na ọ dị mkpa itinye ego na mmepe nke ihe ndị nwere ike ime ka mmiri naa uba n'Afrịka
Nke a ga-eme ka nchekwa nri na nchekwa mmiri dịkwa mma karịa ma chebe uru akụ na ụba site n'ịchịkwa ụkọ mmiri ozuzo, idei mmiri, na ọzara
Enya bụ asụsụ Bantu nkè Democratic Republic of the Congo
Maho (2009) depụtara D141 Zura (Zula) dị kà ndị nwere njikọ chiri ányá

Emotional First Aid Practical Strategies for Treating Failure, Rejection, Guilt, and Other Everyday Psychological Injuries bụ akwụkwọ enyemaka onwe onye nke Guy Winch, onye American clinical psychologist

Akwụkwọ a bụ ihe atụ nke bibliotherapy nke onye ode akwụkwọ na-enye nyocha nke nghọta nke nchegbu uche ndị nkịtị, dị ka owu ọmụma na asịrị na-adịghị mma, na-akọwapụta usoro ọgwụgwọ kwesịrị ekwesị maka onye ọ bụla

Toni Bernhard, onye bụbu prọfesọ iwu na Mahadum California, Davis na-atụ aro na nyocha ya na Psychology Today, “Ọtụtụ n'ime anyị nwere àgwà nke ịsacha na ịgbatị ikpere ozugbo ma, dị ka Winch si kwuo, anyị anaghị emekarị ghọta na e merụrụ anyị ahụ́ n'ụzọ mmetụta uche, ma, ọ bụrụgodị na anyị emee ya, anyị nwere ike ileda mmetụta ọnya ahụ nwere ike ime anya, n'ihi ya, anyị adịghị eme ngwa ngwa iji belata mmetụta ọ na-enwe ná ndụ anyị'

N'ime nyocha, Anne Parfitt-Rogers, onye dọkịta Scotland si na Mahadum Edinburgh na-atụ aro, '[Akwụkwọ ahụ] na'enyocha njikọ dị n'etiti ịjụ na ime ihe ike na omume mmeri onwe onye nke na na - mere ka anyị pụọ mgbe anyị nọ naanị anyị ma ọ bụ nwee ùgwù onwe anyị dị ala, malite usoro ọjọọ ma gbochie mmekọrịta dị irè

Christian Aid bụ ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka na mmepe nkè ụka Ndị Kraịst irí anọ na otu (Protestant, Katọlik na Ọtọdọks) na UK na Ireland, ma na-arụ ọrụ iji kwado mmepe na-adịgide adịgide, kpochapụ ịda ogbenye, kwado ndị obodo ma nyé enyemaka ọdachi na South America, Caribbean, Africa na Eshia
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ narị òtù ndị mmekọ mpaghara na ụfọdụ n'ime obodo ndị kachasị ike n'ụwa na mba 24
Ọ bụ ónyé guzobere Kọmitii Mberede Ọdachi, na ónyé isi otu The Climate Coalition, The Fairtrade Foundation na mkpọsa Trade Justice Movement
Isi ụlọ ọrụ Christian Aid dị na London ma nwee ndị otu mpaghara gafee UK na Ireland, tinyere ụlọ ọrụ mba ndị ọzọ gbụrụ-gbúrụ ụwa
Christian Aid na-ahazi nchịkọta ụlọ na ụlọ kachasị na UK, Christian Aid Week, nké na-ewère ọnọdụ na Mee kwà afọ
Ónyé nduzi ya bụ Loretta Minghella ónyé a họpụtara n'afọ 2010 mànà ọ gbàrà arụkwaghịm n'afọ 2017 iji rụọ ọrụ màkà ndị Kọmishọna Chọọchị
Ónyé isi nchịkwa ugbu a bụ Amanda Khozi Mukwashi nọchiri ya
Ego enyemaka Ndị Kraịst nwetara n'afọ 2012 na afọ 2013 bụ £ 954 nde

Nrụzigharị mgbè agha dị íchè íchè gasịrị na Vietnam, Laos na Cambodia bụ nnukwu ọrụ, ya na enyemaka enyere mgbè a kwaturu ndị ọchịchị áká ike Idi Amin na Uganda, ezinụlọ Somoza na Nicaragua, na Pol Pot na Cambodia
A kwadokwara ndị India Yanomami nọ na Brazil, na nkwenye màkà ndị a chụpụrụ
Christian Aid na-enweta ego site n'ọtụtụ isi mmalite, dị ka ònyìnyé ụlọ ọrụ, ònyìnyé ógè niile, arịrịọ Christian Aid Week, ònyìnyé n'ozuzu, ihe nketa, na arịrịọ mberede
N'afọ 2013, ego ụlọ ọrụ na-enweta, nke akụkụ ya sitere na Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Mmepe Mba Nile na European Commission, mejupụtara percent iri anọ na otu nke ngụkọta ego
Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ego fọdụrụnụ na-abịa site na ọtụtụ puku mmadụ na ụka na obodo
Ógè isi nchịkọta ego gụnyere Krismas, owuwe ihe ubi, na izu enyemaka Ndị Kraịst
N'afọ 2013, £ 126 nde (ma ọ bụ 13% nke ngụkọta ego a na-enweta n'izu a
N'ime afọ niile, ndị na-akwado ya na-enye mgbè niile site na iji debit kpọmkwem, ònyìnyé ego, na Will Aid
Chọọchị na ndị otu obodo na-esokwa na kalenda ihe omume kwà afọ (dịka, ije ije, nri ehihie ofe, na ajụjụ)

Ónyé na-ahụ màkà mmepe akụ na ụba bụ Paul Collier n'akwụkwọ ya bụ The Bottom Billion na-atụ aro na Christian Aid 'na-eduhie eduhie' ndị na-eme ntụli aka na UK n'afọ 2004 na 2005 na mkpọsa megide ibelata ihe mgbochi azụmahịa na Africa

Ọ na-ekwu na mkpọsa ahụ dabeere na nyocha 'nke na-eduhie eduhie' nke ónyé na-ahụ màkà akụ na ụba na-enweghị nka achọrọ mèrè na nyocha ya 'site n'aka otu ndị ọkachamara agụmakwụkwọ' bụ nke mmadụ abụọ ónyé na-ekwu màkà akụ na ụzụ ahụ họọrọ n'onwe ya na ndị 'amaghị màkà nka ha na azụmaahịa mba ụwa'
O kwuru na otu ónyé ọrụ a na-akpọghị aha na Ngalaba Azụmaahịa na Ụlọ Ọrụ Britain na-ekwu na 'ha maara na ọ dị njọ, mànà ọ na-ere T-shirts'
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2023, Christian Aid kwuru màkà ihe iwu méré megide nzukọ ahụ site na Zionist Advocacy Center

Aha nna Enyinnaya bụkwa aha mmadụ
Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gụnyere
Epe bụ obodo na mpaghara gọmentị ime obodo (LGA) na Steeti Lagos, Naijiria nke dị n'akụkụ ugwu nke Lekki Lagoon na ihe dị ka kilomita 90 site na Ibadan
N'oge ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke afọ 2006, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na Epe dị ihe dịka 181,409
Enweghị onye ọchịchị kachasị elu n'ógbè ahụ ebe ọ bụ na e nwere obodo abụọ nwere ndị eze n'otu n'otu
Ndị a bụ obodo Eko Epe na Ijebu Epe n'ime otu obodo ahụEmemme ndị a ma ama a na-emekarị n'ala Epe gụnyere Ememme Kayo-kayo, ụbọchị Ebi, Ojude-Oba, na ụbọchị Epe
Okporo ụzọ dị n'ọnụ ụzọ Epe site na Lekki-Epe Expressway nwere ihe a tụrụ atụ nke nnukwu azụ abụọ, nke Gọmentị Lagos Steeti guzobere

Ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu a ma ama dị ka Lagos State University(LASU), Yaba College of Technology, Michael Otedola College of Primary Education(MOCOPED), Pan-Atlantic University(PAU) niile nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ na mpaghara Epe nke Lagos, Nigeria
N'afọ ndị gara aga, tupu a kpọọ obodo a Epe, a maara obodo ahụ dị ka Igbo Obo (Forest of Monkeys)
Ụfọdụ ìgwè ndị na-achụ nta si Ijebu, nke otu Urankaloye ma ọ bụ Uraka duziri gara n'akụkụ ụwa a n'oge njem ịchụ nta na-achọ ụmụ anụmanụ
Ọ bụ ezie na o mesịrị bụrụ ebe mgbaba maka ndị agha Kosoko, ndị Britain chụpụrụ eze Yoruba na Lagos na afọ 1851
N'afọ 1892, Epe bụ ebe mbido maka njem agha nke Sir Gilbert Carter, Gọvanọ Lagos n'oge ahụ, zitere iji merie awujale (onye ọchịchị na nke ime mmụọ nke Ijebu) na Ijebu-Ode
Uraka na Aramope bụ ndị na-achụ nta wee hapụ Ile-Ife na njem ịchụ nta rutere Ijebu-Ode, Uraka amaghị na ọ nọ n'ọnụ ụzọ akụkọ ihe mere eme
Mgbe Uraka rutere Ijebu-Ode, ọ nwetara ozi site na ịgba afa Ifa, a gwara ya ka ọ gaa n'ebe ndịda gaa n'oké osimiri ma nọrọ ebe ọ bụla n'etiti ịgafe osimiri nke isii na nke asaa
Mgbe ọ gaferé osimiri nke ise a na-akpọ 'OTERIN' (Mmiri oyi), ọ rutere n'ebe e mechara mara dị ka 意pooka ebe o ji osisi popoka ya kụọ ala
Obodo Poka sitere na aha ya a na-akpọ Uraka's popoka stick
Na Poka, a gakwuru onye amụma Ifa maka ntụziaka nke dugara Uraka ịga n'ihu ma mgbe ọ gafere osimiri nke isii, o mechara biri n'ebe a na-akpọ 'ETITA'
Mgbe ọ kwụsịrị na Etita, Uraka hụrụ anwụrụ ọkụ na-esi n'oké ọhịa buru ibu na-aga n'ọdọ mmiri ahụ
Iji hụ ihe n'onwe ya, Uraka chọtara isi iyi nke anwụrụ ọkụ ebe ọ zutere ụfọdụ ndị ọkụ azụ aha ha bụ Opute, Lugbasa, Alaro na Ogunmude
Alaro na Ogunmude lụrụ di ma ha amụghị nwa
Ha abụọ mechara ghọọ chi ma na-efe ofufe na Epe ruo taa, ya mere a na-akpọ ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị niile nke Epe 'Omo Epe Alaro Ogunmude'

Ka ọ dịgodị, Uraka gara n'ihu na njem ịchụ nta ya ruo mgbe ọ rutere n'ebe a na-akpọ Igbo obo (ọhịa enwe), ebe dị ugbu a nke Mahadum Lagos State, Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Injinịa na ebe ndị agha nọbu, ebe ọ gara n'ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-achọ egwuregwu
O mechara chọpụta ebe a na-akpọ Oko-Eepe (Ọhịa nke ndanda ojii)
Dị ka ọ si pụta, mgbe ọ bụla Uraka setịpụrụ ọnyà ya maka egwuregwu, ọ na-alaghachi n'ụlọ mgbe niile aka efu
Nke a ghọrọ ihe na-echegbu ya na nwunye ya
Ma o kwenyesiri ike na Oko-Eepe bụ ebe egwuregwu kachasị ukwuu gbara ya gburugburu
O mere mkpesa nye nwunye ya aha ya bụ 'PEETA' na ọhịa ahụ jupụtara na ndanda ojii na mgbe ọ bụla ọ na-akụ ụkwụ ya iji chụpụ ndanda ojii, ụmụ anụmanụ gbara ya gburugburu ga-agbaso ụkwụ ha
Karịsịa, anụmanụ ọ bụla ọnyà ya jidere na-eri mgbe niile site na ndanda tupu ọ rute ebe ahụ
Oge ọ bụla Uraka gawara ịchụ nta, Peeta ga-ajụ ma ọ ka na-aga Oko-Eepe
Obodo Eepe nwetara aha ya site na Oko-Eepe na narị afọ nke iri na ise na ụfọdụ ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme kwenyere na Peeta, nwunye Uraka ga-arụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịkpọ aha Obodo Epe
Epe malitere ịgbasawanye ma n'oge na-adịghị anya, ụfọdụ ndị biri na Areke ma ọ bụ Bros
ebe ndị ọzọ biri n'akụkụ nke ọzọ a maara dị ka 'Apakeji'
N'akụkụ ahịrị, nwa eze Ijebu, nwa nke ise Awujale nke Ijebu-Ode, Obaloja hapụrụ Ijebu'Ode wee biri na Epe
Ọ were aha Oloja ma site na afọ 1790, a rụnyere Shagbafara Oloja
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1810, Epe bụ nnukwu obodo
Obodo ahụ nwere udo ma nwee òkè nke ya n'agha agbụrụ
Otú ọ dị 1848 hụrụ agha Makun-Omi-Epe
Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ozugbo agha Makun-Omi-Epe gwụsịrị na Eze Kosoko nke Lagos choro ebe mgbaba na Epe Land na ihe karịrị ndị na-eso ụzọ 1,500
Nke ahụ bụ na Disemba, na afọ 1851, n'oge ọchịchị Oloja Olumade
A ma bịdọrọ Kosoko ịbanye n'obodo Epe mana mgbe ogologo arịrịọ gasịrị, a gwara ya Ijebu-Ode ka ọ nweta ikike na ikike n'aka Awujale Anikilaya
N'ihi ya, Awujale weere ya dị ka akara nke eze ma zigara 'Oja Ikale' dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke ikike na nlekọta na Oloja Olumade, na-arịọ ya ka o nye Kosoko na ndị na-esote ya ebe mgbaba na Epe
Oge Kosoko nọrọ na Epe bụ isiokwu nke esemokwu Ụfọdụ na-ekwu na n'ime afọ iri na otu ọ nọrọ na Epe, ọ nweghị ụlọ nke ya, ebe ndị ọzọ na-eche ihe ọzọ
Mana ihe ọ bụla ikpe ahụ nwere ike ịbụ, afọ Kosoko nọ na Epe gbanwere ọnọdụ mmekọrịta na ọdịbendị nke obodo Epe, n'ihi na ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-eso ụzọ ya n'obodo Epe bụ ndị Alakụba
Balogun Ajeniya, Oshodi Tapa, Balogun Agbaje, Disu Kujeniya, Braimoh Iyanda Oloko na Posu bụ ụfọdụ n'ime ndị agha nwere obi ike na Kosoko nọ na Epe
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị isi a ghọrọ ndị Alakụba
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, Balogun Ajeniya, onye mechara bụrụ nnukwu onye na-akwalite Islam na Epe bụ otu n'ime ha
Ndị a tọghatara mechara guzobe obodo n'okpuru nduzi nke Mallam Idris Saliu Gana, onye bụ Imam na Lagos
Nke a bụ ihe kpatara mgbasa nke Islam na obodo Epe ruo taa
Okwu ahụ bụ 'Epe Onikorani' bụ n'ihi mgbasa nke Islam na Epe
N'ịghọta mmeso e nyere ya na Epe, Kosoko nyere otu n'ime ụmụ ya nwanyị aha ya bụ Kusade na Ijebu Chief, Adebawon nke Idogun n'alụmdi na nwunye; Adenusi bụ ngwaahịa nke alụmdi na nwunye ahụ
N'afọ 1869, a gbaghara Kosoko ma mesịa laghachi Lagos
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-eso ụzọ ya sooro ya, gụnyere nwa ya nwanyị Kusade, ma hapụ nwa nwa ya Adenusi
Ezinụlọ Adenusi ka na-amụba na Epe ruo ugbu a
Ndị Kosoko hapụrụ mejupụtara ihe ka ukwuu n'ihe a na-akpọ Epe Eko ugbu a
N'afọ 1892, Epe bụ ebe mbido maka njem agha nke Sir Gilbert Carter, gọvanọ Lagos, zitere iji merie awujale (onye ọchịchị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nke ime mmụọ nke Ijebu) na Ijebu-Ode
Epe nke oge a bụ ebe nchịkọta maka mbupụ azụ, cassava (manioc), ọka (mkpụrụ), akwụkwọ nri na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, akị bekee, koko, ihe nkwụ, rọba, na nkụ na Lagos
A na-ebugharị akwụkwọ osisi pụrụ iche bara uru n'ichekwa mkpụrụ osisi kola na Ijebu-Ode, Shagamu, na obodo ndị ọzọ na-ebubata mkpụrụ osisi kola
A maara Epe nke ọma maka iwu ụgbọ mmiri ndị na-arụ ọrụ, ndị na-adịghị omimi na-agagharị n'ọdọ mmiri ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri
Ịkụ azụ bụ ọrụ bụ isi

Sanofi Aventis kwupụtara na Disemba 2009 na ọ na-ewepụ akwụkwọ ya maka nkwado nke eplivanserin site na Nchịkwa nri na ọgwụ US na Agencylọ Ọrụ Ọgwụ na Europe
Eplivanserin bụ onye na-emegide serotonin receptor subtype 5-HT2A

N'adịghị ka ọgwụ ndị na-eme ka mmadụ kwụsị ịrụ ọrụ nkụzi kasị dị umeala na 5-HT2A receptors (dịka, mirtazapine, clozapine, risperidone), eplivanserin enweghị njikọ ọ bụla na dopamine, histamine na adrenergic receptors
N'ime nnwale ọgwụgwọ nke Phase II nke placebo na-achịkwa na mmadụ 351, eplivanserin belatara oge ụra site na afo nwela onwa iri nkeji 39 (ma e jiri ya tụnyere nkeji 26 n'okpuru placebo)
Njikọ dị n'etiti 2'-Fluoroacetophenone [445-27-2] (5) & 4-hydroxybenzaldehyde [123-08-0] (6) na-enye chalcone dị n'agbata (nakwa enone), ya bụ
(2-chloroethyl) dimethylamine (CDMA) na acetone oxime na-emeghachi omume ọnụ iji nye dimethyhaminoacetoxime (DMA acetoxime), CID 16641114 (3)

Eqbal Ahmad (1933 - 11 Mee 1999) bụ onye sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Pakistan, onye edemede na agụmakwụkwọ a maara maka mmegide agha ya, nkwado ya maka mmeghachi omume mmegide n'ụwa niile na onyinye agụmakwụkwọ na ọmụmụ nke Near East
A mụrụ ya na Bihar, British India, Ahmad kwagara Pakistan mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị wee gaa n'ihu na-amụ akụ na ụba na Forman Christian College
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge dịka onye isi ndị agha ma merụọ ahụ na Agha Kashmir Mbụ n'afọ 1948
O sonyere na Mgbanwe Algeria, wee mụọ Agha Vietnam na ọchịchị alaeze US, na-aghọ onye mmegide mbụ nke agha ahụ mgbe ọ laghachiri na US n'etiti afọ 1960
A mụrụ Eqbal Ahmad n'obodo Irki na Gaya District (nke bụzi Magadh Division) nke steeti India nke Bihar
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata nwoke, otu ìgwè ndị Hindu gburu nna ya n'ihi esemokwu ala n'ihu ya
N'oge nkewa nke India n'afọ 1947, ya na nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye ji ụkwụ kwaga Pakistan
Eqbal Ahmad gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Forman Christian College na Lahore, Pakistan, n'afọ 1951 na nzere na akụ na ụba
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ nwa oge dịka onye agha, ọ debanyere aha na Occidental College na California n'afọ 1957, dị ka Rotary Fellow
N'afọ 1958, ọ gara Mahadum Princeton, ebe ọ gụrụ sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Middle East ruo mgbe ọ nwetara PhD ya n'afọ 1965

Site n'afọ 1960 ruo 1963, Ahmad biri na North Africa, na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na Algeria, ebe ọ sonyeere National Liberation Front ma soro Frantz Fanon na ụfọdụ ndị Algeria na-alụ ọgụ maka nnwere onwe megide ndị France na Algeria rụọ ọrụ
E nyere ya ohere isonyere gọọmentị Algeria mbụ nwere onwe ya, mana ọ jụrụ maka ndụ dị ka onye nwere ọgụgụ isi nwere onwe ya
Kama nke ahụ, ọ laghachiri na United States
Eqbal Ahmad maara asụsụ Urdu, Bekee, Persian na Arabic nke ọma
Eqbal Ahmad nwụrụ n'ihi nkụchi obi na 11 Mee 1999 n'ụlọ ọgwụ Islamabad na Pakistan, ebe a na-agwọ ya maka ọrịa kansa eriri afọ
Ọ lụrụ Julie Diamond na 1969, onye nkuzi na onye edemede si New York ma ha nwere otu nwa nwanyị, Dohra
Ụmụ amaala nhata bụ otu ndị America anaghị akwụ ụgwọ, ndị na-abụghị ndị otu nke 'raara onwe ha nye mgbanwe ndị ga-eme ka ụmụ amaala nwee nha anya'
Ọ bụ onye prọfesọ Iwu Harvard Lawrence Lessig hiwere ya na ngwụcha 2016 ka ọ gaa n'ihu na mbọ iji weta usoro mgbanwe ọ tụpụtara n'oge mkpọsa onye isi ala 2016 ya
N'ụzọ doro anya, dị ka mkpọsa mmalite ya, otu ahụ malitere 'Electors Trust' ozugbo ntuli aka izugbe nke 2016 gasịrị
Ha mere nke a iji nye onye ọ bụla nhọpụta nke chọrọ ịtụ vootu akọnuche ha nkwado iwu n'efu na nzuzo

Na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche, dị ka Hamilton Electors na celebrities, mgbasa ozi mere ka ọnụ ọgụgụ kasịnụ nke 'na-ekwesị ntụkwasị obi' votu ntuli aka mgbe a tụrụ na otu president ntuli aka

Ụmụ amaala nhata etinyela aka na ikpe ikpe ndị ọzọ dị elu dị elu n'ofe US na isiokwu sitere na ịgbanwe usoro ego mgbasa ozi na ịgba akwụkwọ iji kwụsị super PACs, na-emezi usoro nhoputa ndi ochichi na ikpe nke na-ama onye mmeri-weta-niile usoro nke Electoral
Kọleji, iji gbasaa ohere ịtụ vootu site na ozi nye ndị na-eto eto

Ka ọ na-erule 2021, Equal Citizens bụ onye mmekọ na Nkwupụta maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke America na-akwado maka ngafe nke For the People Act, John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act, na DC Statehood
Ụmụ amaala nhata na-akwadokwa pọdkastị Ụzọ Ọzọ, nke Lawrence Lessig kwadoro
Pọdkastị ahụ bụ akụkụ nke otu onye kwuo uche ya, netwọk pọdkastị ahaziri yana kwado ya site na McCourtney Institute for Democracy na Penn State
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2015, Lawrence Lessig kwupụtara ọkwa ya maka nhọpụta onye isi oche nke Democratic Party 2016

Lessig kọwara nhọpụta ya dị ka referendum na mgbanwe ego ego mkpọsa na iwu mgbanwe ntuli aka ma kwuo na, ọ bụrụ na a họpụta ya, ọ ga-eje ozi dị ka onyeisi oche na mgbanwe ndị a a tụrụ anya dị ka ihe ndị omebe iwu ga-ebute ụzọ

Kpọmkwem, isi ihe ndị isi oche Lessig lekwasịrị anya ga-abụ ịfefe Iwu ịha nhatanha nwa amaala nke nwere ebumnuche atọ (1) Ikike nha anya ịtụ vootu, nke gụnyere imejuputa ndebanye aha ntuli aka na-akpaghị aka na ịkwaga ụbọchị ịtụ vootu gaa na ezumike mba; (2) nnochi anya nha anya, enwetara site na ngafe nke Iwu nnọchite anya ziri ezi; na (3) nhoputa ndi ochichi nke nwa amaala akwadoro, ma obu ego oha na eze maka ntuli aka nzuko
Na Nọvemba 2015, Lessig kwụsịrị mkpọsa onye isi ala ya, wee mepụta ụmụ amaala nha anya site na akụrụngwa mgbasa ozi
Ụmụ amaala ha nhata na-eje ozi dị ka ebe ọrụ maka imezu mgbanwe ndị a chọrọ n'ime iwu ịha nhata nwa amaala
Ndị otu a nwere òtù ụmụnna nwanyị abụọ EqualCitizensUS, nzukọ 501(c)(4), na Equal Citizens Foundation, nzukọ 501(c3)
EqualCitizensUS na-eme mkpọsa nkwado azụmaahịa, ebe Equal Citizens Foundation na-elekwasị anya na ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na ikpe
Òtù abụọ ahụ na-ezube imezu otu ọrụ nke ịha nhata ụmụ amaala
Lessig bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Equal Citizens
Ndị na-esonụ na-eje ozi dị ka Board of Directors nke Equal Citizens Foundation
Charles Kolb (2018–ugbua), Onye isi oche na onye isi oche nke DisruptDC
Celinda Lake (2018–ugbua), Onye isi oche nke Lake Research Partners
Lawrence Lessig (2018–ugbua), Prọfesọ na Harvard Law School
Richard Painter (2018–ugbua), Prọfesọ Iwu na Mahadum nke Minnesota, onye na-azọ ọkwa Sineti US
Robert Reich (2018–ugbua), Prọfesọ na UC Berkeley, onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ ọrụ US
Ego maka ụmụ amaala nhata na-abịa site na obere dollar n'ịntanetị onyinye sitere na ntọala ndị ọrụ ebere
Ụmụ amaala nhata anaghị anabata ego site n'aka gọọmentị, òtù gọọmentị, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2017, Equal Citizens malitere mkpọsa nchịkọta ego ụbọchị iri atọ iji kwado ikpe ha iji maa onye mmeri aka na Electoral College

N'ime ụbọchị iri atọ ahụ, ihe karịrị mmadụ puku iri atọ na ise debanyere aha, ihe karịrị mmadụ puku ise nyere onyinye, na ihe mgbaru ọsọ nchịkọta ego nke $ 250,000 mezuru ọtụtụ ụbọchị tupu oge a kara aka
Ọrụ ụmụ amaala nhata bụ 'ịkwụsị nrụrụ aka nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya site na iweghachi nkwa bụ isi nke ịha nhata ụmụ amaala na Iwu anyị'
Ndị otu ahụ nwere isi okwu atọ
N'afọ 2017, Equal Citizens malitere ọrụ ikpe atọ dị elu nke na-achọ ịgbanwe Electoral College na ego mgbasa ozi
Abụọ n'ime ọrụ ikpe ahụ emechaala, ebe a na-edozi otu ugbu a na usoro ụlọ ikpe gọọmentị etiti
Equal Votes bụ ihe ịma aka iwu kwadoro ikike iwu nke steeti ikenye votu ntuli aka ha na ntọala onye mmeri
Lessig rụrụ ụka na dabere na ụkpụrụ 'otu onye, otu votu' nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu kwuputala na Bush v
Gore, usoro onye mmeri na-ewere ihe niile megidere iwu - ọ bụ mmebi nke Iwu Nchedo nhata nke na-ahụ na a ghaghị imeso votu niile n'otu n'otu n'okpuru iwu
Site n'ikenye votu Electoral College ha dị ka onye mmeri na-ewere ihe niile, Equal Citizens kwenyere na steeti na-atụfu votu nke ụmụ amaala United States n'ụzọ dị irè na votu maka onye isi ala
Na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke United States n'afọ 2016, ndị ntuli aka iri votu ma ọ bụ gbalịa ịtụ vootu megidere nkwa ha na Electoral College
Na steeti Washington, a kwụrụ ndị ntuli aka atọ ụgwọ $ 1,000 maka votu ha, na Colorado, ewepụrụ otu onye ntuli aka ma yie mmadụ abụọ ndị ọzọ egwu maka imebi nkwa ha
N'afọ 2017, Equal Citizens gbara akwụkwọ ikpe Baca v
Ngalaba Steeti Colorado na nnọchite nke ndị ntuli aka atọ na Colorado na Guerra v
Washington State Office of Administrative Hearings na nnọchite nke ndị ntuli aka atọ bụ ndị Washington State kwụrụ ụgwọ
Mgbe anyị malitere ikpe ndị a, anyị mere ya n'ihi na n'agbanyeghị ihe ga-esi na ya pụta, ọ dị oke mkpa idozi ajụjụ a tupu o mepụta nsogbu iwu
Anyị enwetala nke ahụ
N'ụzọ doro anya, anyị ekwenyeghị na Ụlọikpe akọwaala iwu ahụ n'ụzọ ziri ezi
Ma anyị nwere obi ụtọ na anyị enwetala ebumnuche anyị bụ isi - ewepụla ejighị n'aka a

Iwu Alaskan na-egbochi onyinye nye ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nọọrọ onwe ha
Mana a naghịzi etinye oke ndị a n'ihi mkpebi ụlọ ikpe gọọmentị etiti, SpeechNOWorg v
Alaska, Otú ọ dị, na-enye ndị bi na ya ohere ịgba akwụkwọ ma ọ bụrụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ntuli aka nke steeti, Alaska Public Offices Commission, anaghị eme ka iwu ntuli aka ya

N'okpuru iwu ndị a, na Jenụwarị 31, 2018, Equal Citizens wetara mkpesa n'aha ụmụ amaala Alaska atọ, gụnyere James Barnett, onye bụbu onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị obodo Anchorage, na-ekwu na Alaska Public Offices Commission emeghị ka iwu ahụ mezuo site n'ikwe ka ndị Alaskan super PACs abụọ nabata onyinye karịrị ego iwu Alaska kwuru
Ndị isi PAC abụọ ahụ metụtara bụ Interior Voters maka John Coghill, otu n'èzí nke kwadoro ntuli aka nke onye isi ndị Republican steeti Senate bụ John Coghill, na Working Families of Alaska
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ bụ ịmegharị mkpebi ụlọ ikpe gọọmentị etiti SpeechNOWorg v
FEC nke mepụtara ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke super PACs

Na Disemba 2016 Lawrence Lessig, Mark Lemley, na Michael Hawley guzobere The Electors Trust site na nkwado nke Equal Citizens, iji nye ndụmọdụ iwu na-enweghị isi na nkwukọrịta nkwukọrịta dị nchebe, nke a na-amaghị aha maka ndị otu 538 nke United States Electoral College bụ ndị nwere ike ịghọ ndị na-enweghị okwukwe iji gbochie ntuli aka nke Donald Trump na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke 2016
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke nzukọ ahụ bụkwa inyere ndị ntuli aka ịchọpụta ma enwere nkwado zuru oke iji gbochie ntuli aka Donald Trump
Na Disemba 2016, Lessig kwuru na e nwere n'etiti ndị Republican 20 na 30 na-atụle ịtụ vootu megide Trump
Lessig na The Electors Trust nọchitere anya Christopher Suprun, onye ntuli aka si Texas, onye kwupụtara na ọ ga-atụ vootu megide Donald Trump n'agbanyeghị otú steeti ya si votu
Na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na ọtụtụ ndị otu ndị ọzọ dịka Hamilton Electors yana ndị a ma ama, mkpọsa ahụ rụpụtara votu ntuli aka asaa 'na-enweghị okwukwe', nke kachasị atụ na otu ntuli aka onye isi ala
Otú ọ dị, mmadụ ise n'ime mmadụ asaa a na-enweghị okwukwe hapụrụ ịtụ vootu maka Hillary Clinton, ebe mmadụ abụọ n'ime mmadụ asaa a na-enweghị okwukwe kwere nkwa maka Trump
Nke a pụtara na mgbasa ozi ahụ dara ndị ntuli aka Trump 35 na-enweghị okwukwe na-erughị 37 dị mkpa iji nwee ike ịgbanwe nsonaazụ ya

N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2018, ụmụ amaala nhata malitere mkpọsa nkwado ya na Demand Progress, EFF, Public Knowledge, na Internet Archive iji mee ka Congress gbanwee ndokwa na Compensating Legacy Artists maka abụ ha, ọrụ ha, na onyinye dị mkpa na Society Act (The CLASSICS Act)

Isi ihe ha chọrọ, nke akọwapụtara n'akwụkwọ ozi ha degaara Kọmitii Ikpe nke Senate, bụ itinye ihe ndebanye aha na mgbakwunye nwebisiinka ọ bụla, iji kwe ka ọrụ ndị a na-edebeghị aha gafere na ngalaba ọha

Na Mee 2018, Equal Citizens, na mmekorita ya na onye egwu Bassnectar na ememme egwu eletrik Electric Forest, malitere asọmpi Creative Democracy, nke ndị ọrụ ntanetị nwere ike ịbanye nka na-egosi eziokwu banyere ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke America maka onyinye
Ndị ikpe maka asọmpi ahụ gụnyere Lawrence Lessig, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Bridgit Mendler, na onye na-ese ihe Sebastian Wahl
Ndezigharị Ịdị n'Otu bụ Ndezigharị nke ndị ọkà mmụta iwu Kimberlé Crenshaw na Catharine MacKinnon tụrụ aro maka Iwu United States

E bu ụzọ kwuo ya na Disemba 2019 na Yale Law Journal Atụmatụ a bụ nsụgharị emelitere nke Ndezigharị Ikike nhata nke Alice Paul dere site na National Women's Party, nke mbụ a tụrụ aro na 1923 ma a kwadobeghị ya
Nke a dị iche na iwu ịha nhatanha nke 2021, nke akwadoro na Congress ka ọ machibido ịkpa oke dabere na mmekọahụ, njirimara nwoke na nwanyị ma ọ bụ usoro mmekọahụ
United States bụ naanị ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke mepere emepe nke na-adịghị ahụ ikike maka ụmụ nwanyị na iwu gọọmentị etiti ya

Ọ bụ ezie na steeti 38 achọrọ agafeela mgbanwe ahụ dị ka nke 2020, onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndekọ ego nke United States akwadoghị mmezigharị ahụ n'ihi oge nkwenye nzuko omebere nke Maachị 22, 1979, nke ụfọdụ nkwado steeti karịrị akarị
Nke a bụ n'agbanyeghị eziokwu ahụ bụ na ịgbakwunye mgbanwe na Iwu United States iji hụ na nwoke na nwanyị hà nhata nwere nkwado dị ukwuu na United States
Na Julaị 2020 Pew Research Center kọrọ na 78% nke ndị America na-akwado ERA ka agbakwunyere na Iwu
Ikpe, Commonwealth of Virginia v
David Ferriero, gbara akwụkwọ na Jenụwarị 2020 iji manye onye na-edebe ihe ochie ka ọ kwado ERA
Na Machị 5, 2021, ụlọ ikpe mpaghara Washington, DC kagburu ikpe ahụ, na-ekwu na mbipụta nke onye na-edebe ihe ochie nke ERA agaghị abụ nkwenye, ma na-ekwusi ike na oge nkwenye nke ERA bụ iwu kwadoro
Nke a hapụrụ ndị na-akwado ERA nhọrọ ole na ole maka ime ihe ọzọ, gụnyere ịnwa ịgbatị oge nkwenye ERA, ma ọ bụ ide mgbanwe ọhụrụ
Crenshaw na MacKinnon bụ ndị ọkà mmụta na-ahụ maka ikike obodo ogologo oge bụ ndị na-arụ ụka na a ga-emelite Ndezigharị Ikike nhata iji gosipụta nsogbu ọgbara ọhụrụ
ERA nwere ogologo akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụmụ nwanyị na-acha ọcha na-arụ ọrụ maka nkwenye ya dịka Shirley Chisholm na Patsy Mink
Ha na-egosi arụmụka nhata bụ ntọala na mba United States na ngalaba nchedo nhata adịghị aga nke ọma iji kpochapụ ịkpa ókè dabere na mmekọahụ
Arụmụka a na-ewuli elu n'elu ọrụ nke ndị ọkà mmụta iwu nwanyị gara aga dịka Pauli Murray, Dorothy Kenyon na Ruth Bader Ginsburg
Dị ka MacKinnon si kwuo, onye bụ otu n'ime ndị ọkà mmụta gbasara iwu ndị a na-akpọkarị, okwu emelitere na-ewe ụzọ n'etiti etiti ebumnuche ya ichekwa ikike ụmụ n
nwanyị
Ọkà mmụta iwu Kim Forde-Mazrui ekwuola na Ndezigharị Ịdị n'Otu, “ga-akacha kwalite ịha nhata ụmụ nwanyị
Prọfesọ Julie Suk, onye ọkachamara na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ERA, kwetara na mmezigharị agbakwunyere na Iwu United States nke bu n'obi inye ụmụ nwanyị nhata kwesịrị, “

Na meteorology, ọkwa nguzozi - Equilibrium level (EL), ma ọ bụ ọkwa nke na-anọpụ iche (LNB), ma ọ dị oke nke convection (LOC), bụ ịdị elu nke ikuku na-arị elu dị n'otu okpomọkụ dị ka gbụrụ-gbúrụ ya
Nke a pụtara na ikuku na-akwụsighị ike ugbu a kwụsiri ike mgbè ọ rùrù ọkwa nguzozi na convection kwụsịrị

Ọnọdụ a na-adịkarị nso na tropopause ma enwèrè ike igosi ya dị ka nso ébé anvil nke égbè eluigwe n'ihi na ọ bụ ébé a na-emecha bepụ égbè eluigwe, ma e wezụga n'ihe gbásárá overshooting n'elu ébé ọ na-aga n'ihu na-arịgo ruo ọkwa kachasị elu (MPL) n'ihi ike

N'ụzọ doro ányá karị, cumulonimbus ga-akwụsị ịrị elu gbụrụ-gbúrụ kilomita ole na ole tupu ọ ruo ọkwa nke na-anọpụ iche na-ese n'elu mmiri na nkezi anvil glaciation na-eme n'ebe dị elu karịa n'elu ala karịa n'oké osimiri (n'agbanyeghị obere ọdịiche dị na LNB site n'ala ruo n'oké Osimiri)

Erhabor Ogieva Emokpae, OON, (9 Mee 1934 - 16 Febụwarị 1984) bụ onye ama ama na Naijiria na-akpụputa ihe, onye na-ese ihe osise, na onye na-ese ihe nke a na-ewere dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke nka ọgbara ọhụrụ na Naịjirịa

Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya ndị a ma ama gụnyere ihe ngosi ọla nchara nke ihe mkpuchi ivory nke Queen Idia nke e ji mee ihe dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke Second World Black and African Festival of Arts and Culture (FESTAC 77) na eserese a ma ama nke Queen Amina Ọ bụkwa ya but Onye sere ihe Ndị icho mma n'ọnụ ụzọ anọ nke National Arts Theatre, na Lagos
A mụrụ Erhabor Emokpae, onye obodo Oredo na Edo Steeti, by Onye a muru na abali itoolu nke onwa Mee n' afo 1934, nna ya bụ onye isi Bini Palace Ewekagosadoba na nne ya bụ onye Alakụba si Benin City
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị obodo, Benin, na 1949, Emokpae banyere Western Boys High School, Benin, n'otu afọ ahụ, wee pụọ na 1951
Ọ gara n'ihu mụọ nka na Government Trade Centre (nke bụzi Yaba College of Technology) na Lagos site na 1951 ruo 1953
Ọ gara n'ihu mụọ nka na England n'afọ 1963
Ndabere nke nkuzi ya mere ka ọ nọrọ na isiokwu nke dualism ya bu usoro Uzo abuo n'ọtụtụ ọrụ nka ya

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Yaba Trade Centre, Emokpae sonyere na ihe ngosi 'Festival of Arts' nke 1950 na Lagos, tupu ọ gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-azụ ọzụzụ na onye na-ese ihe n'etiti 1954 na 1958 na Ministry of Information na Enugu mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe site na Federal Ministry of Information na 1953
N'afọ 1958, ọ kwagara Lagos ma ewere ya n'ọrụ site na West African Publicity (nke bụzi Lintas West Africa, Lagos) dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Ọ gara n'ihu ka a kwalite ya dị ka Senior Creative Advertisement Visual Artist na 1966, na 1973 ọ ghọrọ Onye isi Nchikota nka n' ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
A na-ahụta ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị guzobere Society of Nigerian Artists, otu mkpakọrịta nke ọ gara n'ihu na-ejide ọkwa odeakwụkwọ site na 1967 ruo 1975
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Lagos Arts Council ma nọrọ n'ọkwa odeakwụkwọ n'afọ 1965
N'oge ndụ ya, Emokpae malitere ma mee ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na ọtụtụ mba gụnyere Nigeria, West Germany, England na Brazil

O sonyekwara n'ihe ngosi nkwonkwo gụnyere 'Contemporary African Art', 'Camden Art Centre, London', 'Contemporary Nigerian Prints and Painting' na Mahadum nke Ife's '4th Ife Festival of the Arts Gallery' na 1971
N'afọ 1973, o mepụtara ihe ngosi nke ihe mkpuchi ivory nke Benin dị ka ihe nnọchianya gọọmentị maka FESTAC 77
E nyekwara ya ọrụ imepụta ihe ịchọ mma ọla nchara na frieze na ọnụ ụzọ nke National Arts Theatre na 1974
N'ịkota onyinye ya, Shehu Shagari nyere ya onye isi nke Order of the Niger n'afọ 1980
Nwa ya nwoke bu Isaac Emokpae bụkwa onye ama ama na-ete ihe agba na onye na-ese ihe
Eric Adjetey Anang (pronunciation ; amụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye Ghana na-akpụ ihe na onye ọkwá nkà
A mụrụ ya na Teshie, Ghana ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Kane Kwei Carpentry Workshop
Ọ na-enwe ebe obibi abụọ ugbu a ma kewaa oge ya n'etiti Ghana na Madison, Wisconsin, ebe ọ na-achụso ọrụ pụrụ iche
N'afọ 2001, o webatara igbe ozu Ghana na Gidan Makama Museum Kano, Nigeria, n'okpuru nkwado nke Alliance française na Kano
Ọ gụsịrị agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Accra Academy

Adjetey Anang kọwara n'ajụjụ ọnụ na echiche igbe ozu efu malitere mgbe nna nna ya na-ewu palanquin maka onye isi obodo, mana onye isi ahụ nwụrụ tupu ya enwee ike ịnya ya ma ezinụlọ ahụ kpebiri na a ga-eli ya n'ime ya
N'afọ 2005, ọ weghaara njikwa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nke Seth Kane Kwei guzobere, n'ihi ọchịchọ 'ibuli aha nna nna ya ma hụ ụwa'
N'ime obere oge, Adjetey Anang ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a na Ghana na onye na-eme igbe ozu a ma ama na mba ụwa
Na Jenụwarị 2010, Adjetey Anang sonyere na ọrụ foto a kpọrọ Please, do not move! ya na onye French na-ese foto bụ Guy Hersant
Na ngwụcha otu afọ ahụ, a kpọrọ ya na Black World Festival na Dakar dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị na-emepụta ihe si Ghana
N'afọ 2009, Adjetey Anang haziri maka Oregon College of Art & Craft's Senior Lecturer Michael de Forest ịbịa Ghana maka ebe obibi onye na-ese ihe ọnwa abụọ

Na 2019 Furniture Society Conference nke emere na Milwaukee Institute of Art and Design, Adjetey Anang na Michael de Forest bụ ndị na-ekwu okwu ogbako ma nye ihe ngosi akpọrọ 'Research as Adventure Scratching the Itch of Curiosity Until It Smacks You in the Face'
Adjetey Anang nyekwara ihe ngosi ime igbe ozu na-egosi usoro nke iji ngwá ọrụ aka mee ihe ọkpụkpụ osisi nwere oghere, gbagọrọ agbagọ
Adjetey Anang esonyewo na ọtụtụ ebe obibi ndị na-ese ihe na ọmụmụ ihe n'ụwa niile
N'afọ 2014, ọ bụ onye bi na Windgate ITE International Residency na Center for Art in Wood na Philadelphia, PA
Ọ bụ 2019-2020 Thurber Park Artist-in-Resident, tinyere ọnụ site na Madison Arts Commission na Bubbler na Madison Public Library na Madison, Wisconsin
O mere ihe ngosi naanị ya na Mahadum nke Arkansas Little Rock Windgate Center for Art + Design na 2020 nke akpọrọ Celebrating Death Fantasy Coffins of Ghana nke Eric Adjetey Anang dere
Ihe ngosi a gosipụtara igbe ozu Adjetey Anang sitere na nnukwu ose na-ekpo ọkụ ma ọ bụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ nwere nku

Eric Adjetey Anang na-etinyekwa aka na nyocha anthropological metụtara ndị Ga na Roberta Bonetti, onye prọfesọ mmekọ na History of Anthropology na Mahadum Bologna na Onye Mmekọ na Italian Academy for Advanced Studies, Mahadum Columbia
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na anọ, akwụkwọ akụkọ French Le Monde diplomatique nabatara Eric Adjetey Anang dị ka 'ihe nlereanya maka ndị ntorobịa obodo Afrịka'
N'afọ 2009, e gosipụtara Adjetey Anang na mgbasa ozi telivishọn maka ihe ọṅụṅụ ike Aquarius, onye chọrọ ịkọ akụkọ banyere ndị dị adị na ndị dị egwu
Azụmahịa ahụ kọrọ akụkọ banyere Adjetey Anang na igbe ozu na-azụ ahịa, ma gụnye ihe karịrị ndị otu obodo 300 n'otu obodo azụ a na-akpọ Teshie, na Accra, Ghana

WPT / Wisconsin Life gosipụtara akụkụ na 2018 nke a na-akpọ Coffin Life banyere Adjetey Anang na ọrụ ya, nke meriri Emmy maka Nrụpụta Pụrụ Iche maka Mmemme Magazin - Nkebi na Chicago / Midwest Isi nke National Academy of Television Arts & Sciences
Eric Enomamien Aghimien bụ onye nduzi Naijiria, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye na-ede ihe nkiri na onye nchịkọta akụkọ
A mụrụ Eric Aghimien na Benin City, Edo State ma bụrụ nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ asaa
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, ọ malitere ise ihe na-atọ ọchị ma na-ere otu ihe ahụ nye ụmụ akwụkwọ ibe ya
Ọ gara Immaculate Conception College, Benin City na Auchi Polytechnic, Edo State, Nigeria
Eric nwere onyinye nka nke gụnyere; ịbụ abụ, ịkpụzi na ise ihe
Ihe ntụrụndụ ya kachasị ukwuu kemgbe ọ bụ nwata bụ; ikiri ihe nkiri ma e wezụga igwu mmiri na bọọlụ
O nwetara National Diploma na Science Laboratory Technology n'afọ 2005
Mgbe ọ na-enweta diplọma ya, ọ bụ onye otu egwu a na-akpọ Da TED
Mgbe National Diploma ya gasịrị, Eric kpebiri ịchụso ọrụ na ntụrụndụ
N'afọ 2006, Aghimien si Benin kwaga Lagos wee kpebie ịchụso ọrụ ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na 2007 na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ kọmputa ebe ọ mụtara otu esi eji kọmputa, imepụta ihe osise na nhazi vidiyo
Eric chọrọ ịmụ ime ihe nkiri na mba ofesi mana enweghị ike ịnakọta ego zuru ezu iji wee zụọ onwe ya
Ọ gara n'ihu na mmụta ya site n'inye nkuzi n'ịntanetị
Eric guzobere Hills Pictures Movie Academy na 2008 nke na-enyere ndị na-abịa aka ịchọpụta, zụlite ma gosipụta nkà ha
N'afọ 2011, o mere ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke akpọrọ Heckto nke a họpụtara maka Best Use of Special Effects na Best Actor na 2012 International Short Film Festival
Aghimien mekwara ihe nkiri mbụ ya A Mile from Home, ihe nkiri ihe nkiri, nke nwetara nyocha dị mma
Eric Garris bụ onye (amụrụ na Disemba 24, 1953) ọ bụ kwa onye na-eme ihe ike na nnwere onwe na United States, na-alaghachi na Agha Vietnam
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi weebụ nke Antiwarcom nke a malitere na 1995
A mụrụ Garris na Paris, France ma zụlite ya na Southern California site na afọ abụọ
Ọ malitere itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ dị obere, na-ahazi nzukọ na ikesa akwụkwọ nta na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Los Angeles ma na-eguzogide agha Vietnam na draft

Dị ka nwa red diaper, Garris gara ngagharị iwe na ngagharị iwe maka ikike obodo mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, a chụpụrụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị maka ịkpali ọgba aghara mgbe ọ dị shekara iri na isii, ọ ghọkwara onye na-eguzogide agha Vietnam n'oge ọ bụ okenye
O weere onwe ya dị ka onye aka ekpe n'ihe ka ukwuu n'afọ ndị mbụ ya, mana ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ gbanwere mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri abụọ

Mgbe ọ bi na Venice, California n'afọ ndị 1960, Garris malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na Peace and Freedom Party, na-eje ozi dị ka National Committeeman na osote onyeisi oche tupu o guzobe otu nnwere onwe n'ime pati ahụ na afọ 1973
N'afọ 1975, ọ hapụrụ Peace and Freedom Party iji rụọ ọrụ na Libertarian Party, n'ikpeazụ ya na Justin Raimondo guzobere Libertarian Radical Caucus
N'afọ 1980, Garris na Raimondo hapụrụ Libertarian Party iji sonye na Republican Party
Ha guzobere Kọmitii Na-ahazi Kọmitii Libertarian Republican (LROC) ma kwado Pat Buchanan na 1992 ọ na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala
Na mkpụrụ ụbọchị ise na onwa Nọvemba, 2018, Garris lụrụ Susana Simon Pio si São Paulo, Brazil
Garris kwuru na nguzo ya na-emegide agha dị ka otu ihe na-adịgide adịgide n'oge ọganihu nke echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya ma kwuo na ịbụ onye na-emegid agha dugara ya na nnwere onwe
Echiche ya na agha bụ onye kachasị mebie ikike mmadụ na ihe onwunwe gosipụtara na ọrụ Antiwarcom iji duzie ihe na-adịghị etinye aka na United States na mba ofesi
Dị ka onye na-akwado ikike nwoke na nwanyị, Garris na-arụsi ọrụ ike na imegide ma merie 1978 Briggs Initiative, nke onye omeiwu steeti John V
Briggs, (R-Fullerton) dere
Onye ụkọchukwu Universal Free Libertarian Church, Garris mere ndokwa ka ọ rụrịta ụka Senator Briggs na Mahadum California State, Fullerton (CSUF) na Ọktoba 26, 1978
Awa ole na ole tupu arụmụka ahụ, nke Society for Libertarian Life kwadoro, Briggs apụtaghị ma dochie Prọfesọ
George Kent Onye enyemaka Brigg, Don Sizemore, mechara kwuo na onye omeiwu ahụ nwetara ọtụtụ egwu ọnwụ tupu arụmụka ahụ
Garris bụ otu n'ime ndị gbara akwụkwọ anọ tinyere akwụkwọ mmebi nkwekọrịta megide Briggs, nke onye ọka iwu Newport Beach bụ David Bergland gbara akwụkwọ
N'afọ 2000, Garris kọwara akụkọ ihe mere eme ya na Libertarian Party (LP) dị ka ndị a
N'afọ 1973, sonyeere m na Libertarian Party
E jere m ozi dị ka onye otu Kọmitii Mba, onye nduzi steeti California, na onye na-azọ ọkwa na onye njikwa mkpọsa ọtụtụ ugboro
Abụ m onye otu LP, mana anaghịzi edebanye aha m na LP
Ana m ewere onwe m dị ka onye nnwere onwe nwere nkwenkwe siri ike ma, dị ka Webmaster nke Antiwarcom na LewRockwellcom, na-ewere onwe m dị hi onye na-eme ihe na nnwere onwe
Ana m agụ ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ LP, enwere ọtụtụ ndị enyi na ndị mmekọ na LP, ọbụnakwa na-atụ vootu Libertarian
Ana m adenye aha na ndepụta mkparịta ụka email dị n'ime LP

Mgbe Murray Rothbard na ndị na-akwado ya malitere iche na Libertarian Party, site na uwe ndị dị ka Cato Institute, na-aghọ ihe na-atọ ụtọ na Republican Party na ụkpụrụ ya, ha guzobere 'Libertarian Radical Caucus' nke Garris na onye ya na ya na-arụkọ ọrụ Justin Raimondo duziri
Mgbe nnukwu nkewa nke Libertarian Party nke afọ 1983, ha malitere usoro ịbanye na Republican Party, na n'ime afọ ndị 1990 ha ghọrọ ndị nkwado siri ike nke Pat Buchanan
Eric Garris gbara ọsọ maka ọkwa ọchịchị na afọ 1972 mgbe ọ gbara ọsọ dị ka onye Peace and Freedom Party maka Nzukọ Steeti California na mpaghara 61
O nwetara vootu 3,488 maka 38% nke vootu
Garris gbara ọsọ maka ọkwa nke ugboro abụọ na 1974

N'ịgba ọsọ dị ka onye Peace and Freedom Party na 22 State Senate district, Garris nwetara 4,316 vootu maka 23% N'afọ 1980, Garris gbara ọsọ dị ka nnwere onwe maka oche Senate nke 5 nke California State
N'asọmpi ụzọ abụọ, Garris nwetara vootu 21,162 maka 146% nke vootu
N'afọ 1983, Garris gbara ọsọ dị ka onye nnwere onwe na ntuli aka pụrụ iche maka mpaghara nke ise nke California
O nwetara vootu 408 maka 05% nke ngụkọta vootu
N'afọ 1990, Garris gbara ọsọ dị ka onye Republican maka Nzukọ nke Steeti California na mpaghara nke 21
O nwetara vootu 25,695 maka 291% nke vootu n'ụzọ abụọ agbụrụ
Na mbido, Garris hụrụ ikike ịntanetị nwere iji kwalite nkwenkwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya
N'afọ 1995, o guzobere Antiwarcom na nzaghachi maka ntinye aka nke gọọmentị Clinton na agha obodo Bosnia

Tọrọ ntọala na echiche Randolph Bourne na 'Agha bụ Ahụike nke Steeti,' Antiwarcom na-agbakọta njikọ akụkọ gbasara iwu mba ọzọ site n'echiche dịgasị iche iche iji mee ka ndị America na ụwa mara banyere atụmatụ mba ofesi nke gọọmentị America ma bụrụ ngwá ọrụ nyocha maka ndị ọkachamara ụmụ amaala
Site na 1999 ruo 2012, Garris bụ webmaster maka LewRockwellcom, webmagazine nke onye na-akọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Lew Rockwell
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka webụ maka Ballot Access News, ebe nrụọrụ weebụ akụkọ nke onye na-eme ihe ike Richard Winger bipụtara nke na-eme ka a mara banyere iwu ndị na-egbochi ịtụ vootu
Eric Hudson (amụrụ n'October 15, 1986) bụ ónyé America na onye na-emepụta egwu na-enweta onyinye Grammy
Nne na nna ya bụ Curtis na Phyllis Bivins-Hudson
Curtis bụ ónyé na-ede egwu na ónyé na-emepụta egwu, na nke kachasị pụta ìhè bụ ónyé na'ede egwu Madonna 'Holiday', nke ya na ónyé na'agụ egwu / onye na-agụ egwu Lisa Stevens dere
Hudson gàrà Columbia High School na Maplewood, New Jersey, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2004
Ọ bụ ónyé na-egwu ọtụtụ ngwá egwu (gụnyere piano, drum, bass, guitar, na organ), ma nụchaa ọtụtụ n'ime mmepe egwu mbụ ya na-akpọ na ụka ma na-eduzi otu egwu jazz nke ya a na-akpọ Jazz Funk Project
Hudson egwuriwo egwu na Carnegie Hall, ma rụọ ọrụ na Apollo Theater na Harlem màkà 2002 Democratic National Convention [nkọwa dị mkpa]
Mmalite mbụ ya n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere site n'ịrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ ndị na-emepụta hip hop Buckwild na DJ Kay Gee site na Naughty by Nature
Hudson bụ ónyé na-eji ngwá ọrụ eme ihe na abọm abụọ, The Game's The Documentary na 50 Cent's The Massacre, nké nyeere aka iwere ọrụ ya gaa na ọkwa ọzọ
N'oge na-adịghị ányá, o mepụtara egwu 'Entourage' nke Omarion
Eric Kotut bụ onye ọchụnta ego Kenya bụ onye Gọvanọ nke anọ nke Central Bank na-arụ ọrụ site na 1988 ruo 1993
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ n'ihi mmekọrịta nna ya na onye isi ala Kenya n'oge ahụ bụ Daniel arap Moi, ka ha gara otu ụka
Ọ na-elekọta Goldenberg scandal nke na-efu Kenya ihe karịrị 10% nke GDP ya kwa afọ
Àtụ Governors of the Central Bank of Kenya
Eric Miller (amụrụ n'afọ 1955) bụ onye na-ese foto nke bi na South Africa
A mụrụ Miller na Cape Town mana ọ nọrọ na Johannesburg ógè ọ bụ nwata

Ógè ọ gụsịrị nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ ma rụọ ọrụ n'ụwa ụlọ ọrụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ikpe na-ezighị ezi nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ kpaliri Miller iji ihe ntụrụndụ ya, foto, dee mmegide megide ịkpa ókè nwoke site n'ịghọ onye na-ese foto oge niile
Miller bịdọrọ ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya na otu a na-akpọ Afrapix, nke jiri foto dee eziokwu nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na nguzogide ọchịchị n'oge afọ 1980
Miller bu ụzọ nweta nlebara anya nke ọrụ waya mba ụwa site na foto nke onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ime ala na onye mmekọ ya n'otu ọnụ ụlọ nke ụlọ ndị na-arụ n'ime ebe obibi

Foto ahụ bara uru karịsịa ka ndị otu ahụ na-alụ ọgụ maka ụlọ ezinụlọ banyere ndị ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe n'ime ala, karịa ụlọ obibi nwoke na nwanyị nke manyere ndị ọrụ ịhapụ ezinụlọ ha iji nweta ihe ha ga-eri

N'oge na-adịghị anya ógè nke ahụ gasịrị, e were Miller n'ọrụ banyere idu ndú mba ụwa izizi ya, na-ese foto nke ọgbaghara nke afọ 1987 nke ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe dịka mmadụ gáfèrè narị puku atọ nà South Africa hapụrụ ọrụ ahụ
ka ọtụtụ n'ọrụ Miller na mmalite ọrụ ya bụ akwụkwọ nke ọgbaghara, ngagharị iwe na olili ozu nke bụ ngosipụta nke mmegide ndị mmadụ na ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma nye aka na ọdịda ya
[citation needed] Ruo afọ atọ site n'afọ 1988, Miller rụrụ ọrụ na Reuters

N'oge mbido afọ 1990, ka ụwa hụrụ ọdịda nke ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, isiokwu nke ọrụ Miller gbanwere site na ngagharị iwe na olili ozu gaa na mkparịta ụka nke ga-emecha duga na South Africa nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Ozugbo mgbanwe gaa na ọchịchị na-esote ịkpa ókè agbụrụ bịdọrọ, ihe na-elekwasị anya na foto ya na ndị ọzọ bụ na nsogbu mgbanwe dịka ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ na ọrụ

Mgbe Nelson Mandela pụtara n'ụlọ mkpọrọ n'afọ 1990 n'ọnwa Febụwarị, Miller nweta ohere ịga mba Afrịka n'ofe Afrịka ndị e mechiburu ndị ji paspọtụ South AfricaEbe mbụ Miller gara mgbe a tọhapụrụ Mandela bụ South Sudan, iji detuo ụnwụ nke mere ebe ahụ na 1990s

Ọ gbasoro ọrụ foto na mbà ụwa ihe dịka irí abụọ na asaa dị iche iche gụnyere Botswana, Cuba, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Liberia, Namibia, Nigeria, Sierra Leone, Eritrea, Rwanda, Senegal, Sudan, Uganda, Vietnam and Zimbabwe[Tinye edensibịa]

Ọ bụ ezie na Miller nọrọ ụfọdụ oge na mgbalị na-edekọ ntuli aka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya izizi nke South Africa n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1994, o nwekwara ike ịga Rwanda iji dekọọ ụbọchị irí ikpeazụ nke mgbukpọ agbụrụ ahụ n'ebe ahụ
Ógè ahụ, o dekọrọ ọnọdụ nke (karịsịa ndị Tutsi) ndị arụrụala ahụ metụtara ndị gbagara n'ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na Tanzania

Ọrụ ya na-egosipụta ọ bụghị naanị ọgba aghara na ime ihe ike nke mgbukpọ agbụrụ na Rwanda kpatara, kamakwa mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide banyere ndị a manyere ịgba ọsọ, na nsogbu ndị mba ndị agbata obi ha gbara ọsọ chere ihu

Nchịkọta foto Miller sitere na Rwanda bụ nke e ji mee ihe n'oge na-adịbeghị anya [mgbe?] na ọrụ nke o gosipụtara na Mahadum Cape Town n'oge nnọkọ nnọkọ maka mgbanwe agbụrụ na ime ike na South Africa na Rwanda
N'oge ọtụtụ nleta Miller gara Uganda, o lekwasịrị anya na mmetụta ọjọọ nke agha Joseph Kony na Lord's Resistance Army (LRA) na mpaghara ọ bụla nke ndị bi na ya
O dere okwu màkà ụmụaka ndị agha, ma jiri oge mara ndị na-eto eto gbapụrụ na LRA ógè a manyere ha, dị ka ụmụaka, ịghọ ndị agha ya
Miller bụ onye otu Panos Pictures ugbu a
E bipụtara foto Miller n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ e bipụtara gburugburu ụwa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Associated Press maka otu afọ na Reuters n'ihi afọ atọ
Ọ rụchara ọrụ maka The New York Times na Time, Los Angeles Times, Boston Globe, na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ mpaghara Washington DC
[citation needed]
Miller etinyela aka n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi foto
E gosipụtara foto ya na Then and Now, ihe ngosi nke gara Cape Town, Durban, Johannesburg, Melbourne na Brisbane, ma nọrọ na Mahadum Duke
Ọrụ ahụ, nke onye na-ese foto South Africa Paul Weinberg haziri n'afọ 2008, gosipụtara ọrụ nke ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe Afrapix ma gosipụta ọrụ ha n'okpuru ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ọrụ emere ógè ịkpa ókè
Miller nyere aka na ngosi 'The Nevergiveups'

Ọrụ ahụ na-akọwa ike nke ndị nne ochie nọ n'obodo Khayelitsha bụ ndị nsonaazụ nke ọrịa HIV / AIDS manyere ịghọ ndị nlekọta isi na mberede banyere ịzụlite ụmụ ụmụ ha na-enweghị nne na nna site na HIV / AIDS
E gosipụtara ihe ngosi ahụ na Katzen Arts Center, Mahadum America na Washington DC
na Mahadum Old Dominion na Virginia na ngwụcha afọ 2013

Miller arụwo ọrụ maka ọtụtụ òtù gụnyere United Nations, World Bank, Amnesty International na Red Cross; na World Economic Forum, World Health Organization, ngalaba ahụike mpaghara na South African na International NGOs
E kesara vidiyo nkuzi ya banyere HIV / AIDS maka ikiri ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị na Western Cape
Eric National Mack (amụrụ n'afọ 1987) bụ onye America na-ese ihe, onye na-ese ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi, na ónyé na-akpụ ihe, nké bi na New York City
A mụrụ Mack na Columbia, MD
Aha etiti ya bụ National, Mgbè National Gallery of Artī nke Washington DC gasịrị ebe nne na nna ya zutere
Mgbè ọ dị obérè, Mack rụrụ ọrụ màkà nnà ya na ụlọ ahịa uwe ya na-ere ahịa na-arụkọ ọrụ na ụdị ejiji na akwa dị iche iche
Ihe mkpuchi akwa Mack na-agụnyekarị ihe dịgasị iche iche dị ka blanket na-agagharị agagharị, bandanas, na akwa ndị ọzọ a chọtara ma ọ bụ nke sitere na mpaghara
Na Jenụwarị 2019, Mack meghere na ngosi onwé ya na Brooklyn Museum nke akpọrọ Lemme na-agafe n'ime ụlọ ahụ
Na-emeghe na Mee 2019, Mack ga-egosi na 2019 Whitney Biennial, nkè Rujeko Hockley na Jane Panetta haziri
Eric Santos (a mụrụ na 31 Jenụwarị 1972), bụ onye Angola-Portuguese na-eme ihe nkiri na onye edemede
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Scoundrel, The Compass, Jikulumessu na Kaminey
Santos malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1996 na usoro telivishọn Praça da Alegria
Kemgbe ahụ, o sonyere n'egwuregwu, ihe nkiri, usoro, ihe nkiri ncha na Angola na Portuguese
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke 'Cast 39', ụlọ ọrụ Talent nke dị na Portugal

Erica Joy Baker (amụrụ n'afo 1980) bụ onye injinia na mpaghara San Francisco Bay, Onye isi teknụzụ maka Kọmitii Mgbasa Ozi Democratic Congress, ma mara maka nkwado nkwuwa okwu ya nke iche iche na nsonye
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere GitHub, Google, Slack, Patreon, na Microsoft
Ọ nwetara aha ya na 2015 maka ịmalite akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi dị n'ime ebe ndị ọrụ Google kọrọ data ụgwọ ọnwa ha iji ghọta nke ọma ọdịiche ụgwọ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Kara Swisher nke Recode kpọrọ Baker 'nwanyị ga-ekiri' na profaịlụ na C Magazine
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Baker weere klas mmemme ihe mgbako, na-amụta ka esi eme mmemme na BASIC na Texas Instruments akara mgbako eserese
Ọ mụtakwara ka esi ede koodu webụsaịtị, na-akwado nke ọhụrụ ya na GeoCities
Baker gara na Mahadum Miami wee gụchaa sayensị Kọmputa
Ọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi ojii abụọ nọ na otu n'ime klaasị ya, wee kpebie ịkwaga na Mahadum Alaska na-enweta Associate of apply Science degree in Information Technology
Ọrụ mbụ Baker bụ dịka onye nchịkwa ngalaba Windows maka Mahadum Alaska usoro steeti niile mgbe ọ dị afọ 21
Ọ kwagara n'ụlọ Depot otu afọ, na-arụ ọrụ netwọk na nkwado desktọpụ mkpanaka
Baker rụrụ ọrụ na Google site na afọ 2006 ruo afọ 2015, n'ọrụ dị iche iche, na-ejedebe na ọrụ nke Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
Na Julaị 2015, mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Google maka Slack, Baker kpughere n'ụdị tweet na ya amalitela mpempe akwụkwọ n'ime Google maka ndị ọrụ iji kpughee ozi ụgwọ ọnwa ha
Dabere na mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ, ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ibe ya nwere ike ịkparịta ụka n'ịkwalite ụgwọ ọrụ
Baker kọrọ na ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ibe ya zigara ndị ọgbọ ya ego maka ịmalite akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, mana ndị njikwa anabataghị ego ndị ọgbọ ya
Mpempe akwụkwọ a kpalitere mkparịta ụka na ndịiche n'ụgwọ ọrụ Google, enweghị nghọta na mkpebi ịkwụ ụgwọ, yana ndịiche okike na agbụrụ nwere ike ịkwụ
A nọgidere na-emelite akwụkwọ mpịakọta ahụ ruo afọ 2017, mgbe a na-akọ data emelitere site na akwụkwọ akụkọ na New York Times
Site na Mee 2015 ruo Julaị 2017, Baker rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nrụpụta na ntọhapụ na Slack
Na Febụwarị 2016, Baker, Megan Anctil, Kiné Camara, na Duretti Hirpa nabatara onyinye TechCrunch 's Crunchies n'aha Slack for Fastest Rising Startup

Na June 2017, TechCrunch, na USA Today kọrọ na Baker na-ahapụ Slack ka ọ sonyere Kickstarter dị ka onye nduzi nke injinịa, na-akọ na Lara Hogan, onye VP nke Engineering a họpụtara ọhụrụ, na-arụ ọrụ na Brooklyn
Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ya agụnyeghị ụdịrị dị iche iche na nsonye n'ihu ọha, Baker kwuru na ịkwalite ụdị dị iche iche na nsonye ga-abụ akụkụ nke ọrụ ya
Agbanyeghị, ọ mechara nọrọ na mpaghara San Francisco Bay wee bụrụ onye isi njikwa injinia na Patreon
Na Jenụwarị 2019, Baker sonyeere Microsoft ka onye isi njikwa injinia otu
Na Maachị 2021, Baker sonyeere DCCC ka onye isi teknụzụ
Mgbe emechara akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na data ụgwọ ọnwa Google wee hapụ Google, Baker abụrụla onye na-akwado ụdị dị iche iche na nsonye na blọọgụ ya na n'ihu ọha ndị ọzọ
Ọ nọ n'azụ #RealDiversityNumbers, otu Twitter iji nweta ọnụọgụ maka ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche gburugburu njide na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ikpe kwụsịrị n'ụlọ ikpe
Baker na-akatọ okwu Salesforcecom CEO Marc Benioff nke na-atụ aro na ntinye ntinye maka ndị agbụrụ na agbụrụ na-ewere azụ azụ ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwee ike ilekwasị anya n'ihe gbasara nwoke na nwanyị
Ọ kọwapụtara n'ụzọ dị egwu nke teknụzụ teknụzụ mgbe ọ katọrọ tweet Benioff n'oge ngagharị iwe Black Lives Matter, ebe a na-ejide onye isi ojii nke yi akara twitter
tweet ya kwuru, 'Ee nke ahụ bụ akara @Twitter @blackbirds
Ọ dị ịtụnanya ịhụ teknụzụ dịka ụgbọ maka mgbanwe mmekọrịta ọha

Nkwanye ugwu', nke ọ zara, sị, 'Na onye ọ bụla nwere ike ịhụ foto nke onye isi ojii a na-ejide maka ime mkpesa megide ogbugbu nke onye isi ojii ọzọ na-ezighị ezi wee zaa, 'Hey lee anya Twitter logo', ga-abụ ihe na-agwụ ike ma ọ bụrụ na o mere ebe ọ bụla ọzọ
N'ime ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ, ọ dabara maka usoro ahụ'
Ọ katọkwara usoro vidiyo nke Elissa Shevinsky, onye edemede nke Lean Out, na-ekwupụta na ọ na-ekwu naanị banyere nsogbu dị iche iche n'elu
Meredith L
Patterson weghaara okwu Baker ebubo ma bo ya ebubo na ọ nwere esemokwu mmasị
Baker, tinyere Tracy Chou, Freada Kapor Klein na Ellen Pao, bụ otu n'ime ndị ntọala nke Project gụnyere, mmalite mmalite na 2016 iji nye usoro dị iche iche na ntinye aka na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ahịa
Baker gbara ajụjụ ọnụ site na WIRED's Davey Alba na WIRED Business Conference 2016
Na Jenụwarị 2017, Baker bụ onye isi okwu na Women of Color in Computing ogbako nke Mills College nwere
Na Maachị 2018, Baker bụ ọkà okwu pụtara na Mgbakọ Bond
Baker bụkwa onye na-ekwu okwu maka Berkeley Center maka New Media panel na The Wall Street Journal ' s Women in the Workplace Forum na October 2018
Ọ pụtara na Jeopardy dị ka onye ngosi ọbịa na February 2021
Baker nọ na ndị isi oche maka Girl Develop It
Ọ nọkwa na bọọdụ ndụmọdụ nke Hack the Hood ma bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ teknụzụ maka koodu nwa agbọghọ ojii
Baker nọrọ na nwata ya na njem, nke mbụ na Germany, ebe a mụrụ Baker mgbe a na-ebuga ndị mụrụ ya n'ebe ahụ, na New Mexico, Florida, na Alaska
Ndị mụrụ ya abụọ nọ na US Air Force
Baker malitere ide ihe mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Baker lụrụ mgbe ọ nọ na kọleji na Alaska, mana o kwuru na ọ naghị arụ ọrụ
Na 2021, Baker lụrụ di ya nke ka noo ugbu a, American B Astrella
Baker nwere mmasị siri ike na usoro ọmụmụ, ma nọrọ ihe karịrị afọ iri nyocha akụkọ banyere ezinụlọ ya
Olileanya ya bụ otu ụbọchị inye aka mejupụta oghere maka ezinaụlọ America ọ bụla ọzọ kwa
Erica Dawson bụ onye Amerịka na-ede uri na prọfesọ
Ọ bụ onye dere nchịkọta uri atọ
Dawson tolitere na Columbia, Maryland
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nzere BA
na Mahadum Johns Hopkins na nzere Master of Fine Arts na Poetry na Mahadum Ohio State, ọ nwetara PhD
na Mahadum Cincinnati dị ka Elliston Fellow na Poetry

Nchịkọta uri mbụ Dawson, Big-Eyed Afraid (Waywiser Press, 2007), ahọpụtara maka afọ 2006 Anthony Hecht Poetry Prize site na Mary Jo Salter ma kpọọ ya Best Debut nke afọ 2007 site na Contemporary Poetry Review
Nchịkọta nke abụọ ya, The Small Blades Hurt (Measure Press, 2014), meriri afọ 2016 Poets' Prize
Nchịkọta nke atọ, When Rap Spoke Straight to God, bụ nke Tin House Books bipụtara n'afọ 2018
Abụ Dawson apụtala n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ, gụnyere Barrow Street, Blackbird, na The Best American Poetry nke afọ 2008, 2012, na 2015
A maara Dawson maka ojiji ọhụrụ nke ụdị ọdịnala
N'afọ 2010, a sịrị na o nwetara 'ihe dị ka ọkwa kpakpando rok' n'etiti ndị na-ede uri New Formalist
Ọ bi na Tampa, Florida, ebe ọ na-eduzi Mahadum nke Tampa's Low-Residency MFA na Creative Writing ma na-eje ozi dị ka onye nchịkọta uri nke Tampa Review
Erica Ngozi Nlewedim a makwaara dị ka Star Girl bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya na Naijiria
Nlewedim bụ naanị nwa amụrụ na Ora Lagos na 13 Maachị 1994 wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ primary na ụlọ akwụkwọ secondary na Lagos
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta na azụmaahịa site na Covenant University wee mụọ ime ihe nkiri na Met Film School na London
Ọ gbara n'asọmpi ọmarịcha Nwaanyị nọ na Naịjirịa ebe o meriri nturu ugo maka ịbụ onye kacha adi photogenic
Esepụrụ ya na Big Brother Nigeria reality show n'ihi na ọ nwetara mgbọ 3 nke na-ewepụ onye sonyere na ihe nkiri a
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na -eme ihe nkiri tupu ọ gaa Big Brother Nigeria ma mee ihe nkiri na fim dị ka Devil In Agbada na Bitter Rain mgbe ihe nkiri a gasịrị
O nwekwara ihe ngosi nke akpọrọ Inside Life nke na-egosi na MTV Base
Ọ pụtara na mkpuchi nke Thisday Style dị ka 'onye na -eme ihe nkiri nke ọgbọ ọhụrụ' ya na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Bimbo Ademoye na Nancy Isime
Erick Sermon (amụrụ na Nọvemba 25, 1968) bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ n'akụkụ PMD & DJ Scratchī nke 1980s/1990s hip hop otu EPMD na màkà ọrụ mmepụta ya
Sermon malitere ọrụ ọkachamara na 1986 dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe na ónyé na-ese ihe nke otu hip hop EPMD
Ọ malitere idekọ abọm solo màkà Def Jam na 1993; na 1997, ọ laghachiri EPMD
N'afọ sochirinụ, Sermon, Murray na Redman dekọrọ otu mkpuchi nke 'Rapper's Delight' nke Sugarhill Gang
EPMD gbasara nke ugboro abụọ na 1999
Na Septemba 25, 2001, Sermon merụrụ ahụ mgbè o si na okpukpu nke atọ nke ụlọ obibi daa
Ndị uwe ojii kwùrù na Sermon nwara igbu onwe ya, mana o mechara gọnahụ ma kwuo na ọ bụ ihe mberede

Erhiga Agarivbie (amụrụ ya 30 Machị 1987), amaara ya site na aha ọgbọ ya bụ Erigga
Ọ bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eti egwu hipụ họpụ
Amụrụ Erhiga Agarivbie na Warri, Delta Steeti, ebe ya na ezinaulo ya toro
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n’ime ụmụ ise
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ 'Standard International' na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị
Erigga malitere ọrụ egwu ya na mbido 2010
Ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-emepụta egwu arụọla ọrụ, nkeg ụnyere PFizzy, Snow Man na Phizy Joe
Mbupute egwu izizi Erigga bụ 'Mo Street Gan'
E mere vidio egwu ahụ na Nea, nke AKIN Alabi duziri
Egwu a ghọrọ abụ isiokwu nke Rdio Continental
Na 2013, Erigga wepụtara 'Coupé Décalé ft Shuun Bebe'
Vidiyo egwu a nwetara kwado TV na Naịjirịa
Na mbido 2014, o weputara egwu ọzọ akpọrọ 'Love No Be Garri', nke gosipụtara Jimoh Waxiu
Na 17 Julaị 2017 Erigga wepụtara abọm ya A Trip to the South nke gụnyere Orezi, Skales, Duncan Mighty na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Na 2018, Erigga weputara egwu ọzọ akpọrọ 'Motivation' nke gosipụtara Victor AD
Egwu a enwetala ihe karịrị otu nde nkiri mmadụ na YouTube

Amụrụ Hassle na Salem Municipality, Stockholm
A zụlitere ya n'obodo Bie dị ke tara Katrineholm, ebe ndị na-eti egwu n'ógbè ahụ gbakọtara n'ụlọ ihe nkiri obodo nne na nna ya
Erik Laubscher (afọ 1927, Tulbagh, South Africa rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 2013) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nà South Africa
A mụrụ Erik Frederik Bester Howard Laubscher na Tulbagh, ọ tolitere na Port Elizabeth
Mgbè o gosipụtara mmasị na nka, ọ malitere ọmụmụ ya na Continental School of Art n'afọ 1946
Laubscher zụrụ n'okpuru Maurice van Essche site n'afọ 1946 na afọ 1947 tupu ọ gaa n'ihu na London na Paris n'okpuru John Minton, Claude Venard na Fernand Léger
E nyere ya Carnegie Study Grant na US n'afọ 1966
Na South Africa, e nyere ya Cape Arts Medal n'afọ 1972, SA
Akademie vir Wetenskap en Kuns - Besondere Erepenning vir Skilderkuns n'afọ 1990, na The Cape Tercentenary Foundation Award màkà onyinye pụtara ìhè na nka ányá n'afọ 1994
O guzobere Ruth Prowse School of Art na 1970 wee laa ezumike nká dị ka onye isi ya na ngwụcha afọ 1995
Ọ lụrụ onye na-ese ihe Claude Bouscharain onye ọ zutere na Académie Montmartre na 1950
N'afọ 2012 ọ natara ihe nrite Molteno màkà ihe ọ rụzuru na Fine Arts
Erika Ranee Cosby (amụrụ n'April 8, 1965) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke ónyé ọrụ ebere Camille Cosby na ónyé na-eme ihe ọchị Bill Cosby
A mụrụ Erika Ranee Cosby na Eprel 8, 1965 na Los Angeles, California, nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ ise Camille Olivia (née Hanks) na William Henry Cosby, Jr
Aha ụmụnne ise niile malitere na E, maka 'ịdị mma'
Erika nwèrè ụmụnne abụọ dị ndụ ụmụnne nwanyị Erinn (amụrụ 1966) na Evin (amụrụ 1976)
E gburu nwanne ya nwoke, Ennis Cosby (amụrụ na 1969), na 1997
Nwanne ya nwanyị nkè obérè, Ensa Cosby (amụrụ na 1973), nwụrụ n'ọrịa akụrụ na 2018
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Cosby gàrà Mahadum Wesleyan, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Arts na 1987
Mgbe Wesleyan gasịrị, ọ gàrà School of Visual Arts na New York City, nweta Bachelor of Fine Arts na 1989
Ọ gara Mahadum California, Berkeley ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1991 na Masters of Fine Arts
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị MFA ya, Cosby gara Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture na Maine màkà izu itoolu nke ógè okpomọkụ
David Driskell dere na ihe osise Cosby 'na-elekwasị ányà na nghọta onyinyo, ọkachasị echiche mgbasa ozi na-agbanwe àgwà ndị mmadụ site na nnọchite ányá ọjọọ
Site n'iji satire, ihe atụ, na ihe atụ, ọrụ ya na-enyocha ebumnuche na mmetụta nke ihe oyiyi ndị a gbagọrọ agbagọ na omenala ndị Africa America
' Ọ na-elekwasị ányá na ihe ndị a na-adịghị ahụkebe
Cosby bụ ónyé na-enyere ụlọ akwụkwọ ógè okpomọkụ aka màkà A Long Walk Home, mmemme mmata banyere mwakpo mmekọahụ na Chicago, Illinois
Eriq Ebouaney (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1967) bụ onye France na-eme ihe nkiri

A maara ya nke ọma maka ngosipụta ya dịka Praịm Minista Congo Patrice Lumumba na ihe nkiri Lumumba nke afọ 2000, dịka 'Blacktie' na Brian De Palma's Femme Fatale na dịka 'Ice' na ihe nkiri Transporter 3 nke afọ 2008 nke ọ pụtara n'ihu Jason Statham
A mụrụ Ebouaney na Angers, France, nwa nke ndị Cameroon kwagara mba ọzọ
Dịka nwatakịrị, o gosighị mmasị n'ime ihe nkiri ma kpebie ịghọ onye ọchụnta ego
Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọ dị afọ 30, ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri ma hapụ ọrụ ya dịka onye njikwa ahịa iji ghọọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
O mere ihe nkiri izizi ya n'afọ 1996 na ihe nkiri Cédric Klapisch duziri Chacun cherche son chat
Ọ nwetara ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri Lumumba nke afọ 2000 nke ọ gosipụtara Praịm Minista Patrice Lumumba
E sere ihe nkiri ahụ na Beira, Mozambique
N'afọ 2002, ọ pụtara na Brian De Palma's Femme Fatale ya na Antonio Banderas
N'afọ 2004, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka Jean Claude na ihe ngosi izizi nke Mark Bamford bụ Cape of Good Hope
N'afọ 2005, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Ridley Scott, Kingdom of Heaven, nke ya na Michael Sheen, Liam Neeson, Orlando Bloom, David Thewlis, Martin Hancock na Nathalie Cox
N'afọ 2006, ọ pụtara na The Front Line na La piste

N'afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri Australia a ma ama bụ Disgrace nke gosipụtara onye America na-eme ihe nkiri John Malkovich, obere ọrụ na ihe nkiri Ịtali Bianco e nero ma mesịa bụrụ 'Ice' na Transporter 3, nke gosipụtara ihe nkiri Britain bụ Jason Statham
