Eritrean Investment and Development Bank (EIDB) bụ ụlọ akụ dị na Eritrea
E guzobere ya na 28 Ọktoba 1996
Ọ malitere ọrụ nke ọma ruo 1998 site na otu ọfịs ya na Asmara, EritreaMinistri ego kwadoro ụlọ akụ ahụ n'ụzọ zuru ezu, yabụ ụlọ ọrụ ego bụ ihe onwunwe nke gọọmentị Eritrea
Ụlọ akụ Eritrean Investment and Development Bank bụ nke kacha nta n'ime ụlọ akụ gọọmentị Eritrea
Ọ na-akwụkarị ụgwọ ọrụ mmepe site n'ịkwanye ego sitere na òtù ndị ọzọ dị iche iche, gụnyere Bank of Eritrea na World Bank
Erlena Chisolm Bland (Jenụwarị 18, 1923 na Febụwarị 16, 2009) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese ọkpụkpụ

A mụrụ ya na Washington, DC, Bland gàrà Dunbar High School ma nweta nzere Bachelor of Fine Arts na Mahadum Howard; ọ nwetara nzèrè masta na sayensị ọbá akwụkwọ na Mahadụ Maryland, College Park Ọ nọrọ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri abụọ dị ka ónyé na-ahụ màkà ọbá akwụkwọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụmụ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ pụrụ iche na Goding Elementary School na Washington
O mepụtara nka n'oge ezumike ya, ma mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ gàrà klas na Maryland Institute College of Art, Corcoran School of Art, na Art League na Alexandria, Virginia tupu ọ nweta ụlọ ọrụ
O gosipụtara n'ógbè Washington DC na ebe ndị ọzọ n'oge ọrụ ya, na-egosi ọrụ ya ma n'onwe ya ma n'ihe ngosi otu
Ya na di ya, Dr
Charles N
Bland, nwèrè ụmụ abụọ, nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị; di na nwunye ahụ chepụtara ma wuo ụlọ nke ha na Kalmia Road na Washington
Bland nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa n'ụlọ ndị agadi na Washington
E liri ya na Fort Lincoln Cemetery mgbè emesịrị ememe olili ozu na Dumbarton Chapel na ogige Mahadum Howard
Ernest Nnaemeka Azudialu Obiejesi (amụrụ ya n'ubochi nke iri na asaa nke Onwa Eprel , na afo1960) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ọrụ ebere na Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye isi oche na onye isi nchịkwa nke Nestoil na onye guzobere ntọala Obijackson

A mụrụ ya na Okija, nke Anambra steeti di na Nigeria, Azudialu Obiejesi buru uzo sonyeere azụmaahịa ezinụlọ nna ya na afo1978 tupu o guzobe ụlọ ọrụ mbụ ya, Obijackson West Africa Limited, nke na-ere ahịa gaa mpaghara West Africa
Ulo oru Nestiol nke Azudialu Obiejesi bụ ụlọ ọrụ di na Nigeria nke Injinia, Ịzụ ahịa, Iwu na inye Ikike na-emezi ụlọ ọrụ ndi na ahu maka mmanụ na gasi
N'afọ 1983, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa mbụ ya bụ Obijackson na ọdịda anyanwụ oke Africa, nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Lagos
N'afọ 1991, Obiejesi webatara Nestoil, ụlọ ọrụ Injinia, Ịzụta, Ịrụ & Nchịkwa maka iwu paịpụ, nrụzi na mmezi ya ihe ndị metụtara ya maka ịdọrọ mmiri, ịgafe osimiri na nchebe osimiri
Neconde, otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ozọ Azudialu Obiejesi nwere, bụ ọkachamara na nyocha na mmepe nke mmanụ na gasi maka mmepụta na ire ngwaahịa si na mmanụ n'ala Naịjirịa
A mụrụ Ernest bediako sampong na June 1956, ọ bụ onye Ghana na-ere ọgwụ na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi nchịkwa nke Ernest Chemist ma nye ya onye nke afọ na onyinye EMY Africa 20200
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Adisadel College na Cape Coast, Ghana
Ọ gara n'ihu na Mahadum nke Ghana Medical School mana o mechara daa gaa Mahadum Kwame Nkrumah nke Sayensị na Teknụzụ, ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Science na Pharmacy
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Ernest Chemist Limited, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọgwụ nke na-ere, na-ekesa ma na-emepụta Ọgwụ
N'afọ 2009, o guzobere NestPharma Company Limited na Freetown, Sierra Leone
Ernest enwetala ihe nrite na mmata na azụmaahịa na ọgwụ
Ernest Levi Tsoloane Cole (21 Maachị 1940 - 19 Febụwarị 1990) bụ onye South Afrịka na-ese foto
Ná mmalite afọ 1960, ọ malitere ọrụ onwe ya maka ndị ahịa dịka Drum magazine, Rand Daily Mail, na Sunday Express
Nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ojii mbụ na-ese foto na South Afrịka
Cole bụ onye isi ojii South Africa, a mụrụ na Eersterust na Pretoria, na 1940
Aha ezinụlọ mbụ ya bụ Kole ma were aha Cole mgbe e mesịrị
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe e debere Iwu Mmụta Bantu na 1953, kama ọ gụchara diplọma ya site na akwụkwọ ozi na Wolsey Hall, Oxford
Ọ malitere ịse foto mgbe ọ dị obere, afọ asatọ, na 1950s, onye ụkọchukwu Roman Katọlik nyere ya igwefoto, nke Cole ji gbasaa pọtụfoliyo ya
Dị ka ya onwe ya si kwuo ya 'Ahapụrụ m ụlọ akwụkwọ na 1957 kama ịga na agụmakwụkwọ 'bantu' maka ịgba ohu nke siri ike karịa na mbụ
N'afọ 1958, o tinyere akwụkwọ maka ọrụ na magazin Drum
Jürgen Schadeberg, onye nchịkọta foto, were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka ya
Cole malitekwara ọmụmụ akwụkwọ ozi na New York Institute of Photography

Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka Drum, Cole malitere iso ndị ọzọ nwere nkà na-eto eto ojiiAfrịka - ndị nta akụkọ, ndị na-ese foto, ndị na-agụ egwú jazz, na ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ - ma bụrụ onye na-eme ihe ike na echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya
N'oge na-adịghị anya, o kpebiri ọrụ nke gụnyere idekọ ihe ọjọọ na mmetụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya kwa ụbọchị nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ Bantu World (nke e mechara kpọwa The World - ugbu a The Sowetan ), ebe ọ gara n'ihu na ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto
N'ịchọ ịhapụ Saụt Afrịka, a kpọghachiri ya dị ka 'Coloured', ọ bụghị 'Black' n'ihi na o nwere ike ịghọgbu ndị ọchịchị
N'ihi ya, o nwere ike ịga New York City na 1966
O were akwụkwọ ọrụ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ya na nzuzo
O gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Magnum Photos na nke a rụpụtara nkwekọrịta mbipụta na ikike mbipụta nke Random House nwere
A machibidoro akwụkwọ ahụ, House of Bondage (1967), na South Afrịka
N'akwụkwọ ahụ, Cole dere, sị 'Narị afọ atọ nke ndị ọcha na South Afrịka etinyewo anyị n'agbụ, napụ anyị ùgwù anyị, napụ anyị ùgwù onwe onye ma gbaa anyị gburugburu na ịkpọasị
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ natara onyinye site na Ford Foundation maka akwụkwọ ọzọ, A study of the Negro family in the rural South and the Negro family in the urban ghetto
Ọ bụ ezie na o were ọtụtụ foto, arụchabeghị ọrụ a ma ọ bụ bipụta akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ
Ka ọ na-erule 2020, a malitela inyocha ma bipụta foto sitere na usoro a
Cole mechara kwaga Sweden, ebe ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri
Ndị ANC jiri foto apartheid o sere mee ihe n'ụzọ dị ukwuu na mbipụta ha dị iche iche
Cole nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa kansa na New York City na 18 Febụwarị 1990 mgbe ọ dị afọ 49

A na-ewere ihe ndị na-adịghị mma Cole dị ka ihe furu efu ruo ogologo oge, mana achọtara nchịkọta nke ihe ọjọọ 60,000 na ụlọ akụ dị na Stockholm ma, n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2018, nye ndị nketa ya bụ ndị hiwere The Ernest Cole Family Trust
A ka nwere foto 504 e nwere na Hasselblad Foundation, na ọnụ ahịa a na-eme atụmatụ karịa otu nde euro, na nwe nke ndị a nọ na esemokwu iwu
Ka ọ na-erule 2020, esemokwu iwu n'etiti ala Cole na Hasselblad Foundation na-aga n'ihu
A malitere onyinye Ernest Cole kwa afọ na 2011 n'okpuru nkwado nke Mahadum C
Cape Town
A na-arụ ọrụ Cole na nchịkọta ọha na eze ndị a
Ernest Crichlow (úbọchị irí nà itoolu n'ọnwa Juun, 1914 rụo ụbọchị irí n'ọnwa Novemba, 2005) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na-eme n'eziokwu
A mụrụ Crichlow na Brooklyn, New York, na 1914 n'aka ndị Barbadian kwagara mba ọzọ
Ọ gụrụ nka na School of Commercial Illustrating and Advertising Art na New York na Mahadum New York
Crichlow malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na ụlọ ọrụ na-akwado site na Works Progress Administration's Federal Art Project
Augusta Savage bụ ónyé nkwado mbụ nke ọrụ ya, dịka ọ dị màkà ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe nkè Harlem Renaissance
Ihe ngosi mbụ ya bụ na 1938 na Harlem Community Center na Harlem, New York
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama, lithograph Lovers III na-egosi nwa agbọghọ ojii na-enye nsogbụ n'ime ụlọ ihi ụra ya site n'aka ónyé otu Ku Klux Klan
E gosipụtara ọrụ Crichlow na 1939 New York World's Fair na n'ọbá akwụkwọ Congress n'afọ sochirinụ
N'ime iri afọ ole na ole sochirinụ, a na-egosi ọrụ ya mgbè niile na ụlọ ngosi nka US karịsịa n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ ọ bụ ezie na o mèrè ihe ngosi abụọ na Mahadum Atlanta na 1940s
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha ọrụ ya, Onye isi ala Carter akwanyere ọrụ ya ùgwù

Ihe osise ya nke 1967 White Fence nke na-egosi nwa agbọghọ ọcha na-ekewapụ site na mgbidi site na ụmụ agbọghọ ojii ise bụ nke a ma ama site na ọrụ ya mgbè e mesịrị yana mural panel irí abụọ na isé na Boys and Girls High School na Brooklyn
A makwaara Crichlow nke ọma dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe osise màkà akwụkwọ ụmụaka na-enye ọrụ nka màkà Two in a Team, Maria, Lift Every Voice na Magic Mirrors
O guzobere Cinque Gallery na 1969 ya na Norman Lewis na Romare Bearden yana ịkụzi nka na Mahadum New York na Art Students League
Ónyé bi na Fort Greene, Brooklyn, Crichlow nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa obi na úbọchị irí n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 2005
E mepụtara ya na Biography Resource Center
[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji]

Ernest (Methuen) Mancoba (ubochí irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 1904 ̊ rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na isé n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2002) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, amụrụ na Transvaal Colony, ónyé nọrọ ọtụtụ ógè ndụ ya na Europe
O yikarịrị ka ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe Black nke ógè a na South Africa, ma gosipụta site na ngwụcha afọ 1920 gaa n'ihu
A mụrụ Ernest Methuen Mancoba na Turffontein, Johannesburg, Transvaal Colony n'ubochí irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọst 1904
A mụrụ nwa nke ónyé na-egwupụta ihe n'ime ala, Mancoba tolitere na Rand ma mesịa zigara ya Grace Dieu dị nso na Pietersburg màkà agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị site n'aka nwanne nna ya, ónyé ụkọchukwu Anglican
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, e were ya n'ọrụ na Grace Dieu dị ka ónyé nkuzi asụsụ na 1924
Mmasị Mancoba nwèrè na nka malitere na 1925 site na mbata nke ónyé nkuzi enyemaka aha ya bụ Ned Paterson na Grace Dieu
Paterson, ónyé gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nka na nso nso a na-akwadebe màkà ozi ahụ, webatara ịkpụ osisi ma nweta ndị na-eso ụzọ n'etiti ndị nọ na Grace Dieu bụ ndị nwere mmasị nka
Na mbido, Mancoba mepụtara arịa ndị a chọrọ mmá na ụlọ ahịa ọkwá nkà ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, na-eji ụdị enyemaka ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
N'afọ 1929, ọ nwalere aka ya n'ihe ọkpụkpụ kwụụrụ onwé ya, ma mepụta ọrụ a na-akpọ African Madonna site na iji ihe nlereanya na nguzo contrapposto
Madonna nke Africa bụ ma eleghị anya ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ógè a nke Black South African mepụtara, ma ugbu a, a na-egosikwa ya na Johannesburg Art Gallery
Ozugbo ọ nọ na Europe, Mancoba gara n'ihu na njem ya na nka; na-eleta ebe ngosi nka na ịga ihe ngosi
Mgbe ọ na-ele ihe osise ndị ọzọ nke Africa na ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie nke Europe, e nyere ya echiche ọhụrụ gụnyere ọrụ nke ya
N'ihe osise ya 'Future Africa', mmadụ abụọ ahụ na-egosi na ha nwere nkụda mmụọ na enweghị olileanya, na anya na-enweghị nkụda obi na isi ha dị ala

Ọ bụ ezie na mmetụta nnọchiteanya na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya abụghị ebumnuche ya bụ isi; Mancoba ghọtara na n'ihi ogologo ọgụ Afrịka na-agba iji wepụ onwé ya na ọchịchị ọdịda anyanwụ, a na-ahụ nka Afrịka na ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie Europe dị ka ihe na-adịghị mmá na ihe na-enye mwute
N'ime mgbalị ịrịgo gafere nghọta ọdịda anyanwụ nke nka Africa, Mancoba gbasoro ihe osise abstraction

Na isi iyi nke Södertälje Konsthall gosipụtara, a na-enye anyị ihe ngosi ihe nketa nke Ernest Mancoba, nke nwere mkparịta ụka n'etiti Joanna Sandell, onye nduzi, Södertälge konsthall na Alicia Knock, ónyé nlekọta Centre Pompidou
Ernest Mancoba na-anọchite anya ihe nketa nke na-achọ nghọta banyere ọnọdụ mmadụ
Ọ na-eme nke a site n'iji mmegharị na ọdịdị na agba, na eserese, ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ
A na-akọwa Mancoba dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na onye na-elekwasị ányà na mmekọrịta miri emi na nyocha nke ijikọ mmadụ ebe a n'ụwa
Mancoba atụghị egwu ịrụrịta ụka banyere mmekọrịta Europe na Africa na ụdị nka ya, ma mepụta ọganihu nke ọgbara ọhụrụ n'ime nka
N'ihe ngosi ahụ, e nwèrè obéré ebe ngosi nka màkà ọrụ Ernest Mancoba site na nchịkọta Danish nke Ernest Mancoba Sonja Ferlov Estate na Denmark yana Museum Jorn Silkeborg

Ernest Willmot Sloper (1871 na úbọchị irí nà abụọ n'ọnwa June 1916) bụ ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg, South Africa na United Kingdom
O chepụtara Bishopskop màkà Michael Furse, bishọp nke Pretoria
O mekwara ụlọ nke ya na Parktown, Endstead
Mgbè a mụrụ ya, aha Sloper bụ Ernest Willmott mana ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Ernest Sloper tupu ọ hapụ Britain gaa South Africa na 1902
A mụrụ ya na Britain ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Queen's College, Taunton, Somerset
Ọ gụrụ ihe osise nwá ógè na Taunton Art School mgbè ọ na-arụ ọrụ màkà ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ aha ya bụ Roberts na Tauntón
N'ihe dị ka n'oge a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Great Western Railway dị ka onye injinia bi na-ahụ màkà alaka ụlọ ọrụ Kingsbridge na Devon
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Devon, ọ zutere GF Bodley, ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Willmott malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'ọfịs London nke ụlọ ọrụ Bodley & Garner
Ya na Garner chepụtara Empire Hotel, Buxton
N'afọ 1902, Sloper kwagara South Africa ebe ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ Herbert Baker na Cape Town
Ka e mesịrị na 1902 Baker na Sloper kwagara Johannesburg
N'afọ 1903, Sloper sonyeere ọrụ Baker & Massey dị ka ónyé mmekọ ma kpọọ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ Baker, Masey & Sloper
Baker ji ònyìnyé Sloper nyéré ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kpọrọ ihe na-ekwu na '[Sloper] gosipụtara nnukwu ònyìnyé n'ịkụziri ndị na-ewu ụlọ na ndị omenkà ụzọ ka mma nke iwu ụlọ na iji ihe ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ
Ịdị mma nke mgbidi e ji nkume koppie wuo bụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ihi nnọgidesi ike ya na agbamume ya nye ndị mason
Sloper lekwasịrị ányá nke ukwuu na ọnọdụ ụlọ ahụ n'ogige ahụ; a na-ahụ nke a nke ọma n'ụlọ Howard Pim Timewell ébé e mepụtara terraces site na iji mgbidi koppie-stone
A kụrụ ala ndị a na osisi ndị a
Joane Pim, nwá nwanyị Howard Pim, ónyé ghọrọ onye a ma ama na-emepụta ubi na Johannesburg, ga-enwe mmetụta site na itolite n'ogige ahụ Sloper mepụtara
Prọfesọ Geoffrey Eastcott Pearse nyèrè Sloper otuto màkà ịmalite agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ na Transvaal
N'afọ 1903, Sloper malitere ịkụzi ihe na School of Mines and Technology na Johannesburg na nhazi ụlọ
Pearse bụ otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ isii mbụ na klas ndị ahụ
Ọrụ ya gụnyere
Ernest C
Withers (Ọgọọst 7, 1922 – Ọctoba 15, 2007) bụ onye Afrịkan-Amerị́kan na-ese foto

O dere ihe karịrị afọ iri isii nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Afrịka na Amerịka na mpaghara ndịda United States, na ihe oyiyi dị egwu nke Montgomery bus boycott, Emmett Till, Memphis sanitation strike, Negro league baseball, na ndị egwu gụnyere ndị metụtara Memphis blues na Memphis soul

N'afọ 2010, e kpughere na usoro COINTELPRO nke FBI were Withers ụgwọ iji gwa ya na mmegharị ikike obodo US ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ iri afọ abụọ, malite obere oge mgbe foto mbụ ya nke Martin Luther King Jr

Ọbá akwụkwọ nke Congress edebewo ọrụ Ernest Withers ma hazie ya maka nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Smithsonian Institution's National Museum of African American History and Culture, na Washington, DC
A mụrụ Ernest C
Withers na Memphis, Tennessee, nyere Arthur Withers na Pearl Withers nke Marshall County, Mississippi; o nwere nne nne nke a maara dị ka Oriakụ
Minnie Withers
Withers gosipụtara mmasị na foto site na nwata
O sere foto mbụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị mgbe nwanne ya nwanyị nyere ya igwefoto ọ natara n'aka nwa klas ya
Ọ zutere nwunye ya Dorothy Curry nke Brownsville, Tennessee (ha nọgidere na-alụ di ruo afọ iri isii na isii), na Manassas High School (Tennessee) na Memphis, Tennessee
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ natara ọzụzụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ foto nke ndi amị
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, Withers jere ozi dị ka otu n'ime ndị uwe ojii mbụ nke Memphis

Ernestina Abambila (amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1998) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere etiti na onye na-echebe etiti maka UKS SMS Łódź na Ekstraliga ụmụ nwanyị Poland
Abambila bụ onye Ghana mbụ gbara bọọlụ na UEFA Women's Champions League
O mere nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana megide France na 2017 mgbe ọ dị afọ 18
N'afọ 2016, Abambila bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ na Youngstown State
Abambila malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum
Ọ bịanyere aka na otu egwuregwu Premier League (ụmụ nwanyị) nke Belarus FC Minsk
Ọ ghọrọ onye Ghana mbụ gbara bọọlụ na UEFA Women's Champions League mgbe FC Minsk meriri Ljubljana n'ọkwa nke 2017-18 UEFA Women'S Champions League
Abambila nwere FIFA mbụ ya na 2014 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup nke Costa Rica kwadoro na 2014
FC Minsk
Ernesto Balducci bụ onye amụrụ na (6 August 1922 - 25 April 1992) bụ onye ụkọchukwu Katọlik nke Ịtali na onye na-ahụ maka udo
A mụrụ Balducci na Santa Fiora, Tuscany, Ịtali
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, a chụrụ nna ya n'ọrụ na Scolopi, ntọala okpukpe raara onwe ya nye agụmakwụkwọ nke ndị ogbenye, nyere ya ohere n'efu na seminarị
Ọ gụrụ nkà mmụta okpukpe na Rom, mgbe ahụ akwụkwọ ozi na nkà ihe ọmụma na Florence

Ntọala nke Centro d'Impegno Cristiano 'Cenacolo' (Centre for Christian Commitment) na 1952 nyere ya ohere ime ka ọbụbụenyi ya na onye isi obodo Florence Giorgio La Pira, na mmekọrịta ya na onye edemede-onye ụkọchukwu Lorenzo Milani na ndị na-eso ụzọ Jacques Maritain, nke a maara dị ka 'Little Brothers'
N'afọ 1958, Balducci guzobere nyocha kwa ọnwa Testimonianze ('Ihe akaebe'), nke ọ duziri ruo afọ iri ato na anọ
N'afọ 1963, ọ gbachitere onye Itali mbụ jụrụ n'ihi akọ na uche, Giuseppe Gozzini
Ọ nọrọ na Rom, nke dị nso na Nzukọ nke Abụọ nke Vatican, ruo 1965 mgbe, n'ihi ntinye aka nke Pope Paul VI, ọ laghachiri Tuscany

Otú ọ dị, ọ bụghị na Florence, ebe bishọp Florit ka na-etinye aka na esemokwu ya na La Pira, mana n'ebe obibi ndị mọnk a na-akpọ Badia Fiesolana, narị mita abụọ site na ókèala nke diocese nke Florence

N'agbanyeghị na ọ nọpụrụ iche n'ebe obibi ndị mọnk ahụ, ọ nwere obere oge maka ọmụmụ ya, ebe ọ bụ na magazin Testimonianze, ụlọ obibi akwụkwọ 'Cultura della pace', ('Ọdịbendị Udo'), na-arụkọ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa ụbọchị na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ na site na ịga kpọmkwem na ọtụtụ ngagharị iwe na arụmụka n'Ịtali niile

O mere mkpọsa megide ihe kpatara agha, ma tupu ma mgbe Agha Gulf gasịrị, ma jiri ncheta narị ise na 1992 nke nchọpụta Christopher Columbus nke Amerịka, dị ka oge iji tinye ntọala nke oge a n'ihe gbasara, mkpọsa ndị a ghọkwara isi ihe maka nnukwu usoro udo nke Ịtali
Ọ bụ mgbe ọ na-alọta site n'otu n'ime arụmụka ndị a ka Ernesto Balducci tinyere aka n'ihe mberede ụgbọala
A nabatara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ na coma, ma nwụọ na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Eprel 1992
Ernesto Balducci nyochara okpukpe n'ihe gbasara ikike ha ịbụ ma ọ bụ na ọ bụghị isi iyi nke nzọpụta akụkọ ihe mere eme
Nzọpụta nke na-anọghị na ọkwa na-abụghị nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na nke ịdị adị

Isiokwu kachasị nke oge a nke nkà mmụta okpukpe Protestant na-agbakọta na echiche a, site na Karl Barth ruo Dietrich Bonhoeffer, na ebumnuche ha nke ịkewa okpukpe na okwukwe na ịtụgharị echiche lekwasịrị anya na Chineke maka igosi mmadụ, kama
Mmadụ na-esote okpukpe
N'echiche Balducci, okpukpe bụ ihe nketa nke ọtụtụ puku afọ nke ọdịbendị, dị ka echiche, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọdịbendị na ihe ime mmụọ maka ndị monads ọdịbendị nke, Otú ọ dị, tụfuru ọdịdị ha
Site n'ịnagide egwu apocalyptic nke agha nke oge a, ugbu a okpukpe nwere ọrụ abụọ nwere ike ịrụ
Ma ọ bụ ọrụ na-agbadata nke ncheta nchebe na njirimara ụfọdụ, ma ọ bụ ọrụ amụma maka azụmahịa ahụ na 'oge mbara ala'
Ọ na-agbanye n'ụzọ miri emi na nghọta ha
Dị ka Balducci si kwuo, iweghachite ọdịdị okpukpe ga-adabere n'ụzọ nkịtị maka ajụjụ udo iji mee ka ihe ncheta dị iche iche nke ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ
Ihe a niile n'ahapụghị ụfọdụ ihe ndị zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ọdịbendị ọdịda anyanwụ, dị ka ụkpụrụ nke ịdị elu nke akọ na uche n'ihe gbasara iwu ọ bụla, ụkpụrụ metụtara ọnọdụ nke ikike na usoro sayensị
Njikọ nke 'Planetary Human', na-ezube itinye isiokwu dị iche iche n'aha nke isi nke na-akọwa onwe ya na ụdị
Nsogbu nke oge a na-akpali Balducci ịkọwa usoro nkwekọrịta mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke obodo ụwa
Ihe kpatara ya, nke e wepụrụ n'echiche ndị Ọdịda Anyanwụ Ụwa, na-arụ ọrụ dị mkpa, ruo ugbu a

Site n'iwere aro nke Ernesto de Martino, Balducci kwenyere na ogologo 'akụkọ ihe mere eme' nke nkwurịta okwu dị warara n'etiti 'àgwàetiti' ọdịbendị, nke egwu nke ndị dị iche iche bụ ihe na-emeghachi omume nke mere ka agbụrụ ahụ sie ike, agwụla
Ọbụna ime ihe ike megide ìgwè ndị ọzọ nwere ezi uche ma ọ bụrụhaala na enweghị usoro ịdị n'otu nke mbara ala
Mana egwu maka ịdị ndụ nke ụmụ mmadụ na-eme ka ọdịnihu nke onye ọ bụla dị n'otu
Ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ, site na 'oge homination', na-aga n'ihu na planetarization (globalization)

Balducci na-ekwu na Anthropology nke dabeere na ontology nke 'ọdịiche' (ndị ọzọ na anyị, ndị ọdịbendị na ndị nke okike, ndị mepere emepe na ndị mbụ) wee chọpụta ohere nke ụzọ dị iche iche ịbụ ụmụ mmadụ n'oge na oghere
Site n'ịjụ echiche mbụ ya, Anthropology na-amata ọchịchọ nke ngosipụta mmadụ ọ bụla pụrụ iche maka ọchịchị zuru ụwa ọnụ nke na-ejikọta ụmụ mmadụ, na ha na okike
Nke a bụ echiche nke Balducci na-enweta na njem ọdịbendị dị iche iche, nhazi nke Claude Lévi-Strauss, 'ecology nke uche' nke Gregory Bateson, ụtọ asụsụ nke Noam Chomsky
Balducci na-adabere n'echiche ya na agụụ dị otú ahụ maka ụwa
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe, nnọchianya ya bụ maka dialectic n'etiti akụkụ ụfọdụ na nke ụwa niile nke mmadụ

Ọ gbaziri n'aka Ernst Bloch okwu dị n'etiti 'mmadụ nwere ọdịbendị' (homo editus) na 'mmadụ zoro ezo' (homo absconditus), okwu dị n'etiti ịdị adị na ịdị ike nke mmadụ, ọchịchọ nke bụ transcendence na-enweghị transcendence, a 化 transcendence in the immanence
Ịgafe Balducci yiri ka ọ bụ ụdị teleology anthropological nke na-anọchite anya usoro evolushọn nke mmadụ nwere ike ịkwado ma ọ bụ jụ n'ụzọ ya
Ihe kpatara ya, dị ka Balducci kwuru, na-achọta ihe ọhụrụ dị mkpa
Nanị iwu ahụ ị nwere ike n'otu oge ahụ ga-eme ka ụmụ mmadụ chọta ihe kpatara ya na nkwa nke ịdị ndụ ya (na La terra del tramonto)
Balducci ghọtara na nnwere onwe ime ihe nke steeti na uto nke ikike cosmopolitan bụ ihe gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ n'ụzọ miri emi na iwu evolushọn nke ụdị mmadụ

Okwukwe na mmadụ (echiche Pierre Teilhard de Chardin), nchebara echiche na ụdị anyị nwere ọtụtụ ihe ịma aka siri ike na nke siri ike, ohere nke 'mmadụ mbara ala' ihe ndị a niile nwere ezi uche nye Balducci ma ọ bụrụ na mmetụta nke ịnọ na obodo karịrị mba ga-emepụta ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mbara ala
Ọrụ nke kwekọrọ na obodo ụwa, ihe na-ebilite n'ike nke iwu evolushọn nke ụdị ahụ, otu iwu ahụ na-eduga site n'ebo gaa n'obodo, site n'obodo gaa na mbaỌdịdị
Iji kọwaa ike maka nguzobe nke obodo ụwa, Balducci na-echeta ụdị abụọ nke iwu okike pactum unionis na pactum subjectionis

A na-achọpụta ihe mbụ ahụ n'ihi pacifism anthropological, nke horizon bụ ọha mmadụ nke a na-eme ka ọ dị n'otu site na mmekọrịta nke mmeghachi omume na-enweghị isi na nhọrọ kachasị mma maka enweghị ime ihe ike

Ernesto Djédjé (1948-1983) bụ onye egwu Ivory Coast si Daloa
Nne na nna ya bụ Wolof na Bété
Djédjé malitere ịkpọ egwu n'afọ iri na ise mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye na-egwu guitarist na Ivoiro Star, otu onye na-eme egwuregwu dopé, na 1962
Ọ kwagara Paris na 1968 wee ghọọ nwa akwụkwọ
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe wee mee ndekọ mbụ ya na Anoma Brou Felix na 1970 site n'enyemaka nke Manu Dibango
N'afọ 1972, ọ laghachiri n'ala nna ya iduzi San Pedro Orchestra
O mechara guzobe otu egwu a na-akpọ Les Ziglibithiens ma malite ụdị egwu a na'akpọ Ziglibithy dabere na ụdị egwu mgbọrọgwụ Bété jikọtara ya na rhythms Congolese
Ziglibithy nke Djedje bụ egwu egwu na-agba egwú nke ukwuu, nke a na-eji mpi abụba eme ihe na-agbagwoju anya
Djedje dekọrọ abọm mbụ ya n'onwe ya na 1977, na-akpọ ya Ziboté na onye na-emepụta Gbadamassi Raïmi
E wepụtara abọm ọzọ, Le Roi du Ziglibithy, na Badmos Records na afọ 1977
O weputara abọm akpọrọ Aguisse (nakwa na Badmos Records), Tizere na Zouzoup Ale
All ndị a vinyl LP's are rare taa, ọ bụ ezie na Le Roi du Ziglibithy, nke a na-ekwu na ọ bụ Djedje kacha mma ndekọ, e wepụtara ya na CD site na Popular African Music, nke nwere isi na Germany
Onye isi ala Ivoirian Félix Houphouët-Boigny sọpụrụ ya maka onyinye ya na ọdịbendị mba na afo 1982
Djédjé nwụrụ na mberede n'ihi ọnyá a na-agwọghị agwọ na afọ 1983 mgbe ọ dị afọ 35, ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ ndị na-ekwu na o nwere nsí
Errol Arthur Arendz (onye amụrụ n'abali iri na isii nke ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1953) bụ onye South Africa na-emepụta ejiji
A mụrụ Arendse, Arendz tolitere na Elsie's River, nke dị na Cape Town
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Paris ma rụọ ọrụ na London n'afọ ndị 70 wee malite ịrụ ọrụ aka ya n'afọ 1973 mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ivor Kirsten Academy of Fashion na Johannesburg
Arendz ghọrọ onye a maara nke ọma na South Africa n'afọ 1978, mgbe akwụkwọ akụkọ Fair Lady Magazine gosipụtara Barbara Barnard ka oyi nghọta mbụ nkeaka ọrụ ya
O ji igwe akwa nke Bernina wee n'akọwa akwa ya n'ụlọ
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ na Cape Town mgbe ọ ka dị afọ iri abụọ
Mgbe Margaret Gardiner ghọrọ Miss South Africa, ọ bu Arendz kwara uwe kpụrụ ekpu ka boólụ ya maka asọmpi Miss World, nke o meriri
E tinyere aha ụlọ ọrụ ya, Errol Arendz Fashion Designer cc, n'afọ 1986
Arendz bụ onye ama ama n'oge ikpa oke agba bu oge apartheid, na magazin gbasara ejiji ọ na-ekwusi ike na ọ bụ onye nwere agba
'Anyị enweghị mmasị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, mụ na nwanne m nwanyị Gloria chọrọ naanị ihe ịga nke ọma
Mgbe ahụ, mgbe ahụ ọ dịghị onye hụrụ anyị dị ka onye ojii ma ọ bụ onye ọcha ; ọ bụrụ na ọ dị ihe ọ bụla, anyị bụ ọlaọcha - n'èzí ụdị niile,' ka o kwuru mgbe e mesịrị
N'afọ 2003, ndị ngalaba ọrụ ugbo elu bu South African Airways (SAA) nyere Arendz ọrụ imepụta uwe nke ndị ọrụ ha niile, ndị ọrụ ala na ndị na-ahụ maka ụgbọ elu
Ọ malitere imepụta akpụkpọ ụkwụ n'afọ 2005
Ụlọ ahịa bu aha Errol Arendz weere ụlọ dum na Hout Street na Cape Town
Ndị ahịa ya gụnyere Priscilla Presley, Joan Collins, Shakira Caine, Joanna Lumley, Sharon Stone, Jaclyn Smith, Elita de Klerk, Pam Golding na Karen Barnard
A na-agụnye Arendz n'etiti ndị kacha mma na-emepụta uwe ejiji Europe na South Africa
Ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe na asọmpi ngosi ejiji nlereanya nke TV Revlon Supermodel n'afọ 2007 na nke L'Ormarins Queen's Plate Racing Festival n'afọ 2017
Arendz ritere Lifetime Achievement Coty Award [mgbe?], Onye Mmepụta nke Afọ [nke?], na J&B Onye Mmepụta nke Afọ [mgbe?]

Erving Dzho Botaka-Ioboma ( Russian ; a mụrụ ya na 5 Ọktoba 1998) bụ onye Russia na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara Ufa bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agbara Ufa bọọlụ
O pụtara nke mbụ ya na Russian Professional Football League maka FC Solyaris Moscow na 20 Julaị 2016 na egwuregwu megide FSK Dolgoprudny
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2018, mbugharị ya na Torpedo Moscow kpatara ọgba aghara mgbe a kọrọ na klọb ahụ kagburu nkwekọrịta ya n'ihi na ndị ultras jụrụ ikwe ka onye ojii na-agba bọọlụ na-agbara klọb ahụ
Torpedo mechara gọnahụ nke a site na nkwupụta gọọmentị mana ndị Torpedo ultras siri ike na nkwupụta nke ha
Ọ pụtara bọọlụ mbụ ya na Russian Football National League maka Luch Vladivostok na 24 Julaị 2019 na egwuregwu megide FC Neftekhimik Nizhnekamsk
Na 11 Juun 2021, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ogologo oge na klọb Premier League nke Russia Ufa, ya na onye bụbu onye nkuzi Veles ya bụ Aleksei Stukalov
O mere RPL mbụ ya maka Ufa na 18 Septemba 2021 na egwuregwu megide FC Khimki

The Escravos–Lagos Pipeline System (ELPS) bụ usoro paịpụ gas e wuru na 1989 iji nye gas site na mpaghara Escravos nke Niger Delta gaa na ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik Egbin dị nso na Lagos na Nigeria

Usoro ndị ọzọ sitere na ELP na-ebufe gas nye ndị ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik Delta na Ughelli, Warri Refining and Petrochemical Company na Warri, West African Portland Cement (WAPCO) Plants dị na Shagamu nakwa Ewekoro, ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị na Ikorodu, City Gate dị na lkeja Lagos
Ebe ọ bụ na ụlọ ọrụ ike NIPP pụtara, ELPS bụ isi akwara na-enye gas na ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik na Naịjirịa
Obosara nke akụkụ bụ isi nke paịpụ site na Warri Gas Treatment Plant ruo Egbin tee na PS4 dị nso Lagos bụ inches 36 (910 mm)
Obosara nke ngalaba ahụ site na Escravos ruo Warri na site na Egbin Tee ruo Alagbado Tee na PS5 bụ inches 24 (610 mm)
Ikike nke paịpụ ahụ bụ nde 800 cu ft / d (23 m3/d) na nrụgide dị mma ma ọ naghị ezute mkpa gas a tụrụ anya ya
Site na inches 24 (610 ) tee na Itoki
Site na tee gaa Oben - Geregu pipeline ELPS nwere ike ibuga gaasị na ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik Geregu I na II yana ụlọ ọrụ igwe Ajaokuta
ELPS na-ebukwa gaasị ọnụọgụ ya dị nde 170 scf/d (140 MWh/d) maka West African Gas Pipeline

Ọ bụkwa naanị ya bụ onye nwe nturugo n'egwuregwu ogologo ima elu ugboro atọ n'usoro n'asompi Afrịka yana onye Afrịka mbụ nwetara nrite ogologo ima elu abụọ na asọmpi egwuregwu ụwa

Eshabwe bụ ụdị emere ka ọ dị ọcha nke malitere na Ankole ma jiri ya mee ngwa ihe oriri dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ
Eshabwe, nke a makwaara dị ka ghee sauce, bụ nri ọdịnala ana akwadebe na Ankole
A na-akwadebe nri ahụ maka emume ma ọ bụ oge pụrụ iche nke mba ahụ
N'ememe agbamakwụkwọ ọdịnala nke obodo Ankole, mmadụ anọ na-eri nri ahụ, nwoke na nna ya na nwanne nne nna (ishenkazi) na nwanne nne nne (nyinarimi) nke nwanyị ahụ
A na-enye Eshabwe maka oriri ya na orwabya (efere ụrọ nwere mkpuchi)
Dị ka omenala si dị, ọ bụ ndị agadi nwanyị na-eme ya n'ime ụlọ ebe ha ga-agbachi nkịtị n'ihi na ọ bụ nkwenye na ikwu okwu ga-eme ka eshabwe hapụ ịdị mma
Otú ọ dị, nke a agbanweela ma ana-enye onye ọ bụla eshabwe dị ka nri ọ bụla ndị ọzọ
A na-ebuputa Eshabwe dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na isi nri mmemme dị ka karo (achịcha mmiri ara ehi), poteto, matooke, agwa na ndị ọzọ
Na mbido, a na-asacha ghee ọcha na mmiri oyi
A na-agbakwunye ngwakọta nnu na mmiri (rwabarire) na ghee
A na-agbanye ngwakọta ahụ ruo mgbe ghee gbanwere site na odo gaa na ọcha
Ka ị na-agbakwunye mmiri oyi, nke nwere nnu a gbazere na ya
A na-akpali eshabwe a kpụrụ akpụ ruo mgbe ị nwetara ọkpụrụkpụ nke achọrọ
Mgbe e mepụtara eshabwe, a na-asacha ya iji wepụ ụmụ irighiri ihe ma ọ bụ adịghị ọcha
A na-enye Eshabwe na nri ọ bụla dị mkpa dịka achịcha millet, matooke, poteto na-atọ ụtọ wdg
Esham Attica Smith (amụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba, n'afọ 1973), nke a maara dịka Esham, bụ onye America na-eti egwu si Detroit, Michigan
N'ịbụ onye pụtara dị ka otu n'ime ndị egwu hip hop izizi si Detroit, Esham wepụtara abọm studio mbụ ya, Boomin 'Words from Hell, n'afọ 1989 ógè ọ dị afọ iri na isii
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu wepụta abọm studio iri na ise n'ozuzu ya ma bụrụ onye a maara nke ọma dị ka onye nnọchi anya nke hip hop subgenres horrorcore na rap rock
N'afọ 1992, o sonyere n'òtù egwu Natas
Ya na nwanne ya nwoke James Smith hiwere ma na-agba ọsọ na Detroit hip hop label Reel Life Productions

A mụrụ Esham Attica Smith n'ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba, n'afọ 1973, na Long Island, New York, Esham tolitere na-ekewa oge n'etiti agbata obi Seven Mile n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Detroit, Michigan, ebe ya na nne ya bi
Ọ gara Osborn High School, ma soro nne nne ya biri na New York n'oge ọkọchị
Ọ gụrụ piano, guitar, na trombone na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ma gee ndị na-ese ihe dịka Sugar Hill Gang, Run-DMC, Ozzy Osbourne na Kiss ntị
Esham malitere ide egwu mbụ, nwanne ya nwoke nke tọrọ ya, James H
Smith, gbara ya ume ka ọ gbasoo ọrụ hip hop
Dị ka Esham si kwuo, 'Ọ dị m ka m nwere mmiri ọgwụ, o chekwara na m nwere ike iweta ihe ọhụrụ na egwuregwu ahụ, na-abịa site n'obodo Detroit
N'oge ahụ, ọ bụghị n'ezie ihe nkiri egwu [rap] na Detroit
Onye ọ bụla na-eṅomi ihe onye ọ bụla ọzọ na-eme
' Na klas nke abụọ, Esham zutere Champtown, onye bụkwa onye na-achọ ịgba egwu
Ha abụọ rụrụ ọnụ na mmemme open mic Seafood Bay
N'otu oge, a manyere Champtown na Esham ka ha rapa maka onye na-ere ọgwụ ọjọọ na égbè

N'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 2010, Esham dekọrọ 'Walk Toward the Light', mmekorita ya na onye na-akwado ịgba mgba na mba ụwa na onye na-ese ihe n'okpuru ala zuru ụwa ọnụ One Man Kru (nke otu egwu egwu Keepaz of the Krypt)
Ọ bụ One Man Kru mepụtara ngwakọta izizi ahụ ma Young Wicked nke AMB kwadoro ya maka mixtape UGH34
D-Rodge mepụtara remix ahụ ma wepụta ya na One Man Kru's 'I Will Never Quit' LP n'enweghị amaokwu nke atọ n'ihi nkwukọrịta na-ezighị ezi n'etiti onye mmepụta na injinia ọdịyo

Udị egwu egwu nkè Esham, nke onye edemede Sara Cohen na-ekwu 'na-eji akụkọ na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ (na n'ụzọ doro anya n'elu) iji nye ihe karịrị akarị, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ katọn-dị ka nsụgharị nke ụkọ obodo na Detroit,' sitere na ụdị nke Geto Boys
Okwu Smith lekwasịrị anya na isiokwu ndị dị ka ọnwụ, iji ọgwụ ọjọọ eme ihe, ihe ọjọọ, paranoia na mmekọahụ, ma tinyekwa ntụaka na Setan

Esi' Museum bụ ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie dị na Esi', Kwara State, Nigeria
Ihe ngosi nka a bụ nke mbụ e guzobere na Naịjirịa mgbe o mepere n'afọ 1945
Ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwere ihe karịrị otu puku ihe oyiyi ili ma ọ bụ ihe oyiyi na-anọchite anya ụmụ mmadụ
A maara ya na ọ nwere nchịkọta kachasị ukwuu nke ihe oyiyi soapstone n'ụwa
N'oge a, ihe ngosi nka Esie bụ ebe a na-eme ihe omume okpukpe ma na-eme ememme n'ọnwa Eprel kwa afọ
Asiyaba Irobi (1960-2010) bụ onye Naijiria na-ede uri, onye na-ede egwuregwu, onye na'eme ihe nkiri na onye nkuzi
A mụrụ Irobi na 10 Jenụwarị 1960

O nwere Bachelor of Arts na Bekee / Drama na Master of Arts na Comparative Literature na Mahadum Naijiria, Nsukka, Master of Arts in Film and Theatre na Mahadim Sheffield, Sheffield UK na PhD na Theatre Studies na Mahadam Leeds, UK

Ọ kụziri na Mahadum Liverpool John Moores na England na ụlọ akwụkwọ nka nke Tisch, nke Mahadum New York, ma bụrụkwa osote prọfesọ nke International Theatre and Film Studies na Mahadim Ohio, Athens, USA
Esimbi bụ zi asụsụ Tivoid nke ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Cameroon
A na-akpọkwa ya Isimbi, Simpi, Age, Aage, Bogue na Mburugam
Esmé Frances Hennessy, née Franklin (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 1933, Umzinto) bụ onye South African botanist, botanical artist, na ónyé édémédé
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na taxonomic botany

O dere ma gosipụta Erythrinas nke South Africa, Durban 1972, Orchids of Africa 1961 na Joyce Stewart, The Slipper Orchids 1989 na Tessa Hedge, na ọtụtụ nkọwa na efere na Flowering plants of Africa ya na ọrụ n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta onwé
A mụrụ Esmé Franklin na Umzinto n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1933 n'ezinụlọ dọkịta
Ọ gụrụ botany na zoology na Mahadum Natal, Pietermaritzburg, wee nweta PhD na botany na 1983
Franklin lụrụ Lt Commander Brian Hennessy RN
ma wèré áhà nná ya
Site na 1958 ruo 1960, Hennessy rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé enyemaka nyocha na CSIR
Amoebiasis Research Unit
N'afọ 1961, Hennessy bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara dị ka ónyé nkụzi na Mahadum Durban-Westville Site na 1973 ọ bụ ónyé nkuzi dị elu na Mahadum nke Durban-Westville, ma site na 1984 ọ bụ osote prọfesọ

N'afọ 1972, Hennessy bipụtara akwụkwọ South African Erythrinas na Durban O mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe osise na nkọwa màkà Flowering Plants of Africa na American Orchid Society Bulletin; ihe osise ma soro dee Orchids of Africa (1981) ya na Joyce Stewart ma gosipụta ma soro dee The Slipper Orchids (1989) ya na Tessa Hedge
N'afọ 1991, Hennessy kwetara ịbụ onye nchịkọta sayensị nke akwụkwọ Elsa Pooleyás A complete field guide to Trees of Natal, Zululand and Transkei
N'afọ 2020, Botanical Society nke South Africa nyere Dr
Hennessy Cythna Letty Medal iji sọpụrụ ahụ ya nkè ihe osise botanical bipụtara, nke nyéré aka dị ukwuu n'ịkwalite osisi South Africa
Esohe Frances Ikponmwen (a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1954) bụ onye ọka ikpe ukwu nke Edo Steeti, Naịjirịa
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta iwu ya na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa dị na Enugu
Ikponmwen etinyela aka na ụlọ ikpe nke Edo kemgbe e guzobere steeti ahụ
Ikponmwen bụ onye nsọ nke ụbọchị ikpeazụ
Ọ lụrụ Edward Osawaru Ikponmwen, ma mụta ụmụ ise

Cousso Espérance Agbo (amụrụ na 14 Mee 1995), nke a maara dị ka Espérance agbo, bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na Ivorian na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu maka otu egwuregwu Indian Women's League Gokulam Kerala FC na otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Ivory Coast
Espadaea bụ ụdị monotypic nke osisi na-agbasa okooko nke ezinụlọ Solanaceae
Nke sọọsọ Nanị ụdị bụ Espadaea amoena
A mụrụ ya na Cuba
Aha ụdị ahụ bụ iji sọpụrụ Juan José Díaz de Espada (1757ī1832), bishọp Spanish na Havana na Cuba, na aha Latin nke amoena pụtara 'mara mma' ma ọ bụ 'ihe na-atọ ụtọ'
A kọwara ya na mbụ ma bipụta ya na Rde la Sagra, Hist
Mpịakọta nke ịrị na otu na peeji nke otu narị na iri anọ na asatọ na otu puku, narị asatọ na iri ise
Esperança Machavela bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Mozambik
Onye isi ala Armando Guebuza họpụtara Machavela dị ka Minista Ikpe Ziri Ezi na Febụwarị 11, na afọ 2005, mgbe Guebuza kpọrọ gọọmentị ọhụrụ ya obere oge ka ọ banyere n'ọkwa
Tupu nhọpụta ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ministry of Foreign Affairs ma jee ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya na Portugal
E wepụrụ ya n'ọfịs (ya na minista mba ọzọ Alcinda Abreu na minista njem Antonio Munguambe) na Machị 10, na afọ 2008, Maria Benvida Levy, onye bụbu onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Obodo Maputo, nọchiri ya
Essar Energy plc bụ ụlọ ọrụ ike India nke dị na obodo Mauritius nke nwere akụ na azụmaahịa ike na mmanụ na gas
N'ịbụ nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na obodo Port Louis, ya na Obodo Mauritius na enyemaka nke ndi Essar Group, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere mmasị na mmepụta ike na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2014, onye nwere ọtụtụ òkè, Essar Global Fund Limited, nwetara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

E guzobere ya na afo 1998 dịka ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa zuru oke nke ụlọ ọrụ Essar Group, a na-ebugharị azụmaahịa ahụ na London Stock Exchange n'ọnwa Epre no’ l afọ 2010, na-egosi na mgbanwe ahụ bụ nke kachasị ukwuu kemgbe Disemba no’ afọ 2007
A gbakwunyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na FTSE 100 Index na nyocha nke nkeji iri na ise sochirinụ
Essar Global Fund Limited jidere ihe dịka 76 pacenti na Essar Energy
Ndị na-eduga na ntinye aka mbụ nke ọha na eze bụ JPMorgan Chase ya na Deutsche Bank
Onyinye mbụ ahụ nwetara £ 13bn
Ravi Ruia, Onye isi oche, ya na Sanjay Mehta, onye isi oche nke Essar Global Limited, ka a chọpụtara na akụkọ Economic Times of India dịka ihe enyemaka na ndepụta ahụ
Essex Hemphill (16 Eprel, 1957 - 4 Nọvemba, 1995) bụ onye Amerịka na-ede uri na onye na-eme ihe ike
A maara ya maka onyinye ya na Washington, DC nka nka na mgbe afọ 1980s, nakwa maka ikwurịta n'ezoghị ọnụ isiokwu ndị metụtara obodo ndị mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị n'Afrịka na Amerịka
A mụrụ Essex Hemphill na Eprel 16, 1957, na Chicago, Illinois, nke Warren na Mantalene Hemphill, ọ bụkwa nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ ise
Na mbido ndụ ya, ọ kwagara Washington DC ebe ọ gara Ballou High School
Ọ malitere ide uri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, na-ede banyere echiche ya, ndụ ezinụlọ ya, na mmekọahụ na-eto eto
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ debara aha na Mahadum nke Maryland n'afọ 1975 iji mụọ akwụkwọ akụkọ
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ hapụrụ kọleji mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gara n'ihu na-emekọrịta ihe na DC nka na-ekwu okwu ọnụ, na-arụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ, ma na-amalite ibipụta akwụkwọ uri mbụ ya
Ọ ga-aga n'ihu nweta akara ugo mmụta ya na Bekee na Mahadum nke District of Columbia
N'afọ 1979, Hemphill na ndị ọrụ ibe ya malitere Nethula Journal of Contemporary Literature, mbipụta nke ebumnuche ya bụ igosi ọrụ nke ndị oji nke oge a
Otu n'ime ọgụgụ mbụ ya n'ihu ọha bụ nke onye nchịkọta akụkọ Nethula bụ E
Ethelbert Miller haziri na Howard University's Founder Library ebe ọ rụrụ n'akụkụ ma bụrụ enyi onye na-eme ihe nkiri Michelle Parkerson
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Mahadum Harvard, Mahadum Pennsylvania, na Mahadum California na Los Angeles ịkpọ aha ole na ole
N'afọ 1982, Essex Hemphill, Larry Duckett, ezigbo enyi ya, na Wayson Jones, onye ya na ya bi na mahadum, hiwere otu okwu a na-akpọ 'Cinque', nke rụrụ na mpaghara Washington DC
Hemphill gara n'ihu na-eme uri ya, okwu ya, na 1983, natara onyinye site na Washington Project for the Arts iji mee 'ihe nkiri nnwale' nke uri akpọrọ Murder on Glass, ya na Parkerson na Jones
Hemphill malitekwara ibipụta nchịkọta uri nke ya n'oge a, malite na Diamonds Was in the Kitty na Some of the People We Love (1982), wee soro ya na Earth Life (1985) na Conditions (1986)

Ọ ga-enwetakwu nlebara anya mba mgbe e tinyere ọrụ ya na In the Life (1986), ihe odide nke uri sitere n'aka ndị oji, ndị na-ese ihe na-edina ụdị onwe ha, nke ezigbo enyi Hemphill, onye hụrụ ya n'anya, na onye edemede ibe ya, Joseph F
Beam chịkọtara
E bipụtala uri ya n'ọtụtụ ebe na akwụkwọ akụkọ, edemede ya apụtawo na Obsidian, Black Scholar, CALLALOO, na Essence n'etiti ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 1986, Hemphill nwetara mkpakọrịta na uri site na National Endowment for the Arts
Essex Hemphill pụtakwara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n'etiti mgbe afọ 1989 n'afọ 1992

N'afọ 1989, ọ pụtara na Looking for Langston, ihe nkiri nke Isaac Julien duziri banyere onye na-ede uri Langston Hughes na Harlem Renaissance Hemphill na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-emeri Emmy Marlon Riggs rụkọrọ ọrụ na ihe nkiri abụọ Tongues Untied (1989) nke lere anya n'ime mgbagwoju anya nke njirimara ojii na ndị na-abụghị nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị, na Black is
Black Ain't (1992) nke tụlere kpọmkwem ihe bụ 'ọchịchịrị'
Mgbe Beam nwụsịrị site na ọrịa AIDS n'afọ 1
1988, Essex Hemphill na nne Beam rụkọrọ ọrụ ọnụ iji bipụta usoro ya na In the Life
E bipụtara ihe odide nke abụ'afọ na 1991 n'okpuru aha Brother to Brother New Writings by Black Gay Men, nke debere ọrụ nke ihe dị ka ndị edemede iri atọ na abụọ, gụnyere Hemphill n'onwe ya

Mgbe ọ na-ede banyere Hemphill na Beam n'akwụkwọ ya, Evidence of Being The Black Gay Cultural Renaissance and the Politics of Violence, Darius Bost na-ekwu na Hemphill kwagara na nne Beam iji nyere aka rụchaa anthology, na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ n'ọnọdụ ụlọ na osisi
Ọ na-ede na Hemphill kwuru n'ajụjụ ọnụ na e mepụtara anthology ahụ n'ọnọdụ nke ibuso ọrịa AIDS na ọnwụ gbara anyị gburugburu

Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nguzogide siri ike nke na-ekwu, 'Tupu m nwụọ, aga m ekwu ihe ndị a’’” Hemphill dekwara uri a raara nye Beam mgbe ọ nwụsịrị nke akpọrọ “When My Brother Fell,” ma nyefee ya abụ ya nke afọ 1986 “Heavy Corners” nye ya
N'afọ 1990, o kwuru okwu na ogbako OutWrite (ebe ọ bụ naanị onye isi ojii), nke mechara bụrụ mmeghe na anthology
Nwanna na Nwanna ga-aga n'ihu iji nweta Lambda Literary Award

N'afọ 1992, Hemphill bipụtara nchịkọta uri na obere akụkọ ya kachasị ukwuu, nke akpọrọ Ceremonies edemede na abụ, nke gụnyere ọrụ na-adịbeghị anya, kamakwa nhọrọ site na nchịkọta uri mbụ ya, Earth Life and Conditions N'afọ sochirinụ, a ga-enye anthology ahụ National Library Association's Gay, Lesbian, and Bisexual ihe Nrite onye odee ọhụrụ na Pew Charitable Trust Fellowship na nka
N'afọ 1993, ọ bụ ọkà mmụta nleta na Getty Center
N'afọ ndị 1990, Hemphill anaghị enye ozi gbasara ahụike ya, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-ekwu mgbe ụfọdụ banyere 'ịbụ onye nwere ọrịa AIDS'
Ọ bụ n'afọ 1994 ka o dere banyere ahụmịhe ya na ọrịa ahụ n'abụ ya 'Vital Signs'
Ọ nwụrụ na Nọvemba 4, 1995, n'ihi nsogbu metụtara ọrịa AIDS

Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, òtù atọ (Gay Men of African Descent (GMAD), Mba ndị ọzọ, na Black Nations / Queer Nations?) kwupụtara na Disemba 10, 1995 ka ọ bụrụ Ụbọchị Ncheta Mba maka Essex Hemphill na New York City's Lesbian and Gay Community Services Center
Cheryl Dunye raara ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 1996 Watermelon Woman nye Hemphill
Na edemede ya (Re - Recalling Essex Hemphill' in Words to Our Now, Thomas Glave, na-ekele ndụ Hemphill, na-elekwasị anya na mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide nke omume ya
Glave dere, sị
Na nke a ugbu a, anyị na-eme ememe ndụ gị na asụsụ Essex
Ya mere na-eme ememe, anyị maara na anyị na-akpọ gị ọzọ n'ihe dị ukwuu, iji gbazite site n'aka onye ọhụụ ọzọ, 'oge na-enweghị nnukwu' Nnukwu ibu nke ọnụnọ iku ume gị agafeela

Ugbu a, a ga-amanye ndị agha ugbu a na ndị ga-abịa n'ọdịnihu - onwe gị onwe gị na ndị ọzọ - ịmụta, dị ka ị mere ma mee ka ọ pụta ìhè, na mmadụ niile na-aga n'ihu n'eziokwu - n'ihe efu; ịnụ ọkụ n'obi, ọ bụghị mpako; nkwuwa okwu n'ezoghị ọnụ, ọ bụghị ụjọ

N'afọ 2014, Martin Duberman dere Hold Tight Gently Michael Callen, Essex Hemphill, na Battlefield of AIDS nke Duberman dere ndụ Essex Hemphill, ya na onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe ike, Michael Callen
Akwụkwọ ahụ ga-aga n'ihu iji merie Lambda Literary Award for LGBT Nonfiction

N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, Hemphill bụ otu n'ime ndị mbido iri ise nke ndị America “ndị ọsụ ụzọ, ndị na-agba ọsọ, na ndị dike na National LGBTQ Wall of Honor n'ime Stonewall National Monument (SNM) na New York City's Stonewall Inn
SNM bụ ihe ncheta mba mbụ nke United States nke a raara nye ikike LGBTQ na akụkọ ihe mere eme, a na-ekpughere mgbidi ahụ n'oge ncheta afọ iri ise nke ọgba aghara Stonewall
Ọtụtụ n'ime uri Hemphill na okwu ọnụ ya bụ akụkọ ndụ ya, ma gosipụta ahụmịhe ya dị ka mmadụ ole na ole na obodo ndị Africa na America na LGBT
O dere ihe ndị dị ka 'Family Jewels', nke gosipụtara obi nkoropụ ya banyere ịkpa oke ndị ọcha, ọkachasị n'ime obodo ndị na-edina ụdị onwe ha
N'ime edemede ya 'Mama gị ọ maara banyere m?' Hemphill na-akatọ onye na-ese foto Robert Mapplethorpe's The Black Book, nke gosipụtara foto nke penises nke ụmụ nwoke ojii
Hemphill rụrụ ụka na iwepu ihu nke ụmụ nwoke ojii gosipụtara na ndị ọcha na-edina ụdị onwe ha na-edina ụdị onwe ha

uri na edemede ndị dị na Ememe na-ekwu maka mmegide mmekọahụ nke ụmụ nwoke ojii na omenala ndị ọcha, mmekọrịta n'etiti ụmụ nwoke ojii na-edina nwoke na ụmụ nwoke ojii na-abụghị ndị nwoke na nwanyị, HIV / AIDS na obodo ojii na ihe ezinụlọ pụtara
Ọ gakwara n'ihu na-akatọ ma usoro ndị nna, na njirimara nwoke na nwanyị n'ime ọha mmadụ
Hemphill rịọrọ owu ọmụma ugboro ugboro n'ọrụ ya niile
Owu na ọrụ Hemphill bụ mmetụta dị egwu, mmetụta mgbe niile nke ịjụ
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ikom ahụ laghachiri n'ụlọ mgbe ndị ọcha na-edina ụdị onwe ha jụrụ ha, mana a jụkwara ha n'ime obodo ndị isi ojii
Na uri Hemphill, ọ na-egosi owu ọmụma dị ka mmetụta nchịkọta
Ọ kọwara owu ọmụma dị ka mmetụta nke ịbụ, nke nhụjuanya na-enweghị mmata ọha na eze mara

Mmetụta nke nkewa n'ebe ọha na eze nọ na-emepụta agụụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'ihi na ọ bụ ezie na njem ahụ bụ owu, ịlụ ọgụ megide njem ahụ ka ọ ghara igbu gị, dị ka Hemphill kwuru n'otu n'ime uri ya, na-eme ka ị nwee agụụ maka obodo na nkwado
Essohana Péré bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba Togolese
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị isii a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ ndị omeiwu nke Togo na afọ1979; ndị ọzọ bụ Abra Amedomé, Cheffi Meatchi, Kossiwa Monsila, Zinabou Touré, na Adjoavi Trenou
Essozimna Marguerite Gnakade bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Togolese
N'abalị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2020, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa na mba Togo, nwanyị mbụ nwere ọrụ ahụ
Gnadake enweghị ahụmịhe agha gara aga
Ọ bụ nwunye Ernest Gnassingbé, nwanne nwoke nwụrụ anwụ nke onye isi ala mba Togo Faure Gnassingbe
Àtụ Infobox scientist
Estella Atekwana (née Estella Akweseh Nkwate ; amuru 13 Septemba n'afo 1961) bu onye geophysicist na-amu biogeophysics na tectonophysics
Ugbu a ọ bụ Dean nke College of Letters and Science na Mahadum California, Davis
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ mbụ dị ka Dean nke College of Earth, Ocean and Environment na Mahadum Delaware
Ọ bụkwa prọfesọ ọzọ na Mahadum Waterloo na Mahadum Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ Missouri
Tupu ịbanye na Mahadum Delaware na afọ 2017, ọ bụ onye isi ngalaba nke Boone Pickens School of Geology na Mahadum Oklahoma State
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ asọpụrụ Regents na Clyde Wheeler Sun Endowed oche na Mahadum Oklahoma State, ebe ọ na-ejigide oge nhọpụta
Atekwana abụrụla onye nkuzi na Mahadum Sayensị & Teknụzụ Missouri, Mahadum Indiana-Purdue University Indianapolis na Mahadum Western Michigan
Atekwana tolitere na Cameroon wee nweta BS na Geology site na Mahadum Howard na 1983 dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kọleji ọgbọ mbụ
Na Mahadum Howard, Atekwana malitere na mmemme pre-med tupu ọ gbanwee gaa na geology major
Ọ na-eto onye nkuzi na 1970s maka ịgba ya ume ịchụso geology mgbe ha kwuru na ụmụ agbọghọ erughị eru maka ọrụ ubi
Ọ malitere igosi na onye nkụzi ahụ ezighị ezi
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị BS, Atekwana gụchara MS na geology, nakwa na Mahadum Howard na afọ 1986
N'afọ 1991, Atekwana gụchara PhD
na Geophysics na Mahadum Dalhousie na Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ ghọrọ osote prọfesọ na Western Michigan University
N'ụbọchị izu ike na afọ 1999, Atekwaka bụ onye prọfesọ na-eleta na Mahadum Botswana

Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Mahadum Western Michigan na 2003, ọ kuziri na Mahadum Indiana – Purdue University Indianapolis na Missouri University of Science and Technology tupu ọ malite na Mahadum Oklahoma State Boone Pickens School of Geology na afọ 2007

Mgbalị Atekwana n'iche dị iche iche na geosciences na iwulite ikike na mba ndị ka na-emepe emepe ka ejirila onyinye nkuzi pụtara ìhè sitere na Association for Women Geoscientists na Society of Exploration Geophysicists
Ọ na-eje ozi na ọtụtụ kọmitii ndị ọkachamara gụnyere American Geophysical Union (AGU) Kọmitii Honors and Awards na Kọmitii Mba US maka International Union of Geological Sciences (IUGS)
Atekwana bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ na ngalaba multi ịdọ aka ná ntị nke Biogeophysics, nke na-eji geophysics aghọta mmekọrịta biochemical na-eme na saịtị ndị mmeru
Nnyocha biogeophysical nke Atekwana na-enyocha mmetụta nke usoro mgbasa ozi microbial na mgbasa ozi ala
Ụfọdụ n'ime nyocha ya na-enyocha uru na mkpebi nke nha n'ime ọnọdụ resistivity jikọtara yana nha geoelectrical elu iji mapụta nkesa mmetọ n'ime ala
Atekwana na-ejikwa geoelectric na geophysical mbinye aka nke saịtị emetọọ iji nyochaa mmekọrịta dị n'etiti usoro ndu na mmetụta ha na njirimara eletriki nke ihe ala
Atekwana na-ejikwa geophysics nyocha usoro tectonic
Ọmụmụ ihe ọmụmụ geophysical ya na-ekpughe ihe jikọrọ ọnụ na akwa uwe elu na-eme ka usoro geodynamic jikọtara ya na mgbawa nke kọntinent
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, Atekwana na ndị ọrụ ibe gosipụtara ka eserese geophysis nke arụrụ arụ ụlọ dị adị na Malawi na Botswana siri metụta nhazi mpaghara n'oge mgbawa mbụ
Nnyocha ọzọ sitere na mgbawa Okavango nke dị na ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Botswana na-enye ihe akaebe na ihe owuwu okpuru ulo dị adịbu na-achịkwa rifting

Atekwana sokwa na oru ngo iji smartphones nwere sensọ geophysical nwere ike inye ụzọ dị ọnụ ala maka inweta data geophysical, na-akọwapụta ngwa na ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ nwere oke ohere ịnweta akụrụngwa geophysical dị oke ọnụ
Atewkana edeela akwụkwọ karịrị 100 gụnyere
Estelle Akofio-Sowah bụ onye a mụrụ na Scotland , onye ọchụnta ego Ghana na onye isi obodo CSquared Ghana ugbu a na onye bụ bu onye isi Google Ghana
Estelle bụ bu onye isi nchịkwa nke BusyInternet, onye na-enye ọrụ ịntanetị na Ghana
A mụrụ Estelle na Scotland n'aka nna Ghana
Ezinụlọ ya kwa gara Osu na Ghana mgbe ọ dị ọnwa isii

Ọ gara Ghana International School mgbe ahụ na Mahadum Sussex ebe o nwere akara ugo mmụta na Economics and Development Studies yana Fellow nke klas nke abụọ nke Africa Leadership Initiative-West Africa na onye otu Aspen Global Leadership Network
Estelle bụ onye isi mba ugbu a maka Google Ghana
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa maka Busyinternet, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ISP, cyber cafe na ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa
Ọ bụ onye njikwa nnọkọ na oriri na La Palm Royal Beach Hotel na onye nchịkwa ọrụ nke National Poverty Reduction Program na ProNet, onye mmekọ NGO nke Water Aid UK
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Ghana Internet Service Providers Association
Monica Nanyagwe Chintu bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Zambia, otu n'ime ndị ndọrọndọrọ nwanyị mbụ nke Zambia LifeEdit Tupu abanye n'ụlọ omeiwu, Chintu na-arụsi ọrụ ike na
Ester Banda bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zambia
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu National Assembly maka Roan site na 1964 ruo 1968 ma bụrụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na Zambia
Onye otu United National Independence Party (UNIP), a họpụtara Banda ka ọ bụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ nke Women's Brigade, ebe ọ gbakọrọ nkwado maka pati ahụ na Ndola
Na ntuli aka nke Jenụwarị 1964, Banda sonyere na mpaghara Roan dị ka onye UNIP, a họpụtakwara ya na Kansụl Iwu, otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ a họpụtara n'akụkụ Margret Mbeba na Nakatindi Yeta Nganga
Mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị na 1964, Kansụl Iwu ghọrọ Nzukọ Mba
Ọ tụfuru oche ya na ntuli aka 1968 ma mesịa bụrụ gọvanọ distrikti na odeakwụkwọ mpaghara UNIP na Copperbelt Province
Ester Uzoukwu bụ onye Naịjiria na-eme egwuregwu taekwondo na-asompi katigori ndi okenye umu nwanyi
O meriri ma rite ọla ọcha na 2015 All-Africa Games na katigori ndi 73kg
Ester Uzoukwu meriri ma rite ọla ọcha na 2015 All-Africa Games e mere na Brazzaville, Rịpọbụliiki nke Kọngọ
O sonyere na ihe omume nke 73kg
Esteri Tebandeke (amụrụ na 16 Mee, na afọ 1984) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Uganda, onye na-ese ihe nkiri, onye na'agba egwu na onye na-ahụ anya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Margaret Trowell School of Industrial and Fine Art na Mahadum Makerere
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri a na akpọ 'Sins of the Parents' (2008), Master on Duty (2009), Queen of Katwe (2016) na Her Broken Shadow (2016) bụ njem mbụ ya na akụkọ sayensị
A mụrụ Esteri na Kampala, Uganda, ọ bụkwa onye Teso
Ọ bụ nwa nke isii n'ime ụmụ asatọ na ezinụlọ ya ebiela na Uganda
Esteri gara St
Joseph's Girl's Secondary School na Uganda ma rụọ ọrụ na egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ na ịgba egwu

Esteri malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agba egwú nke oge a na afọ 2008 ma soro ụlọ ọrụ ịgba egwú dị iche iche na Uganda dị ka Keiga Dance Company, Stepping Stones dance company, Mutumizi dance Company, Guerrilla Dance Company na ndị ọzọ

O meela ihe ngosi na usoro nka dị iche iche dị ka; Dance Week Uganda, Dance Transmissions Festival (ihe ngosi ịgba egwú nke oge a kwa afọ), Bayimba International Festival of the Arts na Umoja International Festival na mbụ dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na onye nkuzi ruo afọ 3 iji kpọtụrụ ole na ole aha
Ọrụ ya abụghị naanị na Uganda kamakwa ọ na-etinye aka na ọrụ na Kenya, Rwanda, Madagascar, South Africa, Tanzania, United States of America, na Ethiopia
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na La Mama na mba 'New York' na afọ 2012, Artwater Village Theatre na afọ 2013 na New Orleans Fringe na afọ 2014
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kemgbe afọ 2008 na-eme n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri na Uganda

Ọrụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ gụnyere Maria Kizitoo na-eduzi onye na-eme ihe nkiri dị ka onye na-arịa ọrịa uche, egwuregwu nke prọfesọ Mahadum Brown, Erik Ehn banyere ikpe nke ndị nọn na-eme ka ogbugbu nke ndị Tutsis dị mfe n'oge mgbukpọ agbụrụ nke Rwanda
Ọ bụ onye isi na-eme ihe nkiri na Cooking Oil, egwuregwu nke onye edemede egwuregwu na-enweta ihe nrite Deborah Asiimwe, nke emere na Uganda na United States of America

Ọrụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ gụnyere onye isi mgbaka nwere nsogbu uche na mmepụta Ugandan nke The Body of a Woman as a Battlefield in the Bosnian War yana nwunye nwere nkụda mmụọ na The Marriage Chronicles Na ngwụcha afọ 2015, Esteri so otu ndị na-ese ihe gaa n'akụkụ ugwu nke Uganda iji chịkọta akụkọ ma nwee olileanya ịgbanwe ha ka ha bụrụ ihe nkiri nke a ga-egosi ndị na-ege ntị gburugburu ụwa

Ọrụ Story Circle, nke Jerry Stropnicky, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na United States duziri, nyere ya nnukwu nghọta banyere iji akụkọ dị ka usoro iji nyere ndị mmadụ aka ịnagide akụkụ dị iche iche nke ndụ dịka mmerụ ahụ
Ọ batakwara n'ịduzi ma rụọ ọrụ na ọrụ ihe nkiri, Afroman Spice site na Afroman ensemble, otu ihe nkiri ụmụ nwanyị niile

Ọrụ ahụ malitere na Kampala na June, na afo 2015 ma kemgbe ahụ, a na-eme ya na The Market for African Performing Arts (MASA) na Ivory Coast ma na-edebanye aha igosi ya na Rwanda, Tunisia na Niger na afo 2016

Dị ka onye nkuzi, ọ kwadoro oge ọzụzụ na ọrụ nka ndị ọzọ na ọchịchọ ya inweta ahụmịhe ndụ karịa ma kesaa ihe ọ maara na ndị ọzọ na gburugburu ọrụ ọkachamara na-akpali ya iso ndị mmadụ si n'akụkụ niile nke ndụ rụọ ọrụ
Ahụmahụ ya gụnyekwara ntụziaka ụmụaka n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche gburugburu obodo Kampala

Esteri nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi n'otu n'ime mmemme nke Maisha Film Lab program a Uganda-based non-profit film training initiative founded by award-winning director Mira Nair for emerging East African and South Asian filmmakers
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Judith Adong's Sins of the Parents na afo 2008 na Master on Duty na afo 2009 site na Joseph Ken Ssebaggala
Ọrụ ihe nkiri ọhụrụ ya bụ na mmepụta Walt Disney Pictures a ga-ewepụta n'oge na-adịghị anya, Queen of Katwe, nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-enweta onyinye Academy Lupita Nyongiao na David Oyelowo
N'ikwu okwu banyere ihe nkiri ahụ, Esteri kọwara mmetụta Eze Nwanyị Katwe nwere n'ebe ọ nọ n'okwu ndị a
'Tupu ihe nkiri ahụ, egwu m bụ nrọ m n'ihi na ha buru oke ibu
Ma ugbu a, egwu na-atụ m karịa ka ha buru ibu
Mira Nair, otu n'ime ihe kachasị mkpali ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri n'otu edemede na-adịbeghị anya kọwara ya dị ka 'onye na-enwu gbaa'
N'ihota ụkpụrụ a ma ama nke Mira Nair
'Ọ bụrụ na anyị anaghị akọ akụkọ nke anyị, ọ dịghị onye ọzọ ga-ekwu'
Iji mezuo nke ahụ, ọ na-agba mbọ ịzụlite akụkọ sitere n'ala nna ya, Uganda na kọntinent Afrịka nke na-ekwu maka isiokwu ndị dị mkpa n'ógbè ma na-arịọ mba ụwa
Ọ na-enyocha ohere nke ịzụlite ọdịnaya Ugandan na mmekorita ya na ndị okike dị iche iche na East Africa na karịa

Esteri emeela ihe nkiri ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ mmemme dịka Toronto International film festival, BFI London Film Festival, Luxor African Film Festival, Raindance Film Festival, Uganda Film Festival, Durban International Film Festival, Africa International Film Festival
Esteri so n'òtù na-ede akwụkwọ na usoro weebụ a na-emepụta na mmekorita ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri si Uganda, Kenya, Ghana na Germany
A gbara ọrụ a n'ebe dị na Accra, Ghana ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a
Little Black Dress, nke mbụ ya bụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke e sere na Nairobi, Kenya n'ọnwa Eprel na afo 2019
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Esteri na-atụ anya igosi ụwa ihe ọ pụtara ịbụ onye Uganda n'oge a
Esteri lụrụ kemgbe afọ 2011 na Samuel Tebandeke, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Uganda
Ọ bi na Kampala, Uganda ugbu a

Esther Agbaje (amụrụ na Machị 19, 1985) bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria-Amerịka na onye otu Minnesota House of Representatives
Onye otu Minnesota Democratic -Farmer-Labour Party (DFL), ọ na-anọchite anya District 59B, nke gụnyere akụkụ ugwu na etiti obodo Minneapolis na Hennepin County
Agbaje gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum George Washington na BA
na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Mahadum Pennsylvania na MPA, na Mahadim Harvard na JD
Agbaje jere ozi na United States Department of State dị ka onye ọrụ mba ọzọ
Ọ bụ onye ọka iwu na Ciresi Conlin LLP, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ikpe obodo na mmebi ahụike
A họpụtara Agbaje ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Minnesota House of Representatives na 2020, na-emeri onye nnọchianya Raymond Dehn
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Naijiria-Amerika mbụ a họpụtara na ndị omeiwu Minnesota

Esther Kelechi Agbarakwe bụ otu n'ime ṅdị na-akwalite ma na-ezisa ozi ihe gbasara ihu igwe n' ala Naijirịa amara maka mmeri ya na LEAP Africa nke asaa; Emume a na-eme kwa afọ ịji kwadoo ndị ntorobịa na-agbali n'ọchịchị na ngalaba dị icheiche n'afọ 2010
Agbarakwe gụrụ Chemistry na Mahadum Calabar
Ọ na - aguzi Master ugbu a na Mmekọ Nkwukọrịta nke Ọha na Mahadum Robert Gordon
Agbarakwe chọpụtara ọgbakọ ndị 'Nigeria Climate Coalition ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke General Assembly ndị ActionAid Nigeria
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ Youngers anọ ahọrọla isonye na-arụmaka ndị Elders + Youngers tupu nzukọ Rio + 20
O jeela ozi dị ka onye na - ahụ maka nkwado mba ụwa na Population Action International
Agbarakwe sonyere na nzukọ Mịnịsta ndọrọ ọchịchị nke High-Level Political Forum (HLPF) na Sustainable Development
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye ndụmọdụ gwara Amina J
Mohammed n’afọ 2015 mgbe ọ bụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Gburugburu ala Naịjirịa
Agbarakwe na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Climate na SDG Action Office nke Secretary General Envoy on Youth
N'afọ 2009, Agbarakwe nwetara ihe nrita nke Dekeyser & Friends Foundation na Germany
N’afọ 2010, Agbarakwe meriri na LEAP Africa 7th Annual Leadership Awards
Ahọputara ya na 2010 dika otu n'ime ndị Women Deliver100 Young Leaders bịa bụrụ otu n'ime ndị Commonwealth Youth Climate Fellow na November 2010
Ahoputara Agbarakwe maka Future Awards maka ime ọfụma na mgbasa ozi na 2011/2012 wee bụrụ onye otu Atlas Corps na Septemba 2012
N’afọ 2017 na Barcelona, e nyere Agbarakwe akara Crans Montana nke Ndị isi Ọhụụ nke Echi maka ọtụtụ ọ rụzuru n’ọchịchị
N'afọ 2012, Agbarakwe sonyere na arụmụka kwadoro na UNICEF banyere Mgbanwe ihu igwe ebe ọ na-akwado maka ikike ndị ntorobịa nwere ike itinye olu ha na mkparịta ụka ahụ
N'afọ 2015, o sonyere na mkparịta ụka nke ndi Guardian banyere ụzọ iji nwee ike ikwusara ụzọ mgbanwe ihu igwe ike

N'akụkụ nke nnọkọ nke ọgbakọ nke United Nations General Assembly, Agbarakwe na ndị ọrụ mgbanwe ihu igwe nke Nigeria dịka Hamzat Lawal, zutere Onye isi ala Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari ebe ha mere ikpe maka uru ndị na-eto eto na-eweta na mkparịta ụka ahụ
Esther Aghatise (amuru na abali iri-na ise n’onwa Eprel afọ 1985) bu nwaafọ Naijiria soo na egwuru egwuregwu nke a na akpọ long jumper
Esther Adongo Arunga, nke a makwaara dị ka Esther Timberlake, bụ onye ọka iwu na onye mpechite onu na onye bụbu onye mgbasa ozi telivishọn na redio si Kenya, onye bi ugbu a na Australia
Ọ lụrụ Quincy Timberlake na ya na ya bụ onye nchoputa nke PlaCenta Party (Platinum Centralizer na Unionist Party of Kenya)
Esther Arunga nwere ejima na ụmụnne isii ndị ọzọ
A zụlitere ya na Seventh-day Adventist

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Kenya High School, ebe o nwetara nzere bachelọ nkwukọrịta na iwu na Mahadum Wollongong na New South Wales, o laghachiri Kenya maka otu afọ na Kenya School of Law ma anabatara ya dị ka ọkàiwu na Nairobi n'afọ 2009
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye mgbasa ozi na onye nta akụkọ na 984 Capital FM na Nairobi na nke Kenya Television Network
Ọ ritere ihe nrite CHAT 2008 maka ezigbo Onye ngosi na onye nkwado Teen TV
N'afo 2009 Arunga sonyeere Ụka Mkpịsị aka nke Chukwu nke Joseph Hellon malitere, onye ikwu dị anya
Ọ lụrụ Wilson Malaba, bụ́ okenye chọọchị ahụ, ma ná mmalite 2010 kwụsịrị njikọ aka ahụ ma si n’ụlọ nne na nna ya pụọ gaa biri n’ụlọ chọọchị nwere Hellon na ọtụtụ ndị chọọchị ndị ọzọ
O kwuwo kemgbe na nne na nna ya chọrọ ịlụ ya na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

N'ọnwa Febụwarị ahụ, ya, Hellon, na Quincy Timberlake kwupụtara nguzobe nke PlaCenta Party (Platinum Centralizer na Unionist Party) nke Kenya na nnabata Hellon maka onye isi ala yana Arunga maka oche nke Karachuonyo Constituency na osote onye isi ala
Arunga gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọrụ ya dị ka arịlịka akụkọ na Kenya Television Network n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
N'abalị ahụ, ọtụtụ mmadụ metụtara ụka ahụ, tinyere arga na Hellon na ndị chọọchị,ka ejidere ma bo ebubo igwe otụ íwú akwadoghi ndị ka a
Emebiri kọmpụta na akurungwa ndị ọzọ, bukọrọ akwụkwọ ma jichie ụgbọ ala
Ya na Timberlake kwuru na e kewapụrụ ha na taa ha ahụhụ
Ọ mara ọkwa ikpe megide nne na nna ya, onye ogwọõ ndị isi mgbaka bu Dr
Frank Njenga, Attorney General na Kenya ndị uwe ojii maka mkpọrọ na-ezighị ezi na mmekpa ahụ
A tọhapụrụ Arunga mgbe ụbọchị abụọ gasịrị na 3 March 2010 o lụrụ Quincy Timberlake mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ; Otú ọ dị, o kwupụtala na Hellon mere emume ahụ n'oge ọzọ

N'ịbụ ndị na-eche na enweghị nchebe, ndị Timberlakes hapụrụ Kenya, ma site na Dubai wee gaa Australia, ebe as of July 2012[update] , ọ bụ onye ọka iwu na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke New South Wales wee nweta ikike ịbụ nwa amaala
O kwuputala na ya ga-azọ ọkwa ọchịchị na Kenya, na ọ ga-anabata onyinye sitere n'aka Al Jazeera iji kwado ihe omume ngosi
N’ọnwa Jun afọ 2014, nke okenye nke ụmụ nwoke abụọ ahụ nwụrụ mgbe o doro anya na ihe mberede mere n’ụlọ ha
N'ọnwa Septemba nke afọ ahụ, e boro di ya ebubo igbu ọchụ nke nwatakịrị ahụ, bụ nke o mesịrị kwuo na ọ bụghị ikpe n'ụlọikpe
E mechara boo Esther Timberlake ebubo dị ka onye ntinyeaka ma hapụ ya na mgbapụta
Ọ nyere ihe àmà ọhụrụ na-egosi na di ya ejiriwo usoro ọgwụgwọ agwọ nwa okoro ahụ ma kpachie afọ ya ugboro ugboro ma tụba ya ná mgbidi
A kọrọ na ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Chryslertte Provydence Timberlake
N'afọ 2016, a kọrọ na ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'otu ebe na Australia
Esther Ene Audu (amụrụ na Machị 22, 1986) bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa onye na- eme ihe nkiri Ọ bụ onye amaara nke ọma site n’ ihe nkiri ndị a Dinner (2016), Mystified (2017) na Order of the Ring (2013)

A mụrụ Esther Audu na abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'afọ 1986 na Ikeja Lagos n’ime ezi-na-ụlọ Maazị James Audu, onye soja lagoro ezumike nka nke rụrụ ọtụtụ n’ime ọrụ ya na Lagos ma biri na Ikeja Military Cantonment ebe amụrụ Audu na ụmụnne ya ise ndị ọzọ
Audu bụ ọdụ nwa n’ime ụmụ isii ezinụlọ ya bụrụ ndị Olamaboro nke Steeti Kogi, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Sekọndịrị nke nta ya na Lagos

N'afọ 2002, ezinaụlọ ha hapụrụ Lagos gawa Abuja, n'Abuja ka ọ gụchara akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma mesịa nweta nnabata ịmụ Business Management na Mahadum Jos, Plateau Steeti n'afọ 2006, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nweta BA Business Management na 2010
Esther malitere ọrụ ya kemgbe ọ nọ n' ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị; o kwuru na ị bụ onye mgbasa ozi bụ ọchichọ ya
N' ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị o soro n'otu Drama na Literary ebe ọ sonyere na eme ejije
Ka osinadị, na 1996, ọ so na ndị ahọpụtara ịnọchite anya Naịjirịa na kidafest na Ghana, site na ebe ahụ agụụ ya maka ime ihe nkiri malitere itolite ma kwụsịkwa nrọ ya ịbụ onye mgbasa ozi
O buru ụzọ pụta na fim ebe ọ bụ onye ndu aha ha bụ Ungodly romance na Sins of Rachael na Jos nke Alex Mouth kwuru na ọ bụ ihe nkiri izizi mbụ nke nyeere aka ịmalite ọrụ ya na Nollywood
Agbanyeghị, na Audu ka na-agụ akwụkwọ, o sonyere n' ihe nkiri akpọrọ Fatal Mistake Norbert Ajagu, dika onye na-esota onye isi
Esther lụrụ Philip Ojire onye oru ahia n' onye guzobere Shirt freak

O meriri African Open Port Louis U63kg n'af 2013
Na asọmpi African Judo Championship nke afọ 2008 na Agadir, Morocco, Augustine soro asọmpi 63kg wee rite ọla nchara

Esther Mwila Banda (amụrụ na 4 Nọvemba na afo 1958) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zambia
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu National Assembly maka Chililabombwe site na 2006 ruo 2016, ọ bụkwa osote minista n'etiti afọ 2011 na afo 2016
Banda gụrụ maka BA na sociology ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
O sonyere na ntuli aka nke afọ 2001 dị ka onye otu United Party for National Development na Chililabombwe, mana ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na onye otu Movement for Multi-Party Democracy Wamundila Muliokela
Na ntuli aka na afọ 2006, Banda bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa Patriotic Front ma merie Muliokela (onye bụ Minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa n'oge ahụ), na-aghọ onye omeiwu nke mpaghara ahụ
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na afo 2011, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote minista nke Gọọmentị Obodo, Ụlọ, Mmụta Mbido na Nchebe Gburugburu Ebe Obibi
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ ghọrọ osote minista na Ministry of Gender and Child Development nke e guzobere ọhụrụ
N'ọnwa Febụwarị na afọ 2015 ọ ghọrọ osote minista na-ahụ maka njem nleta na nka mgbe Edgar Lungu ghọrọ onye isi ala
O jikwa ọkwa onye isi oche ụmụ nwanyị nke mba n'ime Patriotic Front
Banda agbaghị ọsọ na ntuli aka nke afọ 2016, onye na-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu nke PF bụ Richard Musukwa nọchiri ya dị ka onye omeiwu Chililabombwe
Esther Chebet (amụrụ na 10 Septemba n'afọ 1997) bụ onye Uganda na-agba ọsọ n'etiti
O mechara nke ise na 2019 African Games (1500 m)
Na 2019 World Cross Country Championships nke emere na Aarhus, Denmark, ọ mechara nke iri na anọ na asọmupi ndị okenye wee merie ọla nchara na asọmupi otu
Ọ sonyere na 2016 World U20 Championships (800 m), 2017 World Championships (1500 m) na 2019 World Championships (500 m) n'erughị nke ikpeazụ

Oge kachasị mma ya bụ 2 031 nkeji na mita 800, nke o nwetara na Septemba 2016 na Eldoret; 4 0290 nkeji na mita 1500, nke o mere na Mee 2019 na Nanjing; na 4 2816 nkeji na mile run, nke o ruru na July 2017 na Lausanne
Na ọnwa June n'afọ 2021, ọ ruru eru ịnọchite anya Uganda na 2020 Summer Olympics

Esther G
Frame (née, Gordon; July 10, 1840 - June 11, 1920) bụ onye ozi America na onye na-ezisa ozi ọma
Ọ bụ onye ụkọchukwu nke Society of Friends ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ, na-esokarị ndị ụkọchụ nke okpukpe ndị ọzọ
The Reminiscences of Nathan T
Frame and Esther G
Frame (Cleveland, Ohio, The Britton Printing Co, 1907), jere ozi dị ka atụmatụ nke ọrụ ha na-ekpuchi oge 1868 ruo 1906
A mụrụ Esther Ellen Gordon na Washington, Indiana, na July 10, 1840
A mụrụ nna ya na Hamilton County, Ohio, ndị nna nna ya si na Scottish Highlands n'ihe dị ka afọ 1720, ha bụkwa ndị Scotch-Irish
Ha bụ ụmụ nke Clan Gordon, bụ ndị, ruo ọtụtụ afọ, lụrụ naanị Clan Douglas

Nna nna Gordon gụrụ akwụkwọ maka onye ụkọchukwu Presbyterian Scotch, mana ọ hapụrụ òtù ahụ wee sonye na Baptists, n'ihi na enweghị ndị Presbyterians Scotch ebe ọ na-akụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ, n'ezie ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị nkụzi mbụ, ma kụzie ọtụtụ afọ na Warren County, Ohio na Montgomery County, Ohio, nakwa na Steeti Indiana
Nne nne Gordon bụ McGary ma si n'akụkụ ugwu nke Ireland, General Grant bụkwa nwa nwanne nne nne Gordon
Nna nna McGary kwusara ozi ọma ruo mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri itoolu
Na nwata, nna ya biri na Centerville, Indiana, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu
Site na Centerville ọ kwagara Thorntown, Indiana, na 1854, nọchitere anya Boone County na Indiana Legislature
N'afọ 1856, ọ gara Salem, Iowa, ebe a nabatara ya n'ụlọikpe dị ka onye ọka iwu
Deborah Mendenhall, Oriakụ A mụrụ nne Frame na New Garden, Guilford County, North Carolina
Ndị ya nwere mmasị n'ọrụ mmụta
Ha bụ ndị Bekee na England, aha ha bụ Milden; site na aha ala ha, ma ọ bụ manor 'Milden-Hall'
Mana mgbe ha rutere na US, aha ahụ ghọrọ Mendenhall, nke a ka maara ha
Ndị nne ya si Guilford County, nso Greensboro, North Carolina, gaa Wayne County, Indiana
Ha bụ ndị otu Society of Friends
Nne nne Mendenhall bụ okenye na Friends Church
Mgbe Esther dị afọ anọ, ezinụlọ ahụ si Wayne County, Indiana, gaa Salem, Iowa
Mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ ya - ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye maka ụmụaka
Ka e mesịrị, ọ gara seminarị ebe Reuben Dorland, enyi, bụ onyeisi
Site na Salem, Iowa, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Boone County, Indiana
N'ebe ahụ, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye nke nwunye onye ụkọchukwu Presbyterian kụziiri
Mgbe ahụ, site na nhọrọ, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Friends, 1 mile (16 km) site na Thorntown
Mgbe ndị Metọdist wuru ụlọ akwụkwọ ha na Thorntown, ndị mụrụ Esther chere na ọ ga-aka mma na ọ gafere ebe ahụ
Ọ sonyekwara na Methodist Episcopal Church
Ọ gara Blue River Seminary na mpaghara ndịda Indiana, nwanne ya nwoke, Luther Gordon, bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ a
Nna Esther bụ onye otu Indiana State Legislature n'oge ahụ
Afọ ole na ole mgbe nke a gasịrị, ha kwagara Salem, Iowa, ebe Esther zutere Nathan Frame
Na Machị, 1857, ọ lụrụ Nathan T
Frame, nke Salem, Iowa
Esther na-arụ ọrụ ugbo n'oge opupu ihe ubi na oge okpomọkụ, ma ọ bụ ruo mgbe oge owuwe ihe ubi gwụrụ, ma na-akụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ n'oge oyi - ọnwa atọ ma ọ bụ anọ na-abụkarị
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ha nwetara ego zuru ezu iji zụta ụlọ n'obodo Salem, Iowa, ma gaa n'ihu na-aga nzukọ Metọdist
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ, otu n'ime ha, nwa nwoke, Hiram, nwụrụ na nwa ọhụrụ, na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Itasca M, na Esther Corinne
Esther frequently went to Quaker meetings,especially when some travelling friend came along and had an appointed meeting
About this time Esther health became poor and she went to Indiana taking corrinne the baby with her and leaving itasca with Nathan at Salem
Esther had already made known to her mother that she felt called to preach and it had become known among some of the prominent members of the church
Some sympathized with her and encouraged he while other's did not think it was a woman's place to preach yet all encouraged her in gospel work
Ozugbo ọ gbasiri ike, Esther lọtara n'ụlọ
Ahụike ya n'oge a dị oke njọ ma ọ na-ada n'ala mgbe niile n'ihi isi ọwụwa
N'inwe mmetụta na a kpọrọ ya ikwusa ozi ọma nakwa na ndị Metọdist agaghị ahọpụta ya, ọ sonyeere Society of Friends ma bụrụ onye ha họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye ozi
Ọ malitere ozi ya na New Garden Friends Meeting, na Richmond, Indiana, 1869
Ozi ya abụghị naanị na ụka nke ya
Ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ, ya na di ya, onye bụ onye ụkọchukwu, kwusara ozi ọma dị ka onye na-ezisa ozi ọma n'etiti ụka niile dị na US
N'afọ 1901, o nwere usoro nzukọ na Whittier, California
Malite na 1880, ọ gara biri na Jamestown, Ohio

Frame bikwa na El Paso, Texas ruo ọtụtụ afọ, n'ime afọ ndị ikpeazụ nke oge ndụ di ya na ebe obibi na El Paso nke nwa ya nwanyị, onye di ya bụ onyeisi ngalaba nke ihe ndị dị ndụ na geology na State College (nke bụzi Mahadum Texas na El Paso) ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 20

Esther Mahlangu (a mụrụ ya n'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1935) bụ onye South Africa na-ese ihe site na mba Ndebele
A maara ya maka nnukwu ihe osise ya nke oge a nke na-atụ aka n'ihe nketa Ndebele ya
Mahadum Johannesburg nyere Esther Mahlangu nzere doctorate (), 9 Eprel 2018
A mụrụ Esther Nikwambi Mahlangu na 11 Nọvemba 1935 n'ugbo dị na mpụga Middelburg, Mpumalanga, South Africa, ọ bụkwa nke ndị South Ndebele

Mahlangu malitere eserese mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, nne ya na nne nne ya kụziiri ya nkà nke eserese eserese, na-agbaso ọdịnala nke ndị obodo ya bụ South Ndebele maka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ iji see mpụta ụlọ
Ọ bụ n'omenala ọdịbendị a ka Mahlangu malitere njem nka ya
O nwere ụmụnne asatọ tọrọ ya, nke mejupụtara ụmụ nwoke isii na ụmụ nwanyị atọ (gụnyere ya)
Ya na di ya nwere ụmụ nwoke atọ
Mgbe e mesịrị, di ya na ụmụ ya nwoke abụọ n'ime ụmụ ya atọ nwụnahụrụ ya
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ na ụlọ ihe nkiri nka nke Botshabelo tupu ọ ghọọ onye na-ese ihe
A maara ya maka ịbụ ụmụ nwanyị Ndebele mbụ hapụrụ South Afrika
Ihe osise Mahlangu na-ezo aka n'ụdị ejiji na ọla nke ndị Ndebele
Usoro ndị ọ na-eji na-abụkarị ndị na-acha agba na geometric
Ihe osise ya buru ibuEsther Mahlangu jiri brushes e ji ajị ọkụkọ mee
A maara ya maka ịsụgharị ma dochie ihu ọdịnala maka ihe osise Ndebele, mgbidi adobe cow-dung, na akwa, na n'ikpeazụ, alloys metal
Usoro akara aka nke Mahlangu nke akara ọcha nwere akara setịpụrụ diagonally ma ọ bụ kpụọ dị ka chevrons
Ọ na-etinye aka na ọrụ bead ya niile na beads na mbido “E M'
O nwetara onyinye mbụ nke United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR) South Africa NGO na ihe nrite otutu ọnye enyemaka n'afọ 2019
“Ihe mejupụtara ya dị nkọ, na-etinye aka ma dị mgbagwoju anya karịa nke ndị ọgbọ ya, ókèala dị mgbagwoju anya
O nwere ọchịchọ ịhazi ụkpụrụ ya
(Boyd)
Mahlangu bu ụzọ nweta nlebara anya mba ụwa n'afọ 1989 na ngosi nka nke Europe akpọrọ Magiciens de la terre (Ndị Anwansi nke Ụwa)
Mgbe e mesịrị n'afọ 1991, BMW nyere ya ọrụ ịmepụta ụgbọ ala nka, dị ka ndị ọzọ BMW Art Car mepụtara tupu (gụnyere Andy Warhol, David Hockney na Frank Stella)
Ụgbọala ahụ, BMW 525i, bụ 'ụgbọala nka nke Afrịka' mbụ ma jiri ihe osise nke ebo Ndebele sere
Ọ bụ onye mbụ na-abụghị onye ọdịda anyanwụ na nwanyị mepụtara otu n'ime ụgbọala nka ndị a
E mechara gosipụta ụgbọala ahụ na National Museum of Women in the Arts na Washington, DC n'afọ 1994
E gosikwara ya na British Museum, London n'afọ 2017

* White ịdị ọcha na ịhụnanya ime mmụọ

ulu valentine, nke a na-akpọ Ibheqe, triangles na ngwakọta dị iche iche White, Red, Blue

E jidere onye a na-enyo enyo ma tinye ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ruo Eprel 20, 2022 maka akwụkwọ mgbapụta
A tọhapụrụ Accomplice na mgbapụta ma nwee ikpe n'ụlọ ikpe na Mee 10
Achọpụtaghị ozi ọzọ
N'agbata afọ 1980 ya n'afọ 1991 ọ bụ onye bi na Botshabelo Historical Village open-air museum, nke na-egosi ma na-akụziri ndị ọbịa banyere omenala Ndebele

E mepụtakwara atụmatụ ya n'afọ 1997 na ọdụ ụgbọ elu British Airways na n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, onye na-ese ihe jiri otu usoro ahụ na-ese ihe na Fiat narị ise ọhụrụ n'oge ngosi 'Why Africa?' (2007, Turin)
Mahlangu bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka nke a na-egosipụtakarị nka ya na mba ụwa
Ọrụ ya dị na nnukwu nchịkọta onwe ya gụnyere nke The Contemporary African Art Collection (CAAC) nke Jean Pigozzi na ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke ọdịda anyanwụ
N'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe a ma ama na mba ụwa, Esther Mahalangu ka bi ugbu a n'obodo ya na mmekọrịta chiri anya na omenala ya
Mahlangu na-agbaso ọdịnala obodo nke a na-enyefe ụdị usoro eserese a n'ime ezinụlọ, na-ekwurịta okwu, na-amụta ma na-ebufe naanị site n'aka ụmụ nwanyị (n'oge gara aga)
Ihe osise ndị a nwere njikọ chiri anya na ọdịnala oge ochie nke ịchọ ụlọ mma n'oge emume ngafe maka ụmụ nwoke
N'agbata afọ iri na asatọ na afọ iri abụọ, ndị ntorobịa nke ebo ahụ na-aga 'ụlọ akwụkwọ ibi úgwù', emume nke na-akwado na ha gafere ogo mmadụ
Iji mee emume a, ụmụ nwanyị na-eji nkwadebe nsị ehi na ihe ndị sitere n'okike na-edozi n'ime na n'èzí ụlọ ha
A na-etinyekwa ihe osise acrylic na-acha ọkụ na atụmatụ ndị akara ojii depụtara
Ọ bụ ezie na o yiri ka ọ dị mfe, a na-egosipụta abstraction geometric nke eserese ndị a na-ekpughe site na mmegharị na symmetry nke ọdịdị dị mfe dị otú ahụ nke na-eme ka ọrụ ahụ dum dị mgbagwoju anya
Nkà nke Esther Mahlangu na-egosipụta esemokwu dị n'etiti obodo na ụwa, n'etiti arịlịka na nkewa
N'agbanyeghị na ọ nọgidere na-eji otu 'okwu nka' jikọtara ya na ọdịnala ya, Mahlangu etinyela atụmatụ ndị ahụ na ihe dị iche iche gụnyere akwa, ihe ọkpụkpụ, ụrọ, ụgbọala na ụgbọelu
Ọ rụkọkwara ọrụ na ụdị dị iche iche dịka BMW, Fiat, EYTYS, Melissa's, Beleverde, British Museum na Rolls Royce
Esther Mahlangu's 1991 BMW Artcar nọ na-ele anya na British Museum dị ka akụkụ nke 'South Africa nka nke mba', site na 27 Ọktoba 2016 - 27 Febụwarị 2017
E gosipụtara usoro BMW Individual 7 ọhụrụ nke nwere osisi pụrụ iche nke ọ sere na Frieze Art Fair na 2016 na ihe ngosi nke ọrụ BMW na 34FineArt haziri
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ rụchara mbipụta pụrụ iche nke Belvedere Vodka karama imewe (50% nke uru niile iji nyere aka ịlụso nje HIV / AIDS ọgụ na Africa)
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe n'ụlọ, Mahlangu nyere ọrụ na 2014 site na Virginia Museum of Fine Arts iji mepụta nnukwu ọrụ nka abụọ
Mahlangu na-eduzi ụlọ akwụkwọ nke na-akụziri ụmụ agbọghọ na-eto eto ọ bụghị naanị eserese kamakwa usoro nke eserese eserese na ụfọdụ nhazi nke beads
Omenala ahụ abụghị ihe na-adịghị agbanwe agbanwe
Dị ka ọrụ nke otu Mahlangu na-atụ aro, 'omenala' bụ ubi na-agagharị agagharị, nke na-adabere n'ọdịnihu ma dị njikere itinye mkpali dị iche iche

N'ezie, ọ bụ ezie na Saụt Afrịka bụ ugbu a otu n'ime mba Afrịka nke nwere ike ime ka ọrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe na mba ha dị mfe ma na mba ụwa site na ihe omume a na-eme kwa afọ na Johannesburg, ọrụ Esther Mahlangu nwere obi ike karị n'ihi na a mụrụ ya ma tolite na ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Esther Mahlangu arụsiela ọrụ ike na-ekpughe ma na-azụlite talent ya na-eme njem gburugburu ụwa, ọ na-enwekwa mmasị ịkọrọ ọgbọ na-eto eto ihe ọmụma ya ka o wee hapụ ihe nketa nke na-adị ndụ ruo ọgbọ ndị na-abịanụ
Na 19 Machị 2022 Mahlangu bụ onye ohi ụlọ ebe a wakporo ya ma wakpoo ya, e zuru ụlọ ya ihe onwunwe ya gụnyere égbè na ego a na-akọwaghị

Mpụ ahụ kpalitere iwe na-eme ka a mara banyere ọnụ ọgụgụ mpụ dị elu na South Africa ma ndị uwe ojii South Africa malitere ịchụ nta mmadụ iji jide onye omekome ahụE jidere onye a na-enyo enyo ma tinye ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ruo Eprel 20, 2022 maka akwụkwọ mgbapụta

Esther Mbulakubuza Mbayo (née Esther Mbulakabuza), bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ Minista nke Onye isi ala na Kọmitii Ugandan
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 6 June 2016, na-anọchi Frank Tumwebaze, onye a họpụtara dị ka Ministry of Information Information Technology and Communication
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda, dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Luuka District
A mụrụ ya na Luuka District nke oge a, na mpaghara Busoga, na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ nke Uganda, na 27 Eprel 1971
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Wanyange Girls' School maka agụmakwụkwọ O-Level na A-Level
Ọ gara Mahadum Makerere, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2005, na Bachelor of Commerce, na ọkachamara na ndekọ ego
O nwekwara asambodo nke Institute of Chartered Secretaries and Administrators nyere ya
N'afọ 1997, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha nke Transocean Uganda Limited
Site na Nọvemba 1999 ruo 2002, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-enyere aka na Lonrho Motors Uganda Limited, ụlọ ahịa na-ere ụgbọala na Kampala
Site na Jenụwarị 2003 ruo Febụwarị 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego na Lonrho Motors
Ọ gara rụọ ọrụ na Commercial Firms Uganda Limited dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego, site n'April 2006 ruo August 2007
N'otu oge ahụ, site na Septemba 2001 ruo June 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego na Socket Works Uganda Limited
Site na Febụwarị 2008 ruo Disemba 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego na Cooper Motor Corporation Uganda
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Luuka District Woman nke ndị omeiwu na ntuli aka nke afọ 2016, na-emeri Evelyn Kaabule
O meriri Kaabule na mbụ na ntuli aka NRM
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Juun afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na isii, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Onye isi ala

Ọ na-eje ozi n'otu oge ahụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke Njikọ Ụmụ nwanyị nke distrikti na pati ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na-achị na dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke Busoga Women Leader Association
Esther Mbayo lụrụ George William Mbayo ma di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ atọ

A mụrụ Esther na Kenya ihe dị ka afọ 1987
Mgbe ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na mpaghara , ọ debanyere aha na Pangani Girls Secondiri
Skul, na Nairobi County, ebe ọ gụchara high school Diploma
A labatara ya na Mahadum Nairobi, ebe ọ gụchara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na njinia njinia
Ọ jikwa Diploma na Chinese Proficiency, Ọwe tara na Confucius Institute dị na Mahadum Nairobi
