Euodia Samson (a mụrụ n'afọ 1970), bụ onye South Afrika na-eme ihe nkiri na onye TV
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ na usoro telivishọn dịka; SOS, Arendsvlei, Big Okes, Madam & Eve na Fishy Feshuns
A mụrụ Euodia Samson na afo 1970 na Cape Flats, Cape Town, South Afrika
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ sonyeere ndị otu ihe nkiri na Lavender Hill
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na Baxter Theatre
N'oge a, Mavis Taylor nyere ya bursary iji gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Town (UCT)
Mgbe ahụ na afo1993, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na Performer's Diploma in Speech and Drama na UCT
Ọ zutere di ya n'afọ 1994 bụ onye injinia ụda na Baxter n'oge ahụ
Di na nwunye a nwere ụmụ nwoke atọ
N'oge ndụ ya na UCT, ọ rụrụ ihe nkiri dịka Romeo na Juliet, Othello, The Cherry Orchard, Antigone na Animal Farm
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Cape Performing Arts Board (CAPAB), na mmemme ụlọ akwụkwọ ha a na-akpọ 'War on Waste'

N'afọ ndị bu ya ụzọ, ọ gara n'ihu na-apụta na ogbo ma e wezụga sinima na telivishọn, Euodia mekwara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka; Freaks, A Winter's Tale, A Midsummer Night's Dream, Dying Breed na Sister Breyani, Dying Breed (CAPAB 1993), Suip! (1993), The Winter's Tale (1997), Ons Hou Konsert (1999), Buckingham Palace, District Six (2000-2001), Vatmaar (2002 na afo 2003), Die Joseph en Mary Affair (2007 na afo 2008), Sister Breyani (2007 na afo 2009)
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Roxy' maka Baxter Theatre na dị ka 'Mustardseed' na 1995 mmepụta nke A Midsummer Night's Dream nke Maynardville mepụtara
N'afọ 1995, o mere ihe nkiri izizi na ihe nkiri vidio The Pink Leather Chair ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke 'Gloria'
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 1996, o mere ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ na usoro Tussen Duiwels ma rụọ ọrụ 'Gawa September'
N'afọ 1997, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Amina Davids' na SABC2 comedy drama Onder Draai die Duiwel Rond N'afọ 2003, Euodia rụrụ ọrụ 'Christina' na oge nke atọ nke SABC2 comedy Fishy Fêshuns
N'afọ 2006, o mere ihe nkiri Heartlines 'The Piano' na ọrụ 'Elsie Daniels'
N'afọ 2011, o mere ihe nkiri Black Butterflies na ọrụ 'nwanyị Alakụba'
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ sonyeere usoro ihe nkiri SABC2 dị iche iche Colour TV ma rụọ ọtụtụ ọrụ
Ka ọ dịgodị, o kwukwara okwu na redio Goud en Silwer maka SABC N'afọ 2015, ya na Tim Noakes Foundation na Groote Schuur Hospital doctor Hassina Kajee jikọrọ aka
Ha duziri mmemme Banting na Ocean View

E wezụga ha, ọ pụtakwara na usoro telivishọn dị ka SOS, Big Okes, Madam & Eve, niile telecast na etv wee na usoro Backstage, Tussen Duiwels, Newshounds na Khululeka N'afọ ndị bu ya ụzọ, o mere ihe nkiri dịka; Cape of Good Hope, Ali Barber, na Crossroads N'afọ 2017, Euodia pụtara na usoro atọ dị ka 'Sharifa Cassim' na danZ!, dị ka 'Fiona Abrahams' na Waterfront na dị ka 'Gevangenis se 'Ma' na Die Byl N'afọ 2018, ọ pụtara na kykNET & kie telenovela Arendsvlei
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ahụ ruo oge atọ n'usoro
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ sonyeere oge atọ Projek Dina, Projek Dina na Sara se Geheim na 2020
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Zainab Petersen' na ihe nkiri Twisted Christmas
Euphrase Kezilahabi (13 Eprel 1944 9 Jenụwarị 2020) bụ onye Tanzania na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, na-ede uri, na ọkà mmụta
A mụrụ ya na Ukerewe, Tanganyika (nke dị na Tanzania ugbu a), ọ rụrụ ọrụ ikpeazụ na Mahadum Botswana, dịka osote prọfesọ na Ngalaba Asụsụ Africa (nke bụzi Ngalaba Ọdịbendị Africa)
O dere na Swahili, ma kwuo okwu banyere isiokwu ndị dịka 'Aesthetic Ambivalence in Modern Swahili' na 'The Concept of the Hero in African Fiction'
Euphrasie Kandeke bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Burundi

Jean-Baptiste Bagaza họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ajụjụ ụmụ nwanyị n'afọ 1982 (ụfọdụ akwụkwọ na-ekwu na ọ were ọnọdụ ahụ n'afọ 1974Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ Caritas Mategeko Karadereye, onye n'oge ahụ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya; ha abụọ bụ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ jere ozi na kansụl Burundi
Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa ya ruo na afọ 1987
N'oge ọrụ ya, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke ndi Burundian Women's Federation, ọ bụkwa onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Union for National Progress
E mechara tụọ ya mkpọrọ, e jidere ya n'abalị tupu nnupụisi nke afọ 1987; n'etiti mmejọ ya, a na-atụ aro na ndị agha kwesịrị ịdị obere
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, a na-enye ya Fanta lemonade agwakọta na nnu, n'etiti ihe isi ike ndị ọzọ
Kandeke bụ onye Tutsi
Euplectes franciscanus
Euroclydon (ma ọ bụ na Latin Euroaquilo) bụ ifufe na-efe n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke na-efe na Mediterenian, karịsịa n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ na ógè oyi
Ọ bụ Gregalia (Gregale) ma ọ bụ Levanter nkè ógè a

Site n'okwu Grik ógè ochie eurokludōn [εὐροκλύδωνδων], site na Euros (Eurus, nké pụtara ifufe ọwụwa anyanwụ) na ma ọ bụ okwu Grik oge ochie akulōn (akylōn, nke pụtara ikuku ugwu), ma ọ bụ kludon (nké pụtara ebili mmiri na-apụta site na ngwaa kluzo nké pụtara ịgbọ) ma ọ bụ Okwu Latin aquilō (aquilon)
Euroclydon ekwesịghị ịgbagwoju anya na okwu nor'easter, nke bụ usoro oké ifufe dị íchè nke na-emepụta n'akụkụ ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke United States
Europactor Algeria Spa
bụ mkpụrụ nke mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ Algeria Sofare Spa
Nke bụ enyemaka nke The Enmtp Group na ụlọ ọrụ Spanish Europactor SL

Na Jenụwarị afọ 2008, Enmtp malitere mkparịta ụka na Europactor SL nke dị na Zaragoza, iji mepụta ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ nke dị na Aïn Smara Constantine, n'ọnwa Eprel nke otu afọ ahụ, a bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nke ndị nwere òkè SOFARE Spa (60%) na Europactor L (40%)
Na 2013 ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị njikere wee malite ịmepụta ọtụtụ ụdị nke rollers okporo ụzọ

Ụlọ ọrụ Aïn Smara na-arụpụta ọtụtụ ụdị maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ise ụdị ise nke Single drum compactors, site na 3 ruo 20 ton, na otu ụdị compactors okpukpu abụọ drum 12 tọn, ụdị niile na-eji engines nke ọhụrụ nso nke mmiri jụrụ engines si
ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta engine nke Oued Hamimine na Constantine
Obodo Békè' bu he ndi Igbo kpowa ala ukwu ndi ocha ana-kpo Europe
O soto Asia na Afrịka n'imerime madu bi la ya
Eva Habil (إيفا هابيل na Arabic) bụ onye ọka iwu Ijipt
N'afọ 2008, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ bụ onyeisi obodo Ijipt mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi obodo Kom Buha, obodo dị na Upper-Egypt nke nwere ihe dị ka mmadụ 10,000
A họpụtara ya karịa ụmụ nwoke ise, gụnyere nwanne ya nwoke
A mụrụ Habil na Kom Buha
Dị ka ọtụtụ ndị bi n'obodo ahụ, ọ bụ Onye Kraịst Coptic
Nna ya bụ onye isi obodo ebe ahụ ruo n'afọ 2002
Ọ gụrụ ma rụọ ọrụ iwu na mpaghara Cairo, ọ bụkwa onye otu National Democratic Party
Eva Naomi Hodgson (Ọktoba 9, 1924 - Mee 29, 2020) bụ onye Bermuda na-eme ihe, onye edemede, onye isi otu, na onye nkuzi
A maara ya maka mbọ ọ na-agba ịlụso ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ọgụ na Bermuda, site n'oge ịkpa ókè ruo na narị afọ nke 21
Ụfọdụ ndị kpọrọ Hodgson onye na-akpata nsogbu maka echiche ya na-enweghị nkwekọrịta
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche mbụ nke Amalgamated Bermuda Union of Teachers ma dee akwụkwọ anọ gbasara akụkọ agbụrụ na ọrụ nke mba ya
A mụrụ Hodgson na 1924 n'ezinụlọ biri na obodo Crawl na Hamilton Parish, Bermuda, ruo ọtụtụ ọgbọ
A zụlitere ya n'òtù Brethren evangelical ma nọgide bụrụ Onye Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi n'oge ndụ ya niile
Nne na nna ya, Harold na Ilene Hodgson, nwere ụmụ isii; nne ya nwụrụ na nwata na 1942
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Berkeley Institute, Hodgson gara Mahadum Queen na Ontario na agụmakwụkwọ gọọmentị
Ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, Hodgson laghachiri Bermuda na 1948 iji kụzie na Berkeley Institute
Mgbe otu afọ nke nkuzi gasịrị, ọ hapụrụ ọzọ iji nweta diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum London
O mechara laghachi n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ maka nzere nsọpụrụ na geography
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Bermuda na 1959, Hodgson gara n'ihu na-akụzi na Berkeley
N'afọ 1967, ọ gara United States ịmụ ihe na Mahadum Columbia
O nwetara nzere masta abụọ wee soro PhD
na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Africa na Africa America na 1980
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gara rụọ ọrụ na Essex County College na New Jersey, ebe ọ ghọrọ onyeisi oche nke ngalaba akụkọ ihe mere eme na 1978
Ọ kụzikwaara nwa oge na College of Staten Island na Mahadum Rutgers
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị nzere doctoral ya, Hodgson laghachiri Bermuda ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nduzi ụlọ akwụkwọ

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nhazi akụkọ ihe mere eme na nchekwa ọdịbendị na Ministry of Education site na 1983 ruo 1990, nke gụnyere ma ilekọta mmemme akụkọ ihe mere mere eme na ịrụ ọrụ iji webata ikike mmadụ n'ime usoro ọmụmụ ụlọ akwụkwọ
Hodgson dere akwụkwọ mbụ ya, Second Class Citizens, First Class Men, na 1963
N'ịbụ nke Bermuda Union of Teachers kwadoro, akwụkwọ ahụ tụlere mgbanwe na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọha mmadụ nke Bermuda site na 1953 ruo 1963
O nyere aka na nchịkọta 1974 Massa Day Dead?- Black Moods in the Caribbean, na-ede banyere 'Bermuda na Search for Blackness'

Akwụkwọ ya ndị ọzọ, niile na-ekwu maka akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị isi ojii na Bermuda, bụ A Storm in a Teacup (1989), The Joe Mills Story (1995), na The Experience of Racism in Bermuda and in Its Wider Context (2008)
Dị ka onye nkuzi na Berkeley na mbido afọ 1960, Hodgson ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Bermuda Union of Teachers, otu ndị nkuzi ojii
N'afọ 1965, òtù ndị nkuzi abụọ ahụ jikọtara ọnụ, ọ ghọkwara onye isi oche mbụ nke Amalgamated Bermuda Union of Teachers
Hodgson bụ onye otu mbụ nke Kansụl ndụmọdụ mmekọrịta ọrụ gọọmentị
E mechara nye ya Russell Award site na World Confederation of Organizations of the Teaching Profession maka ọrụ ya na ndị nkuzi

Hodgson kwuru na ahụmịhe ya na 1940s na '50s bi na Canada na England, nke bụ ebe ndị a na-adịghị ekewapụ - ọ dịkarịa ala n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro - mere ka ọ mara banyere ikpe na-ezighị ezi agbụrụ ọ hụrụ ma nwee na Bermuda
Mgbe ọ laghachiri n'ala nna ya, ọ malitere ikwu okwu megide enweghị nhata; a maara ya maka 'ọnọdụ siri ike ya megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ'
Ọ malitere ide akwụkwọ ozi nye onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Bermuda Recorder na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ
Hodgson ghọrọ onye na-enye aka ogologo oge na peeji akwụkwọ ozi nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Bermudian, na-enyere aka ịkpụzi mkparịta ụka gbasara agbụrụ na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na mba ahụ
N'afọ ndị 1960, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kọmitii maka Nnwere Onwe Ndị Ntorobịa Ụwa Nile, nke lụrụ ọgụ maka ikike ịtụ vootu hà nhata
Ndị Bermuda ka nọ n'okpuru mgbochi ịtụ vootu siri ike dabere na ihe onwunwe, ndị ọchụnta ego ọcha dị ike na-achịkwa ndị omeiwu
Ọrụ ya na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nyere aka mee ka e guzobe Commission for Unity and Racial Equality na 1990s, nke e mesịrị tinye na Human Rights Commission
N'afọ 1992, o guzobere National Association of Reconciliation, otu nzukọ nke nyere aka mee ka mkparịta ụka mba gbasara agbụrụ n'ime afọ iri na ise nke ịdị adị ya

Hodgson bụ onye otu Progressive Labour Party site na mmalite ya na 1963, mana ọ gbochighị onwe ya ịkatọ ndị otu nke ya na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị isi obodo ndị ọzọ, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ ndị iro n'ụzọ

A na-amanye ya ugboro ugboro ka ọ gbaa ọsọ maka ọkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'onwe ya mana ọ jụrụ mgbe niile, ebe ọ hụrụ ihe ọ ghọtara dị ka ọdịda na nkwekọrịta nke ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere echiche mgbe a họpụtara ha
Ndị enyi ya na ndị ezinụlọ ya kwupụtara nkwenye na ọ tara ahụhụ n'ọrụ nkuzi ya n'ihi ikwu okwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya
O tinyere akwụkwọ ọtụtụ ugboro ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Bermuda College ma nyefee ya maka ndị mba ọzọ na-erughị eru
A na-akatọkarị ya maka ịlụ ọgụ ma ọ bụ na-ese okwu, na maka ilekwasị anya na agbụrụ
Ndị na-akatọ ya kpọrọ ya onye na-akpata nsogbu ma bo ya ebubo na ọ na-ele anya azụ ka ọnọdụ na-akawanye mma maka ndị Bermuda ojii

Mana Hodgson jụrụ inwe afọ ojuju na njedebe nke ịkpa ókè nke gọọmentị na ịrịgo n'ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ndị Bermudians ojii, na-ekwu maka echiche agbụrụ na-aga n'ihu n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị Bermudian na ọdịiche na-aga nke ọma na mba ahụ

Ọ jikọtara onwe ya na òtù ndị ọhụrụ dị ka Citizens Uprooting Racism na Bermuda, nke ọ jere ozi ruo 2018, ma gaa n'ihu na-agba mbọ maka ime ihe ziri ezi ma na-ata gọọmentị ahụhụ maka enweghị ezigbo ọganihu ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
A kpọrọ Hodgson aha na Order of the British Empire na 2012 New Year Honors maka ọrụ ya na-ejere obodo Bermuda ozi
Ọ nwụrụ na Mee 2020 mgbe ọ dị afọ 95
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, onye bụbu praịm minista Craig Cannonier toro ya dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị na-eme mkpọsa maka ikike ọha na eze na Bermuda'
Eva Elisabeth Moltesen née Hällström (1871-1934) bụ onye edemede Finnish-Danish na onye na-eme udo
N'afọ 1896, ọ kwagara Denmark iji gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya, lụọ onye Dane ma biri ebe ahụ
O bipụtara akwụkwọ edemede ya na Finnish na Danish, mee ka ndị Denmark mara obodo ya bụ Finland site na usoro nkuzi ma guzobe Finnish Society na Copenhagen
O mepụtara akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu Finnish-Danish na Danish-Finnish
N'afọ 1915, Moltensen bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Danske Kvinders Fredskæde (Danish Women's Peace Chain), ngalaba Danish nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom
N'afọ 1918, na-anọchite anya Venstre, ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa na ntuli aka mba mana a họpụtabeghị ya
A mụrụ ya na Joroinen, Finland, Eva Elisabeth Hällström bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụ Frans Algoth Hällströ (1835-1878) na Olga Elisabeth Hasintytär Nyman (1843-1912)
Mgbe ọ ka bụ obere nwa, mgbe nna ya na ụmụnne ya nwụsịrị, ya na nne ya kwagara Helsinki ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Latin nke asụsụ Swedish
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gụrụ zoology na Mahadum Helsinki, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere masta n'afọ 1894
N'afọ 1896, ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ nke nyere ya ohere ịga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Denmark na Askov Højskole, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka ọ zutere di ya, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụka Laust Jevsen Moltesen (1865-1950)
Ha lụrụ na 1898 ma nwee ụmụ anọ ọnụ Erik Moltesen (1899-1926), Per Algot Moltesen (1900-1980), onye ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ, Bodil Elisabeth Relander (1901-1992) na Harald Moltesen (05-1931)
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ nabatara ụzọ ndụ ndị Denmark n'ụzọ zuru oke, ọ dịghị mgbe ọ chefuru obodo ya bụ Finland, na-agwa ụmụ nwanyị Danish okwu na mba ahụ dum banyere ụzọ ndị Russia si mesoo ndị Finland
N'afọ 1904, o guzobere Finnish Society (Finske Forening) na Copenhagen

N'ihu akwụkwọ, na 1905 mgbe ọ mụsịrị nwa ya nke anọ na nke ikpeazụ, o bipụtara akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu Finnish-Danish na Danish-Finnish na, na 1910, Fra Kalevalas lunde, nchịkọta akụkọ sitere na ihe nketa ọdịbendị Finland
Ọzọkwa na Danish, n'afọ 1920 ọ rụchara obere ọrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na Danish nke akpọrọ Det finske Finland (The Finnish Finland)
O bipụtakwara ọrụ na isiokwu gbasara Denmark na Finnish
Ya na Eline Hansen, Thora Daugaard, Louise Wright na Clara Tybjerg, n'afọ 1915 Moltesen bụ onye guzobere otu udo nke Danish Danske Kvinders Fredskæde
N'afọ 1918 na ọzọ n'afọ 1920, ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa Venstre na ntuli aka nke Folketing mana a họpụtabeghị ya
Ọnwụ nwa ya nwoke Eric n'afọ 1926, wutere Moltensen nke ukwuu
N'otu afọ ahụ, di ya ghọrọ minista mba ọzọ ruo n'afọ 1929
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ bịara na-adịchaghị ike, na-etinye ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ya n'ụlọ
Ọ nwụrụ na Gentofte na 10 Nọvemba 1934 ma lie ya na Gentoft Cemetery
'Eva Ngigi–Sarwari (née Eva Ngigi), is a Kenyan businesswoman
She is an executive at Visa Inc, responsible for Kenya, Somalia & South Sudan, after joining in September 2020
A mụrụ Eva na Kenya ihe dịka 1981
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Moi n'afọ 2004, jiri nzere bachelọ nke Business Management, na-emepe ahịa ahịa
Ọ nwetara Master of Business Administration
Mahadum Nairobi nyere ya onyinye n’afọ 2010
N’afọ 2019, ọ malitere mmemme Oxford Fintech nke ọma na Saïd Business School
Mgbe otu afọ ahụ gasịrị, ọ debanyere aha na Emeritus Institute of Management (EMERITUS), gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2020 na Diploma Postgraduate na Azụmahịa Dijitalụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ mbụ, Eva banyere ụlọ akụ
Ọ nọrọ afọ ise na Cooperative Bank of Kenya, na-elekwasị anya n'ịkwalite mmekọrịta ndị ahịa ụlọ akụ na ahụmahụ
Ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ na CfC Stanbic Holdings, na-elekwasị anya na ngwaahịa azụmahịa na ire ahịa, dị ka onye njikwa maka ngalaba ahụ
N'afọ 2012, Standard Chartered Kenya goro Ngigi wee ruo ihe karịrị afọ asaa ruo n'ọkwa onye isi nke ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa na ngalaba ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa
Na Jenụwarị 2020, ọ weere Project Lead of SC Ventures, ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ nke Stanchart
Ọ hapụrụ Stanchart Kenya na Septemba 2020
Na Septemba 2020, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ọkwa ya ugbu a na Visa Inc
Ọ na-ahụ maka ọrụ na Kenya, Somalia na South Sudan
Eva Warigia bụ nwanyị Kenya na-azụ ahịa na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke East Africa Private Equity & Venture Capital Association (EAVCA), nke dị na Nairobi, Kenya
EAVCA bụ ụlọ ọrụ nke ndị isi ego na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mpaghara ahụ, nke ebumnuche ya bụ 'ịkwalite mmata na itinye aka n'ihe gbasara amụma na mpaghara ahụ'
A mụrụ ya na Kenya ọ wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị
O nwere nzere bachelọ na Mahadum nke Nairobi
Ka ọ na-erule Mee 2020, Eva Warigia na-achụso nzere Master of Business Administration, site na Strathmore Business School na Nairobi
Ntinye aka Warigia na isi ego na-alaghachi na mmalite afọ 2010
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya dị ka Co-Executive Director na EAVCA, iji soro Esther Ndeti jee ozi
Ọrụ ha jikọtara ọnụ bụ ịbawanye 'nkwado, ọgụgụ isi, netwọkụ na ọzụzụ na ego onwe onye' na mpaghara ahụ
Na EAVCA, ya na ndị otu ahia, na-arụkọ ọrụ na mba ofesi iji mee ka obodo mara isi obodo na ego onwe onye, dị ka isi mmalite ọzọ nke isi obodo
EAVCA na-eme nnyocha ụlọ ọrụ na-egosipụta ohere ndị dị na East Africa
Warigia na-ekpuchi mba Ethiopia, Kenya, Tanzania, Rwanda na Uganda
Tupu ọrụ ya na EAVCA, Eva rụrụ ọrụ dị ka nnukwu onye ndụmọdụ na Africa Practice (East Africa), ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze dị na Nairobi
Evan Narcisse bụ onye America na-ede akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị, onye nta akụkọ, na onye na-emepụta akụkọ egwuregwu vidio
Narcisse malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nta akụkọ nke kọrọ banyere egwuregwu vidio maka ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, dị ka The Atlantic, New York Times, Time Magazine, Kotaku, io9, na Polygon
Dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị, Narcisse edeela ọtụtụ nke e gosipụtara dike Marvel Comics, Black Panther
Kemgbe afọ 2018, Narcisse etinyela aka na ịmepụta ma ọ bụ ndụmọdụ banyere ihe akụkọ nke ọtụtụ egwuregwu vidio, gụnyere Insomniac Games 'Spider-Man video game series, Marvel's Avengers, na Redfall

N'ime afọ 2000, Narcisse rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-enye aka na onye edemede maka ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na-elekwasị anya na ụlọ ọrụ egwuregwu vidio, dị ka Entertainment Weekly N'afọ 2010, Narcisse dere ọtụtụ isiokwu nke The Atlantic bipụtara
Narcisse sonyeere blọọgụ egwuregwu vidio Kotaku na Ọktoba 2011, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ ise
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Kotaku na June 2016, Narcisse nọrọ dị ka onye isi na-ede akwụkwọ na io9, saịtị nwanne Kotaku, ebe o dere banyere ihe ọchị na nyocha ọchị
Ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ Narcisse dere maka gụnyere The New York Times, Time Magazine, IGN, GameSpot, na Rolling Stone Magazine
Narcisse apụtawokwa dị ka onye ọbịa ọkachamara na CNN na NPR

Otu n'ime ajụjụ ọnụ Narcisse gbara Ta-Nehisi Coates banyere ọrụ ya na usoro Black Panther dọtara uche onye nchịkọta akụkọ Coates na Marvel, bụ onye gwara ya ka ọ kpọọ Narcisse ka ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na akụkọ Black Panther n'ọdịnihu
Aha akwụkwọ mbụ nke Narcisse bụ Rise Of The Black Panther, obere usoro 2018 ya na Coates dere
Usoro ihe nkiri a na-atọ ọchị na-agbaso afọ mbụ nke onye isi, T'Challa yana ndị ezinụlọ ya na Wakanda, mba Afrịka akụkọ ifo ọ na-achị dị ka eze ya
Narcisse kwuru okwu nke Rise Of The Black Panther, ebe ọ chọrọ ịchọpụta ihe na-eme T'Challa 'nwoke, eze na onye dike Afrịka n'ụwa jupụtara na ndị isi na-acha odo odo na chi ndị nwere ọla edo'
Ọrụ akwụkwọ ọchị ndị ọzọ nke Narcisse maka aha ihe nke ndiị Marvel Comics bipụtara gụnyere Marvel's Voices # 1 na Last Annihilation Wakanda # 1
Narcisse bụkwa onye so dee WWE The New Day Power of Positivity, obere usoro ihe ọchị nke ndị otu ndị ọkachamara na-agba mgba, The New Day
Ọrụ mbụ nke Narcisse na egwuregwu vidio bụ maka aha ihe nkiri 2018, Spider-Man, ebe ọ na-ahụ maka ide ahịrịokwu ole na ole nke mkparịta ụka
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na-ahụ maka atụmatụ akụkọ maka ihe nkiri afọ 2020 nke Marvel a kpọrọ Spider-Man Miles Morales, mmụba kwụụrụ onwe ya na Spider-Man nke gosipụtara Miles Morales
Narcisse jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ akụkọ na War for Wakanda, mgbasawanye ọdịnaya nke 2021 maka ihe nkiri Marvel bu Avengers nke gosipụtakwara Black Panther

Narcisse bụ onye edemede nke 2021 freeware aha Dot's Home mepụtara ma bipụta site na Rise Home Stories Project, ọrụ nchịkọta mgbasa ozi nke ezubere ịgbasa mmata ọha na eze banyere iwu ụlọ na nsogbu ikpe ziri ezi na United States
Na June 2021, Narcisse kwupụtara na ọ bụ akụkụ nke ndị otu mmepe n'azụ aha na-abịanụ nke ụwa co-op shooter, Redfall
Narcisse bụ onye otu ndị na-ede akwụkwọ nke Gen LOCK, ụlọọrụ America na-eme ihe nkiri sayensị na-agbasa usoro telivishọn nke Gray Haddock kere ma Rooster Teeth mepụtakwara, kemgbe July 2018
Narcisse bụ nwa nke ndị mbịarambịa Haitian bụ ndị kwagara United States na ngwụsị afọ 1960, ma nwee ike ịghọta Antillean Kreyol
Nne ha zụlitere Narcisse na ụmụnne ya na mpaghara obodo New York, nke mechara nwee ọganihu nke mere ka ụfọdụ ndị bi na ya ghara ịdị mma
Narcisse sitere na mkpali o nwere site na nwata site na akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Haiti, nke mere ka ọ nwee mmasị ide banyere nsogbu agbụrụ na nnọchi anya n'oge ọrụ ọkachamara ya

Narcisse bụ onye na-akwado ogologo oge nke usoro akwụkwọ ọchị nke Black Panther; ncheta mbụ ya nke ịgụ akụkọ Black Panther bụ mbipụta nke 1970s reprint title Marvel Triple Action, ebe e kpughere onye dike ahụ na ọ bụ onye ojii si mba ọzọ nke nwekwara ọdịbendị dị mgbagwoju anya
Narcisse gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum New York, ma mesịa kụziere ihe ọmụmụ banyere akụkọ egwuregwu vidio na ụlọ akwụkwọ ya
Narcisse si na New York City kwaga Austin, Texas na 2018
Evan Penny (a mụrụ n'afọ 1953, na South Africa), bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Toronto, Ontario, Canada
N'afọ 1978, Penny gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Alberta College of Art and Design wee nwetakwa akara ugo mmụta gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ihe ọkpụkpụ
Evan Penny na-eji silicone, pigmenti, ntutu isi na alumini eme ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ụdị mmadụ
Akụkụ ya sitere na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndụ, ruo na mgbagwoju anya ma ọ bụ gbatịrị agbatị
Penny na-ekwu na otu n'ime mmasị ya 'bụ itinye ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ n'ụzọ nghọta n'etiti ụzọ anyị nwere ike isi hụ ibe anyị n'oge na ohere na ụzọ anyị si echepụta ihe yiri anyị na ihe ngosiputa nké foto
' Ọ bụ ezie na ihe okike ya yiri ndụ, Penny kwenyere na 'a pụghị ịnọchite anya ma ọ bụ gosipụta ihe n'ezie,' na-ahapụ ihe niile ka ọ bụrụ ihe nnọchianya
Ọrụ izizi nke Evan Penny gụnyere ihe ọkpụkpụ, yana foto dijitalụ
Ihe ọkpụkpụ Penny karịrị echiche nke photorealism na mbara igwe atọ
N'ihe ọkpụkpụ ihe atụ izizi ya, Penny na-anọgide na-eme ihe n'ụdị mmadụ na-enweghị mgbagha, ọ bụ ezie na ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ na-adịkarị obere karịa nha ndụ
Otu n'ime ihe ndị a ma ama site na otu a bụ Ali (afọ 1984); nwa agbọghọ gba ọtọ
A na-akọwapụta ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ nke ọma, Penny na-asụgharịkwa akụkụ ọ bụla nke ahụ nwanyị ahụ n'ụzọ zuru ezu
Ihe si na ya pụta bụ mmetụta dị ịtụnanya na nke na-enweghị atụ

A chịkọtara ihe ọkpụkpụ ihe atụ izizi nke Penny na Absolutely Unreal, nnukwu nyocha nke ọrụ onye na-ese ihe nke gara Museum London na London, Ontario, Mendel Art Gallery na Saskatoon, Saskatchewan na Glenbow Museum na Calgary, Alberta (afọ 2003 rụọ afọ 2006)
Ọ dịghị Onye - Karịsịa bụ nchịkọta nke ihe ọkpụkpụ okpukpu abụọ nke na-agbanye ókè nke nnọchiteanya n'etiti akụkụ abụọ na akụkụ atọ
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ndị a bụ ihe osise a na-eche n'echiche nke e wuru ka ha yie ndị nkịtị mana ha nwere akụkụ ahụ buru ibu
A naghị eme ihe ọkpụkpụ ndị a n'ezie dịka otu onye, kama ọ bụ njikọta nke atụmatụ mmadụ, na-emepụta nkọwa banyere atụmanya nke eziokwu n'ime foto
Penny na-aga n'ihu na-agbanye ókè na eziokwu ọkpụkpụ nke oge a na ọrụ ndị a site n'ime ka ọdịiche dị n'ụdị mmadụ pụta ìhè
Penny's Stretch na Anamorph sculptures na-agbasawanye ókè nke mgbagwoju anya n'ime oghere atọ
Ọrụ ndị a na-agbatị, na-agbagwoju anya ma na-achịkwa ọdịdị mmadụ na mbara igwe n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ụzọ enwere ike ijikwa foto dijitalụ abụọ
N'ime ọrụ ndị dị ka Stretch # 1 afọ 2003, a na-agbatị busts ọdịnala Penny n'ụzọ kwụ ọtọ na-eme ka isi na ubu dị ogologo ógè ọ na-anọgide na-eme ihe n'eziokwu na-eme ka ihu mmadụ dị oke mma
Ọrụ Penny's Panagiota bụ akụkụ nke usoro a
A na-ekwu n'ihe banyere echiche nke oge kpọmkwem na ibe Panagiota
Ọrụ ahụ na-egosi mkparịta ụka Penny na nwa agbọghọ nwere site n'ịkọwa ọdịdị ihu ya n'ebe dị iche iche na mkparịta ụka ha - na-eweta oge-foto kpọmkwem n'ụdị ihe ọkpụkpụ
Penny kere usoro ihe ọkpụkpụ dị egwu nke azụ nke ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ndị a na-aga n'ihu na ngalaba nke ma ọ bụghị ụdị ọnụọgụ abụọ ma ọ bụ akụkụ atọ na ọrụ Penny
Otú ọ dị, a na-eji nlezianya sụgharịa ubu, olu na azụ nke isi
Back of Evan bụ akụkụ nke e dechara n'afọ 2005 nke nwoke isi nkwọcha na-eche ihu n'aka nri
A na-eji nlezianya rụọ ihe ọkpụkpụ a nke na mmadụ nwere ike ịhụ ihe ndị dị n'olu nwoke ahụ
Ọrụ Penny na-adịbeghị anya na-eji teknụzụ ọhụrụ eme ihe iji mee ihe ọkpụkpụ dị oke mma
N'afọ 2011, Penny kere ihe ọkpụkpụ ya kachasị ukwuu ruo ugbu a, Jim Revisited, nwoke dị mita iri n'ogologo nke nwere ọnụnọ na-enye iwu
Dị ka ihe nlereanya maka ihe ọkpụkpụ ọhụrụ a, Penny tụleghachiri ibe ya nke afọ 1985, Jim, obere ihe ọkpụkpụ 4/5 nke dị ndụ nke dị ndụ nke dị na ọnọdụ contrapposto
Na Jim Revisited, Penny jiri teknụzụ nyocha dijitalụ mee ihe n'ụzọ dị ịrịba ama iji megharịa ma megharịa ọnọdụ ahụ
Ógè ahụ, ọ rụgharịrị elu ahụ na ụrọ iji tinye nkọwa zuru ezu

Ọganihu nke Jim site n'afọ 1985 ruo afọ 2011, na-egosipụta mmepe nke ihe ọkpụkpụ Penny n'ime afọ iri abụọ na isii gara aga, na mgbakwunye na igosipụta ọganihu nke teknụzụ, foto, na nnọchi anya nke ahụ na oge foto dijitalụ
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Penny kpụrụkwa ihe osise onwe ya abụọ - otu n'ime onwe ya ka ọ na-echeta onwe ya ka ọ na-ele anya dị ka nwa okorobịa, na nke ọzọ ka ọ na-eche na ọ ga-ele agadi anya

Ihe ọkpụkpụ abụọ a na-ekpughe ntụgharị uche onwe onye nke Penny site na oge na-aga n'ihu, ma na-ezo aka n'ọdịdị nke ebe nchekwa na ọchịchọ, na otú foto foto si agwa ma na-agbagọ nghọta na nnọchianya nke Onwe
Evangeline 'EJ' Montgomery (amụrụ na Mee 2, 1930, na New York, New York) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke a maara nke ọma màkà ọrụ ígwè ya
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-ebi akwụkwọ, onye na-ede akwụkwọ na onye na-ahụ maka nhazi
Ọ natara Women's Caucus for Art Lifetime Achievement Award na 1999
Ónyé na-akọ akụkọ ihe méré eme Floyd Coleman kwuru na ọ bụ onye dị mkpa na nka America
Ọ nwere ọrụ ogologo oge nke isonye na ibute ụzọ n'ihe ndị na-aga n'ihu nke na-akwalite nka na mmepe nke ọbọdọ
Ọ kọwara ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye nchịkwa nka na onye na-eme ihe ike
A mụrụ ya na New York City, Montgomery bụ nwa nwanyị nke Oliver Thompson, onye ụkọchukwu Baptist, na Carmelite Thompson, onye na-elekọta ụlọ
Ọ chọpụtara nkà nka ya na ịhụnanya ya maka ise ihe n'oge ọ dị obere, mgbe ọ natara ihe osise mmanụ mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Seward Park High School, Montgomery rụrụ ọrụ na-ese ihu na ụmụ bebi na ihe oyiyi okpukpe
Montgomery kwagara Los Angeles na 1955 ya na di ya, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ màkà Thomas Usher, ónyé na-emepụta ọla ndị Africa America
Ọ natara BFA
ya na California College of Arts and Crafts na 1969, ebe ọ bụ ọkachamara na metallurgy
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta onwe ya na onye ndụmọdụ site na 1967 ruo 1979
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ 'Black Art' maka Rainbow Sign, ebe ọdịnala ndị isi ojii na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Berkeley, California
Na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nlekọta Montgomery bụ ónyé na-akwado nka, na-alụ ọgụ màkà nnọchiteanya ka ukwuu nke ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka

A họpụtara ya dị ka ónyé ndụmọdụ nka agbụrụ na Oakland Museum, Montgomery nwèrè ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịhazi ihe ngosi asatọ nke ndị na-ese ihe ojii, gụnyere ihe ngosi nke 1971 nke ónyé na-ese onyinyo ndị Africa America Sargent Johnson (1887-1967) na ihe ngosi nke 1970 na California Black Craftsmen nke gosipụtara ndị na-eme ihe nkírí iri na itoolu gụnyere Eileen Abdulrashid, Gloria R
Bohanon, Sheryle Butler, Hubert Collins, Dale Brockman Davis, Ibibio Fundi, Manuel Ward, Vernita Henderson, Ernest Leroy, Ernest Leroer, Ben James, John Sson, John John John John Smith, John
Montgomery achọpụtala ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndị a na-emetụbeghị aka banyéré Johnson, onye na-ese ihe nke na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'oge Harlem Renaissance
Ntụle ahụ nyèrè aka guzobe ihe nketa Johnson na nka ndị Africa America
Dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe, Montgomery arụwo ọrụ na ndị na-eme ihe dị iche iche
A maara ya nke ọma màkà igbe ndị nna nna ya, nke e ji ọlaọcha sterling mee ma tinye ihe gụnyere nkume ndị dị oké ọnụ ahịa na ihe ndị a chọtara
Montgomery kwuru na igbe ndị a na-ekwu na ha nwèrè ihe dị oké ọnụ ahịa ma gosipụta nchọpụta ya banyere ọrụ ncheta na ihe ncheta na akụkọ ihe mere eme mmadụ
Otu n'ime igbe mbụ ya, Ancestor Box 1 E mere ikpe ziri ezi maka Angela na 1971 iji meghachi omume na ikpe nke ónyé ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Angela Davis, ọ na-etinye akara Ashanti màkà ikpe ziri ezi

Ọrụ ọzọ dị mkpa, 'Red, Black and Green Ancestral Box - Garvey Box' (1973), a na-etinye ya na ọlaọcha sterling na enamel na-acha ọbara ọbara, oji, na akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ iji mee ka ncheta Marcus Garvey
Evangeline Wiles bụ onye nlekota na teknologi Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Kaymu, Nigeria
Evant bụ zi asụsụ Tivoid nke NaijiriaÀtụ Languages of Cameroon
Evarine Suzeni Katongo bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na Zambia na-agba dịka onye na-eme egwuregwu n'etiti ZISD Queens
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke Zambia na asọmpi bọọlụ na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics
Eve Martha Badana (amụrụ ya na abalị itolu na onwa nke asaa, na afo 1993) bụ onye mgbaru ọsọ bọọlụ mba ụwa nke na-egwu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ụmụ nwanyị maka DLR Waves
Ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Cork City mgbe ọ na-aga Mahadum College Cork
Badana bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị mba Canada na-erubeghị afọ 17 na 2010 FIFA U-17 Women's Cup, mana o kpebiri igwu egwu otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Republic of Ireland na ọkwa dị elu
Ọ meriri okpu mbụ ya maka Ireland na February 2012
Nne Badana sitere na County Tyrone, Northern Ireland, wee kwaga Ontario ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Belfast
N'ebe ahụ, ọ hụrụ nna Badana bụ onye Filipino
Badana nwere otu nwanne na otu nwanne
Badana bụ onye isi ndị otu mpaghara ya Unionville Milliken SC, wee sonye na Toronto Lady Lynx ebe a kpọkwara ya onye isi ma nyere ndị otu Under-20 aka iru eru maka asọmpi Super Y-League 2010
Na 2011, o kwetara a scholarships na Drexel University
Oge izizi Badana na bọọlụ kọleji hụrụ aha ya na otu egwuregwu Colonial Athletic Association (CAA) All-Rookie yana otu ọgbakọ nke abụọ
Na 27 Septemba 2016 Badana bịanyere aka na Cork City, mgbe o kpebiri ịkwaga Ireland wee gụchaa akwụkwọ gbasara iwu na University College Cork
Na Cork City, ya na Amanda Budden gbara asọmpi maka mmalite
Badana nakweere ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ iwu kwadoro na Dublin wee bịanye aka na DLR Waves n'oge 2019 Women's National League season
Mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Nwanna André Catholic High School n'obodo ya bụ Markham, Badana gara Ụlọ Ọrụ Ọzụzụ Mba dị na Ontario
Ọ batara n'uche ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ụmụ nwanyị Canada bụ ndị debanyere ya n'òtù ndị na -erubeghị afọ 17 nke mba
Badana bụ akụkụ nke nhọrọ Canada na 2010 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup

N'ịbụ onye ruru eru n'ihi nne mụrụ County Tyrone, Badana gakwuuru Football Association of Ireland banyere ịgbanwere mmekọ mba ụwa, karịa Irish Football Association, bụ ndị otu mba ya na-anọchi anya ndị na-agba bọl na agbụrụ ma ọ bụ nne na nna si Northern Ireland ma nwee ikike
Nwa amaala Irish
Na Septemba 2011 a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ụmụ nwanyị Republic of Ireland maka egwuregwu ntozu UEFA Women's Euro 2013 megide Wales na France
Na mpụta mbụ ya na mba ụwa na February 2012, Badana gbara nkeji 90 nke Ireland 1–0 Algarve Cup meriri Hungary
Na ọnwa nke ise, na afọ 2012 Badana meriri okpu ọzọ dị elu na 1–0 enyi na enyi Switzerland meriri na Stadion Niedermatten wee gosipụta nnọchi anya na 1–0 meriri South Africa na 2013 Cyprus Cup
Na 5 May 2014, onye njikwa Ireland Susan Ronan aha ya bụ Badana na ndị otu nnwale maka enyi na enyi megide obodo Basque
Badana malitere egwuregwu ahụ na mmeri 2–0 nke Ireland na Azpeitia, nke na-ekewaghị dị ka egwuregwu mba ụwa zuru oke
Ọ nọgidere na-amụ akwụkwọ, na-abụkarị onye a ma ama nke onye mgbaru ọsọ mbụ bụ Emma Byrne
N'ịgbaso ezumike nka mba Niamh Reid Burke na Machị 2021, akpọrọ Badana ka ya na ndị otu onye nchịkwa Ireland Vera Pauw zụọ maka egwuregwu enyi abụọ megide Denmark na Belgium
Ọ laghachiri na squad na June 2021 maka ọbụbụenyi abụọ megide Iceland, mana ọ ka nwere naanị okpu atọ na-esote mpụta mbụ ya ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri tupu mgbe ahụ
Badana nọchikwara anya Ireland na mbipụta 2013, 2015 na 2017 nke Summer Universiade

Eve Boswell (nke amụrụ na Ébéánọr Keleti ;na mkpụrụ Ụbọchị iri na otu n' afọ1922, Budapest, Hungary – ruo mkpụrụ Ụbọchị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ1998, Durban, South Africa) bụ onye na-abụ abụ pop na-aga nke ọma na Britain na oge afọ 1950s
A mụrụ Éva Keleti na Hungary n'aka nne na nna bụ ndị na-agụ egwú nke gara mpayara ụwa niile

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Switzerland, ọ gụrụ piano tupu ya esonyere ndị mụrụ ya na njem dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Three Hugos Mgbe ekwupụtara Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ezinụlọ ahụ hapụrụ Britain na Boswell Circus
Ọ lụrụ di, dịka Eve Boswell ghọrọ onye na-agụ egwú na South Africa
Boswell bụ onye olu abụ nke Vera-Ellen na afọ 1951 bụ ihe nkiri Britain nke akpọrọ Happy Go Lovely
Ya na Geraldo kewara na afọ 1951, wee malite ọrụ naanị ya
Ndekọ egwu mbụ ya bịara n'afọ na-eso ya site na ' Sugar Bush ', nke a na-abụ na Africaans
Malite na ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1952, ya na onye na-akpa ọchị Derek Roy gara njem ọtụtụ ọnwa na revue egwu 'Happy-Go-Lucky', tupu ya agafe Korea iji mee ka ndị agha nwee obi ụtọ
Na afọ 1953, ya na Harry Secombe nọ na 'Show of Show' na Blackpool Opera House
Boswell soro Tommy Cooper gụo egwu na 'Obi ụtọ na Ebube' ma mesịa soro ya na pantomime na 1954 na 'Humpty Dumpty' na Dudley Hippodrome
Isi eserese ya bịara na 'Pickin' a Chicken', egwu South Africa nwere okwu ọhụrụ, nke ruru na iteghete na UK Singles Chart na mbido afọ 1956
LP mbụ ya, Sugar na Spice, bụ nke ọ na-abụ abụ iri n'asụsụ dị iche iche iteghete, sochiri n'afọ
Mmemme na-aga n'ihu nke ọrụ redio na TV na njegharị sochiri, na-ebute ihe karịrị otu mgbakasị uche
Ọ kwụsịrị n'ihu ọha ka mmasị ọha na eze maka egwu pop gbanwere site na njedebe afọ 1950 na 1960
Di ya nwụrụ na afọ 1970 wee mepee ụlọ egwu egwu nke ya na London nke a na-akpọ 'Studio 9' na afọ 1974
Afọ ụfọdụ ka e mesịrị ọ laghachiri South Africa, bụ ebe ọ lụrụ onye na-emepụta redio bụ Henry Holloway, bụ onye mepụtara LP ikpeazụ ya, It's a Breeze, nke mere na afọ 1979
Eve D'Souza (a mụrụ na 11 Machị 1979) bụ onye mgbasa ozi Kenya, onye na-egosi redio na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye ngosi redio na 984 Capital FM site n'afọ 2001 ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ na ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2010
A mụrụ D'Souza na 11 Machị, 1979 na Mombasa, Kenya nye Andrew na Martina D’Souza
O nwere ụmụnne abụọ, Sharon na Jason D’Souza
Ọ gara Loreto Convent na Aga Khan High School, Mombasa
O mechara sonye na Mahadum Katọlik nke Eastern Africa, Nairobi ebe o nwetara nzere bachelọ nke agụmakwụkwọ na Bekee na Bekee
D'Souza lụrụ Simon Anderson na 16 Nọvemba 2020 na agbamakwụkwọ nzuzo
N'afọ 2001, ọ sonyeere 984 Capital FM ruo n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2010 na-akwado ihe ngosi Mid morning, Hits not Home work, The East African Chart na Capital in the Morning

D'Souza mechara rụọ ọrụ Moonbeam Productions, onye na-emepụta telivishọn na-ahụ maka Auntie Boss!, sitcom nke ọ na-emepụta ma na-eme ihe nkiri, wee bụrụ 'onye nnọchi anya' maka Store 66, ụlọ ahịa uwe na Nairobi
Eve Sandler bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe nkírí na ónyé na-ese ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi n'ụdị Abstract Expressionism
Sandler, amụrụ na Harlem, bụ nwa nwanyị nke ónyé na-ese ihe na Harlem Alvin Sandler na nwanne nwanyị nke ónyé ọrụ ihe nkiri Kathe Sandler
Ihe ngosi multimedia nke Sandler 'Mami Wata Crossing' bụ akụkụ nkè ihe ngosi 2008, 'Mami wata Arts for Water Spirits in Africa and Its Diasporas' na Fowler Museum
Ọrụ ahụ nyochara njikọ dị n'etiti chi nwanyị mmírí pan-African Mami Wata, usoro ọmụmụ na akụkụ etiti
Sandler bụ akụkụ nkè otu Black Women Artists, tinyere Carole Byard, Nanette Carter na Howardena Pindell
Sandler bụ ónyé bi na 1990-1991 na Studio Museum na Harlem
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ dịka The Bronx Museum of the Arts
Eve Tetaz (amụrụ n'afọ 1931) bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke America lara ezumike nká na onye na-ahụ maka udo na ikpe ziri ezi na Washington, DC
E jidere Tetaz ugboro iri na otu n'afọ 2007 maka mmegide obodo na-enweghị ime ihe ike n'oge ngagharị iwe megide agha na mmeri nke Iraq
E jidere ya ihe dịka ugboro iri na abụọ n'agbata afọ 2008 na mmalite afọ 2010
Tetaz etinyela aka na ọtụtụ òtù udo na ikpe ziri ezi, dịka Code Pink, National Campaign for Nonviolent Resistance na Witness Against Torture

Evelyn Acham (a mụrụ ya n'ihe dị ka n'ubochi 15 nke ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1991) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ikpe ziri ezi na ihu igwe si mba Kampala Uganda na onye nhazi mba Uganda nke Rise Up Movement, nke enyi ya na onye nhazi ibe ya Vanessa Nakate guzobere
A mụrụ Acham n'ihe dị ka afọ 1991
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke +1Tree Project, ebe ebumnuche ya bụ ịkụ osisi 9,000,000

N'ọnwa Mee 26, 2020, Acham bụ otu n'ime ndị otu maka usoro webinar ActionAid na Women's Agenda Women Leading Climate Action, nke bụ mkparịta ụka mmekọrịta na-emetụta etu ụmụnwanyị si lụso mgbanwe ihu igwe ọgụ n'oge COVID-19

O gosiputara n'akụkụ Inge Relph - onye isi nchịkwa na onye guzobere Global Choices - na Emma Wilkin - onye nhazi nke Global Choices' Arctic Angels - maka 2020 Model United Nations (MUN) Impact Global Summit
N'afọ 2021, ọ gara nzukọ mgbanwe ihu igwe nke United Nations nke afọ 2021 ma nọchite anya Friday for Future Most Affected People and Areas (MAPA)
Friday for Future MAPA bụ otu n'ime ndị na-akwado ihu igwe nke e guzobere mgbe ndị na-ahụ maka ihu igwe Greta Thunberg mere ngagharị iwe n'afọ 2018
Evelyn Acham bụ onye guzobere Climate Justice for Healthy Communities (CJHC), otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke dị na mba Kampala, Uganda

Ebumnuche nke nzukọ ahụ bụ ichebe ma melite ahụike na ọdịmma nke ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, ọkachasị ndị nọ n'obodo ndị nwere nnukwu ihe ize ndụ, site na ihe ize ndụ ndị metụtara mgbanwe ihu igwe, Acham na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na Girl on the Move Initiative, nke onye ọrụ ibe ya Isaac Ssentumbwe guzobere, iji nye ụmụagbọghọ puku ise (5,000) hapụrụ agụmakwụkwọ ha n'ihi mgbanwe ihu igwe n'afọ 2030
Acham gosipụtakwara na mkparịta ụka Climate Hub nke The New York Times ' 2021 'Passing the Torch Intergenerational Climate Dialogues' n'akụkụ Jerome Foster II, Aya Chebbi, na Mary Robinson
Njikọ ndị ọzọ Acham gụnyere Youth for Future Africa na Global Choices 'Arctic Angels
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu Global Witness Advisory Council n'afọ 2022
A họpụtara ya n'etiti ụmụnwanyị 100 na-emepụta Africa ka mma n'afọ 2023
O wepụtara onwe ya dị ka onye mmụọ ozi Arctic na Global Choices kemgbe 2020
Onye so na Fridays For Future MAPA kemgbe afọ 2020
Ọ gara ma kwuo okwu na COP26 na mba Scotland, emume mmeghe nke onye isi obodo Grenoble na France, na ọkà okwu na nzukọ ụwa nke Austria na Youth Climate Conservation Summit na Mahadum Princeton
Evelyn Akhator (onye a muru n'ụbọchị nke 3 n’onwa Febụwarị nke afọ1995) bu onye Naijiria na-eme egwuregwu basketbọọlụ ndi nwanyi n’ihu / etiti nke otu Flammes Carolo
Ndi Dallas Wings nke Women’s National Basketball Association (WNBA) họọrọ ya dika onye nke ato n’ozuzu nke 2017 WNBA Draft
Isi nrụtụaka Àtụ NBA player statistics legend
Dallas Wings họọrọ Evelyn dịka onye nke atọ na nhọpụta ntinye WNBA nke afọ 2017
Ọ pụtala n'asọmpi iri na ise na oge ruki ya n'akụkụ nke Dallas ebe ọ na-enye ọnụọgụ 09 n'egwuregwu ọ bụla, ọnụọgụ 02 blocks kwa egwuregwu, ọnụọgụ 01 kwa egwuregwu
Ndi Dallas Wings gbahapụrụ ya n;ụbọchị nke 13 n'ọnwa Mee nke afọ 2018
N'ụbọchị nke 13 n'ọnwa Febụwarị nke afọ 2019, Akhator laghachiri WNBA site na ịbanye otu Chicago Sky na nkwekọrịta ọzụzụ
Evelyn na-anọchite anya Nigerian national basketball team
Ọ pụtara mpụta izizi ya n’otu oge asọmpi FIBA Afrobasket nke afọ 2017 na Mali
Evelyn jiri ihe ruru ọnụọgụ 153 na mweghachi 95 kwa egwuregwu n'oge asọmpi ahụ were depụta aha ya ndị egwuregwu 5 kacha elu
Evelyn so na ndị Nigerian national basketball team na 2018 FIBA Women's Basketball World Cup ebe ọ ritere ihe ruru ọnụọgụ 126, mweghachi 9 na mnyere aka 14 oge asọmpi ahụ
Akhator nwetara ọtụ na Rọshia n'otu WBC Dynamo Novosibirsk n'afọ 2017
O nwetara ihe ruru ọnụọgụ 124 na mweghchi 85 kwa egwuregwu
N'ụbọchị nke 22 n'ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 2018, Akhator bịanyere aka n'otu basketbọọlụ Turkish Besiktas
O jiri akara iri na ise na mwrghachi 11 na otu egwuregwu nke asọmpi egwuruegwu Tọki, o nwetakwara akara iri na ise na mweghachi n'asọmpi Eurocup na-igwuri egwu karịrị nkeji iri atọ na mpi abụọ ahụ
Ahkator bịanyere aka n'otu Spanish CB Avenida n'ụbọchị nke 15 n'ọnwa Mee nke afọ 2019
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, afọ 2019, Ahkator binyere aka i sonye ndị otu basketbọọlụ Flammes Carolo nke Frans
Na 2018 Nigerian Sports Award, Akhator meriri n'onyinye nke Best Sportwoman na Basketball player
Akhator sitere n'ezinụlọ nke mmadụ atọ, nne na nna ya na nwanne ya nke okenye bi na Naijiria
Nne ya Benedicta nwụrụ n'ihe mberede okporo ụzọ
Evelyn Anite Kajik, onye a maara dị ka Evelyn Anite, bụ onye nta akụkọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka ego maka itinye ego na nkeonwe na Kọmitii Ugandan kemgbe 6 June na afo 2016
N'oge gara aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Steeti maka Ndị Ntorobịa
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 1 Machị na afọ 2015, na-anọchi Ronald Kibuule, onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ihe ndị dị na mmiri
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara maka Koboko Municipality, na mpaghara West Nile, na mpaghara Northern Region nke Uganda, ọkwá ọ nọrọ site na afo 2011 ruo na afọ 2021
Na ntuli aka nke National Resistance Movement (NRM) nke afọ 2020, Dr Charles Ayume, nwa onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Ugandan, onye nwụrụ anwụ Francis Ayume meriri Anite
A mụrụ Anite na 11 Nọvemba na afọ 1984, na Adakado Village, Koboko District, nke Steven Dravu, onye ọrụ gọọmentị, na Sarah Wokoru Dravu, nwanyị ọchụnta ego
Ọ bụ onye Ugandan na-asụ Lugbara nke obodo ya na-agbanye na Democratic Republic of the Congo dị nso
Ọ na-asụ asụsụ Lugbara na Kakwa nke ọma
Ọ gara Arua Hill Primary School maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Saint Mary's Ediofe Secondary School maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị nke Muni, maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level ya
O nwere nzere Bachelor of Arts na Mass Communication, nke Mahadum Ndị Kraịst nke Uganda nyere ya na 2008

Na Jenụwarị na afọ 2018, a nabatara Evelyn Anite na Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy nke Mahadum Tufts, na Medford, Massachusetts, na United States, iji chụsoo Master na International Relations and Diplomacy Programme
N'ọnwa Julaị na afọ 2019, Anite gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Tufts, ebe ọ mezuru ihe niile achọrọ maka mmemme Master of Arts
Ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'afọ 2005, Anite malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio na ụlọ ọrụ redio dị na Arua, na-aga n'ihu na ikike ahụ ruo n'afọ 2007
Malite na afọ 2006 ma gaa n'ihu ruo Na afọ 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-egosi redio na Uganda Broadcasting Corporation na Kampala, isi obodo Uganda na obodo kachasị ukwuu
Site na afọ 2008 ruo na afọ 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Uganda Media Centre dị ka onye enyemaka na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze
N'afọ 2011, ọ gbara ọsọ maka oche ndị omeiwu nke onye nnọchi anya ndị ntorobịa maka Northern Uganda
Ọ meriri mmadụ itoolu ndị ọzọ iji merie oche ahụ
Ọ bụ onye nọ n'ọkwa ugbu a
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka itinye ego na nkeonwe
N'afọ nke 2014, Evelyn Anite sonyere na esemokwu ya na Margaret Baba Diri na onye nke ikpeazụ na-azọrọ na Evelyn Anite na-azọ oche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na Koboko maka ntuli aka elu nke afọ 2016
Na esemokwu a, Margaret Baba Diri kwuru na Evelyn Anite bụ 'onye mba ọzọ na-akpata mgbagwoju anya na Koboko na NRM'
Na nzaghachi, Evelyn Anite kwuru na ọ bụ naanị na-eme mkpọsa na Koboko iji 'wepụ' 'nne' ya Baba Diri n'ibu nke 'ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị siri ike'

N'ọnwa Febụwarị na afọ 2014, n'oge NRM Parliamentary Caucus, tupu ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2016, Evelyn Anite mere mkpebi ikwupụta na Onye isi ala Yoweri Kaguta Museveni bụ onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ nke pati
Mkpebi a bịara mara dị ka Mkpebi Kyankwanzi, zutere nguzogide
N'ịzaghachi nkwado ya maka iwepụ iwu afọ, Evelyn Anite kwuru na ọ natara ọtụtụ egwu ọnwụ
Nke a kpaliri gọọmentị inye ya nkọwa nchebe
Ọ kọwakwara ndị omeiwu ibe ya na-emegide iwu ahụ dị ka 'ndị na-achọ naanị ọdịmma onwe ha'
N'ikwu okwu iji kwado iwepụ iwu afọ, Evelyn Anite na pati na-achị achị nwere 'ọnụ ọgụgụ na ndị agha mba n'akụkụ ha'
Ndị agha Uganda People's Defence Force (UPDF) ewepụla onwe ha n'okwu a
N'akwụkwọ ozi o degaara Onye isi ala Yoweri Kaguta Museveni na Julaị 2018, Hamilton Telecom boro Evelyn Anite ebubo na ọ na-emebi ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta site na itinye ego maka ịzụta Uganda Telecom (UTL)

N'ọnwa Julaị na afọ 2018, e boro ebubo na Evelyn Anite agbapụla mba ahụ, n'ihi na ọ nọ n'okpuru nyocha na-esote akụkọ ndị a na-ekwu na ha rịọrọ $ 8 nde (Shs 288billion) iri ngo n'aka otu ndị Arab na-etinye ego
N'aka nke ya, ọ gbara akwụkwọ akụkọ obodo maka ibipụta akụkọ banyere ya
Mgbe ọ nabatara na Mahadum Tufts, otu akụkụ nke ndị Uganda bi na United States malitere mkpesa ma mee ngagharị iwe na-achọ ka a kagbuo nnabata ya na mahadum ahụ
Ha kwuru na United States ekwesịghị inye ndị ọrụ rụrụ arụ ebe mgbaba n'okpuru ihe ngosi nke ọmụmụ ọzọ
Mahadum Tufts jụrụ arịrịọ ahụ na-ekwu na ọ dịghị ihe ọjọọ o mere iji mee ka a chụpụ ya
Ha gbakwunyere na dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu, e chebere nzuzo ya
N'afọ 2021 mgbe Anite meriri Dr Charles Ayume na ntuli aka elu nke National resistance movement flag bearer, ọ wepụrụ ambulance o nyere na mbụ na Koboko Health Center IV
Evelyn Anite lụrụ Allan Kajik, onye bụbu osote onye isi obodo nke Kampala
Ha lụrụ n'afọ 2011 ma nwee ụmụ abụọ ka ọ na-erule na afọ 2018
Evelyn Ashamallah bụ nwanyị na-ese ihe Coptic, amụrụ na Desouk, Kafr el-Sheikh, Egypt na 1948 nye Ashamallah Eskandar Hanna na Elaine Mikhail Hanna
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba fine arts na Mahadum Alexandria na 1973 wee lụọ onye nta akụkọ Ijipt, Mahmoud Youssry ma ha nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ
N'ime afọ ndị 1980 ya na di ya biri na Algeria ruo afọ ole na ole
O nwere ụmụnne atọ
N'afọ 2000 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa nke Egyptian Museum for Contemporary Art ruo mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'afọ 2002
Ụzọ nka nke Ashmallah agafeela site na ọdịdị ala okike gaa na foto na osisi na-enweghị atụ
O jirila mgbasa ozi dị iche iche, nke gụnyere mmanụ, wax, na acrylic
Ashamallah nwere ihe ngosi nka nke iri abụọ na abụọ ya n'afọ 2005
A maara ụdị ya ugbu a maka egwuregwu ya, na iwelite akụkọ ifo anwansi ebe ihe osise ọ bụla na-akọ akụkọ
Evelyn Berezin (Eprel 12, 1925 - Disemba 8, 2018) bụ onye America mepụtara kọmpụta nke kọmpụta izizi kọmpụta
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na sistemụ kọmputa na-achịkwa maka ndoputa ụgbọ elu
A mụrụ Berezin na ọwụwa anyanwụ Bronx na 1925 site na ndị Juu kwabatara na Alaeze Ukwu Russia, wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Christopher Columbus
Ọ malitere mahadum na Hunter College na January 1941, na-amụ Economics kama Physics ọ masịrị n'ihi na a họọrọ ya dị ka isiokwu maka ụmụ nwanyị n'oge ahụ
Mgbe WWII malitere, ohere ọhụrụ mere ka ọmụmụ physics kwe omume site na ohere agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum New York, gbakwunyere klaasị efu na ma Hunter na Brooklyn Polytech n'oge afọ agha
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ oge nile n'ehihie dị ka onye inyeaka na Ngalaba Rheology nke Ngalaba Nchọpụta nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Na-ebi akwụkwọ Mba Nile (IPI)
Ịga mahadum n'abalị, ọ natara BS ya
na physics na 1946
Berezin malitere ọrụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum New York, na-enwe mkpakọrịta site na United States Atomic Energy Commission
Na 1951 ọ nakweere ọrụ na Electronic Computer Corporation wee malite ebe ahụ dị ka onye isi nke Logic Design Department
Berezin bụ naanị onye na-eme atụmatụ mgbagha maka kọmpụta nke ECC mepụtara
N'afọ 1957, ụlọ ọrụ Underwood zụtara ECC (nke a na-akpọbu Underwood Typewriter Company )
N'ebe a, ọ haziri ọtụtụ kọmpụta bụ ndị zuru oke na nhazi mana nke dị n'otu n'otu na ngwa
Otu n'ime ha bụ usoro maka ndị agha US maka ịgbakọ ọnụ ọgụgụ dị iche iche, usoro maka ịchịkwa nkesa magazin, na ihe a na-ewere ugbu a dị ka kọmpụta ụlọ ọrụ mbụ
Ụlọ ọrụ Underwood Typewriter enweghị ike ịga n'ihu na mmepe ahụ gafere 1957, Berezin wee gaa ụlọ ọrụ a na-akpọ Teleregister, nke bụbu ngalaba nke Western Union
N'iji kọmpụta oghere oghere na mgbanwe ọkụ eletrik, Teleregister wuru otu n'ime sistemụ ndoputa ụgbọ elu mbụ, ' Reservisor '

N'iji teknụzụ transistor dị ọhụrụ, Berezin mepụtara usoro ndoputa kọmputa maka United Airlines nke bụ otu n'ime usoro kọmputa kachasị ukwuu n'oge ahụ, na-achịkwa obodo 60 na usoro nkwurịta okwu nke na-enye oge nzaghachi 1 nke abụọ
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka Teleregister, Berezin mepụtakwara usoro ụlọ akụ kọmputa nke mbụ

N'afọ 1968, Berezin nwere echiche maka nhazi okwu iji mee ka ọrụ ndị odeakwụkwọ dị mfe, na 1969 ọ tọrọ ntọala Redactron Corporation, nke ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze ma nyefee ọtụtụ puku usoro n'aka ndị ahịa n'ime ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi mba ụwa
A na-akpọ isi ngwaahịa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ' Onye odeakwụkwọ Data ' na ọ dị nha nke obere friji, enweghị ihuenyo, na keyboard na ngwa nbipute bụ ụdị typewriter IBM Selectric

N'afọ ndị 1970, ọ bụ ezie na ahịa ahụ nọgidere na-esiwanye ike na akụ na ụba ahụ nwere nnukwu ọnụ ahịa ọnụ ahịa, na-abawanye ọnụego ọmụrụ nwa ruo ọkwa (16%) bụ nke na-enweghị ike maka azụmahịa dị ka Redactron nke na-arụ ọrụ na ụwa nke a na-agbazinye ngwá ọrụ
E rere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Burroughs Corporation na 1976, wee tinye ya na ngalaba akụrụngwa ụlọ ọrụ ya
Berezin nọrọ ruo mgbe 1979
Na 1980, Berezin jere ozi dị ka Onye isi oche nke Greenhouse Management Company, Onye Mmekọ General nke otu nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ nke raara nye ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ dị elu nke mmalite
N'ime oge ọrụ ya niile ọ nwetara nzere doctorate site na Mahadum Adelphi na Mahadum Eastern Michigan
Berezin rụkwara ọrụ na bọọdụ nke CIGNA, Standard Microsystems, Koppers, na Datapoint
Berezin jere ozi na Board nke Stony Brook Foundation na Stony Brook University, Brookhaven National Laboratory na Boyce Thompson Institute

Berezin guzobe Berezin-Wilenitz Endowment, nke ga-enye uru nke ala ya iji kwụọ ụgwọ ma ọ bụ oche, prọfesọ, ma ọ bụ ego nyocha na Stony Brook na ngalaba sayensị ọ bụla dịka ekwuru na uche na ọgbụgba ndụ ya

Na mgbakwunye na onyinye ahụ, Berezin na di ya nwụrụ anwụ kwadoro Sam na Rose Berezin Endowed Scholarship, akwụkwọ nkuzi zuru oke nke a na-enye nwa akwụkwọ na-agụghị akwụkwọ nke na-ezube ịmụ akwụkwọ na sayensị, injinia ma ọ bụ mgbakọ na mwepụ, iji sọpụrụ ya
nne na nna
Berezin na Wilenitz guzobekwara onyinye Wilenitz nke Israel
Nke a na-enye ego akọ na ngalaba mmụta asụsụ na Mahadum Stony Brook, ebe Wilenitz nwetara nzere Masters
Berezin lụrụ Israel Wilenitz, onye injinia kemịkalụ, nke a mụrụ na 1922 na London afọ 51
Wilenitz nwụrụ na February 20, 2003
Berezin nwụrụ na Disemba 8, 2018, mgbe ọ dị afọ 93 ka ọ na-agwọ ọrịa kansa
Evelyn Boyd Granville (amuru May 1, 1924) bụ nwaanyị Afrika-Amerika nke abụọ nwetara PhD
na mgbakọ na mwepụ sitere na mahadum America; o nwetara ya n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na Mahadum Yale
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Smith College n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri anọ na ise
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ n’ihe gbasara kọmputa
Amụrụ Evelyn Boyd na Washington, DC ; nna ya rụrụ ọrụ ndị na-adịghị mma n'ihi nnukwu ịda mbà n'obi mana ya na nne Boyd kewapụrụ mgbe ọ ka dị obere
Boyd na nwanne ya nwaanyị tọrọ n'aka nne ha na nwanne nne ha, bụ́ ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'Ụlọ Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Okike na Mbipụta
Ọ bụ valedictorian na Dunbar High School, nke n'oge ahụ bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ kewapụrụ ma na-asọmpi agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ ojii na Washington

Site na nkwado ego sitere n'aka nwanne nne ya na obere akwụkwọ nkuzi sitere na Phi Delta Kappa, Boyd banyere Smith College na ọdịda nke afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri anọ na otú Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ na physics, mana ọ nwekwara mmasị dị ukwuu na mbara igwe
A họpụtara ya na Phi Beta Kappa na Sigma Xi wee gụchaa summa cum laude n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri anọ na ise

N'ịbụ onye akwụkwọ ikike gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Smith Student Aid Society of Smith College kwadoro ya, ọ tinyere akwụkwọ na mmemme gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ ma Mahadum Yale na Mahadum Michigan nabatara ya; ọ họọrọ Yale n'ihi enyemaka ego ha nyere
N'ebe ahụ, ọ mụtara nyocha ọrụ n'okpuru nlekọta nke Einar Hille, na-agwụcha akara mmụta doctorate nafo otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri anọ na iteghete
Akwụkwọ edemede ya bụ 'Na Laguerre Series in the Complex Domain'
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Boyd gara New York University Institute for Mathematics wee mee nyocha na nkuzi ebe ahụ

Mgbe ọ mèchàrà, n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise,o weere ọnọdụ nkuzi na Fisk University, kọleji maka ụmụ akwụkwọ ojii na Nashville, Tennessee (ihe ndị ọzọ na-ewu ewu na-adịghị adị maka ụmụ nwaanyị ojii)
Abụọ n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ ya n'ebe ahụ, Vivienne Malone-Mayes na Etta Zuber Falconer, gara n'ihu inweta doctorate na mgbakọ na mwepụ nke onwe ha
Mana ka ọ na-erule 1952 ọ hapụrụ agụmakwụkwọ wee laghachi Washington n'ọkwa na Diamond Ordnance Fuze Laboratories
N'onwa Jenụwarị n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise na isii, ọ kwagara IBM dị ka onye mmemme kọmputa ; mgbe IBM nwetara nkwekọrịta NASA, ọ kwagara Vanguard Computing Center na Washington, DC
Boyd si Washington kwaga New York City n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise na asaa
Nafo otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii, mgbe ọ lụsịrị Reverend G
Mansfield Collins, Boyd kwagara Los Angeles
N'ebe ahụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ na US Space Technology Laboratories, nke ghọrọ North American Aviation Space na Information Systems Division n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na abụọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị iche iche maka mmemme Apollo, gụnyere sistemu igwe nke eluigwe, mgbako trajectory, na “usoro kọmputa dijitalụ”
Manyere ịkwaga n'ihi nhazigharị na IBM, ọ nwetara ọkwa na California State University, Los Angeles n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ịsii na asaa dị ka onye prọfesọ zuru oke nke mgbakọ na mwepụ

Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na CSULA nafo otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri asatọ na anọ ọ kụziri na Texas College na Tyler, Texas afọ anọ, nafo otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri iteghete onyeere ngalaba nke Mahadum Texas na Tyler dị ka Sam A
Lindsey Prọfesọ nke mgbakọ na mwepụ
N'ebe ahụ, ọ malitere mmemme ime ka mgbakọ na mwepụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị
Kemgbe afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na asaa, Granville ka bụ onye nkwado siri ike maka agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwaanyị na teknologi

N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise na otu a jụrụ Granville na ndị ọrụ ibe ya abụọ nke Afrịka-Amerika America ịbanye na nzukọ mpaghara nke Mathematical Association of America (MAA), n'ihi na e mere ya na họtel naanị ndị ọcha
MAA na American Mathematical Society (AMS) mechara gbanwee omume ha, n'okpuru nrụgide Lee Lorch, iji meziwanye njikọta ha
Boyd lụrụ Reverend Gamaliele Mansifeld Collins nafo otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na otù
N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na asaa Boyd na Collins gbara alụkwaghịm
Ọ lụrụ onye na- ere ahịa Edward V
Granville n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri asaa
Ha abụọ kwagara Tyler, Texas n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri asatọ na atọ
N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri asatọ na iteghete, Smith College nyere ya nzere doctorate, nke mbụ nke ụlọ ọrụ America nyere nwanyị African-American mgbakọ na mwepụ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche Sam A
Lindsey nke Mahadum Texas na Tyler (1990-1991)
N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri iteghete na asatọ, National Academy of Engineering kwanyeere Granville ùgwù
N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri iteghete na iteghete, United States National Academy of Sciences kpọbatara ya na Portrait Collection of African-Americans in Science
N'afọ pụkụ abụọ, e nyere ya Wilbur Lucius Cross Medal, nsọpụrụ kachasị elu nke Yale Graduate School Alumni Association
N'afọ pụkụ abụọ na otú, e hotara ya na mkpebi nkwonkwo nke steeti Virginia No
377, na-ahọpụta Febụwarị 25 dị ka 'African-American Scientist and Inventor Day'
N'afọ pụkụ abụọ na isii, Spelman College nyere ya akara ugo mmụta nsọpụrụ
N'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na isii, ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ New Relic's Mount Codemore kpọrọ ya dịka otu n'ime 'ndị dike anọ nke onyinye ụmụ nwanyị na sayensị na teknụzụ'
N'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na iteghete, Mathematically Gifted & Black ghọtara ya dị ka Black History Month Honoree
Evelyn Ebhomien (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 15 n'ọnwa Febrụwarị 1981) bịa bụrụ onye ebuli elu Naijiria
Ọ gbara asọmpi na mmemme dị fechaa nke ụmụ nwanyị na asọmpi Olimpik Summer 2000
Evelyn Masaiti bụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ndi ụmụ nwanyị, okike na mmepe obodo na Zimbabwe
Ọ bụ onye otu House of Assembly maka Dzivaresekwa (MDC-T)
Àtụ 7th Parliament of Zimbabwe

Evelyn Nwabuoku (amụrụ na 14 Nọvemba 1985) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti En Avant de Guingamp na French Division 1 Féminine na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Naijiria ma ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu mba
Nwabuoku gbara bọọlụ na mbụ maka BIIK Kazygurt na asọmpi bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Kazakhstan na Bayelsa Queens na Rivers Angels na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị nke Naịjirịa
Nwabuoku gbara bọọlụ na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa maka Bayelsa Queens na Rivers Angels tupu ọ kwaga BIIK Kazygurt nke asọmpi bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Kazakhstan na 2015
O mechara kwaga n'akụkụ French En Avant de Guingamp, ebe ya na nwanne ya nwanyị, na onye Naijiria mba ọzọ Desire Oparanozie sonyeere
O nyeere Nwabuoku aka na nsogbu asụsụ mbụ na ibi n'ógbè ahụ
Nwabuoku mere nke mbụ ya na mmeri ya megide ndị ọkacha mmasị na league FCF Juvisy, ma too ikuku na Fred-Aubert Stadium
Ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Naịjirịa, nke a na-akpọ 'Super Falcons', na 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup na 2014 African Women's Championship na-emeri nke ikpeazụ
Nwabuoku kwuru na ịbụ onyeisi ụgbọ mmiri bụ 'ihe ịtụnanya', nakwa na 'Ọ dịghị ihe dị ukwuu dị ka ịnọchite anya na ịgbachitere mpako nke mba gị'
Otú ọ dị, ọ gbakwụnyere na ndị otu ahụ emeghị nke ọma n'ime afọ ole na ole gara aga ma na-achọ imeziwanye na 2017 Africa Cup of Nations
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị otu na 2012 African Women's Championship
Osimiri Ndị Mmụọ Ozi
Naịjirịa
Oriaku Evelyn Okere bu nwanyi oji ego achu ego O na ebiputa akwukwo nke na ako maka ahu ike na icho mma nke a na akpo St
Eve; O bu onye isi nke i chu ego gbasara ahu ike,O nnwekwara uno olu njikwa na icho mma nke ana akpo Rose di Omimi
Okere gara akwukwo na mahadu di na Enugu steti nke anakpo University of Nigeria, Nsukka
Okere ruru olu nulo aku,ulo mgbasa ozi na unu olu nke na emebi mmanu ugboO bidoro uno olu St Eve nafo 2010
Na onwa nke asato nafo 2012,uno olu ya kpotara onye oku egwu anakpo Rick Ross na ihe nlere nke emere na Lagos
Evelyn Omavowan Oboro (a mụrụ n'afọ 1971) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria nọ n'ụlọ omeiwu gọọmentị etiti
Ọ na-anọchi anya mpaghara Okpe, Sapele na Uvwie nke Delta Steeti na 7th na 8th National Assembly
A hoputara ya n’okpuru otu People's Democratic Party (PDP)
Ọ natara asambodo West Africa School na Alegbo Secondary School,dị na Effurum n'afọ 1988 tupu ọ tinye akwụkwọ maka agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Delta Steeti ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachlelọ n'afọ 1997
O nwetara nzere Master of Public Administration n'afọ 2002 na nzere na Iwu n'afọ 2009 na Mahadum nke Delta Steeti

Everett Gendler (August 8, 1928 , April 1, 2022) bụ onye rabaị America, nke a maara maka idu ndú ya na itinye aka na ihe ndị na-aga n'ihu, gụnyere òtù na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, enweghị ime ihe ike nke ndị Juu, na òtù ndị Juu Havurah
Site na 1978 na 1995, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ụkọchukwu ndị Juu mbụ na Phillips Academy, Andover
A kọwawo ya dị ka 'nna nke ndị Juu na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi'
A mụrụ Gendler na Chariton, Iowa, na afọ 1928 n'ezinụlọ ndị Juu na-ekpe okpukpe nke kwagara Des Moines na afọ 1939
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Theodore Roosevelt High School wee gaa n'ihu nweta BA
na Mahadum Chicago na 1948 n'oge Robert Hutchins na-eduzi
Ọ nọgidere na Chicago ruo 1951 na-amụ ihe na onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Rudolf Carnap
N'afọ 1957, ụlọ akwụkwọ Jewish Theological Seminary họpụtara ya dị ka onye rabaị Conservative

Na ngwụcha afọ 1950 na mmalite afọ 1960, Gendler jere ozi dị ka onye rabaị n'ọtụtụ ọgbakọ na Latin America, gụnyere Beth Israel Community Center na Mexico City, Mexico (1957), Associacao Religiosa Israelita na Rio de Janeiro, Brazil (1961), na ọgbakọ ise nke Havana, Cuba (High Holidays and Easter, 1968)
Site na 1962-1968, Gendler jere ozi dị ka onye rabaị na Jewish Center nke Princeton, New Jersey

N'ime ngwụcha afọ 1960 na mmalite afọ 1970, Gendler, ya na nwunye ya Mary Gendler (amụrụ n'afọ 1940) sonyere n'ọtụtụ obodo obibi ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Ivan Illich's Centro Intercultural de Documentación na Cuernavaca, Mexico (1968-1969) (n'akụkụ Harvey Cox) na ebe obibi inter-racial inter-religious Packard Manse na Stoughton, Massachusetts (1969化1971)

N'afọ 1971, Gendler ghọrọ onye rabaị na Temple Emanuel nke Ndagwurugwu Merrimack na n'afọ 1977, Ted Sizer họpụtara Gendler dị ka onye ụkọchukwu ndị Juu mbụ na Phillips Academy, Andover dị ka akụkụ nke 'ozi atọ' ndị Katọlik Protestant na ndị Juu Gendler nọgidere n'ọkwa ya na Phillips Andover, n'akụkụ ọnọdụ ya na Temple Emanual nke Ndagugwu Merromack, ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, mgbe ọ dị afọ 67, na 1995
Site na 1995 ruo 2022, Gendler, ya na nwunye ya Mary Gendler، tinyere aka n'ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ obodo n'etiti ndị Tibet a chụgara na Strategic Nonviolent Struggle
N'afọ 2007, ha rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na ntọala nke Active Nonviolence Education Center na Dharmasala, India

Ọ bụ nna nke ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Tamar Gendler, onye bụ Prọfesọ nke nkà ihe ọmụma na Dean nke Faculty of Arts and Sciences na Mahadum Yale, na Naomi Gendler Camper, onye bụ Chief Policy Officer na American Bankers Association
Gendler sonyere n'ihe gbasara ikike obodo n'etiti afọ 1950, nke itinye aka na American Jewish Society for Service 1955 summer institute na Highlander Folk School na Monteagle, Tennessee

N'ime afọ 1960, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'itinye ndị Juu America n'ime òtù ahụ, na-eduga ìgwè ndị rabaị America isonye n'ememe ekpere na ngagharị iwe na Albany, Georgia (1962), Birmingham, Alabama (1963) na Selma, Alabama (1965), ma mee kaAbraham Joshua Heschel sonye na njem a ma ama site na Selma ruo Montgomery (1965)
Gendler nyere aka n'ịhazi okwu dị mkpa nke Martin Luther King na mgbakọ ndị rabaị nke mba na Machị iri abụọ na ise 1968, ụbọchị iri tupu ọnwụ King, na-eduzi ihe ga-abụ ajụjụ ọnụ ikpeazụ ya na MLK
Gendler bụkwa onye mbụ na-akwado okpukpe ndị Juu maka ikike nhata maka ndị na-edina nwoke ibe ha, itinye aka n'ememe ụmụ nwanyị, na ikike ndị Palestine
Gendler na-akwado ọnọdụ na enweghị ime ihe ike n'okpukpe bụ akụkụ nke okpukpe ndị Juu dị ka ọ dị na okpukpe ndị ọzọ
Gendler jere ozi na bọọdụ nke Jewish Peace Fellowship, na bọọdụ Shomer Shalom Institute for Jewish Nonviolence
N'afọ 2021, Ben Yehuda Press bipụtara nsụgharị ya nke ọrụ Rabbi Aaron Samuel Tamares, na otuto dị egwu
N'afọ 2013, T'ruah Foundation nyere ya onyinye Human Rights Hero Award iji kwado ọrụ ndụ ya maka enweghị ime ihe ike, ikike mmadụ, gburugburu ebe obibi

Gendler bụ onye, otu mbụ nke Havurat Shalom, onye guzobere Alternative Religious Community na Marblehead, Massachusetts, na onye nyere aka dị mkpa n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ekpere liturgical ndị Juu, akwụkwọ akụkọ na anthologies

N'ime afọ 1960 na afọ 1970, nke ọrụ na ihe odide nke ndị enyi ya na ndị nkuzi Helen na Scott Nearing kpaliri, Gendler tinyere aka na nchedo na gburugburu ebe obibi, ọ bụkwa onye na-akwado ma na-eme ọrụ ugbo na nri akwụkwọ nri
N'afọ 1978, o tinyere ìhè ebighi ebi nke mbụ sitere n'anyanwụ n'elu ụlọ nzukọ ya na Lowell Massachusetts
N'ime afọ iri atọ sochirinụ, o bipụtara ọtụtụ isiokwu gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi ndị Juu ma nye ọtụtụ narị okwu gbasara isiokwu ahụ
N'afọ 2008, ọ natara onyinye Lifetime Achievement maka onyinye ya na gburugburu ebe obibi ndị Juu site na Isabella Freedman Jewish Retreat Center

N'afọ 2013, a kwanyeere ya ùgwù na President' Medallion site na Hebrew Union College-Jewish Institute of Religion iji kwado 'ndụ nke nraranye na ụmụ mmadụ' na 'ndụ ndụ nke itinye aka na ikpe ziri ezi na gburugburu ebe obibi'

N'afọ 2013, a matara ọrụ ndụ ya site n'ịmepụta Gendler Grapevine Project, atụmatụ afọ isii e mere iji mee emume ma mee ka ọrụ ndụ Gendler dịgide, ma bụrụ ebe nchekwa na-adịgide adịgide nke isiokwu na nkuzi ya
Everlyn Chemutai (amụrụ na 12 Ọktoba na afo 1976) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego na onye omeiwu nke Uganda
Ọ bụ nwanyị nnọchiteanya nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda maka mpaghara Bukwo kemgbe afọ 2016
Ọ nwere njikọ na National Resistance Movement (NRM)
A mụrụ Everlyn Chemutai na 12 Ọktoba na afo 1976
Ọ gụsịrị ule Primary Leaving na afo 1989 na Chebinyiny Primary School
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Uganda Certificate of Education na Gamatui Girls SS
n'afọ 1993
Ọ gara Sebei College Tegere ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education na afo 1997
E nyere ya diplọma na Business Studies site na Uganda College of Commerce, Soroti n'afọ 2000
Ọ gara maka agụmakwụkwọ ya ọzọ wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Science in Accounting na Mahadum Makerere na afo 2012
Everlyn Chemutai was an Accounts Assistant for Wilcon Enterprises, Soroti from 2001–2002
She became the Bursar for Moroto High School from 2002–2006
She became the Project Accountant for Africa Leadership Institute from 2004 - 2011
She was the Accounts/ Records Assistant for The AIDS support Organization (TASO) Uganda from 2012 -2015
She became the Member of Parliament of Uganda from 2016 to date
She is the vice chairperson for the Committee on HIV/AIDS and Related Matters
She is also a member of the Committee on Agriculture, Animal Industry and Fisheries
Ọ kwadoro egwuregwu bọọlụ, ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị kwadoro, ndị otu ndị mahadum kwadoro n'ime mpaghara ya
Everlyn Chemutai sonyere na nnọkọ ndị omeiwu ebe ndị omeiwu ga-atụ vootu ma ha ga-ewepụ ụtụ isi Mobile Money ma ọ bụ na ọ gaghị ma ọ sị YES
Evertek bụ onye na-emepụta ekwentị na Tunisia
Evertek bụ akara ahịa nke Cellcom, nke n'aka nke ya bụ akụkụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Tunisia YKH Group
Malite na 2008, Evertek mepụtara ọtụtụ ekwentị mkpanaaka (Dual na triple SIM) ma na-enweta ọganihu na-aga n'ihu n'ahịa Tunisia
N'ihe dị ka afọ 2010, ekwentị Evertek nwere òkè ahịa 10% na Tunisia, a na-erekwa ya na Morocco, France, na ụgbọ elu British Airways, KLM na Virgin Atlantic
Na Jenụwarị 2018, Evertek wepụtara smartphone V4 Nano
Na June nke afọ 2018, Evertek wepụtara smartphone ọhụrụ nke gam akporo V8 curved

Evladiya Slavcheva-Stefanova (Bulgarian Евладия Славчева-Стефанова; amụrụ na 25 Febụwarị 1962 na Pernik, Bulgaria) bụ onye Bulgaria bụbu onye na agba bọọlụ basketball onye sonyere na 1980 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ na 1988 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Evolushọnari Ekologi bụ akwụkwọ sayensị a na-enyocha kwa ọnwa na-ekpuchi ọmụmụ nke gburugburu ebe obibi site n'echiche evolushọn
E guzobere ya n'afọ 1987 nke Springer Science + Business Media bipụtara ya
Onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ bụ Matthew Symonds (Deakin University)
Evoxine (haploperine) bụ furoquinoline alkaloid nwere mmetụta hypnotic na sedative
A na-ahụ ya ahazi ka ndị n'ụzọ okike n'ọtụtụ osisi Australia na Africa gụnyere Evodia xanthoxyloides na Teclea gerrardii
Ofe Ewedu bụ ofe nke ndị Yoruba na-aṅụkarị yiri ofe Okra nke e ji akwụkwọ jute mee, ya mere a maara ya dị ka ofe akwụkwọ jute
Ofe Yoruba bụ ihe na-amị amị ma na-eso anụ ehi na anụ azụ nke Naijiria
Ofe Ewedu na-ewe ihe dị ka nkeji iri na abụọ iji kwadebe ma bụrụ nke kachasị mma na yam, fufu na Amala
Pluck jute na-eji mmiri ma gwakọta akwụkwọ, wee tinye crayfish, locust bean nke a makwaara dị ka iru na nnu iji nye ya ụtọ achọrọ
Gbaa mbọ hụ na ị naghị etinye mmiri dị ukwuu, ị nwekwara ike ileghara iji ijabe (mgbasa ọdịnala) eme ihe iji kụọ na kaun (potash) anya ebe ọ bụ na ị na-eji blender
Ị ga-achọ ihe ndị a iji mee ofe ewedu
Mgbe ị wepụsịrị akwụkwọ jute ọhụrụ, sachaa ma wepụ mmiri ruo mgbe ọ gaghịzi ájá n'ime ha site n'ịchịkọta akwụkwọ ahụ na-ahapụ ájá na ihe fọdụrụ n'ime mmiri
Ị nwere ike ịhọrọ isi akwụkwọ Ewedu ruo mgbe ọ ga-eme ka ọ dịkwuo mfe ịgwakọta
Ị nwere ike ịpụta na iji Ijabe, nke bụ ihe eji eme ihe ọdịnala nke a na-eji akụ Ewedu ruo mgbe ọ dị nro mana enwere ike inweta nsonaazụ ngwa ngwa na nke na-adọrọ adọrọ site na iji blender
Nanị wụnye akwụkwọ jute n'ime blender, tinye obere mmiri iji gbochie ya ka ọ ghara ịdị mmiri nke ukwuu ma gwakọta ruo mgbe ọ dị nro

Enyo pụtara ọdịdị simenti ahụ kemgbe afọ 1959, nke bụ mgbe amalite mmepụta simenti Lafarge na mba Naịjirịa
N'agbanyeghị na ọ na omepeghi emepe, Ewekoro nwere mpụtara dị mma, maka itinye azụmahịa Na-Enye ego n'ihi ịdị nso ya nye obodo abụọ kachasị ukwuu na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa

aegagrus) nke ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Eshia na Eastern Europe zụlitere ya Ewu bụ onye sitere na ezinụlọ anụmanụ Bovidae na ebo Caprini, nke pụtara na ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na atụrụ Enwere ihe karịrị ụdị ewu 300 dị iche iche Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụdị anụmanụ ndị kacha ochie n'ụlọ, dị ka ihe ndị mgbe ochie na-egosi na n'ime ụlọ mbụ ya mere na Iran na kalenda afọ 10,000 gara aga

Exclusive Movies is an Egyptian digital video streaming platform for services that was established in 2020 / Ramadan 1441 AH, and the platform was created to display classic Egyptian artworks, films and Ramadan series in the media company in the Middle East and North Africa region
'Mohamed Mohsen' serving as the Chief Content Officer (CCO)
In 2020, Exclusive Movies has nearly 10 million users, and digital video views on Exclusive Movies platforms have reached nearly 100 million

The 'Exclusive Movies' platform offers a variety of content directed to all members of society and families of all ages, including children's programs and series, 'Disney in Arabic', 'Disney World', and a wide range of various Arab and foreign series and films, And series Anime and Bollywood, Turkish, Gulf, Korean and Latin series, in addition to talk shows, social and news
The premium subscription-based service ‘Exclusive Movies’ was launched in 2020, which provided users with a variant of the free video on demand (VOD) service
Thereby, allowing subscribers to view all the available content without the interruption of any advertisements
Exclusive Movies has been entering into strategic partnerships with relevant companies to increase accessibility
It started with a partnership with Viva in 2021, the telecom operator in Kuwait, which facilitated subscriber payment via their mobile phones
In 2021, a partnership took place with Omantel, the telecom provider in Oman giving its users access to Exclusive Movies subscription
Vodafone Egypt entered the network in 2021 making Exclusive Movies available for Vodafone subscribers without any additional costs

In Saudi Arabia, Exclusive Movies content is provided through Saudi Telecom Company (STC), which started with a partnership between the two companies in May 2021 and a free two-month subscription to Exclusive Movies was given to all STC users

Expelled Because of Color bụ ihe a tụrụ atụ ọla nchara, feet isii (18 ) ogologo, nke John Thomas Riddle, Jr
Ọ dị na ala nke Georgia State Capitol, narị abụọ na iri anọ State Capitol SW, Atlanta, Georgia
Ọ bụ ndị Georgia Legislative Black Caucus nyèrè ya iwu na 1976 ma kpughee ya n'ubochí irí na isii n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1978, ụbọchị nké abụọ kwa afọ nkè Georgia Association of Black Elected Officials Day
Ihe oyiyi ahụ na-echeta ndị Original 33, ndị omeiwu Africa-America 33 a chụpụrụ na ndị omeiwu Georgia na 1868
Ihe e dèrè n'elu ihe ahụ a tụrụ atụ na-agụ, sị
8'Expelled Because of Color' bụ maka ncheta nke ndị omeiwu steeti ojii irí àtó nà àtó a chụpụrụ n'ụlọ Georgia n'ihi ụcha ha na 1868
Ọdịdị blọk cinder dị n'ala nke ihe a tụrụ atụ na-anọchi ányá iwulite nghọta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ojii na nnọchite anya onwe onye na Georgia
Ịgba ohu anyị, ọrụ anyị na Agha Mgbanwe, ụka ojii, ọrụ anyị nwere na ikike ịtụ vootu bụ akụkụ nke ọgụ ndị isi ojii Georgia si n'ụgbọ ohu gaa n'ụlọ steeti
John Riddle, onye na-ese ihe

Mmeme Eyeo bụ nnọkọ kwa afọ maka ndị na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ na data na koodu
Ọ na-ewere ọnọdụ na Minneapolis
Nzukọ ahụ malitere na 2011, ma na-ewere ọnọdụ kwa afọ kemgbe ahụ, na-emekarị na Walker Art Center
N'ihi ọrịa COVID-19, e wepụrụ ihe omume ahụ maka 2020 na 2021
Ọ bụ Dave Schroeder, Thor Jerp, Caitlin Rae Hargarten, na Wes Grubs haziri ihe omume ahụ
Nzukọ ahụ gosipụtara ndị ọkà okwu na-arụ ọrụ na nnyocha data, ndị na-emepụta koodu na ndị na-agba ọsọ

Ndị ọkà okwu gara aga gụnyere Amanda Cox, Stefanie Posavec na Giorgia Lupi (ndị zutere na anya na 2013), Mike Bostock, Nicholas Felton, Adam Harvey, Paola Antonelli, Roman Verostko, Frieder Nake, Lillian Schwartz, Fernanda Viégas na Martin Wattenberg, Ben Fry, Rachel Binx, Moritz Stefaner, Jenny Odell, Lauren McCarthy, Kyle McDonald, Samuel Sinyangwe, Zachary Lieberman, Golan Levin, Paola Antieh'I
Eyerusalem Kuma (amụrụ na 7 Septemba na afọ 1981 na Addis Ababa) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge, onye na-asọ mpi na marathons
O nwere ihe kacha mma nke 2 24 55 awa maka ebe dị anya ma bụrụ onye mmeri 2009 nke Amsterdam Marathon
Na mbido ọrụ ya, o ritere ihe nrite otu na Kenya na IAAF World Cross Country Championships
Ihe kacha mma ọ rụzuru bụ nke ise na 2002 na nke anọ na 2003
Ihe nrite mba ụwa mbụ ya bịara na African Championships in Athletics, ebe ọ bụ onye nwetara ọla nchara 10,000 mita na 2002 na onye mmeri Africa na 2004
Ọ bụkwa onye nke anọ na ihe omume ahụ na 2003 All-Africa Games
O meriri ihe nrite ọla edo nke otu ha na 2004 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships
Mgbe ọ nno ezumike ọrụ ya, ọ pụtara dị ka ọkachamara na marathon na 2009
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Amsterdam Marathon na 2010 na 2011
N'afọ 2013, Kuma dara ule doping nke e mere na Amsterdam Marathon
A kwụsịrị ya afọ abụọ
Na mbido ọrụ ya, ọ bụ ọkachamara na ọsọ ọsọ na ịgba ọsọ na-agafe mba
Ọ mere nke mbụ ya n'afọ sochirinụ na 2001 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, na-abịa nke 23 na ogologo ọsọ ma na-enyere Ethiopia aka inweta ọlaọcha

Kuma mere mmetụta mbụ ya n'afọ sochirinụ, dịka ọnọdụ nke ise ya na ogologo ọsọ na 2002 IAAF World Cross Country Championships duuru mba ya gaa n'ọkwa otu ma kwuo na ọla nchara karịrị mita 10,000 na 2002 African Championships in Athletics (n'azụ ndị Kenya Susan Chepkemei na Leah Malot)
Na 2003 IAAF World Cross Country Championships ọ nwere ọkwa kachasị elu, na-abịa nke anọ ma na-ewere aha otu ya na ndị nrite Werknesh Kidane na Merima Denboba
O mekwara ka ọ bụrụ onye Ethiopia na 10,000 mita na 2003 Afro-Asian Games, ebe ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Ejegayehu Dibaba
N'agbanyeghị ngosipụta na-adịghị mma na 2004 World Cross Country, ọ meriri nnukwu aha mbụ ya na 2004 African Championships in Athletics, na-emeri ndị niile bịara iji nweta ihe nrite ọla edo 10,000m
Kuma setịpụrụ 10,000m nke onwe ya n'afọ ahụ na Utrecht, Netherlands, na-agba ọsọ oge 31 2546 nkeji
Nke a sụgharịrị ka ọ bụrụ ihe ịga nke ọma n'okporo ụzọ ọ bịara nke isii na 2004 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships ma duru otu Bezunesh Bekele na Teyba Erkesso gaa na nrite ọla edo
Ọ gbara ọsọ na 2005 ma nwee ezumike n'ọrụ ịgba ọsọ ya ruo 2009
Eyerusalam laghachiri n'asọmupi site n'ime nke mbụ ya n'elu marathon na 2009 na Dubai Marathon, ebe oge ya nke 2 26 51 awa wetara ya ọnọdụ nke isii
Na njem nke abụọ ya n'ebe ahụ, ọ meriri na 2009 Amsterdam Marathon
O nwetara ọkara marathon nke onwe ya nke 1 1042 awa na usoro nke onye nke abụọ na Great Scottish Run na Glasgow
Ọ bụ naanị nke asatọ na Prague Marathon na 2010, mana mgbe ọ laghachiri Amsterdam ọ bụ onye nke abụọ n'ime oge nke 2 27 04 awa
Ọ gbara ọsọ na 2011 Paris Marathon wee bịa nke anọ
N'ọkwa nke atọ ya na-esote na Amsterdam Marathon, ọ gbara ọsọ nke onwe ya nke 2 24 55 awa, mana ọ bụ onye nke abụọ ọzọ ka ọ na-agwụ n'azụ onye Etiopia ibe ya Tiki Gelana
Eyerusalem emeghị podium na ọ bụla n'ime njem ya na afọ 2012 ọ bịara onye nke asaa na Tokyo Marathon na nke ise na Toronto Waterfront Marathon na Hannover Marathon
Agbụrụ mbụ ya nke afọ 2013 hụrụ ya ka ọ bụ onye nke atọ na Xiamen International Marathon na Vienna City Marathon
Emume Eyo, nke a makwaara dị ka Adamu Orisha Play, bụ emume Yoruba pụrụ iche na Lagos, Nigeria
N'oge a, ndị Lagos na-egosi ya dị ka ihe omume ndị njem nleta ma n'ihi akụkọ ihe mere eme ya, a na-eme ya na Lagos Island
Okwu 'Eyo' na-ezo aka na ndị na-agba egwú ejiji, nke a maara dị ka masquerades nke na-apụta n'oge ememme ahụ
A na-achọta mmalite nke emume a na ọrụ dị n'ime nke òtù nzuzo nke Lagos
Laa azụ n'ụbọchị ahụ, a na-eme mmeme Eyo iji duru mkpụrụ obi nke Eze ma ọ bụ Onye isi Lagos na-apụ apụ ma webata eze ọhụrụ
E kwenyere n'ọtụtụ ebe na egwuregwu ahụ bụ otu n'ime ngosipụta nke mmeme omenala ndị Afrịka nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye na-ebute ụzọ na carnival nke oge a na Brazil

N'ụbọchị Eyo, a na-emechi okporo ụzọ dị n'etiti obodo ahụ (site na njedebe nke Carter Bridge ruo Tinubu Square) maka okporo ụzọ, na-enye ohere maka ngagharị site na Idumota gaa n'obí eze Iga Idunganran
Ihe mkpuchi Eyo na-acha ọcha na-anọchite anya mmụọ nke ndị nwụrụ anwụ, a na-akpọkwa ya na Yoruba dị ka 'agogoro Eyo' (n'ụzọ nkịtị 'ogologo Eyo')
Ngagharị mbụ na Lagos bụ n'ụbọchị 20 nke ọnwa Febụwarị, n'afọ 1854, iji cheta ndụ Oba Akintoye
N'ebe a, ndị sonyere niile na-asọpụrụ Oba na-achị Lagos
A na-eme emume ahụ mgbe ọ bụla oge na omenala chọrọ, ọ bụ ezie na a na-emekarị ya dị ka akụkụ nke emume olili ozu ikpeazụ nke onye isi a na-akwanyere ùgwù nke ukwuu n'ụlọ eze
