Eze Isiocha ( Chinese 伊薩 amụrụ 9 Julaị 1987) bụ onye Naijiria bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ
Ọ gbara bọọlụ ikpeazụ dị ka onye na- aga n'ihu maka Nasarawa United na Nigeria Professional Football League na 2013
Isiocha nwekwara ikike ịbụ nwa amaala Hong Kong
Isiocha malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya na Nigeria Premier League n'akụkụ El-Kanemi Warriors na 2005, tupu ọ kwaga na nnukwu klọb ama ama Enugu Rangers FC na 2006
Ọ pụtara maka Rangers na asọmpi CAF Champions League

Mgbe e mesịrị na 2007, ọ bịanyere aka na Bayelsa United nke Naijiria ọzọ wee gwuo egwu ebe ahụ ruo mgbe klọb ahụ chụrụ iri na asaa n'ime ndị egwuregwu iri atọ na asaa gụnyere ya, n'akwụkwọ ya maka oge egwuregwu 2007
Na 2007, Isiocha bịanyere aka na Hong Kong Premier League akụkụ Citizen AA wee merie 2007–08 Hong Kong FA Cup

Nọmba 9 nke e debere n'azụ uwe ya na Happy Valley AA, Isiocha dị njikere site na agba nke abụọ nke 2008-09 Hong Kong First Division League hosting Fourway, na-enye onyinye gọọlu-atọ na 9- 0 ha gbara Mutual wee jiri ihe mgbaru ọsọ anọ mechie oge
Isiocha bịara India wee bịanye aka na Goa dabeere Sporting Clube de Goa n'oge etiti 2007
Ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị, ọ gbara akwụkwọ na FIFA, òtù na-ahụ maka egwuregwu football ụwa, na-ekwu na ya nwetara nkwekọrịta afọ atọ ma ọ kwụsịrị n'oge na-adịghị anya ka ha ji ya ego
Isiocha, onye nkwekọrịta afọ atọ ya na klọb malite na 2007-08 kwụsịrị mgbe ọnwa abụọ gasịrị site na mkpesa FIFA na ọ nataghị ụgwọ ọrụ ya
Mgbe nyochachara, FIFA gwara ụlọ ọgbakọ Goan ka ha kwụọ ụgwọ
Peter Vaz, onyeisi oche nke SCG, ọ bụ ezie na klọb ahụ ekwesịghị
Eze Mbanasọ nke Opobo (aha ọmumu ya Mbanasọ Ọkwarazurumba ; ca 1821-1891) bụbụ onye-isi ahịa na onye guzobere ḿbà-obodo Opobo na mpaghara dị n'ugbua obodo Rivers na Nigeria
Amuru ya n'Umuduruọha, Amaigbo n' AnịBiafra n'áfọ̀ 1821
Ndị ntọrị tọrọ ya mgbe ọ dị naanị áfọ̀ 12 ma rele ya dịka ohu n'Ụbanị
Ndị Briten kpọrọ ya 'Jaja' ,nrụrụaka aha nnakwere ya bụ Jubo Jubogha, ya bụ nke onye-nwe ya n'Ụbanị nwere ya
Nze Iganipughuma Allison nke Ụbanị gotara ya
N'ihi na ọ na kpa àgwà ísí-íké,Nze Iganipughuma jiri ya nyere enyì ya bụ Madu(Maduka) dịka ihe onyinye
Mgbe ọ dị onyeazị, ọ rụ ọrụ dịka ọnyaụgbọmmiri n'ime ndị ụgbọmmiri-mgbahịa nke ọ̀kà ya wee na ganye na gapụta anị imelime
Dịka oge na fega,ọ bidoro igosipụtara ezigbote amamihe gbasara azụmahịa
Ọ na-echekwa ego ọ kpata sina mgbahịa n'akụkụ wee tọhapụ onwe ya pụọ ọrụohu mgbe ọ dị ntorobia
Ọ mụtara ndị omenaanị n'ọdịnaanị n'Ụbanị, ya mere na ndị ámáàlà masiri ya
Mbanasọ bụ mbeelụsọ n'ihi na enweghị onye sina ọkwá ohu tolite ruo ọkwá nnukwu onye mgbahịa n'Ụbanị
Sitere n'ọrụsike, nnọgide, uche azụmahịa dịelu nakwa eziokwu, ọ ghọlite na wụlụbe onwe ya ịbụ nnukwu onye-nwe ísí n'Ụlọ Anna Pepple
Mgbe Alali( nwanwoke Maduka nakwa onye-ísí Ụlọ Anna Pepple) nwụrụ,ọ hapụrụ nnukwu ụgwọ nke dị n'etiti £10,000-£15,000 ọ jiri ndị mgbahịa Briten makana ọtụtụ kredit ọ nara n'aka ndị mgbahịa Briten
Maka okpotoko ụgwọ a ndị-nwe ísí n'Ụlọ Anna Pepple na-etụ ụjọ ịnọchie ya mana n'oge gafere Mbanasọ kpebiri ịnọchie ya
N'okpuru ndú ya, ọ kwụghachi ụgwọ ahu niile n'ime naanị áfọ̀ 2

Ụlọ Anna Pepple bidoro imịnye ụfọdụ ndị ụlọ mgbahịa nakwa na chịkọbara mgbahịa nke kpatalụ ekọwọlọ n'etiti ndị asọmpi ya, ruo mgbe esemokwu malitere n'etiti ha na ndị Ụlọ Manilla Pepple nke Oko Jumbo(onyeIgbo-ọbụbụ ohu) na-edu
Eseokwu nakwa agha n'etiti ndị ụlọ mgbahịa abụọ a kpatalụ Mbanasọ na ndị ótú ya ikewapụta ma guzolite ḿbà-obodo Opobo n'áfọ̀ 1869
Mbanasọ bidoro ịmanyesịke íké-ọchịchị ya n'Opobo nakwa ịgbakwunyere ụfọdụ anị Ibibio n'ime ókèàlà ya
N'oge adịghị anya Opobo bidoro ịchịkọbara azụmahịa na mmanụ akwụ dị na mpaghara ahu, ruo mgbe ọ nwetara 14 ndị ọbụbụ ụlọ mgbahịa Ụbani
Eze Mbanasọ jiri ọtụtụ íké ọchịchị n'ime mpaghara ahu wee na gbachibido ndị mgbahịa Briten oghere n'ahịa anị imelime nakwa manyere ha ịkwụ ụgwọ comey nke a bụ aha nkenke atụmahịa n'asụsụ Inglish
N'áfọ̀ 1894, maka ụjọ mbanye Germani,onye konsul na Niger Delta manyere Eze Mbanasọ ịbị akara ya n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta ka obodo ya bụ anịnchekwa nke Briten mana ọ ga jigide nnwereonwe n'azụmahịa
Mana esemokwu n'etiti ya na ndị mgbahịa Briten kpatalụ ka ọ bidoro iji ụgbọmmiri ya bufere ngwahịa ga Liverpool wee gbahapụ ndị mgbahịa etiti Briten
Na 1884, n'ọgbakọ Berlin, ha bunyere Briten etiokun Biafra nke gụnyere Opobo dịka ókèàlà ha
Mgbe Eze Mbanasọ nuru maka ndapụta ọhụrụ a, ọ gbara ngagharịiwe mana Ọchịchị Briten gbara ya nkịtị
Briten hibere ọkwá ọhụrụ akpọrọ Osote-Konsul nke Mmiri-akụkụ Biafra
Ha tinyere Harry Johnston n'ọkwá ahu
Harry Johnston bụ onye mmegide Mbanasọ ma chọrọkwa iwepụta ya
Ya na Eze Mbanasọ nwetere esemokwu gbasara ikikere ndị mgbahịa Briten ịgbahịa n'efụ
Ha na esedide okwu ruo ụbọchị 19 Septmeber, 1885 mgbe Johnston nwuchiri Eze Mbanasọ nakwa kpere ya ikpe n'Akkra, Etiokun Ọlaedo tupu ha chụpụ ya ga Saint Vincent
N'áfọ̀ 1891, mgbe ayịyọ mesịara Ọchịchị Briten kwelunye ilotaghachi ya ga Opobo mana ha gbanwezie ngịga ha ịga Tenerife, ndị Àgwàetiti Kanari, ọ ñụrụ tii n'ụgbọmmiri ahu wee nwụlụ na Tenerife

Eze Ènweleána II Obidiegwu Onyesoh bụ Nke iri na isii e dekọrọ, ma na-achị ugbu a, Eze Nri nke Alaeze Nri na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria nke oge a
Ọ na-achị ndị fọdụrụ nke otu n'ime alaeze kacha ochie na Naijiria ugbu a, ma na-ejigide emume dị mkpa dị ka akara nke otu n'ime ndị obodo ahụ kacha mkpa na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Eze Nri Ọbalíke bụ nke iri na ise e dekọrọ Eze Nri nke ala eze Nri na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria nke oge a
A na-ekwu na ọ chịrị malite n'afọ 1889 ruo 1936
Obalike kwuru na nrọ dị ka isi na ndoro-ndoro ochichi ya, dịka a na-eche na e nyere Eze Nri na-esote ya n'ụzọ ndi mmụọ, ekwuru ya na-ekwu
Otu netiti abalị, Enwelana, bụ Eze Nri ikpeazụ, pụtara n'ihu ya sị ya bụ onye a họpụtara; o wee malite ịchụ àjà
N'ịbụ ndị ochịchị Briten na-achị, ndị ozi obodo ọzọ nke Ndị Kraịsti, hụrụ usoro nchịkwa nke dị adị, dabere n'okpukpe okpukpe ọdịnala, dị ka ihe mgbochi na mgbasa ozi ọma ha
Mgbe ndị Briten gara n’ihu weghara ọchịchị ndị Igbo n’afọ 1907, ma ndị agha nke ọchịchị colonial na ndị ozi ala ọzọ nke Ndị Kraịst lekwasịrị anya na ibibi ọchịchị ọdịnala Nri
Mgbalị ndị agha kpara ịnwụde Nri na Eze Nri dara n'ụzọ zuru oke
Otú ọ dị, ịmanye Eze Nri Obalike, megidere omenala ogologo oge, ịhapụ ala Nri gaa n'obodo Oka site na iyi egwu igbukpọ agbụrụ megide ndị Igbo, bụ otu n'ime omume e mere iji nweta njedebe a
Eze Nri Obalike kwetara ka ọ hapụ Nri ka o wee zọpụta ndụ ndị aka ha dị ọcha

Michael Joseph Jackson (Önwa asatọ 29, 1958 — Önwa isii 25, 2009) bụ onye Amerikạ na-agụ egwú burukwa onye na-agba egwu
N'ịbụ onye a ghọtara dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu kacha nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'oge niile, ọ bụ onye isi na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke azụmahịa ngosi na otu n'ime akara ngosi omenala nke narị afọ nke 20
Nke asaa n'ime ezinụlọ nke nwere ụmụaka itoolu, ya na ụmụnne ya bụrụ abụ site na afọ isii wee malite ọrụ ọkachamara na iri na otu na Jackson nke ise, otu ìgwè ya na ụmụnne ya ndị tọrọ ya
Mgbe ọ ka bụ onye otu (rue 1984), ọ malitere ọrụ naanị ya na 1971
Ise n'ime egwu solo ya ewepụtara n'oge ndụ ya so na ọba egwu kacha ewu ewu n'ụwa Off Wall (1979), Thriller (1982), Bad (1987), Dangerous (1991) na HIStory (1995)
Na 1980s, ọ ghọrọ onye isi na egwu pop
A na-eme eserese egwu ya, nnukwu oke na ihe ọhụrụ, dị ka obere ihe nkiri, ọkachasị maka aha Beat It, Billie Jean, Thriller, Bad ma ọ bụ Mpụ dị nro
Ọ kwalitere ọtụtụ usoro ịgba egwu, gụnyere njem ọnwa, nke ghọrọ mbinye aka ya
N'ịbụ onye jikọtara mkpụrụ obi, funk, pop na ụdị egwu egwu, ụdị olu ya na ụdị egwu ya na-aga n'ihu na-emetụta ọtụtụ ndị na-ese hip-hop, pop na r'n'b nke oge a
Aha ya bụ 'Eze Pop', Michael Jackson mebiri ọtụtụ ndekọ na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ
N'ihe karịrị nde ndekọ 500 rere n'ụwa niileNote 2, ọ nọ n'etiti ndị na-ere ndekọ atọ kachasị ukwuu n'oge niile
N'ịre ahịa nke nde 70 nde, Thriller ka bụ ọba egwu kacha ere na akụkọ egwu wee nweta asambodo platinum ugboro 34 na United States
A maara Michael jackson n'ọhịo ụda maka ịbụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe mbụ na-eji usoro ahịrị ma ọ bụ usoro nhazi ahịrị

Eze Ukwu (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1799–1862) Ọ bụ Obi nke iri na ise nke Otolo na Igwe nke alaeze Nnewi

Ọ bụ onye otu Ndi Nnofo Royal na onye nọchiri nna ya bù Eze Chukwu
N'adịghị ka ọtụtụ ndị eze Igbo Ndi ozo, e nwere ndị eze Nnewi tupu ndị Europ abịarute
N'oge ọchịchị ya, ihe omume dị mkpa mere

Ezego gara naanị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị wee hapụ agụmakwụkwọ kpamkpam
O sonyeere otu ndị na-ezu ohi na-eyi ndị obodo Anambra steeti ụjọ ruo ọtụtụ afọ

N'afọ 1988, e jidere onye ọ bụla so n'òtù ndị ohi na-ezu ohi ma e wezụga Ezego, ọ bụ onye na-enweghị ike ịchọta n'ihi na ọ gbanahụrụ njide ya n'ụzọ siri ike na 1989, ọ kwagara Lagos steeti iji nweta ohere azụmahịa
Isi iyi akụ na ụba Ezego bụ ihe a na-enyo enyo ka ọ chịkọtara akụ na ụba ya mgbe ọ nọrọ obere oge na Lagos steeti
Ezego duziri ụdị ndụ mara mma mgbe ọ dị ndụ
O nwere ụlọ ọrụ, nnukwu ụlọ, ọtụtụ ụgbọala dị oké ọnụ ma na-eme njem mgbe niile

Ihe niile ghọrọ ihe na-abaghị uru mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, Ụgbọala ya niile gbara nchara n'ihi na ọ dịghị onye dị njikere ịkwọ ụgbọala ma ọ bụ ịzụta ha, a gbahapụrụ ụlọ ya n'ihi na ọ dịghị onye chọrọ ibi na ha ma ọ bụ zụta ha ma ọ bụ dịka obodo kwenyesiri ike na ọ nwetara ego ya site n'ụzọ dị ọjọọ
Ọzọkwa, ụlọ ọrụ ya niile dara n'ọnọdụ dị ịtụnanya
Na Disemba 25, 1999, n'ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya, ihe mberede ụgbọala dakwasiri ya n'ọnọdụ dị ịtụnanya

Ezego anaghị akwọ ụgbọala, kama o nwere onye ọkwọ ụgbọala nke ya na ya na-eme njem mana n'ụbọchị Ezego nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ahụ, a kọrọ na ọ gwara onye ọkwọ ụgbọala ahụ ka ọ ghara ịkwọ ụgbọala n'ihi na ọ bu n'obi ịkwọ ụgbọala n'onwe ya
Ezema bụ otu n'ime obodo anọ mebere obodo Nru Nsukka dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Nsukka, Nigeria
Ọ dị n'akụkụ obodo atọ ndị ọzọ dị na Nru Nsukka Edem Nru, Umuoyo Nru na Iheagu
Ọ na-ekekọrịta oke n'etiti obodo dị iche iche dịka Umuoyo, Iheagu, Agbamere/Amike na Umabor abụọ na Eha Alumona
Otobogidi bụ obere ahịa kacha ewu ewu na Ezema
Ọ bụ ọdụ ahịa ebe a na-ere ihe ndi eji eme ihe n'ụlọ
ebe a na-eji ngwa ahịa eme ihe na mpaghara ume ọhụrụ
Ụlọ akwụkwọ Evangel dịkwa ebe a
Okporo ụzọ esi abanye n'ime obodo bụ site na Fen Park junction (Enugu Road), Umabor Eha Alumona, Amolu Road site na ụlọakwụkwọ Community Secondary School Nru Nsukka na Iheagu
Obodo Ezema bụ akụkụ nke Ezema ne Edem autonomous ogbe n'ala Igbo, mpaghara omenaala dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria, ndị na- asụ Igbo na-achịkwa ya
Na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ bụ akụkụ nke Nru Nsukka nke ime obodo Nsukka, Enugu steeti
Obodo Ezema mejupụtara obodo iri Amagu(pronounced Amégú), Amugoro, Amamkpume, Uwelu, Amankwo, Umumkporogidi, Amorah, Amaezedim, Umuokwo, na Umuario
Obodo ọ bụla nwere onye isi obodo nke ya, nke a na-akpọ Onyishi, nke na-abụkarị okenye n'ime obodo
Obodo kacha ochie na Ezema bụ Amagu, bụ nke na-eme dị ka isi ebe ọgbakọ na-ezukọ niile metụtara ndị okenye ma ọ bụ obodo Ezema
Ekwenyere na Ezema bụ otu n'ime obodo udo kacha dịrị na Nru Nsukka
Otu kacha arụ ọrụ na Ezema bụ otu Ezema Youth Association (wepụtara na 2016) n'Ezema ne Edem Development Union
Otu mmepe na njikọ kansụl Igwe na-achịkwa ihe niile dị n'obodo Ezema na Edem
Ugwu dị elu nke a na-akpọ Ugwu Ezema ne Edem dị n'ime obodo a
Ofulonu Ezema bu ala ndi Ezema nwe
Ọ bụghị obodo kama ọ bụ obodo nke ụmụ amaala Ezema Nru mere
E wezụga ya, e nwere nnukwu ugwu a na-akpọ Ugwu Ezema
Otu n'ime ugwu bụ nke ndị agbata obi (Edem Nru) na nke ọzọ nke Ezema Nru ya mere e ji akpọ ugwu Ezema ne Edem
E wezụga ugwu ahụ, e nwere obodo a maara dị ka obodo Amike si Agbamere/Eha Alumona
Otobogidi bụ ebe azụmahịa dị na Ezema, ma na-ejekwa ozi dị ka ebe ndị Ezemania na-anọkarị n'etiti
Otobogidi na-ejekwa ozi dị ka obere ahịa maka obodo Ezema
Otobogidi na-ejekwa ozi dị ka ebe nzụkọ maka njikọta ọnụ metụtara Ezema na Edem naanị maka mkparịta ụka na-adịghị mma ma ọ bụghị ya , Amegu Ezema ka bụ isi ebe ha na-ezukọ
Ọtụtụ n’ime ndị Ezema bụ ndị ọrụ aka (dị ka ndị na-akpụ ụzụ , ndị na-akpụ brik, ndị na-arụ ụlọ/ịkwa NLA, wdg), ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị ọzọ na-azụ ahịa na azụrụ ihe
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ịkpụ ụzụ bụ ihe di kemgbe n'ime obodo Ezema ọkachasị n'obodo Amorah kpọmkwem
Ọtụtụ ndị bi n'ala Ezema na-azụ ahịa n'ahịa Nsukka Central nke a na-akpọ ahia Ogige
Okpukperechi abụọ di n' Ezema bụ ika ụka na Odinani, nke bụ okpukperechi ọdịnala ndị Igbo
Ụka dị na Ezema gụnyere
Ndị na-eme Odinani na-asọpụrụ chi Idenyi nkwo (nke a na-akpọkwa Alusi )
Onye-isi-nchụ-aja bụ Attamah (onyeisi nchụ-aja) bụ onye si ma biri n' Ezema
Ezenwa-Ohaeto (1958), bụ onye Naijiria na-ede uri, onye na-ede akụkọ mkpirikpi na onye nkuzi
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Naijiria mbụ bipụtara uri e dere na pidgin English
Ọ nwụrụ na mba Cambridge n'afọ 2005
A mụrụ Ezenwa-Ohaeto na 31 Maachị 1958 n'aka Michael Ogbonnaya Ohaeto na Rebecca Ohaeto n'Ife Ezinihite Mbaise na mpaghara gọọmentị nke Imo Steeti
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na St
Augustine Grammar School, Nkwerre n'afọ 1971
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya n'afọ 1975 na nka na sayensị ebe ọ nwetara asambodo Grade One
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Naịjirịa n'okpuru nkuzi nke onye edemede Chinua Achebe na onye nkatọ Donatus Nwoga site n'afọ 1971 ruo 1979
O mechara gụsịa akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere Bachelor of Arts na nsọpụrụ na Bekee
O nwetara Masters of Arts site na UNN na agụmakwụkwọ site na gọọmentị steeti Imo n'afọ 1982
N'afọ 1991, e nyere ya nzere PhD n'ide akwụkwọ site na Mahadum Benin
Ezenwa-Ohaeto malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya n'afọ 1980 dị ka onye enyemaka nkuzi na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello Site n'afọ 1982 ruo 1992 ọ kụziri na Anambra State College of Education, Awka dị ka onye nkuzi
Ọ kụziri na Alvan Ikoku Federal College of Education dị ka osote prọfesọ site n'afọ 1992 ruo 1998 na dị ka onye nkuzi dị elu na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe site n'afọ 1998 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 2005
Ezenwa-Ohaeto lụrụ Ngozi onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ anọ
Ọ bụ nna Chinua Ezenwa-Ohaeto
Ezeoke Nsu bụ obodo dị na Imo State, Nigeria
Obodo ugwu chere na ọ malitere na narị afọ nke iri na isii, ndekọ mbụ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme ya bụ na 1869, mgbe ndị ozi ala ọzọ Ndị Kraịst letara na mbụ
Isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Dayọsis Anglican nke Okigwe South dị n'ime ime obodo

Gọọmentị Britain malitere Ezi Ntụle nkè ụgbọ ala carbon dị ala n'afọ 2007 iji nyochaa ụgbọ ala na teknụzụ mmanụ ụgbọala nké nwéré ike inye aka mee ka ụgbọ njem okporo ụzọ ghara ịdị n'ime afọ iri abụo na ise sochirinụ
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ Julia King CBE FREng, osote chancellor nkè Mahadum Aston na ónyé bụbu ónyé nduzi nkè Advanced Engineering na Rolls-Royce plc duziri nyocha ahụ
E bipụtara akụkọ nyocha nkè ógè n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2007, ma lekwasị anya na ikike màkà mbelata CO2 sitere na njem okporo ụzọ
O kwubiri, sị
E bipụtara ọkwa ikpeazụ nke nyocha ahụ n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2008, ma nye aro banyéré otu Gọọmentị nwèrè ike isi rụọ ọrụ na mbugharị decarbonising

Goodness Ohiremen Ajayi (amụrụ n'abalị isii n'ọnwa iri n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n;anọ (6 Ọktoba n'afọ 1994) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka klọb Opatija nke Croatia

A mụrụ ya na Benin City, Ajayi bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị egwuregwu si na Nigerian Abuja Football College Academy gaa na otu ndị ntorobịa Rijeka na ngwụcha afọ puku abụọ na iri n'abụọ (2012), na-adọrọ mmasị iji nọrọ na klọb ahụ

O mere Rijeka mbụ ya na agba nke mbụ nke oge 2013-14 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ (18), na-aghọ onye egwuregwu mbụ si Abuja Academy, nke Gabriele Volpi, onye nwe Rijeka na Spezia Calcio, na-achị, iji gosipụta na ndị otu klọb ahụ

Mgbe ọ nọ na Rijeka, a gbazinyere Ajayi na klọb Bosnian Premier League Široki Brijeg na ọnwa asaa, afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise (July 2015) na ka klọbu Israel Premier League Hapoel Ashkelon na ọnwa asatọ, afọ puku abụọ na iri na asaa (August 2017)
N'ọnwa isii n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asatọ (June 2018), a kpọfere ya na Inter Zaprešić dị ka akụkụ nke nkwekọrịta mgbanwe onye ọkpụkpọ
Na abalị iri n'iteolu nke ọnwa isii afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (19 June 2019}, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya na klọb Astra Giurgiu nke Romanian Liga I

“Ezigbo ulo uka Jesu wu ulo uka no ruro onwe ya nke bidoro na Beijing, na obodo China na afo 1917
Ta, ulo uka nwere otutu ndi nzuko na uwa nile nke onugugo ha kariri abua na ukara mputu nari na nari
Ulo uka bu ndi otu natara Mmuo nso bu ndi guzoro re na mbido afo Puku abuo (ma-obukwa Ohu Nari afo)
Nzuka na asopuru aha Jesu kari a ato nime out nke nzuko ndi uzo kwenyere na
Ebum na obi ulo nzuka bu egba sa ozioma di ka edere ya na akwukwo nso na elu uwa nile ru mgbe Jesu Kristi ga abi nke abu a”
“ I na ta Mmuo Nso, di ka ikwu okwu na olu ozo, nke gosiri nke ta ala eze nke eluigwe”
“I'wu mmiri nso bu ihe ha n'eme i wefu nso ndi madu mere na I weputa ya na uwa madu
Ihe ha na'eji a'wu mmiri nso bu mmiri dika mmiri Iyi, Imo na oshi mmiri
Onye ha n'awu miri nso he wu'kwara nyawa miri nso
Mgbe ha na wu miri na onye ha na wu miri nso, o kweshiri i wucha ahu ya nile na miri na ihu ya kweshiri ne le ala”
“I sa uku ne'ye madu uzor I weturu ihe ntakiri di ka Jesus
O kwa na'eme ndi madu echeta na ha kweshiri i bu ndi oma
Ndi madu nile ha wuru miri nso kweshiri I nwe onye na sa uku ya na aha Jesus Christ”
“Oriri nso bu sacrement nke eji echeta onwu nke onye nwanyi bu Jisọs Kraịst”
“Jesu Kristi, wu okwu nke wuru onu ahu, nwu na elu obe maka nzoputa nke ndi mmehie, we bi lie na ubochi nke ato we gba go na elu igwe
Obu na ni ya bu onye Nzoputa nke mmadu, onye Okike elu igwe na elu uwa ya na ezigbo Chi”
“Akwukwo Nso nke agbo ochie na agbo ohuru bu nke edere site na ntuzi aka Chineke, so ya bu ezikwu nke na ejiko obibi ndu oma nke ndi na eso uzo Christ na ebi”
“Nzoputa si na amara Chineke na i nwe okwukwe
Ndi kwere ekwe ga atu kwa si Mmo Nso obi na icho idi nso, ikwa nyere Chineke ugwu na ihu mmadu na anya”
“O bi bia onye nwanyi nke abua ga abu na ubochi ikpeazu, mgbe oga esi na elu igwe bia ikpe uwa ikpe ndi ezi omume ga enwe ndu ebi ebi, ma ndi ajo omume ga ana to ugwo oru ha”

Good Calories, Bad Calories abụba, Carbs, na sayensị arụmụka nke nri na ahụike (nke ebipụtara dị ka The Diet Delusion na United Kingdom na Australia) bụ akwụkwọ 2007 nke onye nta akụkọ sayensị Gary Taubes dere
Taubes na-arụ ụka na afọ ole na ole gara aga nke ndụmọdụ nri na-akwalite nri ndị nwere obere abụba na-ezighi ezi mgbe niile
Taubes na-ekwu na carbohydrates, kpọmkwem carbohydrates a nụchara anụcha dị ka ntụ ọka ọcha, shuga, na starch, na-enye aka na oke ibu, ọrịa shuga, ọrịa obi, na ọrịa ndị ọzọ
Taubes na-ekwupụta njikọ dị n'etiti carbohydrates na ọrịa kansa, yana
Taubes na-ezo aka na ihe akaebe nke ihe ndị dị ndụ, ọrịa na ụmụ mmadụ iji kwado nkwupụta ya
Ahụ́ mmadụ na-ewepụta insulin na nzaghachi maka iri carbohydrates iji chịkwaa shuga ọbara
Usoro a, n'aka nke ya, na-akpali ahụ ichekwa abụba
Taubes na-akọwapụta site n'inyocha ihe akaebe nke mmetụta nke carbohydrates na agbụrụ ndị nwere nri 'ọdịnala' nke nwere anụ ma ọ bụ abụba dị ala na carbohydrates dị obere
Ọ chọpụtara na iwebata carbohydrates dị mma na nri na ọdịbendị ndị a mere ka ọrịa nke mmepeanya dị ka oke ibu na ọrịa obi
Nnyocha dị iche iche maka Good Calories, Bad Calory

Dọkịta Tony Miksanek, na-ede na Chicago Sun-Times, kpọrọ akwụkwọ ahụ 'nke a nyochara nke ọma' ma kwuo na nkwubi okwu Taubesńs bụ 'ihe na'ụzọ na na -eju anya ma na Prọfesọ akụkọ na onye na-ede akwụkwọ nri Michael Pollan kọwara Good Calories, Bad Calory dị ka 'ihe bara uru' mana o kwenyere na ọ 'adịghị agbanahụ ihe ndị na'ahụ maka nri na nri'

Onye nta akụkọ ahụike nke New York Times bụ Gina Kolata kwubiri na arụmụka Taubesão 'ekwenyeghị' ya, na-ede na 'nsogbu nke akwụkwọ dị ka nke a, nke na'aga n'ihu na nkọwa zuru ezu [] bụ na ọ nwere ike isi ike ịmara ihe a hapụrụ
' Laura Vanderkam nyochara akwụkwọ ahụ n'ụzọ na-adịghị mma na The American, akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ụlọ ọrụ na'ihe gbasara American Enterprise Institute
Vanderkam kwenyere na nnukwu nsogbu nke akwụkwọ ahụ bụ na Taubes 'na-eme onwe ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-emegide onwe onye', na'eme ka o 'nlezianya nke ukwuu nke na mgbe ụfọdụ akwụkwọ a dị arọ'
Ezi Ugbo bụ ugbo akụkọ ihe mere eme na ebe okpomọkụ na Njide, New Hampshire
N'ịbụ nke dị na New Hampshire Route 113 na Ezi Ugbo Road, ugbo ahụ dabeere gburugburu ụlọ ọrụ ugbo c1820, George Saltonstall West gbasaa ya n'ime ụlọ ezumike na 1920
Ala 100-acre (40 hectare) gụnyere ọtụtụ ụlọ na ụlọ dị n'akụkụ ọdọ mmiri
E depụtara ugbo ahụ na Ndebanye aha obodo nke ebe akụkọ ihe mere eme na 2012
Ezigbo ugbo dị ihe dị ka kilomita 6 n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke etiti obodo Holderness, n'ihe karịrị 140 acres (57 hectare) nke ala nke Ezi Ugbo Road na New Hampshire Route 113 gafere
Ihe onwunwe ahụ bụ ngwakọta nke ọhịa, ogige mepere emepe, na ala mara mma, ma gụnye ebe obibi, ụlọ ọrụ ugbo, na ụlọ ala gụnyere ụlọ ịsa ahụ, ụlọ egwuregwu, na ụlọ mmiri
Ụlọ bụ isi bụ ụlọ ọrụ ugbo c1820 nke dị n'etiti ubi ndịda nke Ezi Ugbo/113 nkwụsịtụ
N'ịbụ nke Federal na ụdị ya, e nyere ya ihe ndị dị mkpa nke Mweghachi nke Ọchịchị na 1920s
Obere ụlọ Mweghachi nke Ọchịchị, nke e wuru na 1920s iji nye ndị ọrụ ugbo ụlọ, dị n'ebe dị mkpirikpi n'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke ụlọ ahụ
Obere ụyọkọ ụlọ dị n'ime ọhịa n'etiti Ụzọ 113 na Ọdọ mmiri Squam

Ọtụtụ ndị ezinụlọ True na-arụ ọrụ n'ugbo ahụ ruo 1888, mgbe Charles Eziokwu malitere ịgbazite akụkụ nke ugbo ahụ maka Camp Algonquin, ogige oge okpomọkụ nke abụọ maka ụmụaka na Ọdọ mmiri Squam ma malite ịnakwere ndị na-ebi n'oge n'ugbo
Otu n'ime ndị bịara n'ogige ahụ bụ George Saltonstall West, onye zụrụ ihe onwunwe ahụ na 1920 wee malite ntụgharị ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe onwunwa oge okpomọkụ
A na-arụ ọrụ na ihe onwunwe ahụ n'akụkụ dị ka ugbo na-arụsi ọrụ ike, ebe ndị West na-ebubata ngwaahịa ya n'ụlọ ha na Chestnut Hill, Massachusetts
E kewara ihe onwunwe ahụ n'etiti ndị nketa ya mgbe George West nwụsịrị na 1959

“Akwukwo Nso nke agbo ochie na agbo ohuru bu nke edere site na ntuzi aka Chineke, so ya bu ezikwu nke na ejiko obibi ndu oma nke ndi na eso uzo Christ na ebi”
“Nzoputa si na amara Chineke na i nwe okwukwe

“O bi bia onye nwanyi nke abua ga abu na ubochi ikpeazu, mgbe oga esi na elu igwe bia ikpe uwa ikpe ndi ezi omume ga enwe ndu ebi ebi, ma ndi ajo omume ga ana to ugwo oru ha”

Afamdi wu aha otu ezinulo Africa
Aha ofodu ndi ezinulo nka bu Afam, Ahmadi, Amara, Emecca, Halimnye, Isa, Mmadu, Nnadi, Nnamdi, Nnenadi, Onwa na ndi ozo
Ezinulo Afamdi choro ka Niger na Nigeria di etu South Africa diri; Etu ndi South Africa bu ndi Beke na ndi oji otu ahu ka ndi ezinulo Afamdi choro ka ndi Niger na Nigeria bu ndi Arab na ndi Oji
Cheta na oburo ndi Arab nile but ndi Muslim, ndi Muslim nile a bughi ndi Arab
Afamdi bu okwu na dialect Anioma, nwota aha nka bu na Aha mu diri
Mgbe ha muru otu nwata bu mgbe ezinulo Afamdi ji but ihe ezie

Nwata nka ha muru mesi nyere onwe ya aha nke o choro Mana na izizi, nwata nka te were aha nnanna nne ya Wu Mogbue nuhi na ndi umu Mogbue Wu ndi xuo ya site na mgbe nwata nka di afo other mana nne nwata nka ekwero ya ka nwata ji iwe kwuru na 'Gi ka mu jiri aha nnanna nne mu ga eme ma Afamdi?'

Ezrom Legae (1938 ruo 1999) bụ onye South Afrịka na-akpụ ihe na onye na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na Vrededorp, Johannesburg, Legae gụrụ akwụkwọ na Polly Street Art Centre malite na 1959; site na 1960 ruo 1964 ọ gara Jubilee Art Centre ma soro Cecil Skotnes na Sydney Khumalo rụọ ọrụ
N'afọ 1965, ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi, wee bụrụ onye nduzi nke Jubilee Art Centre
N'afọ 1970, ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ nke nyere ya ohere ịga Europe na United States; n'agbata afọ 1972 na 1974 ọ bụ onye nduzi nke African Music and Drama Association Art Project
Legae rụrụ ọrụ oge niile dị ka onye na-ese ihe; ya na ezinụlọ ya biri na Soweto ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
A maara Legae nke ọma maka nkọwa ọhụụ ya dị ike banyere pathos na mmebi nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ - nkatọ ọ gbakwunyere na nnọgidesi ike nke ịda ogbenye na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'afọ ndị na-apartheid gasịrị
O mere nke ọma dị ka onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe oyiyi, isi na anụmanụ na-arụ ọrụ na mmanụ, conté, ọla nchara, ụrọ na mgbasa ozi agwakọta
Ezumike ọha na eze, ezumike mba, ma ọ bụ ezumike iwu kwadoro bụ ezumike nke iwu kwadoro ma na-abụkarị ụbọchị ana-adịghị arụ ọrụ n'afọ
Mba na mpaghara ndị nwe onwe ha na-eme ezumike dabere na ihe omume ndị dị mkpa na akụkọ ihe mere eme ha, dị ka Ụbọchị Mba

India nọ n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na ezumike mba 21, Colombia na Philippines sochiri na 18 nke ọ bụla
N'otu aka ahụ, China na Hong Kong na-enwe ezumike ọha na eze iri na asaa n'afọ

Ememe ọha na eze na-abụkarị ụbọchị ememe, dị ka ncheta nke ihe omume akụkọ ihe mere eme dị mkpa, ma ọ bụ nwere ike ịbụ ememe okpukpe dị ka Diwali
Ezumike nwere ike ịda n'otu ụbọchị n'afọ, jikọta ya na otu ụbọchị n'izu n'otu ọnwa ma ọ bụ soro usoro kalenda ndị ọzọ dị ka Kalenda Lunar

Ezumike obodo, ezumike obodo ma ọ bụ ezumike ọrụ bụ ụbọchị iwu kwadoro ma na-eme ememe dị ka ezumike na otu steeti ma ọ bụ mpaghara nke dị otú ahụ, dịka, steeti maọ bụ mpaghara
Ọ na-abụkarị ụbọchị ndị omeiwu, ndị omeiwu ma ọ bụ ndị eze kwupụtara site na iwu, iwu ma ọ bụ iwu dị ka ụbọchị na-adịghị arụ ọrụ mgbe a na-emechi aka gọọmentị dịka usoro ụlọ ikpe

Na steeti gọọmentị etiti, enwere ike ịnwe ezumike dị iche iche maka steeti ma ọ bụ mpaghara, dịka na United States ebe a na-akpọ ezumike gọọmentị gọọmentị nke gọọmentị federal guzobere ezumike gọọmenti etiti

Ezz El-Dine Ahmed Mourad Zulficar (Egyptian Arabic عز الدين ذو الفقار, ːEzz ad-Dīne Zū al-Fiqār; October 28, 1919 ̆- July 1, 1963) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt, onye edemede, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe a maara maka ụdị ya pụrụ iche, nke na-agwakọta ịhụnanya na ihe omume
Zulficar bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị emetụta n'oge ọlaedo nke ihe nkiri Egypt
A mụrụ Ezz El-Dine Ahmed Mourad Zulficar n'abalị 28 ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1919, nna ya Ahmed Mourada Bek Zulfikar bụ onye isi ndị uwe ojii na nne ya Nabila Hanem Zulfikir bụ nwanyị na-elekọta ụlọ
Ọ bụ onye nke ise n'ime ụmụnne asatọ
Nwanne ya nwoke Mohamed onye ga-etolite ịbụ onye ọchụnta ego, Soad, Fekreya, Mahmoud Zulfikar, onye ga- too ịbụ onye nduzi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ụmụnne Kamal, Salah Zulfikar, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe a ma ama sochiri ha ma mesịa bụrụ Mamdouh onye ga-etolite ịbụ onye ọchụnta ego
Oge Ezz Eldine bụ nwata kpụrụ àgwà ya, n'ihi na ọ masịrị ya n'egwuregwu n'ozuzu ya, ọkachasị ịgba mgba, igwu mmiri, na egwuregwu mmega ahụ nke ọ meriri ụfọdụ asọmpi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye na-agụ akwụkwọ nke ọma ma nwee mmasị ige egwu oge ochie
Ọ nọ na-azụta ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ ọ bụla e wepụtara n'Egypt; ihe ntụrụndụ ọ hụrụ n'anya ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
A kpọbatara Zulficar n'ụwa ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu mgbe nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye Mahmoud kpọọrọ ya gaa ụlọ ihe nkiri iji kirie ihe nkiri ndị Egypt na ndị mba ọzọ
Mmasị ya maka ihe nkiri pụtara ìhè mgbe ọ ga-ekiri ihe nkiri atọ n'usoro
Ọ bụrụ na ọ masịrị otu ihe nkiri ọ ga-ele ya ọtụtụ ugboro
Zulficar bụ onye magburu onwe ya
Ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ ma mụọ ihe gbasara mbara igwe
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ sonyeere kọleji ndị agha iji mee nna ya obi ụtọ, ọ bụ ezie na Zulficar emegideghị echiche ahụ n'onwe ya, n'ihi na ọ hụrụ na ịmụ ọmụmụ agha ga-eme ka nghọta ya gbasaa

N'oge ahụ, ọ matara ọtụtụ ndị ama ama nke kpụrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Egypt mgbe e mesịrị, dịka ndị isi ala Gamal Abdel Nasser na Anwar El Sadat, Yusuf Sibai na Tharwat Okasha na ndị ọzọ so na Free Officers Movement, bụ ndị guzobere July 1952 Revolution
E mechara họpụta ya ugboro abụọ maka ọkwa Minista nke Ọdịbendị, mana ọ jụrụ ọkwa steeti n'ihi na ọ hụrụ ọrụ ihe nkiri n'anya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba ndị agha ma mesịa ghọọ onyeisi
N'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ onye ọrụ a ma ama, ihe omume ọdachi mere ka Zulficar maa jijiji
Nna ya, onye ya na ya dị n'ezigbo mma, nwụrụ
Ọ dara mbà n'obi ma ụmụnne ya dụrụ ya ọdụ ka ọ gbanwee ndụ ya na ọrụ ya
N'ezie, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na ọkwa nke onyeisi na artillery corps iji malite ọrụ na azụmahịa ihe nkiri
Zulficar zutere Faten Hamama mgbe ọ na-ese ihe nkiri Abu Zayd al-Hilali (أبو زيد الهلالي, 意Abuzeid al-Hiliʹ) (1947), nke ọ duziri
Ha abụọ hụrụ onwe ha n'anya ma lụọ ibe ha
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere nwa nwanyị, Nadia Zulficar
Alụmdi na nwunye ha ga-adịru naanị afọ asaa, ebe di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1954
Ha abụọ nọgidere bụrụ ndị enyi, Hamama ọbụna mere ihe nkiri ya mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm gasịrị
Mgbe ahụ Zulficar lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Kawthar Shafik n'afọ 1959
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere nwa nwanyị, Dina Zulficar
Ha nọgidere na-alụ di na nwunye ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1963
Ezz El-Dine Zulficar nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 43 na July 1, 1963 na Cairo, Egypt
N'agbanyeghị na ọ dị obere, ọ hapụrụ nnukwu ihe nketa na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ihe nkiri Egypt
Ezz El-Dine Zulficar enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye, gụnyere
Ezza bụ otu ukpuru ndị Igbo, na Odịda anyanwụ Nigeria
Dịka ndị mmadụ, aha bụ otu aha Ezza / Ezaa ma ọ bụ Ezza-Ezekuna maka nna nna ha
Ezza's, ịbụ agbụrụ njeghari, a na-ahụkarị ha na steeti Ebonyi, ọkachasị Ebonyi Central na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu na Ebonyi North na South
Ezza nwere obodo iri abụọ na abụọ amaara site na steeti Ebonyi, ndị a ma ama n’ime ha gụnyere Amana, Ezzama, Amuzu, Ameka, Oriuzor, Amezekwe, Amegu, Amudo, Idembia, Ekka

Ha bikwa na obodo di iche-iche dika Effium na Ohaukwu LGA, Ezillo na Ishielu LGA, Abaomege, Ukawu, wdg; na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị oke ọnụ na-ebi na akụkụ nke Enugu, Benue, Cross River States na mpaghara ndị ọzọ nke Nigeria
N'ihi ọdịdị ha, a na-ahụkarị ndị Ezzas maka inwe mmekọrịta ndị ọzọ na ndị ọbịa ha ebe ha na-achọkarị ka obodo ha pịrị ha maka ha mgbe ha bi n'otu obodo
Nke a butere ọgbaghara ọgbaghara oge niile n’etiti ndị Ezza na ndị ọbịa ha
Ezza na-arụsi ọrụ ike ma na-asụ asụsụ ahụ n'Ebonyi
Ezza North bụ ọchịchị ime obodo na Ebonyi Steeti Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Ebiaji
Ọ nwere mpaghara nari ato ni ise km abuo na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 145,619 na ngụkọ abuo puku na isi
Ezza North kere na otu puku nari itolu na itolu na isiya na LGA ndị ọzọ na steeti Ebonyi ọhụrụ bụbu akụkụ nke ọchịchị ime obodo Ezza ochie
Ọ bụ obodo ndị Igbo ka ukwuu nke ndị Ezza bi
Kamgbe e kere ya bụ Ezza North nọ n'akụkụ mmepe na-aga n'ihu n'okpuru ọchịchị Ebonyi steeti nke PDP na-achị
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 482
Ezza South bụ ọchịchị ime obodo dị na steeti Ebonyi na ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ Onueke, nke na-ejekwa ozi dị ka isi obodo jikọrọ ọnụ maka mba Ezza yana isi ụlọ ọrụ Ebonyi Central senatorial zone
Emebere ya n'abalị mbụ nke ọnwan nabarara ke Otu puku nari itolu na itolu n'etiti ọchịchị ime obodo ndị ọzọ na steeti Ebonyi ọhụrụ mgbe ahụ site n'aka gọọmentị ndị agha nke General Sani Abacha
Ezza South tupu e kee ya bụ akụkụ nke ọchịchị ime obodo Ezza ochie
Ndị mmadụ kacha bụrụ ndị Igbo
Ha na-asụ olumba Ezza na asụsụ etiti Igbo
Isi ọrụ ha na-arụ bụ ọrụ ugbo na ịzụ ahịa yana otu ndị ọrụ obodo na-apụta
O nwere mpaghara nari ato na iri abuo na ano km abuo yana ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 133,625 na ngụkọ 2006
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 482
Ezzat El Alaili (Arabic) (15 Septemba 1934 - 5 Febụwarị 2021) bụ onye Ijipt na-eme ihe nkiri nke mere ihe nkiri 300, usoro TV, na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri kemgbe afọ 1960
O nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Higher Institute of Theatre Studies n'afọ 1960
O ritere ihe nrite nke ndụ ya site na Dubai International Film Festival n'afọ 2015

A kwanyeere ya ugwu na Sharjah International Book Fair 'maka enyemaka ya dị ịrịba ama na ihe nkiri Egypt n'ime ọtụtụ iri afọ na nkọwa ya dị elu nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Egypt na Arabic kachasị mma site na nnukwu nchịkọta nkiri na usoro TV'
Fátima Albuquerque bụ onye nta akụkọ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri si mba Mozambique
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Mozambique mbụ duziri ihe nkiri na 1980s
Ihe ngosi ya na-egosi ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na Mozambique
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na akụkọ maka Kuxa Kanema, Albuquerque mere ihe ngosi mbụ ya, gbasara ụmụaka nọ n'okporo ámá na Mozambique
Maria de Fátima da Veiga (amụrụ na Juun 22, na afọ 1957) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nnọchi anya mba Cape Verde
Veiga bụ minista na-ahụ maka mba ofesi site n'afọ 2002 ruo afọ 2004
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ minista mba ọzọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Cape Verde
A mụrụ Veiga na agwaetiti São Vicente
O mechara gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu gụnyere Mahadum Aix-en-Provence na ndịda France, German Foundation na Berlin, Prague na Brazil
N'afọ 1980, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Na-eme n'èzí na Cape Verde
N'agbata afọ 2001 na afọ 2002, ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Cape Verde na Cuba
Mgbe ọ bụ minista mba ọzọ, ọ gara Paris site na Jenụwarị 9 ruo 12, na afọ 2002
Ruo afọ ole na ole na afọ 2007 ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Cape Verde na United States
O nyere onye isi ala George Bush asambodo ya n'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2007
Kemgbe Febụwarị 20, na afọ 2014, ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Cape Verde na France
Ọ nọchiri José Armando Filomeno Ferreira Duarte onye bụ onye nnọchi anya kacha nọrọ ogologo oge na France

Félicien Robert Challaye (1 Nọvemba 1875 na 26 Eprel 1967) bụ onye ọkà ihe ọmụma French, onye na-emegide ọchịchị na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ
A mụrụ Félicien Challaye n'ụbọchị 1 Nọvemba 1875 na obodo Lyon, France
Ọ nwetara agrégation na nkà ihe ọmụma na 1897
Challaye bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke nkà ihe ọmụma na Paris site n'afọ 1903 ruo afọ 1937
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ Pierre Savorgnan de Brazza na njem ya n'afọ 1905 na Congo
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, n'afọ 1908, o guzobere otu ikike mmadụ maka ụmụ amaala Congo
O mechara bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke Human Rights League
Challaye jere ozi na Agha Ụwa Mbụ, e merụkwara ya ahụ n'agha n'afọ 1915
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye na-eme udo
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1931, ọ tụrụ aro na ọ họọrọ udo karịa agha, ọbụlagodi na Germany ga-awakpo France
Challaye bụ onye dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ gbasara nkà ihe ọmụma
O bipụtakwara akwụkwọ ụmụaka n'okpuru aha Robert Fougère
Challaye nwụrụ n'ụbọchị 26 Eprel n'afọ 1967 na Paris, France
A gụrụ rue Félicien Challaye na Tunis, Tunisia aha iji sọpụrụ ya
Férid Boughedir (amụrụ n'afọ 1944) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye odee ihe nkiri nke Tunisia
Boughedir eduziwo ihe nkiri ise kemgbe afọ 1983
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ya Caméra d'Afrique na 1983 Cannes Film Festival
N'afọ 1996, e tinyere ihe nkiri ya Un été à La Goulette n'ime 46th Berlin International Film Festival
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ bụ onye otu ndị ọka ikpe na 47th Berlin International Film Festival

F, ma ọ bụ f, bụ mkpụrụedemede nke isii na mkpụrụedemede Latin, nke a na-eji na mkpụrụedemedo Bekee nke oge a, mkpụrụedemede asụsụ ndị ọzọ dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Europe na ndị ọzọ n'ụwa niile
Aha ya n'asụsụ Bekee bụ ef[note 1] (a na-akpọ /ˈɛf/), na otutu bụ efs
Mmalite nke 'F' bụ mkpụrụedemede Semitic waw nke na-anọchite anya ụda dị ka //v// ma ọ bụ /w/
N'ihe osise, ọ ga-abụ na ọ na-egosi ma ọ bụ nko ma ọ bụ klọb
O nwere ike ịbụ na ọ dabeere na ihe odide ndị Ijipt yiri ya dị ka nke na-anọchite anya okwu (nke a sụgharịrị dị ka ḥ (dj))

A nabatara ụdị mkpụrụedemede Phoenician n'asụsụ Grik dị ka ụdaume, upsilon (nke yiri nwa ya 'Y' mana ọ bụkwa nna nna nke mkpụrụedemede Rom 'U', 'V', na 'W'); na, n'ụdị ọzọ, dị ka ụdaolu, digamma, nke gosipụtara ịkpọpụta /w/, dị ka na Phoenician
Latin 'F', n'agbanyeghị na a na-akpọ ya n'ụzọ dị iche, sitere na digamma ma yie ya n'ụdị
Mgbe e /w/epụrụ mgbanwe ụda /w/ site na Grik a na-asụ, a na-eji digamma eme ihe naanị dị ka nọmba
Otú ọ dị, mkpụrụedemede Grik mekwara ka mkpụrụedemede ndị ọzọ pụta, ụfọdụ n'ime mkpụrụedemede a e chekwara sitere na digamma
Na mkpụrụedemede Etruscan, '/f/' n/w/ere ike ịnọchite anya /w/, dịka na Grik, ndị Etruscans guzobere digraph 'FH' iji nọchite anya /f/

(N'oge a gbazitere mkpụrụedemede ndị a, ọ dịghị mkpụrụedemede Grik nke na-anọchite anya /f/ mkpụrụedemede Greek phi 'Φ' na-anọchi anya /ph/ na-enweghị olu, ọ bụ ezie na na Grik nke oge a ọ bịara na-anọchitere //f//) Mgbe ndị Rom nabatara mkpụrụ ak/w/ụkwọ, ha jiri 'V' (site na Grik upsilon) ọ bụghị naanị maka ụdaume /u/, kamakwa maka ụdaume kwekọrọ /w/, na-ahapụ '/f/' maka /f/
Ya mere, site na ụdị dị iche iche nke vav n'ụwa Mediterenian, mkpụrụedemede F batara na mkpụrụedemede Rom jikọtara ya na ụda nke ndị Gris na-enweghị
Mkpụrụ akwụkwọ Roman bụ ntọala nke mkpụrụ akwụkwọ eji eme ihe taa maka Bekee na ọtụtụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ
Obere mkpụrụ akwụkwọ 'f' enweghị njikọ na ogologo s, 's' (ma ọ bụ s dị n'etiti)
Ojiji nke ogologo s nwụrụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu site na mmalite nke narị afọ nke 19, karịsịa iji gbochie mgbagwoju anya na 'f' mgbe ị na-eji obere etiti
N'usoro ederede Bekee, a na-eji ya eme ihe iji nọchite anya ụda /f/, mkparịta ụka na-enweghị olu
A na-ejikarị ya okpukpu abụọ na njedebe nke okwu
N'ụzọ pụrụ iche, ọ na-anọchite anya ụda olu /v/ na okwu a na-ahụkarị 'nke'
F bụ mkpụrụedemede nke iri na otu a na-ejikarị eme ihe n'asụsụ Bekee (mgbe G, Y, P, B, V, K, J, X, Q, na Z), na-enwe ihe dị ka 223% n'okwu
N'usoro ederede nke asụsụ ndị ọzọ, a na-anọchite anya /f/, ma ọ bụ //v//
International Phonetic Alphabet na-eji azụ̀ na-anọchite anya fricative labiodental na-enweghị olu
A na-ejikarị mkpụrụedemede f eme ihe iji gosipụta ọrụ ọ bụla
Hụkwa f na nko (ƒ)
A na-eji mkpụrụedemede f siri ike mee ihe na akara egwu dị ka ihe na-egosi 'olu dara ụda ma ọ bụ ike'
Ọ na-anọchite anya okwu Italian siri ike
Na mba ndị dị ka United States, a kọwapụtara mkpụrụedemede 'F' dị ka ọdịda n'usoro nyocha agụmakwụkwọ
Mba ndị ọzọ na-eji usoro a gụnyere Saudi Arabia, Venezuela, na Netherlands￼￼
N'ime usoro ọnụọgụ hexadecimal, a na-eji mkpụrụedemede 'F' ma ọ bụ 'f' nọchite anya ọnụọgụ hexadecimal iri na ise (nke dabara na 1510)

N'ime usoro ọnụọgụ hexadecimal (base 16), F bụ ọnụọgụ nke dabara na nọmba 15 na ngụkọ (base 10)Àtụ NoteFoot
flux (nke a na-akpọ 'flux') bụ mmemme kọmputa na-agafe agafe nke na-agbanwe okpomọkụ agba nke ngosipụta dabere na ọnọdụ na oge nke ụbọchị, na-enye ezumike maka anya
A haziri mmemme ahụ iji belata ugboro nke dị n'ala ahụ n'ebe nile site n'ime ụmụ ndị nsogbu anya n'oge iji ya eme ihe n'abalị, na-enyere aka belata mmebi nke usoro ụra
Na ntinye, onye ọrụ nwere ike ịhọrọ ebe dabere na nhazi ala, koodu ZIP, ma ọ bụ aha ebe

Usoro ihe omume ahụ na-akpaghị ndị mere n'oge ochie nakwa n'oge kwesịrị ekwesị nke mmiri ọgwụ ahụ n'ebe nile site n'ime ụmụ aka na-atụle okpomọkụ agba nke ngwaọrụ iji kọwaa oge nke ụbọchị, dabere na ọwụwa anyanwụ na ọdịda anyanwụ n'ebe ahọrọ
Mgbe anyanwụ dara, ọ ga-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ gbanwee okpomọkụ ụcha gaa na ụcha dị ọkụ ma weghachite ụcha mbụ mgbe anyanwụ pụtara

flux na-enye ụdị agba dịgasị iche ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge iche iche na ụkpụrụ okpomọkụ akọwapụtara ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge ochie ọbá ụra akpa dị n'ala ahụ n'ebe nile site n'ime ụmụ ndị, na-agbanwe omume mmemme maka mmemme ma ọ bụ ihe omume ụfọdụ; gụnyere ọnọdụ maka ikiri ihe nkiri, na-ebelata ụcha ọbara ọbara (maka awa 25), na ọnọdụ ụlọ gbara ọchịchịrị nke na-emetụtaghị ọhụụ abalị
Enwere ike ịgbanwe oge na flux maka PC iji nye ọkụ ọkụ n'ehihie (maka ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'abalị)
Ihe omume ahụ nwere ike ịchịkwa ọkụ ọkụ Philips Hue LED, nke mere na okpomọkụ ọkụ ụlọ na-agbaso ntọala flux
Usoro ihe omume ahụ dị maka Microsoft Windows, macOS na Linux (ma e wezụga Ubuntu 1804 LTS)
Ọ dịkwa maka ngwaọrụ Apple iOS, ọ bụ ezie na ọ chọrọ ka a kwụsị ngwaọrụ ahụ
Apple ekweghị ka ngwa ahụ dị na Ụlọ Ahịa App ya n'ihi ojiji ọ na-eji ngwá ọrụ mmepe a machibidoro iwu
Onye mmepe ahụ kwadoro ọrụ Xcode na GitHub, na-enye ndị ọrụ iOS 9 ohere ibudata ngwa ahụ na ngwaọrụ ha, mana ọ laghachiri ya na arịrịọ Apple
N'ịgbaso ọkwa Apple banyere ọrụ yiri nke ahụ, nke a na-akpọ Night Shift, na iOS 93, onye mmepe ahụ kpọrọ Apple ka ọ nye ndị mmepe ngwaọrụ ma kwe ka ngwa ha banye na Ụlọ Ahịa App
A preview version maka Google's Android system dị

Mbelata ikpughe ọkụ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ (1000 lux) n'oge abalị jikọtara ya na mmụba nke melatonin na nyocha nke 1996 mana nyocha nke 2018 gosipụtara na ịgbanwe ihe osise nke ngosipụta onwe onye na-enweghị ịgbanwe ntọala ha nwere ike ọ gaghị ezu iji gbochie mmetụta na mgbochi melatonin
Ndị na-akwado flux na-ekwu na ịgbanwe okpomọkụ nke ngosipụta iji belata ịdị mkpa nke ìhè na-acha ọcha na-acha anụnụ anụnụ n'abalị ga-eme ka ịdị irè nke ụra dịkwuo mma

Ọ bụ ezie na onye mmepe ahụ na-enye ndepụta nke nyocha dị mkpa na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ha, a nwalere mmemme ahụ n'onwe ya na sayensị iji chọpụta ịdị irè ya, na mmemme Apple yiri ya, Night Shift, egosila na ọ nweghị mmetụta na nsonaazụ ụra (ụra, oge, arụmọrụ na ịmụrụ anya mgbe ụra bidoro) na nyocha 2021 na ụmụ akwụkwọ kọleji 167
ndị nta akụkọ teknụzụ, ndị na-ede blọgụ, na ndị ọrụ nyochara flux n'ọtụtụ ebe ma dị mma
FAT!SO? bụ akwụkwọ nke onye na-eme ihe ike bu Marilyn Wann, nke Ten Speed Press bipụtara na afo Otu Puku Nari iteghete iri iteghete na asato (1998)
A na-akpọ ya n'okpuru isiokwu n'ihi na ị gaghị arịọ mgbaghara maka ogo gị!
Ọ gbasoro zine weebu nke otu aha ahụ site na Wann

Festac '77, nke a makwaara dị ka Ememme nke Abụọ nke oji na African nke Arts na Culture (nke mbụ bụ na Dakar, 1966), bụ nnukwu ememme mba ụwa nke emere na Lagos, Nigeria, site na 15 Jenụwarị, afọ 1977 ruo 12 Febụwarị, afọ 1977
Ihe omume ahụ were otu ọnwa mere emume ọdịbendị Afrịka ma gosipụta ụwa egwu Afrịka, nka mara mma, akwụkwọ, ihe nkiri, ịgba egwu na okpukpe
Ihe dị ka ndị sonyere 16,000, na-anọchite anya mba 56 nke Afrịka na mba ndị Afrịka, rụrụ ọrụ na ihe omume ahụ

Ndị na-ese ihe na-eme emume ahụ gụnyere Stevie Wonder si United States, Gilberto Gil si Brazil, Bembeya Jazz National si Guinea, Mighty Sparrow si Trinidad na Tobago, Les Ballets Africains, South African Miriam Makeba, na Franco Luambo Makiadi
N'oge emere ya, ọ bụ nnukwu nnọkọ pan-African nke emere
Ihe nnọchianya gọọmentị nke emume ahụ bụ ihe yiri nke Erhabor Emokpae mere nke ihe nkpuchi ọdụ́ nke eze Benin
Nkwado nke emume ahụ dugara n'ịmepụta Kansụl Naịjirịa nke Arts na Ọdịbendị, Obodo Festac na National Theatre, Iganmu, Lagos
E mere ọtụtụ n'ime ihe omume ndị ahụ n'ebe anọ National Theatre, National Stadium, Surulere, Lagos City Hall na Tafawa Balewa Square
Enwere ike ịchọta mkpali maka ịkpọkọta FESTAC na mmepe nke echiche na Négritude na Pan-Africanism
N'afọ 1940, Aimé Césaire na Léopold Sédar Senghor, ndị echiche Pan-Africanism nke W
Du Bois na Alain Locke banyere New Negro kpaliri, malitere akwụkwọ akụkọ na ụlọ obibi akwụkwọ na Paris a na-akpọ Présence Africaine; ma Césaire ma Senghor bụkwa ndị otu Société africaine de culture
Présence Africaine na Society of African Culture bụ ndị na-akwado mgbakọ abụọ, otu na afo 1956 na nke ọzọ na afọ 1959
A kpọkọtara nzukọ ndị ahụ na ebumnuche ịkwalite ọdịbendị na mmepeanya ndị isi ojii
Nzukọ nke mbụ bụ Nzukọ nke ndị edemede ojii na Paris na nke abụọ bụ nzukọ ndị edemede isi ojii na Rom

Ndị bịara nzukọ ahụ gụnyere ndị edemede nke ihe nketa Africa na Afro dị ka Alioune Diop, Cheikh Anta Diop, Léopold Senghor, na Jacques Rabemananjara, Richard Wright, Césaire, George Lamming, Horace Mann Bond, Jacques Alexis, John Davis, William Fontaine, Jean Price Mars, James Baldwin, Chester Himes, Mercer Cook na Frantz Fanon
Ndị otu abụọ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ na-ekwurịta echiche banyere nlọghachi nke ọdịbendị Afrịka na ịkpọkọta ememme nka

N'afọ 1966, site na nduzi nke Senghor nyere na enyemaka sitere n'èzí, ọkachasị France, na UNESCO, emere Ememme Ụwa Mbụ nke Black Arts na Dakar, Senegal, n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1966
Na ngwụcha emume mbụ ahụ, a kpọrọ Naijiria ka ha mee emume nke abụọ na afọ 1970 iji kwalite ịdị n'otu ndị isi ojii site na emume ọdịnala
Mba na-anabata ga-ahụ maka ịnye akụrụngwa na ihe owuwu dị mkpa maka mmemme ahụ nke ọma
Agha Obodo na mgbanwe na gọọmentị mere ka e yigharịa emume ahụ ruo afọ 1977
Nkwadebe maka emume nke abụọ malitere na Lagos, Nigeria, na 3 Ọktoba, na afọ 1972, mgbe Kọmitii Ememme Mba Nile zutere na nke mbụ ya wee kpebie na a ga-eme ememme ahụ na Nọvemba, na afọ 1974
A gbanwere aha emume ahụ site na 'World Black Festival of Arts and Culture' gaa na 'Second World Black and African Festival of Arts et Culture' iji kwado eziokwu nke ịdị n'otu Afrịka
A gbanwere ụbọchị ahụ gaa na Nọvemba, na afọ 1975
Ndị na-ahazi ya kewara mba n'ime mpaghara 16, mpaghara ọ bụla nwere kọmitii nke ndị nnọchiteanya nke ndị Afrịka mejupụtara; onyeisi oche nke mpaghara ọ bụla ga-aghọ onye otu Kọmitii Ememme Mba Nile
Kọmitii ahụ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka aka nchịkwa nke Ememme ahụ
Ọchịchọ imeziwanye emume Dakar mere ka Naịjirịa nwee ebumnuche ịmepụta ihe ngosi dị egwu nke ego mmanụ ọhụrụ a chọtara
Ọchịchị ọhụrụ nọchiri ọchịchị Gowon ma gbanwee ụbọchị ememme ahụ ka ọ bụrụ na afọ 1977
Iji mepụta mgbasa ozi maka emume ahụ, kọmitii mba ụwa dụrụ mpaghara ndị ahụ ọdụ ka ha gbaa emume mbido ume
E mere obere ememme ụfọdụ, dị ka Carifesta nke Guyana kwadoro, ememme Commonwealth na London, ihe ngosi nka na ọrụ aka nke Ghana na Nafest nke Nigeria

Kọmitii emume ahụ họọrọ dịka ihe nnọchianya emume nke Erhabor Emokpae nke ihe nkpuchi ọdụ́ nke Benin nke narị afọ nke iri na ise (ihe nkpuchi ahụ n'onwe ya bụ nke ikpeazụ Ovonramwen, eze Benin nke Consul General nke Niger Coast Protectorate, Ralph Moor wepụrụ n'ocheeze na afọ 1897)
E wuru ụlọ obibi a maara dị ka Festac Village dị ka ebe obibi maka ihe dị ka mmadụ 17,000
Otú ọ dị, ebumnuche ogologo oge nke obodo ahụ n'okpuru Federal Housing Programme bụ iji belata ụfọdụ nrụgide ụlọ na Lagos
A tụrụ aro ụlọ ahụ maka iwu n'ime afọ abụọ, na ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ ngo 40 na-arụ ọrụ na saịtị dị iche iche nke ọrụ ahụ
N'ozuzu, e wuru ụlọ obibi 5,088 tupu emume ahụ ma rụchaa 5,687 ọzọ na ngwụcha afọ 1977
N'oge emume ahụ, ụlọ obibi ahụ bụ ebe a na-eme ihe ngosi na mmekọrịta site n'aka ndị sonyere ka ndị otu dị iche iche na-eme emume ha n'ehihie na n'abalị
Maka ịnabata ihe ngosi na nkuzi, e wuru ụlọ ihe nkiri dị iche iche, iji bụrụkwa ebe nka na ọdịbendị Afrịka
Ihe owuwu ọhụrụ ahụ nwere ụlọ ngosi abụọ, ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri 5,000, ụlọ nzukọ nwere oche 1,600 na ụlọ ihe nkiri abụọ
Ụlọ ihe nkiri ahụ kwadoro ịgba egwu, egwu, ihe ngosi nka, ihe nkiri sinima, ihe nkiri na mkparịta ụka
Emume mmeghe nke emume ahụ mere na 15 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1977 n'ime National Stadium, Surulere, Lagos
Otu n'ime ihe ndị dị ịrịba ama nke emume ahụ bụ ngagharị nke ndị sonyere na-anọchite anya mba 48 na-agafe ndị isi na-eleta, ndị nnọchiteanya na onye isi ala Naijiria, Olusegun Obasanjo
Ụfọdụ ndị sonyere na ngagharị ahụ yi uwe ejiji mara mma, ụfọdụ ndị ikom nọ n'elu osisi dị mita iri na anọ, ndị na-agba egwú Naijiria bu arịa ọkụ n'isi ha
Iji gosipụta nnwere onwe na ịdị n'otu nke ndị isi ojii, a tọhapụrụ 1,000 nduru; onye ụkọchukwu shango gbakwara efere ememme ahụ ọkụ
Ihe omume ememme ahụ na-amalite n'ihe dị ka elekere itoolu nke ụtụtụ ruo n'etiti abalị
Nzukọ ahụ dị n'etiti ememme ahụ, a na-emekwa ya kwa ụbọchị n'ime izu abụọ mbụ nke ihe omume ahụ
Ihe dị ka ndị edemede 700, ndị na-ese ihe na ndị ọkà mmụta sonyere na nkuzi ahụ

Isiokwu nke okwu ndị ahụ na-emetụta enweghị nnwere onwe ọgụgụ isi na enweghị mgbagwoju anya nke mba ụwa nke atọ na-agakwuru ndị na-achị ha mgbe ụfọdụ maka nka ka ha na-anwa ịmepụta onyinyo nke ntụkwasị obi na nnwere onwe onwe onwe onwe n'onwe ha yana ụwa ndị ọzọ
Ebumnuche ekwupụtara nke mkparịta ụka ahụ bụ ịchọ azịza nye ajụjụ banyere otu esi eme ka ndị na-ese ihe ojii na ndị Africa dịghachi ndụ na otu esi eme ihe dị mfe ịnabata mba ụwa na ịnweta ụzọ
N'etiti ndị ọkà okwu na ihe omume ahụ bụ Clarival do Prado Valladares, Lazarus Ekwueme, Babs Fafunwa na Eileen Southern
Kọmitii mmemme ahụ zụrụ ngụkọta nke bọs 2,003 (mmadụ abụọ na atọ) nwere oche 45 na bọs 91 (mmadụ iri itoolu na otu) nwere oche iri abụọ na isii maka ebumnuche nhazi
Otu ihe kpatara ya bụ emume Durbar nke emere na Kaduna, obodo nke karịrị kilomita 700 site na Lagos
Ihe omume ahụ mere site na 5 Febụwarị ruo 8 Febrụwarị, na afọ 1977
Na mbụ, durbars na Naijiria bụ oriri a na-eme iji sọpụrụ ndị isi; malite na afọ 1911, e mere durbars anọ na Naijeria tupu afọ 1977
Otú ọ dị, Festac durbar bụ asọmpi nke nwere ndị eze na-agba ịnyịnya na ndị agha ha, kamel, na ndị na-eme ihe ntụrụndụ dị ka ihe ịrịba ama nke ịdị n'otu

Durbar bụ ngosipụta nke ndị na-agba ịnyịnya na ndị na-eme ihe ntụrụndụ dị ka ndị na-eti egwu na-akpọ opi, Kakakitrumpets, tambari na ịgbà, n'etiti ndị na-ejikọta ya bụ ndị Fulani, Bori na Bida masqueraders

Festac durbar sitere na omenala oge ochie nke Hausa, Songhay na Kanembu dị ka Hawan Dawaki, nke a makwaara dị ka ịnyịnya, na emume ndị agha Bornu a na-akpọ Tewur, nke bụ nzukọ nke ndị agha na-agba ịnyịnya na-eme tupu nnukwu mkpọsa
Ihe omume akụkọ ihe mere eme ọzọ e wepụtara bụ nzukọ kwa afọ nke ndị eze Fulani nke a na-eme na Caliphs nke Sokoto na Kaura Namoda iji mee ka ndị agha gaa njem megide steeti ndị iro
Regatta ụgbọ mmiri bụ ihe omume ọzọ a na-eme n'ebe dị anya site na ebe ndị a na-ahụkarị mana, n'adịghị ka durbar, a na-agba regatta na Lagos
Regatta bụ ihe omume ụbọchị atọ nke emere na Queen's Drive foreshore na Ikoyi, Lagos
Ndị sonyere bụ ndị si Naijiria na steeti ndị nọchitere anya bụ Edo, Cross River, Imo, Kwara, Ogun, Ondo na steeti Lagos
Ụgbọ mmiri ọ bụla nwere ìgwè ndị na-agụ egwú, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ma ọ bụ masquerades na ndị na-agba egwú
Ihe karịrị ụgbọ mmiri 200 sonyere na ihe omume ahụ
Grand Durbar na Kaduna Steeti
Grand Durbar na Kaduna Steeti
Regatta na Lagos

A na-eme ihe ngosi na ihe ngosi nka dị ka ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri, egwu na ịgba egwú n'oge mgbede na mgbede na National Theatre, Otú ọ dị, a na-eme ụfọdụ ihe nkiri na ihe ngosi egwu na Tafawa Balewa Square, na ihe nkiri na egwu nke oge a na-emekarị n'ehihie na ihe nkiri ọdịnala na ihe ngosi egwú na-eme n'uhuruchi
N'ozuzu, e mere ihe dị ka egwuregwu 50, ihe ngosi egwu na ịgba egwu 150, ihe nkiri 80, ihe ngosi nka 40 na oge abụ na ịgba egwu 200
N'abalị na-erule emume mmeghe ahụ, onye nwụrụ anwụ Sory Kandia Kouyaté, onye isi Mande Griot, mesoro ndị isi steeti na gọọmentị na olu olu na kora, nke na-echetara
Ntọala ndị ahụ na-echetara ụlọ ikpe eze ukwu na nke eze ukwu nke Africa

Ndị egwu ndị ọzọ rụrụ bụ Osibisa, Les Amazones, Bembeya Jazz na Les Ballets Africains si Guinea; Franco Luambo si Congo; Miriam Makeba, Louis Moholo, Dudu Pukwana si South Africa; Invaders Steelband si Guyana, na Mighty Sparrow si Grenada; Gilberto Gil si Brazil, na ndị na-ese ihe US gụnyere Donald Byrd, Randy Weston, Stevie Wonder na Sun Ra
Ewezuga ọtụtụ kọntaktị, e mere nzukọ egwu na 29 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1977 n'okpuru nduzi nke onye na-ede egwu Akin Euba
Ndị sonyere na nzukọ ahụ bụ Mwesa Isaiah Mapoma, Kwabena Nketia na Mosunmola Omibiyi
Ndị ọzọ nọ ebe ahụ gụnyere ndị na-akpọ ngwá egwu, ndị na-agụ egwú, ndị nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na ụmụ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nke egwu
Ruo ihe karịrị awa abụọ, ndị sonyere na-atụle okwu gbasara nchegbu onwe onye ma nyochaa ụzọ isi meziwanye ọrụ egwu n'etiti ndị Afrịka, ma na kọntinent ma na Diaspora
Ndị na-agba egwú nke ndị Australia, Aboriginal Islander Dance Theatre, yana Eleo Pomare Dance Company si New York City
E mere ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nka na National Theatre, na Nigerian National Museum na gburugburu Tafawa Balewa Square
Na Square, e nyere mba ọ bụla nọchitere anya na ememme ahụ ụlọ iji gosipụta ihe osise ha, ngwá egwú, ákwà a kpara akpa, akwụkwọ na ihe osise

Ụfọdụ ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ a ma ama mere bụ Africa na Mmalite nke Mmadụ, nke emere na National Theatre, na Ekpo Eyo's 2000 Years of Nigerian Art, nke gụnyere Nok terracottas, Benin court art, Igbo Ukwu, Ife na Tsoede bronzes na ihe nka
Ihe ngosi Naijiria nke oge a nke gosipụtara ọrụ Bruce Onobrakpeya, Ben Enwonwu, Yusuf Grillo, Uche Okeke na Kolade Oshinowo sokwa na ihe omume ahụ

Ihe ngosi nke teknụzụ ụlọ nke Afrịka mekwara na National Theatre, ihe ngosi ahụ gụnyere ihe osise, eserese, na ihe nlereanya na-egosi isiokwu ụlọ dị iche iche dị ka ihe owuwu banco masonry, ihe owuwu tensile na Berber Courtyard nke Matmata
Mgbe emume ahụ mechara nke ọma, Naịjirịa, mba na-anabata ya, debere ihe ndị e ji mara mba na obodo 59 ahụ
Nke a mere ka e guzobe Center for Black and African Arts and Civilization (CBAAC), ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị etiti nwere ọfịs na Marina, Lagos na FCT, Abuja
A na-echekwa ihe ncheta nke emume ahụ ugbu a na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na Center
Onye na-ese foto Marilyn Nance, onye na-ese ihe maka FESTAC 77's North American Zone (NAZ) nwere ma na-elekọta ihe ndekọ nke ndị agha USA
Onye ikpeazụ ugboro abụọ maka W

Eugene Smith Award na Humanistic Photography, Nance nwere ike ịbụ onye a maara nke ọma maka akwụkwọ ya zuru ezu nke FESTAC 77, Ememme Ụwa nke Abụọ nke Black na African Arts na Culture nke emere na Lagos, Nigeria
Ihe ngosi nke Theaster Gates na Romi Crawford haziri gosipụtara ọtụtụ foto, ụfọdụ a na-ahụtụbeghị n'ihu ọha, site n'aka onye na-ese foto na Chicago bụ Karega Kofi Moyo
Ihe ngosi ahụ, K
Kofi Moyo na FESTAC ̊77 The Activation of a Black Archive, nọ na ngosi na Mahadum Chicago's Logan Center for the Arts gallery Febụwarị 12 - Machi 21, na afọ 2021
Ihe ngosi ahụ sitere na nyocha nke e mere n'oge Richard na Mary L
Gray Center Mellon Fellowship site na Gates na Crawford

Trocon Markous Roberts, Jr, nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya FKi 1st, 1$T ma ọ bụ 1st Down, bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu, onye na-agụ egwu, ónyé édémédé egwu, DJ, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si Atlanta, Georgia
Ọ bụ ónyé otu mmepụta na ide egwu FKi

Mmepụta nke FKi 1st enwetala 20 Gold na Platinum ndekọ, gụnyere Iggy Azalea's 'Work', Travis Porter's 'Make It Rain', 'Bring It Back' na 'Ayy Ladies', 'Watch Out' nke 2 Chainz, na 'Pick It Up' nkè Famous Dex gosipụtara ASAP Rocky
O sokwa dee 5 × platinum single 'White Iverson' nkè Post Malone
N'afọ 2016, FKi 1st wepụtara EP nkè ya, First Time For Everything, na Mad Decent ma soro Fetty Wap, Post Malone, Justin Bieber, Diplo, na ndị ọzọ gaa njem
Ọ bụkwa onye isi mmepụta nkè Post Malone's debut album, Stoney (2016), nke mechara gaa 3 × platinum
Faïza Tsabet (amụrụ na Machị 22, 1985, n'ime Chlef) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball mba ụwa
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu mba
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu egwuregwu volleyball nke Algeria n'afọ 2008
Asụsụ Faʼ, Lefaʼ (nke a na-akpọkwa Fak ma ọ bụ Lefa), bụ ihe otu n'ime asụsụ Bantu nke Cameroon
Faaji FM bụ ụlọ ọrụ redio Naijiria
Ọ bụ Daar Communications, ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta nke Raymond Dokpesi guzobere, nwe ya
Faaji FM malitere izipu ozi zuru oke na Disemba 1, afọ 2012, na onye isi ọrụ redio Daar Communications, Kenny Ogungbe na-amalite izipu ozi ahụ
Agidigbo Fm 887, Ibadan
Cheru Kunnath Paijas known by his stage name Faaxy is an Asian singer and musical artist
who has an official YouTube artist channel (OAC) and is present on the largest music platform Spotify
His music is available on international music platforms such as Apple Music, YouTube, Spotify, Deezer, amazon music, etc
He started his music career in 2021 with his own Faaxy music studio in the Sultanate of Oman
Faaxy was born on 21 February 1982 in Kozhikode, Kerala, in a Muslim family to Muhammed and his wife Subaida Muhammed
He started learning dance at the age of ten
While attending high school, he participated in talent shows
At the age of fifteen, he moved with his family to Oman
Faaxy later discovered his interest in computers, a hobby that led him further and further into graphic design, web development, app development and music programming
Originally, he had no musical background, but as a self-taught musician, he was able to go far into the field of music production with the help of YouTube tutorials
Faaxy has many credentials as a programmer, web developer, 3D developer, singer and songwriter
However, it is in his career as a singer and composer that he feels best
Now Faaxy works with many international clients in digital marketing, web development and at the same time is successful in his career as a ‘Musical Artist’
He started his education already in his home village
After finishing secondary school, he was admitted to NIELIT and completed his Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Application in 2002
He also completed a computer science degree in Don Bosco in 2003

Fabian Anene Ositadimma Udekwu (n'afo 1928 na ubọchi nke irina asaa nke onwa Nọvemba n'afo 2006) onye amụrụ na Enugwu Agidi, Anambra Steeti bụ kwa dọkịta na-ahụ maka ahụike, onye na-awa ahụ n'obi
Ọ bụ prọfesọ pụrụ iche nke ịwa ahụ n'obi na Mahadum nsukka nke Naijiria, na onye ọsụ ụzọ nke ịwa obi na-emeghe n'Africa
Prọfesọ Udekwu gara St
Charles koleji nzulite ndi nkuzi na Onitsha ebe e debere ya dị ka onye otu ngalaba mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afo1947, na-akụzi mgbakọ na mwepụ na ọdịdị ala
O mere ule matrikuleshon London ya site na akwụkwọ ozi ma mgbe o tukobarara ego zuru ezu ọ gara n'ihu n'afo 1950 na United States maka ọmụmụ ihe ọzọ
O mere ọmụmụ ọgwụ ya na Bayooji, Kemistri na Fizis na Los Angeles
N'ikpeazụ, ọ gara mahadum Loyola nke Chicago Stritch ụlọakwụkwọ ọgwu,ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka dọkịta n'afo 1957 ma bụrụ ọkachamara na ịwa ahụ obi na obi n'ozuzu ya n'afo1964
O mere ọzụzụ ịwa ahụ ya na ulọ ọgwu Cook County di na Chicago
Fabian Udekwu bụ dọkịta mbụ na-awa ahụ obi na obi na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye otu Koleji Ndị dọkịta na-awa ahụ na Amerika, njiko ndi dokinta na-awa ahu obi na Amerika, koleji mba uwa nke ndi na-awa afọ na Koleji ọdịda anyanwụ African nke ndị na-awa afo
Udekwu bụ onye guzobere na onye otu ulo akwukwo Naijiria nke sayensi
Udekwu laghachiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 1965 dị ka dọkịta na-ahụ maka obi na obi na Mahadum College ụlọ ọgwu nke Mahadum Ibadan
Ọ hapụrụ Ibadan gaa Enugu mgbe mmekpa ahu malitere nke gosipụtara mmalite nke agha obodo Naịjirịa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye dọkịta na-awa ahụ ndị agha na onye isi ụlọ ọgwụ nkuzi Biafran n'ebe dị iche iche gụnyere Enugu na Emekukwu n'oge agha ahụ
Ọ bụkwa odeakwụkwọ nke njikọ enyemaka na nhazigharị ndi Biafra n'oge agha ahụ
Udekwu mechara bụrụ Prọfesọ Pụrụ Iche na Onye isi nke Ngalaba Ịwa Ahụ nke Ụlọ Ọgwụ Nkuzi Mahadum Naịjirịa,(UNTH) ma bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Enugu Campus nke Mahadụ ahụ
A na-eto Prọfesọ Udekwu maka iwulite Ngalaba Ịwa Ahụ nke Mahadum Naịjirịa

N'agbanyeghị ọtụtụ mgbalị na-enweghị isi iji nweta ego iji guzobe ngalaba ịwa ahụ nke oge a site n'ọtụtụ òtù na United Statei, United Kindom, Scandinevia ma site na enyemaka ụka, o nwere ike inweta ego site na ogige Enugu site ya na onyinye nke ndị Naijiria ọ bụla iji wuo ụlọ ịwa ahụ ma zụta ngwá ọrụ dị mkpa iji guzopụta ụlọ ọrụ maka ịwa ahụ n'obi na Naijiria
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ guzobere ịwa ahụ obi na Naịjirịa
Prọfesọ Udekwu duziri otu ndị dọkịta na-awa ahụ nke mere ịwa ahụ obi mbụ gara nke ọma na Naịjirịa n'afo 1974 nke bụ nke mbụ n'ụdị ya na Africa ojii
Ọzọkwa n'ime ndị otu ndị dọkịta na-awa ahụ na-arụ ọrụ a dị ịrịba ama bụ Prọfesọ Sir Magdi Yacoub, Prọfesor Anyanwu CH, Nwafor DC, onye na-akụnwụ ahụ Dr
Shreeniwas Jawalekar na ndị ọzọ
Usoro ịwa ahụ obi isii ọzọ sochiri nkea n'okpuru Udekwu na Mahadum ulo ọgwu nkuzi Naịjirịa (UNTH) n'etiti afọ 1974 na 1980
Udekwu bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu nke ukwuu, na-egwu bọọlụ na tennis n'oge ndụ ya niile

Fadhéla Dziria, nke a na-akpọ Fadhéla Madani Bent el-Mahdi (25 Jun 1917 意 6 Ọktoba 1970) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Algeria n'ụdị Hawzi nke egwu oge ochie Andalusian
A na-ahụkwa aha mbụ ya dị ka Fadila, Fadhila, ma ọ bụ Fadela, na aha nna ọ họọrọ dị ka Dziriya
Dziria pụtara Algeria ọ bụ, n'ọrụ, 'Fadhéla onye Algeria'
A mụrụ Fadhéla Dziria na Algiers, nwa nwanyị nke Mehdi Ben Abderrahmane na Fettouma Khelfaoui
A nụrụ ya na mbụ na redio na Algeria
N'afọ 1930, ọ bụ onye na-agụ egwú cabaret na Paris
Ọ laghachiri Algeria, wee bụrụ abụ na Cafe des Sports
Ọ malitere ime ihe ndekọ n`afọ 1940s, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ abụ ọdịnala
Ọ gara njem ịbụ abụ n'obodo ndị ọzọ, ma pụta na ihe nkiri
Ka oge na-aga n'ọrụ ya, a hụkwara ya na telivishọn
Ya na nwanne ya nwanyị na-alụ ọgụ, Goucem Madani (n`afọ 1918 ruo n`afọ 1983), nwetara ego maka ihe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma nọrọ oge n'ụlọ mkpọrọ maka ọrụ ya
Ụmụnne nwanyị ahụ na Sultana Daoud nwere otu egwu
A na-ekwu na Fadhéla Dziria nwere mmetụta dị mkpa na Saloua, onye ọzọ na-agụ egwú ọdịnala Algeria
O nyekwara ohere mbụ maka onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-ede egwú Biyouna, onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara na ndị inyom niile nke Dziria dị ka nwa agbọghọ
Fadhéla Madani lụrụ di na nwunye nwa oge mgbe ọ dị afọ 13
Ọ nwụrụ n`afọ 1970, mgbe ọ dị afọ 53
Ebe olili ozu ya dị na El Kettar Cemetery
N'afọ 2009, a kpọrọ ụlọ egwuregwu na National Institute of Music na Algiers aha Dziria
A na-eme emume egwu mba kwa afọ n'ebe ahụ
N'afọ 2010, e nwere nnọkọ nke ndị egwu na Algiers iji mee emume ncheta afọ iri anọ nke ọnwụ ya, na imeghe ihe ngosi foto dabere na egwu ya
N'afọ 1999, abụ 'Dziria' nke otu hip-hop Algeria bụ MBS gosipụtara ihe ndekọ Fadila Dziria n`afọ 1951 nke 'Ana Touiri'
Fadhel Jaziri (a mụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Fadhel Jaziri na medina nke isi obodo Tunisia n'afọ 1948 n'ezinụlọ nọ n'ọkwá dị elu nke azụkarị ahịa fez
Na mgbakwunye na azụmaahịa ndị ọzọ metụtara ụlọ ọrụ ile ọbịa, nna Jaziri nwere ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ na mpaghara Bab Souika
Fadhel na-eto eto si otú a nwee ohere izute ma bụrụ onye ndị ọrụ nka, ihe nkiri na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emetụta nke nna ya na-enwekarị obi ụtọ ịnata
Fadhel Jaziri gara Sadiki College nke oge a ebe o nwere ahụmịhe nwa akwụkwọ ọhụrụ na otu ụmụ akwụkwọ na-eme ihe nkiri nke gụnyere onye na-eme egwuregwu Tunisian Raouf Ben Amor
N'oge ihe omume nke afọ 1968, Jaziri na-arụsi ọrụ ike ma sonye na ngagharị iwe na-ewere ọnọdụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị Tunisia ebe o kwupụtara okwu
Iwe nwa okorobịa ya megide mmegide na nrụrụ aka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mere ka a chụpụ ya na Faculty of Arts tupu ọ gụchaa diplọma ya na nkà ihe ọmụma
N'ụzọ dị mma maka ya, n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ iji mụọ na isi obodo England yana ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-eto eto Tunisian
Ahụmahụ mbụ Jaziri nwere n'elu ikpo okwu bụ na Ibn Khaldoun Palace of Culture na Tunis ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Tunisian Ali Ben Ayed mgbe ọ ga-arụ ọrụ na Murad III
Otú ọ dị, mgbe o si London lọta n'afọ 1972, Jaziri so guzobe otu ihe nkiri nke Gafsa nke a maara na French dị ka 意Théâtre du Sud
Ndị otu ahụ gụnyere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama na Tunisia dịka Fadhel Jaibi, Raja Farhat, Jalila Baccar na Mohamed Driss
Na Tunis, Jaziri na Jaibi mechara malite ụlọ ihe nkiri ọhụrụ nke Tunis ma mepụta ọtụtụ ihe nkiri nke ga-aghọ ihe nkiri ndị dị mkpa nke ihe nkiri Tunisian

Fadhili Frank Mtanga (a mụrụ na 14 Nọvemba 1981) nke a maara nke ọma site na aha edemede ya bụ Fadhy Mtanga bụ onye edemede Tanzania, onye na-ede blọgụ, onye na'ese foto, onye na -ese na onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
O bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ Swahili mbụ ya, Kizungumkuti n'afọ 2011, nke Huba sochiri n'afọ 2014 na Fungate n'afọ 2017
N'afọ 2020, o bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke anọ bụ Rafu
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2020, Fadhy malitere ihe ọ kpọrọ #TuzoChallenge na mgbidi Facebook ya
Ọ mara ndị edemede Swahili ndị ọzọ aka ka ha gaa n'ihu na akụkọ ọhụrụ ya nke ọ kpọrọ Tuzo
Dịka ihe mbụ e mere n'ụwa nke akwụkwọ, ihe ịma aka ahụ dugara na mbipụta nke akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ nke ụdị ya na-aga n'otu aha ahụ
N'ịbụ nke ndị edemede ise (Fadhy Mtanga, Lilian Mbaga, Maundu Mwingizi, Laura Pettie na Hussein Tuwa) gosipụtara, Tuzo nke a malitere n'ọnwa Disemba 2020
O bipụtakwara akwụkwọ uri Swahili mbụ ya bụ Hisia n'afọ 2018
Fadia Stella (a mụrụ na 30 Disemba 1974), bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri Caramel na Déjà mort
A mụrụ ya na 30 Disemba 1974 na Nairobi, Kenya
N'afọ 1998, o mere ihe nkiri izizi ya Déjà mort na obere ọrụ dịka 'enyi Alain'
Mgbe e mesịrị, ihe nkiri ahụ gbakwara Caméra d'Or
Fadika Kramo-Lanciné (amụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri sị Ivory Coast yana onye na-ede ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na akụkọ ifo
A mụrụ Kramo-Lanciné na Danané na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Ivory Coast na 1948
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Abidjan na mba ya, wee mụọ ihe nkiri na Louis Lumière School na Paris, France
Kramo-Lanciné sonyeere National Office of Rural Promotion na 1975 wee lekọta ihe nkiri agụmakwụkwọ na mmemme telivishọn na nsogbu mmepe
Ọrụ mbụ ya, La Fin de la Course, bụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke nkeji iri na anọ nke e duziri na 1974
Mgbe ọ sonyechara n'ọfịs nke nkwalite ime obodo, Kramo-Lanciné duziri ihe nkiri nkuzi na ihe ngosi telivishọn iri na abụọ n'etiti afọ 1975 na 1981
N'afọ 1978, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Djéli, conte d'aujourd'hui ma ọ bụ Djeli akụkọ nke taa, site n'enyemaka nke otu ndị ọrụ telivishọn
Emechara ya na 1981, Djéli natara Grand Prix (Yennenga Stallion) na 7th Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou, nke a makwaara dị ka onyinye FESPACO
N'afọ 1993, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi, onye edemede, na onye na-emepụta Wariko, Le gros lot ma ọ bụ Wariko, the Jackpot
Site n'afo 2013 ruo 2016 Kramo-Lanciné bụ onye nduzi nke National Cinematography nke Côte d'Ivoire, ma kemgbe 2016 ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ teknụzụ maka ihe nkiri na Ministry of Francophone Culture
N'afọ 2017, e guzobere ihe oyiyi nke Kramo-Lanciné n'okporo ámá nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Ouagadougou iji cheta ihe ndị ọ rụzuru na ihe nkiri
Fadumo Ahmed Alin bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Somalia nke jere ozi dị ka onye enyemaka (onye osote) minista nke agụmakwụkwọ n'etiti afọ 1974 na afọ 1982
Alin, onye nkuzi site na ọrụ, bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na kansụl Somalia, na nwanyị mbụ minista na Somalia
Na Septemba 5 ruo 6 nke afọ 1993, ọ sonyere na ọmụmụ ihe gbasara udo na esemokwu na obodo Hargeisa

Fadumo Qasim Dayib, onye a na-akpọ Deeqo - nke pụtara 'onyinye' na Somali-, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Somalia na nwanyị mbụ gbara ọsọ maka onye isi ala Somalia, na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Somalia, na ntuli aka nke November 2016
A mụrụ Dayib na 1972 na Thika, Kenya na nne na nna Somalia
Nne ya gara ebe ahụ mgbe ọ nwụsịrị ụmụ iri na otu n'ihi ọrịa ndị a na-egbochi
Nna ya, onye bụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọala, nyere nne ya na nwanne ya nwoke obere ọfụma
Ha lụrụ di na nwunye n'ụzọ ha na-aga Kenya wee biri na Thika
Nne na nna ya abụọ amaghị akwụkwọ ma nna ya na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ
Nne ya bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego na-eme ihe, onye na-ere tii n'akụkụ ụzọ
O nwere ụmụnne abụọ ọzọ amụrụ na Kenya
Nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọ dị obere
A chụpụrụ ezinụlọ ya na Nairobi na 1989 ma chụga ha na Mogadishu
A tụrụ nne ya mkpọrọ nwa oge n'ihi na a na-enyo nwanne ya nwoke enyo na ọ na-akwado otu ndị na-emegide Siad Barre
Nne Dayib rere ihe niile iji mee ka ya na ụmụnne ya gbalaga dị ka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na Finland, ebe ọ bi kemgbe 1990
Dayib amụtaghị ịgụ na ide ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Finland ka ọ bụrụ onye nọọsụ na-ahụ maka nlekọta dị egwu, na-enweta nzere masta abụọ
O meriri na mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwanyị na Harvard Kennedy School iji mụọ nchịkwa ọha na eze
Ọ bụ onye na-achọ nzere doctoral na Mahadum Helsinki na-eme nchọpụta na United Nations Security Council Resolution 1325 (Udo, Ụmụ nwanyị na Nchebe)
Dayib bụ onye na-eme mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ọkachamara na ahụike ọha na eze na onye na-ahụ maka mmepe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba onwe onye na ọrụ maka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka United Nations na Somalia na-eguzobe ụlọ ọgwụ ahụike nne na 2005 mana a kpọpụrụ ya n'ihi nchegbu nchekwa
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mgbochi HIV ma zụọ ndị na-ahụ maka ahụike maka UN na Fiji na LiberiaN'afọ 2017, Fadumo ghọrọ nwanyị Somalia mbụ nwere ọkwa onye nduzi mba na UN Somalia
Dayib kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịzọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Somalia na 2014 na ntuli aka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya mbụ a ga-eme kemgbe 1967
Ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ iri na asatọ na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala n'afọ 2016, gụnyere onye nọ n'ọkwa Hassan Sheikh Mohamud na onye mmeri Mohamed Abdullahi Mohamed
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị
Mkpebi ya ịzọ ọkwa onye isi ala dọtara egwu ọnwụ

Ikpo okwu ya gụnyere iwu mgbochi nrụrụ aka, na-egbu ụmụ nwanyị akụkụ ahụ ha, na-akwụsị usoro ọchịchị nke ezinụlọ 45 ma na-ekwurịta okwu na al-Shabaab iji gbaa otu ahụ ume ka ha belata njikọ ha na òtù ndị na-eyi ọha egwu mba ụwa ma kwụsị igbu ndị Somalia
O kwuru na o nwere obere ohere mmeri n'ihi nrụrụ aka na usoro ọchịchị nke ezinụlọ 45
Dayib nwere ụmụ anọ
O kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịnọgide na-etinye aka n'imeziwanye Somalia ọbụlagodi mgbe ntuli aka gasịrị

Fadwa Sidi Madane (amụrụ na 20 Nọvemba na afọ 1994) bụ onye Morocco na-agba ọsọ n'etiti

Fah-fah bụ ofe nke ndi Obodo Djiboutian, nke a na-erikarị n'akụkụ ndịda nke mba ahụ
A na-ejikarị ya eme nri abalị
Nri a na-ewu ewu n'ezie na nri ndị dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka

A na-ejikarị anụ ewu ya na akwụkwọ nri na chilies na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ eme Fah-fah ma jirikwa achịcha dị larịị a na-akpọ Aish maọbụ nke a makwaara dịka achịcha Lebanọn maọbụ a na-enye ya Injera, achịcha Etiopia a ma ama maọbụ Lahoh, achịcha Somalia yiri sponge
E kwesịghị ịgbagwoju nke a anya na usoro nwa ọhụrụ kpọrọ nkụ a na-akpọSkiwa faffa na Agba ya Obi obodo Ethiopia
Fahmy nwere ike izo aka na ndia
Fahnbulleh bụ aha nna nke sitere na Liberia
Faidherbia bụ ụdị ahịhịa leguminous nwere otu ụdị, Faidherbia albida, nke a gụnyere n'ọtụtụ ụdị Acacia dị ka Acacia albida
A mụrụ ụdị ahụ n'Africa na Middle East ma webata ya na Pakistan na India
Aha ndị a na-ahụkarị gụnyere apụl-ring acacia (ọgba ha, mkpụrụ osisi indehiscent yiri mgbaaka apụl), na ogwu oyi
Aha South Africa bụ osisi ana
A marawo ụdị a dị ka Acacia albida ruo ogologo oge, a ka na-akpọkarị ya dị ka nke a

Guinet (1969) na Pondicherry bu ụzọ kwuo ka a kewaa ya n'ime ụdị Faidherbia, ụdị nke Auguste Chevalier guzobere na senchiri gara aga na nke a dị ka ụdị, nke onye South Africa James Henderson Ross (1973) na onye Senegal legume botanist Nongonierma (1976, 1978), kwadoro, mana ndị edemede nọgidere na-akwado nhazi n'okpuru Acacia ka ọ dị na 1997

Dị ka John Patrick Micklethwait Brenan si dee na Flora of Tropical East Africa (1959), enwere ike ịmata ụdị abụọ na mpaghara a (Kenya, Tanzania, Uganda), agbụrụ A na-amata ọdịiche site na njirimara dị nro, ebe agbụrụ B nwere ntutu
Ross (1979) na-ekwu na osisi niile dị na ndịda etiti Tanzania bụ agbụrụ B
N'otu aka ahụ, Nongonierma kọwara ụdị abụọ maka Senegal, var
glabra na var
pseudoglabra, mana a na-eleghara ọdịiche ya anya site na 2007
Ọ bụ osisi ogwu na-eto eto site na mita isii ruo mita ịrị atọ (20 - 98 ft) n'ogologo na mita abụọ (66 ) n'obosara ogwe osisi
Mgbọrọgwụ ya na-abanye n'ime ala na-eme ka ọ na-eguzogide oke ọkọchị
Akpụkpọ ahụ na-acha ntụ ntụ, ma na-agbaji mgbe ọ kara nká
Enwere mkpụrụ pụkụ ịrị na otu na kilogram ọ bụla[Tinye edensibịa]

N'ebe ndịda Afrịka, ọ dịghị n'ọtụtụ mpaghara, izere ebe kpọrọ nkụ na ugwu ma ọ bụ ebe mmiri ozuzo na-ezo n'oge oyi, mana ọ na-eme n'akụkụ ala mmiri nke Zambezi na Limpopo, na Kruger National Park, Pongoland, gburugburu Gaborone, n'ebe ugwu Okavango, Caprivi Strip, Kaokoveld, ọdịda anyanwụ Gaza na Maputo Province

N'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Afrịka, ọ dịghị n'ọzara, ebe mmiri ozuzo dị elu, oké ọhịa mmiri ozuzo na ebe ugwu dị, mana ọ na-eme n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke kọntinent ahụ site n'ụsọ oké osimiri ndịda na Maputaland ruo Ijipt, n'ofe Subsaharan Sahel na Horn of Africa
N'Ebe Ugwu Africa, ma e wezụga n'Ijipt ọ na-apụta na Algeria, ọ naghị eme na Morocco n'onwe ya, mana a na-ahụ ya na Western Sahara
N'Eshia, a na-eche na ọ bụ nwa amaala Yemen na Saudi Arabia na Arabian Peninsula, Iran, na Levant na Israel, Syria na Lebanon
A na-ahụ ndị bi na ya n'ọhịa ndị dị na Israel (n'ebe nchekwa okike Shimron, nso obodo Timrat)
Osisi niile dị n'otu ahịhịa bụ otu mkpụrụ ndụ nketa ma yie ka ha mụbara site na ọmụmụ ahịhịhịa naanị, ruo ọtụtụ puku afọ[Tinye edensibịa]
A na-ahụ ndị a webatara na Saịprọs na Ascension Island, na Pakistan na Karnataka (India)
N'ebe ndịda Afrịka, ọ na-etolite na ala mmiri na-asọ asọ na bushveld, n'akụkụ osimiri ma ọ bụ ọdọ mmiri, n'ọzara, ma ọ bụ n'osimiri mmiri kpọrọ nkụ nke nwere ike iju mmiri n'oge mmiri ozuzo
Ọ na-eto n'ọhịa dị na Sahel, n'akụkụ Zambezi na Sudan
Na Sahel ọ na-eto n'etiti ndị mmadụ
Ọ na-eto na savannahs na Sudan na Sahel, n'ala dị arọ nke nwere ezigbo mmiri
N'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Afrịka na-ekpo ọkụ, ọ na-eme mgbe ụfọdụ n'otu, mana ọ nwere ike ịbụ ụdị kachasị n'ọhịa kpọrọ nkụ
Na Sahel ọ nwere nkesa na-adịghị mma, nke na-agbakọta agbakọta, na-adịghị n'ebe ụfọdụ mana ọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ógbè mgbe ụfọdụ
Ọ na-eto n'ebe mmiri ozuzo na-ezo kwa afọ
Faidherbia albida dị mkpa na Sahel maka ịzụlite aṅụ, ebe ọ bụ na okooko ya na-enye aṅụ nri na ngwụcha oge mmiri ozuzo, mgbe ọtụtụ osisi ndị ọzọ na-adịghị
A na-eji mkpụrụ osisi ahụ azụ anụ ụlọ, a na-eji ya dị ka nri kamel na Naịjirịa, anụ ụlọ na egwuregwu na-eri ya na Southern Africa
Enyí, antelope, buffalo, baboons na ihe nchọgharị na ndị na-azụ anụ na-atọ ụtọ, ọ bụ ezie na warthog na zebra leghaara ha anya
A na-eji osisi ahụ eme ihe maka ụgbọ mmiri, ụrọ, na pestles ma na-akụ ụgbụ ya na Naịjirịa ma jiri ya mee ihe dị ka ihe nkwakọba na anụmanụ
Osisi ahụ nwere njupụta nke ihe dị ka 560 kg/m³ na mmiri nke pasent ịrị na abụọ
Uru ike nke osisi dị ka mmanụ bụ 19741 kJ / kg
A na-eji ntụ nke osisi eme ncha na dị ka ihe na-eme ka akpụkpọ anụ na ihe na-egbuke egbuke maka akpụkpọ anụ
A na-eji osisi ahụ akpụ ihe; alaka ogwu ndị ahụ bara uru maka mgbidi nwere ogwu
A na-ewere osisi na akwụkwọ osisi dị ka nri anụ ụlọ
Ihe dị ka pasent ịrị itoolu nke ndị ọrụ ugbo Senegal nke Felker gbara ajụjụ ọnụ (1981) chịkọtara, chekwaa, ma nyefee mkpụrụ osisi Acacia albida na anụ ụlọ
Ndị Zimbabwe na-eji pods eme ihe iji mee ka azụ dị egwu
Ụmụ mmadụ na-eri mkpụrụ e siri esi n'oge ụkọ na Zimbabwe[Tinye edensibịa]

A na-eji ya akpọrọ ihe na agroforestry ka ọ na-edozi nitrogen, a rụpụtakwara mkpụrụ dị elu na ọ dịkarịa ala otu ogige nnwale nke ọka a na-akụ n'etiti osisi na njupụta nke osisi dị otu narị ruo ịrị abụọ na ise kwa hekta
Dị ka akụkọ 2018 nke Guardian si kwuo, monocultures nke ụdị a na-ewu ewu n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Niger, ebe a maara ya dị ka gao na Hausa, iji mee ihe maka intercropping

A na-ejikwa ya maka nchịkwa erosion[Tinye edensibịa] Uru ya dị ka osisi agroforestry na-abawanye n'akụkụ ụfọdụ n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na osisi ahụ na-adaba na akwụkwọ ya n'oge oge mmiri ozuzo, ya mere ọ naghị asọmpi na ọkụkụ maka ìhè anyanwụ
A kọwapụtara ojiji osisi ahụ na mmelite okike nke ala mebiri emebi n'ebe ndịda Niger kemgbe afọ 1990 dị ka mgbanwe kachasị mma na Sahel, na ikekwe n'Africa
A na-eji ihe a na-ewepụ ma na-agwọ ọrịa anya n'ụmụ anụ ụlọ
A na-eji ụgbụgbọ ahụ eme ihe na ọgwụ ọdịnala na Southern Africa, na Niger
A maara Faiderbia albida n'asụsụ Bambara dị ka balanzan ma bụrụkwa osisi gọọmentị nke obodo Segou na Osimiri Niger na etiti Mali
Dị ka akụkọ ifo si kwuo, Segou bụ ebe obibi nke osisi balanzan dị pụkụ anọ, narị anọ na ịrị anọ na anọ, tinyere otu 'osisi na-efu efu' dị omimi nke a na-enweghị ike ịmata ebe ya[Tinye edensibịa]
Na Serer na ụfọdụ n'ime asụsụ Cangin, a na-akpọ ya Saas
Saas pụtara ìhè n'akụkọ ifo nke ndị Serer
Dabere na akụkọ ifo ha, ọ bụ osisi nke ndụ na ọmụmụ
Faidherbia albida edeghị dị ka ụdị dị egwu[Tinye edensibịa]

Failed States The Abuse of Power and the Assault on Democracy bụ akwụkwọ Noam Chomsky, nke e bipụtara na 2006, nke Chomsky na-ekwu na United States nakwa ịghọ 'mba dara ada', ya mere ọ bụ ihe ize ndụ nye ndị ya na ụwa
Ihe ngosi (archaic faire ma ọ bụ fayre) bụ mkpokọta ndị mmadụ maka ntụrụndụ dị iche iche ma ọ bụ azụmahịa
Ememme ngosi na-adịkarị nwa oge na oge akwadoro na-adị site na ehihie ruo ọtụtụ izu
Iji ziri ezi bụ nkuzi na iwu United States na-enye ohere iji obere ihe nwebiisinka na-ebughị ụzọ nweta ikike n'aka onye nwe nwebiisinka

Iji ziri ezi bụ otu n'ime mmachi nwebisiinka ezubere iji dozie ọdịmma nke ndị nwe nwebiisinka na mmasị ọha na eze na nkesa sara mbara na iji ọrụ okike site n'ikwe ka ihe nchekwa maka mmebi iwu nwebiisinka na-azọrọ ụfọdụ ojiji nwere oke nke enwere ike were ya dị ka mmebi iwu

Fairview International School bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ Baccalaureate International (IB) tọrọ ntọala na Kuala Lumpur
E bidoro ya na 1978
Ọ kwagara n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Wangsa Maju (KL) site na ụlọ akwụkwọ Ampang ya ma nwee ụlọ akwụkwọ na Subang Jaya (Selangor), Penang Island, na Johor Bahru
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ mepere ogige ọhụrụ na Ipoh na afo 2014
Ndị okenye ama ama gụnyere, Han Jisung nke South Korea Boygroup Stray Kids
Ụlọ akwụkwọ Fairview International School ka enyere ikike ịnye mmemme IB atọ ahụ

Mmemme afọ Primary (PYP) maka ụmụ akwụkwọ gbara afọ 5 ruo 10, mmemme Middle Years Programme (MYP) maka ụmụ akwụkwọ gbara afọ 11 ruo 17 yana mmemme Diploma (DP) maka ụmụ akwụkwọ gbara afọ 17 ruo 19 n'otu ụlọ akwụkwọ zuru oke
Ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ International Fairview ruru ihe ruru ụmụ akwụkwọ 4000, na-anọchite anya mba 55 karịrị
Mmemme iri niile bụ ndị IB Organisation (IBO) nyere ikike na Fairview bụ naanị ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Malaysia nyere ikike ịnapụta MYP
Ụlọ akwụkwọ Kuala Lumpur na Penang bụ naanị ụlọ akwụkwọ IB dị na Malaysia nyere ikike ịnye mmemme atọ PYP, MYP na DP ama ama
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-enye scholarships na Master of Arts in Education program nke a na-enye site na mmekorita ya na Sheffield Hallam University, UK
Ụlọ akwụkwọ na mmemme IB ha nyere ikike bụ ndị a
Kuala Lumpur Campus (Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Ụwa IB) - Mmemme afọ mbụ, mmemme afọ etiti na mmemme diploma IB
Subang Jaya Campus (Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Ụwa IB) - Mmemme Afọ Mbụ na mmemme afọ etiti
Penang Campus (Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Ụwa IB) - Mmemme afọ mbụ, mmemme afọ etiti na mmemme diploma IB
Ipoh Campus (Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Ụwa IB) - Mmemme afọ mbụ na mmemme afọ etiti
Ipoh Campus (Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Ụwa IB) - Mmemme afọ mbụ na mmemme afọ etiti
Na MYP (Mmemme Afọ etiti), a na-akụziri ụmụ akwụkwọ n'akụkụ dị iche iche

Maka MYP dị ala (ọkwa 7, 8 na 9), a na-akụziri ụmụ akwụkwọ isiokwu niile dị ka asụsụ & akwụkwọ (Bekee), mgbakọ na mwepụ, sayensị, asụsụ B (Mandarin na Bahasa Melayu), Physical & Health Education, Performing Arts, Visual Nkà, Nhazi na Ndị mmadụ & Obodo
Banyere MYP Upper (Ọkwa 10 & 11), ụmụ akwụkwọ ga-aga klaasị dịka isiokwu ha họọrọ si dị
Achọrọ ndị Malaysia niile ka ha were Bahasa Melayu, ebe ọ bụ asụsụ gọọmentị na Malaysia
Mandarin bụbu na nhọrọ mana malite na afọ agụmakwụkwọ 2015/16, Mandarin bụ isiokwu asụsụ amanye
A na-ahapụ ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ole na ole ka ha weta laptọọpụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, na, malite Semester 2 nke afọ agụmakwụkwọ 2014/2015, iPads sokwa
Nwa akwụkwọ ọ bụla nọ na MYP ma ọ bụ DP nwere ike weta laptọọpụ
Na mbụ, naanị ngwaọrụ ndị enyere ụmụ akwụkwọ ohere ka ha weta bụ PC, mana Macbooks mechara kweta
Nwa akwụkwọ ọ bụla nwere ike iji kọmputa desktọpụ dị n'ọbá akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ụlọ nyocha ICT site na ikike onye nkuzi ha
Nwa akwụkwọ ọ bụla nọ na klas 4, 5, 6, 7, na, malite na afọ agụmakwụkwọ 2015/2016, ọkwa 8 na KL na Subang Campuses, na 4, 5, 6, na 7 na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ niile nwere ike weta iPads ha
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nwere ike resị ụmụ akwụkwọ nkeji nke iPad Air 2 n'otu ọnụ ahịa dị ka ụdị iPad Air 2 zụtara n'èzí
Na Fairview, klaasị 6 ruo 11 nwere njem njem mmụta abụọ na mba ofesi iji mụọ gbasara ụfọdụ isiokwu
Enwere ọtụtụ ebe ha na-eleta dịka Singapore, Siem Reap, Cambodia, Phuket, Thailand, China, Singapore na ebe ndị ọzọ
Enwekwara ogige Port Dickson kwa afọ maka klaasị 4 ruo 11
Ugbu a, enwere mmemme ụbọchị iri abụọ na otu maka ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ na Grade 7 (ụlọ akwụkwọ Malaysian niile) ịga Fairview International School, Scotland (2020)

Faisal Alam bụ nwoke Pakistani na America nke na-edina nwoke nke guzobere Al-Fatiha Foundation, otu a raara nye ịkwalite ihe kpatara ndị Alakụba na-eme nwoke na nwoke, nwanyị na nwanyị, nwoke na nwanyị, na nwanyị na nwanyị
Alam si Pakistan bịa na United States n'afọ 1987, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, ma biri n'ime ime obodo dị n'etiti obodo Ellington, Connecticut
N'afọ 1997, ọ malitere ndepụta ozi ịntanetị maka ndị Alakụba LGBT nke dugara na ntọala Al-Fatiha n'afọ 1998
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche ya site na 1998 ruo mgbe ọ kwụsịrị n'afọ 2004
N'afọ 2011, ndị otu National Gay and Lesbian Task Force kpọrọ Alam na otu LGBTQ ndị Alakụba ndị ọzọ ka ha guzobe otu Queer Muslim Working Group iji nyochaa mkpa nke ndị LGBTQ Muslim
Alam nyere aka n'ịchịkọta otu ndị isi dị iche iche nwere ahụmahụ iji rụọ ọrụ a
N'afọ 2013, otu Queer Muslim Working Group malitere otu nzukọ ọhụrụ Muslim Alliance for Sexual and Gender Diversity (MASGD)
Ọ bụbu onye otu Kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke mmemme LGBT na Human Rights Watch
'Ndị Alakụba LGBT iri abụọ na otu na-agbanwe ụwa
' Onye ọka iwu
Disemba 20, 2016

Ọ nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya na usoro El Khottab Al Bab ebe ọ na-eme Stayech, nwa nkuchi nke Tammars, n'akụkụ Mouna Noureddine na Raouf Ben Amor
Mgbe ahụ, ọ chọtara Noureddine na usoro TV Mnamet Aroussia
N'afọ 2003, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ncha Chez Azaïez tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ Fouchika na usoro Choufli Hal na ihe nkiri TV ya, nke mere ka ọha na eze mara ya
