Faith Alupo (9 Ọktoba 1983 15 Septemba na afo 2020) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda nke jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu, na-anọchite anya Pallisa District
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na Juunu na afo 2018

A mara Alupo ma kwado ya dị ka onye omeiwu ọhụrụ maka mpaghara Pallisa n'okpuru otu National Resistance Movement na-achị mgbe Achola Catherine Osupelem, Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) Woman Member of Parliament Candidate for Pallisa district wepụrụ ya na asọmpi maka iji aha nhọpụta ndị na-emetụtaghị ndị na nzere agụmakwụkwọ ya
A gwara nke a n'akwụkwọ ozi e dere na 14 Julaị, nke Justice Simon Byamukama bịanyere aka
Alupo lụrụ di ma nwee ọganihu ọkachamara na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
N'afọ 1997, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Primary Leaving Examinations na Pallisa Girls Primary School
N'afọ 2001, Alupo nwetara asambodo agụmakwụkwọ nke Uganda na Pal na Lisa College
N'afọ 2003, ọ nwetara asambodo Uganda Advanced Certificate na MM College Wairaka
Ọ gụsịrị nzere bachelọ ya na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nchịkwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze na Mahadum Ndị Kraịst nke Uganda, Mukono na afo 2007
Mgbe afọ anọ gasịrị (na afo 2011), Okwukwe sonyeere Law Development Centre, Kampala wee nweta asambodo na Iwu
N'agbata afọ 2007 na afọ 2008, ọ malitere ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka onye ọrụ n'ọhịa na Office of Probation nke dị na Makindye Division
Site na 2008 ruo 2009, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ na Uganda Bureau of Statistics
Site na afo 2010 ruo na afo 2011, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ọkwa Sub-County dị ka onye ọrụ ntuli aka na Electoral Commission, Pallisa
N'afọ 2018, gọọmentị Uganda kewara Pallisa District, mepụta Butebo District site na akụkụ nke ókèala ya
Nwaanyị nọ n'ọkwa onye omebe iwu nke Uganda maka mpaghara ahụ, Agnes Ameede, kpebiri ịnọgide dị ka onye nnọchi anya Butebo, na-ahapụ ọnọdụ nke Pallisa nwanyị MP n'efu

Alupo meriri nhọpụta nke National Resistance Movement (NRM) na-achị maka oche na 28 Mee na afo 2018, na-enweta 34,580 vootu na ntuli aka mbụ ma e jiri ya tụnyere 26,995 na 11,058 n'ileghachi anya azụ, maka ndị na-asọmpi ya kacha nso Kevin Kaala Ojinga na Josephine Ibaseret
A haziri ntuli aka ahụ n'onwe ya na 28 na afo June
Mmadụ ise na-azọ ọkwa maka oche ahụ, mana atọ lara, na-ahapụ naanị Alupo na Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) Catherine Achola na asọmpi ahụ

Kọmitii Electoral Commission nke Uganda kwadoro ndị abụọ ahụ na 5 June, mana na 19 June, kọmitii ahụ kwupụtara na a chụpụrụ Achola n'ihi ọdịiche dị n'etiti akwụkwọ nhọpụta ya na ndekọ agụmakwụkwọ nyere
Site na afo 2018 ruo na afo 2020, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
Ọ nwụrụ na 15 Septemba na afo 2020 na Mulago Hospital, ebe ọ na-anata ọgwụgwọ maka ọbara mgbali elu na ọrịa shuga
A na-enyo COVID-19, n'oge ọrịa COVID-19 na Uganda enyo, n'ihi na o nwere nsogbu iku ume

Na 18 Septemba, New Vision kwuru na Alupo nwụrụ 'mgbe ọ na-anata ọgwụgwọ na Mulago National Referral Hospital n'ihe isi mmalite na-ekwu na ọ bụ n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19', ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ tupu ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya nke iri atọ na asaa
Faith Renée Evans (amụrụ n'ọnwa Juun n'ubochí iri, n'afọ 1973) bụ onye Amerịka na-agụ egwu
A mụrụ ya na Lakeland, Florida, ma zụlite ya na New Jersey, ọ kwagara Los Angeles na 1991 maka ọrụ na azụmahịa egwu
Mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado Al B
Sure! na Christopher Williams, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-ese ihe na nkwekọrịta na Sean 'Puff Daddy' Combs 'Bad Boy Records na 1994 mgbe ọ dị afọ 20

Na labelụ ahụ, ọ gosipụtara na ndekọ ya na ọtụtụ ndị mmekọ labelụ dịka 112 na Carl Thomas, ma wepụta album studio atọ platinum-certified n'etiti 1995 na 2001 Faith (1995) na Keep the Faith (1998), na Faithfully (2001)
N'afọ 2003, ọ kwụsịrị mmekọrịta ya na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ iji bịanye aka na Capitol Records

Abọm izizi ya wepụtara na labelụ ahụ, The First Lady (afọ 2005) ghọrọ abọm ya kachasị elu n'oge ahụ, na-eru n'elu US Top R&B / Hip-Hop Albums chaatị, ebe abọm ezumike A Faithful Christmas, wepụtara n'otu afọ ahụ, ga-abụ ntọhapụ ikpeazụ ya tupu a zụta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2007
N'ịgbaso ogologo oge, Evans wepụtara abọm nke ise ya Something About Faith na labelụ onwe ya Prolific na Entertainment One Music na 2010
Site na ọrụ ya dị afọ iri abụọ, Evans rere ihe karịrị nde iri abụọ n'ụwa niile
A mụrụ Evans n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Juun, n'afọ1973, na Lakeland, Florida, nne ya bụ onye Afrịka, Helene Evans, onye na-agụ egwu

Nna ya, Richard Swain, bụ onye na-eti egwu nke Bekee na onye nwere ike ịbụ onye Ịtali nke hapụrụ tupu a mụọ Evans (Evans ekwuola 'Anụla m ka ndị mmadụ na-atamu ihe banyere ya ịbụ onye Ịtali, mana amaghị m n'ezie')

Mgbe ọkara afọ gasịrị, Helene dị afọ iri na itoolu laghachiri Newark, New Jersey, wee hapụ Faith na nwa nwanne nna ya Johnnie Mae na di ya Orvelt Kennedy, ndị nne na nna na-elekọta ihe karịrị otu narị ụmụ ha zụlitere n'oge Faith na ha bi
Faith maara Johnnie Mae na Orvelt Kennedy dị ka nne na nna ya ochie
Ọ bụ ruo mgbe afọ ole na ole gasịrị ka ọrụ Helene dara mbà ma ọ gbalịrị ịkpọghachi Evans n'ụlọ
Otú ọ dị, Faith na-atụ egwu ịhapụ ihe ọ 'na-emebu,' kama nke ahụ, Helene kwagara n'akụkụ ụlọ
N'ịbụ onye nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ na Bad Boy Records, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Combs gwara Evans ka ọ nye aka na nkwado olu na nkà ide ihe na Mary J

Blige's My Life (afọ 1994) na abọm izizi nke Usher (afọ 1994) tupu ọ bídó ọrụ na abọm studio mbụ ya Faith N'ịbụ onye a tọhapụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọst ụbọchị irí abụọ na itoolu, n'afọ 1995, na North America, abọm ahụ bụ isi mmekorita ya na ndị isi na-emepụta Bad Boy, The Hitmen, gụnyere Chucky Thompson na Combs, mana ọ rụpụtara ndekọ ya na Poke & Tone na Herb Middleton
Okwukwe ghọrọ ihe ịga nke ọma dabere na egwu 'You Used to Love Me' na 'Soon as I Get Home'
E mechara nweta album ahụ platinum na nde 15 nke e rere, dị ka RIAA si kwuo

N'ịbụ onye pụtara na egwuregwu ógè ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, Evans bịdọrọ ime ihe nkiri na ọrụ nkwado na onye nduzi Robert Adetuyi's 2000 egwu ejije Turn It Up, nke gosipụtara Pras Michel si The Fugees, Jason Statham na Ja Rule

N'ịbụ onye a tọhapụrụ na nyocha ndị na-adịghị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ, bụ ndị kwuru na ọ bụ 'n'ụzọ doro anya na-enweghị isi na nkọwa na akụkụ buru ibu', ihe nkiri indie ahụ nwere obere egwuregwu ma bụrụ mmechuihu ego, na-enweta US $ 124 nde n'oge ọ na-agba ọsọ naanị na United States
N'afọ 2014, Faith gosipụtara nkwado n'ihe banyere Little Kids Rock site n'inye ihe maka ire ere iji nweta ego iji kwado agụmakwụkwọ egwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha

Faith Evans kwuru na ọtụtụ n'ime mmetụta egwu ya kachasị na ndị ọbụ abụ kachasị amasị ya bụ onye na-agụ egwu ozioma Karen Clark-Sheard (onye a na-ejikarị ya tụnyere), Shirley Murdock, Chaka Khan, Anita Baker na Aretha Franklin
A ma Evans ama n'ihe gbasara 'soprano honeyed soprano' ya

Olu olu ya sitere na ụda ala nke C # 3 ruo soprano C # 6 dị elu Onye edemede Washington Post bụ Craig Seymour kpọrọ ya 'onye mmụọ ozi ma nwee obi ụtọ soprano' dị ka onye na-egosi mmetụta uche nke akọwapụtara site na ahụmịhe onwe onye nke Evans nke ọdachi, ịhụnanya, ihe mgbu na obi mgbawa
Faith Idehen (amuru na onwa ise Februarị n'afọ 1973) bu onye oso oso nwanyi lagoro ezumike nka si Naijiria
N'egwuregwu Olympic nke afọ 1992 ọ, ya na Beatrice Utondu, Christy Opara Thompson na Mary Onyali, meriri ihe nrite ọla na mgbagharị mita 4 x 100
Idehen gara Mahadum Alabama na nkuzi egwu
Ọ lụrụ onye na-egwu egwuregwu Festus Igbinoghene na ha nwere nwa nwoke, Noa Igbinoghene, bụ onye na-egwu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba
Àtụ Footer IAAF World Cup Champions 4x100 m Women
Faith Chepngetich Kipyegon (amụrụ na abalị iri n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1994) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ etiti etiti ndị ógó mita òtù puku na narị ise
Ọ bụ onye mmeri 2016 Rio Olympic na 2020 Tokyo Olympic na ndekọ egwuregwu na nke ikpeazụ, ọ bụ nwanyị nke abụọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na-azọrọ aha Olympic 1500m azụ azụ

Kipyegon emeriela ma ọ bụ mechie nke abụọ na asọmpi ọ bụla kemgbe ọ dị afọ 20 na afọ 2014, a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka nwanyị kachasị agba ọsọ 1500 mita n'akụkọ ihe mere emeKpọpụta njehie Closing tag Onye mmeri 2016 Rio Olympic na 2020 Tokyo Olympic na ndekọ egwuregwu na nke ikpeazụ, ọ bụ nwanyị nke abụọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na-azọrọ aha Olympic 1500m azụ azụ
Kipyegon emeriela ma ọ bụ mechie nke abụọ na asọmpi ọ bụla kemgbe ọ dị afọ 20 na afọ 2014, a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka nwanyị kachasị agba ọsọ 1500 mita n'akụkọ ihe mere emeKpọpụta njehie Closing tag
O sonyere na afọ 2011 World Cross Country Championships na Punta Umbria, Spain wee merie ọla edo na asọmpi ndị na-eto eto na-agbakwunye ọlaọcha na ndị otu ya

Ọnwa ole na ole mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara asọmpi 1500m na World Youth Championships na Lille, France wee merie ihe nrite ọla edo n'ihu ndị Etiopia abụọ na-agba ọsọ na oge nke 4m 948s ma mebie ihe ndekọ mmeri na usoro ahụ

Na 2012 World Junior Championships na Barcelona, Kipyegon ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na ihe omume ọkachamara ya n'ihu egwuregwu na oge nke 4 0496; onye Serbia Amela Terzić na onye Etiopia Senbere Teferi were ọnọdụ nke abụọ na nke atọ
N'oge ahụ, o setịpụkwara ihe ndekọ mmeri
Onye ahụ dị afọ iri na asatọ n'oge ahụ ruru eru maka egwuregwu Olimpik nke London, mana na ihe omume ahụ enweghị ike ịga n'ihu na ọkara ikpeazụ na elekere 4 0878
Na mbido oge 2013, ọ meriri ihe nrite ọla edo na asọmpi ndị na-eto eto ya na ndị otu ya na World Cross Country Championships na Bydgoszcz, Poland
Na 10 Mee, na nzukọ Diamond League na Doha, Qatar, o guzobere na 1500m ndekọ Kenya na oge 3 5698, na-eche onye na-agba ọsọ Sweden Abeba Aregawi ihu
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, na asọmpi World Championships na Moscow, onye dị afọ iri na itoolu bịara nke ise na ngwụcha n'ime oge 4 0508
N'ọnwa Mee, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu meriri ihe nrite ọla edo na 4×1500 m relay na IAAF World Relays mbụ na Nassau, Bahamas, ya na Mercy Cherono, Irene Jelagat na Hellen Obiri
Ndị otu Kenya, n'ihu United States na Australia, setịpụrụ oge ndekọ ụwa ọhụrụ n'oge 16 3358
N'otu afọ ahụ na Julaị, ọ ghọrọ onye mmeri Commonwealth Games 1500m na Glasgow, Scotland na oge nke 4 0894
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, Kipyegon ritere ọlaọcha na 1500m na World Championships na Beijing
Mgbe ọ gbasịrị ọsọ ọ gwụchara na 4 0896 nke abụọ n'aka onye na-edekọ ihe ndekọ ụwa nke Ethiopia bụ Genzebe Dibaba onye gbara 4 0809
Siffan Hassan na-anọchite anya Netherlands bụ nke atọ na 4 0934
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Septemba, na nzukọ Diamond League na Brussels, ọ meriri otu kilomita na onye Afrịka na ndekọ nke 4 1671, na-emeri Hassan onye gbara ọsọ 4 1820 na njedebe ikpeazụ
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Mee, Kipyegon meziwanyere ihe ndekọ Kenya nke afọ 2013 1500 site na ịgba ọsọ 3 5682 mgbe ọ meriri nzukọ Diamond League Shanghai Golden Grand Prix
Izu abụọ ka e mesịrị, o meriri ndekọ ya na arụmọrụ 3 5641 iji bụrụ nke mbụ na Prefontaine Classic na Eugene, Oregon
O nwetakwara mmeri n'ihe omume mile n'oge egwuregwu Oslo Bislett na June
Onye dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ n'oge ahụ ghọrọ onye nwetara ọla edo 1500m n'egwuregwu Olimpik nke 2016 na Rio de Janeiro na-agbanwe usoro site na asọmpi ụwa nke afọ gara aga
Ọ meriri Dibaba na 200m ikpeazụ n'ihe bụ na mbụ ọsọ ọsọ ọsọ, na agba nke atọ na 5680 na 800m ikpeazụ na ọsọ ọsọ ọsọ 800m nke 1 572
Kipyegon gbara 4 0892, Dibaba 4 1027, Jennifer Simpson bụ onye nke atọ na 4 1053
O nwetara akara mbụ ya na Diamond League 1500m, merie agbụrụ atọ na Shanghai, Eugene, na Brussels
Ihe ịga nke ọma ya kachasị mma n'afọ ahụ bụ ebe mbụ na London World Championships, na-aghọ naanị nwanyị nke atọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme iji merie ma Olympic na World Championships 1500m
O mere oge 4 0259 ebe ụmụ nwanyị atọ na-esote dekwara oge n'okpuru 4m 3s, na Jenny Simpson na nke abụọ na Caster Semenya nke atọ
Kipyegon mụrụ nwa mbụ ya na 2018, laghachi ọnwa 12 ka e mesịrị, na June 2019, iji merie ihe omume mbinye aka ya na 3 59 04 na Prefontaine Classic na Palo Alto
Ọ gara n'ihu merie ihe nrite ọlaọcha na World Championships na Doha, ebe o setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ ya nke Kenya nke 3 5422
Sifan Hassan bịara nke mbụ na 3 5195 ebe onye nke atọ Gudaf Tsegay setịpụrụ nke kachasị mma nke 3 5438
N'afọ 2020, ọ sonyeere na nzukọ Diamond League na Continental Tour na-enweghị mmeri na agbụrụ isii ya niile

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, ọ gbara ọsọ nke abụọ kachasị ọsọ, ihe ndekọ Afrịka na ihe ndekọ Diamond League na mita 1000 na Herculis zutere na Monaco, na nsonaazụ ya nke 2m 2915s naanị 017 s na-erughị ihe ndekọ ụwa
N'afọ 2021, ọ meziwanyere ihe ndekọ mba ya ugboro abụọ na nzukọ Diamond League
Na 10 June, ọ gbara ọsọ 3 5391 na Rome Golden Gala meet, nke emere n'ụzọ pụrụ iche na Florence, iji mechie nke abụọ n'azụ Sifan Hassan onye mere 3 5363

N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị na Monaco Herculis, Kipyegon kwụsịrị elekere ahụ na oge nke anọ kachasị ọsọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na naanị otu sekọnd na ndekọ ụwa nke Genzebe Dibaba na-agba ọsọ karịa Hassan n'ụlọ site na ihe dị ka 25 s

Na 1500m nke ụmụ nwanyị nke afọ 2020 Tokyo Games na-egbu oge n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, Kipyegon meriri Hassan na 200m ikpeazụ iji merie nrite ọla edo nke abụọ ya n'usoro n'ihe omume ahụ n'oge nke 3m 5311s, na-emebi ihe ndekọ Olympic nke guzo ruo afọ 33
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị nke abụọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme iji merie n'azụ azụ Olympic 1500m titles
Mgbe Hassan na-apụ n'anya n'ụlọ (3 5586) Laura Muir setịpụrụ ndekọ Britain nke 3 5450 iji nweta ọlaọcha
N'ọnwa Septemba, ọ meriri Hassan ọzọ na Zürich Weltklasse Diamond League final iji were nke abụọ ya na 1500m Diamond Trophy
Kipyegon meriri itoolu n'ime agbụrụ iri ya n'oge ahụ
Kipyegon lụrụ onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti Timothy Kitum, onye nwetara ọla nchara n'egwuregwu Olympic 800m n'afọ 2012
Ha nwere nwa nwanyị, Alyn, amụrụ na June 2018
Kipyegon laghachiri ọzụzụ na Jenụwarị 2019 mgbe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọnwa iri na asatọ gachara
Na June 2019, ọ sonyere na asọmpi mbụ ya kemgbe ọ mụrụ nwa, merie Diamond League's Prefontaine Classic na Palo Alto
Ozi niile sitere na profaịlụ World Athletics

Azwihangwisi Faith Muthambi bụ onye bụbu Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ọha na eze na nchịkwa na onye bụbu Mịnịsta na-ahụ Maka nkwukọrịta nke South Africa
Muthambi nwere ọtụtụ ọkwa tupu nhọpụta ya na kansụl onye isi ala Jacob Zuma n'afọ 2014
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu asaa nke ANC a họpụtara maka kọmitii ad hoc iji tụlee ntinye nke Onye isi ala Jacob Zuma na akụkọ nchebe ọha na eze banyere ebe obibi Nkandla ya
Muthambi nwere B Proc site na Mahadum Venda (1993 ruo 1996), na asambodo na nzere ndị ọzọ dị iche iche site na UPTA, Wits Business School na UNIVEN
Otu kọmitii ndị omeiwu pụrụ iche chọpụtara na Muthambi 'enweghị ikike' na ikpe nke iduhie ndị omeiwu, nke bụ mpụ
O gakwaghị nzukọ ebe ọ ga-akọwa R300,000 ọ na-emefu na ụgwọ njem maka ndị enyi na ndị ezinụlọ iji kirie ya ka ọ na-ekwu okwu
Ọ gakwala nzukọ iji kọwaa ndị ọrụ ya 27 (ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ụmụ ndị enyi ya), mgbe akwụkwọ ntuziaka ndị minista na-egbochi ọnụ ọgụgụ a ruo 10

N'ihi nchọpụta nke onye nche ọha na eze banyere iji ike eme ihe n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi, aghụghọ na nchịkwa na-ezughị oke megide Hlaudi Motsoeneng, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Western Cape kwubiri na Muthambi mere ihe na-enweghị isi na n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị site n'ịhọpụta Motsoeneng dị ka Chief Operating Officer nke SABC
Faithful Nkanyiso Nketsi (amụrụ na ụbọchị iri atọ na onwa Disemba 1994) bụ onye South Africa na -eme ihe na ihe nlere anya
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịbụ onye otu egwu egwu a na-akpọ 'Pro-Twerkers'
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị otu ahụ ọ ghọrọ onye nlereanya na mmadụ mgbasa ozi
Nketsi amuru na Johannesburg
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
Nketsi nwetara nlebara anya mgbasa ozi mgbe ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu nwa agbọghọ na-agba egwu hip hop a na-akpọ 'Pro-Twerkers'
Ọ pụtara na ihe-nkiri egwu nke Cassper Nyovest 's single, 'Tito Mboweni'
Na ụbọchị iri atọ na onwa Julaị 2018, ọ malitere 'Get Snatched', mmemme nri na mgbatị ahụ

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete, Nketsi nọrọ na he eziokwu nke ya ana-kpo '#have faith' nke bụrụ ụzọ pụta na MTV Africa dị na South Africa, nke mere ya ọbụrụ nwaanyị mbụ nwere ihe ngosi eziokwu na Channel ahụ
Nketsi nwere ihe ruru nde 13 mmadụ na eso ya na Instagram na onwa Disemba na afo puku abụọ na iri na iteghete
, Nketsi gbara n'ihe ngosi eziokwu nke ya akpọrọ '#nwe okukwe' nke malitere na MTV Africa na South Africa, mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ nwere ihe ngosi eziokwu nke ya na chanel
Nketsi nwere ndị na-eso ụzọ Instagram karịrị nde 13 dịka nke Disemba afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete
Nkesti amalitela ọrụ egwu nke ya na afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteghete , na-arụ ọrụ na DJ Maphorisa
EP mbụ ya, enweghị nkwanye ùgwù, nwere egwu asaa ma na-emepụta Egwu Blaqboy
Nketsi bụ onye na-akpa ike na social media wee chịkọtala ndị na-eso ụzọ nde 17 na instagram
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe ike na South Africa
Faith Obazuaye (amụrụ na uboch nke anọ n' onwa Machị 1989) bụ onye Naijiria na-egwu egwu Tenis tebụl
O sonyere Naịjirịa na asọmpi tenis tebul nke obodo na nke mba ụwa

Obazuaye bụ onye Naijiria na-egwuregwu tenis table 10, ọ sonyere na otu Ụmụ nwanyị 10 na asọmpi tabulu tenis nke ụmụ nwanyị nke ndi commonwealth haziri na 2018 N'ime Gold Coast, Australia ebe ọ meriri ma nwetakwa ọlaọcha
Obazuaye bụ naanị nwanyị Naijiria ruru eru maka 2020 Summer Paralympics mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na asọmpi nke mba Africa nke eji 2019 ITTF African Championship wee mara
A mụrụ Faith dị ka Faith Oba-zuaye na 4 Machị 1989 na Benin City isi obodo Edo State, Nijiria

Faith Ringgold (amụrụ n'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1930 na Harlem, New York City ) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ihe, onye edemede, onye na-ese ihe na mgbasa ozi, na onye na-ese ihe, nke a maara nke ọma maka akụkọ akụkọ ya

A mụrụ Faith Ringgold nke ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 8, n'afọ1930, na Harlem Hospital, New York City 24 Nne na nna ya, Andrew Louis Jones na Willi Posey Jones, bụ ụmụ nke ezinụlọ ndị na-arụ ọrụ nke Great Migration chụpụrụ
Nne Ringgold bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji na nna ya, yana ịrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ, bụ onye na-akọ akụkọ
Ha zụlitere ya na gburugburu ebe obibi nke gbara ya ume ịmepụta ihe

Mgbe Harlem Renaissance gasịrị, ụlọ Ringgold mgbe ọ bụ nwata na Harlem gbara gburugburu site na ihe ngosi nka na-aga nke ọma - ebe ndị dị ka Duke Ellington na Langston Hughes bi n'akụkụ nkuku 27 Enyi nwata ya, Sonny Rollins, onye ga-etolite bụrụ onye egwu jazz a ma ama, na-agakarị ezinụlọ ya ma na-eme saxofon na nnọkọ ha 28 N'ihi ụkwara ume ọkụ ya na-adịghị ala ala, Ringgold nyochara nka ọhụụ dị ka nnukwu ntụrụndụ site na nkwado nke nne ya, na-anwalekarị crayons dị ka nwa agbọghọ 24 Ọ mụtakwara otú e si akwa na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ okike site n'aka nne ya

Ringgold na-ekwusi ike na n'agbanyeghị nzụlite ya na Harlem nke oge nnukwu ịda mbà n'obi, 'nke a apụtaghị na [ọ] dara ogbenye ma bụrụ onye a na-emegbu emegbu' - 'e chebere ya pụọ na mmegbu ma nwee ezinụlọ na-ahụ n'anya gbara ya gburugburu' 24 Site na mmetụta ndị a niile jikọtara ọnụ, ndị mmadụ, uri, na egwu ọ nwetara na nwata ya, yana ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, mmekọahụ, na nkewa ọ na-emeso na ndụ ya kwa ụbọchị metụtara ihe osise Ringgold n'ọdịnihu nke ukwuu 9
Faith Tabernacle bụ nnukwu ụka na-ekwusa ozi ọma na isi ụlọ ụka nke Living Faith Church Worldwide
Ọ dị na Canaanland, Ota, Lagos, Nigeria, ugbu a neo-charismatic movement
Onye isi ụkọchukwu nke obodo a bụ Dr
David Oyedepo kemgbe a tọrọ ntọala ya na afọ 1983
N'afọ 2015, ndị bịara bụ mmadụ 50,000
N'afọ 1981, David Oyedepo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na isii, nwere ọhụụ maka ozi ya
E hiwere Chọọchị ahụ na Disemba 11, na afọ 1983
N'afọ 2014, Living Faith Church Worldwide dị na mba iri isii na ise
N'afọ 2020, Ụlọ Nsọ Okwukwe nwere ndị bịara 50,000
E zụtara ala Kenan na 1998 ma bụrụ na mbụ 560 acres (3 km2), ọ dị na Ota, Ogun, Nigeria
E wuru isi ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa nke ụka ahụ, Faith Tabernacle, na Cannanland n'etiti afọ 1998 na 1999, were ọnwa iri na abụọ iji wuchaa
A tọrọ ntọala ahụ n'August 29, na afọ 1998
N'afọ 1999, e meghere Ụlọ Nsọ Okwukwe na oche 50,400
A maara Ụlọikwuu Okwukwe dị ka chọọchị kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa n'ihe gbasara ikike
Ọ na-ekpuchi ihe dị ka hekta 70 ma wuo ya n'ime ụlọ a na-akpọ Kenanland, nke nwere ihe karịrị hekta 10,500 (42km2) na Ota, mpaghara Lagos
E wuru ụlọ ụka ahụ n'ime ọnwa 12 ma nyefee ya na Septemba, na afọ 1999
Faithia Williams (amụrụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị 5, 1971) bụ onye Naijiria n'eme ihe nkiri, onye n'eme ihe nkiri, onye n'emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Faithia onye si na Delta Steeti na Ikeja n'ọnwa Febụwarị 1971
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ anụrụ ọtụtụ nwanyị ebe amụtara ụmụ itoolu
Faithia gara Maryland Primary School nakwa Maryland Comprehensive Secondary School dị na Lagos Steeti
Ọ nwetara asambodo West African School Certificate na Maryland Comprehensive Secondary School
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Kwara State Polytechnic maka asambodo diplọma
N'afọ 2016, Faithia natara nnabata na Mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo iji mụọ ihe nkiri
Faithia ghọrọ onye n'eme ihe nkiri na mberede
Nwanne nna Faithia, Alhaji Fatai Teniola, gwara ya ka ọ nọchie anya onye n'eme ihe nkiri nke n'apụtaghị n'otu n'ime mmepụta nke ihe nkiri ha
Williams rụrụ ọrụ mbụ ya na ihe nkiri 'Ta lo pa chief'
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri, mepụta, ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naijiria kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
N'afọ 2008, ọ meriri na Africa Movie Academy Award maka onye n'eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma ọzọkwa ihe nkiri ya bụ Iranse Aje meriri dị kaihe nkiri kachasị nma n'ihe nkiri obodo n'afọ ahụ

N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014, ọ meriri na Africa Movie Academy Award, ebe ọ pụtara dị ka onye kachasị mma nime ndị n'eme ihe nkiri nke afọ ahụ ya nakwa Odunlade Adekola onye pụtara dị ka Onye kachasị nma na ndị n'eme egwuregwu n'afọ ahụ
O nwetakwara ihe nrite Best Indigenous Language maka ọrụ ọ rụrụ n'ihe nkiri 'Iya Alalake' n'afọ 2015 Africa Magic Viewers Tian Choice Awards
Williams lụrụ onye n'eme ihe nkiri Nollywood, Saheed Balogun, onye ya na ya mụtara ụmụ abụọ, otu nwa nwoke na otu nwa nwanyị
Fathia nwekwara nwa nwoke site na mmekọrịta mbụ ya
Aha nna Fakeye bụ aha Naijiria
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Falaba Issa Traoré (1930 - August 8, 2003) bụ odee Mali, onye na-eme ihe ọchị, onye na-ede ihe nkiri, na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya na Bougouni, Traoré duziri otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri tupu ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri mpaghara nke Bamako n'etiti afọ 1962 na 1968
Site na 1969 ruo 1973, o mepụtara ma duzie ndị otu Yankadi maka akụkọ ọdịnala na nka ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1973, ọ gara Germany iji mụọ gbasara ntụziaka ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Mali na 1976 ọ duziri ngalaba ihe nkiri nke Ministry of Sports, Arts, and Culture

Dị ka onye na-eme ihe ọchị, Traoré rụrụ ọrụ dị ịrịba ama na ihe nkiri nke Kalifa Dienta (A Banna), nke Cheick Oumar Sissoko (Nidiougou Guimba), na nke Boubacar Sidibé (nkwekọrịta mmekọrịta, Sanoudié, na N'Tronkélé)
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi, na-eme ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Juguifolo (First Gleam of Hope), na 1979, na nke ikpeazụ ya, Bamunan (The Sacred Pagne) na 1990
Falaba Issa Traoré bụ onye dere ihe nkiri Soundiata ou l'épopée mandingue na Dah Monzon ou l' épopée Bambara
N'afọ 1972, Traoré meriri ihe nrite Afrique de Poésie de la Francophonie
Ọ nwụrụ na Rabat, Morocco, na August 8, 2003
Falaba Issa Traoré na IMDb

Faldela Williams (1952 – 25 Mee 2014) bụ onye South Afriika onye ode akwụkwọ osi nri na ode akwụkwọ esi nri nke akwụkwọ ya kpaliri ọgbọ ndị na-esi nri sochiri ya ichekwa ihe nketa nri nke ndị Cape Malay South Africa
Faldela Adams mụrụ n'afọ 1952 na Pontac Street, na District nke isii, nke Cape Town, South Africa wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Rahmaniyah
Nne nne ya zụrụ ya isi nri, onye a na-akwanyere ùgwù caterer, na nke isii Municipal District nke Cape Town na mgbe ọ ghọtara isi ihe, malitere inye aka n'ịkwadebe nri
N'ihe dị ka mgbe afọ 1975, Adams lụrụ Ebrahim Williams ma emesịa, di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ atọ Riefqah, Aisha na Saadiq
Williams mepere ọrụ nri agbamakwụkwọ ya wee bụrụ onye ama ama na isi nri Cape Malay, na-ebipụta akwụkwọ nri atọ na nri
N'afọ 1988, o bipụtara The Cape Malay Cookbook, bụ nke abụrụla akwụkwọ ntụaka maka ndị na-esi nri na South Africa niile ma bụrụkwa ndị ama ama na mba ụwa
A hụkwara akwụkwọ a site n'aka ndị ọkà mmụta dị ka ọrụ dị mkpa maka ide onyinye omenala nke ụmụ Muslim sitere na ndị ohu Malaysia laghachiri na ihe nketa South Afrika sara mbara
Ebipụtara ya nke ọma n'asụsụ Bekee ma na Afrịka
Ruo mgbe Williams bipụtara Akwụkwọ nri akwụkwọ nri Cape Malay, akwụkwọ nri ole na ole ka ejirila ma ọ bụ bipụta ya
A na-eji usoro nri eme ihe n'ụzọ dị ala, n'ihi na ndị na-esi nri mpaghara kpebiri na ọ gosipụtara enweghị nka isi nri
Ọ bụ ezie na ihe na-eme n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, akwụkwọ nri ndị ọzọ sochiri na mbipụta ahụ wepụtara ọgbọ nke ndị na-esi nri na-eto eto bụ ndị chọrọ ichekwa efere ha na omenala isi nri
Akwụkwọ nri ndị ahụ bụkwa ụzọ 'na-agbawa ala' nke ikwe ka ụmụ nwanyị Malay, bụ ndị e gosipụtara na mbụ dị ka ndị ọrụ ụlọ na-agbachi nkịtị, kwuo n'onwe ha
Akwụkwọ nri nke abụọ nke William, More Cape Malay Cooking bụ akwụkwọ na-esochi na mbipụta mbụ ahụ
Enyere ntụziaka doro anya ma dị mfe, na-egosipụta ngwa nri ndị na-agbakwunye ihe dị iche na nri Cape Malay
Dị ka ọ dị n'akwụkwọ mbụ ya, ọ ghọrọ onye na-eduzi ma ndị na-amụta isi nri na ndị na-esi nri nwere ahụmahụ karị, bụ ndị na-anụ ụtọ ụdị nri Cape Malay
Akwụkwọ ikpeazụ ya, The Cape Malay Illustrated Cookbook (2007) mere ka usoro ntụziaka ọdịnala dị mfe iji mee ka ha dịkwuo irè na mfe ịkwadebe
N'ihe dị ka afọ 2009, Williams na nwa ya nwoke, Saadiq, meghere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na agbata obi ya, nke nwere aha ya
E gosikwara ya n'ọtụtụ akụkọ ndị Cape Argus bipụtara dị ka ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara nri, isi nri maka ezumike okpukperechi na imegharị efere iji gosipụta usoro nlekọta ahụike
Williams bụ onye nnọchi anya kọmitii onye isi alakụba ya na mpaghara Claremont Cape Town
Williams nwụrụ na 25 Mee 2014 ka ọ nwesịrị nkụchi obi izu isii tupu mgbe ahụ
Akwụkwọ nri Williams abanyela n'ọtụtụ mbipụta sochirinụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ndị egosipụtara na ihe ngosi na ụlọ ngosi ihe ngosi Bo-Kaap gbasara onyinye ụmụ nwanyị Alakụba na ihe nketa South Africa
Mgbe ọ nwụrụ, Yusuf Larney onye nwe ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Bo-Kaap Kombuis Malay, nyere ya ụtụ na mmemme mgbasa ozi na Primedia Broadcasting
Fali bu nwere asụsụ abụọ a na-asụ n'ebe ugwu Cameroon
A gụnyere ya n'asụsụ Adamawa nke Greenberg (dị ka otu G11), Boyd (1989) wepụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ ahụ
Roger Blench na-eche na ọ nwere ike ịnọchite anya otu n'ime agbụrụ ndị mbụ nke gbasaa na ngwaahịa Atlantic China Congo

North Fali, nke nwere ndị na-asụ 16,000, nwekwara ọtụtụ olumba; ndị na-ekwu North Fali 'na-eji ngwa ngwa' na-agbanwe na Adamawa Fulfulde site na 1982
A na-asụ ndi asụsụ Nimbari n'ebe ndịda Fali, mana ndị Nimbari na-asụrụ Fali Kangou ugbu a
Falilat Ogunkoya (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Disemba nke fọ 1968 na Ode Lemo,dị na Ogun Steeti nke Naijiria ) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na-emebu egwuregwu ị gba ọsọ
Ogunkoya a turula ugo n'ọtụtụ asọmpi na Naijiria, gụnyere ọla edo n'afọ 1996 n'ọsọ 400 mita, ọla edo n'ọsọ 200 mita n'ọsọ 400 mita n'afọ 1998, na ọla edo ọzọ n'afọ 1999 ma n'afọ 2001 n'ọsọ 400 mita

Na 1996 Summer Olympics, o ritere ọla nchara n'ọsọ 400 mita, n'azụ Marie-José Pérec nke Frans na Cathy Freeman nke Ọstrelia, n'akara kachasị mma na nke Afrịka nke 4910, nke bụ nke iri na abụọ kachasị ọsịsọ n'oge niile

Oghere fallstreak (nkè a makwaara dị ka cavum, oghere punch cloud, oghere oghere, skypunch, ọwa igwe ojii ma ọ bụ oghere igwe ojii) bụ nnukwu oghere, nke na-adịkarị okirikiri ma ọ bụ elliptical, nké nwéré ike ịpụta na igwe ojii cirrocumulus ma ọ bụ altocumulus
Oghèrè ndị ahụ sitere na mmiri dị oke jụụ n'ime igwe ojii na-eme ka mmiri na-esi ísì ma ọ bụ na-ajụ oyi na mberede, ọ pụkwara ịbụ site na ụgbọelu na-agafe agafe
N'ihi ịdị ụkọ ha na ọdịdị pụrụ ichè, e mehiere oghere fallstreak màkà ma ọ bụ na-ekwu na ọ bụ ihe ndị na-efe efe a na-amaghị ama
A na-emepụta oghere ndị dị otú ahụ mgbe okpomọkụ mmiri dị n'ígwé ojii dị n'okpuru oyi, mànà mmiri ahụ, n'ọnọdụ dị oke jụụ, emebeghị ka oyi kpụkọọ n'ihi enweghị ice nucleation

Mgbè kristal ice na-etolite, a na-eme ka mmetụta domino pụta n'ihi usoro Wegener-Bergeron-Findeisen, na-eme gore mmiri na-agba gbụrụ-gbúrụ kristal ahụ na-apụ n'anya nke a na-ahapụ nnukwu oghere, nke na-adịkarị gbụrụ-gbúrụ, n'ime igwe ojii
A na-eche na iwebata ọnụ ọgụgụ búrú ibu nke obere ice crystals n'ime igwe ojii na-eme ka mmetụta domino a nke njikọta nke na-emepụta oghere ahụ
Enwere ike ịmepụta kristal ice site na ụgbọelu na-agafe agafe, nke na-enwekarị mbelata dị ukwuu na nrụgide n'azụ nku ma ọ bụ propeller-tips
Nke a na-eme ka ikuku jụọ oyi ngwá ngwá, ma nwee ike ịmepụta eriri nke ice crystals na-esote n'azụ ụgbọelu ahụ
Mmiri ice ndị a na-ahụ onwe ha gbụrụ-gbúrụ, ma na-eto ngwa ngwa site na usoro Bergeron, na-eme ka mmiri na-apụ n'anya ma na-emepụta oghere nwèrè akara dị ka brush nke ice crystals n'okpuru ya
Ihe ndekọ satellite mbụ nke oghere dị ogologo n'elu Florida Panhandle nké nwéré ike ịbụ site na ụgbọelu na-agafe agafe pụtara na Corfidi na Brandli (afọ 1986)
A na-ahụkarị oghere Fallstreak site na satellites dị elu nke taa (dịka, lee ihe atụ nke anọ na isiokwu a)
(afọ 2010) na-akọwa usoro ndị dị n'azụ mmepụta nke oghere fallstreak n'ụzọ zuru ezu, ma gosipụta ụfọdụ ihe ndị a hụrụ banyéré microphysics na dynamics ha
Igwe ojii dị otú ahụ abụghị naanị n'otu mpaghara ọ bụla ma e sere foto site n'ọtụtụ ébé

Fally Ipupa N'simba (amụrụ na Disemba 14, 1977), nke a maara site na aha egwu ya bụ Fally Ibupa, bụ onye na-agụ egwú na-ede egwu, onye na-agba egwu, onye ọrụ ebere, onye na'egwú na onye na-emepụta ihe
Site na 1999 ruo 2006, ọ bụ onye otu Quartier Latin International, otu egwu nke Koffi Olomidé guzobere na 1986
Abọm mbụ ya bụ Droit Chemin wepụtara na afọ 2006, nke gara n'ihu na-ere karịrị 100,000 nkeji, [citation needed] na abọm nke abụọ ya Arsenal de Belles Melodies wepụtara na afọ 2009
N'afọ 2007, Fally Ipupa meriri Kora Awards maka Best Artist ma ọ bụ Group si Central Africa
N'afọ 2010, Fally Ipupa meriri MTV Africa Music Awards afọ 2010 maka Best Video maka 'Sexy Dance' na Best Francophone Artist
O meriri ihe nrite obodo maka onye na-ese ihe kacha mma n'Africa
A họpụtara Fally Ipupa na Best Live Act category na MTV Africa Music Awards afọ 2014
O weputara abọm akpọrọ Power 'Kosa Leka' n'afọ 2013
Ipupa, onye bụkwa onye a ma ama na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, jikọtara ya na ndị na-ege ntị na steeti na 'Chaise Electrique', abụ ịhụnanya asụsụ abụọ nke gosipụtara onye na-agụ egwu G-Unit bụ Olivia
A mụrụ Fally Ipupa Nsimba na Disemba 14, 1977 na Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of Congo n'ime nnukwu ezinụlọ
Ebe a zụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ ndị Katọlik, ọ malitere ịbụ abụ na ukwe chọọchị

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya na obere ìgwè dị iche iche na Kinshasa, na n'etiti afọ ndị afọ 1990 olu ya dọtara uche ma mesịa sonye n'òtù ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ, gụnyere 'New City' ma ọ bụ 'New Covenant'
Na ngwụcha afọ 1990, ọ sonyeere 'Latent Talent' a ma ama na mba ahụ, onye ya na ya dekọrọ abọm mbụ ya
Na ngwụcha afọ 1990, otu nzukọ dị mkpa mere ka ọ bụrụ mmalite nke ịrị elu egwu, mgbe ọ sonyeere Quartier Latin International nke Koffi Olomide guzobere
Ipupa ghọrọ 'onye nduzi nke ndị egwú'
Ipupa gụnyere ihe o dere 'Eternelement' na album Force de frappe
A makwaara ya maka duets ya na Koffi Olomide na Effrakata karịsịa egwu 'Effervescent' na afọ 2001
Dị ka ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ Congo kpakpando, ọha na eze nwere mmasị inwe aha njirimara maka ndị na-ese ihe ma n'oge na-adịghị anya a kpọrọ ya 'Di Caprio', 'Anelka' na 'The Great One'
Site na ihe ịga nke ọma n'òtù ndị egwú, ọ kwalite ọrụ nke ya gụnyere abọm nke ya Droit Chemin, Arsenal des Belles mélodies , Power, Tokos and Control
Ọ na-etinye aka nke ukwuu na atụmatụ nke ncheta ncheta nke afọ iri atọ nke otu ahụ, n'agbanyeghị na ọ hapụrụ otu ahụ na afọ 2006
N'afọ 2006, o wepụtara abọm mbụ ya Droit Chemin nke David Monsoh Obouo nke Music (nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na aha ndị ọzọ nke egwu Africa dịka Koffi Olomide, Papa Wemba, DJ Arafat)
Ya na Maddy Munan, Krys, Mokobé nke 113 na Ben J nke Neg 'Marrons rụkọtara ọrụ, gụnyere egwu dị ka Liputa, Orgasy na Sopeka na-apụta na DR Congo na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Africa
Ihe ịga nke ọma ya pụtara ìhè mgbe ọ nwetara ndekọ ọla edo maka ire ihe karịrị 100,000

Fally enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye na nhọpụta ọ meriri Césaire music Male Artist of the Year, na Paris, abụọ Black Music Awards maka Male Artist of of the Year، Best clip na Benin, na Male Artist of l'année na Ivory Coast
A họpụtara ya na ngalaba 'Best Soukous Entertainer' na onyinye IRAMWA na United States na onye omenkà kachasị mma na Central Africa na Kora Awards
A malitere ọrụ ya na-aga nke ọma n'ebe ahụ, ma tinye egwu, njem na nkuzi
N'April 7, na afọ 2007 onye omenkà ahụ rụrụ ọrụ na Olympia na Paris
Site na ihe ịga nke ọma ya, Ipupa enweghị atụmatụ ịlaghachi na Quartier Latin International
Otú ọ dị, n'ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ, ọ kwetara na ọ ga-abụ akụkụ nke òtù ahụ mgbe niile

Afọ atọ mgbe a tọhapụrụ Droit Chemin (Straight Path), Ipupa wepụtara abọm nke abụọ nke egwu iri na isii a na-akpọ Arsenal De Belles Melodies (French maka 'arsenal of beautiful melodies') nke a na-eme ka ọ bụrụ 'A2BM'
Ọ bụ abọm nke abụọ nke Ipupa nke David Monsoh mepụtara

N'ime abọm a, Olivia Longott, onye America na-agụ egwu (onye bụbu onye otu G-Unit site na 50 Cent ) gosipụtara na Chaise Électrique na onye na-eme ihe nkiri dancehall Krys gosipụtara na ' Sexy Dance ' maka oge nke abụọ n'usoro mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma nke 'Droit Chemin Remix'
Mgbe ya na onye na-agụ egwu Olivia rụkọchara ọrụ, onye nwere nnukwu ndị na-akwado ya n'Africa, Ipupa nwetara nkwado ka ukwuu na kọntinent ahụ wee ghọọ otu n'ime ndị egwu kachasị achọ n'Africa
O meriri ọla edo nke abụọ ya site na abọm a na ihe karịrị 100,000 e rere, gụnyere 40,000 n'otu izu, ndekọ maka onye na-ese ihe na Congo
Na Mee 16, na afọ 2009, n'oge 'Creole Night', ihe omume nke otu Kassav haziri, Fally na-enye arụmọrụ na-akpali akpali ma na-agba ọkụ Stade de France jupụtara na mmadụ 90,000
Ihe omume ahụ kwadokwara otu 'LamusiK'
Fally na 'LamusiK' rụrụ ọrụ na ọrụ; 'Young Star'
Fally debere ihe ngosi na Zénith Paris na Jenụwarị 2, na afọ 2010, na-eme ka ihe karịrị mmadụ 6,000 gbakọta

O nwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite, dị ka 3 Ndule awards 2010 ('Best Album', 'Best Video' na 'Best Song'), 'Micro Gold', 'Best Artist Central Africa' na Soundcity Music Video Awards (SMVA 2010), Double Mama na MTV Africa Music Awards nke afo 2010, Best Francophone Artist, Best Music Video 'Sexy Dance', ihe nrite anọ na Moamas Awards, abụọ Okapi Awards nke afọ 2011, họpụtara Nostalgies Music na ihe nrite nke afo 2012
A họpụtakwala ya maka ọtụtụ onyinye MTV maka ihe nrite na mba Europe na afọ 2011, ihe nrite BET afọ 2011
Na Satọdee June 11, na afọ 2011, ya na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri n'Afrịka sonyere na African Night na Stade de France
O sonyere na ịdị n'otu na Haiti na ịgbasa Okwu
N'April 4, na afọ 2013, ọ malitere n'ahịa abọm nke atọ ya Power 'Kosa Leka' nke nwere egwu 22
Ọ bụ abọm ikpeazụ nke Ipupa nke onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nkuzi ya ugbu a bụ David Monsoh mepụtara

Abọm a nwere egwu ndị a ma ama dịka 'Bruce', 'Service', 'Terminator', '1000% Mawa', 'Anissa', 'Skype', 'Love Assassin', 'Sony', 'Double Clic' 'Kosa Leka' 'Hustler is Back', R&B na hip hop song Sweet Life (La vie est belle), Ndoki, Oxygene, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Sweet Life (La vie est belle), bụ egwu R&B / hip hop, nke edere n'ụzọ dị mma
Ọ na-ebu ụda na-asụ asụ nke na-esonyere nwayọ na-agbagharị na nnukwu bass-pumping groove na guitar
Abụ ahụ na-egosi ntụziaka egwu nke Ipupa n'ọdịnihu
Ngwakọta nke rumba na hip hop nke Congo, ọ na-egosi Ipupa dị ka onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na onye na-eme ihe ike na-ekwu maka ibi ndụ dị ụtọ
Sweet Life (La vie est belle)' Remix gosipụtara onye na-eti egwu Congolese Bigg masta G (Muana Mboka)
Ipupa biputere remix ahụ, na akaụntụ Facebook ya
Ipupa sokwa Bigg masta G (Muana Mboka) rụkọọ ọrụ na remix 'Ndoki'
A gbanwere ngwá ọrụ maka remix ahụ ma wepụ akụkụ nke olu Ipupa n'abụ ahụ ma jiri akụkụ rap nke Bigg masta G dochie ya
Ihe mkpuchi nke remix ahụ na-egosi ihe oyiyi na-akpali akpali nke nwere okwu 'Ndoki' n'etiti Ipupa na Bigg masta G
Onye na-agụ egwu rumba nke Congo MJ30, Poison Mobutu & Mami Wata mekwara remix nke abụ ahụ
Na remix nke MJ30, a na-ewepu olu Fally Ipupa kpamkpam; kama nke ahụ, MJ30 n'onwe ya na-abụ abụ
Vidio gọọmentị maka egwu 'Ndoki' nwetara ihe karịrị 150,000 nlele na YouTube n'ihe na-erughị otu izu (ihe ndekọ maka onye na-ese ihe Congo)
A na-ewere abọm nke atọ ya dị ka ihe ịga nke ọma, na-ahụ na ọ rere ihe karịrị 30,000 n'ime otu ọnwa
Mee 14, na afọ 2013, Fally meriri ihe nrite maka 'Best African Artist' na mbipụta mbụ nke Trace Urban Music Awards
Ipupa bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta maka abọm atọ (World Version) na Eprel, na afọ 2013 na Universal (Label AZ), ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ kachasị n'ụwa
Nke a gosipụtara ịrị elu na-aga n'ihu na mkpuchi nke egwu Afrịka site na akara ahụ
Ihe dị ịrịba ama bụ ngosipụta nke onye America rapper, Eve, na egwu 'Sex'plosif', n'oge ihe ngosi Guest Star Trace TV na Febụwarị 2013

Ipupa sonyere na MTV Africa All Stars na ndị omenkà a ma ama na mba ụwa dịka Snoop Lion (nke a maara dị ka Snoop Dogg), 2Face Idibia, Flavour, n'etiti ndị ọzọ n'ihu ihe karịrị ndị nkiri 15,000 na Mee 18, na afọ 2013 na Moses Mabhida stadium na Durban
O sonyekwara na ọrụ 'Doc Agric', maka mmepe nke ezigbo ọrụ ugbo n'Africa na nyocha nke ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe n'Africa D'banj na Tiken Jah Fakoly
Na Mee 5, na afọ 2014, Ipupa biputere egwu ọhụrụ ya 'Original' na ibe Facebook ya na ọwa YouTube
Na vidiyo ahụ, ndị na-agụ egwu Zouk Lynnsha na Fanny J gosipụtara na-agba egwu na abụ ahụ, yana onye na-egwu basketball 'OKC Thunder' Serge Ibaka
Egwú a gụnyere ihe nkiri sitere na ihe ngosi Ipupa gara aga na obodo ndị Afrịka Kinshasa, Brazzaville, Dakar, Douala, Abidjan, Luanda na ndị ọzọ
Ụda abụ ahụ na-egosipụta ụdị egwu ọdịnala nke egwu Afrịka, ọkachasị ụdị egwu Ecuador DRC

Egwú ahụ ruru ihe dị ịrịba ama nke 1 nde nlele n'ime ọnwa atọ na YouTubeA maara abụ ahụ maka mgbanwe nke ụdị egwu ndombolo, nke na-enwe ọganihu na-agbadata nwayọ n'ihi ọpụpụ nke ndị na-ese egwu Congo na Europe
Fally Ipupa meriri na Best Artist categori maka Central Afirika na ihe nrite Afrimma nke emere na Dallas na onwa Julai, na afọ 2014
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gara Washington, DC
dị ka akụkụ nke nzukọ US-Africa Summit, nke Onye isi ala Obama kpọrọ ndị isi Afrịka 47 maka oge August 4 ruo 6, na afọ 2014
Dị ka White House si kwuo, a kpọrọ nzukọ a iji mee ka mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Africa na United States sikwuo ike
A họpụtara ndị omenkà Afrịka iri na abụọ ka ha gaa, gụnyere Fally Ipupa, naanị onye omenkà a kpọrọ site na Central Africa
N'ọnwa Julaị, na afọ 2017, Ipupa wepụtara abọm nke anọ ya bụ Tokooos nke bụ abọm mbụ ya n'obodo ukwu
Otu afọ mgbe abọm mbụ ya n'obodo mepere emepe gasịrị, ọ laghachiri na rumba na Ndombolo omenala Congolese na abọm nke ise ya Control wepụtara na Nọvemba 2018

Na Disemba, na afọ 2020, Ipupa wepụtara abọm nke isii ya Tokooos II nke bụ abọm obodo nke abụọ ya nke nwere egwu 16 na mbipụta dijitalụ na egwu 22 na mbipụta anụ ahụ, gụnyere ihe anọ na Dadju, Naza (rapper), Ninho na M
Pokora

Folarin Falana (amụrụ na 27 Ọktoba 1990), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Falz, bụ onye na-eti egwu na Naijiria, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke malitere ọrụ ya mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị mgbe ya na enyi ya guzobere otu a na-akpọ 'The School Boys' tupu ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eti egwu amalite na 2009
Falz ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ wepụtara egwu 'Marry Me' nke gosipụtara olu sitere na Poe na Yemi Alade
Ugbu a, o nwere akara ndekọ onwe ya nke a na-akpọ 'Bahd Guys Records' O weputara abọm izizi ya bụ 'Wazup Guy' n'afọ 2014
E wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ya bụ 'Stories That Touch' n'afọ 2015
O weputara 27 na 2017, na abọm studio nke anọ ya bụ Moral Instruction na 2019
A mụrụ Falz na mpaghara gọọmentị nke Mushin, Lagos State, n'aka ndị ọka iwu na ndị na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ Funmi na Femi Falana
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa n'ụlọikpe n'afọ 2012 mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu Nigeria dị na Abuja
[nkọwa dị mkpa] Falz gụsịrị akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na nke sekọndrị na 'St
Leo's Catholic Primary School, Ikeja na Olashore International School, Osun State' n'otu n'otu
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Reading England, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nwere nzere LLB na Law
Falz malitere egwu dị ka ihe ntụrụndụ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ya na enyi ya guzobere otu egwu akpọrọ 'The School Boys'
N'afọ 2009, o wepụtara nchịkọta nke ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndekọ ya dị ka mixtape akpọrọ Shakara The Mixtape
N'afọ 2011, Falz wepụtara otu egwu akpọrọ 'Wahz Up Guy', wee wepụta 'High Class' na 'Currency', nke mere ka ọ nweta ala na ụlọ ọrụ egwu Naijiria
Na Jenụwarị 2, 2014, edepụtara Falz na tooXclusive's 'Artistes To Watch in 2014'
Na 30 Mee 2014, Falz wepụtara abọm studio mbụ ya akpọrọ 'Wazup Guy', abọm ahụ gosipụtara mmepụta sitere na ndị dị ka Studio Magic, DJ Woske, Tin Tin na Spellz, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Wazzup Guy nwere egwu iri na asatọ na ndị ọbịa si Olamide, Show Dem Camp, Phenom na Yemi Alade
Ụfọdụ n'ime egwu ndị a bụ 'See Me', 'Toyin Tomato', 'Senator', 'Right Now', 'Jessica', 'High Class', 'Marry Me', 'Oh God', 'The Advice' na 'Cool Parry', nke ndị nkatọ egwu toro
Na 31st Jenụwarị, 2015, Falz laghachiri na otu egwu akpọrọ 'Ello Bae'
N'ezie, ọ bụ mgbalị mbụ ya n'onwe ya mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya, nke Wazzup Guy ma merie ya ọtụtụ onyinye
[citation needed] Falz bụ atụmatụ, banyere mmalite nke egwu ahụ ka a malitere ya obere oge tupu oge valentine
[cittion needed]
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara Falz na 'Nkwado Kasị Mma nke Afọ' na 2015 Nigeria Entertainment Awards maka egwu ya 'Marry Me'
O meriri ya nhọpụta na 'Nkwado Kasị Mma nke Afọ' na 2015 'Nigeria Entertainment Awards'
A họpụtakwara ya na 'Best Rap Act of The Year' na 'Best New Act to Watch'
Na 31 Jenụwarị 2015, ọ wepụtara otu egwu akpọrọ 'Ello Bae', nke mere ka a họpụta ya na 'Best Street Hop Artiste of The Year' category na 2015 The Headies award
N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2015, ọ kwupụtara ntọhapụ nke abọm studio ya nke abụọ, nke akpọrọ Stories That Touch, nke a tọhapụrụ n'ụbọchị iri na asaa n'ọnwarị
N'afọ 2016, Falz meriri 'Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Comedy Movie/Series' na 2016 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards maka ọrụ ya dị ka Segun na usoro TV nke Funke Akindele 'Jenifa's Diary '
Na June 2016, a họpụtara Falz dị ka onye mmeri nke 'Viewer's Choice Best New International Act' category na 2016 BET Awards
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2016, Falz so Simi wepụta Chemistry, EP nwere egwu asaa nke Sess mepụtara
Falz na Simi rụkọtara ọrụ na mbụ na egwu 'Jamb Question' na 'Soldier'
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2017, afọ iri abụọ na ise ọ gbara, Falz wepụtara abọm ọhụrụ akpọrọ 27 iji mee emume ụbọchị ahụ
Nke a bụ abọm na-eju anya, ebe ọ bụ na a naghị akwalite ya tupu ewepụta ya
O nwere egwu iri na asaa gụnyere egwu egwu dịka 'Bhad Baddo Baddest', 'Wehdone sir', na 'Something light'
Ọ gosipụtara egwu egwu ama ama dị ka Davido, Olamide, Burna Boy, Wande Coal, Maleek Berry, Sir Dauda, Medikal, Terry Apala, na Ycee
Ọ bụ Sess mepụtara abọm ahụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe n'ụlọ, na ụfọdụ egwu bụ Maleek Berry, na anwansi studio
Abọm ahụ mere nke ọma ma nweta ọtụtụ onyinye na nhọpụta, gụnyere nhọpụta maka The Headies Award maka Rap Album of the Year
Na Mee 2018, Falz wepụtara vidiyo egwu akpọrọ 'Nke a bụ Naịjirịa' nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Childish Gambino 'Nke ahụ bụ America'
O gosipụtara okwu ndị Naijiria gụnyere nrụrụ aka na iri ngo
Mgbe ọnwa ole na ole gachara, NBC (National Broadcasting Commission) machibidoro egwu ahụ na-azọrọ na ọ bụ abụ rụrụ arụ
Mgbe a jụrụ Falz, o kwuru, sị Ọ bụrụ na ha machibido abụ a iwu, mgbe ahụ, aghọtaghị m ha n'ihi na abụ ahụ abụghị abụ na-adịghị mma
Otú ọ dị, Falz gbara NBC akwụkwọ maka N100 nde

Na Septemba 1, 2018, Falz meriri 'Onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma' na 2018 Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards maka ọrụ ya dị ka Quam na ihe nkiri Tope Oshin Ogun New Money, na-aghọ onye egwu Naijiria mbụ meriri Africa Magic Views' Choice Award ugboro abụọ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020, Falz kpughere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri ya nke aha ya bụ House21TV
Ka ọ na-ekpughe ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri ọhụrụ, Falz gakwara Instagram iji kpughee usoro ihe ọchị ọhụrụ, Therapy, iji gosipụta naanị na YouTube

Na Machị 2022, Falz kwupụtara na ibe Instagram ya na ọ ga-eme ihe dịtụ iche n'afọ a ebe ọ hichapụrụ post ya niile site n'afọ gara aga na-emesi obi ike na ọ bụ nkwụsị ọhụrụ site n'ịtọhapụ bụ egwu mbụ maka afọ ahụ na BNXN nke a na-akpọkwa Buju nke akpọrọ 'Ice Cream'
O nwetakwara ụgbọala nwere ụlọ tiketi nke e ji Falz Ice Cream mee ka ndị mmadụ gbasaa ịhụnanya site n'inye ice cream n'efu n'ime obodo Lagos
Falz kọwara ụdị egwu ya dị ka 'egwú Wahzup'
Ọ bụ njikọta nke okwu ndị na-atọ ọchị na hip-hop nke oge a na ụda Yoruba adịgboroja

N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2014, Falz nọ n'ọkwa #9 na ndepụta nke 'Ndị Rapper 10 kachasị nwee onyinye na Naịjirịa n'afọ 2014', na-ekwu na ikike nke ịnọgide na-eche echiche ma nweta isi ya na 16 barz mgbe ọ na-agbanwe ụda olu, na-etinye punchlines na-atọ ọchị ma na-enye ya niile n'ụzọ na-eme ka onye na-ege ntị soro ya bụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, Falz kpọrọ Runtown na ndị ọzọ ama ama na Naijiria ka ha sonye na ngagharị iwe #EndSARS na Lagos, South West Nigeria, na-akpọ gọọmentị ka ọ kwụsị obi ọjọọ ndị uwe ojii
Onye na-agụ egwú na-ekwu okwu banyere okwu ndị metụtara ikpe ziri ezi na mba ahụ
N'ịkwanyere ndị mmegbu ndị uwe ojii metụtara otuto, ọ wepụtara vidiyo egwu maka 'Johnny', egwu mbụ sitere na abọm ikpeazụ ya, Moral Instruction
O dere na post na-ewebata abụ ahụ, 'Anyị agaghị echefu ndị dike e gburu n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị
Nke a bụ maka ha
Maka ndụ Naijiria ọ bụla e wepụrụ n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị, anyị ga-ahụ na anyị nwetara ikpe ziri ezi
'Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ abụọ kemgbe m wepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ
Ọbụna ihe na-enye nsogbu iche na ka oge na-aga, ozi ahụ bịara dịkwuo mkpa

N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Christiane Amanpour nke CNN, na 2020, Falz kwuru na nkwa Onye isi ala Buhari kwere ime mgbanwe na ndị uwe ojii Naijiria na-ewe iwe ma na-akpasu iwe ka ọ na-azọrọ na Buhari anọwo na-eme otu nkwa ahụ kemgbe 2017

Ezinụlọ nwere Mkpa Nna (FNF), nke a chọpụtara n'afọ 1974, bụ ụlọ ọrụ ebere na-elekọta mmadụ n'ime United Kingdom nke na-enye ozi, ndụmọdụ, na nkwado nye ndị nne na nna ndị mmekọrịta ụmụ ha na ha nọ n'ihe egwu n'oge ma ọ bụ mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm ma ọ bụ nkewa gasịrị, ma ọ bụ ndị kewapụrụ ma ọ bụ kewapụrụ ụmụ ha

FNF na-akwadokwa maka ịkekọrịta nne na nna, oge ka ukwuu maka ụmụaka na nne ma ọ bụ nna ha na-abụghị onye nlekọta, na omume ụlọ ikpe siri ike mgbe nne ma ọ bụ nna na-elekọta ya na-emegide iwu ụlọ ikpe na-achọ ka ha kwe ka ụmụ ha nwee mmekọrịta na nne ma ọ bụ nna nke ọzọ
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke nzukọ ahụ bụ na ụmụaka amuru site na ịgba alụkwaghịm ma ọ bụ nkewa ekwesịghị ịkwụsị ịhụnanya na nlekọta nke otu n'ime nne na nna ha

N'ime United Kingdom, ihe dị ka otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ụmụaka sitere na nne na nna kewara ekewa enweghị mmekọrịta na nna ha, nzukọ ahụ banyere na-echegbu onwe ya banyere ịnọgide na-enwe mmekọrịta nwatakịrị na nne na nna ya n'oge na mgbe ezinụlọ dara

E hiwere Ndị Nna Mkpa Ezinụlọ na Mee 1974 site n'aka onye na-agwọ ọrịa uche ụmụaka Alick Elithorn na onye ndụmọdụ ego Keith Parkin dị ka nzukọ iji mee mkpọsa maka oge nne na nna nhata mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm gasịrị, na maka mmụba mmekọrịta n'etiti nwatakịrị na nne na nna ya na-abụghị onye nlekọta
Òtù ahụ ghọrọ ọrụ ebere e debara aha n'afọ 1979, ma nwee ike ị nweta ndị ọrụ n'ime afọ 1992

Ka nzukọ ahụ na-eto ma malite ịnata ego gọọmentị, ụfọdụ ndị otu hapụrụ na 1990s ma guzobe ọtụtụ òtù ọhụrụ dịka Parents Forever Scotland, Association of Shared Parenting, Dads After Divorce, na Fathers4Justice
N'afọ 1994, FNF, Dads After Divorce na Parents Forever Scotland guzobere Cheltenham Group iji gbalịa ịmepụta njikọ nke òtù ndị nne na nna

N'ime afọ 2008, FNF rụrụ ọrụ n'okpuru ndò nke 'Both Parents Matter' ma tinye eriri a na akara ọrụ ebere ahụ n'afọ 2013 iji kọwaa n'ụzọ doro anya mmesi ike ọrụ ebere ahụ na mkpa nne na nna abụọ dị na ndụ nwatakịrị
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2010, nzukọ ahụ nwere alaka iri ise na otu na United Kingdom na netwọk nke ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo narị atọ
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu na-akwado maka ịkekọrịta nne na nna na ndị mgbasa ozi, Ụlọ nke Commons na ụlọ ọrụ ikpe ziri ezi nke ezinụlọ, ebe ọ na-aga n'ihu na ọrụ ya dị ka nzukọ nlekọta ọha na eze
Jon Davies bụ onye isi ọrụ site n'afo 2006 ruo afọ 2010
Onye isi oche ugbu a bụ Jerry Karlin, na Michael Lewkowicz bụ odeakwụkwọ ụlọ ọrụ

N'ime afọ 2016, Ezinụlọ Mkpa Nna natara ihe dị ka oku puku iri abụọ na ise na Helpline ya, ihe dị ka ndị ọbịa puku ise na nzukọ obodo, ọnụ ọgụgụ yiri nke posts na Forum ya n'ịntanetị, na nlele peeji otu narị na iri asatọ na ise pụrụ iche na weebụsaịtị ya

N'ime afọ 1994, onye omeiwu Labour Party bụ Glenda Jackson kwuru na Families Need Fathers dụrụ ndị nna ọdụ ka ha tọọrọ ụmụ ha ma ọ bụrụ na a naghị ekwe ka ha nweta ha, ma ọ bụrụ na nke ahụ arụghị ọrụ, igbu nne

N'akwụkwọ ozi sochirinụ banyere nkwupụta ozi nke òtù ahụ, ọ kwughachiri nkwupụta ịtọrọ mmadụ ma chọpụta na nkwupụta ozi ahụ bụ mwakpo megide ụmụ nwanyị kama ịbụ arụmụka maka idebe ụmụaka na ndị nne na nna na kọntaktị
N'ọnọdụ ọ bụla, onye omeiwu ahụ enyeghị isi iyi maka ebubo ịtọrọ mmadụ
N'afọ 2007, onye nta akụkọ Jenni Murray rụrụ ụka na na ntọala ya, FNF were onwe ya tinye n'èzí nke nkwanye ùgwù dịka e kwuru na ha na-akwado ịtọrọ ụmụaka ndị e nyere nne ha ikike ilekọta ha
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya n'afọ 2017, Legal Action for Women mere ngagharị iwe na nzukọ FNF
Ha hotara okwu ntọrọ Jackson n'afọ 1994 na nzuko omeiwu ma mee mkpesa na nzukọ ahụ na-awakpo ụmụ nwanyị mgbe niile nakwa na ha na-agọnahụ ịdị adị nke ime ihe ike n'ụlọ
Famoudou Konaté bụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ Malinké si Guinea
Famoudou Konaté bụ onye na-eme nke ọma na djembe udu na ndị egwú ya
Otu n'ime ndị isi ole na ole malitere óménàlà ịgbà nke Malinké, a na-akwanyere Famoudou ùgwù n'ụwa niile dị ka otu n'ime onye isi ịgbà djembe nke mbụ n'ụwa
O nyefere ndụ ya n'ịrụ egwu na ichekwa egwu nke ndị ya, na-enyere aka ibuli ndị egwu djembe site na mgbọrọgwụ ọdịnnala ya gaa na ewu ewu n'ụwa niile
A mụrụ Famoudou na afọ 1940 na nso Sangbaralla, obodo nta dị na mpaghara Hamana nke Upper Guinea, etiti Malinké na ebe a mụrụ ezinụlọ dundunba nke rhythms
Onye na-akụ ọkpọ, ọ na-akụ egwu na ememme obodo mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ ma n'oge na-adịghị anya, a chọrọ ya dị ka djembefola gafee mpaghara ahụ
Site na afo 1959 ruo na afọ 1985, Famoudou bụ onye isi djembe soloist maka Les Ballets Africains de la République de Guinée, na-agagharị n'ụwa ma na-eme ihe dị egwu
N'oge a, Famoudou n'onwe ya mepụtara ọtụtụ n'ime usoro egwu ndị a na-ahụkarị ugbu a na West African na nnọkọ ndị na eme ihie n'ụwa niile
N'afọ 1986 na afọ 1987, Konaté malitere ọrụ nkuzi onwe ya n'otu oge ahụ ọ ka na-arụ ọrụ maka 'Les Ballets Africains' na Conakry
Rále Dominique si Germany, Alain Brammer na Michel Weelen, ha abụọ si France, bụ ụmụ akwụkwọ Konaté mbụ kemgbe afọ 1986
Ha niile gara n'obodo a mụrụ Famoudou na Konate, Sangbaralla gburugburu Kouroussa na Upper Guinée wee dekọọ nke mbụ, na teepu, nke ọrụ ya wee weghachite ya na Europe
Na afọ 1987 site n'aka Rainer Dörrer, Johannes Beer gara Conakry
N'afọ 1988, Johannes Beer kpọọrọ Famoudou Konaté gaa Germany wee guzobe 'Ensemble Moderne'
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha afọ 1988, na Berlin, ya na 'Famoudou Konaté Ensemble', nke ndị a ma ama na-akụ ọkpọ si Berlin, 'Djembe Tubabu' (Silvia Kronewald na Paul Engel) guzobere ma na-achịkwa
N'afọ 2000, a kpọrọ Konaté na United States maka oge mbụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya site na Chicago Djembe Project
N'okpuru nduzi nke Lillian Friedberg na Jim Banks, Konaté guzobere onwe ya na North America site na njem mba site n'ụsọ oké osimiri site na afo 2000-2004
Taa, Konaté na-akụzi ma na-eme kwa afọ na Europe, Japan, Israel, North America na West Africa, na-akụnye ọgbọ nke ndị na-abụghị ndị Africa na-akụ ọkpọ nwere ọzụzụ pụrụ iche
N'afọ 1996, ọ natara prọfesọ nsọpụrụ na Didactics of African Musical Practice site na Mahadum nke Arts Berlin
O mepụtara CD asatọ, gụnyere mbipụta ya kachasị ọhụrụ, Hamana Namun
Fan Binging (Chinese 范冰冰, amuru 16 Septemba 1981) bu onye omere China
Site na 2013 ruo 2017, etinyere ya dị ka onye ama ama kacha akwụ ụgwọ na ndepụta Forbes China Celebrity 100 ka ọ gbagoro na 10 kacha elu kwa afọ kemgbe 2006
Ọ pụtara na ndepụta magazin Time nke 100 ndị mmadụ kacha nwee mmetụta na 2017
Ọrụ mbụ onye fan bụ na sinima East Asia na telivishọn, ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri My Fair Princess (1998–1999)
Ọganihu ya bịara na ihe nkiri Cell Phone (2003) bụ ihe nkiri China kacha enweta ego n'afọ
Ọ gara n'ihu mee ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndị China, gụnyere Lost in Beijing (2007), Buddha Mountain (2011) na Double Xposure (2012)

Maka isi akụkọ ihe nkiri ahụ Abụghị m Madame Bovary (2016), Fan nwetara onyinye sitere na Golden Horse Film Festival, Tokyo International Film Festival, San Sebastián International Film Festival na Golden Rooster Awards

Ọrụ ihe nkiri mba ofesi ya gụnyere ihe nkiri French Stretch (2011), ihe nkiri Korea My Way (2011), ihe nkiri dike America X-Men Days of Future Past (2014) na ihe nkiri Hong Kong-Chinese-American Skiptrace (2015)
Fanagalo, mà ọ bụ Fanakalo, bụ asụsụ obodo mà ọ bụ pidgin dabere ná Zulu ná ntinye sitere ná Bekee ná obere ntinye Afrikaans

Á na-eji yá eme ìhè dị kà asụsụ, ọkachasị ná ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ọlaedo, diamond, coal ná ọla kọpa ná South Africa ná ruo n'ókè dị àlà ná Democratic Republic of the Congo, Namibia, Zambia, ná Zimbabwe
Ọ bụ ezie ná á na-eji ya eme Ìhè dị kà asụsụ nkè abụọ naanị, e mere atụmatụ ná ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-asụ yá dị kà 'ọtụtụ narị puku' ná 1975

Ka ọ na-erule oge nnwere onwe bịara mà ọ bụ n'ihe banyere South Africa, ikike ntụli áká zuru ụwa ọnụ nke Bekee aghọwo nke a na-asụ n'ọtụtụ ebe mà ghọta ná ọ ghọrọ asụsụ á na-ahụkarị, na-enyere agbụrụ dị iche iche nọ n'otu mbà ahụ áká iso ibé há kwurịta okwu, ná ojiji Fanakalo adaala
Áhà 'Fanakalo' sitere ná ụdị Nguni nkè yiri fana-ga-lo nke pụtara 'dị ka + nke + nke ahụ' mà nwee ìhè pụtara 'ime yá dị ka nkè a', na-egosipụta ojiji yá dị kà asụsụ ntụziaka
Asụsụ ndị ọzọ nkè áhà ahụ gụnyere Fanagalo ná Fanekolo
Á makwaara yá dị kà Isikula, Lololo mà ọ bụ Isilololo, Piki ma ọ bụ Isipiki, ná Silunguboi
Dị kà ụmụ amaala ndị Fanagalo sitere ná há enweghị asụsụ edere ede, á naghị edozi orthography nke Fanagalo; dịka ọmụmaatụ, ụda nkè W ná B dị nso [nkọwa dị mkpa]
Dị kà Turkish, á na-eji ụdaume ụfọdụ màrà Fanagalo, ébé á na-agbanwe ụdaume dị ná prefix dịka ụdaume na-esote
N'asụsụ Nguni, prefix Mu- ma ọ bụ Ma- na-egosi otu, ébé Bu- mà ọ dị Ba- na-apụta ọtụtụ ʿ yá mere Muntu = nwoke; Bantu = ndị mmadụ, ọkachasị mgbè á na-etinye yá n'agbụrụ, dịka
dịka ọmụmaatụ, á na-akpọ ndị ikom nke agbụrụ Lozi Ba-rotse (asụgharịrị mkpụrụ okwu), há na-asukwa Si-lozi; Bembas na-asụrụ Chiwemba; Tswanas bi ná Botswana, nkè á na- bingaka Bechuanaland
Chi-lapa-lapa thus is the 'language' derived from lapa = 'there', with reduplication for emphasis
Fanagalo bụ otú n'ime ọtụtụ asụsụ pidgin nkè Africa nkè mepụtara n'oge ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị iji kwalite ịdị mfe nke nkwurịta okwu na South Africa
Á makwaara yá dị ka asụsụ na-egwupụta ìhè n'ime àlà nkè ndị na-egwe ìhè n'ebe á na-asụ iji mebie ìhè mgbochi asụsụ
Ọ bụ ìhè á na-ejighị n'aka otú e si mepụta asụsụ pidgin á ná mbụ ebe ọ bụ ná e nwere échichè dị iche iche sitere ná isi mmalite dị ichè ichè

Échichè á na-ahụkarị bụ ná e mere Fanakalo n'ihi ná ndị ikom na-asụ asụsụ dị ichè iche (na-abịa site na ọdịbendị dị ichè ichè ná South Africa ná steeti ndị gbara yá gburugburu) gara rụọ ọrụ ná ébé á na-egwupụta ìhè n'oge ngwụcha narị afọ nke 19
N'ikpeazụ, asụsụ ndị a jikọtara ọnụ mà mepụta olumba ọhụrụ iji mebie ihe mgbochi asụsụ n'etiti ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ime ala
Fanakalo agbasaala ná mba ahụ ná Southern Africa niile

Yá mere, á na-asụ Fanakalo dị kà 'asụsụ kọntaktị' n'ime ébé á na-egwupụta ihe n'etiti ndị si n'agbụrụ dị ichè ichè ná South Africa ná mba dị iche iche dị na Southern Africa, ná n'etiti foremen ná ndị ọrụ [Afrikaans na ndị na-asụsụ Bekee], na ndị Europe (dị ka Portuguese, Polish ná German) na-enye aka ná ihe Fanakalo chọrọ maka nkwurịta okwu ná ebe a ná ebe a

Otú ọ dị, ụfọdụ ndị na-eme nchọpụta ekwenyeghị n'echiche á n'ihi ná Fanakalo bụkarị Zulu na obere Afrikaans ná Bekee, mà okwu ndị á gbazitere site ná asụsụ ndị ọzọ sitere ná mba ahụ ná steeti ndị gbara yá gburugburu (dị ka Mozambique, Zimbabwe wdg) abụghị ìhè á na-ahụkarị, mana eziokwu ahụ bụ ná ndị ọrụ àlà si n'agbụrụ dị ichè ichè ná mbà ahụ nakwa ná á na-asụ yá n'ógbè niile nkè Southern Africa kwadoro echiche á

Echiche ọzọ (nkè Adendorff ná ndị nchọpụta ndị ọzọ na-atụ aro) bụ ná Fanakalo si ná Colony nkè Natal dị kà ụzọ nkwurịta okwu n'etiti ndị isi ojii na-asụ asụsụ Zulu na ndị ọcha na-asụrụ Bekee ná Afrikaans nkè nwere ike ịbụ ìhè mere asụsụ pidgin a ji bụrụ nkè Zulu, Afrikaans ná Bekee
Ọbịbịa nkè ndị Britain ná ndị Afrikaners ná Natal bụ ná mmalite narị afọ nke 19 n'oge ngwụcha afọ 1830, ndị Cape Afrikaners gara Natal (ma mesịa guzobe mba Boer nke Natalia (1840-1843))
Ndị si England kwabata rutere afọ iri kà e mesịrị
A na-ekwu ná mmepe nkè asụsụ pidgin ná Natal sitere ná nsogbu siri ike nkè nkwurịta okwu
Á na-asụkwa Fanakalo ná ndị ọrụ India bụ ndị ndị ndị ọchịchị Britain bubatara ná Natal mà mesịa ghọọ ụzọ nkwurịta okwu n'etiti ndị India ná ndị Zulu
Otú ọ dị, ọ dị mkpa iburu n'uche ná ọ bụghị asụsụ ndị India na-emetụta ya
N'ezie, asụsụ ndị India enweghị uru akụ ná ụba màkà mmekọrịta yá ná Bekee ná ndị Zulus
Á kụziri Fanakalo n'ebe á na-egwupụta ọlaedo mgbè ndị ikom Zulu si Natal kwaga Witwatersrand ịrụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ ma nkè á ghọrọ asụsụ pidgin kachasị mmá ná South Africa

Ụfọdụ ndị na-eme nchọpụta ekwenyeghị n'echiche á n'ihi na, olee otú o si kwe omume ná asụsụ pidgin si Natal ga-agafe ná ebe a na-egwupụta ọlaedo ná Witwatersrand ná ebe a á na-egwu diamond ná Kimberly, mana o gosipụtara ná e nwere nnukwu ngafe nke ndị Zulu (nke nọgidere na-arị elu) site ná Natal gaa ná mpaghara Transvaal ná mpaghara Cape (ụfọdụ ọbụna gaa Orange Free State) iji rụọ ọrụ ná ebe á nkè na-eguzogide echiche a n'ezie n'ihi ọtụtụ ebe ndị agbata obi ná South Africa bụ ndị agbata obi ha dị ná ndị Sotho 2 ndị ọzọ si na-egwu àlà ná ndị ọzọ si n'ebe ndị agbata obi yá nà ndị mmadụ nà ndị ọzọ na-achịkwa
Adendorff kọwara ụdị abụọ nkè asụsụ ahụ, Mine Fanagalo na Garden Fanagalo
Aha nkè ikpeazụ na-ezo aka n'iji ya na ndị na-eje ozi n'ụlọ
A maara yá ná mbụ dị ka Kitchen Kaffir
Ma Fanagalo na Kitchen Kaffir nyere aka n'ịchịkwa asụsụ kà e kere Kitchen Kaaffir iji kewapụ ndị na-achị àlà ná obodo ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ ná dị ka ụzọ isi chịkwaa
(A na-ejikarị okwu 'kaffir' eme ìhè, ná South Africa, dị ka okwu mkparị maka ndị isi ojii, á na-ewerekwa yá ugbu a dị kà ìhè mkparị
O sitere ná okwu Arabic Kafir, nkè pụtara ónyé na-ekweghị ekwe)
Ìhè abụọ mere kà Fanagalo ghara inweta ọnọdụ dị kà asụsụ bụ isi nkewa nkè Fanagalo ná ngalaba metụtara ọrụ ná enweghị ntụrụndụ
Nkè abụọ, á naghị ekwe ka ụmụ nwanyị ná ụmụaka na-asụ Fanagalo, nkè pụtara ná nkwurịta okwu ezinụlọ adịghị adị mà enwere obere ụzọ iji gbasaa ojiji nkè pidgin
N'etiti narị afọ nke 20 ná South Africa, e nwere mgbalị gọọmentị iji kwalite mà mee kà Fanagalo bụrụ asụsụ nkè abụọ zuru ụwa ọnụ, n'okpuru áhà 'Basic Bantu'
[citation needed]
N'ụzọ dị iche, ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-egwupụta ìhè ná mmalite narị afọ nke 21 agbalịwo iwepụ Fanagalo maka asụsụ ndị dịbu adị
Ná mgbakwunye, e nwere mgbalị siri ike iji kwalite ojiji nke Bekee ná ngalaba ebe a na-ejikarị Fanagalo eme ìhè dị ka ụzọ nchịkwa
Ravyse (2018) na-atụle nguzogide doro anya nkè Fanagalo megide iwu gọọmentị, n'agbanyeghị ihere yá na-aga n'ihu dị ka asụsụ màkà ndị na-amaghị akwụkwọ
Fanagalo ejikọtala ná omenala nkè ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe, na ịga n'ihu yá yiri ka ọ na-adabere ná ihu ọma na-aga n'ihu nkè ndị na-ekwu okwu ya, karịa iwu ụlọ ọrụ

N'agbanyeghị mbelata a n'iji yá eme ihe, a ka na-anabata Fanagalo dị ka akụkụ nke omenala ná njirimara nkè igwu ala mà na-ele ya anya dị ka iwu n'ezie ma na-anọgide na-enwe Mkpà yá nà ngalaba ojiji ya
Njirimara siri ike nkè ndị na-asụ asụsụ Fangalo kerịtara mere ka há nwee otu, ya mere ha na-eguzogide itinye Bekee ma eleghị anya ọ bụ ihe mere a ka ji jiri pidgin mee ihe taa
Mine Fanagalo ná South Africa ná Zimbabwe dabere na ókwú Zulu (ihe dị ka 70%), na Bekee (ihe dị na 25%) na ụfọdụ okwu sitere ná Afrikaans (5%)
Ọ nweghị ụdị mgbanwe Zulu, ọ na-agbaso usoro ókwú Bekee
Adendorff kọwara Mine Fanagalo ná Garden Fanagalo dị ka otu pidgin
Ọ na-atụ aro na a ga-ahụ Garden Fanagalo dị ka nke dị ná njedebe Bekee nkè usoro, ná Mine Fanagalo nso ná njedebe Zulu

Á maara ụdị dị iche iche ná Zimbabwe (Rhodesia) dị kà Chilapalapa ma Shona na-emetụta yá, ebe ụdị dị iche ná Zambia (Northern Rhodesia), nkè á na-akpọ Cikabanga (nke a na-ekwupụta, ná mgbe ụfọdụ á na-asụ, Chikabanga), Bemba na-emetụtara yá
Ọtụtụ ìhè dị mkpa na-eme kà Fanagalo dị ichè ná asụsụ Nguni (dị ka Zulu ná Xhosa)
Lo na-arụ ọrụ dị kà isiokwu ná ngosipụta, ebe ọ bụ naanị ngosipụta ná Zulu
Á na-eji Lapha eme ihe iji pụta 'ebe a', nkè pụtakwara 'ebe a' mgbe a na-ekwusi okwu mbụ ike, á na-ejikwa yá dị ka nnọchiaha maka ọnọdụ
(Ọ na-arụ ọrụ màkà ìhè ọ bụla dịka 'na', mà ọ bụ 'n'akụkụ', wdg) Zulu, n'aka nkè ọzọ, na-eji naanị lapha eme ìhè iji pụta 'ebe a'
Tụkwasị ná nkè á, Fanagalo na-eji naanị nnọchiaha n'efu mina, thina, wena, ena, nkè pụtara 'M, anyị, gị, ya/ya/ya/ha'
Zulu na-eji naanị nnọchiaha eme ìhè màkà nkwenye, na-adabere kama ná akara nkwekọrịta ngwaa, dịka Spanish
Á na-eji nsonaazụ -ile (hamba 'M na-aga, na-aga!', hambile 'M ná na-aga'), ná ọdịnihu ná modal azi (azi hamba 'ga-aga')
Nkè á bụ ìhè atụ abụọ (a na-akpọ mkpụrụedemede niile) -

Fanele Ntuli (amụrụ na 7 Machị 1991), bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-egosi ihe oyoyo na YouTuber A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ na ihe oyoyo Uzalo na Durban Gen
A mụrụ Ntuli na abalị asaa nke ọnwa Maachị 1991 na Durban na Kwazulu Natal, South Africa
Ọ banyere Durban Girls High School n'afọ 2003 wee gụọ akwụkwọ n'afọ 2008
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2013, ọ nwetara asambodo dị elu na ọmụmụ ihe nkiri na Oaksfields College
Ọ bụ nne nke otu nwa nwoke
E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbo n'ime ime obodo ya na mpaghara Chibili nke KwaZulu Natal yana onye na-azụ ehi nwere ìgwè ehi karịrị otu narị na iri ise

N'oge ndụ ya na Oaksfields College, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri dị ka; In Love With Shakespeare na ọrụ 'Lady Mac Beth', na The Story of Jane Doe dị ka 'Nurse Coco' na Imagine dị ka 'Michelle, onye anwansi'
N'afọ 2015, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ na ihe oyoyo na obere ọrụ nke 'School girl' na ihe nkiri Isibaya
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2016, ọ sonyeere Uzalo iji rụọ ọrụ 'Mandisa'
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma ahụ gasịrị, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ahụike nke etv
telenovela Durban Gen, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ 'Dr Thandekile Zondo'
Ọ bụ nne nke otu nwa nwoke
Fanfan Rwanyindo Kayirangwa bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Rwanda bụ onye bụ Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ọha na eze na ọrụ na kansụl Rwanda, kemgbe ụbọchị 31 Ọgọst 2017
O nwere nzere Bachelor of Laws, nke ọ nwetara n'afọ 1997, site na Mahadum Mba nke Rwanda
O nwekwara Master of Laws, nke Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, na Johannesburg, South Africa nyere n'afọ 2010
Tupu afọ 2004, Rwanyindo Kayirangwa rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ ọrụ ego
Site n'afọ 1998 ruo afọ 2004, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ iwu na onye ọrụ akwụmụgwọ nke Commercial Bank of Rwanda, nke taa na-azụ ahịa dị ka I&M Bank Rwanda Limited

Fang /ˈfɒŋ/ bụ asụsụ ndi Central Africa nke ihe dị ka nde mmadụ 1 na-asụ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha nọ na Equatorial Guinea, na n'ebe ugwu Gabon, ebe ọ bụ asụsụ Bantu kachasị; A na-asukwa Fang na ndịda Cameroon, Republic of the Congo, na obere akụkụ nke agwaetiti São Tomé na Príncipe
Ọ nwere njikọ na asụsụ Bulu na Ewondo nke ndịda Cameroon
N'okpuru bu Onye isi ala Macías Nguema, Fang bụ asụsụ gọọmentị nke Equatorial Guinea, ọ bụ ezie na n'afọ 1982, Iwu nke atọ jiri Spanish dochie ya
Kemgbe ahụ, nsụgharị ọ bụla nke Iwu ahụ amatala Fang na asụsụ ndị ọzọ bụ ụmụ amaala obodo ahụ dị ka akụkụ nke ọdịbendị mba, n'agbanyeghị na asụsụ ndị a enweghị ọnọdụ gọọmentị
Enwere ọtụtụ ụdị dị iche iche nke Fang na ugwu Gabon na ndịda Cameroon
Maho (2009) depụtara Southwest Fang dị ka asụsụ pụrụ iche
Olumba ndị ọzọ bụ Ntoumou, Okak, Mekê, Atsi (Batsi), Nzaman (Zaman), Mveni, na Mvaïe
Dị ka ALCAM si kwuo (2012), a na-asụkarị Fang n'ebe ugwu Gabon nakwa na Equatorial Guinea
Asụsụ ndị a gụnyere Ntumu, Mvayn, na Okak
Na Cameroon, a na-asụ Fang na ọkara ndịda nke ngalaba Dja-et-Lobo (Southern Region) n'ebe ndịda Djoum
A na-asụkwa ya na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ngalaba Mvila ndịda Mvangan, tinyere obere akụkụ dịpụrụ adịpụ nke ngalaba Océan n'etiti Lolodorf na Kribi ebe a na-asụgharị asụsụ Okak
A na-asụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ, Mvayn na Ntumu, na ngalaba Vallée-du-Ntem
Fang bụ asụsụ ndi Southern Bantoid nke Cameroon
'Fang' bụ aha ndi obodo a na-asụ asụsụ
