Àtụ Infobox writer
Faridah Àbíké-Íyímídé (amụrụ na 13 Ọktọba 1999) bụ onye Britain na Naịjịrịa na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na-ede akụkọ mkpirikpi na onye na-edekọ akụkọ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ izizi ya, ihe na-akpali akpali Ace of Spades (2021), natara NAACP Image Award maka Outstanding Literary Work ➜ Youth/Teens na 2022, wee ruo n'elu iri na ndepụta Best Seller
Tụkwasị na nke a, Àbíké-Íyímídé enyewo aka n'akwụkwọ dị iche iche, gụnyere The Bookseller, gal-dem, NME na Reader's Digest
A mụrụ Àbíké-Íyímídé ma zụlite ya na Croydon na South London
Ọ biri na Aberdeen, Scotland mgbe ọ na-amụ Bekee, Chinese na anthropology na Mahadum Aberdeen
Ọ bi na London ugbụ a mgbe ọ na-amụta ihe n'ebe dị anya n'afọ ikpeazụ nke usoro nzere
Akwụkwọ akụkọ izizi nke Àbíké-Íyímídé, Ace of Spades, bụ ihe na-akpali akpali nke nwere isiokwu nke 'homophobia na obodo ndị isi ojii, ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na echiche dị ịche ịche n'etiti ndị isi ojii'
N'afọ 2018 ọ nwetara onye nnọchi anya na nkwekọrịta akwụkwọ UK maka Ace of Spades na Usborne Publishing
N'afọ 2020, ọ nwetara nkwekọrịta akwụkwọ US na Macmillan Publishers maka Ace of Spades tinyere akwụkwọ akụkọ nke abụọ, maka ego asaa
Àbíké-Íyímídé na-akọwa n'ihu ọha dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike
Farouk Hosny (ma ọ bụ Hosni) (Arabic; amụrụ n'afọ 1938) bụ onye Egypt na-ese osise nke bụ Minista nke Ọdịbendị site na 1987 ruo 2011
A mụrụ Hosny ma tolite na Alexandria
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Alexandria University's School of Fine Arts n'afọ 1964 ma mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ duziri Al-Anfoushi Cultural Palace ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Onye na-ese ihe na-enweghị atụ, Hosny mere ihe ngosi n'ụwa niile ma merie ihe nrite omenala na udo nke Japanese Soka Gakai International University
N'agbata afọ 1971 na afọ 1978, ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị nke Ijipt na Paris ma site na 1979 ruo 1987 ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'otu ọkwa ahụ na Rom, ebe ọ bụkwa onye nduzi nke Egyptian Academy of Arts
N'afọ 1987, a họpụtara Hosny ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Ọdịbendị na Ijipt site n'ọkwa ya na Rom

N'oge ọ nọ n'ọkwa, ọ gbasaa ebe ngosi nke gọọmentị ma malite mmemme ọdịbendị dị iche iche, gụnyere Horizon One Gallery, Palace of Arts, Gezira Arts Center, Alexandria Center of Arts, Modern Dance Troupe and School, Cairo History Rehabilitation Project (nke gụnyere ọtụtụ ụlọ nzukọ ndị Juu), Nubian Museum na Aswan na Alexandria National Museum (nke a na-ewu bụ Grand Egyptian Museum na National Museum of Civilisation na Fustat) na Cultural Development Fund
N'afọ 2005, Hosny nyere onye isi ala Hosni Mubarak akwụkwọ arụkwaghịm ya n'ihi ọkụ Beni Suef Cultural Palace, nke ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri iri anọ na asatọ nwụrụ ma merụọ ndị ọzọ ahụ
Mubarak jụrụ ịgba arụkwaghịm Hosny, na nzaghachi maka arịrịọ nke ihe dị ka ndị ọgụgụ isi narị anọ dị elu
Oge Hosny dị ka Minista nke Ọdịbendị kwụsịrị n'ihi mgbanwe ọchịchị Ijipt nke afọ 2011
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2011, gọọmentị na-anọchi anya Ijipt họpụtara prọfesọ Mahadum Cairo Emad Abu Ghazi ka ọ bụrụ onye isi
N'ajụjụ ọnụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na Nọvemba 2006, Hosny katọrọ isi hijab, na-akpọ ya 'na-alaghachi azụ'
Ọ gbakwụnyere na ọ bụ 'nzọụkwụ azụ maka ụmụ nwanyị Ijipt,' nakwa na 'ụmụ nwanyị nwere ntutu mara mma dị ka okooko osisi ma ekwesighi ikpuchi ha'

N'ihi okwu ya, Hosny nwetara nkatọ siri ike site n'aka ndị siri ike, ọkachasị site n'etiti ndị Islamist Muslim Brotherhood, na ndị otu otu narị na iri atọ nke ndị omeiwu Ijipt kpọrọ oku ka ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm

Hosny enyochala ụfọdụ mgbasa ozi na ihe nkiri, gụnyere ịmachibido egwu egwu egwu egwu na ijide ndị na-akwado ya, yana ịmachibide ihe nkiri Israel The Band's Visit ka a ghara igosi ya na Cairo International Film Festival

Na Julaị 30, 2007, Egypt họpụtara Hosny ka ọ nọchie Koichiro Matsuura dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) wee malite mkpọsa iji họpụta ya n'ọkwa ahụ
Ọ dịghị onye Arab nọbu n'ọkwa ahụ

A na-ewere Hosni dị ka onye ga-emeri na ntuli aka nke Septemba 2009, mana nkwa ya na Mee 2008 ịgba akwụkwọ Israel ọkụ n'ọbá akwụkwọ ndị Ijipt kpalitere obi abụọ banyere iru eru ya maka ọnọdụ ahụ ma mee ka mmegide megide nnọchiteanya ya sie ike
Ndị ọkà mmụta atọ na ndị na-eme ihe ike nke ndị Juu bụ Bernard-Henri Lévy, Claude Lanzmann, na Elie Wiesel mere mkpọsa iji megide nhọpụta Hosny
N'akwụkwọ ozi e degaara mba ụwa na Mee 2009, mmadụ atọ ahụ katọrọ na mmeri Hosny 'ga-abụ ihe doro anya na-akpali akpali nke megidere echiche UN nke UNESCO na-agaghị agbake
' Ha rịọrọ, 'Anyị ga-arịọ, n'egbughị oge, arịrịọ na akọ na uche onye ọ bụla ka ọ ghara ịdaba n'aka nwoke, mgbe ọ nụrụ okwu 'omenala,' jiri akwụkwọ ọkụ na-azaghachi'

Na Septemba 22, 2009, Hosny meriri na ntuli aka UNESCO na iwe dị egwu na ntuliaka nke ise na nke ikpeazụ nke ntuli aka na onye Bulgaria Irina Bokova, onye nwetara vootu iri atọ na otu ka Hosni nwetara iri abụọ na asaa
Na agba nke anọ nke ịtụ vootu, ndị abụọ ahụ jikọtara na votu iri abụọ na itoolunke ọ bụla
Hosny kwuru na mmeri ya sitere na nrụgide ndị Zionist na otu ndị Juu nwere mmetụta, nke nwere ike na-ezo aka na Lévy, Lanzmann, na Wiesel bụ ndị na-emegide ya
Ọ katọrọ onye nnọchi anya US na UNESCO, David Killion, maka imebi nhọpụta ya wee kwuo, 'Ebe ugwu ga-achịkwa ndịda mgbe niile'
Farouk al-Fishawy (Arabic; 5 Febụwarị 1952 - 25 Julaị 2019) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn
A maara ya maka Al-Mashbouh (1981)
A mụrụ ya dịka Mohamed Farouk al-Fishawy na Sirs El-Layan, Monufia Governorate n'abalị 5 ọnwa February afọ 1952
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụnne ya nwoke atọ na ụmụnne ya nwanyị abụọ
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu na nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye Rashad al-Fishawy lekọtara ya ma zụlite ya
Ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na ọgwụ n'ozuzu ma tupu nke ahụ ọ natara nzere bachelụ nke nka na Mahadum Ain Shams
Ọ malitere ọrụ nka ya n'afọ ndị 1970 ma mee ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe karịrị nkiri 130, gụnyere al-Qatila (1991), al-Tufan (1985), al-Rasif (1993), Mutarada Fi al-Mamnu (1993), Ghadan Sa'antaqem (1980), Hanafy al-Obaha (1990), La Tasalni Man Ana (1984), Siriyun Lilghaya (1986), Nessa Khalf al-Qodban (1986), Qahwat al-Muaridi (1981), el-Mar'a el-Hadeya (1987), Fatat Israel al-Hade (19999), Makhacitation (1992) na Hebir
Al-Fishawy lụrụ nwanyị ugboro atọ
Nwunye mbụ ya bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Samia al-Alfi, site n'afọ 1972 ruo mgbe ha gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1992
Ha nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Omar na Ahmed
Nwunye ya nke abụọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Soheir Ramzi; ha lụrụ n'afọ 1992 ma kewaa mgbe afọ ise gasịrị, wee gbaa alụkwaghịm
Nwunye ya nke atọ bụ onye na-abụghị onye a ma ama, Nouran Mansor ma kewaa n'afọ 1998
Ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Laila Elwi nwekwara mmekọrịta, mana ọ lụghị ya
N'abalị 3 ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2018, Farouk al-Fishawy, mgbe ọ natasịrị ọta site na Alexandria International Film Festival, mara ọkwa na ya nwere kansa
Al-Fishawy nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa imeju n'abalị 25 ọnwa Julaị afọ 2019 mgbe ọ dị afọ 67

Farouk Yahaya (A mụrụ Jn'ụbọchị ise nke ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1966) bụ a onyeisi ndị ọchịagha nke Ndị agha Naijiria na onye isi ndị agha nke ugbu a nke President Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa n'afọ 2021 mgbe onye isi nke ọrụ ndị agha, Ibrahim Attahiru nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọelu Beechcraft King Air 350i dara na nso ọdụ ụgbọ elu Kaduna
Onyeisi ndị ọchịagha Farouk Yahaya bụ onye otu 37 Regular Course nke Ụlọ mmụta ndị agha ngbachite nke Naijiria nke dị na Kaduna
Amụrụ Farouk Yahaya n'ụbọchị nke ise nke ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1966 na Mpaghara gọọmentị obodo Sifawa, Bodinga nke Sokoto Steeti

Ọ bụ onye otu 37 Regular Course nke Ụlọ mmụta ndị agha ngbachite nke Naijiria (NDA), bidoro ọzụzụ cadet ya n'ụbọchị iri abụọ n'asaa nke ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 1985, e nyekwara ya ọrụ na Infantry Corps nke ndị agha Naijiria n'ụbọchị iri abụọ n'abụọ nke ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 1990

Yahaya ejeela ozi n'ọtụtụ ọkwa, gụnyere ọchịagha Garrison nke ndị Ndị nche brigade, ndị ọrụ nke ndị agha na kọleji ndị ọrụ (AFCSC), osote onye isi nke isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha na ngalaba nke ndị odeakwụkwọ ndị agha, osote onye isi ndị agha na nyocha na onye isi ndị ọrụ, Isi ụlọ ọrụ Joint Task Force ọrụ Pulo Shield
O jekwara ozi dị ka onye isi onye isi ndị ọrụ nke Mịnịsta nke Nchekwa
Tupu a họpụta ya dịka onye isi ndị ọchịagha, Yahaya ejekwala ozi dịka onye isi ọchịagha na-achịkwa ngalaba nke mbụ
Ọrụ ikpeazụ nke Lt Gen Faruk Yahaya bụ onye ọchịagha ihe nkiri maka Operation HADIN KAI, onye na-ahụ maka iyi ọha egwu na mbuso agha ọgụ na mgbago ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria
N'ọnwa Julai afọ 2021, Achọrọ Yahaya mma dịka Lieutenant general site n'aka onye isi ala bụ Muhammad Buhari
Yahaya lụrụ nwanyị ma nwee ụmụ anọ
Farzam Tavassoli mụrụ na March 10, 1991 na Tehran na Iran
Ọ bụ onye Iran na-agụ abụ na onye na -ede abụ
Ọmụmụ MBA na Art Marketing na akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ n'ọhịa nke njikwa egwu Iranian nke isiokwu ya bụ Nyocha nke Brand iguzosi ike n'ihe na ndị na-abụ abụ na ụlọ ọrụ egwu Iranian site na netwọkụ mmekọrịta
Uwe bụ ụdị ngosipụta onwe onye na nnwere onwe na otu oge na ebe na n'otu ọnọdụ, nke uwe, akpụkpọ ụkwụ, ụdị ndụ, ngwa, ihe ntecha, ntutu isi, na ọnọdụ ahụ
Okwu a na-egosi ọdịdị nke ụlọ ọrụ ejiji kọwara dị ka nke na-eme ihe
Ihe niile a na-ewere dị ka ejiji dị ma bụrụ nke usoro ejiji (ụlọ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi) na-ewu ewu
Na iburu na uche ịrị elu nke mmepụta buru ibu nke ngwaahịa na uwe na ọnụahịa dị ala na iru ụwa, nkwado aghọwo nsogbu dị ngwa n'etiti ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ụdị, na ndị na-azụ ahịa
Ụdị okwu French, nke pụtara 'ọdịdị', malitere laa azụ na 1482, ebe okwu Bekee nke na-egosi ihe 'n'ụdị' malitere naanị na narị afọ nke iri na isii
Okwu ndị ọzọ dị na-emetụta echiche nke ụdị na ịrịọ arịrịọ nke na-esote ọnọdụ

Na narị afọ nke iri na abụọ na nke iri na atọ nke Old French echiche nke ịma mma malitere ịpụta na ihe gbasara mmasị ndị aristocratic iji bulie ịma mma na ngosipụta dị mma, na cointerie, echiche nke ime ka onwe gị mara mma karịa ndị ọzọ site na ụdị ma ọ bụ nkà na ejiji na ejiji, pụtara na uri nke narị afọ nke 13 nke Guillaume de Lorris na-adụ ndị ikom ọdụ na 'uwe mara mma na ngwa mara mma na-eme ka nwoke dịkwuo mma'
Onye ọkà mmụta ejiji Susan B
Kaiser na-ekwu na onye ọ bụla 'na-amanye ya ịpụta', na-enweghị onye na-eso ndị ọzọ
A na-enyocha onye ọ bụla site na ejiji ha, nyocha ahụ na-agụnye ịtụle agba, ihe, ọdịdị, na otu uwe si apụta n'ahụ
Uwe ndị yiri ibe ha na ụdị na ihe ndị e ji mee na-adịkwa iche dabere na ọdịdị ahụ onye na-eyi ya, ma ọ bụ ma a sachara uwe ahụ, fụchie ya, dozie ya, maọ bụ ọ bụ ọhụrụ
A na-akọwa ejiji na ọtụtụ ụzọ dị iche iche, na itinye ya n'ọrụ nwere ike ịbụ ihe na-edochaghị anya mgbe ụfọdụ
Ọ bụ ezie na okwu ejiji na-egosi ọdịiche, dịka na ' ejiji ọhụrụ nke oge', ọ nwekwara ike ịpụta otu, dịka ọmụmaatụ na-ezo aka na 'ejiji nke afọ 1960', na-egosi otu ihe na ozuzu
Uwe nwere ike igosi ihe ọhụrụ, mana ọ nwere ike na-ezo aka na ejiji nke oge gara aga, na-eduga na ịpụtaghachi nke ejiji site n'oge dị iche

Ọ bụ ezie na enwere ike ịkọwa ihe na-ewu ewu site n'aka ndị na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla, ndị a na-akwanyere ùgwù na ndị bara ọgaranya na-eme ka ha yie ihe pụrụ iche, dị ka ụlọ ejiji na ndị na-emepụta ejiji dị elu, a na-emekarị 'ọdịdị' a site na ịdọrọ ihe ndị sitere na subcultures na ndị otu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bụ ndị a na ya, ma si otú a wepụ ha ime ọdịiche nke ihe bụ ejiji na onwe ha

Ọ bụ ezie na omume na-egosipụtakarị ngosipụta mara mma pụrụ iche, nke na-adịkarị mkpụmkpụ karịa oge ma bụrụ nke a na-ahụ anya, ejiji bụ ngosipụta pụrụ iche na nke ụlọ ọrụ na-akwado nke na-ejikọta ya na oge ejiji na nchịkọta
Style bụ okwu na-adịgide na otụtụ oge ma na-ejikọkarị ya na omenala ọdịbendị na akara mmekọrịta, akara, klas, na ọdịbendị (dị ka Baroque na Rococo)
Dị ka ọkà mmụta mmekọrịta ọha na eze Pierre Bourdieu si kwuo, ejiji na-egosi 'ihe dị iche kachasị ọhụrụ'
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ejikarị okwu ejiji, uwe na ejiji eme ihe ọnụ, ejiji dị iche na ha abụọ
Uwe na-akọwa ihe na uwe teknụzụ, na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla ma ọ bụ njikọ ọ bụla; ejiji abụrụla uwe mara mma ma ọ bụ uwe masquerade
Na uzọ dị iche, ejiji na-akọwa usoro mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nke na-emetụta ma 'na-eme' ejiji dị ka ihe na-egosi mmekọrịta mmadụ na oge na ọnọdụ ụfọdụ

Onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Giorgio Agamben jikọtara ejiji na echiche ndị Gris oge ochie nke kairos, nke pụtara 'oge ziri ezi, nke dị oke egwu, ma ọ bụ nke kwesịrị ekwesị', na uwe na echiche nke oge, njirimara nke oge ma ọ bụ oge
Ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ ụdị pụrụ iche nwere ike ịsị na akara haute couture, okwu ahụ bụ naanị ndị otu Chambre Syndicale de la Haute Couture na Paris
Uwe ejiji dị elu bụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị; nke sitere na nka na ọdịbendị, na n'ọtụtụ ọnọdụ, echekwara maka ndị isi akụ na ụba
Uwe bụkwa isi iyi nke nka, na-enye ndị mmadụ ohere igosipụta mmasị na ejiji ha pụrụ iche
Ndị na-emepụta ejiji dị iche iche na-emetụta ihe ndị dị n'èzí ma gosipụta mkpali a na ọrụ ha
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, jeans 'na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ' nke Gucci nwere ike ịdị ka ntụ ntụ ahịhịa, mana nye ndị ọzọ, ha na-egosipụta ịdị ọcha, ịdị ọhụrụ, na oge okpomọkụ
Uwe bụ ihe pụrụ iche, na-emezu onwe ya ma nwee ike ịbụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke njirimara mmadụ
N'otu aka ahụ na nka, ebumnuche nke nhọrọ mmadụ na ejiji abụghị ka onye ọ bụla nwee mmasị na ya, kama ọ bụ ka ọ bụrụ ngosipụta nke mmasị onwe onye
Ụdị onwe onye nke mmadụ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka 'ọzụzụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na-ejikọta ụkpụrụ abụọ dị iche iche mgbe niile
Ọ bụ ụzọ ọha na eze nabatara ma dị nchebe iji mee ka mmadụ dị iche na ndị ọzọ ma, n'otu oge ahụ, ọ na-egbo mkpa onye ahụ maka mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na iṅomi

' Ọ bụ ezie na onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Immanuel Kant kwenyere na ejiji 'enweghị ihe jikọrọ ya na ezi ikpe nke ụtọ', kama ọ bụ 'ihe gbasara iṅomi na-enweghị atụ na 'enweghị anya', onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya Georg Simmel chere na ejiji bụ ihe 'nyere aka imeri anya dị na etiti mmadụ na ọha mmadụ ya'
Mgbanwe na uwe na-emekarị na oge mgbanwe akụ na ụba ma ọ bụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, dịka ọ mere na Rom oge ochie na Caliphate nke oge ochie, ogologo oge na-enweghị mgbanwe dị ịrịba ama sochiri

Na narị afọ nke asatọ nke Moorish Spain, onye na-agụ egwú Ziryab webatara na Córdoba [isi iyi a na-apụghị ịdabere na ya] ụdị ejiji dị mgbagwoju anya dabere na ejiji oge na nke kwa ụbọchị site na obodo ya bụ Baghdad, nke sitere na ike mmụọ nsọ ya gbanwere
Mgbanwe ndị yiri nke ahụ mere na narị afọ nke 11 na Middle East mgbe ndị Turks rutere, bụ ndị webatara ụdị ejiji site na Central Asia na Far East
The Fashion Museum (nke a maara tupu afọ 2007 dị ka Museum of Costume) dị na Ụlọ Nzukọ na Bath, Somerset, England
Doris Langley Moore malitere nchịkọta ahụ, onye nyere obodo Bath uwe ya n'afọ 1963
Ebe ngosi nka ahụ na-elekwasị anya na uwe ejiji maka ụmụ nwoke, ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka site na ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na isii ruo taa ma nwee ihe karịrị ihe puku narị
Ihe ndị mbụ bụ uwe elu na uwe aka ndị a chọrọ mma site n'ihe dị ka otu puku na narị isii
Ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ na-anabata ihe dị ka ndị ọbịa narị puku kwa afọ
Kwa afọ site na nhiwe ya na 1963, a gwara onye ọkachamara n'ihe ejiji onwe ya ka ọ họrọ uwe maka ịbanye n'akụkụ a nke nchịkọta

Ndị na-emepụta ihe ndị ọrụ ha na-anọchite anya gụnyere Mary Quant, John Bates, Ossie Clark, Jean Muir, Bill Gibb, Giorgio Armani, John Galliano, Ralph Lauren, Alexander McQueen, Donatella Versace na Alber Elbaz
N'afọ 2019, National Trust, onye nwe Ụlọ Nzukọ, gosipụtara nkwekọrịta nkwụsị na nkwekọrịta ihe ngosi nka iji mee ohere maka ihe ngosi nka ọhụrụ gbasara Georgian Bath
Ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ kwupụtara na ọ ga-ahapụ Ụlọ Nzukọ na Machị 2023 ma chọọ ụlọ ọhụrụ
Ana akpọ ebe ngosi nka ejiji dị ka ebe ma ọ bụ ngalaba na-egosipụta nnukwu nchịkọta nke ngwa ma ọ bụ uwe
E nwere ụfọdụ mkpokọta na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie akwa
Ihe atụ ndị a ma ama gụnyere ebe ngosi ngwa ihe nkiri nke Canada, ụlọ ngosi nka ejiji, Bath, Musée Galliera na Paris, na ụlọ ngosi nka ejiji nke Province nke Antwerp MoMu
Ebe ngosi nka mba nwere nnukwu nchịkọta ejiji gụnyere Victoria na ụlọ ngosi nka ejiji nke Albert na London
Metropolitan Museum of Art na New York nwere nchịkọta nke ihe karịrị uwe puku iri asaa na ise na ngwa

Ụlọ ngosi ọzọ dị na London bụ ụlọ ngosi nka ejiji na akwa , nke onye na-emepụta Zandra Rhodes guzobere na 2003, na naanị ebe ngosi nka na Britain raara onwe ya nye igosi mmepe na ejiji nke oge a, yana inye mkpali, nkwado na ọzụzụ maka ndị na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

Fasil Assefa Beyene (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ịrị abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1984) bụ onye Etiopia na-ese ihe nke a maara maka isiokwu ya kachasị mkpa bụ hustle and bustle of Merkato, na igosipụta nka pop nke Etiopia site na eserese ya
A nabatara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya udo site na Universal Peace Foundation, na Inter Religious and International Federation for World Peace
A mụrụ ya na Addis Abeba nye Asnakech Degefu na Assefa Beyene, ọ tolitere na gburugburu ebe obibi dị ka nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ ịrị na otu
Mgbe Assefa bụ nwata ma ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Abedissa, ọ na-enwe mmasị mgbe niile na eserese Jizọs nke dị n'ụlọ ndị agbata obi ya ma na-agbalị mgbe niile imegharị ya
Ọ na-agakarị njem
Talent Assefa na eserese na-enwu gbaa mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị nke mere ka ọ họrọ eserese dị ka ụzọ ọrụ

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'afọ 2001, ọ debara aha ya na Master Abyssinian fine Art na ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ ọrụ aka mgbe ahụ ọ nwetara diplọma ya n'afọ 2002 site na ngalaba eserese mgbe ahụ ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nweta asambodo site na Abyssinia fine Art na ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ ọrụ aka n'afọ 2003

Mgbe e mesịrị, Assefa nọgidere na-ese ihe ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi nka, wee gaa n'ihu na-amụ ihe na Addis Ababa University School of Fine Arts na imewe site na 2005–2007; n'ikpeazụ, ọ dị njikere igosipụta ihe ngosi nka mbụ ya nke e mere na Imperial Hotel na Addis abeba n'okpuru aha Colors of the Millennium, Colors of Millennium ngosi emeghewo ọnụ ụzọ maka Fasil dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise ma site na nke ahụ gaa n'ihu, Assefa malitere ịghọ onye na-ese ihe osise oge niile ma gosipụta ihe ngosi nka
Fast Food Nation The Dark Side of the All-American Meal bụ akwụkwọ edere n’afo Puku abuo na otu (2001) nke onye odee akwukwo bù Eric Schlosser dere

Nke mbụ Rolling Stone dere na 1999, akwụkwọ ahụ emeela ka e jiri ya tụnyere akwụkwọ akụkọ Upton Sinclair nke afo Otu Puku na isii (1906) The Jungle A gbanwere akwụkwọ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri emerge n’afo Puku abuo na isii (2006) nke otu aha ahụ, nke Richard Linklater duziri

Fat Land How Americans Became the Fattest People in the World bù akwukwo edere n’afo Puku abuo na ato (2003) bụ akwụkwọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke onye odee akwukwo bù Greg Critser na akọwa etu 60% nke ndị Amerika si buru oke ibu, mana - nyochaa mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ịrị elu na ụlọ ọrụ nri ngwa ngwa na ịbawanye ogo na nri ndị Amerịka, yana iwu gọọmentị na agụmakwụkwọ na ụkọ nri na akwụkwọ
Onye nkatọ na-akọwa ihe ize ndụ ahụike ụfọdụ metụtara oke ibu na nri dị ngwa
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-ekpuchi ụfọdụ n'ime otu isiokwu ahụ dị ka Eric Schlosser's Fast Food Nation (2001), mana ọ n’ agbasawanye ụgwọ ahụike nke oke ibu nye ụmụaka na ndị okenye
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya n'afọ 1953 ma duzie ọtụtụ ndị egwu gụnyere Ebenezer Obey na onye nwụrụ anwụ Orlando Owoh
A maara ya maka nkà ya n'ịkpọ ụbọ akwara, ihe ikpeazụ Rolling Dollar kụrụ bụ 'Won Kere Si Number Wa'
N'afọ 1957, o guzobere otu egwu asatọ a na-akpọ Fatai Rolling Dollar na African Rhythm Band, ha dekwara ọtụtụ egwu asaa maka Phillips West Africa Records
Ọ nwụrụ n'udo n'ụra ya
E liri ya na Ikorodu, Lagos Ọ bụ onye na-ese egwu kacha ochie na Naịjirịa
Fate Tola Geleto (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1987) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-asọ mpi na asọmpi marathon
Ọ nọchitere anya Ethiopia na IAAF World Half Marathon Championships ma merie marathon na Thessaloniki na Vienna
Ọ bi na mba Germany ma soro Irina Mikitenko na-ọzụzụ̀
Kemgbe afọ 2012, ọ na-asọmpi nye klọb German MTV Braunschweig
Otu n'ime ihe ndị mbụ ọ pụtara bụ Great Ethiopian Run n'onwa Nọvemba 2008, ebe ọ gbara nke anọ n'azụ Teyba Erkesso n'elu kilomita iri
O mere mpụtara nke mbụ ya na Alexander the Great Marathon n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2009 ma merie na mgbalị mbụ ya, na-ewere aha otutu ụmụ nwanyị n'ime awa 2 36 54
Ljubljana Marathon n'ọnwa Ọktoba bụ nke abụọ ọ gara n'ihu n'ebe ahụ ma ọ bụ nke anọ, mana ọ meziwanyere oge kachasị mma ya site na nkeji na ọkara
Ọ nọchitere anya ndị uwe ojii Oromia na Sululta Cross Country na mbido afọ 2010 wee gbaa onye nke anọ
Ọ kwalitere marathon ya nke ọma na Marathon Rome nke afọ ahụ, were nkeji ise n'ime elekere 2 28 54, wee merie Paderborner Osterlauf 10K n'oge na-adịghị anya
A họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Etiopia na 2010 IAAF World Half Marathon Championship na Nanning na Ọktọba wee bịa na nke asaa, na-esetịpụ ihe kacha mma nke awa 1 09 38 maka idi anya ya

Ọsọ ikpeazụ ya kacha n'afọ ahụ bịara na Marathon Turin wee mekwaa ọzọ ọ ghọrọ asọmpi nwanyị abụọ n'etiti Tola na Priscah Jeptoo na agbanyeghị na ọ bụ onye Kenya na-ama ya aka na-ekwenye na mmeri, Tola gbara ọsọ nke 2 28 22 kacha mma
awa dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ

Oge afọ 2011 ya malitere site na njedebe nke abụọ na Berlin Half Marathon Nke a bụ nkwadebe ya maka Vienna City Marathon na n'ọsọ ahụ ọ meriri ndị mbido Peninah Arusei na Ana Dulce Felix iji merie na nke anọ n'usoro nke elekere 2 26 21 Usoro a bịara na njedebe na Ọktoba Frankfurt Marathon ka oge ya nke awa 2 27 18 wetara ya ọnọdụ nke asaa
Ọ gbachitere aha ya na Vienna Marathon n'afọ 2012 wee bịaruo nso na nke kachasị mma ya na ọsọ nke 2 26 39 awa
Ọnọdụ nke ise na 2012 Berlin Marathon hụrụ ka ọ meziwanye oge ahụ ruo awa2 25 14
Fatema Chebchoub (1952 August 9, 2006), nke a maara site na aha egwu ya, Al-Chebchouba, bụ onye Moroccan agụmakwụkwọ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, onye na'eme ihe ọchị, onye na -ede uri
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Moroccan mbụ dere ma duzie ihe nkiri ihe nkiri, yana otu n'etiti mmadụ ole na ole na-etinye ihe nketa ihe nkiri ọdịnala na mmepụta ya
Chebchoub jiri ikpo okwu ya kwurịta okwu ndị dịka nrụrụ aka, nha nhata nwoke na nwanyị, ịgụ na ide nke ụmụ nwanyị, na ikpe na-ezighị ezi
A mụrụ Chebchoub n'afọ 1952
Nne na nna ya, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke ụdị egwu Moroccan a ma ama nke a maara dịka Hlaqa (halaqa) na Arabic, nke bụ ụdị akụkọ ọha na eze, nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obere
Chebchoub alụghị di ma biri naanị ya
Njem ọ na-eme ugboro ugboro na ụdị ndụ ya mere ka a kpọọ ya 'al-Roumi' ma ọ bụ 'onye ọdịda anyanwụ' site n'aka ezinụlọ ya
Chebchoub malitere ime ihe nkiri dịka nwatakịrị n'afọ ndị 1960 ma duzie mmepụta mbụ ya n'afọ 1980
O mechara gaa n'ihu na-ede ma na-eme ihe ngosi otu nwanyị
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị a zụrụ azụ Hlaqia, onye dị n'etiti n'ụdị ọdịnala nke ịkọ akụkọ ọha na eze a maara dịka
Hlaqa
Ọ rụrụ Hlaqas ya ma ọ bụ ị ka onye na-eme ihe n'onwe ya ma ọ bụrụ na ya na ndị agha ya nke a maara ị ka ASYAS

Ụdị Hlaqa nwere njikọ na echiche nke halaqa, nke sitere na okwu Arabic maka mgbaaka ma ọ bụ okirikiri, nke a na-ejikwa akọwa nzukọ okpukpe maka ọmụmụ Islam na ịgụ kor'an (mgbe ndị mmadụ na-anọdụkarị na okirikiri)
Ọrụ Hlaqa nke Chebchoub gụnyere ihe ngosi a na-akpọ Chkouf al-Gars, Al-Matmora, Al-Abbacia na Moulat Sserr
Moulat Sserr, nke e mechara kpọwa Tamawayt, bụ ọrụ ya a ma ama
Ọ gara mba ụwa iji mee ya na mba ndị dịka Australia, United States, na Syria
Chebchoub nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 53 na Skhirat, nso Rabat, n'ihe mberede igwu mmiri, n'ọnwa August 9, 2006
Fatema Abdul Majeed Hameed Gerashi, (amụrụ na 26 Machị 1986), bụ onye na-egwu mmiri na Bahraini
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nọchitere anya Bahrain na Olimpik
Ọ nọchitere anya mba ya na 2000 Summer Olympics na Sydney, na-asọmpi na asọmpi mita 50 nke ụmụ nwanyị
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ọ bụ onye kachasị nta na asọmpi nke ihe omume ọ bụla na mba ọ bụla na Sydney Games

Ọ gwụchara ọsọ ahụ na oge nke 5115, na-emecha ihe karịrị sekọnd iri na abụọ n'ihu Paula Barila Bolopa nke Equatorial Guinea, mana a napụrụ ya ikike, a kọrọ na ọ na-agbagharị na blọk mmalite, nke a na-ewere dị ka mmalite ụgha n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụghị onye asọmpi mbụ ịbanye na mmiri
The Times toro ya 'mmụọ Olimpik' na ya 'ọsọ obi ike, nke nwere nkà na ụzụ'
The Guardian n'otu aka ahụ toro òkè ya dị ka ihe kwekọrọ na 'ezi mmụọ nke Olimpik'
The Daily Telegraph kọwara ya dị ka 'onye ọsụ ụzọ maka ụmụ nwanyị Alakụba Arab na egwuregwu ebe iwepụ uwe nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-akpata nsogbu okpukpe na ọdịbendị

Ọ bụ, n'ezie, - ya na onye na-agba ọsọ Mariam Mohamed Hadi Al Hilli- otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ na-asọmpi na-anọchite anya Bahrain na Olimpik - ọ bụ ezie na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ agbaala asọmpi maka Bahrain na track and field na Paralympic Games na 1984
Ejike Camillus Anthony Ebenezer Mbaka nke a maara dị ka Nna Mbaka bụ onye ụkọchukwu Katọlik, onye na-eti egwu na onye guzobere Adoration Ministries, Enugu, Nigeria
A maara ya maka ịbụ otu n'ime ndị isi okpukpe a ma ama na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa
A mụrụ Mbaka na Amata Ituku na Awgu Local Government Area nke Enugu State, ebe ya na ezinụlọ ya bụ ndị na-etinye mmanya nkwụ tolitere
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị St
Vincent, Agbogugu na Awgu Local Government Area nke Enugu State maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndary ya
Mbaka gara Seat of Wisdom Seminary, Owerri, Imo State na St Josephīs Seminary Ikot Ekpene na Akwa Ibom State, ebe a zụrụ ya maka ọrụ ụkọchukwu
Na 29 Julaị 1995, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ụkọchukwu nke Chọọchị Roman Katọlik, n'usoro nke Melchizedek

Na 31 Disemba 2014, Mbaka gwara ọgbakọ na onye isi ala nke oge ahụ bụ Goodluck Ebele Jonathan enweghi ike igbochi oke enweghị nchebe na nrụrụ aka na mba ahụ, ma gbaa ha ume ka ha tụgharịa vootu maka nchịkwa
Arịrịọ Fr
Mbaka maka mgbanwe na nchịkwa na-agbakọta na ozi amụma ya
Mbaka anọwo na-eduzi, na-adụ ọdụ ma na-adọ aka ná ntị na nchịkwa ọ bụla na Naịjirịa kemgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ụkọchukwu Roman Katọlik
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel 2021, Mbaka kpọrọ Onye isi ala Buhari ka ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm n'ọfịs ya n'ihi enweghị nchebe na-akawanye njọ na Naịjirịa

N'ịzaghachi oku Mbaka, Onye isi ala Naijiria wepụtara nkwupụta site na Garba Shehu na Mbaka na-ekwu na iwe ji n'ihi na Onye isi ala Buhari leghaara arịrịọ ya maka nkwekọrịta anya mgbe ọ rịọrọ maka nkwekọ dịka ụgwọ maka nkwado ya na 2015 na 2019
E kwuru na e nwere ihe omume nke asọmpi, na étíti father Mbaka na father Ebube Muonso, mana ndị Reverend Fathers Mbaka na Emmanuel Obimma(Ebube Muonso gbaghaara asịrị ụgha a
Fathi Hassan (Arabic) (amụrụ na 10 Mee 1957) bụ onye Ijipt, onye Omenkà bire na Ịtali nke a maara maka ntinye ya metụtara okwu edere
A na-ewere Fathi Hassan dị ka onye na-ese ihe n'Africa na Muslim kacha mkpa n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nkà ọgbara ọhụrụ na nke oge a
A mụrụ Fathi Hassan na Cairo n'afọ 1957 dị ka nwa nwoke nke abụọ n'ezinụlọ Nubian
Nna ya Hassan bụ onye Sudan na nne ya bụ Fatma si na mpaghara Toshka Lakes na ndịda Ijipt
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Kerabia na Cairo, ebe ọ zutere onye na-akpụ ihe Ghaleb Khater
N'afọ 1979, Hassan natara onyinye site n'aka Italian Cultural Institute na Cairo wee kwaga Naples
Ọ debanyere aha na Accademia di Belle Arti n'afọ 1980 iji mụọ ihe osise
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1984 na edemede banyere mmetụta nke nka Africa na Cubism
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ ma n'afọ mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Hassan rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe na RAI (Radiotelevisione Italiana works) na Naples na Rome
N'afọ 1986, ọ kwagara Pesaro
N'afọ 1989, Hassan bụ onye omenkà mbụ nke ihe nketa Afrịka a kpọrọ na ngalaba 'Aperto' nke 43rd Venice Biennale nke Dan Cameron na Giovanni Carandente haziri
O gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ gallery na Italy, Belgium, Denmark, Germany, France, Egypt, na United States
Ọrụ Hassan na-emekarị ka ike dị ike na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti okwu a na-ekwu na nke edere ede; site na ihe nketa Nubian ya, ọ na-ekwusi ike na ọnwụ nke asụsụ n'okpuru ọchịchị nke ọchịchị
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe odide ya dabere na calligraphy kufic, mana ha ka na-akpachara anya na-agụ akwụkwọ ma ghara ikwe omume ịkọwapụta
Na vidiyo ya Blessed Nubia (2002) bụ nyocha nke asụsụ mbụ nke Nubia
Hassan ebiela ma rụọ ọrụ na Ịtali kemgbe afọ 1979, na-eke oge ya n'etiti Rome, Milan na Fano

Fathi Uraybi (15 Machị 1942 - 2 Eprel 2015) bụ odee na onye na-ese ihe na Libya
O nyere ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ngalaba; nke gụnyere foto, ime ihe nkiri, agụmakwụkwọ, na imepụta ihe osise
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin Kraassi, nke bụ magazin eletrọniki nke na-atụle oche na akwụkwọ na nka n'asụsụ Arabic, na, mgbe e mesịrị, n'asụsụ ụwa niile
Ọ duziri ma mepụta ihe nkiri isii na mmemme telivishọn asaa, o nyere aka n'ịmepụta ụfọdụ ngalaba nke telivisheneng Libya, ma kwado ihe ngosi iri isii na mpaghara na mba ofesi
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi nke ọmụmụ abụọ na Mahadum Garyounis
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ bụ onye otu ọtụtụ klọb, òtù na òtù
Uraybi gụrụ ọtụtụ ọmụmụ na ngalaba nke ime ihe nkiri na ide ihe

Ọ mụtara banyere ihe nkiri na nhazi na Arri Academy na 1969 na Germany, ide ihe nkiri na iduzi na Visnews na 1978 na London, na ide ihe nkiri n'Arab Center for Radio and Television Training na 1988 na Damascus
Ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ikpeazụ a kụziiri ya kwanyere ya ugwu maka ọrụ ya pụrụ iche
Nke mbụ, Visnews họpụtara ya na mbụ maka ihe nkiri ya, 'Life in Wax,' nke bụ maka ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na London, Madame Tussauds
Nke abụọ, ọ nwetara asambodo ekele na ọdịiche maka ide ihe nkiri 'The Red Flower,' nke bụ ihe nkiri banyere nwata nwoke na-enye ndị mmadụ ọrụ nhicha akpụkpọ ụkwụ ya

Foto na Cinematography N'afọ ndị mbụ ya, Uraybi rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Al-Haqiqa Benghazi, nke o mere afọ anọ, ya bụ, site na 1964 ruo 1968, na mgbe ahụ maka magazin Al-Haditha na obodo Tripoli

Mgbe ahụ, ọ gbanwere gaa n'ọrụ nke ihe nkiri, ebe ọ bụ ọkachamara na mmepụta nke akụkọ akụkọ na ihe nkiri, ma jee ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya Illustration Magazine nke Libya, nke Ngalaba mgbasa ozi na ọdịbendị nke Ministry of Information na Libya wepụtara
Ọzọkwa, ndị na-ahụ maka telivishọn Libya nyere Uraybi ọrụ iji guzobe ngalaba ihe nkiri ya na ụlọ nyocha teknụzụ
Na mgbakwunye, Uraybi haziri ihe karịrị ihe ngosiputa ịrị isii yana ihe ngosi n'ime Libya na mba ofesi

Ọ bụ ole na ole n'ime ihe ngosi ndị a mere n'obodo ndị Arab, dị ka Damascus, Baghdad, Alexandria, Cairo na Tunis, ebe ndị ọzọ nọ n'obodo mba ọzọ, nke gụnyere Athens, Rome, Valletta, Paris, London na Leicester
E mere ihe ngosi mbụ ya na Benghazi 1965, nke so n'ihe omume ndị ọzọ nke Annajma Football Club haziri
Ọtụtụ n'ime onyinye ya n'ọhịa gụnyere iduzi usoro ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi
Nkụzi pụrụ iche Uraybi, kwa, ọkachamara n'agụmakwụkwọ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi na Mahadum Garyounis, ebe ọ kụziri 'Nkwadebe maka mmemme redio na telivishọn' n'afọ 1985, na 'Foto' n'ọnwa 1997
Nka Mgbe ọ nọsịrị ọtụtụ afọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nọrọ onwe ya, Uraybi kpebiri itinye oge ya n'ịhazi ihe ndekọ foto ya ma na-achụso ọrụ ya n'onwe ya n'ọrụ nka na foto
O mepụtara mkpuchi akwụkwọ, ma jiri kọmputa ya mee ihe iji dabere na ihe osise na ụlọ ọrụ nka ya, nke ọ kpọrọ 'Piegonz Nest' n'afọ 1975
O sonyere na mmemme ọdịnala ndị ọzọ, nke gụnyere ihe ndị a
Ọ so n'ọtụtụ otu, ndị enyi na klọb, nke, o kwenyere, na o nweghị mmetụta dị mma na ọrụ edemede na nka ya
O so n'òtù ndị a
Uraybi bipụtara akwụkwọ na mpaghara foto na ihe nkiri, nke gụnyere
Fathia Absie (Somali , Arabic) bụ odee Somali-American, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri,onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe onyonyo
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe ngosi abụọ ahụ, yana akụkọ ifo, ma bipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ a kpọrọ, The Imperceptible Peace Maker

Fathia bụ onye guzobere Eat With Muslims, ọrụ e mere iji mee ka ndị Alakụba na ndị na-abụghị ndị Alakụb gakọta ọnụ n'oge nri abalị na akụkọ na-enwe olileanya iwu àkwà mmiri n'etiti ndị agbata obi na obodo nke okwukwe na ọdịbendị dị iche iche
Absie kwagara Minnesota n'ihe dị ka n' afọ 2010 ma bụrụbu onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ òtù oru nke gụnyere Ngalaba Ọrụ na Ọrụ Ezinụlọ nke Ohio na Columbus, Ohio, Mahadum Washington na Seattle, na Voice of America na Washington DC
Absie na-eme ihe nkiri nke ya, The Lobby, banyere mmekọrịta dị n'etiti nwoke onye ọcha na nwaanyị Somali-American
N'afọ 2013, ọ sonyeere ECHO, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na Minnesota na-ejere obodo ndị mbịarambịa ozi
N'afọ 2011, Absie wepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Broken Dreams, ihe nkiri nke na-enyocha mkpesa mkpesa megide iwebata ndị ntorobịa Somalia na Minnesota site n'aka ndị na-anụbigara okpukpe ọkụ n'obi ókè
Ikpe ahụ wetara nlebara anya a na-achọghị site na gọọmentị US na obodo Somalia na Minnesota na gburugburu mba ahụ
Mgbe ụmụ okorobịa Somalia ahụ furu, FBI malitere nnyocha kachasị ukwuu nke US megide iyi ọha egwu kemgbe ọdachi nke 9/11
N'afọ 2014, Absie bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ eserese, The Imperceptible Peacemaker, site na CreateSpace, ọrụ na-ebipụta onwe ya nke Amazon nwe

Ihe atụ nke ikpe ziri ezi, onye dike ya, na onye ọgaranya teknụzụ mepụtara uwe nke na-enye ya ikike ịghọ ike a na-adịghị ahụ anya maka ilu ogu megide ọchịchị nchigbu na ikpe na-ezighị ezi gburugburu ụwa

Absie rụkwara ọrụ na Twin Cities PBS ebe ọ kwadoro ọtụtụ mmemme na ihe ngosi, Giving Thanks! Na 2016 Fathia Absie bụ ihe nkiri Drama nke Musa Syeed duziri · Banyere nwa okorobịa onye Alakụba gbara ọsọ ndụ na Minneapolis na nkịta furu efu gafere ụzọ
Absie mere nne Barkhad Abdirahman
https //wwwimdbcom/title/tt5447852/
N'afọ 2015, Absie wepụtara ihe nkiri nke abụọ ya, akụkọ ifo The Lobby, nke ọ pụtara na ya nakwa dee ma duzie
Emere ya na Minneapolis Saint Paul International Film Festival n'ọnwa Eprel nke afọ ahụ
Nke a bụ akụkọ ifo banyere mmekọrịta dị n'etiti nwoke ọcha na nwaanyị Somali-American

Nọvemba n'afo 2017, Absie zutere Barkhad Abdirahman, n'oge a na-eme ya na nne Faysal Ahmed na-eme ihe nkiri Eric Tretbaris, Onye Mbụ Plural A nke oge a Romeo na Juliet, nke Faysal Ahmed bụ onye na-eme na Broadway, Pearce Bunting na ndị ọzọ

Absie malitere mmepụta nke akụkọ a na-akpọ 'Grapes Of Heaven' Nwaanyị Somali-American nwere obi mgbawa na odee jereobere obodo Berbera, Somaliland ebe onye Somalia a ma ama na-ede uri aha ya bụ Bodheri nwụrụ n'ihi obi mgbawa n'afọ ndị 1930
Fati Abubakar bụ onye Naijiria na- agbasa ozi site na foto na idekọ kwa foto
A mụrụ Abubakar ma zụlite kwa ya na Maiduguri, nke Nigeria
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ bụ isi n'ịdekọ ihe ọjọọ dị na Borno, gụnyere ọgụ Boko Haram
O nwere oru ngo a na-akpo Bits of Borno
Fatima Lami Abubakar CON (amụrụ na 12 Eprelụ 1951) bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria bụ onye bụ nwanyị mbụ nke Naijiria n'oge Abdulsalami Abubakar si June 1998 ruo May 1999
Mgbé ọ chịrị dị ka First Lady, Abubakar bụ Chief Judge nke Niger State site na 2013 ruo 2016
A mụrụ Fatima Lami na 12 Eprel 1951 na Minna, Naịjirịa, ma gụchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Queen Elizabeth School na Ilorin Kwara
Ọ gara kọleji na Ilorin tupu ọ gaa Federal Government College, Sokoto, na Mahadụm Ife
N'ọmụmụ ihe post-secondary ya, ọ gụsịrị ọtụtụ nzere na iwu, site na nzere bachelọ ruo Doctor of Philosophy
Abubakar gụchara akwụkwọ ọzọ na Nigeria Law School
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ Naijiria gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum
Abubakar malitere ọrụ ya n'iwu dị ka onye nyocha na onye ndụmọdụ ukwu na Naịjirịa
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye ọka iwu ukwu nke Ngalaba Ikpe nke steeti Niger na 1985 na onye ọka ikpe maka Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu na 1989
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2013, a họpụtara Abubakar ka ọ bụrụ Onye isi ikpe nke steeti Niger
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa a ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọnwa Eprelụ 2016
N'èzí ọrụ iwu ya, Abubakar bụ akụkụ nke nzukọ iwu site na 1988 ruo 1989 na kọmitii wayo ụlọ akụ site na 1989 ruo 1992
Na June 1998, Abubakar ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ nke Naijiria mgbe di ya Abdulsalami Abubakar weghaara ọkwa onye isi ala nke Naijịrịa
Ọchịchị ya dị ka First Lady kwụsịrị na May 1999
N'oge ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ, Abubakar guzobere Women's Rights Advancement and Protection Alternative na 1999, nke na-elekwasị anya na ikike ụmụ nwanyị
E nyerénya SIr Ahmadu Bellow Honours Award maka ọrụ pụrụ iche ọ rụụrụ ụmụ mmadụ, nkwado maka ikike ụmụaka na mkpakọ ụlọ mkpọrọ site na Sir Ahmadu bello Memorial Foundation na Kaduna
Abubakar lụrụ onye bụbu onye isi ala Naịjirịa Abdulsalami Abubakar, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ isii

Fati Mohammed (amụrụ ya na abalị anọ, na onwa nke isii, na afọ 1979) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agba dịka onye na-edebe goolu
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na 2003 FIFA Women's World Cup na 2007 FIFA Women'S World Cup
Na klọb ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Robert Morris College na United States
Fatih Birol bụ onye Turkey na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na ọkachamara na ike, onye jere ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke International Energy Agency (IEA) kemgbe 1 Septemba 2015

N'oge ọ na-elekọta IEA, o meela usoro iji melite nzukọ mba ụwa nke dị na Paris, gụnyere iwusi mmekọrịta ya na akụ na ụba na mba ndị na'ịpụta n'ọhịa dị ka India na China ike na ịrụ ọrụ na mgbanwe ike dị ọcha na mbọ mba niile iji nweta ikuku efu

Birol nọ na ndepụta Time 100 nke ndị kachasị emetụta n'ụwa na 2021, magazin Forbes akpọwo ya aha n'etiti ndị kacha emenye mmetụta nʼihe gbasara ike n 'ụwa' ma Financial Times kwetara na ya na 2017 dị ka Onye Ike nke Afọ
Birol bụ onye isi oche nke World Economic Forum (Davos) Energy Advisory Board
Ọ bụ onye na-enye onyinye ugboro ugboro na mgbasa ozi na kọmputa ma na'inye ọtụtụ okwu kwa afọ na nnukwu nzukọ na nzukọ mba ụwa
Tupu ịbanye na IEA dị ka onye nyocha nke obere na 1995, Birol rụrụ ọrụ na Organisation of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) na Vienna
N'ime ọtụtụ afọ na IEA, Birol rụrụ ọrụ ruo n'ọrụ nke Chief Economist, ọrụ nke ọ na-ahụ maka akụkọ IEA nke World Energy Outlook na-elele anya, tupu ọ ghọọ onye isi nchịkwa na 2015
Nwa amaala Turkey, a mụrụ Birol na Ankara na 1958
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta BSc na injinịa ike na mahadum Istanbul Technical University
O nwetara MSc na PhD na Economic Economics site na Technical University of Vienna
N'afọ 2013, e nyere Birol nzere Doctorate of Science honoris causa site na Imperial College London
Emere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndụ nsọpụrụ nke klọb bọọlụ Galatasaray SK
n'afọ 2013

Fatiha Berber (1945-2015) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri maka ụlọ ihe nkiri na telivishọn, onye ezigbo aha ya bụ Fatiha Blal
A mụrụ Fatiha Berber na Casbah nke Algiers
Ezinụlọ ya si Legata na Boumerdès Province nke Northern Algeria
Na ngwụcha afọ 1950 ọ bụrụ abụ na ndị egwú nke Meriem Fekkaï, tupu ọ mụọ ihe nkiri na Conservatory nke Algiers
Onye nduzi Mustapha Gribi nyere ya ọrụ mbụ ya, na mgbanwe nke Molière, Les femmes savantes
O sonyere na ọgụ nnwere onwe mba Algeria
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị 16 ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2015 na Paris, mgbe ọ nwesịrị nkụchi obi
Fatimé Kimto (nwụrụ na Mee 21, na afọ 2015) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Chad
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ jere ozi n'ọkwa kansụl n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba ahụ
Kimto bụ onye Alakụba si n'akụkụ ndịda nke mba ahụ
A họpụtara ya na kọmitii na afọ 1982, ọ ghọrọ Minista na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ụmụ nwanyị; ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa ahụ ruo na afọ 1984

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro abụọ ọzọ na kansụl n'oge ọrụ ya; ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ọha na eze na ezinụlọ site na afo 1999 ruo n'afọ 2001 na ọzọ site na afo 2004 ruo na afọ 2005, ọ bụkwa Minista na ọrụ ọha na ibe ya, ọrụ, na ọrụ site na n'afọ 2005 ruo n'afọ 2007
N'ọkwa nke abụọ, o kwuru okwu na nzukọ nke Nzukọ Ezumezu nke United Nations na afọ 2000, na-ewere dịka isiokwu ya ịha nhata nke ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị
N'oge ọ malitere ọrụ, ọ bụkwa onye otu politburo nke National Union for Independence and Revolution
Otu n'ime ihe ndị ọ na-echegbu onwe ya mgbe ọ nọ na gọọmentị bụ okwu metụtara ọrụ na ọnọdụ ndị ọrụ na Chad na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na obodo Chad
Kimto nwụrụ na N'Djamena mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa ogologo oge; mgbe ọ nwụrụ, ụmụ anọ hapụrụ ya, Alain, William, Olivier, Chantal na di ya Dongus Kimto
Otú ọ dị, nwanne ya nwoke ọ hụrụ n'anya bụ Onye Ọkachamara
Kimto Ngomdji_ nnukwu onye mgbakọ na mwepụ (onye bi na Naijiria) gakwara n'enweghị ụmụ ise, Johnson, Patricia, Rita, Emmanuel na Blessing
Ọ bụ gọọmentị nọ n'ọchịchị chọpụtara ọnwụ ya
Fatim Jawara (13 Machị na afo 1997 - 27 Ọktoba 2016) bụ onye Gambia na-agba bọọlụ nke gbara bọọlụ maka otu ụmụ nwanyị Gambia na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Gambian Red Scorpions FC
N'afọ 2012, ọ gbara bọọlụ dị ka onye na-anọchi anya onye na-edebe goolu na 2012 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup maka ndị otu mba na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ na-anwa ịgafe Oké Osimiri Mediterenian site n'ụgbọ mmiri gaa Ịtali n'afọ 2016
Jawara gbara bọọlụ maka klọb bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị kachasị elu na Gambia, Red Scorpions FC, nke dị na Serekunda
O mechara bụrụ onye mbụ họọrọ onye na-edebe goolu maka otu ahụ
Jawara nọchitere anya Gambia na ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa na ndị okenye mba
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Gambia na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa, na-eme nke mbụ ya na 2009 wee gaa n'ihu na-egwu na 2012 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup na Azerbaijan
O mere nke mbụ ya maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị n'afọ 2015, ma zọpụta penalty kick na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Glasgow Girls FC
site na Scottish Women's Football League First Division n'oge egwuregwu ahụ
Na Febụwarị na afọ 2016, Jawara hapụrụ ala nna ya Serrekunda na Gambia wee gafee Ọzara Sahara gaa Libya
Ozugbo ọ nọ na Libya, ọ kpọtụrụ ezinụlọ ya wee gwa ha na ọ na-aga Europe ịchọ ọnọdụ na-egwuri egwu maka otu nnukwu klọb Europe
Na ngwụcha Ọktọba na afọ 2016, ọ nwara ịbanye na Europe site na iso ndị ọzọ na-eme njem n'ụgbọ mmiri abụọ gafee Oké Osimiri Mediterenian, na-aga agwaetiti Lampedusa, Ịtali
N'ihi oké ifufe, ụgbọ mmiri ha mikpuru na mmiri riri Jawara
Ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu
A chọpụtara na ọ nọghị mgbe ndị otu mba ahụ ga-egwu Casa Sports FC
site na Senegal dị ka akụkụ nke emume iji mee emume bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị
Ụbọchị ole na ole mgbe ihe mberede ahụ gasịrị, onye ọrụ ahụ kpọtụrụ ezinụlọ ya iji gwa ha na ụgbọ mmiri ahụ adaala, mmiri wee nwụọ ya
Lamin Kaba Bajo, onye isi oche nke Gambia Football Federation, kwuru na otu ahụ 'na-eru uju n'oge a n'ihi na nke a bụ nnukwu mfu nye ndị otu bọọlụ mba na mba ahụ'
Onye bụbu onye otu Jawara bụ Adama Tamba kwuru na ịnụ banyere ọnwụ ya bụ 'ihe mgbu'
Tamba kwuru na Jawara bụ 'onye ya na ya dị nso' nakwa na ọ 'na-adụ ya ọdụ mgbe niile', ọkachasị na asọmpi [] na Baku na 2012'

Fatima-Zohra Oukazi (amụrụ n'imeJenụwarị 18, 1984, n'ime Chlef) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball mba ụwa na onye isi ndị otu volleyball nke ụmụ nwanyị Algeria (2010-2012), na egwu dị ka onye na etinye
Na klọb, o mere nke mbụ ya maka GS Chlef, nke dị n'obodo ya bụ Chlef
Ọ na egwuri egwu ugbu a maka GS Petroliers nke Algiers
Klọb dị ugbu a 2007-GSP dị ugbu a (nke bụbu MCA)

Fatima Abdel Mahmoud (27 Julaị 1944, Omdurman, Sudan 22 Julaị 2018, London, England) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sudanese, onye ndú nke Sudanese Socialist Democratic Union N'afọ 1973, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọkwá ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Sudan, ọ sonyekwara na ntuli aka Sudan n'April 2010 dị ka nwanyị mbụ na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala
A mụrụ Abdel Mahmoud na 27 Julaị 1944
Ọ gụrụ ọgwụ na Moscow, Russia, n'afọ ndị 1960 wee ruo eru dị ka dọkịta na-ahụ maka ụmụaka
N'afọ 1973, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ndị ntorobịa, egwuregwu, na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Nhọpụta a, tinyere nke Sayeda Nafisa Ahmed al Amin dị ka onye otu politburo nke Sudanese Socialist Union na-achị, mere akụkọ mba ụwa n'oge mgbe atụmatụ nke oge a na-etinye ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ nwanyị Sudan na-agụ akwụkwọ na 10%
Abdel Mahmoud jere ozi na ndị omeiwu ruo afọ iri
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, Sudan mere ntuli aka mbụ ya zuru oke (ya bụ, nke mbụ gụnyere ndị na-azọ ọkwa site na pati ndị mmegide) kemgbe afọ 1986

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2010, ụlọ ọrụ Sudanese National Elections Commission jụrụ Abdel Mahmoud maka ịzọ ọkwa onye isi ala, tinyere nke ndị ọzọ abụọ na-achọ ịzọ ọkwa, nke kwuru na mkpọsa Abdel Mahmioud enwetaghị stampụ ndị dị mkpa na ndepụta nke mbinye aka achọrọ na-akwado ịzọ ọkwa ya
Abdel Mahmoud na ndị na-akwado ya mere mkpesa megide mkpebi ahụ, nke ha kọwara dị ka onye nnọchiteanya nke nkata aghụghọ megide ụmụ nwanyị, ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị weghachikwara ya tupu ntuli aka ahụ
Ọtụtụ òtù ndị na-emegide ya mechara kwụsị ntuli aka ahụ, na-azọrọ na e mebiri ya maka onye isi ala Omar al-Bashir
Al-Bashir gara n'ihu merie ntuli aka ahụ n'ụzọ siri ike
Nsonaazụ ntuli aka gosiri na Abdel Mahmoud nwetara 03% nke ngụkọta vootu
O mechara guzo na ntuli aka 2015 na Sudan, ebe ọ bịara nke atọ na ntuliaka onye isi ala na pati ya enwetaghị oche na National Assembly
E nyere ya ihe nrite FAO CERES na 1976
Abdel Mahmoud jere ozi dị ka Onye isi oche UNESCO maka ụmụ nwanyị na sayensị na teknụzụ, nke Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ nke Sudan kwadoro
Ọ nwụrụ na London, England na 22 Julaị 2018, ụbọchị ise tupu afọ 74 ya
Fatima Ahmed Ibrahim (Arabic; c
) bụ onye edemede Sudanese, onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụ nwanyị na onye ndú nke ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A mụrụ Ibrahim na Khartoum
O sitere n'ezinụlọ gụrụ akwụkwọ; nna nna ya bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Sudan mbụ maka ụmụ nwoke yana Imam na ụlọ alakụba dị n'ógbè ya
Nna Fatima gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Gordon Memorial College ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi
Nne Fatima so n'ọgbọ mbụ nke ụmụ agbọghọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Fatima tolitere n'oge ndị Anglo-Egyptian Sudan na-achị
A chụpụrụ nna ya n'ịkụzi ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị mgbe ọ jụrụ ịkụzi ihe site na iji Bekee
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị nna ya kụziri na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzọ
Mgbe ọ malitere na Omdurman Girls' Secondary School, ọ malitere ịkwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị
O mepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mgbidi a na-akpọ Elra'edda, ma ọ bụ na Arabic الرائدة ma ọ bụ n'asụsụ Bekee Pioneer Girls
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya lekwasịrị anya na ikike ụmụ nwanyị ma o dekwara na akwụkwọ akụkọ n'oge ahụ ọzọ n'okpuru aha mkpịsị aka
Fatima duziri ọgbaghara ụmụ nwanyị mbụ na Sudan n'ihi na ndị isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ya kpebiri ịkagbu nkuzi sayensị ma jiri nkuzi 'sayensị ezinụlọ' dochie ha
Ọgbaghara ahụ gara nke ọma

Ọrụ ya gafere ụlọ akwụkwọ; na 1947 o guzobere Òtù Ụmụ nwanyị Intellectual, na 1952 ya na ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ rụkọrọ ọrụ ma guzobe Òtù Ụmụnwaanyị Sudan (SWU, Arabic , transliteration Aletahad Elnees'y Alsodanni), ebe ya na Fatima Talib na Khalida Zahir jere ozi na kọmitii nduzi
Onye isi oche mbụ nke Union bụ Fatima Talib Isma'il
Òtù ụmụ nwanyị meghere ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị niile nọ na Sudan na SWU meghere alaka na mpaghara dị iche iche na Sudan

Ihe omume nke Women's Union n'oge ahụ, dị ka mmezigharị nke iwu ya na 1954, lekwasịrị anya na ikike ịtụ vootu, ikike ụmụ nwanyị nwere, na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ndị nnọchiteanya na ụlọ ọrụ iwu, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na nchịkwa niile
Na SWU, ọ rụkwara ọrụ iji guzobe nha nhata na ụmụ nwoke na ụgwọ ọrụ na ọzụzụ teknụzụ, ma nyere aka wepụ amaghị akwụkwọ n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị
N'ihi ebumnuche SWU, esemokwu na ikike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka Jabihat El-methaiq elaslami ma ọ bụ Islamic Pledge Front

N'afọ 1955, Fatima ghọrọ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke Sawat al-Maraa Magazine ma ọ bụ Woman's Voice Magazine (nke Women's Union bipụtara), magazin a mechara rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịkwatu ọchịchị Ibrahim Abboud
Mgbe ọ nọ na magazin ahụ, Ibrahim na onye edemede na-eto eto na onye otu Communist Party, Suad Ibrahim Ahmed nwere esemokwu
Ha ekwekọrịtaghị nke ukwuu banyere ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị, okpukpe na omume ọma na atụmatụ otu
Ọ bụ ezie na Ibrahim kwenyere na enwere ike iji Islam mee ihe dị ka ike na-aga n'ihu megide ndị na-agbaso okpukpe, Ahmed chọrọ ime ka ọgụ ụmụ nwanyị bụrụ nke ụwa
Ahmed chere na ịnọ n'ime usoro Islam ga-amanye ndị na-aga n'ihu ịlụ ọgụ n'ọhịa ndị iro ha

N'afọ 1954, Fatima sonyeere ndị Sudanese Communist Party (SCP), ma n'oge dị mkpirikpi Fatima ghọrọ onye otu Central Committee nke SCP (SCP bụ ndị Sudanese Party mbụ nwere usoro ụmụ nwanyị n'ime, kemgbe 1946)
N'afọ 1956, Fatima ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Women's Union
Otu n'ime ebumnuche ya bụ maka nnwere onwe nke njikọ ahụ site na njikọ ha na nchịkwa nke SCP, ọ gbasaa ntinye aka nke ụmụ nwanyị nwere nzụlite dị iche iche
N'afọ 1965, a họpụtara Fatima ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu, na-aghọ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị Sudan mbụ

Nsogbu iwu nke sitere na mwepụ iwu na-akwadoghị nke ndị otu SCP a họpụtara site na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na ndị omeiwu Sudan, nke Sadiq al Mahdi duziri, kpatara nnukwu esemokwu n'etiti SCP na Umma Party
N'afọ 1967, Ibrahim bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị anọ a họpụtara na Kọmitii Central nke 33 nke Sudanese Communist Party, tinyere Mahasin Abd al-Aal, Naima Babiker al-Rayah na Suad Ibrahim Ahmed
N'afọ 1969, mgbe Jaafar Muhammad al-Nemieri weghaara ọchịchị n'ọchịchị ndị agha nke SCP kwadoro, ọrụ nke Women's Union gbasaa ma ụmụ nwanyị nwetara ọtụtụ ikike n'akụkụ dị iche iche

Oge ezumike ezumike n'etiti ndị Sudanese Communist Party na Jaafar al-Nemieri kwụsịrị mgbe nnukwu esemokwu nke dugara na July 1971 na nnupụisi ndị agha nke SCP kwadoro nke Hashim Elatta duziri, mana nnupụchi ahụ dara mgbe ụbọchị ole na ole gachara na Nimiri laghachiri n'ọchịchị, nke dugara n'igbu ndị isi nnupụnụ nke SCP, n'etiti ha bụ Alshafi Ahmed Elshikh onye isi ndị ọrụ na di Fatima
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, e jidere Fatima n'ụlọ ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ma jide ya ọtụtụ ugboro n'oge ọchịchị Nemieri
N'afọ 1990, Fatima hapụrụ Sudan mgbe Omar Hassan al-Bashir wepụrụ ọchịchị ndị agha, wee sonye na ndị mmegide na mba ọzọ dị ka onye isi oche nke Sudanese Women's Union a machibidoro iwu
N'afọ 1991, a họpụtara Fatima ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Women's International Democratic Federation
Ọ laghachiri Sudan n'afọ 2005 mgbe nkwekọrịta dị n'etiti gọọmentị na ndị mmegide, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya na nzuko omebe iwu na-anọchite anya SCP
Nwanne ya nwoke bụkwa onye edemede ma tinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Salah Ahmed Ibrahim, o nwere otu nwa nwoke site n'aka di ya Elshafi, aha ya bụ Ahmed
Ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọchịchị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'afọ 2011
Ọ nwụrụ na London na 12 Ọgọst 2017, mgbe ọ dị afọ 84, e mekwara emume olili ozu ya na Khartoum na 16 Ọgọust
A mụrụ ya bu Ibrahim na Khartoum
O sitere n'ezinụlọ gụrụ akwụkwọ; nna nna ya bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Sudan nke izizi maka ụmụ nwoke yanakwa Imam na ụlọ alakụba dị n'ógbè ya
Nna Fatima gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma turu ugo na Gordon Memorial College ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi
Nne Fatima so n'ọgbọ ndị mbụ nke ụmụ agbọghọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Fatima tolitere n'oge ndị Anglo-Egyptian Sudan na-achị obodo A chụpụrụ nna ya n'ịkụzi ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị mgbe ọ jụrụ ịkụzi ihe na asụsụ Bekee
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị nna ya kụziri kwara na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzọ
Fatima Akilu bu onye Naijiria bụ ọkà mmụta n'akparamàgwà mmadụ, bụrụkwa onye na-ekwu okwu n'ọhaneze n'ihe gbasara Preventing and Countering Violent Extremism (CVE) and Counter-Terrorism

Ọ bụ Ezekutiv Daịrektọ nke Neem Foundation ugbua, na onye bụbu ntụzịaka gbasara nnyocha akparamaagwa na nkwukọrịta okwu n'ụlọ ọrụ nke National Security Adviser na Naịjirịa, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Countering Violence Extremism Programme n'afo 2014
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Global Strategy Network ya na ọkachamara ụlọ ọrụ Richard Barrett na ndị ọzọ
Fatima bụkwa onye na-ede akwụkwọ ụmụaka, yana onye mmekọ nke Women Alliance for Security Leadership (WASL)
A mụrụ ya nye Ali Akilu (onye ugwu bụ ode akwụkwọ nwụgoro nke ngwụcha ugwu) na Hajia Astajam
Akilu gụrụ akwụkwọ na Beechwood Sacred Heart School, Tunbridge Wells
O nwere nzere PhD na MRes na Psychology na Mahadum nke Reading, dị na United Kingdom na nzere BA na Bekee na Psychology sitere na Mahadum nke Mount St
Mary (Los Angeles)

Fatima Akilu bu onye oka mmuta nke NHS na fọrịnzik saịkọlọji, bu onye okacha amara n’agwo ndi dara iwu nwe oria mmepe na oria isi mgbaka, o nwere ihe kariri afọ iri abuo n'ihe gbasara ahụ ike ọgụgụ isi n'akparamagbwa mmadụ

Dịka onye ọrụ ndị ntorobia na Lọndọn, Fatima nyere ndị na-eto eto na-enweghị ebe obibi ndụmọdụ,ma mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ndị isi mgbaka na Washington ọ dụrụ John Hinckley Jr ndụmọdụ, nwoke ahụ nwara i gbu Ronald Reagan
Ọ bụkwa onye nkụzi mahadum na onye na-akwado ndị a na-emegbu, na-arụ ọrụ na ngalaba nke akparamaagwa na ahụike ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ
Na-arụ ọrụ dịka Ajọnkt Prọfesọ nke General Psychology na SUNY Broome Community College (USA) ihe karịrị afọ 12
Ọ kuziela ma dee ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nyocha metụtara enweghị ebe obibi, agbụrụ na mmekọrịta ha na ahụike ọgụgụ isi
Ọ bụbu onye isi kọmụnikeshọn nke onye Ọkachamara ukwu pụrụ iche nke Onye isi ala na Millennium Development Goals, ọ bụ Onye isi oche Editorial Board nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Leadership

Akilu bụbu onye ntụzịaka gbasara nyocha akparamaagwa na nkwukọrịta okwu n'ụlọ ọrụ nke National Security Advisor na Naịjirịa, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ Countering Violent Extremism Programme n'etiti afọ 2012 na 2015
Ihe omume CVE bụ otu atụmatụ gọọmentị ga-adị ogologo oge iji gboo Boko Haram ; otu ndị agha ntịịkpọ kpatara ọnwụ nke ihe karịrị mmadụ 20,000 na Naijiria

N'ịkọwa dịka nnwale siri ike na nnyocha iji ghọta ma lebara ihe kpatara mbuso agha a anya, emume CVE nke Naijiria bụ ịdọ aka na ntị dị iche iche na-eleba anya na ndị otu Boko Haram, ndị ntorobịa, na ndị ọzọ na-adịghị ike site na mmemme mmekọrịta na-enye ha uzo ozo karịrị i sonye ndị agha ntịịkpọ
Mmemme ndị a lebara anya na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti mmepe na nchekwa n'ọkwa obodo

Akilu e sorola nwunye nke ndị ọchịagha Boko Haram gbapụrụ agbapụ, bụ ndị na-eweta ihe ịma aka pụrụ iche ebe ọ bụ na ha na-enwetakarị ọnọdụ nkwanye ùgwù na ikike dị n'etiti ọha mmadụ na-enupụ isi na-achọkarị ịlaghachi
Akilu bu onye isi Ezekutiv Daịrektọ nke Neem Foundation, otu na- abụghị nke gọọmentị e hiwere ka nzaghachi nye nsogbu nke enweghị nchekwa na Naijiria
Akilu bụkwa onye edemede akwụkwọ ụmụaka, onye dere akwukwo umuaka iri na asaa
O deela akwukwo asato na Millennium Development Goals maka ụmụaka iji kuziere umuaka ihe banyere otutu omenala tinyere okwu mmepe mba uwa
Ọ na-edu ugbu a mgbasa ozi iji mee ka ụmụ Naijiria gụọ akwụkwọ 100 n'otu afọ

Titilayo Fatima Azeez onye amụru n'abalị̀ iri atọ na otu n'ime ọnwa Disemba afọ 1992, bụ onye egwuregwu badminton nke Nigeria
N’afọ 2010, ó sonyere asọmpi ogo ndị ntorobịa Summer, na Singapore
N’afọ 2011, o ritere ọla nchara ọkpụkpụ abụọ ụmụ nwanyị na All-Africa Games na Maputo, Mozambique

Fatima Bashir (amụrụ na 8 Jenụwari, afọ 1995) bụ Naijiria judoka onye zọrọ mpi nke ụmụ nwanyị na udi
O ritere ọla nchara n’egwuregwu mba Afrịka nke 2015 n’arọ iri anọ na asatọ
Fatima Batul Mukhtar bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa gụrụ akwụkwọ, nke bụ prọfesọ na Botani
Nnyocha ya gbadoro ụkwụ na 'growth regulation, biostatistics, biotechnology and plant conservation'
N’afọ 2016, onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara ya dịka onye osote onye isi ọchịchị Federal University Dutse
A mụrụ Mukhtar na Kano n'afọ 1963

Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke Shahuchi nakwa Shekara Girls Boarding Primary School maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya, were gazie Government Girls College,nke Dala dị na Kano maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị ya
N'afọ 1984, o nwetara nzere bachelọ na botani na Mahadum nke Ahmadu Bello
N’afọ 1994, o nwetara nzere masta na mahadum nke Bayero
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ mmụta dọktọreti n'afọ 2005, bụrụ ọkachamara na nkà mmụta ọgwụ osisi site n'otu ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum ahụ
N'afọ 2012, o debara aha ya n'agụmagụ akwụkwọ banyere nkà na ụzụ ọrụ ugbo na mahadum nke Michigan Steeti
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi ntọala ọchịchị na Mahadum nke Northwest Kano, bụrụkwa diin mbụ nke sayensị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
N'afọ 2015, e mere ya osote onye isi oche nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi nke Federal University Dutse
Fatima Ben Saïdane (a mụrụ na 25 Disemba 1949), bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Otu n'ime ogidi ndị mbụ nke ihe nkiri sinima Tunisia, a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ndị a ma ama nke a na-akpọ Making Of, Halfaouine Boy of the Terraces na Thala My Love
A mụrụ ya n'abalị 25, ọnwa Disemba, afọ 1949 na Tunis, Tunisia
Fatima malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 1989 na ihe nkiri Arab ma rụọ obere ọrụ 'Asfour'
N'otu afọ ahụ, o mere ihe nkiri Layla, Ma Raison
N'afọ 1990, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Salouha' na ihe nkiri Halfaouine Boy of the Terraces

Mgbe ọtụtụ obere ọrụ nkwado na ngwụcha afọ 1990, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri isii dị mkpirikpi na ihe ngosi n'afọ 2006 10 Courts, 10 Regards, Dementia, Me, My Sister and the Thing, Mrs Bahja, Making Of na The TV Is Coming
Fatima El-Faquir (amụrụ n'afọ 1954) bụ onye Morocco na-agba ọsọ, onye nkuzi, na prọfesọ egwuregwu
Ọ bụ onye Morocco mbụ na-asọ mpi na Olimpik
O sonyere na 100 mita ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 1972 Summer Olympics na Munich ma bụrụ onye mmeri Afrịka mbụ na 400m hurdles na Dakar na 1979
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na-eme egwuregwu nyere Morocco aha
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke agụmakwụkwọ dị elu na Moroccan National Institute of Sport
El-Faquir gụrụ Physical Exercise and Sport na Mahadum Bucharest na Romania site na afọ 1973 ruo na afo 1978 wee gaa Mahadum Montreal na Canada
Ọ lụrụ di ma zụlite ezinụlọ ya na onye nkuzi ya bụ Aziz Daouda
Ọ zụrụ ndị otu egwuregwu mba Morocco (track) ma zụọ Nawal El Moutawakel na huders na relay events
Ọ haziri ihe omume dị ka Pan Arab Games na Rabat, Morocco na 1985, Francophone Games na afọ 1989, Cross Country World Championship na afọ 1998, na Youth World Championships na Marrakech na afọ 2006
Ọ nwere ọkwa onye isi ala na Confederation of African Athletics, North Africa, na National Association of Women's Physical Activities and Sport
N'afọ 2017, ọ gbachitere akwụkwọ edemede ya n'asụsụ French nke akpọrọ 'Moroccan High Level Athletes Emergence, Visibility, Erasure 1956-2016'
