Fatima-Zahra El Allami (amụrụ na 26 na ọnwa Machị na afọ 1989 na Meknes) bụ onye Moroccan bụbu onye na-eme egwuregwu tennis
N'ọrụ ya, El Allami meriri utu aha atọ na utu aha abụọ iri na abụọ na ITF Circuit
N'abalị mbụ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2010, ọ ruru ọkwa kachasị elu n'ụwa nke 433
N'ọnwa Julaị, afọ 2009, ọ rutere n'ọkwa nke 420 na ọkwa abụọ nke WTA
E nyela ya kaadị maka Grand Prix SAR La Princesse Lalla Meryem kwa afọ kemgbe afọ 2007, mana ọ dịghị mgbe ọ gafere agba nke mbụ
Na-egwuri egwu maka Morocco na Fed Cup kemgbe afọ 2008, El Allami nwere ihe ndekọ mmeri nke 1911
Fatima El Jazouli bụ onye Morocco bụbu onye na agba bọọlụ
Ọ bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Morocco
El Jazouli gbara ọsọ maka Morocco na ọkwa dị elu n'oge 2000 Asọmpi ụmụnwaanyị Afrịka na 2002 Itozu asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka
Fatima Hajaig (amụrụ na 10 Disemba, na afọ 1938) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa, ya na African National Congress na-achị
Ọ bụ onye otu African Union's Pan-African Parliament si South Africa
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche nke kọmitii na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ nke ndị omeiwu South Africa
Ọ bụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi n'okpuru onye isi ala Kgalema Motlanthe
Hajaig gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand na afy 1963
N'afọ 1967, ọ nwetara LLB ya na Mahadum Eötvös Loránd na Hungary
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2008, ọ kpọrọ onye nnọchi anya ọhụrụ nke Israel na Ministri Na-ahụ Maka Mba Ọzọ iji katọọ omume Israel na Gaza

Nke a mere ka Israel mee mkpesa n'aka ndị nnọchi anya South Africa na Tel Aviv n'ihi na, o kwuru, Hajaig kparịrị Elias Inbram, onye na-ekwuchitere ndị nnọchianya Israel a mụrụ n'Etiopia, na-eche na a kpọtara ya na nzukọ ahụ dị ka onye isi ojii ma jụọ onye nnọchi anya
Mgbe ndị ọrụ ibe gị na Europe na-aga nzukọ dị ka nke a, ha na-ebukwa onye dị ka onye nọ n'akụkụ gị?

Na nzukọ COSATU na Wednesday 14 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2009, na Lenasia, Gauteng, o kwuru na nchịkwa nke America, dịka nchịkwa nke ọtụtụ mba ndị dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ, dị n'aka ego ndị Juu ma ọ bụrụ na ego ndị Juu na-achịkwa mba ha mgbe ahụ ị pụghị ịtụ anya ihe ọ bụla ọzọ
Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi bụ Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma katọrọ okwu ya banyere ndị Juu, onye wepụtara nkwupụta na-ekwu na okwu ndị dị otú ahụ megidere iwu mba ọzọ
Ndị South African Jewish Board of Deputies tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa megide Hajaig na Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ nke mba ahụ
N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2009, ọ rịọrọ mgbaghara maka ihe mgbu ọ bụla sitere n'okwu o kwuru na nnọkọ ahụ
Otú ọ dị, onye isi oche nke South African Jewish Board of Deputies Zev Krengel kwuru na Hajaig nyere naanị 'mgbaghara zoro ezo' na nkwupụta ya
'Ọ ka na-arịọ mgbaghara maka ihe o kwuru
Ọ na-arịọ mgbaghara maka mmerụ ahụ
N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2009, onye isi ala South Africa bụ Kgalema Motlanthe nyere ya 'a dressing down' maka okwu ya na-emegide ndị Juu
Ndị South African Jewish Board of Deputies nabatara mgbaghara nke abụọ ya
N'oge gara aga, ndị Cabinet 'egosipụta nchegbu banyere nkwupụta ahụ n'ihi na ọ megidere iwu gọọmentị a kwuru banyere mmetụta ndị na-emegide ndị Juu
Fatima Hamroush (Arabic) (amụrụ na 14 Febụwarị na afọ 1959) bụ onye na-ahụ maka anya na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Libya
A mụrụ ya na Benghazi na 14 Febụwarị, na afọ 1959, Hamroush kwagara Ireland na afọ 1996 ma mesịa ghọọ nwa amaala Irish site na nnabata ma si otú ahụ ghọọ nwa ama amaala Irish-Libyan abụọ
Ọ biri na Julianstown, County Meath, Ireland
O nwere ụmụ anọ, otu n'ime ha bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu, Farah Elle
Na Febụwarị, na afọ 1983, Hamroush gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere ahụike (MB BS) na Mahadum Garyounis na Disemba, na afọ 1999 ghọrọ Fellow nke Royal College of Surgeons nke Edinburgh
Hamroush bụ onye otu Irish College of Ophthalmologists, ọkachamara na glaucoma, retina ahụike, na neuro-ophthalmology
Site na afọ 2000, ruo n'agha obodo Libya nke afọ 2011, Hamroush nwere ọkwa onye ndụmọdụ anya na Our Lady of Lourdes Hospital, Drogheda, Ireland
Site na Nọvemba na afọ 2011 ruo Nọvemba, na afọ 2012, Dr Hamroush nọ n'ọkwa Minista ahụike na Gọọmentị Mgbanwe Libya
N'oge ọ nọ n'ọchịchị, Hamroush gosipụtara enweghị nnwere onwe dị ịrịba ama maka nrụrụ aka ma, n'agbanyeghị ọnọdụ siri ike, nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịmepụta ntọala maka ọrụ ahụike mba Libya
Ọ laghachiri Ireland n'ọnwa Nọvemba, mgbe o nyefere Minista ahụike ọhụrụ, Dr Noureddine Doghman
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2013, ọ maliteghachiri ọrụ onye ndụmọdụ anya ọha na eze na OLLH na ọrụ onwe ya na Drogheda
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2011, Praịm Minista Libya Abdurrahim El-Keib mara ọkwa na Hamroush bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ Minista Ahụike nke Libya
Hamroush bụkwa onye nduzi nke Irish Libyan Emergency Aid
Dr Hamroush bụ nwa nwanyị nke Abdullah Hamroush, onye bụbu colonel na onye ọka ikpe ụlọ ikpe ndị agha n'oge alaeze ahụ, tupu nnupụisi ahụ na afọ 1969
A tụrụ nna ya mkpọrọ n'abalị nke nnupụisi ahụ n'ihi ịbọ ọbọ maka ịtụ Gaddafi mkpọrọ na afọ 1967 mgbe e boro ya ebubo ịta onye agha ahụhụ n'oge ọzụzụ
E debere nna ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ruo afọ anọ tupu ụlọ ikpe egosipụta na aka ya dị ọcha

Dr Hamroush megidere ọchịchị Gaddafi wee bụrụ onye a ma ama na onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike nke ndị mmegide Libya site na afọ 2008, ebe ya na ọtụtụ ndị mmeghachi omume Libya na mba ofesi na n'ime Libya rụkọtara ọrụ

Otú ọ dị, maka ebumnuche nchekwa, o jiri otu aha 'Alleebeya' الليبية mee ihe mgbe o bipụtara ọtụtụ isiokwu na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ndị mmegide, kesaa n'ịkwalite mmata ọha na eze, mpaghara na mba ụwa banyere ọchịchị aka ike wee bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke ebe nrụọrụọrụ weebụ ndị na-emegide 'Libya Almostaqbal' site na afọ 2009 ruo Jenụwarị, na afọ 2011
O nyekwara aka n'inye ego maka ngagharị iwe n'ụwa niile iji kwado ọgụ ndị Libya na-alụ megide ọchịchị Gaddafi
A kpughere onye ọ bụ na mmalite nke mgbanwe nke 17 Febụwarị, na afọ 2011, mgbe o welitere ọkọlọtọ tricolour nke Libya n'ihu GPO na etiti obodo Dublin
A hụrụ ya dị ka onye mbụ welitere ọkọlọtọ na Republic of Ireland

Na 26 Febụwarị, na afọ 2011, ya na nwa ya nwoke, Abdullah Elneihum (Abe Neihum), guzobere Irish Libyan Emergency Aid (ILEA), otu enyemaka enyemaka iji nye Libya ọgwụ n'oge mgbanwe ahụ, nke nyere aka n'inye ngwá ọgwụ na ihe oriri n'oge nnupụisi ahụ na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mpaghara niile dị na Libya

Na Septemba, na afọ 2011, na arịrịọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị isi nke National Transitional Council, Dr Hamroush guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụike nke Libya iji nyere aka n'ịgwọ ndị merụrụ ahụ n'agha na ndị siri ike ọgwụgwọ na-enweghị ọgwụgwọ na Libya
E kwukwara na e guzobere ọfịs ahụ iji nyere aka n'ịkpọbata ndị ọkachamara ahụike na Libya ma melite ọzụzụ ahụike na ebumnuche nke ime ka ọgwụgwọ mba

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2011, a kpọrọ Dr Hamroush dịka Minista ahụike maka Libya na Gọọmentị Mgbanwe, nke nwere ndị minista iri abụọ na anọ, abụọ n'ime ha bụ ụmụ nwanyị, praịm minista na ndị nnọchi anya atọ
Dr Hamroush nọ n'ọkwa site na 2 Disemba, na afọ 2011 ruo mmalite Nọvemba, na afọ 2012

Site na Machị, na afọ 2012 ruo Ọgọstụ, Dr Hamroush tinyere aka na esemokwu mgbe ọ na-egbochi nnukwu nrụrụ aka n'ime usoro ọgwụgwọ ndị merụrụ ahụ n'agha, nke ngalaba dị iche na-abụghị Ministrị Ahụike duziri

Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, ọ gbochiri Kọmitii Ndị Agha merụrụ ahụ ka ha ghara ịga n'ihu n'omume ya na-abụghị nke omenala ma jikọta ọgwụgwọ nke ndị agha merụrụ ahụ n'ime ngalaba ahụike ma nye iwu maka usoro ndekọ mpụ na nke ndị omempụ
N'oge obere oge ya, Dr Hamroush malitere ọtụtụ ọrụ na ozi ya nke kwụsịrị n'oge agha ahụ

Na ngwụcha oge ya, o nyere akụkọ banyere oge ya na General National Council na Gọọmentị Temporary, yana General Prosecutor, na-eme ka mkpa ọ dị ịchịkwa nchekwa na nrụrụ aka yana ibuli ụkpụrụ nke ụkpụrụ omume na nkà nchịkwa n'etiti ndị Libya iji nweta mgbanwe

Na ngwụcha afọ 2013, mgbe ọ laghachiri Ireland, Hamroush malitere ịmepụta mmemme maka mkparịta ụka na ime udo site na ịhazi nzukọ na netwọk maka ndị ọrụ Libya na ndị ọrụ mbụ nke ọchịchị gara aga, ihe mkpali a na-akpọ The National Libyan Dialogue for Reconciliation
Ihe omume maka Dialogue nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịgba ndị diaspora ume, ya bụ, ìgwè ndị jikọtara na ndị bụbu nke ọchịchị gara aga, iji kwupụta nchegbu ha ma bịa n'ihu iji zụlite steeti ahụ

Agha ike nke sochiri n'oge na-adịghị anya n'etiti afọ 2014, ọkachasị agha obodo nke malitere n'etiti Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na Ọdịda Anyanwụ nke Libya, emela ka Hamroush ghara itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọ bụla, na-egbochi onwe ya naanị ikwupụta echiche ya na-adịghị ele mmadụ anya n'ihu na ajụjụ ọnụ
Ọ bi na Ireland ugbu a, na-alaghachi n'ọrụ ya dị ka Consultant Medical Ophthalmologist
'Fatima Jebli Ouazzani bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Moroccan
A mụrụ ya na Meknes, Ouazzani
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Netherlands na 1970

Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, ma mụọ nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ n'oge na-adịghị anya tupu ọ banye na Dutch Film School na Amsterdam, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere na ntụziaka na edemede na 1992
In My Father's House (1997) bụ ihe ngosi ogologo oge nke na-ekwu maka ọgụ Ouazzani na atụmanya nwoke na nwanyị nke ezinụlọ Morocco ya

O jisiri ike merie ihe nrite kachasị elu na 1998 Moroccan National Film Festival, n'agbanyeghị isiokwu ya nke pụtara na ọ nataghị nnyocha azụmahịa na Morocco, ma merie Golden Calf maka Best Long Documentary na Netherlands Film Festival na Iris Prize Best European Documentary
Fatima Jibrell (Somali , Arabic; amụrụ na , mgbe onwa Disemba, gbara nkpuru ụbọchị iri atọ n' afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri anọ na asaa ) bụ onye Somali-Amirikan na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi

Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi nchịkwa nke Horn of Africa Relief and Development Organization (nke bụ Adeso ugbu a), onye nchoputara nke Sun Fire Cooking, ma nye aka n'ịmepụta Women's Coalition for Peace
A mụrụ Jibrell na mgbe ọnwa Disemba gbara mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri atọ, na afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri anọ na asaa , na Sanaag, Somaliland n'ezinụlọ na-akwagharị akwagharị
Nna ya bụ onye na-azụ ahịa ụgbọ mmiri nke biri na New York City
Dị ka nwatakịrị na Somalia, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi nke Britain ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, mgbe ọ hapụrụ mba ahụ iji sonyere nna ya na United States
N'ebe ahụ, Jibrell gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Temple High School
N'afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri isii na itoolu , ọ laghachiri Somaliland wee rụọ ọrụ na gọọmentị, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ lụrụ di ya, Abdurahman Mohamoud Ali, onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ
Mgbe ya na ezinụlọ ya nọ na Iraq, Jibrell malitere agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Damaskọs dị na Siria dị nso
N'afọ 1981, a kpọfere di ya na US, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Bachelor of Arts na Bekee
O mechara gaa n'ihu na-agbaso Master's na Social Work na Mahadum Connecticut
Mgbe ha bi na US, Jibrell na di ya zụlitere ụmụ nwanyị ise, gụnyere Degan Ali
Ọ ghọkwara nwa amaala America

N'ịbụ onye agha obodo na Somalia nke malitere na 1991, Jibrell na di ya na ndị enyi ezinụlọ ya guzobere Horn of Africa Relief and Development Organization, nke a na-akpọ Horn Relief, otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị (NGO) nke ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa
N'afọ 2012, Horn Relief gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Adeso
Mgbe Jibrell lara ezumike nká dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na 2006, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na mmemme Somalia ya
Adeso na-akọwa ọrụ ya dị ka ọrụ dị ala nke e mere iji bulie obodo dị iche iche
Jibrell nyere aka n'ịmepụta Women's Coalition for Peace iji gbaa ụmụ nwanyị ume itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
O sokwa guzobe Sun Fire Cooking, nke na-ezube iwebata ihe na-esi nri anyanwụ na Somalia iji belata ịdabere na icheku ọkụ dị ka mmanụ
N'afọ 2008, Jibrell dere ma soro mepụta ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi akpọrọ Charcoal Traffic, nke na-eji akụkọ akụkọ ifo iji kụziere ọha na eze banyere nsogbu charcoal
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Nathan Collett duziri ihe nkiri ahụ
N'afọ 2011, Jibrell na onye nnọchi anya mba Australia lara ezumike nká bụ James Lindsay bipụtara Peace and Milk Scenes of Northern Somalia, akwụkwọ foto gbasara ime obodo na ndụ Somalia
Ọrụ ahụ enwetala otuto mba ụwa site n'aka ndị otu gburugburu ebe obibi, gụnyere Goldman Environmental Foundation na Résistants pour la Terre
Site na Horn Relief, Jibrell guzobere mkpọsa gara nke ọma iji zọpụta ọhịa ochie nke osisi acacia na mpaghara ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Somalia

Osisi ndị a, nke nwere ike itolite ruo afọ 500, ka a na-egbutu iji mee icheku ọkụ ebe ọ bụ na ihe a na-akpọ 'ọla ojii' bụ ihe a na'achọsi ike na Peninsula Arab, ebe agbụrụ Bedouin nke mpaghara ahụ kwenyere na acacia dị nsọ
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ mmanụ dị ọnụ ala nke na-egbo mkpa onye ọrụ, mmepụta nke icheku ọkụ na-edugakarị n'ịgbukpọ ọhịa na ọzara
Dị ka ụzọ isi dozie nsogbu a, Jibrell na Horn Relief zụrụ otu ìgwè ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma iji kụziere ọha na eze banyere mmebi na-adịgide adịgide nke na-emepụta icheku ọkụ nwere ike ịmepụta
N'afọ otu puku 1999, Horn Relief haziri njem udo n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Puntland nke Somalia iji kwụsị ihe a na-akpọ 'agha coal'
N'ihi mbọ Jibrell na-agba maka agụm akwụkwọ, gọọmentị Puntland na afọ puku abụọ machibidoro mbupụ icheku ọkụ
Gọọmentị emeela ka mmachibido iwu ahụ dị irè, nke a kọrọ na ọ kpatara mbelata pisenti iri asatọ na mbupụ nke ngwaahịa ahụ
Maka mgbalị ya na-emebi gburugburu ebe obibi na ọzara, Jibrell enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye ihe nrite
N'afọ puku abụọ na abụọ , e nyere ya Goldman Environmental Prize, ihe nrite gburugburu ebe obibi kachasị ewu ewu
N'afọ puku abụọ na asatọ , o ritekwara National Geographic Society / Buffett Foundation Award for Leadership in Conservation
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na anọ , Jibrell natara onyinye ihe nrite United Nations Environmental Programme (UNEP) Champions of the Earth maka ọrụ nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi ya
Tụkwasị na nke a na afọ puku abụọ na iri isii Jibrell natara onyinye Takreem maka mmepe gburugburu ebe obibi na nkwado
Fatima Kyari Mohammed bụ onye na-ahụ maka ndị otu Afrịka na United Nations

Tupu nhọpụta ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka otu mba Afrịka na United Nations, Oriakụ Mohammed bụ onye ndụmọdụ ọpụrụiche na ngalaba Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) Commission, na-elekwasị anya na udo na nchekwa, njikọta mpaghara na mmepe nhazi nhazi
Tupu ọ banye ECOWAS, ọ bụ onye isi oche na ndụmọdụ gbasara esemokwu na nchekwa nke West Africa
Na mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye njikwa mmemme na European Union Delegation na Nigeria na ECOWAS; na dị ka Regional Project Manager maka Nchekwa amụma Project na West Africa
Fatima Marouan, nke a na-akpọkwa Fatema Marouane, (amụrụ n'afọ 1952) bụ dọkịta Moroccan, onye isi azụmaahịa na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Site na afo 2002 ruo na afọ 2005, ọ bụ onye isi nke Endocrinology na Metabolic Diseases nke Ụlọ Ọgwụ Mahadum Ibn Rochd na Casablanca

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, n'okpuru ọchịchị nke Praịm Minista Abdelilah Benkirane, site n'October na afọ 2013 ruo Eprel, na afọ 2017 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Crafts na Social Economy dị ka onye otu National Rally of Independents
A mụrụ ya na afọ 1952 na Benslimane n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Casablanca, Fatima Maroun gụrụ ọgwụ na Mahadum Lyon
Ọ ghọrọ Onye Ọkachamara na onye nchọpụta na Ngalaba Ọgwụ na Ọgwụ nke Mahadum Casablanca
N'ịbụ onye ọkachamara na endocrinology na nsogbu nri na-edozi ahụ, ọ bụ onye isi nke Ngalaba Endocrinology, Diabetology na Nutrition na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Ibn Rochd na Casablanca
Maroun bụ onye otu Moroccan commission on combating diabetes
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye isi Smedian (Société marocaine d'ãoendocrinologie, diabétologie et nutrition)
Fatima Marouan enyewo aka n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ sayensị
N'ihu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, dị ka onye otu National Rally of Independents, o sonyere na mmepe nke atụmatụ ahụike na agụmakwụkwọ
Site n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2013 ruo n'afọ 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ aka na akụ na ụba ọha na eze
Maroun bụkwa onye otu ụlọ ọrụ Casablanca Chicago Sister Cities Association
Ọ na-asụ asụsụ atọ, na-asụ asụsụ Arabic, asụsụ French na asụsụ Bekee
Onye otu sayensị nke Destination Santé SAS, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ụlọ ọgwụ California Cardiology Clinic nke Casablanca
Fatima Maroun lụrụ di ma muo ụmụ abụọ
Fatima Massaquoi-Fahnbulleh (Ọmụmụ 1912 – Ọnwụ 1978) bụ onye nkuzi nke so na ndi kwalitere ikuzi ihe na obodo Liberia
Mgbe ọguchara akwụkwụ na obodo Amerika, nwa ada nkea pụrụ iche lọtara obodo ya Liberia na afọ 1946 bido kwalitebe omenala na mmerikọta ndu nke ndi ime obodo ya
Fatima Meer (12 Ọgọst na afo 1928 – 12 Maachị na afo 2010) bụ onye odee South Afrika, agụmakwụkwọ, onye na-ede ihe nlegharị anya, na onye ama ama na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ

A mụrụ Fatima Meer na Gray okporo ámá, Durban, South Africa, n'ime ezinụlọ dị n'etiti nke itoolu, ebe nna ya Moosa Ismail Meer, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke The Indian Views, kụnyere n'ime ya nghọta nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na dị na obodo
Nne ya bụ Rachel Farrell, nwunye nke abụọ nke Moosa Ismail Meer
Nne ya bụ nwa mgbei na onye Juu na Portuguese
Ọ ghọrọ Islam wee gbanwee aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Amina
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 16 na afo 1944, o nyere aka wulite £1 000 maka enyemaka ụnwụ nri na Bengal, India
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Durban Indian Girls High School
Mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa akwụkwọ ọ kpọkọtara ụmụ akwụkwọ ka ha chọta Kọmitii Nguzogide Nkwụsị nke Student iji kpokọta ego maka Mgbasa Mgbasa Nkwụsị Nkwụsị nke obodo India site na afo 1946 ruo afo 1948
Kọmiti ahụ duuru ya izute Yusuf Dadoo, Monty Naicker na Kesaveloo Goonam
O mechara gaa mahadum nke Witwatersrand otu afọ ebe ọ bụ onye otu Trotskyism nke jikọtara na Non-European Unity Movement (NEUM)
Ọ gara mahadum Natal, ebe ọ gụsịrị nzere bachelọ na nzere Master na Sociology
Meer na Kesaveloo Goonam ghọrọ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara ka onye isi oche nke Natal Indian Congress (NIC) na afo 1950
O nyere aka guzobe Durban na District Women's League na 4 Ọktoba afo 1952 dịka otu ụmụ nwanyị 70
A malitere nzukọ a iji wulite njikọ n'etiti ndị Afrika na ndị India n'ihi ọgba aghara agbụrụ dị n'etiti otu abụọ ahụ na afo 1949
Bertha Mkhize ghọrọ onye isi oche wee bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ọgbakọ
Njikọ ahụ mere ọrụ dị ka ịhazi Crèche na ikesa mmiri ara ehi na Cato Manor
Otu ọgbakọ a na-achịkọtakwa ego maka ndị ajọ ifufe tonado kpatara na Springs ebe ndị Africa enweghị ebe obibi ma nakọta nke ọma £ 4000 maka ndị idei mmiri metụtara oke osimiri Cow Lake
Mgbe National Party nwesịrị ike na afo 1948 wee malite itinye iwu nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ha
Mmalite nke Meer mụbara na n'ihi mmemme ya, a machibidoro Meer na afo 1952 maka afọ 3

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu tọrọ ntọala Federation of South African Women (FEDSAW) nke e hiwere na 17 Eprel afo 1954 na Trades Hall na Rissik Street, na etiti Johannesburg nke butere njem njem ụmụ nwanyị mere eme na Union Buildings, Pretoria na 9 Ọgọst
Afo 1956
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi nke March ụmụ nwanyị na afo 1956
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ na-ahazi kọmitii iji chịkọta ego maka mgbapụta na ịkwado ezinụlọ sitere n'aka ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Natal bụ ndị nọ na ikpe aghụghọ
N'afọ ndị 1960, ọ haziri nche abalị iji mee mkpesa megide oke njide nke ndị na-akwado ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na-ekpeghị ikpe na mpụga ụlọ mkpọrọ durban
Fatima Meer bụkwa otu onye nhazi maka vigil otu izu na Gandhi Settlement na Phoenix
Onye ndu vigil bụ Sushila Gandhi
N'ime afo 1970s, ọ malitere ịnakwere Black Consciousness Ideology na South African Student Organisation (SASO) nke Steve Biko duziri
Na afo 1975, Fatima Meer mebere otu Black Women's Federation (BWF) na Winnie Mandela
Meer ghọrọ onye isi oche mbụ nke otu ahụ
Otu afọ ka e mesịrị, a machibidokwara ya iwu ọzọ ruo afọ ise
Iwu amachibidoro ya bịara ka ọ gara nzukọ nke Black Studies Programme ebe ọ bụ onye isi okwu n'okwu nke isiokwu ya bụ, 'Afọ iri abụọ na ise nke Ọchịchị Apartheid'
Na June afo 1976, mgbe Soweto Upriings gasịrị, ejidere ma jide ụmụ nwanyị 11 sitere na BWF n'okpuru Nkebi 6 nke Iwu Iyi ọha egwu
E tinyere ha n'ụlọ mkpọrọ dịpụrụ adịpụ na Johannesburg
Ọ gbanarị obere mbọ maka igbu ọchụ obere oge ka a tọhapụrụ ya na njide na afo 1976 mgbe a gbagburu ya n'ụlọ ezinaụlọ ya dị na Durban, mana emerụghị ya ahụ
Nwa ya nwoke, Rashid, gara biri n’ala ọzọ n’otu afọ ahụ
A wakporo ya ọzọ wee taa ụta nke abụọ ọgụ na Black Consciousness Movement na Inkatha Freedom Party
N' ime afo 1980s, Meer tọrọ ntọala kọmitii na-ahazi ndị isi ojii (Indian, Coloured, African) Ratepayers Organisation iji guzogide ikpe na-ezighị ezi nke na-eme obodo ndị ojii nke obodo Durban kpatara
Ọ jụrụ inye oche na nzuko omeiwu na 1994 kpatara mmasị ya maka ọrụ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị
Na Mee afo 1999, Fatima tọrọ ntọala Concerned Citizens' Group [CCG] iji mee ka ndị India kwenye ka ha ghara ịtụ vootu maka ndị ọcha otu ntuli aka ọzọ
Ọ bụ onye nkwado siri ike nke mgbanwe mgbanwe nke Iran wee gbochie njem Salman Rushdie na South Afrika na afo 1998, na-ekwu na ọ bụ onye nkwulu
O tinyere aka na ngagharị iwe megide mmegbu na mwakpo nke ndị Palestine na mbuso agha US na-edu Afghanistan
O hiwere Jubilee 2000 ka o mee mkpọsa maka ịkagbu ụgwọ ụwa nke atọ
O bipụtara akwụkwọ ya nke akpọrọ Portrait of Indian South Africa na afo 1969 wee nye onyinye niile sitere na ire akwụkwọ ahụ nye Gandhi Settlement maka mkpa iji wuo ihe ngosi nka na ụlọ ọgwụ Gandhi
O nyeere aka n'ịgbapụta mmadụ 10 000 idei mmiri ndị India merụrụ na Tin Town nke dị n'akụkụ mmiri Umgeni
Meer wuru ụlọ nwa oge n'otu ụlọikwuu ma hazie nri na uwe enyemaka
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gara nke ọma kwurịta maka mmezi na-adịgide adịgide maka ha na Phoenix
Meer hibere wee bụrụ onye ndu nke Natal Education Trust nke na-anakọta ego n'aka ndị obodo India iji wuo ụlọ akwụkwọ na Umlazi, Port Shepstone na Inanda
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Tembalishe Tutorial College na Gandhi's Phoenix home ka ọ kuziere ndị ojii na nka odeakwụkwọ na afo 1979

Crafts Center guzobekwara na Settlement iji kụziere mbipụta ihuenyo, ịkwa akwa, ịcha akwa na ịkwa akwa maka ndị na-enweghị ọrụ, ma ụlọ akwụkwọ kọleji na ebe nka nka mechiri na afo 1982 mgbe ejidere Fatima maka imebi iwu mmachibido iwu ya kpatara na-ahụ maka ọrụ na mpụga nke ókèala Durban

N' ime afo 1980s, ọ haziri scholarships maka ụmụ akwụkwọ iri ka ha gaa United States wee nyere aka na 'SAVE Our HOMES COMMITTEE' nke ndị Colored Community nke Sparks Estate tọrọ ntọala iji chọọ ikpe ziri ezi maka ndị obodo Durban na-eyi egwu bụ ndị chọrọ ịkpọrọ ụlọ ha
Ha nwere ihe ịga nke ọma inweta ụgwọ ọrụ maka omume ahụ
Site na nkwado ya na Indira Gandhi, ọ haziri ohere agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ South Africa ka ha mụọ ọgwụ na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na India
IBR na-eme mmemme nkuzi iji kwalite ọnụego ngafe matric dị ala yana Phambili High hiwere na afo 1986 maka ụmụ akwụkwọ Africa
Na afo 1992, (afọ abụọ tupu ntuli aka onye kwuo uche ya nke mbụ) Fatima Meer tọrọ ntọala Clare Estate Environment Group dị ka nzaghachi nye mkpa nke ndị bi n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na ndị njem ime obodo
Ha enweghị ikike n'obodo mepere emepe ma chọọ mmiri dị ọcha, idebe ihe ọcha na ebe obibi kwesịrị ekwesị
Ụlọ akwụkwọ Khanyisa tọrọ ntọala na afo 1993 dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ nkwado maka ụmụaka ndị Africa na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla tupu ha aga ụlọ akwụkwọ nkịtị
E hiwere ya ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ nka nke ụmụ nwanyị Khanya na afo 1996, nke na-akụziri ụmụ nwanyị ojii 150 n'ịcha ụkpụrụ, ịkwa akwa, agụmagụ okenye na njikwa azụmaahịa
Fatima Meer lụrụ nwa nwanne nne ya mbụ na afo 1950, Ismail Meer
Nke a abụghị ihe ọhụrụ na obodo Sunni Bhora ebe o tolitere
Ismail Meer bụ onye ọka iwu ama ama na onye na-akwado ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọ bụ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndị omebe iwu mpaghara KwaZulu-Natal ANC
N'afọ ndị 1960, e jidere ya ma bo ya ebubo ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru ya na Nelson Mandela na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe ike
Na 2000, nwa Fatima Meer Rashid nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọ ala
Ọ bụ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ Shehnaaz, onye ọka ikpe Court Claims Court, na Shamin, onye na-ahụ maka sayensị na-elekọta mmadụ
Meer ghọrọ onye nkuzi sociology na onye ọrụ na Mahadum Natal site na 1956 ruo 1988
Ọ bụ ya bụ onye mbụ na-abụghị onye ọcha nwere ọkwa ahụ
Ọ bụkwa prọfesọ na-abịa eleta n'ọtụtụ mahadum dị na mba ofesi
Meer ghọrọ onye otu ụlọ akwụkwọ London School of Economics, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta nsọpụrụ atọ
Nke mbu, o nwetara akara ugo mmụta nke Honorary Doctorate na Philosophy site na Swarthmore College (1984) na na Humane Letters si Bennet College na United States (1994)
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ natara Honorary Doctorate na Social Sciences na Natal University na South Africa (1998)
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Institute for Black Research (IBR), nke ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ nyocha na mbipụta na NGO agụmakwụkwọ na 1972
Fatima Meer nwụrụ na St
Augustine's Hospital na Durban na 12 Maachị afo 2010, ọ dị afọ iri asato na otu, site na ọrịa strok nke ọ tara izu abụọ tupu mgbe ahụ
Egosipụta ihe osise ya na eserese ya na Constitutional Hill kemgbe August 2017
Fatima Regragui (15 Febụwarị 1941 - 2 Ọgọst 2021) bụ onye Moroccan na-eme ihe nkiri
Regragui malitere ọrụ nka ya n'afọ ndi 1950 N'afọ 1975, ọ sonyeere ndị otu National Theatre Mohammed V na Rabat n'akụkụ Aziz Maouhoub, Mohamed El Jam, Malika El Omari na Nezha Regragui
O gosipụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Moroccan nke ghọrọ ofufe dịka Farewell Mother nke Mohamed Ismaïl duziri na Mirage, nke Ahmed Bouanani duziri
Regragui nwụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2021 mgbe ọ dị afọ 80, mgbe ọ lụchara ọgụ ogologo oge
Ọ tụfuru anya ya kpamkpam obere oge tupu ọnwụ ya
Fatima Rushdi (1908-1996) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agụ egwu, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Rushdi bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke ihe nkiri Egypt
A mụrụ ya na Alexandria, Fatima Rushdi kwagara Cairo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ ka o wee bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Enweghị ọzụzụ ọ bụla, ma na-asụ naanị Arabic, ọ malitere otu ihe nkiri nke ya na 1926 wee gaa North Africa
Onye nduzi ihe nkiri nke Chanin-Aziz hụrụ ya n'anya ma mee ka ọ mụta ịgụ na ide
A maara ya dị ka 'Bernhardt nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ' maka ịmegharị ọtụtụ ọrụ Sarah Bernhardt a ma ama, gụnyere Mark Anthony na Julius Caesar
Na ngwụcha afọ 1920, Rushdi gara njem ime ihe nkiri na mba ofesi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Beirut, Jaffa, Haifa, Latakia, Baghdad, na Tunisia na Algeria
Ọ gakwara South America ma rụọ ọrụ na Santos, São Paolo, Rio de Janeiro, na Buenos Aires
N'afọ 1933, o duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya na naanị ya, al-Zarwaj, nke emere na Paris
Enweghị mbipụta dị ndụ, na n'akwụkwọ ncheta ya nke afọ 1970, o kwuru na ya gbara ihe nkiri ahụ ọkụ
N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ pụtara dị ka nwanyị nna ya manyere ịlụ di na nwunye na-enweghị obi ụtọ nke nwụrụ n'ụzọ dị mwute na njedebe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri nke Kamal Selim, nke gụnyere ihe nkiri nke eziokwu The Will al- CanalAzima (1939), ebe ọ na-egosi dika nwa agbọghọ na-arụ ọrụ na-ahụ nwa nwoke onye agbata obi ahụ n'anya
Ọ pụtara n'ihe nkiri ikpeazụ ya n'afọ 1955, n'ọrụ nke abụọ na Ahmad Diya Destiny al-Din's Da Destiny / Let Me Live
N'afọ ndị 1960, Rushdi haziri salon maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ụmụ akwụkwọ na Cairo Higher Institute for Drama Studies
Fatima Talib (Arabic , amụrụ na 1 Jenụwarị 1928) bụ onye nkụzi Sudanese na onye na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị nke kpọkọtara nzukọ mbụ naanị ụmụ nwanyị na Sudan
N'afọ 1946, ya na ndị enyi ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya na Gordon Memorial College, Mahasin Abed Alaal na Khalda Zahir, Talib guzobere Women's Cultural Society (Jam'ee'yat alfata'yat althaqa'fia) na Omdurman
E mere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ iji kụziere ma nye ụmụ nwanyị ike ma nye ha nkwado ọha na eze
Iji rụọ ọrụ, ọha mmadụ chọrọ nkwado nke ndị ọchịchị Britain, ya mere a na-akpọsa ya naanị dị ka nchegbu ọha na eze, agbanyeghị na ọ nwere ihe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ụmụ nwanyị itoolu sonyeere ozugbo, mana mmekọrịta ahụ dịgidere naanị afọ abụọ
N'agbanyeghị ndụ ya dị mkpụmkpụ, ọ dị mkpa n'ihi na ọ bụ nzukọ mbụ ụmụ nwanyị guzobere na Sudan
N'afọ 1949, Talib ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ so na Muslim Brotherhood
Ụmụnne nwanyị si n'ezinụlọ Al-Mahdi sonyeere ya ma ha abụọ guzobere Women's Development Society
N'afọ 1952, ya na Khalda Zahir, Hajja Kashif Badri, na ndị ọzọ, Talib guzobere Sudanese Women's Union (الاتحاد النسائي السوداني al Etihaad al Nisaa'i alSudani)
E mere nzukọ a iji jikọta ma kwalite nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị
Kọmitii ndị isi mbụ bụ Fatima Talib Isma'il, Khalida Zahir na Fatima Ahmed Ibrahim
Talib bụ onye isi ala nke Union site na 1952-6
Ntọala nke Union bụ otu n'ime ihe kachasị mkpa na ọgụ megide ọchịchị ndị na-achị na Sudan
O mere ka ụmụ nwanyị nwee ike ịhazi iji ghọta ma chebe ikike mmekọrịta ha, akụ na ụba na nke obodo
E guzobere ya n'okpuru echiche pan-Africanist na nke socialist
A mụrụ Talib na 1 Jenụwarị 1928 na Al-Rank, na ndịda Sudan
Nna ya bụ onye isi ndị agha bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na mgbanwe nke 1924
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Unity High School na Khartoum ma site n'ebe ahụ bụ nwanyị mbụ si Sudan nwetara nzere na Mahadum London
Talib bụ nwanyị mbụ na Sudan ghọrọ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
N'oge ọrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Yemen, na-enye atụmatụ maka agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 2004, a gbara Talib ajụjụ ọnụ banyere ọrụ ya na nkwado ụmụ nwanyị Sudan

Fatima Togbe, onye aha ya zuru oke bụ Kike Fatima Togbe-Olory, bụ onye guzobere na onye isi nchịkwa nke Hayati Communications Group, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na ntụrụndụ nke na-elekwasị anya n'ịkwalite ndụ ụmụ nwanyị Alakụba ike na West Africa
Ọ malitere Hayati Magazine n'afọ 2012, Hayati Retail n'afọ 2015, Hayati Fashion Week na July 2017, na Hayati Magazine Français na October 2017
Fatima pụtara na abụọ maka mgbasa ozi Vlisco nke afọ 2017 (S2-2017 na S3-2017), nke na-eme ememe ụzọ dị iche iche na nke pụrụ iche ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka na-eyi vlisco
Ọ nọchitere anya ụdị Nestle, Goldern Morn Naịjịrịa na Maggi, dị ka onye nnọchi anya ha
Fatima Waziri-Azi bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria na onye bụbu onye isi ngalaba na-ahụ maka iwu ọha na Public Law at the Nigerian Institute of Advanced Legal Studies
Ọ bụ onye enyemaka pụrụiche nye onyeisiala mba Naijiria bụ Muhammadu Buhari n'ihe gbasara iwu site n'ọnwa Ọgọst nke Afọ 2019 tupu a họpụta ya dịka onyeisi NAPTIP
Nwanyị na-akwado ikike ziri ezi megide onye na-akwado ime ihe ike n'ụlọ na nke mmekọahụ na ọkachamara n'ịchịkwa iwu
Fatima Waziri-Azi gara Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria, nweta akara ugo mmụta bachelor na iwu na 2001

Ọ bụkwa onye otu, Chartered Institute of Arbitrators, UK (ACirb); Onye otu, Nigerian Bar Association (NBA); Onye otu, New York County Lawyers Association (NYCLA); Onye otu, Association of Women in Development (AWID); Onye otu, Women in International Security (WIIS)

Site n'ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 2005 ruo ọnwa Ọgọst nke afọ 2006, Fatima Waziri-Azi rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu/onye isi mmemme na ikike ụmụnwanyị, okwu ntuli aka, na ngalaba ndozigharị nke ikpe ziri ezi

Site n'ọnwa Febrụwarị nke afọ 2016 ruo Nọvemba 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha na mmemme na Kọmitii Ndụmọdụ Onye isi ala megide nrụrụ aka nke a kpọrọ Presidential Advisory Committee Against Corruption (PACAC) n'asụsụ bekee
Site n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-enye ndụmọdụ gbasara iwu n'ụlọ ọrụ osote onye isi oche nke Federal Republic of Nigeria
Na Septemba 2021, Fatima Waziri-Azi ka a họpụtara dịka onye isi oche nke National Agency for the Prohibition of Trafficking in Persons (NAPTIP)

Fatima Yusuf-Olukoju (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 2 n'ọnwa Mee afọ 1971 na Owo,dị na Ondo steeti) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria bụ onye egwuregwu ị gba ọsọ lagoro ezumike nka, onye sọrọ mpi ọkachasị na mita 400 n'oge ọrụ ya
Ọ meriri n'ọsọ mita 400 na 1991 All-Africa Games ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ na mita 200
Ọ lụrụ Adewale Olukoju
O mechara soro sọọ mpi mita 200 na World Championship na Spen ebe ọ gbara ọsọ 2228
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị Afrịka mbụ gbara ọsọ n'okpuru sekọnsụ 50 na mita 400
Ọ gbara 4943 na 1995 African Championship

Ọ sọrọ Naịjirịa asọmpi na 1996 Summer Olympics e mere n'Atlanta, n'Amerịka na mita 400 nke ọ gbatara onye nke 6 na oge nkesekọnsụ 4977 na mita 4 x 400 ebe o meriri nrite ọla ọcha ya na ndị otu ya Bisi Afolabi, Charity Opara na Falilat Ogunkoya n'azụ mba Amerịka
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Azusa Pacific
Fatima Zahra Bennacer (Arabic فاطمة الزهراء بناصر; a mụrụ n'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1981), bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere ọrụ nka ya n'afọ 1997 ma rụọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ mmepụta
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ ya na usoro TV 'An hour in hell' dịka Sophia, na ọrụ ya dịka nwa agbọghọ nnupụisi na usoro Ramadan TV Akba Lik
Fatima Zohra Cherif (amụrụ n'ime Nọvemba 8, 1986) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball
Klọb dị ugbu a WA Tlemcen
Fatimah Tuggar (onye a muru n'ụbọchị n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n’afọ1967) bu onye Naijiria na-ese ihe nke bi n'obodo Amerika
Vidio Tuggar na ọrụ dijitalụ ya na-enyocha mmetụta teknụzụnye ọdịbendị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
A mụrụ Tuggar na Kaduna,nke Naijiria, n'afọ 1967
Ugbu a o bi na Toronto,nke Ọntario, ebe ọ bụ osote Onye Nkụzi Ọkachamara na Ngalaba Nkà na Mahadum Ontario College of Art and Design University
Tuggar gụrụ akwụkwọ na Blackheath School of Art na Lọndọn,na Ịngland, tupu ọ nata nzere BFA na Kansas City Art Institute n'Amerịka
Tuggar nwetara nzere MFA ya na Mahadum Yale n'afọ 1995
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Yale, ọ gụrụ otu afọ ọmụmụ nke onwe ya na Whitney Museum of American Art
Ọ gakwara Kano Corona na Queens Collage Yaba na Naịjirịa tupu ọ gaa Convent of the Holy Family na Littlehampton, dị naSussex na Ịngland
Tuggar na-emepụta foto, ihe, nrụnye yana ọrụ nka mgbasa ozi na-akụzi nkuzi n'ịntaneetị
Ha na-abụkarị ihe nkiri sitere na ndụ ndị Afrịka na ndị Westị kwa ụbọchị
Nke a na-adọrọ uche gaa n'usoro metụtara ma na-atụle nrubeisi nke nwoke, nke ya, na echiche nke ọganihu

Tuggar gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ngosipụta otu na Museum of Modern Art ( MOMA ), New Museum of Contemporary Art, na ngosipụta nke mba ụwa kwa afọ dịka Moscow Biennale of Contemporary Art (2005), Palais des Beaux-Arts, Brussels (2003), Center Georges Pompidou na Paris (2005), na Bamako Biennal,na Mali, n'afọ 2003

Ọ natawo onyinye n'ụlọ ọrụ dịka WA Mellon Research Fellowship - John Hope Franklin Humanities Institute, Durham, NC, US, Artist Production Residency - Kitchen, New York, New York, US, Civitella Ranieri Fellowship - Civitella Ranieri, Umbertide, Umbria, Italia, Techno-Oboro Residency - Oboro Arts Center, Montreal, Canada, Techno-Oboro Residency - Oboro Arts Center Montreal, Canada, Contemporary Art, Copenhagen, Denmark

Ihe ndị ahụ na-agụnyekarị ụdị birikọleej ; ijikọta ihe abụọ ma ọ bụ karịa sitere na Westen Afrịka na nhata na be ndị ọcha iji kwuo maka ọkụ eletrik, akụrụngwa, ị nweta na mmetụta mmeghachi omume n'etiti teknụzụ na ọdịbendị
N'otu aka ahụ, mọnteeji kọmputa ya na ọrụ nchịkọta vidiyo na-eweta vidiyo na foto o sere ma chọta ihe sitere na azụmahịa, akwụkwọ akụkọ na eserese ochie
Ihe mghọta pụtaara Tuggar dị n'ime eserese ndị a nke na-enyocha etu mgbasa ozi si emetụta ndụ anyị kwa ụbọchị
Nchịkọta ọrụ Tuggar na-eji atụmatụ nke mmezi iji gbaghaa echiche anyị na mgbakwunye n'ụzọ ndị ọzọ
Ọrụ niile na-ekwupụta echiche gbasara agbụrụ, okike nwoke na nwanyị na klaasị ; akpaghasị echiche anyị banyere isiokwu
Ọrụ ya na-egosipụta njirimara ọtụtụ ihe ma na-agbagha echiche nke e ji mara Afrịka
Ọrụ ya na-ekwu maka isiokwu nwere ike ị kpachapụ anya dịka agbụrụ, teknụzụ na omenala mgbe ọchịchị gachara
Onye na-ese ihe na-ahọrọ ịghara ịgbasa ozi ngosi, kama ọ bụ iji kọwaa nụwansis ọdịbendị nke karịrị ihe atụ doro anya nke omenaala
Iji maa atụ, na ihe osise afọ 1996 ya a kpọrọ Turntable, Tuggar na-eji diski rafia eme ihe n'ọnọdụ vaịnịl rekọọdụ
Ihe osise a na-ekwu maka ụzọ i webata gramafon si metụta mmepe asụsụ obodo
N'ihi myiri vịnịlnyl na fai-fai n'ọtụtụ asụsụ ndị ugwu nke Naijiria, vaịnịl nwetara aha ya site na diski rafia
Iji maa atụ, n’asụsụ Awụsa a na-akpọ diski rafia fai-fai, ma vaịnịl bụ fai-fain gramofon
Kpọmkwem, ọrụ onye na-ese ihe na-egosi etu okwu ndị a si arụ ọrụ site na omume ngosipụta ọhụụ dị ka mgbasa ozi telivishọn, ihe nkiri Hollywood, na imepụta ngwaahịa

Fusion Cuisine, nke njikọ aka ya na Kitchen (ụlọ ọrụ nka na-ahụ maka ọrụ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ na New York), ji egwu na-ekpughe echiche efu nke ndị Amerịka maka teknụzụ ndị ahịa dị ka nnwere onwe na ọganihu mba mgbe ha na-ekpughere agbụrụ na mpaghara ala nke na-abụ ntọala nke ọhụụ ndị a nke ọdịnihu

Ihe onyonyo a nwere eserese abụọ mgbasa ozi agha mba ụwa nke abụọ nke Amerịka na-akpọsa teknụzụ ụlọ ma lekwasị anya n'ebe ụmụ nwanyị ọcha nke Amerịka nọ na klasị etiti, na ihe osise nke ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka nọ na vidio nke onye na-ese ihe nkiri na Naijiria
Fusion Cuisine na-agbanwe n'etiti ihe nkiri ochie nke ihe efu nke ndụ nke oge a na suburbia na ihe osise ndị na-adịbeghị anya nke ọrụ ụlọ n'egwuregwu na Naijiria
Na mọnteeji komputa ya na vidio, Tuggar chịkọtara onyonyo nke na-enyocha ọdịnala yana mmekọrịta dị iche n'etiti ndị mmadụ na ikike
N'ime ọrụ mmekọrịta ya na weebụ, ndị sonyere nwere ike ị mepụta nchịkọta nke onwe ha site na ịhọrọ ihe ndị na-eme egwuregwu na ndabere
Usoro a na-enye ndị sonyere ohere iwu ma ọ bụ mebie akụkọ nke enweghị usoro

Ihe mmekorita kolaaji ya, 'Transient Transfer', na-enye ndi ozo ohere ikeputa ihe ndi ozo na Greensboro n'afọ 2011 ma obu Bronx n'afọ 2008 (lee ' Street Art, Street Life Site n'afọ 1950s ruo taa ' na The Bronx Museum of the Arts, New York )

Na oru webusaiti afọ 2006 ya, Triad Raid, e keputara dika akuku nke Rethinking Nordic Colonialism, Tuggar “na-enye onye obula / onye sonyere na onodu ike buru ibu nke i me ihe ha chọrọ, ma ọbụ ị hapụ Omume ma obu emeghi ihe n’ime mpaghara a na-emepụta ihe kolaaji di egwu
Nke a bụ kolaajie a rụrụ site na Characters icons and totems, Context landscapes and commodities, and Behaviors actions and interactions n'etiti ihe niile ndị a
Nke a na - agba ume ịmepụta akụkọ obere oge na - enweghị usoro, nke e nwere ike wulite ma ọ bụ mebie dabere na nhọrọ nke onye ahụ sonyere
Isi ihe dị na ya bụ mmata nke nhọrọ na nsonaazụ nke ịme ma ọ bụ ị họrọ ịghara igosipụta ikike a
Ihe ngosi ndi ozo gunyere
(2015) ' Art Appropriation Finding Meaning in Found-Image Collage ' ( Bascom Ebe Nlekọta Maka Visual Arts, Highlands, North Carolina)
(2013) ' Na / Anya Seams ' (Mechanical Hall Gallery, Mahadum nke Delaware, Newark, DE)
(2012, 2011, 2010) ' Ihe ndekọ ahụ Contemporary Art and Vinyl ' ( Nasher Museum of Art, Mahadum Duke ; Institute of Contemporary Art, Boston, MA)
(2012) 'Harlem Postcards' (Studio Museum Harlem, New York, NY)
(2009) 'Tell Me Again A Concise Retrospective' (Franklin Humanities Institute, Duke University, Durham, NC)
(2009) ' On Screen Global Intimacy ' (Artspace at Kansas City Art Institute, Kansas City, MO)
(2005) 'Inna's Recipe' (Indiana Black Expo's Summer Celebration, Cultural Arts Pavilion, Indianapolis, Indiana)
(2005) ' Rencontres de Bamako Biennale Africaine de la Photographie Telling Time '
(2001) 'Empire/State Artists Engaging Globalization' (The Art Gallery of the Graduate Center, The City University of New York)
(2000) 'Poetics and Power' (Museum of Contemporary Art Cleveland)
(2000) 'Crossing the Line' (Queens Museum of Art)
(2000) 'The New World, The Vices and Virtues, Bienal de Valencia, Spain Bienal de Maia (Porto, Portugal)
(2000) 'Celebrations' (Galeria Joao Graça, Lisbon, Portugal)
(2000) 'At the Water Tap' (Greene Naftali Gallery, New York)

(1999) 'Beyond Technology Working in Brooklyn' (Brooklyn Museum of Art, New York)
(1998) 'Village Spells' (Plexusorg)
Fatimat Olufunke Raji-Rasaki
A mụrụ Raji-Rasaki na Ekiti State na 1 Jenụwarị 1957
Ọ gara Doherty Memorial Grammar School na Ijero, tupu ya amụ na Mahadum Lagos
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchiteanya maka steeti Ekiti
E nwere ihe karịrị otu narị ndị otu a họpụtara na nzukọ agako nke esato na 2015, mana naanị isii n'ime ndị a bụ ụmụ nwanyị
Ndị ọzọ bụ Stella Oduah na Uche Ekwunife bụ ndị na-anọchite anya Anambra, Rose Okoji Oko, Oluremi Tinubu na Binta Garba
N'afọ 2016, ọ gbara afọ iriano nke alụmdi na nwunye Brigadier General Raji Alagbe Rasaki
Fatin Abdel Wahab (22 Nọvemba 1913 - 12 Mee 1972) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ijipt
O duziri ihe nkiri ịrị ise na abụọ n'agbata afọ 1949 na 1970
E tinyere ihe nkiri ya nke 1961 a kpọrọ Wife Number 13 n'ime 12th Berlin International Film Festival
E tinyere ihe nkiri ya nke 1965 Driven from Paradise n'ime 4th Moscow International Film Festival
Fatma Zahra Djouad (amụrụ 12, Julaị 1988) bụ nwa agbọghọ Algeria na egwu volleyball
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Algeria
O sonyere na 2013 FIVB Volleyball Ukwu ụwaPrix
N'ọkwa klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka MBBEJAIA n'afọ 2013
Fatma Zohra Ouhachi-Vesely (née Ksentini) bụ nwanyị Algeria bụ onye mbụ na-edekọ akụkọ pụrụ iche nke United Nations maka mkpofu site na 1995 ruo 2004
Tupu ọ nọrọ n'ọkwa ya, ọ bụ onye nta akụkọ pụrụ iche na Sub-Commission on Prevention of Discrimination and Protection of Minorities site na 1989 ruo 1994
Ksentini bụ akụkụ nke Sub-Commission on Prevention of Discrimination and Protection of Minorities mgbe akpọrọ ya onye nta akụkọ pụrụ iche na ikike mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi na 1989
Maka United Nations Commission on Human Rights, ọ malitere nyocha afọ anọ gbasara ikike mmadụ gburugburu ebe obibi na 1990
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị nyocha ya na 1994, o tinyere nchọpụta ya wee bịanye aka na Draft Declaration of Principles on Human Rights and the Environment
N'afọ 1995, Ksentini ghọrọ onye na-akọ akụkọ pụrụ iche nke United Nations na ihe mkpofu na ya
N'oge mmalite nke ọrụ ya, ọ chịkọtara ozi gbasara mmetụta ahụike nke iwepụ ihe mkpofu na-egbu egbu
Mgbe o nyechara akụkọ ya na 1997, Ksentini katọrọ Ọfịs nke Kọmishọna Ukwu nke Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu maka ikike mmadụ maka ịghara inye ya ego dị mkpa iji mee nyocha n'ala
Mgbe a họpụtara ya ọzọ na 1998, Ksentini malitere ịmepụta atụmatụ maka iwepụ ihe mkpofu na-egbu egbu na mba ndị na - na
Oge ikpeazụ ya dị ka Special Rapporteur malitere na 2001 wee gwụ na 2004
Ewezuga ọrụ ya dị ka Special Rapporetur, Ksentini bụ onyeisi oche nke Working Group on Contemporary Forms of Slavery na 1991
Ksentini lụrụ Maazị Ouhachi-Vesely
Fatou Bom Bensouda nee Nyang (amụrụ ya n' abali 31 na Ọnwa mbụ 1961)
Ọ bu onye Ọka-Ikpe Gambia, Onye Ndụmọdụ ikpeazụ Yahya Jammeh, Ọ bu onye Ọka-Ikpe, onye mkpegbu na onye ndụmọdụ Iwu nke mba ụwa

Ọbụrụla onye Isi nke mkpegbu n'ụlọ ịkpe nke mba ụwa, si te na ọnwa isii, na-afo puku abụọ n' iri na abụọ, mgbe ọrụchara ọrụ dịka onye n' esota onye mkpegbu n' ụlọ ịkpe mba ụwa{{en}} Ọ chiala dika Onye Ndụmọdụ n' Iwu n' onye Ọka-Ikpe n'otu Ikpe nke mba Rụwanda
A mụrụ ya n' abali 31 n' Ọnwa mbụ 1961 na Banjul (a maara dika Bathurst) na mba Gambia
Bensouda bụ nwa nwanyi nke Maazi Omar Gaye Nyang, onye na-akwali Igba Mgba
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nke Primari na Sekọndri na mba Gambia tupu Ọ gawa mba Naijiria ebe ọ gụrụ Ọka-Ikpe Ikpe na Mahadum nke di na IFE na-afọ 1986
Na-afọ nke ọzọ, onwetara asambodo na Barrista-nke-Law (BL) na Naijiria Law School
O mechara bụrụ onye ọkachamara nke mbụ na maritime law nke mba Gana mgbe onwetachara Master of laws n'International Maritime Law Institute nke di na mba Malta
Bensouda lụrụ onye azumahia nke Gambian–Moroccan a na-akpo Phillip Bensouda, Ha nwere ụmụ ato, otu onye bụ nke ha nakweere

Fatou Bensouda played a central role in the early years of the Gambian Yahya Jammeh putschist regime, being chosen as his legal adviser after his 1994 putsch, before becoming his Minister in 1998 and 'being sacked' in 2000
Jammeh's rule has been recurrently denounced for its disrespect of human rights, being considered as one of the 'worst dictatorships in the world'
Fatou Diome (a mụrụ n'afọ 1968 na Niodior ) bụ onye edemede French-Senegalese nke a maara maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya kachasị ere ahịa The Belly of the Atlantic, nke e bipụtara n'afọ 2001
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha ndụ ndị mbịarambịa na France, na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti France na Africa
Fatou Diome bi na Strasbourg, France
A mụrụ Fatou Diome na Niodior n'àgwàetiti nke otu aha ahụ na Sine-Saloum Delta
Nne nne ya zụlitere ya ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ ma nwee mmasị n'akwụkwọ French
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, ọ hapụrụ Niodior wee gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na M'Bour
Mgbe ọ mmesịrị, ọ kwagara Dakar ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na mahadum, na-akwado onwe ya site n'ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ụlọ
N'afọ 1990, ọ lụrụ onye France wee kwaga France
N'ịbụ onye ezinụlọ Serer na ezinụlọ ya jụrụ, ọ gbara alụkwaghịm afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị
N'afọ 1994 Diome kwagara Strasbourg ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Strasbourg
Aha nke PhD
ya bụ Le Voyage, les échanges et la formation dans l'œuvre littéraire et cinématographique de Ousmane Sembène (Njem, mgbanwe, na agụmakwụkwọ na edemede na ọrụ ihe nkiri nke Ousmane Sembène)
Site n'afọ 2002 ruo afọ 2003, Diome bụ onye nkuzi oge ọkara na Mahadum Marc Bloch, Strasbourg, na Institute of Pedagogy nke Karlsruhe (Germany)
Site na Septemba 2004 ruo Nọvemba 2006, ọ gosipụtara mmemme telivishọn omenala na edemede Nuit Blanche (Sleepless night) na Ọwa French France 3 Alsace
Diome bipụtara nchịkọta akụkọ dị mkpirikpi, La Préférence nationale, n'afọ 2001
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, The Belly of the Atlantic (French ) ghọrọ akwụkwọ kacha ere ahịa na France ma bipụta ya n'asụsụ Bekee site na Serpent's Tail
[nkọwa dị mkpa] Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya bụ akụkụ nke akụkọ ndụ ya ma na-ekwu maka Salie, onye mbịarambịa Senegal bi na Strasbourg, na nwanne ya nwoke Madicke, onye nọrọ na Senegal
Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke mgba gasịrị, Salie emechaala rute ma biri na France
Nwanne ya nwoke nke nta na-atụ anya iso ya gaa France ma bụrụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ na-aga nke ọma
A sụgharịrị The Belly of the Atlantic n'asụsụ Bekee, German na Spanish
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ, Kétala, n'afọ 2006 na France
Ọrụ Diome na-enyocha France na Senegal, na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti mba abụọ ahụ
Ụdị ya na-emetụta akwụkwọ ọdịnala nke Afrịka
Asụsụ ya bụ eziokwu ma doo anya, ọ na-egosipụtakwa ihe ngosi nke ihe isi ike nke ijikọta na France dị ka onye mbịarambịa, agwakọta ya na nostalgia na ncheta nke nwata na Senegal
Fatou Diome na-enupụ isi megide ndị na-enweghị ndidi, ọ na-agbachitere ọrụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ na Republicanism
N'ihu ịrị elu nke populism, a na-akpọ Fatou Diome mgbe niile ka ọ kesaa echiche ya banyere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na mgbasa ozi telivishọn ma ọ bụ mgbasa ozi
Karịsịa, ọ na-ewere ọnọdụ siri ike megide ịrị elu nke populism na France na “Rassemblement National'

Dị ka onye edemede, n'akwụkwọ ya, ọ chọrọ ichetara ndị mmadụ mkpa nke ụkpụrụ republican na nke mmadụ n'ihi na ọ kwenyere na 'mgbe anyị na-eche ndị na-echegbu onwe ha banyere njirimara mba ihu, anyị agakwaghị ịgbachi nkịtị
Diome na-agbaso isiokwu nke ụgwọ na neoliberalization na 'Le ventre de l'Atlantique' (2003) na 'Celles qui attendent' (2010)
N'ime ọrụ abụọ ahụ, a na-eji ụgwọ agbachitere usoro erughị ala ma na-akpali ndị mbịarambịa ịchụso ọrụ na mba ndị ọzọ n'okpuru ọnọdụ na-adịghị mma
Diome na-agbakwa ozi maka imekọ ihe ọnụ n'etiti Europe na Africa
O kwenyere na, n'oge a, Europe na-achịkwa imekọ ihe ọnụ nhaghị nhata ebe Africa enweghị njikwa na akụ ya
Ọ na-agbachitere echiche ahụ bụ na mmekọrịta ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị na-anọgide na-adịgide adịgide na ndị Afrịka na ndị Europe ọ bụla, nke na-egbochi imekọ ihe ọnụ a ka ọ ghara ịdị n'otu
Ọ na-eche na onye ọ bụla, n'agbanyeghị ebe o si, 'kwesịrị inwe mmetụta mmadụ mgbe ọ na-eche mmadụ ọzọ ihu

Ya mere, n'etinyeghị ibu ọrụ n'otu kọntinent karịa na nke ọzọ, Fatou Diome na-ekwupụta mkpa ọ dị ndị Afrịka ịtọhapụ onwe ha n'ọnọdụ ha na-emegbu na ndị Europe ịhapụ ọnọdụ ha dị elu iji kwụsị atụmatụ mmegbu / mmegbu, ndị na-enye onyinye / ndị nnata
N'ikpeazụ, onye edemede ahụ kwuru na inyere ndị mmadụ aka pụtara inyere ha aka ka ha ghara ịchọ gị ọzọ, na-akatọ enyemaka mmepe nke mba ọdịda anyanwụ guzobere na Afrịka n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Fatou Djibo (27 Eprel 1927 - 6 Eprel 2016) bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị, onye na-ahụ Maka ụmụ nwanyị, nkụzi na onye na-arụ ọrụ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Union des Femmes du Niger ma bụrụkwa nwanyị mbụ si Niger na-anya ụgbọala
A mụrụ Fadima Hassane Diallo na 27 Eprel 1927, nna Djibo bụ Chief Djagourou, onye ọchịchị ọdịnala nke ndị ọchịchị French họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye isi distrikti nke Téra ebe a mụrụ ya

N'ime nzọụkwụ a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'oge ahụ, o zigara nwa ya nwanyị, mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị e meghere ọhụrụ na Téra ma n'ihi ya bụrụ otu n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ Naijiria mbụ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị dị elu na isi obodo Niamey ma mesịa gaa n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ ndị nkuzi École normal de Rufisque na Senegal
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1946
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ lụrụ onye nkuzi Djibo Yacouba onye ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ asatọ
Site na 1946 ruo 1966, Djibo rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, na mbụ na Fada N'Gourma ma mesịa na Maradi, Zinder, Tillabéri na Niamey
N'afọ 1954 ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na-anya ụgbọala na Niger
Djibo guzobere otu ụmụ nwanyị Union des Femmes du Niger (UFN) na 7 Machị 1959, nke ọ bụ onye isi oche ya ruo ọtụtụ afọ
N'afọ 1962, o duuru ndị nnọchi anya si n'òtù ahụ gaa Cairo
N'oge Republic Mbụ (1960-1974) ọ bụ ihu ọha maka nchegbu ụmụ nwanyị na Niger
O kwuru na mmepe nke mba enweghị ike zuru ezu na-enweghị nnwere onwe nke ụmụ nwanyị nakwa na iwu kwesịrị ekwesị ga-akwụsị mmebi na mmechuihu nke ụmụ nwanyị
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ hụrụ ọrụ bụ isi nke nwanyị Naijiria dị ka onye nkuzi nke ụmụ amaala ọdịnihu
N'afọ 1969, Djibo sooro di ya gaa Brussels mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị na 1968 ọ laghachiri Niger, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke Lycée Kassaï School na Niamey
N'afọ 1971, ọ bụkwa osote onye na-ahụ maka akụ nke Union of Workers' Trade Unions of Niger
N'afọ 1978, o kelere USSR maka onyinye ọgwụ na ngwá ọgwụ ya nye Niger Red Cross
N'afọ 1979, ọ gara ogbako mba ụwa gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na idu ndú
Djibo lara ezumike nká na 1983 wee gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ afọ ofufo maka òtù ọrụ, Red Cross na òtù ndị ọzọ
Ọ nwụrụ na Niamey na 6 Eprel 2016
Fatou Jeng bụ onye na-eto eto na-agba mbọ maka ọdịmma ihu igwe na Gambia, lekwasịrị anya na agụmakwụkwọ, nchekwa na ịkụ osisi

A maara ya n'ụwa niile dị ka onye na-ahazi ọrụ ihu igwe ndị ntorobịa na mba ahụ, gụnyere ịnabata National Youth Conference on Climate Change, onye nhazi mba na onye otu ụlọ ọrụ zuru ụwa ọnụ maka Plant-for-the-Planet, na onye nhazi Friday for Future

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi, ọkà okwu, na onye enyemaka maka ọtụtụ mmemme mba ya nakwa nke mba ụwa gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe gụnyere COP23 na COP24, Global Landscapes Forum's 2018 Bonn conference, Action for Climate Empowerment Youth Forum 2018, na ndị ọzọ
eng guzobekwara ndị ntorobịa na-eduga na òtù na-enweghị uru Clean Earth Gambia
Ebumnuche nke nzukọ ahụ bụ ime ka a mara banyere nsogbu gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi, nke kachasị mkpa bụ mgbanwe ihu igwe
Tinyere ịrụ ọrụ iji kụzie ma zụọ ihe karịrị ụmụakaụkwọ 5narị ise basara mgbanwe ihu igwe yana nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi na obodo ndị dị n'ógbè
N'afọ 2019, n'ọgbakọ UNFCC YOUNGO nke mbụ, ndị nnọchi anya ndị ntorobịa na mkparitaụka maka ịhụ igwe, ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ iri atọ ahọpụtara
Na mgbakọ nke United Nations, ọ bụ onye na-akpali itinye iwu n'okpuru okike na mgbanwe ihu igwe yana ọrụ iwu na-eduga maka ụmụ nwanyị na okike
N'afọ 2019, o nyere aka mee ka ndị ntorobịa sonye n'oge izu ihu igwe Africa
Ọ bụ QTV Youth Dialogue Gambian Youth of the Month na Jụn 2019 maka nkwado mgbanwe ihu igwe ya, nke Whatson Gambia kọwara dị ka otu n'ime ndị ntorobịa Gambia ịrị atọ kachasị nwee mmetụta
N'afọ 2021, African Alliance of YMCAs, African Wildlife Fund, na nchịkọta nke ọtụtụ òtù mba ụwa na-anaghị achọ uru, nabatara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi otu nari na-eto eto na-ahụ maka nchekwa
Jeng bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Gambia, ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi oche nke otu ụmụ akwụkwọ mahadum ahụ
Ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ ugbu a na Mahadum Sussex ebe ọ na-agbaso nzere masta ya na gburugburu ebe obibi, mmepe, na iwu
Fatou N'Diaye bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, sitere na Senegal, a mụrụ n'afọ 1980 na Saint-Louis du Sénégal
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, ya na nne ya hapụrụ Senegal wee kwaga Paris

Fatou mụtara Guinea-Bissau Creole maka ọrụ ya dịka Vita na ihe nkiri afọ 2002 Nha fala

Ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ ya bụ maka ikike ụmụaka ma bipụta ya na nkwado nke UNICEF na gọọmentị Senegal
N'afọ 1989, o sonyere na 5th PEN International Congress

Fatou Tiyana (amụrụ na Febụwarị 24, 1987) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu ọsọ ọsọ nke na-asọmpi mba ụwa maka otu egwuregwu Olympic nke Gambia
Tiyana nọchitere anya Gambia na 2008 Summer Olympics na Beijing

Fatoumata Bagayoko (amụrụ na onwa Mee 23, na afọ 1988) bụ onye Mali na-agba bọọlụ basketball
Bagayoko sonyeere Mali na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics, ebe o nwetara 21 na egwuregwu 5, gụnyere akara 8 na mmeri ikpeazụ na Spain

Àtụ Navboxes
Fatoumata Coulibaly bụ onye Mali na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, onye nta akụkọ, na onye na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị, ọkachasị megide igbu ụmụ nwanyị (FGM)
Fatoumata Coulibaly si n'ezinụlọ ndị na-agụ egwú, nne nne ya Bazéko Traoré bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eti egwu si mpaghara Sikasso, ebe Coulibalys si

Coulibaly rụrụ ọrụ mbụ dịka onye nta akụkọ redio na onye mgbasa ozi na Mali, tupu o nwee echiche maka egwuregwu, wee gaa hụ onye nduzi Ousmane Sow, onye tụrụ aro ka ọ gbalịa ide ya dịka edemede ihe nkiri, dịka Cheick Oumar Sissoko
Coulibaly bu ụzọ dọta uche mba ụwa site na ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri 1997 N'Golo dit Papa
Coulibaly rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri 2004 Moolaadé site n'aka onye edemede na onye nduzi Senegalese Ousmane Sembène

Coulibaly gosipụtara dịka Collé Gallo Ardo Sy, nke abụọ n'ime ndị nwunye atọ nke di ya, n'otu obodo dị na Burkina Faso, onye na-eji moolaadé ('nchebe anwansi') iji gbalịa ichebe ụmụ agbọghọ pụọ na nkwarụ nwanyị (FGM)
Coulibaly n'onwe ya abụrụla onye a na-egbu egbu n'ahụ nwanyị
Onye nkatọ Roger Ebert nyere ihe nkiri ahụ kpakpando anọ (n'ime anọ), na-ede 'maka m ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Cannes 2004, akụkọ na-eme ka ọ dị ngwa na ndụ
Ọ na-eme nkwupụta dị ike ma n'otu oge ahụ nwee ọchị, ịma mma na ịma mma anya dị ịtụnanya
' Coulibaly ritere ihe nrite Best Actress maka ọrụ ya dịka Collé, na Cinemanila International Film Festival n'afọ 2005
E dekọrọ mkpọsa ya megide FGM na ihe nkiri Africa on the Move The Power of Song (2010)
Coulibaly apụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, usoro telivishọn na egwuregwu
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2016, Coulibaly na-arụ ọrụ maka Office de radiodiffusion télévision du Mali (Office of Broadcasting Television of Mali) (ORTM)
Fatoumata Diabaté, (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 19 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1980) bụ onye Mali na-ese foto si Bamako

N'afọ 2002, mgbe ọ nọrọ ọnwa itoolu na Centre de Formation Audiovisuel Promo-Femmes training center na Bamako, Diabaté gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na Centre de Formation en Photographie de Bamako (CFP), nke bu n'obi ime ka ndị na-ese foto na Mali bụrụ ndị ọkachamara
E nyere ya ọzụzụ izu abụọ n'ebe ahụ
Mgbe e mesịrị, a hụrụ ya maka mkpali ya na talent ya, wee debe ya ma zụọ ya ruo afọ abụọ ọzọ
Diabaté mechara ọzụzụ ya na Switzerland na Vevey Professional Education Center wee laghachi na CFP na Bamako, ebe ọ bụ onye enyemaka teknụzụ site n'afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2009
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Central DUPON's professional printing laboratory na Paris
Ọmụmụ ihe ya nyere ya ohere iji meziwanye nkà ya na foto gelatin ọlaọcha ojii na-acha ọcha na isonye n'ọtụtụ ọmụmụ ihe na Mali, yana mba ofesi
O kwuru na onye na-ese foto na Mali bụ Seydou Keïta, onye bụ onye agbata obi ya mgbe ọ na-etolite, dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe
Diabaté enyewokwa Malick Sidibé, Samuel Fosso, na Oumar Ly, ndị niile bụ ndị ọkachamara na-ese foto studio nke Africa

Diabaté esonyewo n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu nakwa ndị o mere nanị ya ma nwetakwa ọtụtụ onyinye, ọkachasị Prix Afrique, nke Association française d'action artistique nyere na-esote 2005 Rencontres africaines de la photographie biennial, Bamako, ebe o nwetara ihe nrite Afrique en Créations maka ọrụ ya Touaregs, en gestes et en mouvements Igwefoto ọ họọrọ bụ igwefoto ọhụụ oge ochie, nke o jiri mee ihe n'ime ụlọ ọrụ na-ebugharị / ntinye na ọrụ ya Studio Photo de la Rue, iji mepụta ihe nkiri maka ndị ọ na-achị, ọ bụkwa isi na-ahụ maka ọrụ nke foto studio nke Afrịka kwuru n'elu
[nkọwa dị mkpa] Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na usoro foto analog, ma oji ma ọcha na agba
Diabaté eseela foto na kọmitii maka World Press Photo, Oxfam, Rolex, na Bill na Melinda Gates Foundation

Fatuma Roba (Amharic ፋጡማ ሮባ; amụrụ na 18 Disemba, na afọ 1973) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge, nke a maara nke ọma maka ịbụ nwanyị Afrịka mbụ meriri nrite ọla edo na asọmpi Olympic marathon nke ụmụ nwanyị na Atlanta 1996 Summer Olympics na maka mmeri atọ na-esote Boston Marathons
A mụrụ Fatuma Roba na 18 Disemba, na afọ 1973 na Bekoji, Ethiopia
Ka Fatuma na-etolite, ọ dịghị nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe dị anya na-agba ọsọ n'ime Etiopia, naanị Abebe Bikila
Mgbe Fatuma nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, a naghị agba ya ume ịgba ọsọ mana o kpebiri ịga n'ihu n'agbanyeghị
Ọ bụ Sentayehu Eshetu zụrụ ya, onye ya na ndị na-eme egwuregwu dịka Derartu Tulu rụburu ọrụ
O mere otu mba mbụ ya n'afọ 1988, na ọkara marathon
N'afọ ahụ, ọ nọ n'elu iri na asọmpi ụwa, ka ọ na-erule afọ 1992, ọ ka mma ruo nke isii
Mgbe ọ bịarutere nke mbụ na juniors na nke asaa n'ozuzu na New York Mini Marathon, o kpebiri ịnwale marathon zuru oke

Ya mere na afọ 1994, o sonyere na Paris Marathon, na-emecha nke iri na itoolu, mgbe e mesịrị kwuo 'mgbe m mechara m kwuru, ;Ọ dịghị mgbe ọzọ, agaghị m eme nke a ọzọ, ọ dị ogologo!' Aṅụara m mmiri nke ukwuu, enwere m nsogbu afọ, mgbe 14km gachara agwụla m
Ọ hapụrụ ogologo oge maka afọ na-esote, mana na ụbọchị 25 ga-aga ruo na afọ 1995 World Championships in Athletics, a tụrụ aro na ọ ga-asọmpi ebe ọ bụ na Ethiopia anaghị eziga onye ọzọ
Ya mere, ọ gbara ọsọ, wee gbaa ọsọ ruo kilota 25 (16 mi), mana mgbe ahụ ọ na-enwe isi ọwụwa ma daa ọtụtụ ugboro
Ọ gwụchara nke iri na itoolu, na oge nke 2 39 27, mana arụmọrụ ya mere ka ọ banye n'ụlọ ọgwụ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
Mana Fatuma kpebiri ịga n'ihu na ọzụzụ n'ebe ahụ
O meriri marathon mbụ ya na Marrakech na mbido afọ 1996, tupu ya emeri Rome Marathon ọnwa abụọ ka e mesịrị
N'etiti ọsọ abụọ ahụ, ọ meziwanyere oge kachasị mma ya site na otu nkeji
Mgbe mmeri na Rome gasịrị, a họpụtara ya maka ndị otu Etiopia na 1996 Summer Olympics, na Atlanta, United States, ma mee ka ọzụzụ ya sie ike

O mechara kwuo na site na kilota iri na asatọ (11 mi) na marathon ụmụ nwanyị na Atlanta Games, o doro anya na ọ meriri n'ọsọ ahụ n'ihi na ndị ọzọ na-agba ọsọ na-agwụ ike n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-achọta ọsọ ahụ
Site na mmeri ya na ihe nrite ọla edo, Fatuma ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ si mba Afrịka meriri n'asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na egwuregwu Olimpik

Fatuma merikwara Boston Marathons ugboro atọ n'usoro site na 1997-1999 Onye mmeri Boston ugboro atọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ ghara inwe akara nke anọ n'usoro n'afọ 2000, na-abịa na nke atọ na njedebe kachasị nso n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
O mechara kwuo 'Ọ dị mma, nye m, marathons kachasị ukwuu n'ime marathons niile bụ Olympic Marathon, mana ebe nke abụọ bụ Boston'
Àtụ Footer Olympic Champions Marathon Women

Ọ bụ onye nwetara ọla ọcha n'egwuregwu Afrịka nke afọ 2019 na mita 400
Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri nke ndị ntorobịa Afrịka nke afọ 2019 na 200 na 400 mita
Mgbe ọ dị naanị 16, ọ nọchitere anya obodo ya na 2019 World Relays na Yokohama na-agba ọsọ na 4 × 100 m na 4 × 400 m relays
Akpọrọ ya aha onye na-eme egwuregwu nke nwanyị zutere na asọmpi 2019 African U18 na U20 na egwuregwu mgbe o meriri ma asọmpi mita 200 na 400

Fawzia Yusuf Haji Adam (Somali Fawzia Yusuf H
Adam, Arabic ) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Somalia
Site na 4 Nọvemba na afọ 2012 ruo 17 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2014, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ na osote praịm minista nke Somalia na osote onye isi ala nke Somalia
N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2012, Praịm Minista Abdi Farah Shirdon họpụtara Adam ka ọ bụrụ Minista Na-ahụ Maka Mba Ọzọ na osote Praịm Mịnịsta nke Somalia
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara maka ọnọdụ ahụ
A họpụtara Adan ka ọ bụrụ osote praịm minista
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2012, ndị ọchịchị gọọmentị Somalia rịọrọ ndị United Nations Security Council maka enyemaka n'inweghachi akụ na ego ọha na eze na-ejide na mba ọzọ
Ndị ọchịchị mba ọzọ, ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị mba ọzọ emeela ka ihe onwunwe steeti ahụ kpọnwụrụ akpọnwụ mgbe ọdịda nke gọọmentị etiti Somalia na na afọ 1991 iji gbochie iji ya eme ihe n'enweghị ikike

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2013, Adan na ndị ọzọ so na kọmitii Somalia malitere usoro nyocha na mweghachi nke akụ mba Somalia, nke gụnyere ụgbọ mmiri na ụgbọelu ndị ekwere na a ga-eme na Ịtali, Germany na Yemen
Na ngwụcha Mee, na afọ 2013, Adan na Minista Na-ahụ Maka Mba Ọzọ nke United Arab Emirates Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed Al Nahyan bịanyere aka na Memorandum of Understanding on bilateral cooperation
Nkwekọrịta ahụ na-eweghachi mmekọrịta mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Somalia na UAE, ma na-elekwasịkwa anya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nchekwa, akụ na ụba, itinye ego na ngalaba mmepe
Tụkwasị na nke a, gọọmentị Emirati mara ọkwa na ọ ga-emeghe ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya ya na Mogadishu

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2013, mgbe ya na osote onye isi ala China bụ Wang Yang nwesịrị nzukọ, Adan kwupụtara na ndị ọchịchị Somalia na-atụ anya imekọ ihe ọnụ na gọọmentị China na ike, akụrụngwa, nchekwa mba na ngalaba ọrụ ugbo, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Wang toro ọbụbụenyi ọdịnala dị n'etiti mba abụọ ahụ ma kwughachi mkpebi China na usoro udo Somalia
Na Septemba, na afọ 2013, gọọmentị abụọ ahụ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta mmekọrịta gọọmentị na Mogadishu dị ka akụkụ nke atụmatụ mgbake mba afọ ise na Somalia
Nkwekọrịta ahụ ga-ahụ ndị ọchịchị China ka ha wughachi ọtụtụ ihe owuwu dị mkpa na isi obodo Somalia na ebe ndị ọzọ, gụnyere National Theatre, ụlọ ọgwụ, na Mogadishu Stadium
Tụkwasị na nke a, onye nnọchi anya China bụ Liu Guangyoun gosipụtara na China ga-emeghe ụlọ ọrụ nnọchi anya ya na Mogadishu n'ala nke gọọmentị Somalia nyere maka nzube ahụ

Oge Adan dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi na osote praịm minista nke Somalia kwụsịrị na 17 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2014, mgbe praịm Minista ọhụrụ Abdiweli Sheikh Ahmed họpụtara Abdirahman Duale Beyle dị ka Minisita na-ahụ Maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ na Ridwan Hirsi Mohamed dị ka osote praikm minista
Adam na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Somalia na ntuli aka onye isi ala Somalia nke afọ 2022
Àtụ Somali presidential elections
Fawziya Abikar Nur (Somali ) bụ Minista Federal nke Somalia maka ahụike na nlekọta ọha na eze kemgbe Machị 2017
A zụrụ ya n'iwu na ahụike ọha na eze ma rụọ ọrụ na World Health Organization
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ n'oge ntiwapụ nke ọrịa COVID-19 na Somalia na mbata nke ọgwụ mgbochi mbụ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu na Mahadum Mba Somalia ma na Febụwarị 1985 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Ọ gara Ịtali ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ afọ abụọ na iwu ọha na eze na Mahadum Bologna
Ọ nọrọ n'Ịtali wee gaa n'ihu na Istituto Superiore di Sanità na Rom ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta na Health Services Management tupu ọ gụchaa nzere doctorate na Mahadum Sapienza nke Rome na ahụike ọha
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Mahadum Mba Somalia dị ka onye nkuzi na-enyere ya aka ma mesịa na mmemme ọzụzụ iji belata ịda ogbenye na Sapienza na Istituto Superiore di Sanità
Site na 2012 ruo 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ maka World Health Organization na Somalia
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2017, ọ ghọrọ Minista Federal nke Somalia maka ahụike na nlekọta ọha na eze wee sonye na kọmitii ọhụrụ nke Praịm Minista Hassan Ali Khaire
Ngalaba ahụike dị na Mogadishu
N'afọ 2018 o kwuru banyere ihe ịga nke ọma mba ya nwere n'ịlụso ọgbụgbọ na polio ọgụ
N'ọnwa Eprel 2020, e dekọrọ ọnwụ mbụ nke ọrịa COVID-19 na Somalia
Nur kwupụtara ọnwụ nke onye mbụ e gburu bụ nwoke dị afọ 58
Onye nke abụọ e gburu bụ Khalif Mumin Tohow onye bụ Minista Ikpe Ziri Ezi maka steeti Somalia nke Hirshabelle
Ọ ka si nleta ọ gara United Kingdom lọta
N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel 2021, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19 bụ 576
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Eprel 2021, minista ahụ natara ọgwụ mgbochi coronavirus mbụ site na China
Onye nnọchi anya China bụ Qin Jian nyere ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa Sinopharm BIBP 200,000

Ụbọchị iri ka e mesịrị, Somalia natara ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa Oxford-AstraZeneca 300,000 site na atụmatụ COVAX; Nur kwuru na a ga-eziga ọgwụ mgbochi ahụ na mpaghara ọ bụla nke Somalia ma nye ndị ọrụ ahụike ihe mbụ n'oge mmemme ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi
N'ọnwa Eprel, ọ kwupụtakwara na Òtù Ahụ Ike Ụwa ga-eduga n'imeziwanye na nlekọta ahụike uche
Ọrụ a na-elekwasị anya na ndị Somalia na-eto eto ndị esemokwu metụtara
Enwere obere ndokwa maka ahụike uche na mba ebe ụzọ abụọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ndị bi na ya erubeghị afọ iri atọ ma ọtụtụ na-ebi na ime ihe ike
Fayçal Azizi (Arabic; a mụrụ na 26 Febụwarị 1986 na Tetuan) bụ onye obodo Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu na onye na'ede egwu
A maara ya maka egwu ya 'Werda ala Werda' na ihe nkiri afọ 2006 The Bitter Orange, egwu ya na otu K'lma, na nsochi ya afọ 2015 nke egwu ọdịnala Judeo-Moroccan 'Hak A Mama'
Fayçal Azizi malitere dịka onye na-eme ihe ọchị mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nnabata na Superior School of Dramatic Arts and Cultural Entertainment na Rabat
O mepụtara otu egwu K'lma n'afọ 2004, wee sonye n'òtù Dabateatr n'afọ 2007, na-eme ihe nkiri dị iche iche dịka Il / Houwa na Driss Ksikes's 180 degrés
Ọ pụtakwara dịka Habib na usoro Kaboul Kitchen nke a na-agbasa na ụlọ ọrụ TV French Canal+
Fayza Ahmed (December 5, 1934 September 24, 1983) bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri si Siria-Ijipt-Lebanọn
N'oge ọrụ ya, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri isii
A mụrụ Fayza Ahmed na 1934 na Damaskọs nye nna Siria na nne Lebanọn
O nwere ụmụ ise nakwa ụmụ ụmụ itoolu
Mgbe ọ na-abụ abụ, Fayza Ahmad pụtara n'oge egwuregwu ahụ jupụtara na ndị asọmpi dị egwu
Ndị a gụnyere;
Fayza Ahmed nwụrụ n'afọ 1983 na Cairo mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa kansa
Chibuzor Oji, nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Faze, bụ onye egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri onyonyo na Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye otu egwu hip hop nke Naijiria Plantashun Boyz, ya na BlackFace Naija na 2face Idibia
Ndị otu ahụ kewara n'afọ 2004 ma onye ọ bụla so n'òtù ahụ agaala n'ihu ịmalite ọrụ naanị ya
Abọm mbụ ya bụ Faze Alone rere ihe karịrị nde atọ, ebe abọm nke abụọ ya bụ Independent rere ihe karịrị nde asaa
Abọm nke atọ ya bụ Originality gara platinum n'ọnwa mbụ nke ntọhapụ ya
Ọ bụ onye egwu Naịjirịa mbụ nwere album platinum atọ n'usoro
Mmekọrịta ya gụnyere otu egwu ya na Wyclef Jean nke akpọrọ 'Proud to Be African'
N'afọ 2011, Faze mere ihe nkiri izizi ya ebe ọ mere ka ihe nkiri nwoke nke Lovechild na ihe nkiri a ma ama nke Naijiria bụ Alero's Symphony
O nyekwara ụda ihe nkiri ahụ nke o ritere Africa Movie Academy Award n'afọ 2012, na ngalaba nke Achievement in Soundtrack
A mụrụ Chibuzor Oji n'afọ1977 na Festac Town, Lagos
Oji bụ onye nke anọ n'ime nnukwu ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ itoolu
A na-ekwu na ndị ezinụlọ niile nwere ezigbo olu na-abụ abụ nke zuru oke site na ogologo oge ha na-abụ abụ otuto n'oge ekpere
Oji mere mgbalị mbụ ya iji nweta mgbasa ozi mgbe o meriri asọmpi DBN Karaoke nke afọ 1994
Ọ rụrụ dị ka onye egwu rap n'okpuru aha Lyrical Orge ruo mgbe ọ sonyeere Plantashun Boiz
Faze wepụtara mgbalị mbụ ya nke akpọrọ 'Faze Alone' na nkeji iri na ise ikpeazụ nke afọ 2004
Egwu egwu 'Faze Alone', 'Angel Gabriella', 'Miss U' na 'Na True' ruru ebe kachasị elu na chaatị egwu dị iche iche
Ụdị egwu ya a na-akpọ universal flavor - ngwakọta dị mma nke R&B, Reggae, Pop, Dancehall, Ragga na Soul, ha niile nwere ụda olu Afrịka ka a ma ama site na ntọhapụ nke abọm ahụ
N'afọ 2006, Faze wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ya 'Independent'
N'afọ 2008 wepụtara abọm studio nke atọ site na Faze
Onye ndu 'Originality' okpukpu abụọ dị ka aha abọm ahụ
Egwu ndị ọzọ sitere na abọm ahụ bụ 'Am In Love' na 'Spend My Money'
N'afọ 2012, Faze gara n'ihu ịrụ ọrụ ma wepụta abọm nke anọ 'REFAZED'
Onye ndu nke abọm 'Am In The Mood' nwere ntụgharị dị elu na redio na igwe onyonyo
N'afọ 2013, ọ gbakwunyere egwu abụọ ọzọ 'Ifeoma' na 'Lambo' na mbido ya, onye na-agụ egwu ahụ gbasoro otu egwu ahụ na vidiyo na egwu ọ bụla n'otu oge
Faze esorola ndị mba ọzọ nwere ntụkwasị obi mba ụwa dịka Beenie Man, Wyclef Jean, onye ya na ya dekọkwara egwu 'Proud To Be African', na Akon

Faze site na egwu ya akwadola ụdị azụmahịa zuru ụwa ọnụ ma na-akwanyere ùgwù dị ka Star na Star Trek Event kwa afọ, Globacom na National Globacom Campus Storm, Guinness na Guinness Extra Smooth Discovery Shows, na Sprite na ihe omume ha maka ndị ntorobịa, Spriteball
Mgbe ọ sonyeere Plantashun Boyz dị ka mmadụ atọ na BlackFace Naija na Tuface (2face Idibia), ọ gbanwere aha ya na Faze
Ndị otu ahụ wepụtara abọm abụọ na usoro ahụ Body and Soul n'afọ 2000 na Sold Out n'afọ 2003
Oge ahụ mebiri site na anụ ehi na-emepe emepe banyere 'Faze versus 2Face' na ndị otu ahụ nke mere ka ndị otu ahụ gbasaa n'ikpeazụ n'afọ 2004

Ndị otu ahụ gbakọtara n'afọ 2007 naanị maka otu abọm ọzọ Plan B' nke ndị njikwa Plantashun Entertainment na-elekọta nke onye bụbu onye njikwa Tuface bụ Nathaniel Akinwale Owoyemi na nwanne ya nwoke na onye njikwa ya bụ Ifeanyi Oji' guzobere
N'afọ 2014, Independent Entertainment na Valanchy Records n'okpuru Plantashun Management ọhụrụ ma ha anọwo na-arụ ọrụ
Mgbe nkewa nke Plantashun Boyz n'afọ 2004, Faze bịanyere aka ná Akara egwu Solomon Arueya's Westside nke Lagos, Nigeria, iji mepụta abọm mbụ ya akpọrọ Faze Alone
Abọm ahụ nwetara ọkwa platinum na ahịa nke nde 12 n'ọnwa mbụ ya
Otu egwu 'Faze Alone' mere nke ọma na chaatị egwu Naịjirịa, na-eru nọmba 1 na chaatị egwu nke ụlọ ọrụ redio ama ama dị ka Rhythm FM, Cool FM, na Ray Power FM
A nabatara egwu 'Miss U' na 'Angel Gabriella' sitere na abọm Faze Alone nke ọma
Abọm ahụ webatara ụda olu Faze gụnyere ikike ya ịbụ abụ kachasị elu site n'aka nwoke na ụlọ ọrụ egwu Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2006, o ritere ihe nrite Hip-Hop World maka Best Vocalist
Ọ na-ewepụta ihe ya site na akara ndekọ ọ nwere, Independent Entertainment
Na abọm nke abụọ ya akpọrọ 'Independent', nke ewepụtara n'afọ 2006, o wepụtara egwu dịka Kpo Kpo Di Kpo, Letter to my Brother, Tattoo Girls, Need Somebody na Kolomental
Kolomental ga-aga ịghọ abụ na klọb na nnọkọ niile na Naịjirịa
Ọ gara ezumike okike maka afọ ole na ole n'oge ọ na-apụ n'anya n'ihe nkiri egwu
Ihe kpatara nkwụsị a bụ, n'okwu nke ya, 'ịmụ ụdị ụda a na-eme n'ebe niile ka m wee nwee ike idozi onwe m na ya n'ebughị ụzọ pụọ n'ezie onwe m
Nke ahụ bụ naanị ya
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2014, Faze laghachiri na ntọhapụ nke otu egwu ya 'Your Daughter' nke natara massisve air play
Ọ gara n'ihu wepụta egwu ọzọ a na-akpọ 'Tonite' ya na onye egwu egwu egwu Naịjirịa bụ Patoranking

Fe'fe' ma ọ bụ Fe'efe'e, bu ihe a makwaara dị ka Nufi ma ọ bụ Bafang (Fe'fe' Nufi), bụ asụsụ Bamileke a na-asụ na Cameroon, gburugburu obodo Bafang
Ọ bụ otu n'ime asụsụ anọ ahọpụtara maka nhọrọ na Collège Libermann na Douala (ya na Duala, Basaa na Banjun)
