Ndị na-ahụ maka ụkpụrụ gbasara ụmụ nwanyị kwenyere na ọ dịịrịrịrị ka a nụ echiche echiche ụmụ nwanyị dị iche iche wee mepụta echiche nkwekọ na-ejikọta ọnụ n'aka ha Ịgbalị imezu nke a na ịkwanye aka n'ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị ọnụ bụ ebumnuche nke ụkpụrụ omume nwanyị
Idozi
i okwu ndị a dị mkpa n'oge a n'ihi echiche na-agbanwe agbanwe yana ihe a na-ewere dị ka 'ụkpụrụ omume' n'ihe gbasara ọgwụgwọ na otu esi emeso ụmụ nwanyị, ọkachasị, ahụ ụmụ nwanyị
Fenadiazole (INN), nke a makwaara dị ka phénadiazole (DCF) ma na-ere n'okpuru aha Hypnazol, Eudormil, na Viodor, bụ ọgwụ na-eme ka mmadụ kwụsị ịlụso ehighị ụra nke a na-eji agwọ ma anaghịzi ere ahịa

A na-akọwa ya dị ka ọgwụ na-abụghị barbiturate hypnotic nke nwere akara ma ọ bụ ihe dị omimi na ọgwụgwọ n'ime ụmụ anụmanụ, mmetụta hypnotic dịgasị iche iche n'ime mmadụ (na-akpali ụra ngwa ngwa gbaba n'ebe nile site n'ime ụmụ ndị ogbi ozi ọma ahụ n'ebe nile maka awa 6 ruo 8), ihe mgbochi mgbochi, na mmetụta spasmolytic, na profaịlụ na-anagide nke ọma n'ime ndị mmadụ (na nkezi nke 200 mg / ụbọchị)
Ọgwụ ahụ mepụtara, kọwaa ya na ọgwụ, mepụtara ya, mepụtara, ma na-ere ya site na ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọgwụ na France bụ Laboratoires Jacques Logeais n'etiti afọ 1960 na 1962
Dị ka ihe na-eme ka mmadụ kwụsị ma na-eme ihe na-adịghị ndị mmadụ mma, fenadiazole nwere usoro kemịkal pụrụ iche nke sitere na oxadiazole
Ọ nwere ike ịbelata ọtụtụ ndị na eme na ohiri ike ịbụ na ọ nwere njikọ kemịkalụ na ọgwụ ndị ọzọ na-eme ka mmadụ kwụsị ịrapara mmadụ n'ahụ na ọ bụghị ihe a na-ahụkarị
Fenton Johnson (May 7, 1888 - September 17, 1958) bụ onye America na-ede uri, onye edemede, onye edemede nke obere akụkọ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ, na onye nkuzi
Johnson si n'ezinaụlọ ndị Afrịka na Amerịka nọ na Chicago, ebe ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ ọrụ ya
A na-etinyekarị ọrụ ya na anthologies nke uri nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ, a makwaara ya maka abụ mbụ
Onye edemede James Weldon Johnson (enweghị mmekọrịta) kpọrọ Fenton, 'otu n'ime ndị mbụ na-ede uri mgbanwe ihe gbasara ndị ojii'
A na-ewerekwa ya dị ka onye mbido nke Harlem Renaissance
A mụrụ Johnson na Mee 7, 1888, na Chicago, Illinois, nne na nna ya bụ Elijah na Jesse (Taylor) Johnson
Nna ya, Elijah Johnson, bụ onye na-ebu ụgbọ okporo ígwè na ezinụlọ ha bụ ndị Afrịka na Amerịka nwere ego

Ezinụlọ ya nwere ụlọ State Street ebe ha bi na ya, na dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ ndụ nke Arna Bontemps si kwuo, a kọwara Fenton Johnson dị ka 'nwa nwoke mara mma nke na-akwọ ụgbọala eletrik ya gburugburu Chicago' Mgbe ọ na-etolite, Johnson chetara na ọ 'na-ede akwụkwọ kemgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu,' mana n'agbanyeghị ọchịchọ edemede, Johnson ebughị ụzọ mee atụmatụ ịmalite ọrụ edemede, ọ bụghịkwa ọrụ uri
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, Johnson bu n'obi ịghọ onye otu ndị ụkọchukwu
Johnson tolitere na Chicago, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze dị iche iche n'obodo ahụ, gụnyere Englewood High School na Wendell Phillips High School
Johnson bu ụzọ malite agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Northwestern, nke ọ gara site n'afọ 1908 ruo 1909 wee gaa Mahadum Chicago
Johnson mechara gaa Columbia University Pulitzer School of Journalism

Mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ gasịrị, Fenton rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ozi na post ọfịs tupu ọ malite ịkụzi Bekee na State University of Louisville (SUL), nke bụ ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo, ojii, Baptist nwere na Kentucky nke ga-emecha mara dị ka Simmons
Ụlọ akwụkwọ kọleji
Ọ kuziri ebe ahụ site na 1910 ruo 1911, wee laghachi na Chicago na 1911 itinye uche na ọrụ ide ya
N'afọ 1913, Johnson bipụtara mpịakọta mbụ ya nke uri, Nrọ nta
Nchịkọta ahụ bụ ọrụ e bipụtara n'onwe ya, tinyere nchịkọta abụọ ya ndị ọzọ, Visions of the Dusk (1915) na egwu nke ala (1916)
Na mbụ, n'afọ 1909, Johnson yiri ka o nyefere maka mbipụta ụdị akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo, nke akpọrọ 'A Wild Plaint', nke e dere n'aha onye, Aubrey Gray
Ihe odide a, nke a na-ebipụtaghị, bụ 'ihe ngosi doro anya nke ịkpa ókè', na ntinye 'n'ụzọ ọzọ nwere nchekwube, iwe, ịda mbà n'obi, na nkụda mmụọ
Na mmechi nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo, Gray gburu onwe ya, na-akọwa na ọ bụ 'n'ihi ajọ mbunobi a
na m na-eme ihe m na-eme' Mkparịta ụka Johnson banyere ajọ mbunobi na mkpagbu gụnyere okwu agbụrụ na echiche agbụrụ na agbụrụ
N'etiti ntọhapụ nke nchịkọta uri nke mbụ ya na nke abụọ ya, Johnson kwagara New York, ebe ọ gara Pulitzer School of Journalism site na nkwado ego nke onye enyemaka
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ akwụkwọ uri nke atọ ya, Johnson laghachiri Chicago, ebe ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị nchịkọta akụkọ ntọala nke The Champion n'afọ 1916

E guzobere Champion na njikọ ya na Henry Bing Dismond, nwa nwanne nna ya, onye bụkwa onye na-achọ uri na onye na-eme egwuregwu a ma ama, otu n'ime mmadụ ole na ole gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji ndị Afrika-Amerikan ahọpụtara maka ọzụzụ ndị ọrụ na Army's Eighth Illinois Regiment na Camp Des Moines n'afọ 1918
Mbipụta ahụ lekwasịrị anya na ihe ndị isi ojii rụzuru ma bipụta ya kwa ọnwa
Afọ abụọ mgbe ọ tọrọ ntọala The Champion, n'afọ 1918, Johnson gara n'ihu chọta The Favorite Magazine, nke akpọrọ The World's Greatest Monthly, ya na Dismond
The Favorite Magazine bipụtara ole na ole n'ime uri Johnson, na gburugburu oge a, a na-ebipụtakwa obere akụkọ Johnson na The Crisis
Na mgbakwunye na obere akụkọ ndị e bipụtara na The Crisis, Johnson bipụtara nchịkọta akụkọ mkpirikpi nke ya nke akpọrọ Tales of Darkest America n'afọ 1920
N'otu afọ ahụ, o bipụtara akwụkwọ edemede akpọrọ For the Highest Good

N'oge a, site n'ihe dị ka afọ 1912 ruo afọ 1925, Johnson guzobere njikọ na Chicago na Harriet Monroe, a nabatara ọtụtụ n'ime uri ya maka magazin uri Poetry Na mgbakwunye, Johnson chọtara mbipụta na anthology nke onye na-ede uri Alfred Kreymborg họọrọ n'afọ 1915 nke a na-akpọ Ndị ọzọ Magazin nke Amaokwu Ọhụrụ
E bipụtara otu n'ime uri ya a ma ama, 'Tired', n'afọ 1919 na Ndị ọzọ ma bipụta ya na The Book of American Negro Poetry n'afọ 1922, n'etiti uri ndị ọzọ ya
Johnson dechara ma ọ bụ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ gụchaa nchịkọta nke anọ nke uri akpọrọ African Nights, mana o nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na ibipụta nchịkọta ahụ
Na mgbakwunye na uri ya, edezi, na edemede edemede, Johnson rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede egwuregwu
Ka ọ na-erule afọ iri na itoolu, e mepụtara ihe nkiri Johnson 'na ogbo nke Pekin Theatre ochie, Chicago'
N'afọ 1925, e mere egwuregwu ya akpọrọ The Cabaret Girl na Shadow Theatre na Chicago, naanị aha a maara nke egwuregwu ya
N'afọ ndị nke afọ 1930, Johnson rụrụ ọrụ maka Ihe oru ngo ndị odee nke gọọmenti etiti, nke bụ akụkụ nke Works Progress Administration (WPA) na Chicago
Ọ bụ Arna Bontemps duziri ya, akụkụ nke Federal Writers' Project lekwasịrị anya n'ide banyere ahụmịhe ojii na Illinois
Bontemps mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ nke Johnson

Abụ Johnson nwere ọnụnọ na-agbanwe agbanwe na anthologies, gụnyere Weldon Johnsons, The Book of American Negro Poetry; Harriet Monroe na Alice Corbin's The New Poetry An Anthology of Twentieth Century Verse in English (1923); na Countee Cullen's Caroling Dusk (1927)
Ndị nkatọ na-ahụkarị uri nke Fenton Johnson ka ọ bụrụ nke nwere nnukwu ihe ọchị na ụdị enweghị olileanya nke sitere na ahụmịhe ndị Africa America

Na mmepe ya na Fenton Johnson na The Book of American Negro Poetry, James Weldon Johnson dere na n'ọtụtụ uri Johnson, 'ọ dịghị ihe fọdụrụ ịlụ ọgụ maọbụ olileanya maka' N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, James Weldon Johnson gara n'ihu, 'abụ ndị a nke obi nkoropụ nwere ike dị ukwuu ma bụrụ ọrụ kacha mma nke Fenton Johnson
' A na-ahụkarị Fenton Johnson dị ka onye na-ede uri nke nwere echiche egbu egbu nke sitere na ahụmịhe ya dị ka onye Afrika Amerika, ụdị uri a na-ewe iwe bụ ihe a maara ya nke ọma
Nakwa na mmeghe ya, Johnson na-ekwu okwu ole na ole banyere ọrụ mbụ nke Johnson, na-achọpụta na akwụkwọ mbụ ya nke abụ Nrọ nta, 'enweghị ọdịiche dị ịrịba ama”
James Weldon Johnson na-egosikwa na mmepe ya nye Johnson na ọ bụ n'oge agha ka Fenton Johnson nakweere amaokwu n'efu, ma 'si na ọdịnala na echiche niile nke abụ maka Mgbako ojii pụọ
Nke a chọtara ọhụrụ 'enweghị usoro,' Johnson chọpụtara, 'kwupụtara nkụda mmụọ na obi ilu nke mmetụta agbụrụ Negro na-enwe mgbe ahụ

' Maka James Weldon Johnson, mgbe ahụ, uri Fenton Johnson jikọtara ya na obi nkoropụ, ọ bụkwa otú ahụ ka Johnson si bụrụ onye e si bụrụ onye e ji bụrụ onye e ji bụrụ nnukwu ọrụ Akwụkwọ nke gbasara abụ gbasara ike ndị ojii na Amerika, ma mesịa na anthologies ndị ọzọ
Fenton a 'na-ewe iwe' na-etinye n'ahịrị nke uri ya ' Ike gwụrụ' 'Ike gwụrụ m ọrụ
Ike gwụrụ m iwulite mmepeanya nke onye ọzọ,' ka uri ahụ na-agụ
Johnson nwere otu ihe nketa n'ime abụ American Modernist
A maara na ọ bụ akụkụ nke ndị edemede ga-abụ ndị na-eme uri 'ọhụrụ', nke chọrọ 'ịtụfu ọdịnala nke American Poetry', dị ka James Weldon Johnson ga-akọwa ya

uri 'ọhụrụ' ndị a pụtara na magazin ndị dị ka abụ, Others, na mgbe e mesịrị, The Liberator, ha gosipụtara ọganihu site na 'ọdịnala nkịtị gaa na okike kachasị mgbanwe, site na akara a na-enyocha nke ọma gaa n'amaokwu n'efu, site na asụsụ Negro a na-ahụkarị gaa n'asụsụ siri ike nke [Carl] abụ nke Sandberg's Chicago

Ọ bụ ezie na a na-edekarị 'Ike gwụrụ', e mere abụ mbụ nke Johnson n'ụzọ ndị ọzọ, gụnyere uri olumba, dị ka achọtara n'akwụkwọ mbụ ya, Nrọ nta Nchịkọta ahụ tụlere ọtụtụ isiokwu, site na uri na Paul Laurence Dunbar, nke akpọrọ 'Dunbar', na isiokwu nke oge ochie dịka na 'Lancelot's Defiance'
Ọzọkwa,Nrọ nta nwere uri omenala Scottish, uri Irish, na ọbụna uri Yiddish, nke na-egosi ọtụtụ mmetụta uri n'oge mmalite nke ọrụ uri ya
Na Visions of the Dusk na egwu nke ala, Johnson malitere itinye 'Negro spirituals', ebe a ka a hụ mgbanwe n'ime isiokwu ndị ahụmahụ ndị Africa na America na-emetụta nke ukwuu
Na Abụ nke Ala, Johnson dere na 'The Negro nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọ bụkwa ihe karịrị onye ọrụ ugbo
' Site n'ebe a gaa na uri 'Ike gwụrụ', anyị nwere ike ịchọta 'onye oji na-ede uri mgbanwe' nke James Weldon Johnson na-ekwupụta na Fenton Johnson bụ na mmadụ ole na-ahụ ya taa
N'afọ 2016, a kpọbatara Johnson na Chicago Literary Hall of Fame
N'ihe odide ntinye ha, Hall of Fame dere, sị
Johnson lụrụ Cecilia Rhone
Ọ bụ onye otu Ndị edemede Njikọ nke Amerika na nke Alpha Phi Alpha fraternity

' Maka James Weldon Johnson, mgbe ahụ, uri Fenton Johnson jikọtara ya na obi nkoropụ, ọ bụkwa otú ahụ ka Johnson si bụrụ onye e si bụrụ onye e ji bụrụ onye e ji bụrụ nnukwu ọrụ Akwụkwọ nke gbasara abụ gbasara ike ndị ojii na Amerika, ma mesịa na anthologies ndị ọzọ
Fenton a 'na-ewe iwe' na-etinye n'ahịrị nke uri ya ' Ike gwụrụ' 'Ike gwụrụ m ọrụ
Ike gwụrụ m iwulite mmepeanya nke onye ọzọ,' ka uri ahụ na-agụ
Johnson nwere otu ihe nketa n'ime abụ American Modernist
A maara na ọ bụ akụkụ nke ndị edemede ga-abụ ndị na-eme uri 'ọhụrụ', nke chọrọ 'ịtụfu ọdịnala nke American Poetry', dị ka James Weldon Johnson ga-akọwa ya

uri 'ọhụrụ' ndị a pụtara na magazin ndị dị ka abụ, Others, na mgbe e mesịrị, The Liberator, ha gosipụtara ọganihu site na 'ọdịnala nkịtị gaa na okike kachasị mgbanwe, site na akara a na-enyocha nke ọma gaa n'amaokwu n'efu, site na asụsụ Negro a na-ahụkarị gaa n'asụsụ siri ike nke [Carl] abụ nke Sandberg's Chicago

Ọ bụ ezie na a na-edekarị 'Ike gwụrụ', e mere abụ mbụ nke Johnson n'ụzọ ndị ọzọ, gụnyere uri olumba, dị ka achọtara n'akwụkwọ mbụ ya, Nrọ nta Nchịkọta ahụ tụlere ọtụtụ isiokwu, site na uri na Paul Laurence Dunbar, nke akpọrọ 'Dunbar', na isiokwu nke oge ochie dịka na 'Lancelot's Defiance'
Ọzọkwa,Nrọ nta nwere uri omenala Scottish, uri Irish, na ọbụna uri Yiddish, nke na-egosi ọtụtụ mmetụta uri n'oge mmalite nke ọrụ uri ya
Na Visions of the Dusk na egwu nke ala, Johnson malitere itinye 'Negro spirituals', ebe a ka a hụ mgbanwe n'ime isiokwu ndị ahụmahụ ndị Africa na America na-emetụta nke ukwuu
Na Abụ nke Ala, Johnson dere na 'The Negro nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọ bụkwa ihe karịrị onye ọrụ ugbo
' Site n'ebe a gaa na uri 'Ike gwụrụ', anyị nwere ike ịchọta 'onye oji na-ede uri mgbanwe' nke James Weldon Johnson na-ekwupụta na Fenton Johnson bụ na mmadụ ole na-ahụ ya taa
N'afọ 2016, a kpọbatara Johnson na Chicago Literary Hall of Fame
N'ihe odide ntinye ha, Hall of Fame dere, sị
Johnson lụrụ Cecilia Rhone
Ọ bụ onye otu Ndị edemede Njikọ nke Amerika na nke Alpha Phi Alpha fraternity
Ferdinand Emmanuel Edralin Marcos (1917-1989) bu president nke Philippines
Marcos bu onye ojii nke chiri obodo Philippines
Ferdoos Mohammed (13 Julaị 1906 na Ijipt - 22 Septemba 1961) bụ onye Ijipt na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a ma ama maka ịrụ ọrụ nne ma ọ bụ nne nwanyị na ihe nkiri Ijipt na 1940s na 1950s
Younes Ferhi (Arabic) bụ onye obodo Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Arlette Pinheiro Esteves Torres (16 Ọktoba 1929) bu onye Brazilian bu ọmẹka
Maria Fernanda Pontífice de Jesus Bonfim (Amụrụ n'afọ 1955) bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị São Toméan
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ìgwè mbụ nke ụmụ nwanyị so na National Assembly n'afọ 1975 ma mesịa bụrụ Minista nke Mmụta na Ọdịbendị
Amụrụ ya n'afọ 1955, Popu gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lisbon na nzere na akwụkwọ
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1975, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba ahụ dịka otu n'ime ndị inyom isii mbụ nọ na ndị omeiwu
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na Ministri nke Mmụta na Ọdịbendị, n'afọ 2002, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Mmụta Na Ọdịbendụ

A họpụtara ya ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na ntuli aka nke afọ 2006, mana n'otu afọ ahụ a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ dean nke Universidade Lusíada de São Tomé e Príncipe ma gbaa arụkwaghịm na ndị omeiwu iji lekwasị anya na ọrụ a
N'afọ 2008, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị nke Democratic Convergence Party
O mechara bụrụ onye isi nke Universidade Lusíada
Ferré Gola, bụkwa Ferre Gola, onye aha ya zuru ezu bụ Hervé Gola Bataringe, bụ onye DR Congo na-edekọ egwu
N'otu oge, ọ bụ onye otu egwu ndị Congo, Wenge Musica Maison Mère na Quartier Latin International
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 3 Machị n'afọ 1976, na Kinshasa, obodo kachasị ukwuu na isi obodo nke Democratic Republic of the Congo
Site na nwata, ọ nwere mmasị ịghọ onye egwu ọkachamara
Ferré Gola malitere ọrụ ya na otu egwu na obodo Bandalungwa nke a na-akpọ 'Rumba des Jeunes' tupu ọ banye na 'Wenge Musica' n'afọ 1995
Na nkewa nke otu a, Ferré Gola sonyeere Werrason na Wenge Musica Maison Mère ruo afọ 7, tupu ya na Bill Clinton Kalonji na JDT Mulopwe mepụta 'Les Marquis de Maison mère'
Ma, 'Les Marquis' pụtara ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị mgbe ntọhapụ mmeri nke opus 'Miracles', abọm kachasị mma na onyinye KORA 2005 na South Africa
N'afọ 1995 n'oge ngosi nka na Bandalungwa, otu obodo nke obodo Kinshasa, Werrason hụrụ ya ma kpọbata ya n'ime otu Wenge Musica 4*4
Mgbe ndị otu ahụ kwụsịrị, Gola, Werrason, Didier Masela, na Adolphe mepụtara otu Wenge Musica Maison Mère ebe ọ nọrọ afọ asaa site n'afọ 1997 ruo afọ 2004
Ọ hapụrụ otu Werrason na 2004 iji chọta The Marquis de Maison Mère na JDT Mulopwe na Bill Clinton Kalonji bụ ndị hapụkwara Werrason
N'afọ 2005, Gola sonyeere otu Quartier Latin International, nke Koffi Olomide, na-ahapụ maka ọrụ naanị ya na 2006, n'otu afọ ahụ Fally Ipupa hapụrụ
Mgbe ọ nọ na Quartier Latin, otu n'ime egwu ndị a na-agaghị echefu echefu ọ mepụtara bụ egwu Sisi Silvie Remix ebe ya na Olomide rụkọrọ ọrụ
Site na ezigbo aha ya bụ Hervé Gola Bateringe, Ferré emeela njem nka pụrụ iche nke mere ka ọ nwee ihe ịga nke ọma ugbu a

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya, otu ụmụagbọghọ na ụmụnwoke gbara ya gburugburu bụ ndị guzosiri ike ma na nchịkwa ya ma na ndị otu egwu ya, tinyere ndị ọzọ Chikito, Kunzardo, Charly Solo, Mark House, Guy Digital, De Gaulle na ndị ọzọ
Tupu ọ nabata ọrụ naanị ya, Ferré Gola mepụtara egwu ise gụnyere Vita Imana, Victime d'amour , 100 Kilos, Amour Intèret, Insecticide na ndị ọzọ
Kemgbe mmalite nke ọrụ naanị ya, Gola wepụtara abọm atọ zuru oke

Ferrari Elite Sheppard (amụrụ n'ubochí atọ n'ọnwa Machị, 1983) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkírí nke ógè a, nke a maara màkà ihe osise ya dị egwu, nke ngwakọta nke na-agwakọta figurativism na nka abstract
Ewezuga ịbụ onye na-ese ihe, Sheppard bụ ónyé édémédé, ónyé na-ede foto, ónyé na'eme ihe ike na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
Dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, Sheppard bụ ọkara nke ndị ọzọ hip hop duo Dec 99th, tinyere Mos Def
A mụrụ Ferrari Sheppard na Chicago
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Chicago
Sheppard gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Art Institute nke Chicago
Mgbè ọ hapụsịrị The School of the Art Institute of Chicago, Sheppard were ogologo ógè site na nka ányá iji chụsoo ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ na mmepụta egwu
Sheppard gbàrà ndị na-ese ihe dịka MIA, Erykah Badu, Saul Williams, Earl Sweatshirt na Little Dragon ajụjụ ọnụ maka Stop Being Famous, ebe nrụọrụ weebụ o guzobere na 2009
Nọvemba 2014, Sheppard pụtara na ihe ngosi njem nke Anthony Bourdain The Getaway n'akụkụ Yasiin Bey
Ha abụọ gàrà Marrakesh, Morocco
Na May na June 2016, Sheppard wepụtara egwu atọ dị ka ónyé na-emepụta maka ndị ọzọ hip hop duo Dec 99th na Yasiin Bey 'NAW', 'Tall Sleeves' na 'Local Time'
N'abalị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2016, Dec 99th wepụtara egwu nke anọ ha na Tidal nke akpọrọ 'Hymn' ya na nkwupụta sitere n'aka ha abụọ, 'Mgbaghara nye ezinụlọ ndị e gburu egbu
Ọ kwụsịtụghị ịchụso nnwere onwe, 'ma eleghị anya na-ezo aka na igbu ọchụ ndị uwe ojii na United States
Sheppard na Bey wepụtara abọm izizi ha a na-atụ anya ya nke ukwuu, nke akpọrọ onwe ya, Disemba 99 naanị na Tidal (ọrụ) na 2016
N'afọ 2016, Sheppard laghachiri na nka anya, na-ekere òkè na ihe ngosi otu ma nwee ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na Septemba 12, 2020
Ụlọ ọrụ nka Sheppard dị na Los Angeles, California

Ferry (1915 mgbe 1930 gasịrị) bụ ịnyịnya na-agba ọsọ na British Thoroughbred
Dị ka ọ dị afọ atọ na 1918 o dekọrọ nnukwu iwe mgbe ọ meriri 1000 Guineas na 50/1
E mechara nye ya ọnọdụ nke onye abụọ na Oaks Stakes mana ọ dara mgbe ọ na-alụ ọgụ megide ndị mmegide nwoke
O nwere mmetụta dị nta dị ka nwa ara ma mechie ụbọchị ya na Poland
Ferry bụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke onye wee ya bụ Edward Stanley, 17th Earl of Derby zụlitere ma nwee
Ọ zụrụ n'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ site n'aka onye na-enye ọzụzụ n'onwe ya bụ Lord Derby, George Lambton na Stanley House stable na Newmarket, Suffolk
Nna Ferry bụ Swynford bụ ịnyịnya na-agba ọsọ nke meriri St Leger na 1910 na Eclipse Stakes n'afọ sochirinụ
Ọ ka mma dị ka ịnyịnya na-azụ ụmụ ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere Blandford, Saucy Sue, Challenger na Tranquil
A kọwaala ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Gondolette dị ka otu n'ime ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ndị a ma ama na Stud Book
Ọ bụ onye na-elekọta nwanne Ferry Sansovino (Epsom Derby) na nna nna nke ụmụ nwanyị dị ka Hyperion, Sickle, Pharamond, Big Game na Snow Knight
Ọrụ ịgba ọsọ nke Ferry mere n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Mbụ
E mechiri ọtụtụ ebe ịgba ọsọ maka oge esemokwu ahụ ma mee ka agbụrụ ise niile nke ọdịnala British Classic na Newmarket
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Mee, ọsọ nke 106 nke 1000 Guineas karịa otu kilomita na Newmarket Racecourse dọtara obere ogige nke ndị na-agba ọsọ asatọ
Onye mmeri nke Middle Park Stakes Benevente malitere ọkacha mmasị n'ihu My Dear ebe Ferry, nke Brownie Carslake na-agba, malitere onye 50/1 n'èzí
Benevente buru ụzọ tupu ọnye My Dear efe mana Ferry butere ụzọ na mmechi ma merie 'n'ụzọ dị mfe' site na ogologo abụọ
A na-ebuli nwa ahụ elu n'ebe dị anya maka iri furlong Newmarket Stakes ka e mesịrị n'ọnwa ahụ mana ọ gbara ọsọ n'enweghị ebe ọ nọ n'azụ nwa ehi Somme Kiss
Mgbe ahụ, a kwagara ụgbọ mmiri ọzọ n'ebe dị anya maka New Oaks Stakes, na-agba ihe karịrị otu kilomita na ọkara na Newmarket na 6 June
Ọ lọtara n'ụlọ na-ekpo ọkụ maka nke atọ na Silver Bullet n'azụ Stony Ford na My Dear, mana a kwalitere ya na ọkwa ka ọ bụrụ onye nke abụọ mgbe a napụrụ Stony Ford ikike maka ịkpata mgbochi
Newmarket na onwa Septemba hụrụ ọsọ nke September Stakes, onye nọchiri St Leger n'oge agha
Ferry malitere 25/1 outsider wee lọta n'ụlọ n'ikpeazụ n'ime ndị na-agba ọsọ ise n'azụ Gainsborough
N'akwụkwọ ha, A Century of Champions, dabere na usoro nyocha Timeform, John Randall na Tony Morris kwuru na Roseway bụ onye mmeri 'dị ala' nke 1000 Guineas
Ferry lara ezumike nká n'ịgba ọsọ iji bụrụ nwa ewu maka Lord Derby
Lord Beaverbrook mechara zụta ya wee ree ya maka mbupụ na Poland na 1930
Ọ mụputara ọ pekata mpe ụmụ ehi atọ aha ha
Fesikh ma ọ bụ fseekh ( ) bụ nri ndị Ijipt oge ochie na-eme ememme
Ndị Ijipt na-eri ya n'oge ememme Sham el-Nessim n'Ijipt, nke bụ ememe mmiri site n'oge ochie nke Ijipt ma bụrụ ememe mba na Egypt
Fesikh nwere mullet fermented, nnu na mịrị amị nke genus Mugil, azụ mmiri nnu nke bi na Mediterranean na Oké Osimiri Uhie
Usoro ọdịnala nke ịkwadebe fesikh bụ ịcha azụ n'anyanwụ tupu ichekwa ya na nnu
Usoro a dị mgbagwoju anya, na-agafe site n'ọgbọ gaa n'ọzọ n'ezinụlọ ụfọdụ
Ọrụ ahụ nwere aha pụrụ iche na Ijipt, fasakhani
Ndị Ijipt nọ n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ ejirila azụ ọcha mee ihe dị ka ihe ọzọ

Kwa afọ, akụkọ banyere ihe ole na ole na-egbu egbu n'ihe oriri nke na-emetụta fesikh a kwadebere n'ụzọ na-ezighi ezi na-apụta na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị Ijipt, ọkachasị n'oge ememme Sham el-Nessim, mgbe ndị Ijipt na-eri azụ a
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2012, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nri na Canada wepụtara ncheta maka fesikh mullet dum, bepụ fesikh mullets na mmanụ, na fesikh shad dum nke a na-ere site na ụlọ ahịa dị na Toronto
E nwere ọrịa atọ a kọrọ na ha na-emetụta iri ngwaahịa ahụ, nke nwere ike ịbụ na nje bacteria Clostridium botulinum emetọla

Otú ọ dị, akụkọ ndị a egbochighị ndị Ijipt iri nri ememe a, ebe ọ bụ na ha metụtara naanị fesikh a kwadebeghị nke ọma na fesikh na-adịghị mma ma ọ bụ fesikh na'adịghị mma; Ngalaba ahụike Ijipt na-agba ndị Ijipt ume mgbe niile ịzụta fesikh ha n'aka ndị na-ere ahịa a ma ama na ndị a tụkwasịrị obi ma nyochaa ụbọchị njedebe, ma ọ bụ ịkwadebe ya nke ọma ma ọ bụrụ na ha na-eme ya n'ụlọ, a na-enyocha ụlọ ahịa na-ere azụ ahụ mgbe niile
Obodo Festac bụ ụlọ obibi gọọmentị etiti nke dị n'akụkụ Lagos-Badagry Expressway na Lagos State, Naijaria
Aha ya sitere na acronym FESTAC, nke na-anọchite anya Ememme Ụwa nke Abụọ nke nka na ọdịbendị nke Afrịka nke emere n'ebe ahụ na afọ 1977
Ọ dịkwa mkpa ịmara na festac dị n'okpuru mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo Amuwo-Odofin na Lagos
Obodo Festac, nke a na-akpọbu 'Festival Town' ma ọ bụ 'Festac Village', bụ ebe obibi e mere iji mee ka ndị sonyere na Ememme Ụwa nke Abụọ nke Black Arts na Ọdịbendị nke 1977 (Festac77)
N'ịbụ nke nwere ụlọ obibi 5,000 nke oge a na ụzọ asaa dị mkpa, e mere obodo ahụ n'ụzọ dị irè iji nweta ihe karịrị ndị ọbịa 45,000 yana ndị ọrụ na ndị isi Naijiria ọ bụla na-arụ ọrụ na mmemme ahụ

Gọọmentị Naịjirịa tinyere ego buru ibu na ihe onwunwe n'iwu Festac Town, nke na-eme egwuregwu na-emepụta ọkụ eletrik, ndị uwe ojii na ụlọ ọkụ ọkụ, ịnweta njem ọha na eze, nnukwu ụlọ ahịa, ụlọ akụ, ụlọ ọgwụ, ụlọ mposi ọha na eze
Ya mere, e bu n'uche ka obodo ahụ mee ka oge a na nkwa nke mmepe akụ na ụba nke gọọmentị kwadoro site na ego mmanụ
Mgbe emume ahụ gasịrị, Gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa kenyere ndị mmeri mechara sonye na ntuli aka ụlọ na ala ala
Iwu mbụ machi, bidoro ndị mmeri dị otú ahụ ịgba zite na iwepụ ihe onwunwe ndị ọzọ
Emere emume mbụ na 1966 na Dakar, Senegal
A na-ewu obodo Festac na netwọk grid nke nwere okporo ụzọ asaa / boulevards ma ọ bụ avenues nke obere okporo ụzọ si gbasaa
A na-amata ụzọ ndị a site na nọmba ha 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th na 7th Avenues n'otu n'otu
1st, 2nd, 4th na 7th Avenues gbara akụkụ nke obodo ahụ gburugburu n'ihe yiri ka ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ netwọk okporo ụzọ rectangular nke jikọtara ma nwee ike ịnweta site na ibe ya
Okporo ụzọ nke atọ na nke ise na-aga n'otu akụkụ n'ime obodo ahụ
A na-ahụ ụzọ nke isii n'otu akụkụ nke obodo ahụ site na àkwà mmiri site na 1st Avenue
Obodo a nwere cul-de-sacs ma ọ bụ closes nke a na-akpọ aha na usoro mkpụrụ akwụkwọ
A na-enweta obodo Festac site na Lagos-Badagry Expressway site na ọnụ ụzọ ámá atọ na-emeghe n'ime ụzọ nke mbụ, nke abụọ na nke asaa ma na-akpọ ọnụ ụzọ ákwà nke mbụ, ya abụọ na nke atọ
A na-enwetakwa obodo ahụ site na Festac Link Bridge

Ọnọdụ nke FESTAC Town dị mgbagwoju anya dịka gọọmentị etiti, steeti na gọọmentị ime obodo niile na-ekwu maka njikwa nke ala ahụ ma na-enye ndị bi na ya ụgwọ dị iche iche site na ụgwọ ọnụahịa, ụtụ gọọmentị mpaghara na ọnụego ụlọ

Obodo FESTAC agbanweela kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ ma ghọọ obodo nke ya, obodo ahụ enwela usoro mgbasa ozi dị iche iche dị ka Festaconline nke ghọrọ akara mgbasa ozi ụlọ nke na-ekesa ozi, ihe na-eme na Festac Town, Mile 2 na mpaghara gọọmentị mpaghara dum, Amuwo Odofin, Lagos State
Ozugbo ọ bụ ala na-ehi ụra, FESTAC Town adọtawo ụdị azụmaahịa dịgasị iche iche n'ime ala na gburugburu ya n'ime afọ ole na ole gara aga
Taa, e nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ na-arịwanye elu nke ụlọ akụ azụmahịa, na ụlọ ahịa na-elekọta ndị bi na ya
E nwekwara ọtụtụ họtel na ebe a na-anọ efe ezumike n'ime ala ahụ nke nyere aka na ndụ abalị dị egwu
Edemede a weputara ememme ọdịnala na ihe omume ọdịnala ndị ọzọ na mpaghara Odisha nke India
Odisha na-eme mmemme iri na atọ n'ime ọnwa iri na abụọ ka okwu a na-aga Bāra Māsare Tera Parba ( transl Ememe iri na atọ n'ime ọnwa iri na abụọ )
Akụkụ a weputara ememme ndị a na-eme na Odisha niile
Festus Egwarewa Keyamo (amụrụ na 21 Jenụwarị 1970) SAN FCIArb bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria, onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2018, a họpụtara Keyamo dị ka onye nduzi nke Nkwukọrịta atụmatụ nke 2019 nhoputa ndi ozo bid nke Onye isi ala Buhari
A mụrụ ya na Jenụwarị 21, 1970, na Ughelli, obodo dị na Delta Steeti n'ebe ndịda Naịjirịa mana nna ya si Effurun, obodo dị dị na Delta
Keyamo gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Model na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị na Ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị, Ughelli, ebe ọ nwetara asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West African na 1986
O mechara gaa Mahadum Ambrose Alli na Ekpoma, na Edo Steeti n'ebe ndịda Naịjirịa ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Law na 1992 ma kpọọ ya na Naịjirịan Bar na Disemba 1993
Ọ malitere ọrụ iwu ya na 1993 na Gani Fawehinmi's Ụlọ na Lagos Steeti, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Nigeria
Mgbe ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ n'ụlọ Gani Fawehinmi, ọ hapụrụ iji guzobe Festus Keyamo ulo

Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ nke onye ndú nke Niger-Delta Peoplesão Ndị agha afọ ofufo, Mujahid Dokubo-Asari na ikpe ya maka mpụ ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru na onye ndú ndụmọdụ na ikpe ịgba ọchịchị mgba ọchịchị mgba okorobịa nke Ralph Uwazuruike, onye ndú Ntughari maka nke Nkwalite nke Eze Steeti Biafra (MASSOB)
Keyamo bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ na ogbugbu Bola Ige
N'afọ 2008, ọ kpọgara Gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa n'ụlọ ikpe maka nhọpụta iwu na-akwadoghị nke ndị isi ọrụ

N'afọ 2017, Stephanie Otobo, onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-eyi uwe na Canada, boro Apostle Suleman Johnson, site n'aka onye ọka iwu ya Festus Keyamo, ebubo na ọ naghị emezu nkwa alụmdi na nwunye e kwere ya mgbe a na-ekwu na ya na ya nwere ọtụtụ mmekọahụ
Festus so na ndị minista a họpụtara n'ọchịchị nke abụọ nke Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari
Mgbe a họpụtara ya, ndị omeiwu nyochara ya

Ruo Septemba 24, 2019, a họpụtara Keyamo ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Naịjirịa, maka Niger Delta, tupu Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari e zighachi ya na Ministri nke Ọrụ na Ọrụ naanị otu ọnwa mgbe nhọpụta mbụ ya gasịrị na 21 Ọgọst 2019
Kọmitii Naịjirịa na-ahụ maka ihe ùgwù (LPPC), kpọrọ Keyamo aha na Julaị 2017 dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọka iwu Naịjirị pụtara ìhè ka e nye ya ọkwa SAN
Festus nọ ugbu a na kọmitii Muhammadu Buhari
Keyamo na ndị ọzọ a kpọrọ aha na ndepụta SAN nke afọ 2017 ka emere ka ha banye n'òtù dị elu nke Senior Advocates of Nigeria (SAN) na Septemba 2017
N'ụzọ dị mwute, onye egwu Eedris Abdulkareem gbanwere nkwenye a ka ọ bụrụ Senior Advocate of Nonsense

N'afọ 2017, e nyekwara Keyamo onyinye Global Human Rights Award site na United States Global Leadership Council na Washington maka mbọ ọ na-agba kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ gbasara nchedo na ịkwalite ikike mmadụ na mkpọsa maka gọọmentị na-aza ajụjụ na Naịjirịa
Fethi Haddaoui (Arabic) (a mụrụ na Tunis, December 9, 1961 - na Tunis ) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe , onye nduzi, onye edemede na onye na-emepụta ihe

Fethi Haddaoui bụ onye isi na-eme ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu, gụnyere Arab na El Aouada, ọ bụkwa onye telivishọn n'ihi òkè ya n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ncha na usoro, yana na Tunisia dịka na Syria, na Jọdan, na Morocco, na Turkey
na United Arab Emirates, Lebanon, Ịtali nakwa France
Na ihe nkiri sinima, ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Europe n'okpuru nduzi nke ndị nduzi dịka Franco Rossi, Serge Moati, Jean Sagols Peter Kassovitz na ndị ọzọ

Haddaoui ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite n'oge ọrụ ya, gụnyere Onye Nkwado Kasị Mma maka ọrụ ya na No Man's Love na Noce d'été na Carthage Film Festival, ntụgharị nwoke kachasị mma na Oran International Arabic Film Festival, onye nduzi kachasị mma na Festival des radios na Arab televisions maka La Cité du savoir
Fethia Mokhtar Mzali (Arabic) (6 Eprel, na afọ 1927, 12 Febụwarị, na afọ 2018) bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia nke ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị minista nwanyị abụọ mbụ nke mba ahụ na 1983
Di ya, Mohammed Mzali jere ozi dị ka praịm minista mba ahụ site na afo 1980 ruo na afọ 1986
A mụrụ Fethia Mokhtar na 6 Eprel 1927 na Tunis
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị Alakụba na ụlọ akwụkwọ nwa nwanyị Bardo
Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ kwụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 1942 na Armand Fallières High School na Nérac na afọ 1947
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta na nkà ihe ọmụma na Sorbonne na Paris na afọ 1952
Mzali bụ onye nkuzi na onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ na kọleji ndị nkuzi na Tunis
Ọ bụ onye otu Destour ma sonye na ngagharị iwe site na afo 1950-1955 nke dugara na nnwere onwe
N'afọ 1956, mgbe Tunisia nweere onwe ya, Mzali bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere National Union of Women of Tunisia
N'afọ 1974, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke nzukọ ahụ, ọ bụ ọrụ ọ rụrụ ruo n'afọ 1986
Otú ọ dị, a katọrọ nhọpụta ya n'okpuru Onye isi ala Habib Bourguiba maka inye aka na mmegharị ụmụ nwanyị na Tunisia na-agwụ ike n'okpuru mmetụta ya
N'afọ 1957, a họpụtara Mzali dị ka onye kansụl obodo maka obodo Tunis, na-eje ozi afọ atọ
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na Tunisia kwuru okwu banyere igbochi ọmụmụ n'afọ 1959
Ọ sonyeere Central Committee nke Socialist Destourian Party na afọ 1974 ma họpụta ya dịka onye otu ya na afọ 1979
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya mpaghara Kairouan, Tunis na Bizerte na afọ 1974 na n'afọ 1981
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke National Assembly kwa afọ site na afo 1980 ruo 1984
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1983, a họpụtara Mzali ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ezinụlọ na ụmụ nwanyị n'ọchịchị di ya bụ Praịm Minista Mohammed Mzali
A họpụtara Souad Yaacoubi ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ahụike ọha na eze n'otu oge ahụ, na-eme ka ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ahụ bụrụ ndị mbụ jere ozi na kansụl mba ahụ
A chụpụrụ Mzali n'ọkwa ya na June 1986 mgbe a chụpụrụ di ya n'ọchịchị pati na-achị
Ha gbapụrụ na mba ahụ gaa France, na Eprel, na afọ 1987 a mara Mohammed Mzali ikpe na-anọghị ya maka iji ihe onwunwe ọha na eze eme ihe n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi na ịba ọgaranya n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị
A kagburu ikpe ahụ n'afọ 2002, na-enye ohere ka ha laghachi Tunisia
N'afọ 1978, Mzali natara onyinye United Nations na Field of Human Rights n'aha National Union of Tunisian Women
Ọ nwetara ihe ịchọ mma site na gọọmentị ndị France, Finland na Senegal
Mzali zutere Mohammed Mzali mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Paris ma ha lụrụ na afọ 1950
Ha nwere ụmụ isii
Mzali nwụrụ na 12 Febụwarị, na afọ 2018 mgbe ọ dị afọ 90
Feyisetan Fayose onye bụbu nwunye onye isi ala nke steeti Ekiti na nwunye Ayo Fayose
Ọ bụkwa onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka na onye na-akwado ya
Feyisetan Fayose amụrụ ya na Jenụwarị 8, afọ 1964
Ọ burukwa onye isi ndi isi ochichi nke ndi isi ndi oru nta akuko nke steeti Ekiti
Perouz Artin Kalfayan, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Feyrouz ma ọ bụ Fayrouz, bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri ụmụaka
A mụrụ Kalfayan na Cairo, Egypt, na 15 Maachị 1943, n'ezinụlọ ndị Armenia nke Ijipt, ndị nna nna ya gbapụrụ n'ihi mkpagbu Ottoman wee biri na Ijipt
Nwanne ya nwanyị, Nelly Kalfaian, batakwara na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ
Aha ọmụmụ ya, Perouz, bụ aha Armenia, ma eleghị anya ụdị Feyrouz
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya mgbe ọ dị obere, na-eme nke mbụ ya mgbe ọ gbara afọ asaa na ihe nkiri Yasmine nke 1950
Onye nduzi Ijipt Anwar Wagdi nyeere ya aka n'ọrụ ya
O mechara laa ezumike nká n'ịme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, n'afọ 1959, ka ọ lụọ onye na-eme ihe ọchị Badreddine Gamgoum
Di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ ụmụ abụọ, Iman na Ayman

Fezeka Nkomonye-Bayeni (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1981) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke jere ozi dị ka onye otu Executive Council (MEC) maka egwuregwu, ntụrụndụ, nka na ọdịbendị na Eastern Cape site n'afọ 2019 ruo 2022
Ọ bụ onye otu Eastern Cape Provincial Legislature kemgbe afọ 2014, na n'oge gara aga site na afọ 2009 ruo afọ 2010
Nkomonye-Bayeni bụ onye otu African National Congress
A mụrụ Nkomonye-Bayeni na 29 Ọgọst 1981
O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts (BA) na Mahadum Durban-Westville
Ọ na-amụ ugbu a maka nzere masta na Development Studies site na Mahadum Metropolitan Nelson Mandela
Nkomonye-Bayeni rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ọrụ na Ingquza Hill Local Municipality
N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara Nkomonye-Bayeni dị ka onye otu Eastern Cape Provincial Legislature dị ka onye so na African National Congress
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu kachasị nta a họpụtara na ntuli aka
N'afọ 2010 ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ụlọ omeiwu iji were ọkwa onye isi nke ozi n'ọfịs nke onye otu Executive Council (MEC) maka Ngalaba Eastern Cape nke Atụmatụ na Treasury
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara Nkomonye-Bayeni ka ọ laghachi na ndị omeiwu
Ọ bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị, ndekọ ego ọha na eze, nlekọta, ọrụ ọha na eze
N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2021, Nkomonye-Bayeni meghere kansụl Eastern Cape Provincial Geographical Names Committee (ECPGNC) na Bhisho, isi obodo mpaghara ahụ
Nkomonye-Bayeni bụ onye na-agba ọsọ ma sonye n'ọtụtụ marathons
Ọ nwalere COVID-19 na Nọvemba 2020, n'oge ọrịa COVID-19 na South Africa
Àtụ Members of the Eastern Cape Provincial Legislature
Fiodor Dostoievsky (Disemba 11, 1921 - Febụwarị 9, 1881) bụ onye edemede Russia nke a na-ewere dị ka otu n'ime ndị edemede kachasị ukwuu na ndị kasị nwee mmetụta n'ụwa
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Dostoevsky na akụkọ dị mkpirikpi emetụtala ọtụtụ ndị edemede, ndị ọkà ihe ọmụma na ndị na-eme fim, bụ ndị nọgidere na-amụ ha gburugburu ụwa
A na-enwe mmasị na akwụkwọ ya maka omimi uche, ọchị na ike ime mmụọ ha
Ndị nkatọ na-ewere 'Mpụ na ntaramahụhụ', 'Onye nzuzu', na 'Ụmụnna Karamazov' dịka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya kachasị ukwuu
Fidelia Akuabata Njeze (onye nke amuru na abali asato nke onwa June n'afọ iri na iteghete ọgu atọ na anọ nke bu 1964 na bekee) bu onye nochite anya Naijiria no obodo Switzerland na Liechtenstein
A họpụtara ya na mgbe mbụ dị ka onye isi nke ngalaba ihe gbasara ugbọ elu na Nigeria niile na ụbọchị isii nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ puku abụọ na iri (2010)
Nke a mere tupu onye isi ala Jonathan echi zuo, mgbe ọ mara ọkwa maka ndị ọhọọrọ ọhụrụ maka ịsoro ya rụọ ọrụ na kabinet ya
Tupu ọkwa ahụ, Njeze rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Mịnịsta nke bu onye nlekọta na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo na ihe gbasara mmiri na ọbere Minista maka Nchebe obodo na kabinet nke President Umaru Yar'Adua nke nara nmuọ
A mụrụ Njeze na ụbọchị asatọ na ọnwa June, n'afọ 1964 na Enugu State
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ Girls High School Awkunanaw, Enugu
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta asambodo BSc maka ndị na-eme ọgwụ nke bekee n'akpọ Pharmacy na Mahadum nke Nigeria, dị na Nsukka a'na akpọ UNN na aha ichafu
Mgbe ọ gasịrị ọzụzụ otu afọ a na-akpọ internship na asụsụ bekee, ọ ga'ra obodo Naijira ozi dị ka esi eme ya nke n'akpọ National Youth Service Corps site na afọ 1990 ruo 1991
Ọmere nke a na ụlọ ọgwụ na-elekọta maka ọkpụkpụ nke a'na akpọ National Orthopedics Hospital, dịkwa na Enugu
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ma na-ere ọgwụ n'ụlọ ọrụ Chinors Pharmacy n'afọ 1992
Site na afọ 1996 rue 2007 Njeze bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Gredel Pharmacy
N’afọ 2004 a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị na-elekọta ahụike na Enugu State a'na akpọ Health Services Management Board iji nye aka ịgbanwe ngalaba ahụike na steeti Enugwu
A họpụtara Njeze dị ka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka nchekwa obodo na ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2007 mgbe onye isi ala oge ahụ Umaru Yar'Adua họpụtara ya
Ndi Senate nke Federal Republic of Nigeria nyochara ya nke ọma
Ya mere, na ụbọchị iri na asaa, n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2008 ọ ghọrọ Minista nke ọbere maka Ọrụ Ugbo na ihe gbasara mmiri mgbe onye isi ala ahụ mere n'gbanwee na ndị ha na ya na-arụ ọrụ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ụgbọelu na ụbọchị isii nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2010 site n’aka onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan mgbe ọ banyechara n’ọchịchị

Na Satọde,ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 2011, n'oge emume nke ndị gụchara akwụkwọ nke iri abụọ na atọ na Mahadum nke Teknụzụ, Federal University of Technology Owerri (FUTO) nyere Oriakụ Njeze asambodo Honorary Doctorate dị ka dọkịta nke njikwa teknụzụ
Ọ nwetala nsọpụrụ dị iche iche site na'aka ndị ọtụtụ otu na emepụta ọgwụ nke na'egosi na Njeze bu ọkachamara na-emepụta ọgwụ, ma bụrụkwa onye nnọchi anya ọrụ ahụ
Ihe nsọpụrụ enyere ya dị ọtụtụ gunyere;
N'oge ntuli aka nke n'afọ 2011, ọ kwadoro ma gbasaa mkpọsa ozi nke ọma maka President Goodluck Jonathan
Mgbe nhoputa ndi ochichi nke afọ ahụ gachara, President Goodluck Jonathan hoputara Njeze ka o duzie otu n’ime komiti nraranye nke ga enyere aka ọrụ ohuru a
Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara Fidelia Akuabata Njeze maka ọkwa nke onye nnọchi anya Naịjirịa n'ọnwa Disemba n'ụbọchị nke mbụ, n'afọ 2011
Mgbe nke a gasịrị ndị Senate nyochara ya ma kwado ya
Maka nke a, a họpụtara Njeze ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Naijiria na Switzerland na Liechtenstein na ọnwa June n'ụbọchị iri na abụọ, n'afọ 2012
N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Septemba na otu afọ ahụ Onye nnochite anya Fidelia Akuabata Njeze gara n'ihu chee akwụkwọ ozi nke nzere nye Onye isi ala nke Switzerland Confederation Eveline Widmer-Schlumpf
O gosipụtara akwụkwọ ozi nke nzere maka ntozu nye mba Liechtenstein n'ụbọchị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Disemba 14, na otu afọ ahụ
Nnukwu ahụmịhe nke ọ chịkọtara kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ na ọrụ ọhaneze mere ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu akụ nke bara uru na mba Naijiria na steeti obodo ya

Ahụmahụ ihe nke a mere ka ọ sonye na otu nmadu iri na ise ndị ndụmọdụ ndị n'ahụ maka akụ na ụba akpọrọ Economic Advisory Committee (EAC) nke Gọvanọ steeti ahụ guzoro na ọnwa June n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na otu, n'afọ

E guzobere kọmitii ahụ maka iji kwalite ma mmụba akụ na ụba na-aga n'ihu, na echiche ọhụrụ banyere okwu akụ na ụba steeti, ma ịkwalite itinye ego na ndụmọdụ gọọmentị banyere otu esi eme ka steeti Enugwu bụrụ ebe azụmahịa na aga nke ọma maka ọchịchọ ịkwalite ụkpụrụ ibi ndụ nke ụmụ amaala ahụ
Fidelis Gadzama (amụrụ 20 Ọktoba 1979) bụ onye na- eme egwuregwu na Naijiria onye nwetara ihe nrite n'egwuregwu Olympik
Gadzama so na ndị otu Naijiria nwetara ihe nrite ọla ọcha na mgbagharị 4 x 400 mita relay na asọmpi Olympik nke afọ 2000 na Sydney

Ndị otu Naijiria gbahara nke abụọ n'azụ ndị otu US, bụ ndi e mechara chụpụ na asọmpi ịgba ọsọ 4x400 mita na asọmpi Olympik nke afọ 2000 site n'aka Kọmitii Olympik nke mba ụwa , n'ihi otu n'ime ndị otu ahụ ji ọgwụ na-akwalite arụmọrụ iwu na-akwadoghị mgbe ha na-asọmpi na Sydney
Na 21 Julaị 2012, a napụrụ ihe nrite ịgba ọsọ Olympik nke 2000 4 × 400 m relay mgbe ndị otu USA napụrụ ihe nrite ọla edo, nke pụtara na Gadzama na Nigeria bụ ndị nwetara ọla edo
Na Mee 2014, a hoputara ya ka onye otu Labour Party Merton London Borough Councillor maka Cannon Hill
Àtụ Footer Olympic Champions 4x400 m Men
Fidelis C

Okoro bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria bụ onye Senator nwere nye ndi Enugu North Senatorial District nke Enugu State na mmalite nke Republic nke anọ nke Naijiria, ọ bu onye otu ndi Alliance for Democracy (AD)
Ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka senator na ubochi ịrị abụo na itoolu na ọnwa Mee n'afọ otu puku na narị itoolu na iri itoolu na itoolu

Mgbe ọ nọsịrị n'oche ya na Senate na June n'afọ otu puku na narị itoolu na iri itoolu na itoolu , a họpụtara Okoro na kọmitii na Senate Services, Industries (onye isi oche), Police Affairs, Agriculture na Niger Delta
Ọ gbanwere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ chichi ono bu Alliance ka obuzieru People's Democratic Party (PDP) wee bụrụ onye na-akwado Gọvanọ Chimaroke Nnamani
N'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ puku abụọ na otu , Chief Mike Ejinima, onye na-achọ ibu gọvanọ, tinyere Nnamani, Ike Ekweremadu na David Atigwe, onye otu Enugu State House of Assembly
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ puku abụọ na atọ na tiketi PDP
Àtụ Nigerian Senators of the 4th National AssemblyÀtụ Nigerian Senators of the 5th National Assembly
Prọfesọ Fidelis Uzochukwu Okafor bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na onye isi nlekọta nke Mahadum Anambra Steeti nke dị n'Uli, bụ obodo dị na Naijiria
Gọvanọ Anambra Steeti họpụtara ya
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1950 n'Onitsha, Okafor nwere GCE ya na All Hallows Seminary, Onitsha n'afọ 1972
O nwere nzere mmụta BA ya na Mahadum Urban, Rome n'afọ 1976
Ọ nwere nzere Masters ya (1980) na PhD (1982) na Mahadum Urban, na Mahadum Gregorian dị na Rome
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye nkuzi nke abụọ (1982-1984), Onye nkuzi nke mbụ (1984-1986), Onye nkuzi Ọkà (1986-1997) tupu ọ banye n'ọkwa prọfesọ n'afọ 1997 na Mahadum nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ ya bụ osote shanselọ nke Anambra State University n'agbanyeghị na ọ rụọla ọrụ dị ka onye isi na Nwafor Orizu College of Education, Nsugbe (2007–2010)
O dere akwụkwọ ndị gụnyere Iwu Positivism na African Legal Tradition na ikike na Iwu na Hobbes 'Ethical and Theory Theory
Ọ meriri akara ngosi kacha mma maka Japan Foundation na 1994
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị
Nigeria Philosophical Association, African Association of Ethnophilosophers, International Association of Orientalist
Ihe igwe ihe bụ ngwá ọrụ pụrụ ichè eji atụle ike nké oghere eletrik na ikuku, otu n'ime isi ihe ndị dị na ọkụ eletrik ikuku
A na-eji ha eme ihe na usoro mbupụ màkà rọket ndị a na-ejikọta màkà orbit, yana Space Shuttle lara ezumike nká ugbu a, iji zere égbè eluigwe
A na-ejikwa ha eme ihe na ụlọ nyocha dị n'èzí màkà ngwá ọrụ nchebe àmụ̀mà iji chọpụta ọnọdụ nnwale dị mmá, ma ọ bụ naanị iji tụọ mpaghara eletrik ikuku site na égbè eluigwe
'Ihe igwe' bụ ihe na-agbagharị agbagharị na ngwá ọrụ ahụ
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Chopper, na-agbanwe obere mgbaàmà DC nke ọkụ eletrik dị gbụrụ-gbúrụ n'ime obere mgbaàmà AC nke dị mfe ịchọpụta na-enweghị mgbagwoju ányà DC nke amplifier na-eme ka ọ jupụta
Enwèrè ike iji ya n'ala, ma ọ bụ tinye ya n'ikuku ma na-efefe n'ime igwe ojii isi anvil iji tụọ ya
Na Kennedy Space Center (KSC) na Florida, a na-etinye ihe igwe ihe iri atọ na otu gbụrụ-gbúrụ KSC na Cape Canaveral Space Force Station dị nso
Data sitere na ihe igwe ihe na-enyere ndị na-akọ ọdịnihu aka ịchọpụta mgbè ụgwọ eletrik dị n'elu nwèrè ike ịkpata àmụ̀mà n'oge mmalite
Refilwe Boingotlo Moeketsi (amụrụ n'abalị̀ iri abụọ na anọ nke ọ̀nwa Ọktoba afo 1991), nke a maara dịka Fifi Cooper bụ onye na-edekọ egwu na South Africa
Fifi Cooper malitere ọrụ egwu ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwu R&B tupu mgbasasi egwu ya ahụ ya ka ọ wepụtara egwu rap ya 'Chechela Morago' n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2015, o wepụtara abọm studio mbụ ya nke nwetara ihe nrite 20FIFI
Fifi Cooper bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ atọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Montshiwa, Mahikeng, South Africa, ebe o jikwa mgbalị ya na-ịbụ abụ na ịgba egwú mee ihe
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Batswana High School, Mahikeng na agụmakwụkwọ ya dị elu na Boston Media House ebe ọ gụrụ Media

Fifi Cooper malitere ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị; na-esonye n'ihe omume ndị ọzọỌ malitere ọrụ egwu ya n'afọ 2008 mgbe ọ mere ngosi ọbịa na Mo'Molemi 's Motzamai Rebel With a Pause album
Ihe ịga nke oma ya bịara n'afọ 2010 ka ewepụtara otu ya akpọrọ 'Chechela Morago', egwu rap nke nwetara nnukwu egwu egwu ma mee nke ọma iji nweta ebe ọhụrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ egwu South Africa
Fifi Cooper mekwara ka ụda olu pụta ìhè na remix nke AKA 's 'Baddest Remix' single, Mo'Molemi's album titled Asia, Khuli Chana 's Lost in Time and Lection's Gentlemen's Club
N'afọ 2015, Fifi Cooper bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ nke Ambitiouz Entertainment, ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ nke South Africa
Na mbido afọ 2015, ọ wepụtara egwu AB Crazy nke akpọrọ 'Kisses'
Dino Benedetti duziri vidiyo egwu nke 'Kisses' ma wepụta ya na YouTube n'abalị iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2015

N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2015, Fifi Cooper wepụtara 20FIFI, abọm studio mbụ ya nke meriri ihe nrite atọ na 15th Metro FM Music Awards ma họpụta ya ọzọ na 'Best Newcomer of The Year' na 'Best Female Artist of The Year ' na mbipụta nke abụọ nke South African Music Awards
Na Febụwarị 2017, Fifi Cooper hapụrụ Ambitiouz Entertainment tinyere A-Reece na duo hip hop B3nchMarQ
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị akara ndekọ mbụ ya, o guzobere akara ndekọ nke ya Mo Cooper records ma mesịa wepụta abọm mbụ ya n'okpuru akara ndekọ nke aka ya
Abọm egwu iri abụọ na otu akpọrọ 'Take Me Back' nke gụnyere egwu dịka 'Freedom & 'Zwagala', gosipụtara ndị dị ka Thabsie, Moozlie, Towdeemac na Leon Lee ịkpọ aha ole na ole
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2020, Fifi Cooper wepụtara egwu mbụ ya 'Net So' site na abọm ya na-abịanụ na 2021 nke akpọrọ Chapters
Vidio egwu maka 'Net So' nke Mo Cooper Visuals gbara, The Boss Lady n'onwe ya dekwara ma duzie ya
N'abalị iri na otu nke ọnwa Maachị afọ̀ 2021, a tọhapụrụ egwu ya 'Motlogeleng'
Abụ ahụ ga-abụ isi egwu site na abọm ya na-abịanụ
N'ịbụ onye ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi obodo na-ele anya dị ka 'nwanyi mbụ nkeotswako', ụdị egwu Fifi Coopers nwere ike ịhụ rap ya ma na-abụ abụ
A na-ekwu na ọ bụ onye na-agụ egwú na egwu Khuli Chana bụ 'Mnatebawen', ọ na-eme ụdị egwu hip hop na Motswako
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na YoMzansi, Fifi Cooper kọwara ụdị rap ya dị ka 'ihe a na-apụghị ịkọwapụta akọwapụta, nke na-eme ihe ike na nke obi ụtọ'
Fifi Cooper bụ nne naanị ya, o nwere nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Resego
Princess Fifi Ekanem Ejindu bụ onye Naịjirịa na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka
A mụrụ ya na Ibadan,n'ime Naijiria,mana ọ bụ nwa nwa nwa nke Eze James Ekpo Bassey nke obodo Cobham na Calabar, Naijiria, ma nna ya, prọfesọ Sylvester Joseph Una, si Uyo,dị na Akwa Ibom Steeti
Princess Fifi bụ nwa nwa nwa nke James Ekpo Bassey, eze Efik dị ike nke oge ọchịchị kolonia masta, onye oche ya dị n'obodo Cobham,na Calabar,nke Naijiria
Eze Bassey, bụ nne nna ya, bụ onye eze obodo Cobham nke ndị nnọchi anya eze nwanyị Victoria n'afọ 1893
N'ihi ihe nketa a, Princess Fifi na-eji aha HH Obonganwan King James n'ọgbakọ
A mụrụ adaeze Offiong Ekanem Ejindu na Ibadan, isi obodo Oyo Steeti,na Naijiria
A zụlitere ya ebe ahụ
Nna ya, Prọfesọ Sylvester Joseph Una, gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Trinity dị na Dublin, na Mahadum Brown dị n'Amerịka
Ọ bụ Mịnịsta mbụ na-ahụ maka ahụike na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ mbụ nke Naijiria, na onye otu nzuko omebe iwu na-eduga na nnwere onwe
Mgbe ahụ ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ were bụrụ otu n'ime ndị nkuzi mbụ bụ ụmụ amaala na Mahadum nke Ibadan
Nne Princess Fifi bụ Obonganwan Ekpa Una gụkwara akwụkwọ n’ỊEngland
Princess Fifi gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Senior Staff Primary School n'ogige mahadum ma mesịa gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị na Queens College, nke Yaba,na Legọs
Fifi gara n'ihu mụọ ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Pratt Institute, kọleji onwe na-ahụ maka mmewe na Brooklyn,nke New York
N'afọ 1983, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Pratt, bụrụ nwanyị ojii Afrịka izizi e nyere nzere BArch
n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị nkea, Fifi gụrụ akwụkwọ na Massachusetts Institute of Technology tupu ọ gaa ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ dị n'obodo New York
Fifi laghachiri Pratt Institute iji nweta nzere masta ya na Urban Planning ma mechaa laghachi Naịjirịa
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa, Ejindu malitere Starcrest Group of companies
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere n'afọ 1995, ma gụnyere Starcrest Investment Ltd, Starcrest Associates Ltd
na Starcrest Industries Ltd, ndị niile metụtara ihe ala, mmanụ, na iwu ụlọ

Princess Fifi na-akọwa ụdị nka ya dị ka Neo-tradishọna nke ọ na-akọwa dịka 'building a new project [with] new materials, but with traditional and old style details and features' ma ya mere ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya, ka ọ na-akọwa, n-eweghachite oge Ntụghari ọhụrụ
N’afọ 2013, e nyere ya ihe nrite African Achievers African Arts na Fashion Lifetime Achievement Award
Fifi Mukuna (amụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ onye Congo na-ese ihe osise na onye na-ese ihe osise
A mụrụ Fifi Mukuna na Kinshasa na Zaire, nke bụzi Democratic Republic of the Congo, n'afọ 1968
Nna ya bụ onye nnọchi anya mba
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na Belgium, ebe e kenyere nna ya, wee bụrụ onye na-akwado Bob et Bobette, usoro ihe ọchị nke Willy Vandersteen mepụtara
O nwere mmasị na eserese, mgbe ọ laghachiri Zaire, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Académie des Beaux-Arts na Kinshasa n'afọ 1989

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Mukuna malitere inye onyinye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche gụnyere Le Palmarès, Le Phare, na Le Grognon, na-arụkọ ọrụ na ndị na-ese ihe na ndị Kongo na-ewu ewu na ndị na-ese ihe osise
Banyere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe maka Le Phare, o kwuru, 'Ọ dị ize ndụ, mana ọ masịrị m nke ukwuu

' E bipụtara ụfọdụ n’ime ọrụ a n’aha ụgha, ọtụtụ ndị na-agụkwa akwụkwọ chere na ọ bụ nwoke, bụ́ nke chebere ya mgbe ndị ọchịchị n’otu oge bịara n’ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ịmanye ndị na-ese ihe ka ha ghara ise ihe
O bipụtakwara ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Franco-Congolese Alliance, otu ndị Congo na-abaghị uru na-arụ ọrụ na mmekorita ya na Alliance Française na Paris
Mukuna nwetara ọzụzụ ọzọ site na ọmụmụ ihe nke Centre Wallonie-Bruxelles haziri
N'afọ 2001, o nyere aka na nchịkọta ọrụ nke ndị edemede Africa, À l'ombre du baobab, nke ọ lekwasịrị anya na ndụ ụmụaka n'okporo ámá
N'ịbụ onye na-echegbu onwe ya banyere mmegide na-arịwanye elu na ihe osise ya mgbe gọọmentị chọpụtara onye ọ bụ, Mukuna hapụrụ mba ya n'afọ 2002 wee biri na France
O nwetara ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gbara ọsọ ndụ, ụmụ ya wee nwee ike iso ya biri na France, mana di ya nke nọgidere na Kinshasa nwụrụ tupu ya enwee ike isonyere ya
Na France, Mukuna maliteghachiri ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ ọchị

O nyere aka na mbipụta nke atọ nke Afrobulles, mbipụta nke nchịkọta nke otu aha ahụ nke onye ọzọ na-ese ihe osise na Congo, Alix Fuili, yana nchịkọta atọ ndị ọzọ Une journée dans la vie d'un africain d'Afrique, Là-bas
Na poto, na ọbịbịa ọhụrụ
O nyekwara aka na magazin Italian Linus, na mmekorita ya na onye edemede Christophe Ngalle Edimo, ma sonye na ihe ngosi Matite africane
Ya na Edimo rụkọrọ ọrụ na mgbanwe nke akụkọ Carl Norac na isiokwu nke mmiri na gburugburu ebe obibi
N'afọ 2005, o bipụtara ihe ọchị Si tu me suis autour du monde
O bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, Kisi le Collier, n'afọ 2013
N'ofè imepụta ọrụ nke ya, Mukuna na-akụzi, gụnyere na Higher Regional School of Visual Art na Tourcoing
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya omenala nke Alliance Française na Red Cross
Otu palanquin ihe atụ jikọtara ya na totem nke onye nwe ya bụ ụdị ihe mkpofu pụrụ iche eji eme ihe na mpaghara Greater Accra na Ghana

Palanquins ndị a a na-akpọ n'asụsụ Ga okadi akpakai bụ nke akara eze ma ọ bụ naanị ndị eze Ga ma ọ bụ mantsemei na ndị isi ha na-eji ya eme ihe mgbe a na-eburu ha n'ihu ọha na durbars na ememme dịka Homowo
Site na palanquins ndị a na-anọchi anya, ndị Ga na-emepụta ọdịiche agbụrụ n'etiti onwe ha na ndị agbata obi ha Akan na-eji naanị ụgbọ mmiri ma ọ bụ oche dị mfe
Onye isi Ga nke ezinụlọ ya na-eji ọdụm dị ka totem ga-eji ahịhịa mee ihe n'ụdị ọdụm
Totem na akara ezinụlọ nke Ga na-anọchi anya anụmanụ, osisi ma ọ bụ ihe
E jikọtara ha niile na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ezinụlọ na nna nna ya
Fikile Khosa bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ na-agba dịka onye na-agbachitere Red Arrows
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke Zambia na asọmpi bọọlụ na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics
A mụrụ Fikile Patrick Magadlela (ubochí irí àtó n'ọnwa Disemba 1952 nà Newclare, Johannesburg South Africa
Ọ bịdọrọ ise ihe na mgbidi ndị mụrụ ya site na mgbè ọ chetara
Nne na nna ya Arthur Magadlela na Mavis Magadlela zụlitere ya n'ụlọ ịhụnanya
Ịgụ akwụkwọ nna ya zụrụ ma nweta ihe ọmụma site n'aka ndị agadi
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ọkọlọtọ asatọ (grade nké irí) iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe oge niile
Magadlela bụ ónyé nkuzi onwé ya mànà ya na ndị omenkà ibe ya nọrọ ọtụtụ awa na-agbanwerịta echiche na usoro
Magadlela ná ndị na-ese ihe dịka Ezrom Legae, Solly Maphiri, Winston Saoli, Percy Sedumedi, Pietro Cuzzolini na Harold Jeppe rụkọrọ ọrụ nkè ọma, na-ewebata ya na ndị na'ihe nkiri na Johannesburg
Ọrụ ya a mà ámá bụ nke akpọrọ 'Birth of The Second Creation' bụ usoro ihe omimi nke ala na-egosi nwoke na nwanyị Afrịka na-agbagharị na ìgwè ojii
Mgbè e mesịrị, Magadlela ga-eme ihe nkiri ndị siri ike na ihe odide ndị yiri ya na-eji agba na uri
Ihe ngosi mbụ ya bụ na Goodman Gallery nke Linda Givon nwèrè na 1978
Berman Gallery 1992
Ntụle na UNISA Art Gallery 1995
Magadlela nwụrụ n'afọ 2003, nwa ya nwanyị bụ ónyé na-ese ihe Turiya Magadlela nwụkwara
Okpu oke aso (/ɑːˈʃoʊkeɪ/; nke a maara dị ka fila n'asụsụ Yoruba) bụ okpu dị nro nke ndị Yoruba nke Western Africa na-eyi
A na-eji ákwà aso oke, ogho, velvet, ma ọ bụ damask e ji aka kpụọ ya
A na-ejikarị ogho kpuchie ha, mana enwere ike ịtọpụ ha ma ọ bụrụ na emepụta ha ka a na-eyi ha maka otu ihe omume
Ọ bụ ezie na okpu ndị a sitere na ndị Yoruba na Naijiria, ndị ikom si n'agbụrụ Africa ndị ọzọ na ndị Africa na-eyi ha
Ndị nwoke na-eyi ya naanị, filala na-adaba nke ọma n'isi, a na-eyikarịkwa ya n'otu akụkụ, na-ezu ike n'elu ntị onye na-eyi ya
Otú ọ dị, ọ nwere ike ịbụ 'ịkpụzi' n'ụzọ dịgasị iche iche, dị ka mmasị onwe onye nke onye nwe ya si dị
Ụfọdụ na-ekwu na fila mgbe a na-eyi ya n'aka nri na-egosi nwoke na-alụbeghị di, ebe iyi ya n'aka ekpe na-egosi nwoke lụrụ nwanyị
A na-eyikarị ya na uwe Yoruba na-akpata ya ma chọọ ka a na-eyi ya mgbe a na-eji Agbada (nke a na-ejikwa aso oke, lace ma ọ bụ ogho mee) ma ọ bụ uwe dashiki brocade
Otu ihe atụ a ma ama nke a na-eyi fila maka oge pụrụ iche bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri John Boyega na-eyi otu na Star Wars The Rise of Skywalker premiere
Fileless malware bụ ụdị nke kọmputa metụtara ngwanrọ ọjọọ nke dị naanị dị ka ihe nchekwa kọmputa nke dabeere na RAM

Ọ naghị ede akụkụ ọ bụla nke ọrụ ya na diski ike nke kọmputa nke pụtara na ọ na-eguzogide usoro nyocha nke Anti-computer dị ugbu a nke na-agụnye ndepụta ọcha dabeere na faịlụ, nchọpụta mbinye aka, nkwenye ngwaike, nyocha ụkpụrụ, akara oge, wdg, ma na-ahapụ obere ihe site na ihe akaebe nke ndị nyocha nyocha dijitalụ nwere ike iji chọpụta ọrụ na-akwadoghị
Dị ka e mere malware nke ụdị a iji rụọ ọrụ na ncheta, ogologo ndụ ya na usoro ahụ dị naanị ruo mgbe a maliteghachiri usoro ahụ
A na-ewere malware na-enweghị ntụpọ mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka ihe jikọrọ ya na malware na-echeta ka ha abụọ na-arụ ọrụ ha n'edeghị data na diski n'oge ndụ nke ọrụ ha

Nke a emeela ka ụfọdụ ndị na-ekwu okwu kwuo na ụdị a dị iche iche abụghị ihe ọhụrụ ma bụrụ naanị 'nkọwa nke okwu a maara nke ọma, nje bi na ebe nchekwa, nke a pụrụ ịchọta usoro ọmụmụ ya na 1980s na ọmụmụ Lehigh Virus nke onye malitere okwu ahụ, Fred Cohen, mepụtara, wee nwee mmetụta na akwụkwọ ya na isiokwu ahụ

Fileless malware bụ ụdị evolushọn nke ngwanrọ ọjọọ nke weere ihe nlereanya na-adịgide adịgide nke imeziwanye onwe onye / nkwalite na ịkwọ ụgbọala gaa n'ọnọdụ mwakpo a kọwara nke ọma, nke a pụrụ ịchọta mgbọrọgwụ ya na mmemme nje virus nke nkwụsị-na-anọ / ebe nchekwa nke, ozugbo ha malitere, ga-ebi na ebe nchekwa na-echere nkwụsị usoro tupu ha enweta ohere ịnweta njikwa ha; ihe atụ nke a hụrụ na nje ndị dị ka Frodo, The Dark Avenger, Number of the Beast

Na Febụwarị 8, 2017, Kaspersky Lab's Global Research & Analysis Team bipụtara akụkọ akpọrọ 'Fileless attacks against enterprise networks' nke na-emetụta ụdị malware a, na ọdịdị ya kachasị ọhụrụ, na-emetụta netwọk ụlọ ọrụ 140 n'ụwa niile na ụlọ akụ, ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta na òtù gọọmentị bụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ kachasị elu

Mmapụta nke malware nke na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ na-enweghị ntụpọ na-eweta nnukwu nsogbu nye ndị na-eme nchọpụta nyocha dijitalụ, ndị ịdabere na inwe ike inweta ihe eji emepụta ihe dijitalụ site na ebe mpụ dị oke mkpa iji hụ na usoro njide na ịmepụta ihe akaebe nke a na-anabata n'ụlọ ikpe
Filipa Alexandra Carmo da Silva (onye amụrụ n'afọ 1995) bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu
O nwetara nkwanye ùgwù dị ukwuu maka mmeri nke asọmpi egwu mkpuchi nke RyanSeacrestcom maka ntụgharị ya nke egwu One Direction, 'Story of My Life'
Mgbe agba ise gasịrị, Filipa meriri asọmpi ahụ site na vidiyo egwu ya nke Pearl Harbor nke Kyle White duziri
N'ihu UK The X Factor, ejima Jedward bụ ndị na-esote, na USA The X Factor finalist Josh Levi, onye gbara onye nke atọ
Nke a nyere ya ikpo okwu zuru ụwa ọnụ iji wepụta egwu izizi ya bụ Chills n'ọnwa Mee 2014

Ọ bụghị onye ọbịa n' ihe nkiri mpụta ìhè ya nke bu nkwanye ugwu ebe osi bụ Mediterranean ya, a gwara Filipa ka ọ ọ kwe ukwe mba Portuguese na Portugal - Mozambique friendly n'oge 2010 FIFA Soccer World Cup; n'ihu ihe na-ruru opekatampe puku iri atọ

Filipa ejirila ọtụtụ oge ya kemgbe afọ 2014 na-arụkọ ọrụ ya na ndị na-ede egwu ma ndị na-emepụta egwu na US, gụnyere onye na-ede egwu ritere Grammy-Award Pam Sheyne (nke a maara nke ọma maka egwu Christiana Aguilera zuru ụwa ọnụ, “Genie in a Bottle”)
Ya na ya rụkọrọ ọrụ maka egwu nke ya, Little White Lie
Na nweputa n'afọ 2016,, Little White Lie rịgoro ngwa ngwa na iTunes na chaatị redio South Africa
O tinyekwara oge na-emepe ụda olu ya pụrụ iche, yana ịmanye ókè egwu ya ka ọ na-eto dị ka ọ na-ese ihe mgbe ọ na-amụ ihe n'ịntanetị iji nweta nzere BA na Liberal Arts
A kwanyere ya ugwu na Glamour's Next Big Thing na awọd Women of the Year nke afọ 2014, yana Cosmo Awesome Women Nomination
Ndị Fans nwere ike ịtụ anya ọtụtụ ihe site na mmetụta , onye dị nkwadobe iwepụta ọtụtụ egwu na EP n'ime ọnwa ndị na-abịa

Na-arụ ọrụ na ndị na-ese ihe, ndị na-emepụta ihe, na ndị na-ede egwu, ma na mpaghara ma na mba ofesi, ọrụ Filipa na-abịanụ ga-emepụta mkpali nke a na-atụ anya ugbu a site na talent ya, nnọgidesi ike, na nraranye ya
Luís Filipe Duarte Ferreira da Silva, onye a maara nke ọma dịka Filipe Duarte (5 June 1973 -17 April 2020), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ese olu na Angola
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Variações Guardian Angel, Cinzento e Negro na Noise
A mụrụ ya n'abalị 5 ọnwa June afọ 1973 na Nova Lisboa, mgbe ahụ na mpaghara mba Portugal nke Angola
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Spain, Nuria Mencía
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere otu nwa nwanyị, Antonia onye a mụrụ n'ọnwa Machị 2011
Duarte nwụrụ na 17 Eprel 2020, n'oge mkpọchi COVID-19 mbụ na Portugal, mgbe ọ dị afọ 46 n'ihi ọrịa obi siri ike
Duarte gụsịrị akwụkwọ ihe nkiri na Lisbon Theatre and Film School
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ ọzụzụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Institute for Research and Theatrical Creation
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n'okpuru ndị nduzi ihe nkiri a ma ama Adolfo Gutkin, Rogério de Carvalho, Geraldo Touché, Francisco Salgado, Carlos J
Pessoa, Laila Ripol na Miguel Seabra
Na telivishọn, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na telivisheneng Teorema de Pitágoras, nke Gonçalo Galvão Telles duziri
Mgbe ahụ ọ sonyeere usoro ihe nkiri TV abụọ A Ferreirinha, nke Jorge Paixão da Costa na João Semana duziri, nke João Cayatte duziri
Mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama na usoro ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na usoro Ecuador nke dabeere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Miguel Sousa Tavares
N'afọ 2013, ọ rụrụ ọrụ a ma ama 'João Belmonte' na telivishọn soapie Belmonte
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Filipe na-eme olu mgbe niile maka ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri animated gụnyere onye ama ama 'Sanosuke Sagara' na usoro animated Samurai X
N'oge ọnwụ ya n'afọ 2020, ọ na-edekọ ihe nkiri ncha nke Brazil Amor de Mãe, nke na-egosi na SIC, sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Nothing Ever Happened nke Gonçalo Galvão Teles duziri
Ihe onyonyo ndị a na-esonyekarị na ụda, yana adịkarịghị, mkpali mmetụta ndị ọzọ
Okwu ahụ bụ 'sinima ', nke dị mkpirikpi maka ihe nkiri, a na-ejikarị eme ihe maka ime ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri, na ụdị nkà nke sitere na ya

A na-emepụta ihe oyiyi na-akpali akpali nke ihe nkiri site na iji igwefoto ihe onyonyo na-ese foto n'ezie, site na ịse eserese ma ọ bụ obere ụdị site na iji usoro ihe nkiri ọdịnala, site na “CGI” na ihe nkiri kọmputa, ma ọ bụ site na ngwakọta nke ụfọdụ ma ọ bụ usoro ndị a niile
na mmetụta ndị ọzọ a na ahụ anya
Tupu iwebata mmepụta dijitalụ, a na-edekọ usoro onyonyo ka o dị n'obere celluloid nwere mmetụta kemịkal (ngwaahia ihe nkiri foto), na-abụkarị fremu 24 kwa nkeji
A na-ebufe ihe onyonyo a site na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri n'otu ọsọ ahụ edere ya, yana draịvu Geneva na-ahụ na etiti ọ bụla ka dị n'ime obere oge ntule ya

Ihe mkpuchi na-atụgharị na-akpata “stroboscopic” etiti oge nke ọchịchịrị, mana onye na-ekiri ahụ anaghị achọpụta nkwụsịtụ n'ihi “flicker fusion”Ntugharị a na-ahụ anya na ihu igwe onyonyo bụ n'ihi eziokwu ahụ bụ na echiche a na-ahụ anya enweghị ike ịmata ihe oyiyi nke onye ọ bụla na nnukwu ọsọ ọsọ, ya mere mmetụta nke ihe oyiyi ahụ na-ejikọta na oge gbara ọchịchịrị ma si otú a jikọta ọnụ iji mepụta echiche efu nke otu ihe oyiyi na-akpali akpali
Ụda ngwa anya yiri ya (ihe onyonyo eserese nke okwu a na-ekwu, egwu na ụda ndị ọzọ) na-aga n'akụkụ akụkụ nke ihe nkiri a echekwabara naanị maka ya, ewepụtaghị ya
Aha 'ihe nkiri' na mbụ na-atu aka na oyi akwa fotochemical emulsion dị na celluloid strip nke na-abụbu ihe na- emebu maka ịdekọ na igosi ihe nkiri
Ọtụtụ okwu ndị ọzọ dị maka foto ngagharị nke onye ọ bụla, gụnyere foto, ihe ngosi onyonyo, eserese na- akpụ akpụ, egwu egwu, na imegharị
Okwu a na-ahụkarị na mba Amerika bụ ihe nkiri, ebe a na-ahọrọ ihe nkiri na Europe
Okwu ochie gụnyere 'foto animetedi' na 'foto animated'

Okwu ndịa na-ahụkarị maka ubi n'ozuzu gụnyere nnukwu ihu igwe onyonyo, ihu igwe onyonyo ọlaọcha, ihe nkiri, na sinima ; A na-ejikarị nke ikpeazụ n'ime ihe ndị a eme ihe, dị ka okwu zuru oke, n'edemede ndị ọkà mmụta na edemede dị egwu
N'afọ ndị mbụ, a na-eji mpempe okwu ahụ eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ kama ihu igwe onyonyo
Nkà ihe nkiri adọtala n'ọdịnala dị iche iche nke mbụ n'akụkụ dị ka ịkọ akuko ọnụ, akwụkwọ, ihe nkiri na nkaa anya
Ụdị nka na ihe ntụrụndụ ndị egosipụtalarị ihe onyonyo na-akpali akpali na/ma ọ bụ atụpụtagoro gụnyere

Ewebatara ụkpụrụ “stroboscopicanimation” na 1833 na diski “stroboscopic”(nke a maara nke ọma dị ka phénakisticope)ma mesịa tinye ya na “zoetrope”(ebe 1866), akwụkwọ mpịakọta (ebe 1868), na “praxinoscope” (ebe 1877), tupu ọ ghọọ isi ụkpụrụ maka cinematography
Emere nnwale ndị na-eme ihe ngosi ihe nkiri nke dabere na phénakisticope opekata mpe dị ka 1843 wee lelee ya n'ihu ọha na 1847
“Jules Duboscq”rere sistemu amụma “phénakisticope”na France site na ihe dịka 1853 ruo 1890s
Ewebatara foto na 1839, ma na mbụ 'emulsions' foto chọrọ ogologo mkpughe nke na ndekọ nke ihe ndị na-akpali akpali yiri ihe na-agaghị ekwe omume
Opekempe ka ọ dị ka 1844, e mepụtala usoro isiokwu eserese nke ewepụtara n'ọnọdụ dị iche iche iji tụọ usoro ngagharị ma ọ bụ idetu ụdị akụkụ nlele dị iche iche
Ọbịbịa nke foto stereoscopic, na nnwale ndị mbụ na 1840s na ihe ịga nke ọma azụmahịa kemgbe mmalite 1850s, welitere mmasị n'ịmecha usoro foto na mgbakwunye nke ụzọ isi jide agba na mmegharị

N'afọ 1849, Joseph Plateau bipụtara banyere echiche ahụ iji jikọta mmepụta ya nke phénakisticope na stereoscope, dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri stereoscope Charles Wheatstone tụrụ aro ya, na iji foto nke ihe ọkpụkpụ plasta na ọnọdụ dị iche iche ka a na-emegharị na ngwaọrụ jikọtara
N'afọ 1852, Jules Duboscq kwadoro ngwá ọrụ dị ka 'Stéréoscope-fantascope, ou Bïoscope', mana ọ na-ere ya naanị obere oge, na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Otu diski Bïoscope nwere foto stereoscopic nke igwe dị na mkpokọta Plateau nke Mahadum Ghent, mana ọ nweghị ngwa ma ọ bụ diski ndị ọzọ ahụbeghị

Ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị 1850s ihe atụ mbụ nke foto ozugbo bịara wee nye olile anya na ịse foto ngagharị ga-ekwe omume n'oge na-adịghị anya, mana o were afọ ole na ole tupu e jikọta ya nke ọma na usoro iji dekọọ usoro onyonyo n'usoro n'oge
N'afọ 1878, “Eadweard Muybridge” nwee ike ịse foto nke ịnyịnya na-agba ọsọ na batrị igwefoto n'ahịrị n'akụkụ egwu ahụ wee bipụta nsonaazụ ya dị ka “The Horse in Motionon cabinet cards”
Muybridge, yana Étienne-Jules Marey, Ottomar Anschütz na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ ga-emepụta ọtụtụ ihe ọmụmụ “chronophotography” ọzọ
Muybridge nwere ọtụtụ usoro chronophotographic ya ka etinyere na diski ugegbe wee were zoopraxiscope were tụọ ha na nkuzi ya site na 1880 ruo 1895

Anschütz mepụtara Electrotachyscope nke ya na 1887 iji wepụta onyonyo onyonyo 24 na-ese foto na diski ugegbe dị ka ihe onyonyo na-akpụ akpụ, na-adọkpụ ogologo oge ọ na-eche na ọ na-atọ ndị na-ege ntị ụtọ
A mụrụ Filsan Abdullahi na 1991/1992 (afọ 30–31) na Dire Dawa
Nne na nna ya si Jigjiga, isi obodo Somali Region na Etiopia
Nne Filsan bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego na nna ya onye injinia petroleum bụ onye rụrụ ọrụ ọtụtụ oge ndụ ya na Saudi Arabia
Filsan gụrụ akwụkwọ ma biri na Addis Ababa ebe ọ nwetara nzere na nchịkwa na njikwa na mahadum Unity, na England ebe ọ nwetara nzere na sayensị nkwukọrịta na Mahadum Hertfordshire
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka okwu na asụsụ na England ọtụtụ afọ

Finuala Dowling (amuru June 1962) bu onye odee na onye odee South Africa
Nke asaa n'ime ụmụaka asatọ amụrụ ndị mgbasa ozi redio Eve van der Byl na Paddy Dowling, Finuala Dowling nwetara MA na Bekee site na Mahadum Cape Town (UCT), na DLitt
sitere na Mahadum South Africa (UNISA), ebe ọ kụziri na bekee afọ asatọ
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ uri mbụ ya, I Flying n'afọ 2002 wee nweta ihe nrite Ingrid Jonker Ọ nwetakwara ihe nrite Sanlam maka uri na ihe nrite Olive Schreiner
Ọ meriri M-Net Literary Award (ụdị bekee) nke 2012 maka ime ụlọ maka ala-na-obi
Ya na Tessa na Cara Dowling o guzobela ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ, Dowling Sisters Productions
Dowling na nwa ya nwanyị bi na Muizenberg, Cape Town
Fio Fio bụ ofe Naịjirịa pụrụ iche na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ, a na-eme ofe guinea pea na cocoyam dị ka isi ihe
Guinea pea soup bụ nri dị ụtọ nke a ma ama na steeti Enugu
Ihe ndị ọzọ a na-etinye n'ime fio fio gụnyere akwụkwọ na-esi ísì ụtọ, crayfish, mmanụ nkwụ na Ugba
A na-esi nri Guinea pea ruo mgbe ọ dị nro ma sie ya n'akụkụ achicha (coyam paste)
Fio o bụ asụsụ Beboid nke Cameroon

Fiona Coyne (22 June 1965 - 18 August na afọ 2010) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede, onye na-ede egwuregwu na onye na-egosi igwe onyonyo nke kwadoro nsụgharị South Africa nke The Weakest Link
A mụrụ Coyne na Springs, South Africa n'afọ 1965
Ọ bụ onye otu ihe nkiri Capab ruo afọ asaa mgbe ọ nwetachara ọzụzụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na rhinoceros na ebe nsọ elephant na Kenya ruo afọ anọ
Ọ bụ onye na-ede ọtụtụ egwuregwu a ma ama dịka The Birthday, Glass Roots na As the Koekie crumbles
Fiona McLeod Hill CBE (amụrụ ya na onwa July 1973), nke a na-akpọbu Fiona Cunningham, bụ onye ndụmọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Britain
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Joint Downing Street Chief of Staff na-akwado praịm minista Theresa May, n'akụkụ Nick Timothy, ruo mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na-esochi ntuli aka izugbe 2017
A mụrụ Fiona Hill na Greenock, Obukwa onye gara St Stephen's Roman Catholic Secondary School na Port Glasgow
Tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nte akụkọ na ngalaba mgbasa ozi na mgbasa ozi; ahụmahụ ya gụnyere ịrụ ọrụ maka Daily Record, Scotsman na Sky News
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Conservative Party na 2006, tupu ya etinye oge na Ụlọ Ahịa Britain, wee laghachi na-arụ ọrụ maka Conservatives
Site na 2010, Hill na-arụkọ ọrụ na Theresa May na Home Office dị ka onye ndụmọdụ mgbasa ozi
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na 2014

Ọ hapụrụ gọọmentị mgbe a manyere ya ịgba arụkwaghịm dị ka onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nke May na esemokwu 2014 ya na Michael Gove maka ebubo extremism n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, bụ nke mechara wepụta akwụkwọ ozi nzuzo na webụsaịtị May, kpaliri Prime Minister mgbe ahụ, David Cameron, na-ekwusi ike na May chụrụ
Hill wee bụrụ onye ntụzi aka nke Center for Social Justice think tank, na 2015 ghọrọ onye ntụzi nke ụlọ ọrụ na-agba ọsọ Lexington Communications
Na abalị iri na anọ na onwa mbu, na afo 2016, na-agbaso mkpebi nke ntuli aka ndị isi Conservative 2016, a họpụtara Hill onye isi ndị ọrụ na Theresa May, n'echi ya May ghọrọ Prime Minister
Obere ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dị na ndekọ ọha
N'adịghị ka Timoti, bụ́ onye ya na ya na-ekerịta ọkwá onyeisi ndị ọrụ ruo otu afọ, ọ zere ide akụkọ echiche

James Kirkup, onye na-arụ ọrụ na Hill dị ka onye nta akụkọ na Scotsman, tụrụ aro 'ma eleghị anya ọ dị mma ịsị na Oriakụ May na-ekwu naanị banyere ịgba ohu nke oge a [dị ka ihe dị mkpa maka ọrụ gọọmentị] n'ihi Ms Hill, na nke ahụ abụghị naanị okwu ya
nke ahụ bụ eziokwu'

Ntuli aka n'ozuzu nke 2017 hụrụ nlọghachi nke Conservatives dị ka obere ọchịchị, na ọtụtụ ha na-adabere na Democratic Unionist Party, na-eduga na oku zuru ebe nile n'ime otu ahụ maka ma Nick Timothy na Fiona Hill ka a chụrụ
Dị ka akụkọ si kwuo, Hill kpasuru ndị Conservatives Scotland iwe karịsịa
Ha mere mkpesa maka oke 'nnyonye anya' ya na a gwara ya ka ọ ghara ịme mkpọsa nke kewapụrụ na nke si London
Ka o sina dị, onye ndu ha Ruth Davidson họọrọ ileghara ọchịchọ ahụ anya, iji nweta mmụba dị ukwuu na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị nnọchiteanya Scotland

Nsonaazụ a dị oke mkpa n'ibelata mwepu nke oche ndịda nke oke ala ahụ wee yie ka ọ na-ajụ isi ihe dị mkpa nke atụmatụ ntuli aka Hill na Timoti n'ime ụbọchị ole na ole, na n'ihu nkwughachi azụ na-eto eto, ndị isi ndị ọrụ abụọ agbahapụla
Mgbe na Sky News Hill zutere Tim Cunningham, onye isi TV, onye ọ lụrụ; di na nwunye ahụ mechara gbaa alụkwaghịm
Ka oge na-aga, Charles Farr bụ onye ọrụ obodo ghọrọ onye mmekọ Hill

Ụfọdụ ihe ndekọ na-ekwu na e liri ihe karịrị ndị ozi ala ọzọ dị narị abụọ n'ebe a

Taa, ebe ili ozu ahụ bụ otu n'ime ebe akụkọ ihe mere eme nke na-adọta ndị njem nleta n'obodo Badagry
Ọtụtụ ndị Europe nwụrụ n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Africa n'oge ndị Europe na-agba ohu nke ndị Africa, oge nke Ndị Kraịst, na oge ọchịchị na kọntinent ahụ
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị Europe a nwụrụ site na ọrịa ịba na ụdị dị iche iche nke ahụ ọkụ nke ọtụtụ n'ime ha enweghị ikike mgbochi nke na-enweghị ọgwụgwọ dị irè n'oge ahụ
Ọ bụ ogologo oge ka e mesịrị ka a chọpụtara na quinine na agwọ ịba
Nke a bụ ọnọdụ ebe ọtụtụ ndị ozi ala Europe nke kwagara n'obodo Badagry malite n'afọ 1845 nwụrụ ma lie ha n'obodo ahụ
Ọ bụ n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ndị ozi Europe mbụ rutere na Badagry ka achọpụtara ọnwụ mbụ n'etiti ha
Oriakụ Eliza Phillips Gollmer, nwunye otu n'ime ndị isi nke ozi ahụ, bụ Rev

Charles Andrew Gollmer (onye ọ lụrụ mgbe nwunye mbụ ya nwụsịrị na Sierra Leone n'ọnọdụ yiri nke ahụ), bụ onye mbụ na ndepụta ogologo nke ọnwụ ndị ozi ala ọzọ na / ma ọ bụ olili na Badagry nke ga-esote
Oriakụ Gollmer nwụrụ n'ụbọchị iri na otu nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1845, mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa siri ike ruo ọnwa atọ
Ọ bụ mgbe e liri ya n'ebe a ka e guzobere ili ozu ndị ozi ala ọzọ
Ndị ozi ala ọzọ Europe ndị ọzọ nwụrụ ma lie ebe a gụnyere Mrs
Müller, nwunye Rev

Müller onye nwụrụ n'abali iri abụọ na isi nke ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1848; na Eugene Celadon Van Cooten (onye dọkịta na-awa ahụ Dutch) na nwunye ya, Emily Primrose Van Cooten, onye nwụrụ site na oke ọkụ n'abalị atọ nke onwa Machị afọ 1851, na Mee 17, 1850, n'otu n'otu
E nwekwara ndị Europe ndị ọzọ, ọ bụ ezie na ha abụghị ndị ozi ala ọzọ, e liri ha n'ebe ili ozu a
Otu ihe atụ bụ Maazị George Brand, onye nnọchi anya Britain na Lagos nke nwụrụ n'ọrịa afọ ọsịsa na ahụ ọkụ na June 16, 1860
E lie ụfọdụ ndị ozi ala ọzọ Africa n'ebe ahụ, dị ka Maazị Edward Philips, onye nkuzi ozi ala ọzọ nke Sierra Leone nke nwụrụ site na nkụnwụ na abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Machị afọ 1847
E nwekwara Maazị Mark Willoughby, onye ntụgharị Sierra Leonian nke Gollmer, onye nwụrụ na Mee 9, 1850, mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa ogologo oge
N'ime iri afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, e lie ndị ụkọchukwu Naijiria ole na ole nke oge a, ọkachasị nke Anglican na Methodist, n'ebe ili ozu a
Ndị Katọlik na Society of African Missions ya n'obodo ahụ nwere ebe ili ozu dị iche na Topo Island ebe ọrụ ha dabeere n'ụzọ dị ukwuu

A mụrụ Akinade na Liverpool
Ọ nọrọ afọ anọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Naịjirịa tupu ọ laghachi UK ebe ọ tolitere na Fallowfield na Moss Side nke Manchester
Azụ bụ anụmanụ na-ebi na ime mmiri, craniate, nke na-ebu mkpịsị aka na-enweghị aka na mkpịsị ụkwụ
Nkọwa a gụnyere hagfish dị ndụ, lampreys, na cartilaginous na ọkpụkpụ azụ yana ụdị dị iche iche na-adịghịzi adị
Ihe dị ka 95% nke ụdị azụ dị ndụ bụ azụ ray-finned, nke sitere na klas Actinopterygii, na ihe dị ka 99% nke ndị ahụ bụ teleosts
Ihe ndị mbụ a ga-ekewa dị ka azụ bụ chordates dị nro nke pụtara na mbụ n'oge Cambrian
Ọ bụ ezie na ha enweghị ezigbo ọkpụkpụ azụ, ha nwere notochords nke nyere ha ohere ịdị nkọ karịa ndị ibe ha na-enweghị azụ
Azụ ga-anọgide na-agbanwe site n'oge Paleozoic, na-agbasa n'ụdị dịgasị iche iche
Ọtụtụ azụ nke Paleozoic mepụtara ihe agha mpụga nke chebere ha pụọ na ndị na-eri ibe ha
Azụ mbụ nwere agbà pụtara na oge Silurian, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọtụtụ (dị ka sharks) ghọrọ anụ ndị na-eri anụ na oké osimiri kama ịbụ naanị anụ oriri nke arthropods

Ọtụtụ azụ bụ ectothermic ('ọbara oyi'), na-enye ohere ka okpomọkụ ahụ ha dịgasị iche ka okpompe gburugburu ebe obibi na-agbanwe, ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ n'ime nnukwu ndị na-egwu mmiri dị ka shark ọcha na tuna nwere ike ijide okpomọkụ dị elu
Azụ nwere ike ikwurịta okwu n'ụzọ ụda, ọtụtụ mgbe n'ihe gbasara nri, ime ihe ike ma ọ bụ mbedo
Azụ dị ukwuu n'ọtụtụ mmiri

Enwere ike ịchọta ha n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ gburugburu mmiri niile, site na iyi ugwu dị elu (dịka, char na gudgeon) ruo na abyssal na ọbụna okwu omimi nke oké osimiri ndị dị omimi (dịka, cusk-eels na snailfish), ọ bụ ezie na ọ dịghị ụdị ọ bụla edepụtala na ya
kacha omimi 25% nke oke osimiri
Na ụdị 34,300 akọwara, azụ na-egosipụta ụdị dị iche iche karịa otu ọ bụla ọzọ nke vertebratesi
Azụ bụ ihe dị mkpa maka ụmụ mmadụ n'ụwa niile, ọkachasị dịka nri
Ndị na-akụ azụ ahịa na ndị na-eri nri na-achụ nta azụ n'ime azụ̀ ọhịa ma ọ bụ na-akọ ha n'ọdọ mmiri ma ọ bụ n'ime ngịga dị n'oké osimiri (na aquaculture)
Ndị na-akụ azụ̀ na-atụrụ ndụ na-ejidekwa ha, na-edobe ha dị ka anụ ụlọ, ndị na-azụ azụ na-azụ ha, na-egosikwa ha n'ime aquaria ọha
Azụ enweela ọrụ n'omenala kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, na-eje ozi dị ka chi, akara okpukpe, yana isiokwu nke nka, akwụkwọ na ihe nkiri
Fit-fit ma ọ bụ fir-fir (Ge'ez ፍትፍት fitfit; ፍርፍር firfir), (Oromo chechebsaa), bụ nri Eritrea na Etiopia nke a na-ejikarị eme nri ụtụtụ
A na-enye Fit-fit site n'ịkwado isi ofe na ịpị injera ma ọ bụ kitcha n'ime iberibe ma gwakọta ha abụọ
A na-ejikarị achịcha dị larịị, bọta na-atọ ụtọ, na berbere na-esi ísì ụtọ eme ya
E nwere ụdị abụọ dị iche iche nke fit-fit dabere na ụdị achịcha a na-eji eme ihe injera siri ike na kitcha na-enweghị ihe iko achịcha
Injera fit-fit (enjera fetfet; kwa taita fit-fit na Tigrinya) bụ ngwakọta nke injera, berbere, yabasị, na bọta a ñụchara añụcha
Mgbanwe dị iche iche na ntụziaka a bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị ebe a na-ejikarị aha ihe mgbakwunye dị ka prefix (dịka injera na shiro (chickpea puree), a na-akpọ ya shiro fit-fit)
Na Eritrea, a na-agbakwunye ofe anụ fọdụrụ (zighni ma ọ bụ tsebhi) na injera fit-fit ma nye ya maka nri ụtụtụ na ose chili na yogọt n'akụkụ
N'otu aka ahụ, na Etiopia, a na-eji wat fọdụrụnụ eme ihe dị ka isi ihe tinyere injera
Enwere ike iji spoon rie Injera fit-fit mgbe a na-enye ya n'ime efere ma ọ bụ jiri aka nri rie ya mgbe a na na-enyefe ya n'elu injera ọzọ dị ka ọ dị na nri ndị Etiopia ma ọ bụ Eritrea

Kitcha fit-fit (ọdịiche dị na Etiopia kitta fer-fer, kita fir-fir; nke a maara nke ọma site na aha Oromo ya chechebsa) bụ ngwakọta nke kitcha (Tigrinya) ma ọ bụ kitta (Amharic), berbere, na bọta doro anya
A na-eri nri Kitcha fit-fit mgbe ụfọdụ na yogọt nkịtị (urgo na Amharic na rug-o na Tigrinya)
N'adịghị ka ọtụtụ nri ndị mba Etiopia, a na-eri ya na arịa (na-abụkarị spoon)

Five Roads to Freedom From Apartheid to the World Cup bụ ihe nkiri 2010 nke Robin Benger na Jane Thandi Lipman duziri nke na-ele mgbanwe mgbanwe nke South Africa site n'anya ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị ise bi n'okpuru onyinyo nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ

Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na-elekwasị anya na mmadụ ise si n'ofe mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị nkịtị bụ ndị ahụmahụ ha na-anọchite anya mgbanwe dị omimi nke afọ iri na ise gara aga na ndụ ha n'afọ 2010 na-egosipụta ma nkwa ahụ na mgbagwoju anya nke South Africa taa

Ụzọ ise maka nnwere onwe bụ ọrụ nkeonwe maka onye na-ese ihe nkiri Robin Benger Dịka onye ndu ụmụ akwụkwọ South Africa na ngwụcha 1960s na mmalite afọ 1970s, e jidere ya ugboro atọ maka mmemme mgbochi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, wee chụpụ ya na mba ahụ Emepụtara ihe nkiri a bụ Ian Ayres, Robin Benger, Eric Ellena, Jane Thandi Lipman, Joseph Oesi na Christopher Sumpton

Moalosi Jacob Qoopane (1955-2017) bụ ónyé a makwaara dị ka Nna nke akwụkwọ na nka na Bloemfontein
Qoopane bụ ónyé na-ede akwụkwọ na South Africa na ónyé edemede a ma àmà na mba ụwa, ónyé na- ede uri, ónyé nta akụkọ na ónyé na-akọ akụkọ ndụ
A mụrụ Qoopane nà 1955 nà Mangaung nà Free State
Ọ nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ọ bụ nwata yana ọrụ na Free State
Mmasị ya màkà ide ihe malitere mgbè ọ dị obere
Qoopane gara Tanzania ma biri nà mba ọzọ site na 1977 ruo 1992
Mgbè ọ lọtara, ọ gara n'ihu na-ede édémédé, édémédé, akụkọ ifo na uri
Flaxman Qoopane na Omoseye Bolaji ghọrọ aha ezinụlọ na Mangaung n'oge na-adịghị anya
Ịbụ ónyé a ma ama n'ihi na a na-ebipụta isiokwu ha ugboro ugboro na magazin Next
Qoopane nyekwara aka na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba a ma ama kwa ụbọchị, Daily Sun na magazin Realtime
Ọrụ Qoopane pụtakwara n'akwụkwọ ndị dị ka Hola, Sowetan, Bona, Drum, A nà E, Kopanaang na Free State News
Qoopane guzobere ma dozie Qoopane Literary Gallery ebe a na-egosipụta profaịlụ nke ndị édémédé nà ndị nta akụkọ dị n'ógbè ahụ site ná akwụkwọ akụkọ na magazin dịgasị iche iche
Qoopane wepụtara ógè ya nà mgbalị ya n'ịmepụta ohere na ihe onwunwe màkà ndị edemede nà Bloemfontein
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị edemede a ma àmà nke ọrụ ya gafere oge nke iwepụ ndị isi ojii ka ha bipụta ọrụ ha nà South Africa

Qoopane egosila ọrụ edemede na uri ya na mba ndị dị ka Netherlands, Italy, United Kingdom, Mozambique na Lesotho Ọrụ odeakụkọ ya gara n'ihu na-eto n'oge ọ nọ n'ebe a chụgara ya na Qoopane nwèrè ihe ịga nke ọma karịsịa nà South Afrịka
Ọrụ ndị Qoopane dere gụnyere
Qoopane nwụrụ nà ụbọchị irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba na 2017 mgbe ọ dị afọ 62
A kọrọ na ọ na-arịa ọrịa tupu ọnwụ ya
Qoopane na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé ọrụ nkwukọrịta na ónyé ọrụ metro n'oge ọnwụ ya
Ndị otu Bloemfontein dị iche iche weghaara ebe nrụọrụ weebụ mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta dị iche iche iji kwupụta mwute ha maka ọnwụ Qoopanez
Flightgbọ elu Air France 447 (AF447 ma ọ bụ AFR447[ala-alpha 1]) bụ ụgbọ elu ndị njem mba ofesi ahaziri si Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, gaa Paris, France

Edson Masunda (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 1985),
onye amara aha ya nke ọma dịka Flint Bedrock, bụ onymba Zimbabwewe na -abụ abụ, onye na-ede abụ na onye na-emepụta egwu
Amụrụya naa Seke, Harare Flint kwagara London mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa tupu ya bbbeana Leeds 'aafọ 2005 ebe ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ebere ya site na egwu gụnyere mmekorita nke afọ 2015 ya na Chuckle Brothers n'etiti kpakpando ndị ọzọ dị ka akụkụ nke The Crowd iji nweta ego maka ọkụ n'ámá egwuregwu Bradford City
Flint nwetara nkuzi piano malite mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Ọ gara n'ihu mụọ egwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ mana ọ hụghị ya dị ka ụzọ ọrụ ruo mgbe ọ zutere ụfọdụ ndị egwu mpaghara n'afọ 2009 na Leeds
Bedrock wepụtara otu mpụta mbụ ya bụ 'Dreamer' ṅ'afọ 2011 tupu ewepụtaghachi ya ọzọ n'afọ 2013 n'okpuru akara ndekọ aha ya ọhụrụ na ụlọ ọrụ njikwa ihe nkiri YSBG Entertainment

Otu mpụta mbụ ya bụ 'Dreamer' bụ ihe ịga nke ọma wee butere onyinye nkwekọrịta ndekọ mana Flint abinyeghị aka; kama ọ nọrọ afọ ole na ole sochirinụ imezu nka ya na usoro nke aka ya na ịzụlite azụmahịa egwu ya
Ọ wepụtara nke abụọ ya, 'Enweghị ike iweta m', tinyere vidiyo egwu n' ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 2017 nke wetara ya nkwekọrịta mbipụta na Gamma Music dabere na Russia
Nkwekọrịta ahụ ga-ahụ ka a na-ekesa egwu na Russia na Baltic Steeti gasị, na-egwuri egwu na redio na ọwa egwu TV
Ya na onye omenkà ojii ibe ya na onye na-akwado Donald Trump Joy Villa rụkọrọ ọrụ na egwu nnwereonwe (lụrụ ya ọgụ) n' ọnwa Julaị nke afọ 2019
| 2021 ||'Ịlaghachi n'ụlọ'|| Flint Bedrock
Flocke bu bear nke obodo oyi, nke futárá na uwa na ime mgbachí na nlélé anumanu Nuremberg na 11 Önwa iri na orụ 2007
Na izu uka olé garaga mgbe omúmú ya, hé wefụrụ Flocke nwa anumanu na áká mmá ya mgbe ndi madu chere nche na ndu ya a dígị na mma
Nlélé anumanu mere ilú nke íke na ha na á kpata anumanu áká, ndi ichié si ha gi zifú Flocke na áká ya
