Flomena Cheyech Daniel (amụrụ na Julaị 5, 1982 na West Pokot, Kenya) bụ onye Kenya na-eme egwuregwu nke na-asọ mpi na ọsọ ọsọ ogologo na marathon
O setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma ya nke 2 22 44 na-emeri na 2014 Paris Marathon ma bụrụ onye nwetara ọla edo na 2014 Commonwealth Games
Ọ nọchitere anya Kenya na 1999 IAAF Junior World Cross Country Championships na Dublin, Ireland na 2009 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships
Ọ nọ na Japan n'etiti afọ 2007 na 2010, na-agba ọsọ maka otu ụlọ ọrụ Uniqlo, ọ bụkwa onye mmeri ugboro abụọ nke Japanese Corporate Half Marathon
O nwetakwala mmeri na marathons na Vienna na Toronto
Mbido mba ụwa nke Daniel bịara dị ka onye na-eto eto na 1999 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, ebe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke iri n'otu n'otu ma nyere Kenya aka inweta ọlaọcha
O mechara lekwasị anya n'ogologo ọsọ 10,000 mita wee melite site na 33 223 nkeji na 2004 ruo 33 105 nkeji na 2006
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ gbara ọsọ marathon mbụ ya na Nairobi Marathon wee bụrụ onye nke asaa n'ime awa 2 42 31
N'ịbụ onye Eric Kimaiyo zụrụ na usoro ịgba ọsọ ụlọ ọrụ Japan, o setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma na ụzọ nke 9 1621 nkeji maka mita 3000, 15 5470 nkeji maka mita 5000 na 32 4798 nkeji maka 10,000 m
O mere nke mbụ ya n'elu ọkara marathon na 2008 All-Japan Corporate Half Marathon Championships ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ na Yukiko Akaba na oge nke 69 06 nkeji
Oge ahụ mere ya nke iri na anọ n'ụwa n'afọ ahụ maka anya
Ọ meziwanyere ihe kachasị mma ya na oge egwu ndị Japan na nkeji 15 3883 maka 5000 m na nkeji 31 5850 maka 10,000 m
Ọ laghachiri na Corporate Half Marathon na 2009 ma bụrụ onye mmeri na nkeji 68 44
Mgbe ọ gachara nke asaa na Sapporo Half Marathon, a họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Kenya na 2009 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships, ebe ọ bịara n'ọnọdụ nke asatọ
O nwekwara ihe ịga nke ọma karịa 10,000 m n'afọ ahụ, merie na Hyogo Relays ma bịa nke atọ na Japanese Corporate Track and Field Championships
Daniel meriri n'ọkwa nke abụọ nke ụlọ ọrụ Japan na asọmpi ọkara marathon nke afọ 2010 ma bụrụkwa nke atọ na Sapporo n'afọ ahụ
Ọ hapụrụ oge fọdụrụnụ na 2011 niile mgbe ndị otu ụlọ ọrụ kwụsịrị ya, ọ laghachiri naanị n'etiti afọ 2012
Ọ malitere iguzobe onwe ya na marathon, merie na Porto Alegre na elekere 2 34 13 wee bụrụ onye nke abụọ na Singapore Marathon
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na otu ọzụzụ Gianni DeMadonna na Ịtali
Usoro mmeri n'okporo ụzọ sochiri na 2013
O meriri Roma-Ostia Half Marathon n'ime nkeji 67 39, na-akụ ihe karịrị otu nkeji nke kachasị mma ya ma bụrụ nke itoolu n'ụwa n'afọ ahụ

Vienna Marathon gosipụtara na ọ bụ nnukwu ọganihu maka Daniel ọ gbara ọsọ ahụ n'ime awa 2 24 34 (ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mmelite nkeji iri n'afọ gara aga) wee merie asọmpi ahụ site na ihe fọrọ nke nta hiwere nkeji asaa
Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri doro anya na Toronto Waterfront Marathon n'ọnwa Ọktoba
Nnukwu asọmpi mbụ Daniel nke afọ 2014 bụ Ras Al-Khaimah Half Marathon ma ọ bụ ezie na Priscah Jeptoo meriri ya, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na nkeji 6813
O gosipụtara ikike ya n'elu ogologo oge marathon n'ọnwa Eprel ahụ site na mmeri nke Paris Marathon dị elu na ihe kachasị mma nke 2 22 44 awa nke abụọ Yebrqual Meles nọ na nkeji atọ na ọkara n'azụ ya
A họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Kenya na marathon maka oge mbụ na 2014 Commonwealth Games
N'asọmpi ahụ, ọ bụ onye ndu doro anya n'oge niile ma na nke ikpeazụ ọ hapụrụ onye obodo ya Caroline Kilel iji merie ihe nrite ọla edo nke mbụ n'ọrụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 32
Flora Ogbenyeanu Ogoegbunam Azikiwe (7 August 1917 - 22 August 1983) bụ nwunye mbụ nke Nnamdi Azikiwe, onye isi ala mbụ nke Naijiria
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka nwanyị mbụ nke Naịjirịa site na 1 Ọktoba 1963 ruo 16 Jenụwarị 1966
A mụrụ Flora Ogbenyeanu Ogoegbunam na Onitsha, obodo dị na Anambra Steeti nke oge a na Chief Ogoegboundam, Adazia nke Onitsha (Ndichie Chief) site na Ogboli Agbor Onitsha
Ọ zutere Nnamdi Azikiwe n'ebe ahụ na 1934, ha abụọ lụrụ na 4 Eprel 1936
E mere agbamakwụkwọ ha na Wesley Church James Town, Accra, Gold Coast (Ghana nke oge a) ebe di ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke African Morning Post n'oge ahụ
Azikiwe bụ onye otu Eastern Working Committee nke National Council of Nigeria and the Cameroons (NCNC)
Ọ bụ onye isi mbụ nke Home Science Association (HSA), nke a maara dị ka Federal Home Science Association
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1983, Azikiwe nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na isii
Ya na di ya nwere otu nwa nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke atọ
Flora Guerrero Goff bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, na onye guzobere Guardianes de los Arboles (Ndị na-eche osisi) na Cuernavaca, Mexico

Nwa nwanyị nke onye na-ese ihe bụ Jesus Guerrero Galvan, Guerrero bụ onye na-akwado ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Mexico gụnyere nchedo nke Ọhịa Mmiri, isi iyi mmiri nke Mexico City yana mpaghara obodo ndị na-eyi egwu n'ime obodo Cuernavaca
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise okpukpe ya na-egosipụta na-adịgide adịgide n'ụka dị iche iche, a kpọkwara ya ka ọ wulite ihe ngosi nke otu nwanyị, nke emere October 16, 2009, na Mision del Sol
na Cuernavaca, Morelos na mgbanwe nke nnukwu ego n'aka ndị nwere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Guerrero Goff eduziwo ngagharị iwe megide igbutu osisi site na ụlọ ahịa ọgwụ Farmacias del Ahorro na ebe ịzụ ahịa 'City Market'
Ọ gbara Secretariat of Communications and Transportation (SCT) akwụkwọ n'afọ 2018 maka ileghara ọrụ ogbenye na nke dị ize ndụ nke na Cuernavaca anya
Flore Maltine Ramarozatovo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba Madagascar
Onye otu nzukọ Omeiwu mba Madagascar, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Tiako I Madagasikara; ọ na-anọchite anya mpaghara Soavinandriano
Flora Mutahi bụ onye ndekọ ego Kenya, onye ọchụnta ego na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke otu ndị na- emepụta ihe na Kenya
Ọ bụkwa onye nchoputa na onye isi nchịkwa nke Melvin Marsh International Limited onye na-emepụta Melvin's Tii, akara Kenya
Amụrụ ya na Kenya wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na mpaghara maka agụm akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị
O nwere nzere bachelọ nke Sayensị na Akaụntụ na Ego, enwetara na Mahadum zuru ụwa ọnụ nke United States
O nwekwara Executive Master of Business Administration, nke Mahadum Cape Town na South Africa nyere ya
Ọ bụ Akaụntụati Ọha
Na mbido, Mutahi gbaziri ego n'aka nne ya, ka o wee ruo eru maka mbinye ego ụlọ akụ
O bu ụzọ tinye aka n'ichepụta nnu
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ malitere ịzụ ahịa tii ya
Ọ malitekwara nhazi osikapa na ire ahịa
A maara ya nke ọma maka Melvin Marsh zuru ụwa niile , ụlọ ọrụ ọ tọrọ ntọala na 1995, ebe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka CEO, kemgbe
Flora Mutahi bụ nne mụrụ ụmụ atọ
Na onwa Nọvemba 2017, a họpụtara ya osote onye isi oche nke kansụl azụmahịa nke Common Market of Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA)
Mutahi bụ onye otu ndị isi oche nke Seed Hope, onye Kenya anaghị akwụ ụgwọ na-agbalị ime ka ọnọdụ obibi ndụ nke ndị slum-ebi n'ime obodo Kibera shanty town
Flora Natumanya bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, onye omeiwu na onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka mpaghara Kikuube na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement (NRM)

Natumanya meriri Tophas Kahwa na ntuli aka NRM iji bụrụ onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ NRM na ntuliaka mba nke 2021, ntuli aka ọ meriri iji bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka Kikuube District na Nzukọ nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Ọ na-anọdụ na Kọmitii ndị omeiwu na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na akụrụngwa na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Natumanya jụrụ ajụjụ banyere ihe gọọmentị Uganda ga-eme iji belata ọnụego a na-eji ájá eme ihe na Kọmitii na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na akụrụngwa
Natumanya nyere ndị mmadụ ụgbọala ise ka ha rụọ ọrụ dị ka ụgbọala ndị ọrụ ahụike na Kikuube District
Ọ gwakwara ndị obodo Kikuube District na ọ ga-eji ya na-ebu mmanụ ụgbọala nakwa na ọ ga na-akwụ ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala nke ụgbọala ndị ahụ ụgwọ

Florence Nwanzuruahu Nkiru Nwapa (Ubochi iri na atọ na onwa Jenụwarị na afọ nari iri itoolu iri atọ na otu rue ubochi iri na isii na onwa Ọktoba afọ nari iri itoolu iri itoolu na atọ), bụ onye edemede Naijiria nke a na-akpọ nne nke akwụkwọ edemede Afrịka nke oge a
Ọ bụ onye bu ụzọ n'ọgbọ nke ụmụ nwanyị Africa na-ede akwụkwọ, na nwanyị Africa mbụ na-ede akụkọ a ga-ebipụta n'asụsụ Bekee na Britain
O nwetara nkwado mba ụwa na akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya bụ Efuru, nke Heinemann Educational Books bipụtara na nari iri itoolu nari isii na isii
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ dịghị mgbe ọ na-ewere onwe ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, a maara ya nke ọma maka ime ka ndụ na ọdịnala dịghachi ọhụrụ site n'echiche nwanyị Igbo
O bipụtara akwụkwọ ndị Afrịka ma kwalite ụmụ nwanyị n'etiti ndị Afrịka
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Africa mbụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ mgbe o guzobere Tana Press na Naịjirịa na 1970
Nwapa tinyere aka n'ọrụ gọọmentị na iwughachi mgbe Agha Biafra gasịrị; ọkachasị, ya na ụmụ mgbei na ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na-arụ ọrụ n'oge agha ahụ
Dame Flora Louise Shaw, Lady Lugard Àtụ Postnominals (born 19 December 1852 – 25 January 1929), wu onye shi British
Flora Suya bụ onye Malawi na-eme ihe nkiri
A họpụtara ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na 6th na 9th Africa Movie Academy Awards
Ya na Tapiwa Gwaza, Suya rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na Seasons of a Life (2010), nke na-akọ akụkọ banyere ihe isi ike nke nwa agbọghọ Africa nke onye isi ya dinara n'ụzọ mmekọahụ, onye wee jụ ya ilekọta nwa ya
O nwetara Africa Movie Academy Award maka Best Actress in a Leading Role maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ

N'afọ 2013, ọ pụtara na Shemu Joyah, Last Fishing Boat, ebe ọ bụ mmasị ịhụnanya nke onye njem nleta na nwunye nke nwoke nwere ọtụtụ nwanyị, ọrụ ahụ mere ka a họpụta ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na AMAA awards
N'afọ 2014, a kọrọ na ọ ga-apụta na ihe nkiri Zambia, Chenda, nke na-akọ akụkọ banyere nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị na-amaghị nwoke na-agafe na mmeghachi omume ọjọọ nke ụmụ nwoke Afrịka n'ọnọdụ ahụ
Emere ihe nkiri ahụ na sinima n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014, wee wepụta ya n'afọ 2015
N'afọ 2016, a mara ọkwa ihe nkiri ya, My Mothers Story dịka otu n'ime ihe nkiri mmeghe na Silicon Valley African Film Festival na United States
N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ na-eme Tadala, nne na-alụbeghị di na ọnọdụ okike na ọdịbendị Afrịka
Flora Ugwunwa (amụrụ na 26 June 1984) bụ onye Naịjịrịa na-eme egwuregwu Paralympic na-asọ mpi na ihe omume F54
Ọ nọchitere anya Naịjịria na 2016 Summer Paralympics nke emere na Rio de Janeiro, Brazil ma merie nrite ọla edo na ihe omume F54 nke ụmụ nwanyị
O setịpụkwara ihe ndekọ ụwa ọhụrụ nke 2025m na ihe omume a

Ọ nọchitere anya Naịjịrịa na 2020 Summer Paralympics na Tokyo, Japan mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ihe nrite ọlaọcha na ihe omume F54 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2019 World Para Athletics Championships nke emere na Dubai, United Arab Emirates O mekwara asọmpi na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị F54 ebe ọ gwụchara na nke isii
Àtụ Infobox football biographyFlorence Kikelomo Ajayi bụ onye na - agbachitere Naịjirịa eguregwu bọọlụ, na-agbakwa bọọlụ ugbu a na Dínamo Guadalajara na ngalaba nke abụọ nke Spanish
Ajayi bidoro ọrụ ya na Nigerian Championship maka Koko Queens, Rivers Angels, Jagede Babes na Pelican Stars
Mgbe ọ gbachara 1999 World Cup ọ bịanyere aka na 1FFC Niederkirchen na German Bundesliga, ebe ọ nọrọ oge abụọ
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa, ọ gbara bọọlụ maka ndị uwe ojii na Bayelsa Queen ruo n’afọ 2008 mgbe ọ kwagara na Tianjin Teda nke Chinese Super Leaguena otu ndị Super League

Na 2010, ọ laghachiri na European leagues mgbe otu afọ gachara, nọrọkwa na-egwuri egwu na-aga nke ọma maka Krka Novo Mesto na Slovenia, Pogoń Szczecin na Poland na Dínamo Guadalajara na ọkwa nke Spanish abụọ
Dika otu onye n'ime ndi Nigerian national team, onwetara mmeri ise na African Championship site n’agbata 1998 na 2006, ma sorokwa na 1999 na 2003 World Cups na 2000 na 2008 Summer Olympics
Ọ jere ozi dị ka onyeisi ndị otu egwuregwu umunwanyị nke Nigeria
Florence Alice Lubega (5 Nọvemba na afo 1917 - 28 Ọktoba na afo 2021) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na nwanyị mbụ si Uganda sonyeere ndị omeiwu na Uganda nwere onwe ya na Mee na afo 1962
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu nwanyị mbụ nke Uganda, ebe ọ bụ onye otu Kansụl Iwu (LEGCO)
Ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị omeiwu mbụ nke Uganda, na osote minista na-ahụ maka mmepe obodo na ọrụ
Florence Lubega bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye isi ala Buganda Samuel Wamala na Erina Nantongo
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Gayaza Girls' School tupu ọ banye Buloba Teachers' College
O mechara bụrụ nwanyị mbụ a nabatara na Makerere College School tupu ọ banye na Mahadum Oxford
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum na afo 1946, ọ laghachiri ịkụzi Bekee na Mahadum Makerere

Florence Lubega lụrụ Saulo Lubega, onye nkuzi na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Mityana na onye bụbu minista na-ahụ maka ego n'ọchịchị Buganda Florence Lubega nwụrụ karịa ụmụ ya ma nwee ụmụnne anọ; onye nwụrụ anwụ Israel Magembe Wamala [onye na-agụ egwú] nke Nakasajja na Kyaggwe, Wamala Steven Ssempasa, onye bi na United Kingdom, Paul Musoke Wamala, onye bụbu onye na-ahụ Maka njem nleta nke bi ugbu a na Luzira, mpaghara Kampala na onye nwụrụ anwụ Wamala Herbert Dagirira
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2021, otu izu tupu afọ 104
A mụrụ Florence Ayisi na Kumba na Cameroon na 1962 (ọ bụ ezie na a kpọtụrụkwa 1964 aha)
Ọ bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
O meriri UK Film Council Breakthrough Brits Award maka Film Talent na 2008
Kemgbe afọ 2000 ọ na-akụzi ihe nkiri na Mahadum nke South Wales
Ayisi guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe a kpọrọ Iris Films na 2005
N'afọ 2007, a nabatara ya site na nzukọ ya na eze nwanyị maka njikọ ọrụ ya na mba Commonwealth
Marsha Meskimmon na Dorothy C

Rowe dere na 'ihe osise dị iche iche nke Ayisi banyere ndụ ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka nke oge a jụrụ echiche dị mfe ma na-atụ aro na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwoke na nwanyị n'ụwa ụwa nwere ike ọ gaghị ekewa n'ụzọ dị mfe n'usoro nke mba, 'East' na 'West', ma ọ bụ 'mepụtara' na 化-emepe'

N'otu edemede nke afọ 2012 Olivier Jean TchOuaffé kwuru 'Kim Longinotto na Florence Ayisi, na ihe nkiri ha Sister-in-Law, pụtara ìhè maka ihe ọhụrụ ha ji gosipụta onye ọka ikpe n'ime ọnọdụ enweghị nchebe, ka ha na-egosipụta ụmụ nwanyị abụọ siri ike dị ka ihu nke nchekwa na nkwụsi ike ikpe' p196
Nnyocha ọzọ kọwara ihe nkiri ahụ dị ka 'ihe nkiri a rụrụ nke ọma, nke lekwasịrị anya nke na-ekwu ihe banyere obere akụkụ nke ọdịbendị ọzọ na ndị na-akpụzi ya'
Nnyocha na Black Camera kọwara Sisters in law dị ka 'ihe nkiri nke na-eme ka ahụmịhe zuru ụwa ọnụ ghara itinye ya'
Florence Dadson (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1992) bụ nwanyị Ghana na-agba bọọlụ, onye na-agbachitere ndị Gulf Coast Texans na United States ugbu a
Dadson malitere ọrụ ya na Academy of Christ the King wee sonye na Ghatel Ladies Cape Coast mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ
Ọ hapụrụ ala nna ya, Ghana, na Septemba 2011 mgbe ọ natara nnabata na Mahadum Robert Morris na Illinois iji gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Business Administration
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka RMU n'akụkụ ndị otu Ghana Olivia Amoako na Linda Eshun
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Robert Morris n'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2014, ọ sonyeere klọb W-League Gulf Coast Texans
Dadson gbara bọọlụ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu ma nọchite anya mba ya na ọkwa U-17 na U-20
Dadson gbara bọọlụ maka Ghana na 2008 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup na 2012 FIFA U-20 Women'sWorld Cup
Ọ na-eguzo n'òtù ndị Black Queens
Dadson lụrụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa David Accam na 3 Jenụwarị 2019 na Cape Coast, Ghana

FFlorence Agnes Dillsworth (1937-2000), bụ onye nkuzi Sierra Leone nke jere ozi dị ka onye isi nke St
Joseph's Convent School ma bụrụ onye isi obodo nke atọ nke Freetown, Sierra Leone
A mụrụ Florence Agnes Dillsworth n'aka nne na nna Sierra Leone Creole, Wilmot Aloysius Dillsoworth (1908-1985), onye odeakwụkwọ obodo Freetown, na Jeanne Dillsworth, nke a mụrụ Peacourt
Florence Dillsworth gara St
Joseph's Convent School na Freetown, Sierra Leone ma mesịa gụọ akwụkwọ na England
A họpụtara Florence Dillsworth dị ka nwanyị nke atọ bụ onyeisi obodo Freetown na Freetown City Council
Dillsworth nwụrụ na afọ pụkụ abụọ na Freetown, Sierra Leone, ma lie ya na Ascension Town Cemetery
Florence Ekpo-Umoh (amụrụ na 27 Disemba 1977 na Lagos) bụ onye Naijirịa-German na-agba ọsọ, onye ọkachamara na 400 m
A kwụsịtụrụ ya na asọmpi ruo afọ abụọ maka ịṅụ ọgwụ ọjọọ
Ekpo-Umoh meriri mba a mụrụ ya Naijirịa na 1994 World Junior Championships
Ọ gbagara Germany na 1995 n'oge ogige ọzụzụ n'ebe ahụ, lụrụ onye na-enye ya ọzụzụ German na 1998 wee nweta nwa amaala Germany na 2000
Kemgbe afọ 1998, ọ nọchitere anya klọb egwuregwu USC Mainz
N'afọ 2003, a chọpụtara na ikpe mara Ekpo-Umoh maka doping stanozolol
E nyere ihe nnwale ahụ na 24 Jenụwarị 2003 na ule na-abụghị asọmpi na South Africa
A kwụsịtụrụ ya n'egwuregwu ahụ ruo n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2005
Oge kachasị mma ya bụ 5113 sekọnd, nke o nwetara na June 2001 na Stuttgart
Àtụ Footer European Champions 4x400 m Women
-ịFlorence Nightingale Harrison Bell (8 Ọktoba 1865 - Septemba 1948) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Britain
A mụrụ ya na Newcastle-upon-Tyne na 8 Ọktoba 1865 dị ka Florence Tait
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị Isabella Tait
Na baptizim ya na 17 Disemba na St
Andrew Newcastle, edere ya dị ka Florence Harrison, edere nna ya dị ka Thomas Latham Harrison (nwoke)
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ nakweere aha Florence Latham Harrison
Nna ya, onye na-agba chaa chaa na Newcastle, nwụrụ mgbe Florence dị afọ abụọ
Ya na nne ya biri obere oge na Scotland wee laghachi na North East England mgbe nne ya Isabella lụrụ Thomas Hedley Thompson, onye na-etinye injin, na Gateshead Register Office na 30 Ọktoba 1878
Site n'oge ahụ, Florence na nne ya na nna nna ya biri na Gateshead na Newcastle
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-esi nri tupu ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na Armstrong College wee ghọọ onye nkuzi
N'oge ụfọdụ, ọ nabatara aha Florence Nightingale Harrison
N'okpuru aha ahụ na 1896, ọ lụrụ Joseph Nicholas Bell, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke National Amalgamated Union of Labour
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Independent Labour Party (ILP), ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ jere ozi na National Administrative Council (NAC)
N'afọ 1898, Emmeline Pankhurst nọchiri ya na NAC
Site na ILP, ọ malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na Kọmitii Na-anọchite anya Ọrụ (LRC), ọ bụkwa odeakwụkwọ mbụ nke Newcastle LRC
Na 1902, Bell ghọrọ onye nduzi nke Newcastle Co-operative Society
Ka ọ na-erule 1907, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi maka Women's Trade Union League
Ọ nọkwa na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ngagharị ịtụ vootu, holdin Societies wee jee ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke mmekọ obodo ya, Òtù North East maka ịhọpụta ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 1909, ọ kwụsịrị n'ọkwá ahụ, n'afọ sokwa ya, ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ nke alaka ụlọ ọrụ nke Women's Labour League
A họpụtara Bell ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Women's Labour League na 1913
N'afọ 1918, a họpụtara ya na Kọmitii Nchịkwa Mba nke Labour Party dị ka akụkụ nke league slate
Ọ tụfuru oche ya n'afọ sochirinụ, mana ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọzọ n'ime afọ iri
am na di ya kwagara North Finchley ka ha nwere olileanya na ọ ga-abụ MP
A họpụtara di ya dị ka onye omeiwu maka Newcastle na 1922 mana ọ nwụrụ n'ime otu ọnwa a họpụtara ya
Akwụkwọ akụkọ obodo ahụ kwuru na a maara ya dị ka di Florence Bell ma kwuo na Bell ga-emeri n'ụzọ doro anya ma ọ bụrụ na ọ kwụ maka ntuli aka
O guzoghị
Ọ nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Labour Party, ma guzo na Luton na ntuli aka UK nke 1929, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke atọ na 165% nke votu
Ọ nwụrụ, dị afọ 83, na 8 Septemba 1948
N’ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, Newcastle City Council wuru ihe ncheta n’ụlọ dị na Hotspur Street, ebe ya na di ya biri ihe dị ka afọ iri abụọna-agụ 'Florence Nightingale Harrison Bell (1865-1948)
Socialist, suffragist, onye na-adịghị agwụ agwụ maka nlekọta ahụike, ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
Onye odeakwụkwọ Federal Federal nke Independent Labour PartyBiri ebe a 1901-1920' Naanị ihe ncheta nke abụọ nye otu nwanyị na Newcastle (nke mbụ bụ Dr
Ethel Williams)
Florence Ita Giwa (onye amụrụ na ụbọchi iri na-itolu na ọnwa nke abụọ na-afọ 1946) aghọrọ ya dika onye ome-iwu na-anọchi anya gburu-gburu Cross River South Cross River State, Nigeria
na mbido Republik nke anọ na Naijiria, ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchichi All People's Party (APP) Ọnọrọ na-oche malite na ọnwa nke ise na-afọ 1999 ruo na ọnwa nke ise na-afọ 2003

Amụrụ Ita-Giwa na-ụbọchi iri na-itolu,ọnwa nke abụọ na-afọ 1946 na obodo Atabong, Bakassi LGA na steeti Cross River, ọ gụrụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Kilburn Polytechnic nke di na London, United Kingdom ọ bụrụ onye nọọsụ, mecha bụrụ onye nnọchite anya ụlọ ọrụ Beecham pharmaceutical, wee banye-kwa na Standall Pharmaceutical ebe ọnọchitere anya steeti Lagos Ọ lụrụ Dele Giwa, onye nhazi akwụkwọ nke Newswatch magazin Ha lụrụ nani ọnwa iri, tupu Dele Giwa alụọ Olufunmi Olaniyan, onye lụrụ ya ruo mgbe ọnwụrụ 1986
Ita-Giwa tinyere aka na ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchichi wee pụta dika onye isi-oche NRC na steeti Delta

Mgbe emesiri, a hoputara ya dika onye otu gọọmentị etiti malite na-afọ 1992 ruo na 1993, ọ so na commitee na-ahụ maka nkpochapụ nke mgbakọ na- eme ihe ike malite na afọ 1994-95 Ọ malitere itinye aka na ihe omume Bakassi, ebe oritere aha 'Mama Bakassi' Ahọpụtara Ita-Giwa dika onye ọka-iwu na anọchite anya gburu gburu Cross River South na ọnwa April na afọ 1999 ahọpụtakwara ya dika na commitee na- ahụ maka iwu na usoro,gburu gburu ebe obibi,ihe mba-ọzọ, ụmụ-nwanyi, and was appointed to committees on Rules and Procedures, Environment, Foreign Affairs, Women, Niger Delta, ọgwụ na akwara

Mgbe ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ome-iwu na afọ 2003, o sonyere ndi otu ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchichi People's Democratic Party PDP, wee bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo na ihe gbasara ụlọ ome-iwu Na ọnwa ise na afọ 2010 enwere ashịrị na ego furu na akaụntụ kọmitti na-ahụ maka nhazi Bakassi,nke Ita-Giwa dika onye isi, jụrụ ndi Economic and Financial Crimes Commission ka ha nyochaa okwu ahụ
Florence Iweta (amụrụ (1983-03-29 ) ) bụ onye Naijiria bụbu onye gbachitere egwuregwu bọọlụ bụụrụ otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa
Ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi olimpik nke afọ 2000
Àtụ Nigeria squad 1999 FIFA Women's World Cup
Florence Masebe (a mụrụ n'abalị 14 ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1972) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, nke a maara n'ógbè ahụ maka ọrụ ya na usoro Muvhango
O meriri Africa Movie Academy Award maka Best Actress in a Leading Role na 9th Africa Movie Academy Awards
Florence Nakiwala Kiyingi (née Florence Nakiwal), bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ Minista nke steeti maka ndị ntorobịa na ụmụaka na Cabinet nke Uganda ugbu a
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 6 June 2016
Ọ bụkwa osote onye isi oche nke atọ nke Federation of Uganda Football Associations, nwanyị mbụ nwere ọkwa ahụ na Uganda
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka Onye isi oche nke ndị Minista Ndị Ntorobịa Commonwealth Task force vootu maka ọkwa ahụ na 2017
A mụrụ Florence Nakiwala na 1972, na Kimanya, Masaka District, nye Charles Ssonko na Perepetwa Najjuma, dị ka nwa nke asatọ n'ime ụmụ ha iri na abụọ
Nna ya bụ onye isi obodo nke Buddu n'oge ahụ
Ọ gara Kimanya Primary School tupu a nabata ya na Trinity College Nabbingo maka agụmakwụkwọ O-Level na A-Level
Mgbe ọ nọ na Nabbingo, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Commerce
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, a họpụtara ya na kọmitii nduzi nke Nkoba Za Mbogo, nzukọ ụmụ akwụkwọ Baganda na Mahadum Makerere
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ndú nke ụmụ akwụkwọ azụmahịa na ọmụmụ ya
N'afọ mbụ ya na Makerere, ọ zutere ma mesịa hụ di ya, Deogratius Kiyingi, onye omeiwu maka Bukomansimbi South Constituency na 10th Parliament (2016 - 2021)
Dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, ka ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara njem gaa London wee hụ otú ụlọ ọrụ ahụike na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma
Nke a mere ka ọ nwee ọchịchọ siri ike inwe ụlọ ọrụ ahụike na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma mgbe ọ tolitere
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Makerere, o guzobere Lisa Medical Centre, usoro ụlọ ọgwụ na ụlọ ọgwụ na-anọ obere oge na Uganda, nwere alaka na Nairobi, Kenya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ndị ntorobịa na alaeze Buganda, ruo afọ ise
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Njem na alaeze ahụ, ọrụ ọ rụrụ ruo June 2016
N'oge ntuli aka mba nke afọ 2016, Florence Nakwala sonyere n'ọkwa onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị Kampala na ụlọ omebe iwu nke iri (2016 - 2021)
Ọ gbara ọsọ na Democratic Party ticked
Ọ meriri onye nọ n'ọkwa, Nabilah Naggayi Sempala nke Forum for Democratic Change
N'ụzọ a na-atụghị anya ya, Onye isi ala Yoweri Museveni họpụtara Nakiwala ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Mba maka Ndị Ntorobịa na Ụmụaka, na 6 June 2016
Florence Nakiwala Kiyingi lụrụ Dogratius Kiyingi kemgbe afọ otu puku narị itoolu na itoolu na asatọ

Ha bụ nne na nna nwere ụmụ ise, ụmụ nwoke atọ na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Site na 6 June 2016, a họpụtara ya dịka onyeisi oche nke Express FC, onye otu Uganda Super League
Florence Namayanja (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1960) bụ nwanyị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan bụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti nke Bukoto County East, Masaka District
Ọ nọ n'òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Democratic Party ma ugbu a ọ nọ na National Unity Platform
Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri na otu, ọ guzoro dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi oche LC5 maka Masaka City n'okpuru National Unity Platform ọ bụ ezie na ọ meriri na ntuli aka ahụ
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke oche onye isi obodo Masaka mgbe o meriri mmadụ asaa gụnyere onye ọchụnta ego, Emmanuel Lwasa na vootu 28,824
A mụrụ Namayanja na John Kisomose Mukasa na Pirajiya Namatove nwụrụ anwụ ma ọ bụ nke ise a mụrụ n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ asatọ
N'afọ 1978, ọ nwetara asambodo agụmakwụkwọ Uganda ya na Masaka SSS
ma mgbe ọ sonyeere Makerere Day na Evening Classes for Adults maka asambodo agụmụbe Uganda Advanced ya ma mechaa ya n'afọ 2003
O nwere asambodo na Human Resource Management na Gọọmentị Obodo (2004) na asambodo na Leadership na Management (2005) site na Uganda Management Institute
N'afọ 2007, ọ sonyeere Mahadum Makerere maka nzere bachelọ ya na Industrial and Organizational Psychology
N'otu afọ ahụ (2007), e nyere ya asambodo na Building Communities of Character site na Character Training Institute, Oklahoma
Ọ bụ onye nchịkwa na National Water and SewCorp (1981-1994)
O mechara were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye otu Council na Mulago School of Nursing (2008-2009) na Kyambogo University Council (2006-2011)
N'otu afọ ahụ (2006-2011), ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu Board na National Water & Sewerage Corporation
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ LC5 (2001-2006) na osote onye isi obodo Kampala City (2006-2011)
Site n'afọ 2011 ruo n'afọ 2016, ọ bụ onye omeiwu nke Uganda na omeiwu nke Ukraine na nke itoolu na nke iri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọzọ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda na Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ihe onwunwe, na Kọmiti na Kọmisi, Ndị Ọchịchị Steeti na Ụlọ Ọrụ Steeti
Ọ gbara alụkwaghịm
Ihe ntụrụndụ ya bụ ịchọpụta ihe ọhụrụ, na ime ndị enyi ọhụrụ
Ọ bụ onye Rotarian na onye ndú ụmụ nwanyị (Onye isi nke DP Women League)
E jidere Florence Namayanja na Dr Abed Bwanika, onye National Unity Platform- NUP na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala n'oge ngagharị iwe ndị sochiri njide Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu

E jidere ha na Evan K Gameu, onye na-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu nke Bukoto East NUP na Juliet Kakande Nakabuye, onye na na-azọrọ ọkwa onye omebe iwu nke Masaka ma boo ha ebubo ịkpali ime ihe ike na ime ihe nwere ike ịgbasa ọrịa na-efe efe, n'okpuru ngalaba 171 nke Iwu Iwu Iwu
E mechara tọhapụ ha na mgbapụta
Florence Nambozo Wamala (amụrụ na 14 Febụwarị 1975) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara ya dị ka nwanyị onye omeiwu iji nọchite anya mpaghara Sironko na ntuli aka 2016 Uganda ma họpụta ya ọzọ maka otu ọkwa ahụ na ntuliaka 2021 Uganda

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na 1989 na Nkoyoyo Boarding Primary School, Matale, N'afọ 1992, Florence gụsịrị akwụkwọ Uganda Certificate of Education (UCE) maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị dị ala na Nabumali High School
Ọ gụsịrị ọkwa sekọndrị dị elu nke a maara dị ka Uganda Advanced Certification of Education (UACE) na 2008 na Makerere Day na Evening Adult School na Kampala
N'afọ 2012 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Kyambogo na nzere bachelọ nke Arts na Education
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Sironko Development Network, ọkwá ọ na-enwe kemgbe afọ 2014

Ọ kụziri na Aga Khan Education Services na Uganda site na 2002 ruo 2011 wee bụrụ onye otu ndị omeiwu na ntuli aka n'ozuzu nke afọ 2016, ọkwá ọ nwetara ọzọ site na ntuliaka n'ofe nke Uganda nke afọ 2021
Florence Andiru Nebanda, onye a maara dị ka Florence Nebanda, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye omeiwu Uganda
Ọ bụ nwanyị omebe iwu, na-anọchite anya Butaleja District na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na Febụwarị 2013, na-anọchi nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere, Cerinah Nebanda, onye nwụrụ n'ọchịchị na Disemba 2012
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ezinụlọ ụmụ asatọ (otu nwa nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị asaa) a mụrụ ya na Entebbe, na 9 Ọktoba 1986 nye Peter Waiga na Alice Namulwa
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Ugandan ruo mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na UACE ya na Katikamu SDA Secondary School na Wobulenzi, Luwero district na 2013
Ọ kwagara United Kingdom iji gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ laghachiri Uganda mgbe nwanne ya nwanyị Cerinah Nebanda nwụrụ na Disemba 2012
A kọrọ na o nwere BA na Human Resources Management nke e nwetara na Mahadum nke East London na 2008 na MA na International Human Resources management, na Mahaduma Bedfordshire na United Kingdom
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2012, Cerinah Nebanda, onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu maka Butaleja Women's Constituency nwụrụ na mberede, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ebe tọgbọrọ n'efu
Na ntuli aka iji mejupụta oche ya, nwanne ya nwanyị nke okenye, Florence Andiru Nebanda meriri na tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke National Resistance Movement
Ọ ga-eje ozi fọdụrụ n'oge ahụ ruo mgbe ntuli aka nke Machị 2016
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Kọmitii na-ahụ maka mmefu ego na ihe gbasara onye isi ala
Nebanda hụrụ netball n'anya dị ka otu n'ime ihe ntụrụndụ ya, ọ bụ akụkụ nke asọmpi Netball nke ndị omeiwu mgbe ọ nọ na 9th parliament
Ọ na-agụkwa akwụkwọ akụkọ na Bible
Florence Oboshie Sai Cofie ma ọ bụ Oboshie sai Cofie (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 6 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1953), bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana na onye isi mgbasa ozi
Ọkachamara na nkwukọrịta nke nwere ihe karịrị afọ 20 na ọchịchị, mmekọrịta mba na mba na mmekọrịta mba ụwa, mmekọrịta mgbasa ozi na nkwado ahụike ọmụmụ
Ọ bụ osote onyeisi ndị ọrụ na nchịkwa Kufuor ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka osote minista
N'oge nke abụọ nke Onye isi ala John Kufuor ọ bụ osote minista na Ministry of Information site na afo 2006 ruo 31 Julaị na afọ 2007
Malite na 1 Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2007, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye onye isi ala Kufuor họpụtara dị ka Minista nke Ozi na National Orientation, na-anọchi Kwamina Bartels

O mechara bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka njem nleta na mmekọrịta ndị mba ọzọ, Sai Cofie bụkwa onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu Ghana Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nke Onye isi ala Akufo-Addo na mgbasa ozi na nkwukọrịta
A mụrụ Oboshie Sai Cofie na 6 Eprel, na afọ 1953 na Accra n'aka Fred T

Sai, onye Ghana agụmakwụkwọ na dọkịta ahụike ezinụlọ nke so guzobe Planned Parenthood Association of Ghana na 1967, na Florence Aleeno Sai (née Dzani) Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ isii Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Ridge Church School na Accra wee gaa n'ihu na Aburi Girls' Secondary School iji mụọ O-Levels (1964-1969) wee kwaga Achimota School maka A-Level ya (1969-1971) O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Sociology na Mahadum Ghana, Legon n'afọ 1974
Sai Cofie malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-enyere onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ghana aka
Site na Nọvemba 1975 ruo Juun, na afọ 1978 ọ bụ onye nchịkwa maka VEC Transport & Company Limited, nke dị na Tema Ghana

N'afọ 1979, Sai Cofie kwagara na United States wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na Afam Concept Chicago dị ka onye nduzi ahịa na ahịa mpaghara N'afọ 1989, Sai Cofie laghachiri Ghana ma tinye aka n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ a ma ama a na-akpọ Osibix Confections
O guzobere Mediatouch Productions na afọ 1992, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na mmepụta
Ụlọ ọrụ ya mepụtara ọdịnaya ma mepụta ntinye aka Ghana mbụ na ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a Talk Show, otu n'ime ha, Straight Talk, nwere Sai Cofie dị ka onye na-egosi ihe ngosi ahụ

N'etiti Septemba, na afọ 1996 na Disemba, na afọ 2000 Sai Cofie bụkwa onye nnọchi anya Africa maka European Market Research Centre, ebe ọ na-eme nyocha ahịa ma nye isi ụlọ ọrụ dị na Brussels ndụmọdụ banyere ọnọdụ ahịa Afrịka
Mgbe John Agyekum Kufuor meriri na ntuli aka nke Disemba, na afọ 2000, n'etiti afọ 2001 na 2004, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'Ọfịs Onye isi ala, dị ka onye enyemaka pụrụ iche nye Onye isi ala
E buliri Sai Cofie ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi ndị ọrụ n'afọ 2004

Mgbe a gbanwere ya n'ọfịs onye isi ala n'afọ 2006, a kpọpụrụ ya n'ụlọ ọrụ onye isi ala ka ọ bụrụ osote Minista na-ahụ maka ozi na National Orientation na-anọchi Shirley Ayorkor Botchwey onye e zigara na Minista na mba ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ onye osote minista A kwalitere Sai Cofie ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ozi na Julaị, na afọ 2007
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2008, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka njem nleta na mmekọrịta ndị mba ọzọ na Stephen Asamoah Boateng onye weghaara dịka Mịnịsta nke ozi na National Orientation
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara Madam Oboshie Sai Cofie ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Ghana Airports Company Limited ma ọ nọrọ n'ọkwa a ruo n'afọ 2021

N'oge nke abụọ ya, Onye isi ala Akufo-Addo họpụtara Sai Cofie dị ka onye ndụmọdụ onye isi ala ya na mgbasa ozi na nkwukọrịta atụmatụ, ọnọdụ nke ọ na-emepe ma na-etinye usoro nkwukọrịta maka gọọmentị, ma na-enye nlekọta na nhazi maka ngalaba nkwukọrịta gọọmentị niile

Sai Cofie lụrụ onye nwụrụ anwụ Wellington Komla Cofie, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Wosela na Kameoli Cofie Sai Cofie nwere ụmụ ụmụ anọ, Senyo, Seyram, Evam na Ava Oboshie Mmasị ya gụnyere ịgụ, ide, nkwado ahụike ọmụmụ, na nkwado maka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
Onye isi ala Kufuor nyere Sai Cofie Order of the Volta na 3 Julaị 2008
Florence Okoe (amụrụ ya na 12 na ọnwa Nọvemba na afọ 1984) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na 2003 FIFA Women's World Cup na 2007 FIFA Women'S World Cup
Na klọb ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Ghatel Ladies na Ghana
Florence Omagbemi (amuru na ubochi nke abụọ na ọnwa Febrụwarị 1975) bu onye Naijiria ama ama n'egwuregwu bọọlụ
Ọ so na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa gafee asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke FIFA anọ, ọtụtụ iko mba Africa na asọmpi olimpik nke afọ 2000
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya onye nchịkwa nwa oge nke otu mba, ebe ọ bụbu osote onye nkuzi n'otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na-erubeghị afọ 20

Omagbemi gbara otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa ihe karịrị afọ iri, ọ pụtara n'asọmpị iko mba ụwa nke anọ nke FIFA gụnyere ịbụ onye so na otu ndị rutere agba nke abụọ n'afọ 1999 tupu ha emerie Brazil
Dị ka onye isi, o jiri ndị Super Falcons merie asọmpi iko mba Afrịka ugboro anọ na 1998, 2000, 2002 na 2004
Ọ sokwa na ndị otu Naijiria bụ ndị gbara asọmpi Summer Olympic nke mbụ n'asọmpi 2000 na Australia
Omagbemi malitere ọrụ nkuzi egwuregwu boolu ya na ọtụtụ otu ndị ntorobịa nọ na America, tupu akpọọ ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye nkuzi maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na-erubeghị afọ iri abụọ
Mgbe ha nọ n'ọnọdụ ahụ, ndị otu ahụ ruru ọkara ikpeazụ nke 2012 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup tupu United States ewepụ ya
Akpọrọ Omagbemi ka ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi nwa oge nke otu nnukwu mba maka asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke 2016
Naijiria enwebeghị onye nchịkwa kamgbe a chụrụ Christopher Danjuma n'ọrụ n'ihi adịghị mma otu a na- eme n'egwuregwu Africa 2015
Otu ọnwa tupu asọmpi a ebido, ekpughere na akwughi Omagbemi ụgwọ ya n'aka ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa
Na nzaghachi, NFF kwere nkwa na a ga-akwụ ya ụgwọ tupu ndị otu a pụọ maka asọmpi a
Na ubochi atọ nke Disemba 2016 Florence Omagbemi ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ meriri iko mba Afrịka dịka onye ọkpụkpọ na onye nchịkwa
Dị ka onye ọgba boolu
Dị ka onye nchịkwa
Florence Ozor (a mụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria n'azọ maka oke ụmụ nwany Naijiria,onye na-azụ ahịa, na otu onye nke ndị otu atụmatụ Bring Back Our Girls
A kpọrọ ya 'resolute feminist'
A mụrụ Florence Ozor n'afọ 1980, na Legọs,nke Naijiria, nwa nke etiti na ezinụlọ nke ụmụ nwanyị ise
Ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na mmekọrịta mba ụwa, yana ọmụmụ banyere ọchịchị na Legọs, Harvard na Singapore
Ozor rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba eyimeyi, nrụpụta, mgbasa ozi na mmekọrịta ọhaneze, ma banye na nkwukọrịta ụlọ ọrụ yana mmekọrịta gọọmentị n'ihe dịka afọ 2010

N’afọ 2014, Ozor nọrọ ọtụtụ izu na Washington, DC, dịka otu n’ime ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ na atọ n’ime mmemme Global Women Mentoring nke <a href='https //enwikipediaorg/wiki/US_State_Department' rel='mw ExtLink' title='US
State Department' class='mw-redirect cx-link' data-linkid='35'>US
State Department
Dịka akụkụ nke a, ọ gara njem nleta na Colorado steeti dị n'Amerịka , were kọwapụta ọnọdụ ụmụ agbọghọ na-efu efu, na-ekwu na ụwa nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke ichezọ ha

N'afọ 2014, Ozor gara 2014 Women Leadership Retreat na Entusi Resort na Retreat Center dị na Uganda, ebe o mere ka ndị niile bịara ya see foto n’azụ ọkọlọtọ ‘Bring Back Our Girls’ ma gwa Newsweek banyere ya

Ozor bụ otu n’ime mmadụ abụọ binyere aka na mgbasa ozi ‘Bring Back Our Girls’ nke ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2017, Mr President, time to act is now, ya na Oby Ezekwesili, na-ekwu na ọ bụ ụbọchị 1,277, ma na 113 n’ime ụmụada ahụ ka nọ n’agha
O guzobela Florence Ozor Foundation, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị, nke na-abụghị maka uru na-elekwasị anya na ọchịchịi na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ ntakịrị nwanyị na Naijiria

Ozor bụ onye kwuru okwu n'ọgbakọ nke 'Political Empowerment of Women in Africa and in Europe' na Brussels na Septemba afọ 2017, nke Global Progressive Forum na PES Women haziri dị ka akụkụ nke 2017 Africa Week
Florence Seriki MFR (Ọgọst 16, 1963 - 3 Maachị 2017) bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Omatek Ventures Plc
, ụlọ ọrụ ICT mbụ nke Naijiria na Africa iji kpokọta ma rụpụta kọmpụta na akụkụ kọmputa dị ka okwu kọmputa, ọkà okwu, kiiboodu, òké
A mụrụ Seriki na Lagos mana o si Delta State
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Reagan Memorial Baptist Secondary School, Sabo, Yaba n'etiti 1975 na 1980 wee gaa na Federal School of Science, Lagos maka ọkwa A
Ọ gụchara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na mahadum Ife (nke bụzi Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife )
Na 1993, n'oge ngosi CTO (nke ngalaba azụmahịa nke American Embassy na Nigeria haziri), Seriki wepụtara Omatek brand of Computers nke bụ n'ezie mbọ mbụ ụdịrị ya na Nigeria

N'afọ 2003, ọ ghọrọ onye Afrịka mbụ mepụtara akpa kọmputa, igwe okwu, bọọdụ na mouse nke si na completely knocked down(CKD) ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepụtara kọmputa Omatek, akwụkwọ ndetu na sava na ihe niile mejupụtara ya na Nigeria
Ihe nrite ndị e meriri gụnyere
Ọ lụrụ nwanyị nwere ụmụ atọ, otu nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Seriki nwụrụ na Lagos University Teaching Hospital (LUTH) na Friday 3 March 2017
Ihe gburu ya bụ cancer nke pancreas
Lorato Florence Tito bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye otu South African National Assembly
Tito bụ onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters
Tito gụrụ akwụkwọ na Tetlanyo Secondary School na Kimberley, Northern Cape
O nwere diplọma na ahịa na nchịkwa ọha na eze na njikwa
Tupu a họpụta ya na ndị omeiwu, ọ bụ onye kansụl EFF na Sol Plaatje Local Municipality na Frances Baard District Municipality
Tito guzoro dị ka onye omeiwu EFF na ntuli aka mba nke afọ 2019, e mesịkwara họpụta ya na National Assembly ma ṅụọ iyi na 22 Mee 2019
Kemgbe ọ ghọrọ onye omeiwu, Tito abụwo onye otu Portfolio Committee on Home Affairs
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Oluremi Tinubu (amumuruya 21 Septemba1960) nwuye onye isi ala mana ugba obu onye okaiwu na Lagos State
Obu onye otu pati All Progressives Congress (APC)
Oluremi Tinubu bu nwa ikwpeazu na ime umu iri na abuo; Azuruya na Ogun State

Tinubu ritere BS na mmuta na mahadum no na lfe nke anakpo University of Ife, na nzere ozo ndi oyibo na akpo National Certificate of Education n'ime osisi akumaku na umuanuma nu site na ulomuta Adeyemi College of Education
Oluremi Tinubu ghoro nwanyi mbu nke obodo Lagos mgbe di ya Bola Tinubu meriri na akwa ndoro ochichi ibu onyeisiala na Lagos state
Dika nwayi mbu ,o hiwere ogbaku ana - akpo New Era Foundation, nke na arara enye nguzowe ogbako nke na ahu maka nlekota ndi na etoetao na mata ihuoha ime nchekwa mgburumguru ebe obidi na oru obodo'
Mgbe aghoputara Tinubu, amara aka na ulo ikpe uloikpe nke uloikpe mkpesa nke ga-emesi kpokota maka kwado nhoputa ndi ochichi na afo 2012
Tinubu bu otu onye n'ime out nari ndi okaiwu ahoputara na nzuko asato n'ime afo 2015
Otuodina, nani umunwanyi isii ka aghoro Ndi nke ozo bu Stella Oduah na Uche Ekwunife, ndi nochitere anya Anambra, Fatimat Raji Rasaki, Rose Okoji Oko na Binta Garba
Oluremi bu nwunye onye wubu oneye isiala na onye okaiwu Lagos State, aha ya bu Bola TinubuObu onye otu karist
Florestine Perrault Collins (1895-1988) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto si New Orleans
A maara Collins maka ịmepụta foto nke ndị ahịa Afrịka-Amerịka nke 'na-egosipụta mpako, ọkaibe, na ùgwù'
kama ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
A mụrụ ya na Louisiana, Collins bụ otu n'ime ụmụ isii
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze naanị ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, mgbe a manyere ya ịhapụ iji nyere aka weta ego ezinụlọ
N'afọ 1909, Collins malitere ime foto mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Ihe ndị ọ na-ese sitere na agbamakwụkwọ, orili nso mbụ, na ngụsị akwụkwọ na foto onwe onye nke ndị agha laghachiri n'ụlọ
Na mbido ọrụ ya, Collins ga-agafe dị ka nwanyị ọcha iji nwee ike inyere ndị na-ese foto aka
Collins mechara mepee ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, na-enye ezinụlọ ndị Afrịka-Amerịka nri
Ọ nwetara ndị na-eso ụzọ na-eguzosi ike n'ihe ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma, n'ihi ma foto ya na nkà ahịa ya
N'ime ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka 101 ndị gosipụtara onwe ha dị ka ndị na-ese foto na ọnụ ọgụgụ mba US nke 1920, Collins bụ naanị onye edepụtara na New Orleans
Ọ na-akpọsa na akwụkwọ akụkọ, na-eme ka mmetụta nke foto a rụrụ nke ọma
Collins tinyekwara foto ya na mgbasa ozi iji mee ka ndị ahịa mara ndị chere na onye na-ese foto nwanyị nwere ike iwere foto dị mma nke ụmụ ọhụrụ na ụmụaka
Di mbụ Collins, Eilert Bertrand, kwenyere na ụmụ nwanyị ekwesịghị inwe ọrụ ma gbalịa igbochi ya ịpụta n'ihu ọha
Collins nwụrụ n'afọ 1988
Dị ka Encyclopedia nke Louisiana si kwuo, ọrụ Collins ' gosipụtara mmekọrịta dị mgbagwoju anya nke okike, agbụrụ na atụmanya klas'
'A pụrụ ịkọwa akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nnwere onwe ndị isi ojii na United States dị ka ọgụ maka ihe oyiyi dịka ọ bụkwa ọgụ maka ikike, 'dị ka mgbịrịgba
Foto Collins na-anọchite anya nke ahụ
Site n'iwere foto nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na ụmụaka n'ụlọ, ọ na-agbagha echiche zuru oke nke oge ahụ banyere ụmụ nwanyị ojii
E gosipụtara Collins na ihe ngosi nke afọ 2014, Through A Lens Darkly Black Photographers and the Emergence of a People
E tinyere ọrụ Collins na ihe ngosi na New Orleans na ngwụcha afọ 1900 na mmalite afọ 2000, dị ka Women Artists in Louisiana, 1825ī1965 A Place of Their Own,
Collins bụ isiokwu nke akwụkwọ afọ 2013 Picturing Black New Orleans A Creole Photographer Chinas View of the Early Twentieth Century, nke Arthé A
Anthony dere
Florida bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
Ìfulū, ndi madụ màrà ya kwá kà ìgùgù, bu ihe àkụlō na rara nke ìfulū
Zùbe ndu ìfulū bu Í mékotá mkpuru nwóké na ntú nwaanyị ka ha nwéríkí gbáfù mkpuru
Nwa agbọghọ Flower bụ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri ịhụnanya na atọ ọchị nke afọ 2013 setịpụrụ wee gbaa na Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ gbagharịrị na akụkọ Kemi ( Damilola Adegbite ) chọrọ ịlụ Umar (Chris Attoh); nwa okorobịa nke na-achọsi ike ịga n'ihu n'ọrụ ya
Mgbe mmekọrịta ha dakwasịrị n'oke mmiri, Kemi na-achọ enyemaka onye na-eme ihe nkiri Tunde ( Blossom Chukwujekwu ) ha kpara atụmatụ iji nweta Kemi ihe ọ chọrọ
Kemi na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ahịa ifuru nne na nna ya, ọ bi n'obi ịghọ otu n'ime di na nwunye na-enwe obi ụtọ ọ na-ahụ kwa ụbọchị
Otu enyi ya nwoke nke ogologo oge bụ́ Umar onye ọkaiwu ekwela nkwa na ya ga-alụ ya ma ọ nweta nkwalite, mana ọ na-enwekwu ndidi
Ọ na-eme ye ihere na ya na ndi mụrụ ya ka bị n'ụlọ, ọ na-anọkwa abalị n'ime ime ụlọ ya na-eme atụmatụ agbamakwụkwọ ọ tụrụ anya na ọ ga-eme otu ụbọchị
Otu ụbọchị ahụ ọ nọworo na-echere abịala; Umar enwetala nkwalite! Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọ bịarutere na-atụ anya ka ọ atụpụta alụmdi na nwunye ha,ka ma ọ gbasa ha kama
N'ịbụ onye obi gbawara, ọ gara n'ihu, ma, n'ịbụ onye na-apụghị ịhụ ebe ọ na-aga n'anya mmiri nke iru újú, ụgbọ ala kụtuo ya
Onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala ahụ tụgharịrị bụrụ Tunde Kulani, onye ama ama na ihe nkiri Nollywood
Ka Tunde na-ahu maka ọnya ya, Kemi kwere obi mgbawa wee kọọrọ ya nsogbu ya
Tunde kwere nkwa inyere ya aka ime Umar ka ọ tuputa alụmdi na nwunye ha
Ha na-echepụta atụmatụ
Ha ga-eme ka ha bụ di na nwunye na-eme Umar anyaụfụ wee mee ka ọ laghachi azụ na-atụ aro na ikpere ya
Dị ka ọ dị n'obere nwa, Bello wetara ihu ọhụrụ na ọrụ nke abụọ wee kpebie ịgwakọta ihe nkiri isi na ndị na-eto eto
Maka ọtụtụ n'ime ha, gụnyere ndi ama ama TV Damilola Adegbite, ọ bụ oge mbụ ha na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Naijiria
Ahụmahụ ọhụrụ ọzọ bụ ime ka ha mara usoro na usoro pụrụ iche nke onye nduzi n'ime izu nke mmega ahụ
Michelle Bello mepụtara edemede mbụ siri ike maka ihe nkiri ahụ mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ maka nzere masters na Communications na Mahadum Regent dị na Virginia, United States
A gwara klas ahụ ka ha dee ihe nkiri ogologo, nke ọ na-emetụbeghị mbụ
Ọ tụgharịrị uche n'akụkọ ahụ ọ ga-achọ ide banyere ya; otu nke ga-atọ ụtọ nke ukwuu ịmalite n'ime edemede iri itoolu
Ọ sịrị; 'Ọ na-amasị m ikiri ihe nkiri nto-ochi ịhụnanya
M na-abụ onye na-enwe mmasị n'ịhụnanya n'obi na enwere m ike ịkọrọ ndị isi akụkọ na ahụmahụ ha
Ọ chọsiri m ike iwere ụdị ihe a wee mee ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri nke oge a na Lagos, Nigeria
Achọrọ m inyocha ụdị agwa dị iche iche mara mma - ma akụkụ ha dị mma na akụkụ ọjọọ ha n'ihi na njedebe nke ụbọchị ọ nweghị onye zuru oke'
Bello dere akwụkwọ mbụ nke Flower Girl, nke a na-akpọbu Caught Up, n'ime obere oge nke ọnwa abụọ
Ọ gbakwụnyere okwu na-eme na mmekọrịta nke ndị di na nwunye na-eto eto taa na obodo Naijiria na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe gbasara ndị na-eto eto
Onye na-emekọ ihe ọnụ bụ Michelle Dede na-ekwu, sị, Imepụta ihe nkiri, karịsịa na Nigeria, abụghị ihe kachasị mfe ime
Ọ bụ ihe na-akwụghachi ụgwọ nke ukwuu n'ihi ahụmahụ nke ịnọ na ihe nkiri na ihe niile dị nta na-eme ka ihe nkiri nwee ike
Ọ bụ Hitplay dere egwu
Ọtụtụ egwu agbakwunyere gụnyere
Ihe ngosi izizi ụwa nke Flower Girl mere na 13 February 2013 na Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ gara na mwepụta n'ozuzu na Nigeria na ụbọchị Valentine 2013 wee nata nlebanya dị egwu dị iche iche

Emechara ihe ngosi Ghana mere na 5 May 2013 na Accra na n'abalị mbụ ka ekwesịrị igosi ya n'ụlọ ezumezu sinima n'ihi ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ndị mmadụ nọ ebe ahụ bụ ndị ji ụjọ chere ọbịbịa ihe nkiri ahụ na obodo ha
Emere ihe ngosi UK na 26 Septemba 2013 na Odeon Cinema na Greenwich
Talking Drum Entertainment UK kesara ụdị ihe nkiri ihunanya ọhụrụ edeziri na Fraịde, 4 Ọktoba 2013 na Odeon, Vue, Cineworld na sinima nọọrọ onwe ha
A na-enyochakwa nwa Flower Girl na Hollywood Black Film Festival 2013 wee nwee ngosi izizi na US na nyocha na Los Angeles na 3 Ọktoba 2013
E wepụtara ya na Netflix na Julaị 13, 2021
Otú ọ dị, a katọrọ ya maka ọdịdị ụda adịghị mma yana nhoro egwu na ezughi ezu
Floyd E
Norman (amụrụ na June 22, 1935) bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede, na onye na-ese akwụkwọ ọchị
N'ime oge ọrụ ya, Norman arụlọa ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, n'etiti ha bụ Walt Disney Animation Studios, Hanna-Barbera Productions, Ruby-Spears, Film Roman na Pixar
Ịhụnanya Norman nwere maka ihe nkiri malitere mgbe ọ na-ekiri ihe nkiri Disney a kpọrọ Dumbo na Bambi Norman gara Art Center College of Design na Pasadena, California ebe ọ gụrụ ihe atụ
Ọ malitere dị ka onye enyemaka nke Katy Keene comic book artist Bill Woggon, onye bi na Santa Barbara, California, ebe Norman tolitere

N'afọ 1957, e were Norman n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka Sleeping Beauty (nke ewepụtara n'afọ 1959) na The Walt Disney Company, na-aghọ onye mbụ na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na Amerịka nke nọgidere na studio ahụ ogologo oge
N'ịgbaso ọrụ ya na Sleeping Beauty, a họpụtara Norman, o wee laghachi na studio mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na 1960 iji rụọ ọrụ na One Hundred and One Dalmatians (1961) na The Sword in the Stone (1963)
Mgbe Walt Disney hụrụ ụfọdụ n'ime eserese ụlọ ọrụ Norman mere iji mee ka ndị ọrụ ibe ya nwee obi ụtọ, e zigara ya na ngalaba akụkọ, ebe ya na Larry Clemons rụkọrọ ọrụ na akụkọ maka The Jungle Book
Mgbe Walt Disney nwụsịrị n'afọ 1966, Floyd Norman hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ Disney iji hiwe Vignette Films, Inc, ya na onye mmekọ azụmahịa na onye nduzi Leo Sullivan
Vignette Films, Inc
mepụtara ihe nkiri isii ma bụrụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ mbụ mepụtara ihe nkiri gbasara akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị isi ojii

Norman na Sullivan rụkọrọ ọrụ ọnụ n'ọrụ dị iche iche, nke gụnyere akụkụ maka Sesame Street na mbụ Hey, Hey, Hey, It's Fat Albert telivishọn pụrụ iche nke Bill Cosby chepụtara, nke gosipụtara na 1969 na NBC
N'afọ 1972, e mepụtara Fat Albert na Cosby Kids Saturday ụtụtụ katọn usoro maka CBS site Filmation Associates
Norman laghachiri Disney n'otu oge na mmalite afọ 1970 iji rụọ ọrụ n'ihe nkiri Disney a kpọrọ Robin Hood, ma rụọ ọrụ na ọtụtụ mmemme telivishọn na Hanna-Barbera na Ruby-Spears
N'afọ ndị 1980, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye edemede na ngalaba na-atọ ọchị na Disney ma bụrụ onye edemede ikpeazụ maka comic strip tupu a kwụsị ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri maka Walt Disney Animation Studios na Pixar, ebe o nyere aka n'ụzọ okike dị ka onye na-ese akụkọ na ihe nkiri dịka Toy Story 2 na Monsters, Inc
maka Pixar na Mulan, Dinosaur na The Hunchback of Notre Dame maka Walt Disney Animation Studios, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Reel FX's Free Birds

Norman ebipụtala ọtụtụ akwụkwọ katụụn sitere na mkpali na ahụmịhe ndụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri, Faster! Cheaper! The Flip Side to the Art of Animation; Son of Faster, Cheaper! A Sharp Look Inside the Animation Business How the Grinch Stole Disney ; Disk Drive Animated Humor in the Digital Age; and Suspended Animation The Art Form That Refuses To Die

Norman edepụtala ihe nkiri nke ọkara akụkọ ndụ, nke akpọrọ Animated Life A Lifetime of tips, tricks, techniques and stories from an animation Legend (Animation Masters) , nke Focal Press bipụtara na 2013
Ọ bụ isiokwu nke ihe nkiri 2016 Floyd Norman An Animated Life
Ọ bụ onye edemede maka weebụsaịtị JimHillMediacom na AfroKidscom
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara Norman na kọmitii agụmakwụkwọ na mgbasa ozi nke Academy of Motion Picture Arts & Sciences
Na mbido na 2017 D23 Expo, Disney Editions bipụtara akwụkwọ foto A Kiss Goodnight nke Richard M
Sherman dere ma Norman gosipụtara
A kpọbatara Norman na Black Filmmakers Hall of Fame n'afọ 1979
Norman bụ onye natara ihe nrite Winsor McCay Award maka 'nnabata nke ndụ ma ọ bụ onyinye ọrụ na nka nke ihe nkiri' na 2002 Annie Awards
A kpọrọ Norman Disney Legend na 2007
N'afọ 2008, ọ pụtara dị ka onye ọbịa nke nsọpụrụ na Comic-Con International, ebe e nyere ya Inkpot Award
N'afọ 2013, a kwanyere Norman ugwu na 'Sergio Award' site na The Comic Art Professional Society (CAPS)
n'afọ 2014, Norman bụ onye natara onyinye DFC Disney Legend nke Disneyana Fan Club nyere
N'afọ 2015, Norman natara Friz Freleng Award for Lifetime Achievement for Excellence in Animation site na International Family Film Festival
N'afọ 2016, Norman bụ onye natara onyinye pụrụ iche (Legendary Animator) site na African-American Film Critics Association
Na June 2018, Norman natara nzere Doctorate of Philosophy site na Cogswell Polytechnical College
Na Mee 2019, a kwanyere Norman ugwu na Milton Caniff Lifetime Achievement Award site na National Cartoonists Society

Flubromazepam bụ ihe sitere na benzodiazepine nke e mepụtara na 1960, mana ọ dịghị mgbe a na-ere ya n'ahịa ma ọ bụghị ọzọ ka a na-elebara na ụdị ke amụta ya anya ma ọ bụ na-amụ ya ruo na ngwụcha afọ 2012 mgbe ọ pụtara n'ahịa na-acha ntụ ntụ dị ka ọgwụ ọhụrụ
Enwere ike ire isomer ọzọ, 5- (2-bromophenyl) -7-fluoro-1,3-dihydro-2H-1,4-benzodiazepin-2-one ma ọ bụ ọgwụ mgbochi ịba gụnyere 'iso-flubromazepam', n'okpuru otu aha ahụ
Na UK, e kewapụtara flubromazepam dị ka ọgwụ Class C site na mmezigharị May 2017 na Iwu Mmetụta Ọgwụ 1971 yana ọtụtụ ọgwụ ndị ọzọ na-emepụta benzodiazepine
Flubromazepam, clonazolam, na flubromazolam bụ ihe ndị a na-achịkwa na Schedule I n'okpuru Iwu Steeti Virginia
Fludiazepam, nke a na-ere n'okpuru aha Erispan (エリスパン) bụ benzodiazepine dị ike na 2ʹfluoro sitere na diazepam, bụ nke Hoffman-La Roche mepụtara na 1960s
A na-ere ya na Japan na Taiwan
[mkpa nhota] Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ọgwụ ya site na ịkwalite mgbochi GABAergic
Fludiazepam nwere okpukpu anọ karịa njikọ maka ndị na-anabata benzodiazepine karịa diazepam
Ọ nwere ihe na-eme ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị na em ka nchegbu kwụsị, ihe na-egbochi nkụchi, ihe na'ime ka ahụ dị jụụ, ihe na na-emebi ihe na-emetụta ahụike
A na-eji Fludiazepam eme ihe ntụrụndụ

Tinyere ịkwaga ndị merụrụ ahụ na ndị ọrịa n'ụlọ ọgwụ, nzukọ ahụ eguzobewo akụrụngwa ahụike maka gọọmentị ma soro ụlọ ọrụ onwe ha rụọ ọrụ iji melite ọrụ ahụike ha
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na gọọmentị na ụlọ ọrụ onwe
