Steven Ellison (amụrụ n'October 7, 1983), nke a maara site na aha egwu ya Flying Lotus ma ọ bụ mgbè ụfọdụ FlyLo, bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, DJ na ónyé na-eti egwu si Los Angeles
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere akara ndekọ Brainfeeder
Flying Lotus ewepụtala abọm studio asaá 1983 (2006), Los Angeles (2008), Cosmogramma (2010), Until the Quiet Comes (2012), You're Dead! (2014), Flamagra (2019) na Yasuke (2021) -nke a na-aja mma
O mepụtara ọtụtụ n'ime egwu egwu na Cartoon Network's Adult Swim programming block
O nyekwara áká remixes màkà ndị na-ese ihe Plug Research gụnyere Mia Doi Todd
N'afọ 2012, Flying Lotus malitere ịpị rap n'okpuru onye Captain Murphy, dabere na Sealab 2021 nkè otu aha ahụ
Ellison zoro eziokwu a ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa, n'ikpeazụ kpughere njirimara ya ọtụtụ izu mgbè a tọhapụrụ mixtape rap mbụ ya Duality (2012)
A mụrụ Flying Lotus Steven Ellison na October 7, 1983, na Los Angeles, California
Ọ bụ nwa nwa nke ónyé na-eme piano jazz Alice Coltrane, onye di ya bụ onye na-egwu saxophon John Coltrane

Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ bụ nwa nwa nke onye na-agụ egwú na ónyé na-ede egwú Marilyn McLeod, ónyé a ma ama maka ide Diana Ross's 'Love Hangover' na Freda Payne's 'I Get High (On Your Memory) ' ma bụrụ nwanne nwanyị Alice Coltrane
Otu onye édémédé akpọwo nwanne nne ya Alice 'mmetụta kachasị na egwu Ellison'
Nnyocha DNA kpughere na Ellison bụ nwa ndị Tikar nke Cameroon
Bernard Edwards Jr
(amụrụ na Nọvemba 6, 1972), nke a maara dị ka Focus, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta egwu si New York City
O nwetara nnukwu nkwado na ụlọ ọrụ egwu mgbè ọ bịanyere áká na Dr
Dre's Aftermath Entertainment, na 2002
Kemgbe ahụ, o mepụtara egwu màkà ọtụtụ ndị omenkà ama ama, gụnyere Dr

Dre, Eminem, Kendrick Lamar, Snoop Dogg, Rick Ross, John Legend, The Game, Ice Cube, Busta Rhymes, Fabolous, 50 Cent, Schoolboy Q, Joe, Christina Aguilera, Jennifer Lopez, Beyoncé, Lil Wayne, Ameriie, Christina Millian, Mac Dre, Marsha Ambrosius na ndị ọzọ
Focus
bụ nwa nwoke nké Bernard Edwards nwụrụ anwụ, ónyé guzobere disko na R&B band Chic
A mụrụ ya na Manhattan, New York City, ma zụlite ya na Tri-State Region
Edwards Jr
na-eto nna ya màkà ịhụnanya ya maka mmepụta nke egwu, nke ọ mepụtara site na nwata, na-aga ọtụtụ oge studio na nna ya
Ógè alụlụ bụ oge alụlụ nke na-eme n'ebe ụfọdụ, n'ihi ọnọdụ ihu igwe na ọdịdị ala pụrụ iche, mgbè oge mmiri ozuzo gasịrị
Ógè alụlụ na-adabere n'ọnwa ndị dị jụụ (ọgwụgwụ ógè mgbụsị akwụkwọ, ógè oyi na mmalite ógè opupu ihe ubi)

A na-ahụ ihe atụ na San Joaquin Valley na Sacramento Valley nkè Great Central Valley nké California, ébé nnukwu anwụrụ ọkụ, nke a maara dị ka Tule fog, nwèrè ike ịmepụta, ọkachasị n'ọnwa site n'ọnwa Nọvemba ruo Machị
N'ógbè Tampa Bay nke Florida, ógè alụlụ bụ site na Disemba ruo Febụwarị
Ógè igwe ojii nke Sydney dị ogologo, malite n'ọnwa Eprel ruo Ọktoba
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-emekarị na June n'ihi mmiri ozuzo ka ukwuu

Ọ bụghị eziokwu n'ozuzu na ógè alụlụ n'otu ébé bụ n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ oge oyi (ọnwa ndị dị jụụ); dịka ọmụmaatụ, ụsọ oké osimiri Pacific nke Japan nwèrè ógè alụlụ siri ike site na Mee ruo Ọgọst
June Gloom, ihe igwe ojii na igwe ojii, nke a hụrụ n'ụsọ oké osimiri ndịda California na-eme na ngwụcha oge opupu ihe ubi na mmalite ógè okpomọkụ (May na June)
⁴Adefemi Gbadamosi (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1993) nke a makwaara dị ka Fola David, bụ dọkịta na-ahụ maka ahụike na Naijiria nke na-eme ihe ngosi dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Ọ na-ese ihe eserese nke gụnyere eserese ndị mmadụ n'elu ikpo okwu mgbe akwa ahụ dị n'elu ma ọ bụ na-atụgharị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na akwa maka Ooni nke Ife Adeyeye Enitan Ogunwusi, Patoranking, Trey Songz, Wale, Keri Hilson, R-kelly, Jidenna, 2face, Iyanya, Dj Jimmy Jatt, Alibaba n'etiti ndị ọzọ

Iji mee mkpọsa megide echiche mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke nsogbu akpụkpọ ahụ, ọrụ ya na-ekpuchi ezughị okè akpụkpọ ahụ dị ka wrinkles, vitiligo, freckles, stretch marks, ichthyosis na ọnọdụ akpụkpọ ahụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-eme ka a mara banyere nsogbu ahụike site na Fola David Foundation
O nwere nzere na Medicine na Surgery na College of Medicine, University of Lagos
A họpụtara ya maka The Future Awards Africa Prize For Art & Culture na 2017
O kwukwara okwu na TEDxBellsTech na Mahadum Bells na 2018
Folake Akinyemi (a muru n'ụbọchị nke 31 n’ime onwa Maachị nke afọ 1990) bu onye Naijiria na 0nye Nọọwe na-eme egwuregwu ị gba ọsọ mita 100 na 200 nke lagoro ezumike nka
A muru ya na Legọs

Nwa nke kwere nkwa, o mechara n'ọkwa nke anọ n'ọsọmita 100 na 2007 European Youth Olympic Festival, na 2009 European Junior Championship, o meriri ma rite ọla ọcha n'ọsọ mita 100 were mechaa n'ọkwa nke isii n'ọsọ mita 200

O sonyekwara na 2006 World Junior Championship (relay only), 2007 European Junior Championship (naanị 100) na 2008 World Junior Championship (mita 100 na 200) na 2011 European U23 Championship (mita 100 na 200 ) na-erughị na njedebe

N'ime egwuregwu ndị megoro agadi, ọ gbara asọmpi nke European European Indoor Championship n'afọ 2009, 2010 World Indoor Championship, 2010 European Championship, 2012 European Championship na 2013 European Indoor Championship na -erughị na njedebe
Na njem ikpeazụ ya na mba ụwa, o ruru ọkara ikpeazụ nke mita 100 na 2013 Summer Universiade
Kemgbe, ọ lara ezumike nká n'ihi mmerụ ahụ

Oge kachasị mma ya bụ 736 sekọnsụ n'ọsọ mita 60 (n'ime ụlọ), ọ rụzuru n'ọnwa Febụwarị nke afọ 2009 na Florø ; 1146 sekọnsụ n'ọsọ mita 100, o nwetara n'ọnwa Juun nke afọ 2012 na Florø; na 23,61 sekọnsụ n'ọsọ mita 200, o nwetara n'ọnwa Julaị nke afọ 2010 na Donnas,dị na Ịtali
Ọ nọchitere anya klọb IL na BUL na SK Vidar tupu ọ banye na IK Tjalve tupu oge afọ 2014, oge mgbe o riteghị ihe ọ bụla
A mụrụ Folake na Lagos, Nigeria na 1974
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Switzerland na United Kingdom, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta postgraduate na iwu mmanụ ala wee laghachi Nigeria ịchụso ọdịmma ejiji ya
Akara ejiji ya, 'Tiffany Amber' ka ewepụtara na Lagos na 1998
Akara ahụ nwere ụlọ ahịa anọ naanị ya na ebe ana ere akwa na Lagos ma Abuja
O meela ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ejiji na Africa, Europe na United States
N'afọ 2008, o mere akụkọ ihe mere eme dị ka onye mbụ na-emepụta ejiji n'Africa iji mee ihe ngosi ugboro abụọ na New York Fashion Week
Ọ bụ onye mbụ nwetara ihe nrite “Designer of the Year” n'izu ejiji nke Africa na Johannesburg na 2009 ma nyekwara ya onyinye “Ejiji Ejiji nke Afọ” na izu Ejiji ARISE na 2011
Na 2013, ọ natara ihe nrite Enterprise na 2013 Women, Inspiration and Enterprise (WIE) Symposium wee mee ndepụta ụmụ nwanyị Forbes Power
O weputara mkpokọta mmiri/ọkọchị 'Nirvana' ya na mmalite DOII Designs
Mgbe a jụrụ ya ma nna ya emetụtala ọrụ ya n'ụzọ ọ bụla, Folake Coker kwuru na nna ya emetụtaghị ọrụ ha dị ka ụmụ ya kama ọ ga-eduzi ha nhọrọ ọrụ ha kpebiri itinye aka na ya
Coker lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego Folorunsho Coker, bụ onye lụgharịrị kemgbe, onye bụbu onye isi njikwa nke ngwaahịa nọmba plate ikike nke steeti Lagos, ugbu a onye ndụmọdụ Gọvanọ Lagos
Folake Olayinka, dọkịta na onye ndú ahụike mba ụwa
Kemgbe afọ 2020 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi immunization ụwa niile nke United States Agency maka mmepe mba ụwa (USAID na ndebiri okwu)
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ndu teknụzụ na atụmatụ maka COVID19 Vaccine Access na Delivery Initiative Washington DC USA

Tupu ọ banye USAID Washington, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na JSI Arlington VA, USA (Ọgọst 2015 ruo ọnwa Ọktoba 2020) dị ka Project Director MOMENTUM Routine Immunization Transformation and Equity (MRITE); Senior Immunizing Advisor and Immunizations Center Senior Leadership member ; na Global Immunizage Team Leader USAID's Flagship Maternal Child Survival Program nke e mere iji kwụsị ọnwụ nne na ụmụaka a na-egbochi

Ọ bụ onye nduzi mmemme nke nkwado maka mmemme ịba nke mba,(SuNMAP) ọrụ UKAID kwadoro na-akwado mmemme nchịkwa ịba nke Naịjirịa na inye enyemaka zuru oke maka nchịkwa ịnyịnya, nke Malaria Consortium duziri
Ọ bụ onye otu WHO's Strategic Advisory Group of Experts ( SAGE) https //wwwint/about/people/biography/doctor-folake-olayinka ma na-ejekwa ozi na SAGE Working Group na ọgwụ mgbochi COVID-19
Site na 2010 ruo afọ 2014, ọ bụ onye otu WHO Immunization Practice Advisory Committee (IPAC)

Ọ na-eje ozi na WHO African Regional Immunization Technical Advisory Group (RITAG) ma bụrụkwa onye ndụmọdụ sayensị maka African Local Initiative for Vaccinology Expertise, Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, South Africa
Ọrụ ya kachasị mkpa bụ na mgbochi ọrịa, mkpochapụ polio, ahụike nne na nwa (MCH), mmemme HIV, na ịba
Ọ bụ onye ASPEN New Voice Fellow na Fellow na WomenLift Health Leadership program Stanford University USA
https //wwwwomenlifthealthorg/profile/folake-olayinka/
https //wwwwomenlifthealthorg/northamerica/us/about-the-journey/
Folake Olowofoyeku (a mụrụ na abalị iri abụọ na isii nke ọnwa Ọktooba na afọ 1983) bu onye Naijiria na-eme ejije na -agụkwa egwu Ọ na-eme ejije ugbu a na Chuck Lorre CBS sitcom Bob Hearts Abishola
A mụrụ Olowofoyeku na Naijiria nye onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria bụ Babatunji Olowofoyeku na Felicia Olowofoyeku
Ọ bụ ya bụ ọdụdụ nwa n'ime ụmụaka iri abụọ O tolitere na Victoria Island na Lagos, Nigeria, ma nọkwaa nwa oge na London
Otu n'ime ụmụnne ya ndi nwoke ndi tọrọ ya bụ onye na-agụ egwu na akpakwa ụbọ Toby Foyeh
Olowofoyeku gara ụlọ nkụzi Igbinedion, ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi Montessori dị na Benin City
Ọ mesịrị gafere na Vivian Fowler Memorial College nke ụmụ nwanyị dị na Ikeja, Lagos mekwaa gaa Oxbridge Tutorial College
N’afọ puku abụọ na otu (2001), mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Olowofoyeku kwagara mba Amerịka, bụ́ ebe ya na nwanne ya nwaanyị bi
Na agbanyeghị na na mbụ ọ na-amụ gbasara akụ na ụba na-atụmanya nke ịghọ onye ọka iwu, Olowofoyeku nwetara nzere BA na ihe nkiri site na City College of New York
N'oge ya na City College ọ gbara bọọlụ basket kọleji nke NCAA Division III maka CCNY Beavers
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji, Olowofoyeku malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ihe nkiri off-Broadway na New York City

Olowofoyeku pụtara n'ọrụ ejije ndị ọbịa na ihe ngosi televishọn gụnyere 30 Rock, Otu esi agbapụ na igbu ọchụ, Iwu & Order Criminal Intent, Iwu & Order Special Victims Unit, Modern Family, Westworld, nakwa White Collar
Olowofoyeku pụtakwara na ihe nkiri, Death Race 2050, n'afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asaa (2017) dị ka Minerva Jefferson
Ọzọkwa na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asaa (2017), Olowofoyeku pụtara megide Gaby Hoffmann na oge ikpeazụ nke usoro TV Transparent, dị ka mmasị ịhụnanya ya, Lyfe

Na ọnwa Septemba afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na iteghete (2019), Olowofoyeku chawapụtakwara ka Onye ọkpa ụkọ ọchị nke Amerika Billy Gardell na Chuck Lorre CBS nke ejije sitcọm nke afọ 2019, Bob Hearts Abishola, nke Lorre mebere jiri onye ọkpa ụKaọchi Britain -Naijiria Gina Yashere - onye na-ede maka ihe nkiri ahụ ma na-emekwa dika ezigbo enyi Olowofoyeku, Kemi
Bob Hearts Abishola bụ ejije sitcọm America izizi zipụtara ezinaụlọ Naịjirịa
Olowofoyeku mere dika Abishola, onye nọọsụ obi Naijiria nke zutere onye ọchụnta ego mkpakọ sock aha ya bụ Bob na Detroit
Ihe ngosi a na-egosi ufere na-eto eto n'etiti ha abụọ, bụ ndị chọpụtara na ha nwekọrọ ọtụtụ ihe ọnụ karịa ndịiche
Olowofoyeku ekwuola na ihe nkiri a dịkwa egwu n'ihi na ọ na-egosi ndị na-eme ihe nkiri gụnyere Abishola na-asụ asụsụ Yoruba
Olowofoyeku na-akpa egwu eletrọnịkị Afro-beat n'okpuru moniker The Folake
Ọ na-akpa jita, piano, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye injinia ụda
Olowofoyeku nwere nzere diplọma na ọdịyo injiniarịn site na Institute of Audio Research
Na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na atọ (2013), Olowofoyeku pụtara na vidiyo David Bowie abụọ dị ka onye na-akpata ya jita baaz ' Kpakpando (Apụtago n'abalị a) ' nakwa ' Ụbọchị Na-esote '
Vidiyo abụọ ahụ bụ Floria Sigismondi duziri ha, ya na Tilda Swinton na-eme ka nwunye Bowie na 'Kpakpando' ebe 'Ụbọchị Na-esote' gosipụtara ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Gary Oldman na Marion Cotillard
Olowofoyeku kwuru na onye nduzi Sigismondi na Bowie na-arụkọ ọrụ ha na ndị otu ahụ ka ha wee nwee ike ịmụta akụkụ ha na egwu na mgbatị ahụ, yana igosi onwe ha na vidiyo
A bara Olowofoyeku aha nwanyị mbụ bụ Nnukwu onye nkwupụta okwu na Naijiria, Folake Solanke
Olowofoyeku ekwuola maka mkpa aha dị na omenala ndị Yoruba
Aha mbụ ya pụtara iji akụ na ụba na-abụghị nke ego azụtọ, aha nna ya pụtara na ọgaranya na-eji aha eze akwalite akụ na ụba ha
Olowofoyeku na-asụ Yoruba
Ọ bụ nnukwu onye na-akwado akụkọ sayensị na ọrụ Octavia Butler, ma gụọ akwụkwọ Butler nke 1980, Mkpụrụ ọhịa, dị ka ọkacha masị
Olowofoyeku bi na Los Angeles ugbu a
Folake Olunloyo-Oshinowo bu onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchichi na obodo Naịjiriya na
onye so na ndi ome iwu nke ala

Olunloyo-Oshinowo na mbu, ọ bu onye nyemaka onye na ekwuchitere ndi ome iwu nke ala onye nke a na akpọ, Alhaji Aminu Waziri Tambuwal, tụpụ o si na otu patị nke ana akpọ Peoples' Democratic Party (PDP) gafere na nke a na akpọ All Progressive Congress (APC)
Echiri Olunloyo-Oshinowo echichi nke Aare Egbe Omo Iyalode; Di ya bu Dr
Tunde Oshinowo
Folake Oritsegbubemi Onayemi (amụrụ Ọktoba 4, 1964) bụ Prọfesọ nke Classics na onye isi ngalaba mmụta Classics na Mahadum Ibadan dị na Nigeria
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ e nyere PhD na Classics na Nigeria na nwanyị ojii mbụ ghọrọ Prọfesọ nke Classics na Sub-Saharan Africa
Ọ bụ ọkachamara n'ịtụnyere akwụkwọ, omenala na akụkọ ifo ndị Gris na Rom na Naịjirịa, ọkachasị metụtara ọrụ na nnọchite anya ụmụnwanyị

Folake Onayemi gara mahadum nke Ibadan maka BA ya na Classics (1986), sochiri MA (1990), MPhil (1997), na PhD (2001); ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ e nyere nzere PhD na Classics na Nigeria, jiri akwụkwọ akụkọ akpọrọ Fear of Beauty Women in Classical and African/ Yoruba Literature
N'oge PhD ya, ọ nọrọ oge dịka Ọkà mmụta nleta na Mahadum Brown, Rhode Island

A họpụtara Onayemi ka ọ bụrụ onye enyemaka onye nkuzi na ngalaba “Classic of University of Ibadan” n’afọ 1994, wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ nwetara ọkwa a na ngalaba ahụ, ma were ọkwa na ọkwa abụọ nke onye nkuzi (Lecturer II na 1996, Lecturer I)

n'afọ 1999), nye onye nkuzi Senior n'afọ 2002, na Reader n'afọ 2005; n'afọ 2008, nkwalite ya na Prọfesọ mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ Prọfesọ nke Classics na Mahadum Ibadan na nwanyị ojii mbụ ghọrọ Prọfesọ nke Classics na Sub-saharan Africa

Okwu mmeghe ya, nke e nyere n'ụbọchị 23 n'ọnwa June n'afọ 2016, bụ isiokwu ' Paradigms of Life from Ancient Greek Literature ', wee nyochaa mkpa ọrụ Homer, Sophocles na Plutarch na-aga n'ihu na ndụ na Nigeria ugbu a

Onayemi abụrụla Prọfesọ nleta na Department of Classics, University of Texas at Austin, (2001); Ọkà mmụta nleta na Ngalaba Ochie, Mahadum Ghana (2009-2010, 2013-14); nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ Naijiria nke Bayo Kuku Postdoctoral Fellowship (2004), John D
na Catherine T
MacArthur Foundation Fellowship (2005), na Alexander S
Onassis Foundation Fellowship (2006-7)

Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ na American Council of Learned Societies' Humanities Programme, na onye nnọchiteanya Naijiria na International Federation of the Societies of Classical Studies (FIEC); ọ na-edezikwa akwụkwọ akụkọ ngalaba Nigeria and the Classics
Nchọcha Onayemi bụ nke kacha n'ihe ọmụmụ ntụnyere nke Greco-Roman na Nigerian ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ na omenala Africa, ngalaba nke ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya na Ibadan (gụnyere Prof
Olakunbi Olasope ) enyela nnukwu onyinye

Ọ na-elekwasị anya karịsịa na ọrụ ụmụnwanyị na ihe nnọchiteanya ha na akwụkwọ na ihe nkiri, bụ nke o bipụtara akwụkwọ abụọ na ọtụtụ akụkọ, ma ebipụtawokwa ihe ọmụmụ ntụnyere nke okpukpe Grik na nke Yoruba, na akụkọ banyere ọrụ nke Classics dị ka ọzụzụ na omenala Naijiria na Afrika nke oge a na ọha mmadụ

Ọ bụkwa onye odee, ya na Kofi Ackah, nke A Guide to Ancient Greek Literary History (2011), akwụkwọ ọgụgụ e bu n'obi iwebata ụmụ akwụkwọ Africa nke Classics n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ edemede Greek oge ochie na akụkọ ihe mere eme ha
2016; Bettany Hughes gosipụtara mmemme ahụ, ndị ọzọ sonyere gụnyere Edith Hall

Na Maachị 2019, o kwuru nkuzi isi okwu akpọrọ 'Yoruba Adaptations of Classical Literature' na ọgbakọ mba ụwa na 'Classical Antiquity and Local Identities from Newfoundland to Nigeria and Ghana', nke emere na Mahadum Memorial
Onayemi ga-ekwu okwu isi okwu na 'Global Classics and Africa Past, Present, and Future' na Mahadum Ghana, Legon, na October 2020
Chief Folake Solanke (amụrụ ya na abalị iri abụo na itolu na onwa nke ato, na afọ 1932), SAN, CON, ọ bụ onye okaiwu Naijiria, onye nchịkwa na onye nkatọ
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ enyere okwa Senior Advocate of Nigeria na onye ọka iwu nwanyị mbụ Naijiria yi uwe akwa silk dị ka Onye Ndụmọdụ Senior
Ọ bụ Kọmishọna mbụ nke Western State ma bụrụkwa onye bụbu Onye isi oche nke Western Nigeria Television Broadcasting Corporation (WNTBC)
Ọ bụ onye nke iri anọ na abuo bụ African International President of Zonta International, otu mba na-eje ozi òtù na elekwasị anya karịsịa na ikwalite ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị
Onye isi ala mba ụwa nke iri anọ na atọ bụkwa onye Afrịka
A mụrụ Solanke na 29 Maachị n'afọ 1932 n'ezinụlọ Pa
JS Odulate nwụrụ anwụ na Abeokuta, isi obodo Ogun State na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjiria
Site n'afọ 1937 ruo 1939, Solanke gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Ago Oko
Site na 1940 ruo 1944, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Emo Girls na Abeokuta
Site na 1945 ruo 1949, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Methodist Girls' Lagos, ebe ọ na-enweta ihe nrite mbụ na bekee na mgbakọ na mwepụ

N'afọ 1949, Solanke nwetara Asambodo Ụlọ Akwụkwọ West African, bụrụ onye nlekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ na onye egwuregwu, na na ule asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West Africa ọ ghọrọ nwa akwụkwọ mbụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nwetara asambodo otu
Ọ nọrọ otu afọ na Queen's College Lagos tupu ọ gawa Mahadum Newcastle (mgbe ahụ Mahadum Durham ), England, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Arts (2nd Division) na Latin na mgbakọ na mwepụ na 1954

N'afọ 1955, Solanke nwetara asambodo diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ (2nd Division) wee sonye na ngalaba nke Pipers Corner School, Great Kingshill, High Wycombe, Buckinghamshire, ebe ọ kụziiri Latin na mgbakọ na mwepụ maka afọ 2
N'October 1956, ọ lụrụ Toriola Solanke
Na 1957, o sonyeere ngalaba nke St Monica's High School, Essex, ebe ọ kuziri otu ihe ọmụmụ otu afọ
Na 1960, a nabatara Solanke na Grey's Inn, London ka ọ gụọ maka akara ugo mmụta iwu
N'afọ 1962, ọ laghachiri Naijiria ka ọ rụọ ọrụ iwu

Mgbe ọ lọghachiri na Naijiria n'ọnwa August n'afọ 1962, Solanke malitere ọrụ iwu ya n'ụlọ ezumike Honourable Justice Michael Adeyinka Odesanya (rtd), mgbe ọ na-akụzi Latin na mgbakọ na mwepụ na Yejide Girls Grammar School na Ibadan, Oyo
Nna ya nwụrụ n'April 1963
N'ọnwa Mee 1963, ka akpọchara ya na Bar na-anọghị ya, ọ kwagara n'ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke Chief Frederick Rotimi Williams dị ka onye ndụmọdụ obere
N'afọ 1972, a họpụtara Solanke ka ọ bụrụ kọmishọna mbụ nke Western State na onye isi oche nke Western Nigeria Television Broadcasting Corporation (WNTBC)
N'afọ 1981, Solanke ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ Senior Advocate of Nigeria na onye ọka iwu nwanyị mbụ Naijiria yi uwe akwa silk
Solanke gbagoro n'ọkwa Zonta International, buru ụzọ jee ozi dịka Gọvanọ mpaghara maka Africa wee bụrụ onye isi oche mba ụwa
N'afọ 1988, 1990, na 1994, Solanke gbara ọsọ maka ntuli aka nke International Presidency nke nzukọ (ọ gbaghị ọsọ na 1992)

Ọ meriri ugboro abụọ mbụ, mana ọ meriri nke ugboro atọ, a họpụtara ya na Hong Kong na 21 Julaị 1994 ka onye isi oche mba ụwa nke iri anọ na abụọ, onye mbụ na-abụghị onye caucasian, onye isi oche Africa nke nzukọ kemgbe e guzobere na 1919
E bipụtara akụkọ ndụ Solanke, Reaching for the stars na 2007
Akwụkwọ ahụ kọwara ya dị ka “Lady of many firsts” na otu o siri wee bụrụ onye a ma ama na ọrụ iwu
Solanke enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye, gụnyere nsọpụrụ mba nke Onye Ọchịchị nke Order nke Niger
N'afọ 1981, e nyere Solanke aha ọdịnala nke 'Yeyemofin nke Ife' site n'aka onye nwụrụ anwụ Olubuse II, 50th Ooni nke Ife, na-esochi nkwekọrịta ya na Senior Advocate of Nigeria

N'afọ 2012, Solanke nwetara onyinye nturu ugo nke International Bar Association 's International Woman Lawyer Award na Association's 5th World Women Lawyers' Conference nke emere na London, iji kwado ọmarịcha ọkachamara ya na nnukwu ntinye aka na ọganihu ụmụ nwanyị n'ime ọrụ iwu
Nakwa n'afọ 2012, Solanke wepụtara akwụkwọ nke abụọ ya, A Compendium of Selected Lectures and Papers, Volume 1
Na Jenụwarị 17, 2015, Solanke nwetara onyinye nrite nke ndụ site na akwụkwọ akụkọ Sun na emume emere na Eko Hotels and Suites, Victoria Island, Lagos
Folakemi bụ aha nwanyị
Nke a nwere ike ịgụnye ịhe ndị a

Folakemi Titilayo Odedina (amụrụ ya na Jenụwarị 21, 1965) bụ onye sayensị a mụrụ na Naijiria na prọfesọ nke ọgwụ na ọgwụ na Mahadum Florida Ọ bụ onye isi nchọpụta maka Prostate Cancer Transatlantic Consortium (CaPTC), otu nyocha ahụike na-eji sayensị genomic na etiology gburugburu ebe obibi iji nyochaa ibu arọ na-enweghị atụ nke ọrịa kansa prostate n'etiti ndị isi ojii nke NCI kwadoro
Ọ bụ onye otu American Cancer Society's National Prostate Cancer Disparities Advisory Team
Odedina nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị nke Ógwù na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo (OAU) (nke a maara dị ka Mahadum Ife), Ile-Ife na 1986
N'afọ 1990, ọ malitere mmemme PhD na sayensị ọgwụ na Mahadum Florida
Ọ gụsịrị PhD
ya na 1994
Thesis PhD
ya bụ na 'Implementation of Pharmaceutical Care in Community Practice Development of a Theoretical Framework for Implementation'
Mgbe PhD
ya gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka Prọfesọ na Mahadum West Virginia
A mụrụ Odedina na Jenụwarị 21, 1965 na Abeokuta, Ogun State, Nigeria na Ezekiel Shotayo Badejogbin na Grace Modupe Badejogbi
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Lagos ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Apostolic Church Primary School na Methodist Girls High School, Lagos
Odedina bụ prọfesọ nke Medicine na Pharmacy, na Ngalaba nke Radiation Oncology na Ngalaba Pharmacotherapy & Translational Research nke Mahadum Florida
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi mmemme nke Florida-California Cancer Research, Education and Engagement (CaRE2) Health Equity Center- a National Cancer Institute kwadoro onyinye U54
Ọrụ sayensị Odedina lekwazịrị anya na mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa, ihe na-ekpebi gburugburu ebe obibi nke ọdịiche nke ọrịa kansa prostate
Ọ na-eme nyocha banyere ịghọta ihe na-egosi ọdịiche dị n'etiti ndị isi ojii na nyocha nke itinye aka n'omume iji melite nsogbu ahụ
Ọ duziri ihe karịrị ọrụ nyocha iri atọ gbasara ọrịa kansa prostate
N'afọ 2006, ọ natara Fulbright Specialists Program iji nyochaa usoro akụkọ gbasara ọrịa kansa na Naịjirịa
Ọ duziri ọrụ nyocha ọrịa kansa nke mba mbụ na usoro akụkọ data ọrịa kansa na Naịjirịa ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị isi dere atụmatụ mbụ nke National Cancer Control Plan (NCCP) nke Naịjirịa
Odedina enyewo ihe karịrị ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị Afrịka puku ato
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Nnyocha maka African Organisation for Research and Training in Cancer (AORTIC)
N'afọ 2017, e nyere ya Carnegie African Diaspora Fellowship iji rụọ ọrụ na ihe ize ndụ nke ọrịa kansa prostate na mmepe nke oncology clinical clinical trial virtual platforms na Mahadum Cape Town

N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na SciDev na afo 2020, Odedina kwuru na ọ nwere ịkpa ókè nwoke na nwanyị, mgbe otu prọfesọ nwanyị gwara ya na ọ gaghị enwe ike ịmecha mmemme ngụsị akwụkwọ ya n'ihi alụmdi na nwunye na ime ime ime n'oge ụlọ akwụkwọ ngụsị akwụkwọ

Ọ bụ onye isi nchọpụta nke Prostate Cancer Transatlantic Consortium (CaPTC), otu United States National Institute of Health / National Cancer Institute kwadoro nke nwere ihe karịrị ndị otu ụlọ ọrụ iri ise na ebe nyocha na Afrika, Europe, Ugwu Amerika na Caribbean

Ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye maka onyinye ya na sayensị na ọdịiche ahụike, onyinye ya gụnyere Leadership Award for Health Disparities site na American Society of Health-Systems Pharmacy na Association of Black Health-S System Pharmacists na 2009,Inspiring Women in STEM Award 2016 site na INSIGHT Into Diversity, Living Legend Award site na Clinical Trial Summit na 2017, William Award for Innovation in Cancer Care site na African Organisation for Research and Training in Cancer (AORTIC) 2017
Folakunle Oshun (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1984 na Ibadan ) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe n'oge a, onye na-akpụ ihe na onye nlekọta
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye nduzi nke Lagos Biennal, otu nzukọ nke na-enye ụzọ maka mkparta ụka na mmepe nke nka Afrịka nke oge a
E gosipụtara ọrụ Oshun n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi obodo na mba ụwa
A mụrụ Folakunle Oshun ma zụlite ya na Ibadan Oyo State, Nigeria
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Lagos, ebe ọ gụrụ BA
na Fine Arts (2004 -2007) na MA
Onye nlekọta ahọpụtara
Folarin bụ aha Yoruba nke sitere na Yoruba pụtara 'ṅa-eje ije ṅa akụ na ụba'
Ndị ama ama nwere aha ahụ gụnyere
Ndị bịara Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife, OSun state, Nigeria Nigerian Estate Surveyor and Valuer
Onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria na mmepe azụmaahịa / onye ndụmọdụ IT
Ọkà okwu n'ihu ọha na onye ndụmọdụ teknụzụ
Folasade Tolulope Ogunsola (amụrụ n'afọ 1958) bụ onye Naijiria prọfesọ nke microbiology ahụike, na onye osote -ahọrọ nke Mahadum Lagos
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na nchịkwa ọrịa, ọkachasị HIV / AIDS
Ogunsola bụ onye isi nke College of Medicine, Mahadum Lagos ma bụrụ onye a ma ama dị ka nwanyị mbụ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ
Ọ bụkwa osote osote onye isi oche (Ọrụ Mmepe) nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'etiti afọ 2017 na 2021
A họpụtara ya dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Mahadum Lagos na 24 Ọgọst 2020, site na ndị omeiwu mahadum ahụ
A zụlitere Ogunsola na Mahadum Ibadan ebe nna ya, Akin Mabogunje na-akụzi ihe
Dị ka nwatakịrị, ọ na-eṅomi ndị dọkịta site na iji ụmụ bebi dị ka ndị ọrịa, mgbe ọ na-enye ha nlekọta ahụike
Ọ gara Queen's College, Lagos
N'agbata afọ 1974 na afọ 1982, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na Mahadum Ife
na nzere masta na College of Medicine, Mahadum Lagos, wee gaa n'ihu maka nzere doctorate ya na Machịum Wales n'agbata 1992 na 1997
Ogunsola bụ onye na-anọchite anya osote onye isi nke Mahadum Lagos maka obere oge na 2020 mgbe Mahadum ahụ banyere na nsogbu n'ihi mwepụ nke osote onyeisiala site na Kansụl Mahadum
Ọ bụkwa osote osote onye isi oche (Ọrụ Mmepe) nke Mahadum ahụ, ọkwá ọ nọrọ na mbụ tupu ọ rịgoro n'ọkwa onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Tupu ọ bụrụ osote osote onye isi ala, ọ bụ onye isi nke College of Medicine, Mahadum Lagos
Mpaghara nyocha ya lekwasịrị anya na nhazi na nchịkwa nke ọrịa nje, ọkachasị HIV
Ọ bụ onye isi nchọpụta na AIDS Prevention Initiative na Nigeria (APIN) na Mahadum Lagos
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Nchịkwa Ọrịa nke Ụlọ Ọgwụ Mmụta Mahadum Lagos
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke National Association of Colleges of Medicine na Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2018, o gosipụtara nchegbu banyere mgbochi na nchịkwa ọrịa na Naịjirịa
Ọ chọpụtara ịdị ọcha na iji ọgwụ nje eme ihe n'ụzọ gabigara oke dị ka omume na-akwalite mgbochi ọgwụ nje

N'inye ngwọta, o kwusiri ike na 'a ga-ewu ihe owuwu na mmemme mgbochi na njikwa ọrịa (IPC) gburugburu usoro isi ihe nke gụnyere ntuziaka, ọzụzụ, nlekota, atụmatụ multimodal maka itinye IPC, nlekocha na nyocha n'etiti ndị ọzọ'

N'ikwu okwu n'oge nnọkọ ya na ndị mgbasa ozi, ọ kọwara na ihe ngwọta iji belata ọnụ ọgụgụ enweghị ọrụ 58% bụ maka ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Naijiria ịmalite ịmepụta echiche ndị ga-eme ka ndụ mmadụ dịkwuo mma
O kwukwara na ihe ọmụma n'onwe ya ezughị ezu, mana itinye ya n'ọrụ n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị iji mee ka ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ ka mma ma bulie ndụ ndị ọzọ bụ ihe ndị ntorobịa kwesịrị ichegbu onwe ha
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Naijiria Otu maka Ọrịa njikwa na 1998 ma bụrụkwa onye otu Global Infection Prevention and control Network
A họpụtara ya dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Mahadum Lagos na August 24, 2020, site na ndị omeiwu mahadum na-esote nsogbu dị n'etiti onye isi oche, Maazị Wale Babalakin na osote onyeisi oche, Prọfesọ
Oluwatoyin Ogundipe Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ ịbụ osote onye isi na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mahadum ahụ
Folashade Abigeal Abugan (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị 17 n’ime onwa Disemba nke afọ 1990) bu nwanyi Naijiria na-eme egwuregwu ị gba ọsọ nke mita 400
Ọ bụ ya ritere ọla nchara ahụ n'ọsọ nke mita 400 na 2007 All-Africa Games ma kwalite na nrite ọla ọcha na 2008 African Championship, ebe ọ setịpụrụ oge kachasị mma nke 5089 sekọnsụ
O meriri nrite ọla edo na World Junior Championship nke afọ 2008 ma na asọmpi 2009 African Junior Athletics Championships
Ọ pụtara na 2010 Commonwealth Games na Delhi were nweta nrite ọla ọcha abụọ nye Naịjirịa n'ọsọ mita 400 ma n'ọsọ mita 4x400
Kosiladị, a chụpụrụ ya ma machibido ya mgbe ọ dachara ule ọgwụ ike were gosi na ọ gbara testosterone prohormone na nlele 'A' ya
Ọ hapụrụ ikike ka e nyochaa nlele B ya
Folashade Adefisayo bụ onye na-enwe mmasị n'agụmaakwụkwọ na nkuzi, ọ bụ ya bụ kọmishọna nke Lagos State Ministry of Education
Ọ gara mahadum nke Ibadan ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na Zoology
Ka oge na-aga, ọ gara mahadum Lagos State ebe o nwetara akara ugo mmụta Master na Business Administration ma gaakwa mahadum Nottingham, bụ ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta masters ọzọ na Education

Folashade malitere ihe omume iji kwalite ụmụ akwụkwọ na Kọmputa Base Test (CBT), ka e nwechara ogologo oge mkpọchi COVID-19 na Lagos State, ihe omume a ga-akwalite ihe dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ dị nde 15 n'ofe Lagos State na Nigeria
O nyekwara iwu ka ebugoo ụmụ akwụkwọ Lagos gaa na klas ọzọ site n'ịtụle nwale ha(CA Test)
Folashade bụ onye a mụrụ ma zụlite na Lagos na Ibadan nke Nigeria ; ọ bụ onye mbụ n'ime mmadụ ise a mụrụ n'ezinụlọ ya, ọ na-enwekwa mmasị ịgụ akwụkwọ na ime njem
Folashade Alice Oluwafemiayo (onye amụrụ na uboch nke iri na otu nke Machị 1985) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme egwuregwu Paralympic
A mụrụ Oluwafemiayo na Jos, ọ lụrụ nwoke na-eme egwuregwu paralympic, onye ya na ya nwere otu nwa
N'afọ 2012, Oluwafemiayo ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na 75kg nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2012 Summer Paralympicsna-emebi ihe ndekọ ụwa na usoro ahụ
O nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla edo na asọmpi ndị na-ebuli ike nke do mba Uwa na 2017 na Mexico
Otú ọ dị, a kwụsịtụrụ ya otu afọ ka e mesịrị maka imebi iwu mgbochi ọgwụ ọjọọ
N'afọ 2021, o ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na ihe omume ya na asọmpi ndi nebuli ike nke emere na Tbilisi, Georgia na 2021
N'ihe omume a, o setịpụkwara ihe ndekọ ụwa ọhụrụ nke 1525 kilogram
Folashade Omoniyi, nke a makwaara dị ka Shade Omoniayi (amụrụ na Machị 26, 1968), bụ ṅwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye isi oche nke Kwara State Internal Revenue Service
Ọ bụbu MD / CEO nke FBN Mortgages Limited, nke bụ enyemaka nke First Bank of Nigeria
A mụrụ Folashade na Kano, Naijirịa na Machị 26, 1968
Ọ gara St Clare's Girls Grammar School na Offa, Nigeria maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
O nwere nzere Bachelor of Engineering (Honours) na Mahadum Ilorin na Masters in Business Administration (MBA) na Machịum Obafemi Awolowo, Ile-Ife, na 2001
Ọ gakwara mmemme agụmakwụkwọ ndị isi na Michigan Ross, London Business School, Stanford Business School na Lagos Business School
Folashade malitere ọrụ ya dị ka injinia na ụlọ ọrụ IT site na 1990 ruo 1997 tupu ọ banye n'ụlọ akụ mba Afrịka ebe ọ bụ Oṅye isi IT & Systems Administration
N'afọ 2001, ọ sonyeere First Bank of Nigeria ebe ọ malitere dị ka Head Networks & Communication Management wee si na IT banye na mmepe azụmaahịa
Ọ bilitere site na osote onye isi njikwa gaa na osote nnukwu njikwa na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche site ṅa mmepe azụmaahịa ruo na ahịa mkpọsa, ngalaba ọha na eze na ọrụ ụlọ akụ alaka
Mgbe ọ ruru n'ọkwa nke ọrụ ụlọ akụ ya, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa / onye isi oche nke ụlọ akụ mbụ nke Nigeria FBN Mortgages Limited na 2016 mgbe afọ iri na ise gachara ṅa ụlọ akụ ahụ
Ọ nọrọ n'ọkwa a ruo afọ atọ wee hapụ ya iji gaa ṅ'ihu na-enye ndụmọdụ na IT na nkwukọrịta
N'Ọctoba 1, 2019, Gọvanọ nke Kwara State, AbdulRahman AbdulRasaq họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke Kwara Steeti Internal Revenue Service na kọmitii nwere ihe karịrị 50% ụmụ nwanyị

Folashade bụ onye otu National Institute of Marketing (NIM) nke Nigeria, Chartered Institute of Taxation nke Nigeria, onye otu nsọpụrụ nke Chartered Institute nke Bankers (HCIB) nke Nigeria ma bụrụkwa Cisco Certified Network Professional, Cisco Certified network Associate na Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer
Folashade Omoniyi lụrụ Biodun Omoniyi ma nwee ụmụ
Folashade Sherifat Jaji (amụrụ na 10 Machị 1957) bụ onye Naijirịa na-emepụta kemịkal, onye ọrụ gọọmentị na odeakwụkwọ nke Gọọmentị Lagos
Ọ bụbu onye isi ọrụ na Lagos State, ọfịs ọ rụrụ mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, Lagos State Ministry of Establishments, Training and Pensions

A mụrụ Sherifat na Machị 3, 1957 na Surulere, obodo ukwu nke Lagos State, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Nigeria
Ọ gara Anglican Girls Primary School na Surulere, lagos tupu ọ gaa Queen's College na Yaba, ebe ọ nwetara asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West Africa na 1974

Ọ natara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Mahadum ṅke Ibadan, ebe a zụrụ ya dị ka onye na-emepụta kemịkal tupu ya edebanye aha maka Post Graduate Diploma na Public Administration na Administrative Staff College of Nigeria mgbe ọ gụsịrị otu afọ Youth Service na Nigerian Breweries
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1985, ọ gara Mahadum Lagos ebe ọ nwetara ṅzere Master of Business Administration na 1989

Ọ sonyeere ndị ọrụ gọọmentị nke steeti Lagos na 27 Ọktoba 1980 na kọmitii ọrụ ikpe nke steeti tupu e zigara ya n'ọfịs gọvanọ steeti, Ngalaba ṅke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ebe ọ jere ozi afọ abụọ, n'etiti 1980 na 1982, n'otu afọ ahụ ka ọ natara ọrụ na kọm ọrụ gọọmentụ steeti ebe ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ ọzọ tupu ọ laghachi n'ọfesọ Gọ Gọ Agha na Ngalaba mmemme na mmefu ego ebe ọ nọrọ ọnwa asaa, n'agbata afọ 1985 na 1992
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2008, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, Ụlọ Ọrụ Nkụzi na Ezumike ṅká, ọkwá ọ nọrọ afọ anọ
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2011, ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, Ministri nke Ụlọ Ọrụ, Ọzụzụ na Pensions nke Lagos State
N'abalị iri na asaa ṅ'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2015, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi ọrụ nke steeti Lagos iji nọchie Josephine Oluseyi Williams, onye bụ onye isi ọrụ iri na asaa nke ọrụ ọha na eze steeti
Na 30 Mee 2019, Gọvanọ Lagos Steeti Babajide Sanwo-Olu họpụtara Jaji dị ka odeakwụkwọ ọhụrụ nke Gọọmentị Steeti (SSG)

Folashade Mejabio Yemi-Esan CFR (née Mejabi; amụrụ n'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1964), bụ onye ọrụ gọọmentị Naijirịa na onye isi Civil service of the federation, kemgbe ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwarị n'afọ 2020
Onye isi ala Naịjirịa, Muhammadu Buhari ṅụrụ iyi na 4 Machị 2020
A mụrụ Yemi-Esan na Kaduna Steeti, Naijirịa
Ọ si Ikoyi, Ijumu, Kogi State
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Bishop Smith School, Ilorin ma gaa Federal Government College, Ilorin maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Ibadan, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1987 dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mma maka ịwa ezé
O mechara nweta asambodo na atụmatụ ahụike na njikwa, tupu ọ nweta nzere masta na nchịkwa ọha na eze na nke mba ụwa
Yemi-Esan malitere ọrụ ya na Federal Ministry of Health na Naijirịa, tupu e bulie ya n'ọkwa onye nduzi

N'oge ọ nọ na ngalaba ahụike, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta West Africa Health Organisation (WAHO), onye nhazi nke ahụike ọnụ na mmemme ụlọ akwụkwọ na onye nduzi nke nyocha na ọnụ ọgụgụ atụmatụ ahụike

N'afọ 2012, e buliri ya n'ọkwa odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide nke Federal, na-eje ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ na na-adịkarị adịgide nke Service Policy and Strategy Office nke Onye isi ọrụ gọọmentị nke gọọmentị etiti, Federal Ministry of Information and Culture, Federal Ministry nke Education na Federal Ministry of Petroleum Resources

N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2019, onye isi ala Naijirịa, Muhammadu Buhari, họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-anọchite anya onye isi ọrụ gọọmentị nke gọọmentị, na-anọchi Winifred Ekanem Oyo-Ita
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2020, e mere ya onye isi ọrụ gọọmentị na-adịgide adịgide nke gọọmentị etiti ahụ ma ṅụọ iyi n'ọkwa n'ụbọchị anọ n'ọnwokusatu afọ 2020
Folayemi 'Fo' Debra Wilson bụ onye America na-ese ihe, onye na-ese onyinyo, na onye nchịkwa agụmakwụkwọ
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta oche na onye na-eme ihe, onye na-ese ihe, onye ọrụ mgbidi, na onye na'ihe osise
Wilson bụ onye isi oche mbụ maka ịnweta na ikpe ziri ezi na Penn State College of Arts and Architecture
Wilson nwere nzere MBA na Mahadum New York Stern School of Business, na nzere MFA (2005) na imewe ụlọ site n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Rhode Island School of Design (RISD)
Na mmalite ọrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise, onye nduzi nka, na onye nduzi okike
Wilson rụrụ ọrụ maka magazin Essence na YSB
N'afọ 1984, a kpọrọ Wilson onye nduzi nka nwanyị mbụ na magazin Essence
N'afọ 1991, o guzobere Studio W, ụlọ ọrụ na-ese ihe osise, na-ewulite ahụmịhe ọkachamara ya site na ọrụ nke ụlọọrụ magazin
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2016, ya na Norman Teague guzobere blkHaUS Studios, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe na Chicago
Ọrụ ha na-elekwasị anya na omume ọha na eze, iji mee ka oghere ọha na eze na Chicago bụrụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị

Ọrụ Back Alley Jazz nke blkHaUS Studios rụrụ ọrụ iji mee ka ọdịbendị jazz na omenala dị na Chicago na 1960s na 1970s; ha kpọkọtara ndị egwu obodo, ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri iji wuo ihe omume na oghere arụmọrụ
N'afọ 1995, Renee Cox, Fo Wilson, na Tony Cokes mepụtara Negro Art Collective (NAC) iji lụso ọdịbendị na-ezighị ezi banyere ndị ojii America ọgụ

N'afọ 2008, Wilson wuru ihe ngosi sayensị nke senchiri nke iri na itoolu na-echeta Sartje Baartman (nke a makwaara dị ka 'The Hottentot Venus') n'oge obibi na School of Art + Design na SUNY / Purchase

Ihe owuwu ya na 2016 Eliza's Peculiar Cabinet of Curiosities, bụ ụlọ e wuru, zuru oke, senchiri nke ịrị na itoolu, akụkọ ifo, ụlọ ohu nwere ụlọ ọrụ na-adọrọ mmasị jupụtara na ihe otu narị nke ihe nwanyị Africa America nke oge a nwere ike inwe ma ọ bụ rọrọ nrọ inwe

Eliza's Peculiar Cabinet of Curiosities bụ ọrụ na-aga n'ihu, Afrofuturist ma jiri ya mee ihe dị ka ebe maka ihe omume na arụmọrụ ndị metụtara ya; na ngosi na 2016 ruo 2017 na Lynden Sculpture Garden na Milwaukee, Wisconsin
N'afọ 2019, e nyere ya ọrụ ịmepụta nka ọha maka Chicago Transit Authority (CTA) n'ime ọdụ Damen Green Line e wuru ọhụrụ
Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta ihe ngosi nka na Cooper Hewitt, Smithsonian Design Museum
Wilson jere ozi na bọọdụ nke American Craft Council (ACC)
N'ọnwa Julaị 2021, a họpụtara Wilson dị ka onye isi oche mbụ maka ịnweta na ikpe ziri ezi na Penn State College of Arts and Architecture
Ọ bụbu onye nduzi nke agụmakwụkwọ dị iche iche, ikpe ziri ezi na itinye aka na Columbia College Chicago
Folorunsho Alakija (amụrụ 15 Julaị 1951) bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego Naijiria nwere ego ruru ijeri kwuru ijeri na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịmma mmadụ
Ọ na-etinye aka na ejiji, mmanụ, ezigbo ala na ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ

Ọ bụ onye isi nke otu The Rose of Sharon Group nke ụlọọrụ ndị mejupụtara ya gụnyere The Rose of Sharon Prints & Promotions Limited, Digital Reality Prints Limited na osote onye isi oche nke Famfa Oil Limited
Alakija nwekwara nnukwu oke na DaySpring Property Development Company
Folorunsho Alakija bụ onye Forbes họpụtara dị ka nwanyị kacha baa ọgaranya na Nigeria nke nwere ihe onwunwe ruru otu ijeri dollar n'afọ 2020

Dị ka n'afọ 2015, e depụtara Alakija dị ka nwanyị nke abụọ kachasị ike na Africa ebe Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala bu nwanyị nke mbụ kasị ike, e deputakwara ya dika nwanyị nke iri asatọ na asaa kasị ike n'ụwa site na-akụkọ Forbes
A mụrụ Alakija na 15 Julaị 1951 na ezinụlọ elu-n'etiti; nna ya bụ Chief L
Ogbara nke Ikorodu, Lagos State
Alakija gara akwụkwọ ọta akara ya na Our Ladies of Apostles, Lagos site na 1955 ruo 1958
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, Alakija gara United Kingdom ịga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Dinorben School for Girls na Hafodunos Hall na Llangernyw, Wales site na 1959 rue 1963
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya, Alakija gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ndị okpukpe alakuba na Sagamu, Ogun State, Nigeria
Ọ mèchàrà laghachi na England maka akwụkwọ odeakwụkwọ ya na Pitman's Central College, London
Alakija malitere ọrụ ya na 1974 dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu na Sijuade Enterprises, Lagos, Nigeria obere oge ka ọ gụchara akwụkwọ odeakwụkwọ na Pitman's Central College London
Ọ kwagara na National Bank of Chicago, nke mechara bụrụ FinBank nke ndi nwe ya ugbu a bu FCMB (First City Monument Bank) dị ka Secretary Executive na onye isi nchịkwa

Ọ ghọrọ onye isi ọhụrụ nke ngalaba na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ nke International Merchant Bank of Nigeria (nke bụbu First National Bank of Chicago), ma mechaa bụrụ onye enyemaka nke ụlọọrụ na ngalaba nchekwa ego

N'oge na-adịghị anya ka ọ rụchara ọrụ na ụlọ akụ nke were afọ iri na abụọ, Alakija welitere ihe ịma aka ọhụrụ nke oke mmasị ya nwere maka Ejiji kpaliri ịmụ imepụta ejiji na The American College na London nakwa Central School of Fashion
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na Nigeria, ọ malitere ụlọọrụ ejiji mbụ ya nke a na-akpọ Supreme Stitches, bụ nke e mechara kpọgharịa Rose Of Sharon House of Fashion na 1996
N'ime afọ ole na ole, dị ka Rose of Sharon House of Fashion, ọ ghọrọ aha ezinụlọ
Dị ka onye isi ala na onye nlekọta ogologo ndụ nke Fashion Designers Association of Nigeria (FADAN), ọ hapụrụ akara a na-apụghị ịgbagha agbagha, na-akwalite omenala Naijiria site na ejiji na ụdị
Na May 1993, Alakija tinyere akwụkwọ ka e wee kenye ikikere nke ịchọ mmanụ (OPL)
Enyere ụlọ ọrụ Alakija a kpọrọ Famfa Limited akwụkwọ ikike ịchọ mmanụ n'oke ala ruru 617,000 acres nke a na-akpọ OPL 216 ugbu a

Ihe mgbochi a dị ihe dịka kilomita narị atọ na ịrị ise (mailu narị abụọ na ịrị abụọ) na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Lagos na kilomita otu narị na iri (mailu iri asaa) n'ụsọ osimiri Nigeria na Ubi Agbami nke etiti Niger Delta

Na Septemba 1996, Alakija banyere nkwekọrịta ya na Star Deep Water Petroleum Limited (onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ Texaco ) ma họpụta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ teknụzụ maka nyocha nke ikike, na-ebufe pasent iri anọ nke ihe oke ya na Star Deep
Ka ha gwuputachara mmanụ, gọọmentị Naijiria kwuru na ha nwere pasent iri anọ wee tinyere pasent iri ọzọ
Arụmụka gọọmentị kwuru bụ na ọ bụrụ na ahapụ Alakija na ezinụlọ ha ka ha nọrọ n'òtù ahu ha ga na-akpata nde dollar iri kwa ụbọchị
Alakija rụrụ ụka nke a wee merie
Dị ka n'afọ 2014, e depụtara Alakija dị ka nwanyị nke irí itoolu na isii kachasị ike n'ụwa dika Forbes si kwuo
Na May 2015, ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria abụọ, edeputa Minista na-ahụ maka ego, Ngozi okonjo-Iweala na Alakija n'ime ụmụ nwanyị otu narị kachasị ike n'ụwa dịka Forbes si kwuo
Ọ bụ onye nke irí asatọ na isii na ndepụta ahụ

Alakija bụ onye nke irí abụọ na 2020 ndepụta ndi nwere ego ha ruru nde na Africa n'afọ 2020 nke ewepụtara na 2021, ma bụrụkwa onye nke otú puku na na narị itoolu na iri anọ na otu ndi ego ha rụrụ nde n'afọ 2019 nke ebiputara nakwa onye nke irí asatọ na ụmụ nwanyị kasị ike n'afọ 2016 nke ebiputara na 2017
Na 17 Julaị 2021, Mahadum Benson Idahosa, Benin City nyere ya nzere Doctorate Degree na nchịkwa azụmahịa
Nke a bụ n'ihi ntinye aka ya na ụwa azụmahịa
Alakija guzobere Rose of Sharon Foundation nke na-enyere ụmụ nwanyị di ha nwụrụ na ụmụ mgbei aka site na ịnye ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu nakwa site n'onyinye azụmahịa
Alakija enyela ụlọ ọrụ mmụta nkà na ụzụ na Yaba College of Technology (Yabatech), ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu dị na Lagos
Alakija lụrụ onye ọka iwu, Modupe Alakija nke ezinụlọ Adeyemo Alakija, na Nọvemba 1976
Ha bi na Lagos, Nigeria, ha na ụmụ ha nwoke anọ na ụmụ ụmụ ha
Nwa nwanne ya bụ DJ Xclusive
Na June 2017, nwa Folorunso Folarin Alakija, lụrụ onye Iran na-eme ihe nlereanya aha ya bu Nazanin Jafarian Ghaissarifar na agbamakwụkwọ weere ọnọdụ na Blenheim Palace na England
Ada Afoluwake Ogunkeye (amuru Nọvemba 25, 1986) nke amara dika Folu Storms, bu onye mgbasa ozi na redio Naijiria, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-akwuputa ihe, na onye na-ekiri ihe onyonyo
A mụrụ Storms na Aguda, Surulere, Lagos steeti

Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Corona VI, wee mụọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na mbụ na The Lagoon Secondary School, mecha ga St Leonards Mayfield na UK wee gaa Mahadum Aberystwyth ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ maka nzere bachelọ iwu (LLB) n'etiti 2005 na 2008Storms mechara debanye aha na Mahadum Bristol maka Nna-ukwu nke Iwu ya (LLM) na 2009
Storms nwere diplọma na Broadcast Journalism si Pan-African University
Storms malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu, tupu ọ malite na redio 923 Inspiration fm na 2012
Ọ gbara asọmpi maka nchọ VJ nke MTV Base Africa ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị asọmpi atọ

Ndị ụlọ ọrụ Naijiria Ndani TV mechara were Storms kwụọ ya ụgwọ dị ka onye na-eweta ihe ngosi na onye na-emepụta ọdịnaya ebe o mepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ New Africa nke ahọpụtara maka ihe nrite akwụkwọ kacha mma na 2016 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
O mere ihe ngosi nri ụtụtụ na Smooth 981FM dị na Lagos ma na-eme nke a rụọ 2019
Storms meriri 2017 Ebony Life TV Sisterhood Awards maka Onye ngodi onyonyo nke afọ ihe nrite 2018 On-Personality maka onyinye ọdịnihu na ELOY Awards

Ọrụ nke 'Sope' gụnyere mgbe ọ banyere na obere usoro akpọrọ MTV Shuga Alone Together na-akọwapụta nsogbu nke Coronavirus na Eprel 2020Tunde Aladese dere usoro a ma mgbasa ozi abalị niile, ndị na-akwado ya gụnyere World Health Organization
Usoro a dabere na Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya na Côte d'Ivoire na akụkọ a na-aga n'ihu site na iji mkparịta ụka ịntanetị na ọnọdụ n'etiti mkpụrụedemede
Ihe etemeete niile na ihe nkiri bụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri mere Ndi gunyere Lerato Walaza, Mamarumo Marokane, na Jemima Osunde
Foluke Daramola-Salako bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na- eme ihe nkiri
A họpụtara ya maka onyinye ihe nkiri Africa Movie Academy for Best Actress in a Supporting Role n'afọ 2013
A mụrụ Daramola n'ụbọchị nke 15 n'ọnwa Febụwarị
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Obafemi Awolowo
N’afọ 1998, o mere ihe nkiri izizi ya n’ime ihe nkiri usoro a kpọrọ Palace
Ọ pụakwara na Durodola na Above Law
N'afọ 2016, a kọrọ na nwa ya nwanyị bụ onye nhazi nke ihe ngosi onyonyo
O kwuru na ihe nkiri ahụ sitere n'ahụmahụ ya, n'ihi na ndị mụrụ ya achọghị ka ya tinye aka na ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye bidoro 'Action Against Rape in Africa', bu atụmatụ nke na acho i gbochi ị wakpo mmadụ n'ike, ma mee ka ndi kpara agwa a n'Afrika gaa mkpọrọ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke afọ 2016, o kpughere na e dinara ya n'ike mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Tribune, ọ kọwara na ụmụ nwanyị kwesịrị ị ma uru ha bara na ị dabere na di ha maka ego
O kwuru na tigbuo-zọgbuo n'ezinụlọ bụ mbibi ka ukwuu n'ụlọ ya, karịa ekwesịghị ntụkwasị obi
N’afọ 2017, o kwuru n’ihu ọha maka ịdị umeala n’obi nke Aliko Dangote, na-akọwa ya dịka “onye kacha umeala n’obi n’ụwa ”

Na mkparịta ụka nke ọnwa Maachị nke afọ 2018 na The Punch (Legọs, Naijiria), Daramola-Salako kwuru na ya na-ele nnukwu ara ya anya dị ka akụ na ụba ọ bụghị ọbụbụ ọnụ “Ihe mbụ na-adọrọ mmasị ọtụtụ ndị nwoke na-abịakwute m na-abụkarị ihe mmekọahụ
Ha na-ahụ nnukwu ara m, ọ na-akpali ha ozugbo
Mana dika mmadu, Agaghị m eso nwoke ọ bụla pụọ n'ihi na mmasị ha na-adọrọ m n'ihi na a maara m na ọ bụ ihe nkịtị
N'ebe m nọ, ụmụ nwanyị kwesịrị ị kwụsị ịhụ 'akụ' ndị a dị ka nsogbu ma were ha dị ka ngọzi
Ọ bụ naanị site n’ime otú ahụ ka ha ga-ama etu ha ga-esi na-ebu onwe ha nke ọma
Ha kwesịrị i bu onwe ha nke ọma, ka ihere ghara ime ha
Foluke Atinuke Gunderson (née Akinradewo; amụrụ n'Oktober 5, n'afọ 1987) bụ onye na-egwu volleyball n'ime ụlọ nke na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye na-egbochi etiti maka klọb Japan Hisamitsu Springs
A mụrụ ya na Canada, ọ na-anọchite anya United States na mba ụwa

Gunderson meriri ọla edo na ndị otu mba afọ 2010 FIVB World Grand Prix, 2014 World Championship, Rimini Volleyball Nations League, afọ 2020 Tokyo Summer Olympics, ọlaọcha afọ 2012 London Summer Olympics, na ọla nchara na afọ 2016 Rio Olympic Games
Mmeri ya n'egwuregwu Olimpik nke afọ 2020 nyere ya ohere mezue ihe nrite ọla nchara, ọlaọcha, na ọla edo nke Olimpik
A mụrụ Gunderson na London, Ontario, na Ayoola na Comfort Akinradewo
Ụmụnne ya bụ Folu na Foluso Akinradewo
Ọ nwere ụmụ amaala atọ na Canada, Nigeria na United States, ma na-ege ntị maka mgbasa ozi mgbe ọ dị obere
Gunderson gara St
Thomas Aquinas High School na Fort Lauderdale, Florida, ebe ọ bụ onye mmeri akwụkwọ ozi afọ atọ na volleyball ma nọrọkwa na basketball na track & field teams
Ọ bụ onye nhọpụta All-American n'afọ 2003 na afọ 2004 na nhọpụta steeti niile n'afọ 2002, 2003 na afọ 2004
A kpọrọ ya onye egwuregwu Volleyball nke afọ na Florida Dairy Farmers n'afọ 2005
Na mgbakwunye na volleyball, ọ bụ onye a họọrọ na steeti niile na basketball ma bụrụ onye mmeri Florida State ugboro anọ na track
O mere US mba mbụ ya tupu mmalite nke afọ ọhụrụ ya na Stanford
O nyere mba US aka imeri afọ 2004 NORCECA Continental Women's Junior Championship, wee bụrụ onye na-amalite n'etiti na US
Women's junior National Team na 2005 FIVB World Championships
Gunderson gụrụ akwụkwọ na Biology nke mmadụ na Mahadum Stanford
Dị ka onye ọhụrụ n'afọ 2005, a kpọrọ ya Pac-10 Freshman of the Year na American Volleyball Coaches Association (AVCA) Pacific Region Freshman nke Afọ
A kpọrọ ya AVCA Second Team All-American ma duzie ndị otu ahụ na pasentị ịkụ (397), akara nke atọ na Pac-10, nke 13 na mba ahụ na nke atọ maka otu oge na akụkọ ihe mere eme ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 2006, a kpọrọ aha ya na NCAA Final Four All-Tournament Team ka ọ na-eduga Stanford na NCAA Division I nke abụọ na Nebraska
N'afọ ahụ, AVCA na Volleyball Magazine kpọrọ ya First Team All-American
N'afọ 2007, a kpọrọ Gunderson AVCA National Player of the Year ma bụrụ onye mmeri Honda Sports Award maka volleyball
Ọ mebiri Pac-10 na Stanford otu oge na-akụ pasentị ndekọ site na ihe karịrị akara 50, ebe ọ na-enweta pasentị499, akara nke mbụ na mba ahụ na nke abụọ kemgbe ewepụtara rally-scoring na 2001
A kpọrọ ya aha na Final Four All-Tournament Team ka ọ na-eduga Stanford na nke abụọ n'usoro Division I nke mba na-esote na Penn State
Dị ka onye okenye na afọ 2008, Gunderson kwughachiri dị ka Pac-10 Player of the Year ma nweta nhọpụta Honda Award nke atọ n'usoro
Ọ kwughachiri dị ka onye otu mbụ All-American ma duru Stanford gaa egwuregwu nke atọ n'usoro NCAA
Ọ gwụchara ọrụ kọleji ya na arụmọrụ kachasị mma (446) nke onye ọ bụla NCAA Division I
Gunderson sonyeere Toyota Auto Body Queenseis n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2010
Na afọ 2010 1910 VPremier League, a kpọrọ Gunderson onye mmeri nke onyinye Spike
Gunderson meriri nrite ọlaọcha na 2012 FIVB Club World Championship, na-egwuri egwu na klọb Azerbaijan Rabita Baku
N'afọ 2013, klọb Gunderson, Rabita Baku, meriri Azerbaijan Super League Championship na-emeri nke isii ha n'usoro
O meriri ihe nrite Best Spiker nke league
Gunderson sonyere Team USA n'afọ 2012 Summer Olympics
O nwetara ihe nrite ọlaọcha maka mbọ ọ na-agba
Gunderson so n'òtù mba USA nke meriri nrite ọla edo nke afọ 2014 World Championship mgbe ndị otu ahụ meriri China 3 South1 na egwuregwu ikpeazụ
Ọ bụ ọla edo mbụ nke USA na nke ọ bụla n'ime asọmpi volleyball atọ
Gunderson so n'òtù US na-enweta ọla nchara n'afọ 2016 Olympics
Ọ malitere egwuregwu asatọ niile
A kpọrọ aha ya na 2016 Olympic Games Dream Team na onye na-egbochi etiti
Na Mee n'afo 2021, a kpọrọ aha ya na ndị egwuregwu iri na asatọ maka asọmpi FIVB Volleyball Nations League
nke a ga-egwu na Mee 25-June 24 na Rimini, Ịtali
Ọ bụ naanị asọmpi mba ụwa dị mkpa tupu Tokyo Olympics na July
Na Juun 7, nke afọ 2021, onye isi nchịkwa US National Team Karch Kiraly kwupụtara na ọ ga-abụ akụkụ nke ndị egwuregwu Olympic iri na abụọ maka afọ 2020 Summer Olympics na Tokyo

Nri bụ ihe ọ bụla a na-eri iji nye nkwado na-edozi ahụ maka ihe dị ndụ
Nri na-abụkarị nke osisi, anụmanụ, ma ọ bụ fungal, ma nwee ihe oriri dị mkpa, dị ka carbohydrates, abụba, protein, vitamin, ma ọ dị ka mineral
Ihe dị ndụ na-eri ihe ahụ ma mkpụrụ ndụ nke ihe ahụ na-eri ya iji nye ike, mee ka ndụ dịgide, ma ọ bụ kpalie uto
Ụdị anụmanụ dị iche iche nwere omume iri nri dị iche iche nke na-egbo mkpa nke metabolism ha pụrụ iche, na-agbanwekarị iji mejupụta otu niche gburugburu ebe obibi n'ime ọnọdụ ala ụfọdụ
Ụmụ mmadụ na-eri ihe niile na-eme mgbanwe nke ukwuu ma nwee ike inweta nri n'ọtụtụ usoro okike dị iche iche
Ihe ka ukwuu n'ike nri achọrọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ nri, nke na-emepụta nri na ọrụ ugbo siri ike ma na-ekesa ya site na nhazi nri dị mgbagwoju anya na usoro nkesa nri

Usoro ọrụ ugbo a na-adabere n'ụzọ dị ukwuu na mmanụ ala, nke pụtara na usoro nri na ọrụ ugbo bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-enye aka na mgbanwe ihu igwe, na-aza ajụjụ maka ihe ruru 37% nke ngụkọta gas na-ekpo ọkụ
Usoro nri nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ọtụtụ nsogbu mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị ọzọ gụnyere nkwado, ụdị dị iche iche nke ndu, akụnụba, ụba mmadụ, inye mmiri na nchekwa nri

Ndị ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa na-ahụ maka nchekwa na nchekwa nri dị ka International Association for Food Protection, World Resources Institute, World Food Programme, Food and Agriculture Organisation, na International Food Information Council
FoodCo Nigeria Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-azụ ahịa
E guzobere ya n'afọ 1982, ọ bụ azụmahịa Naijiria zuru oke
FoodCo na-arụ ọrụ nnukwu ụlọ ahịa na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa, na mpụga Lagos Steeti, na ụlọ ahịa iri na atọ gbasara n'ofe mpaghara ahụ
N'afọ 2020, FoodCo malitere nnukwu ụlọ ahịa n'ịntanetị
Ọ malitekwara FoodCo Quick Shops, usoro ụlọ ahịa dị n'ógbè na-enye ihe oriri na ihe ndị dị n'ụlọ
Ọtụtụ ụlọ ahịa FoodCo dị n'otu ebe, na-ejikọta nnukwu ụlọ ahịa, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ebe a na-eme achịcha, na ebe ntụrụndụ
FoodCo malitere dị ka ụlọ ahịa mkpụrụ osisi na akwụkwọ nri n'afọ 1981, mana gbasaa n'ime nnukwu ụlọ ahịa otu afọ ka e mesịrị
E meghere Supermarket FoodCo mbụ na Bodija, Ibadan
N'ikpeazụ, azụmaahịa ahụ toro ịgụnye ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na-arụ ọrụ ngwa ngwa, nrụpụta na ntụrụndụ
Azụmaahịa ahụ etolitela ugbu a site na otu alaka ahụ gaa n'ọtụtụ alaka nwere ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ narị asaa
E meghere ụzọ mbu Lagos Steeti n'afọ 2019
Naanị n'afọ 2020, nwa ya nwoke Ade Sun-Basorun batara dị ka Chief Executive Officer nke FoodCo Nigeria Limited, mgbe ọ na-ewere ọnọdụ onye isi oche
FoodCo Supermarkets bụ nnukwu ụlọ ahịa na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa, na mpụga Lagos Steeti
Ọ bụkwa nke kachasị ochie n'etiti ụlọ ahịa iri kachasị elu na Naịjirịa
FoodCo Supermarkets na-arụ ọrụ n'ịntanetị nke na-enye ngwaahịa zuru oke yiri ụlọ ahịa anụ ahụ
A na-agbakwunye nnukwu ụlọ ahịa site na ọrụ nnyefe ụlọ nke malitere na 2020
FoodCo bụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Quick Service (QSR) na Naịjirịa
Ọ malitere dị ka ebe a ma ama ebe ndị mmadụ nwere ike inweta achịcha dịka doughnuts, anụ pie na anụ ọkụkọ na 80s na 90s na Ibadan
Ka afọ na-aga, azụmahịa ahụ gbanwere n'ime ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na-arụ ọrụ ngwa ngwa
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ FoodCo bụ ihe dị mkpa n'ụlọ ahịa ndị a
FoodCo Entertainment Centre na-enye ịgba chaa chaa, ụlọ egwuregwu ime ụlọ na ntụrụndụ
N'afọ 2019, Ụlọ Ntụrụndụ ahụ kwadoro asọmpi FoodCo Football Videogame Championship, nke ihe karịrị ndị asọmpi narị abụọ na iri anọ sonyere na asọmpi ahụ
FoodCo Fellowship Programme (FFP) bụ mmemme na-ewuli ikike pụrụ iche iji wulite ọgbọ na-esote ndị isi azụmaahịa iji kwalite uto na mpaghara azụmaahịa ndị Naijiria
Mmemme na-enye ọzụzụ immersive afọ abụọ na njikwa azụmaahịa na iduzi MBA na ụmụ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na-achọ ịchụso ọrụ na azụmaahịa
Onye na-ere ahịa nke afọ, 2020 Marketing Edge Brands na Advertising Excellence Awards
Ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ahịa nke Afọ, 2020 BusinessDay Nigerian Business Leaders Awards
Multigenerational Company of the Year, 2019 BusinessDay Nigerian Business Leadership Awards (Excellence in Enterprise)
Best Bread in Africa, 2019 African Brand Congress
Lagos Food Security Systems na Central Logistics Park bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ na Ketu-Ereyun, n'etiti Epe na Ikorodu
Mgbe arụchara ya, ọ ga-abụ nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nri na mpaghara Sahara Africa
A na-eme atụmatụ na ọnụ ahịa nri kwa afọ na Lagos dị ijeri USD 10
Otú ọ dị, ndị ọrụ ugbo na-efunahụ 40% nke ihe ọkụkụ a kwa ụbọchị n'ihi na enweghị akụrụngwa nchekwa mgbe owuwe ihe ubi gasịrị

Mgbe emechara, a na-atụ anya na ụlọ ọrụ nhazi ga-enye ihe karịrị nde ise ndị ahịa ego na usoro uru ọrụ ugbo, ka ọ na-ahụ na ihe karịrị nde Lagos iri ga-enye nri na-akwụsịghị akwụsị maka ọ dịkarịa ala ụbọchị iri itoolu n'oge ụkọ
A na-atụ anya na etiti nri ga-enweta nloghachi dị elu maka ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị na-etinye ego na agribusiness, bepụ ọtụtụ ndị na-anọ n'etiti ma melite ohere ịnweta nhazi na ọrụ nkwakọ ngwaahịa dị elu
A na-atụ anya na ụlọ ọrụ nhazi ga-enyere aka belata ọnụahịa nhazi ka ọ na-ahụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ na ogo nke ngwaahịa ugbo
A na-atụkwa anya na ọ ga-emeziwanye mmepụta ihe ma nye ndị ọrụ ugbo ihe dị elu site na iwepụ ọtụtụ ndị na-anọ n'etiti
A na-atụ anya na ọ ga-enye ndị ọrụ ugbo ohere ka mma maka nhazi na nkwakọ ngwaahịa nke oge a ma mepụta data bara uru maka ụlọ ọrụ gọmentị, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche
A na-atụ anya na uru ojiji sitere na ụlọ ọrụ nhazi ga-enyere gọọmentị aka ịmepụta data bara uru maka atụmatụ ọha na eze na amụma itinye ego nke onwe
Nhọrọ nke ebe dị mkpa maka ọrụ ahụ n'ihi ịdị nso ya na obodo ndị ọrụ ugbo na ịdị mfe ịnweta
A na-ewu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 12 nde square mita na Ketu-Ereyun, Epe
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga-echekwa ihe dị n'ihe karịrị ụgbọala 1 500 ma na-atụ anya na ọ ga-egbo mkpa kwa ụbọchị nke ọtụtụ iri puku ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na usoro uru nri n'afọ niile
E bidoro iwu ya n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ na afọ 2022 ma na-atụ anya na a ga-arụcha ọrụ ahụ n'ọnwarị nke anọ nke afọ 2024
Ndị otu ngbahapụ ụkwụ ( Chinese ), ma ọ bụ otu ndị na emegide nke chi ụkwụ (戒缠足会; Jiè chánzú huì ), bụ ọgbakọ obodo nke na -emegide njikọ ụkwụ na ngwụcha usoro ndị eze Qing na China
Otu a nwere mmetụta site na Ndozigharị nke narị ụbọchị nke afọ 1898
Nzukọ a bulirị ihe gbasara ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na China
Ijikọ ụkwụ bụ omenala a na -eme ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ nwanyị kamgbe n'ihe dị ka otu puku afọ na China
Nke a malitere na narị afọ nke iri
N'obodo ndị China, a na ewere ụkwụ ekere agbụ dị ka ihe mara mma na ihe na - akpali agụụ mmekọahụ

Omume a mechiri ngagharị ụmụ nwanyị, ma mgbe ụfọdụ a na -ahụ ya dị ka akara ọkwa (nwanyị ahụ agaghị na arụ ọrụ) ma ọ bụ akara nke ịbụ ihe ma ọ bụ ngwogwo nwoke (ngagharị nwanyị ahụ na epe mpe yana ọ na dabere nke ukwuu na ụmụ nwoke nọ n'ụlọ ya na imere ya ihe niile)
Mgbe Agha Opium Mbụ gasịrị, China na Britain bịanyere aka na 'Nkwekọrịta Nanking ' nke afọ 1842, nke mere ka gọọmentị Qing mepee ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ise
Ọtụtụ Ndị Kraịst bịara China wee malite imegide njikọ ụkwụ, n'ihi na ha chere na ọ bụ ịkpa oke megide ụmụ nwanyị
Na afọ 1875, ndị inyom ndị otu Kraist dị n'etiti iri isii na iri asaa n'ọnụ ọgụgụ na obodo Xiamen gara nzukọ nke onye mgbasa ozi Ktaist site n'ala ọzọ John MacGowan do were

Na ọgbakọ ahụ ka ha malitere otu akpọrọ Ụkwụ ka esi ke ya (tianzu, nke pụtara Ụkwụ Eluigwe), Ndị bụ otu a na isi bụ ndị otu akpọrọ Woman's Christian Temperance Movement nke ehiwere na afọ 1883 nke ndị mgbasa ozioma ala ọzọ gụnyere Timothy Richard kwadoro ya, onye chere na ịso ụzọ Kraịst nwere ike ịkwalite ịha nhatanha n'etiti nwoke na nwanyị
Ihe odide Richard ga -emetụta ndị na eme mgbanwe na China dị ka Kang Youwei na Liang Qichao, Ndị a bụ ndị gbaghara omume nke ịjiko ụkwụ ụmụ nwanyị
Ndozigharị nke otu narị ụbọchị nke afọ 1898 kpaliri ọtụtụ ọrụ mgbanwe ọha
Nke kacha gbasawanye bụ mmegide ijikọ ụkwụ, nke butere ntọala Otu ntọhapụ ụkwụ
Na afọ 1887, Kang Youwei na Qu Eliang guzobere 'Otu ntọhapụ ụkwụ' na Nanhai District, nke Foshan City; agbanyeghị, a gbahapụrụ ya n'ihi mmegide ọha
Na afọ 1885, Kang Youwei na nwanne ya nwoke Kang Guangrou (康广仁) guzobere 'Otu ntọhapụ ụkwụ nke Canton'
Ọ rịọrọ ụmụ ya nwanyị Kang Tongwei na Kang Tongbi ka ha hapụ ụkwụ ha dịka ọmụmaatụ
Otu a malitere imetụta ọdịbendị na obodo Guangdong
N'ọgwụgwụ afọ 1896, Wu Xinggang (吴 性 刚) hiwere 'Otu mmegide ijikọ ụkwụ' na mpaghara Hunan
Ka afọ 1897 gachara, ndị otu na nghọta maka mmegide ijikọ ụkwụ malitere ma na aba-uba ngwa ngwa
Na Shunde District nke obodo Foshan, ihe karịrị otu narị mmadụ gara nzukọ mgbochi ijikọ ụkwụ
Na June 30, e guzobere 'Otu mmegide ijikọ ụkwụ nke Shangai'
Ọ metụtara ndị ọzọ na Fuzhou, Tianjin, na Macau
Na afọ 1897, Chen Baoyi (陈保彝) kwuputara nguzobe otu ndị na -ahụ maka mmegide ijikọ ụkwụ na Changsha
N'afọ sochirinụ, Tan Sitong na Tang Caichang malitere Otu ntọhapụ ụkwụ nke Hunan
A na-ekwu na ndị otu nke ndị na-egbochi ijikọ ụkwụ ruru puku narị atọ
O nwere ike bụrụ na mpaghara ụfọdụ gbochiri ọrụ ndị a n'oge a
Ọzọ bụ na naanị ụmụ amaala mara ihe nwere nghọta maka mgbochi ijikọ ụkwụ
Mgbe mmezigharị nke otu narị ụbọchị gasịrị, mmegide maka ijikọ ụkwụ kwụsịrị
Nke mere na njigide ụkwụ bido na-aga n'ihu na-eme ebe niile
N'oge Ndozigharị Gengzi (清末新政, 庚子新政), amaliteghachiri mmemme mgbochi ụkwụ
Na afọ 1902, Empress Dowager Cixi kwupụtara mmachibido iwu maka ijikọ ụkwụ iji mee ka obi jụrụ ndị ala ọzọ, mana ewepụrụ iwu nke a obere oge ka e mesịrị
Na afọ 1905, eguzobere ndị otu Natural Feet Society (天足会) Nke a metụta ọnọdụ na ihe gbasara ijikọ ụkwụ nke ukwuu
Ndị otu a nwetara nkwado nke ọtụtụ ndị gọvanọ mpaghara dị iche iche
Gọvanọ Sichuan Cen Chunxuan bipụtara akwụkwọ puku iri ise iji kwado ihe gbasara ọnọdụ ahụ
Gọvanọ Zhili Cen Chunxuan, Gọvanọ Huguang Duanfang dekwara akụkọ na-emegide ijikọ ụkwụ
Na afọ 1904, amachibidoro ijikọ ụkwụ n'ọtụtụ ógbè, ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ gọọmentị rịọrọ ndị nwunye ha ma ọ bụ ụmụ ha nwanyị ka ha hapụ ike ụkwụ ha agbụ
Na afọ 1912, mgbe ọdịda nke usoro eze ndị Qing dara, gọọmentị China ọhụrụ machibidoro njikọ ụkwụ
A gwara ụmụ nwanyị ka ha yipụ ihe eji kechie ụkwụ ha ka a ghara igbu ha
E hiwere ọgbakọ dị iche iche iji kwado mkpochapụ nkedo ụkwụ, ma nwee nkwekọrịta n'etiti ezinụlọ ndị ga-ekwe nwa ọhụrụ nwoke na nwa nwanyị nkwa anụmdị ma ọ bụrụ na ekeghị ụkwụ nke nwanyị agbụ

Mgbe ndị Kọmunist weghaara ọchịchị na afọ 1949, ha tinyere iwu ma mmachibido njikọ ụkwụ, gụnyere mpaghara ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ ma ọ bụ nke dị n'ime ime obodo ebe elefuru anya n'oge gara aga maka mmachibido iwu nke ahụ
Nmachibido ijikọ ụkwụ ka dị irè taa na China

N'ebe Njikọ̀taọ̀hà na Kánada, ma mgbe ufodu na ala bekee, adiwi kpo ya soccer
Ibi úgwù n'ike bụ ibi úgwù nke ụmụ nwoke na ụmụaka megide uche ha
N'ihe gbasara Bible, a na-eji okwu a eme ihe karịsịa n'ihe gbasara Pọl onyeozi na esemokwu ya megide esemokwu ibi úgwù na Iso Ụzọ Kraịst oge mbụ

Ibi úgwù mmanye emeela n'ọtụtụ ọnọdụ, ọkachasị na ntọghata mmanye nke ndị na-abụghị ndị Alakụba na Islam na ibi úgwù mmanye nke ụmụnwoke Teso, Turkana na Luo na Kenya, yana ịtọrọ ụmụnwoke nọ n'afọ iri na ụma nke mba South Africa na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị a na-akpọ ibi úgwù ('ụlọ akwụkwọ ọhịa')
Na South Africa, omenala na-enye ohere ka ụmụnwoke na-asụ Xhosa na-ebighị úgwù gafere afọ ibi úgwù (ya bụ, afọ iri abụọ na ise ma ọ bụ karịa) ka ụmụnwoke ndị ọzọ merie ha ma bie ha úgwù n'ike
R1 Maccabees na-akọ akụkọ banyere otú Mattathias (ihe dị ka 166 BC) si bie ụmụ nne na nna ndị Juu hapụrụ emume ahụ úgwù
A na-agba akaebe na ndị Juu manyere ibi ndị Jentaịl úgwù site na narị afọ nke abụọ BC gaa n'ihu
Na 125 BC John Hyrcanus meriri Edom, nke ndị Rom kpọrọ Idumea; ndị Idumean wee ghọọ ndị Juu
Dị ka Josephus kọrọ, a chọrọ ibi úgwù n'aka ndị Idumean dị ka ihe ngosi nke nnabata ha n'okpukpe ndị Juu
BuNdị ọkà mmụta ekwenyeghị na nkọwa nke isi mmalite
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, Steven Weitzman kwenyere na e biri ndị Idumean úgwù n'ike n'ihi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ bụghị okpukpe
Dị ka Shaye J
Cohen si kwuo, 'Ptolemy's claim, na a manyere ndị Idumaeans ibi úgwù na ịnakwere ụzọ ndị Juu, bụ akụkọ dị mfe nke ihe ndị Idumaeans a bi n'obodo ukwu nwetara
N'oge obere ọchịchị nke ọkpara Hyrcanus, Aristobulus nke Mbụ (104-103 BC), ndị Hasmonean nwetara ikike nke Galili
N'okwu a, kwa, isi mmalite na-egosi na e bie ndị bi na ya úgwù
Ihe akaebe ihe mgbe ochie na-egosi na, n'oge a, ndị Jentaịl si Galili gbapụ iji zere ibi úgwù n'ike
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Isaac Soon ekwuola na 1 Macc 2 46 anaghị ezo aka na ibi úgwù 'site n'ike' kama na Mattathias biri úgwù 'n'ike'
Ọ na-arụ ụka na Mattathias ejighị ike bie úgwù, kama ọ maliteghachiri ibi úgwù n'etiti ndị Juu bi na Judia 'n'ike'
Ndị mba Greece na ndị mba Rome lere ibi úgwù anya dị ka mmerụ ahụ nke akụkụ ahụ nwoke, mana a naghị atụle omume ahụ na akwụkwọ edemede ndị Rom ruo na narị afọ nke abụọ nke oge Ndị Kraịst
E nwere esemokwu ibi úgwù na Iso Ụzọ Kraịst oge mbụ mana e doziri nke a na Kansụl nke Jerusalem n'ihe dị ka afọ 50 nke mere ka o doo anya na ibi úgwù nke ndị mba ọzọ ghọrọ Ndị Kraịst adịghị mkpa

Josephus (onye gbanwere nrubeisi ya site n'aka ndị Juu gaa na ndị Flavian Rom) na-akọ na ndị isi Rom abụọ gbabara na ndị Galili n'oge agha ha na Rom (n'oge 67 AD) nọ n'okpuru nrụgide ka ha gbanwee gaa n'okpukpe ndị Juu
Josephus, na-ekwupụta na 'onye ọ bụla kwesịrị ife Chineke ofufe dịka akọ na uche ya si dị,' na-ekwu na ọ zọpụtara ndị Jentaịl abụọ ahụ site na ibi úgwù mmanye
Mgbe Agha Rom na ndị Juu nke Mbụ gasịrị, a na-atụ ụtụ isi, Fiscus Judaicus, megide ndị Juu niile
Dị ka Suetonius si kwuo, Domitian (c90) tinyekwara ụtụ isi a na ndị e biri úgwù, ọ bụrụgodị na ha kwuru na ha abụghị ndị Juu
E gburu Titus Flavius Clemens n'afọ 95 maka ịnakwere omenala ndị Juu
N'afọ 96, Nerva mere ka ụtụ isi ndị Juu dị jụụ dị ka ọ na-emetụta naanị ndị na-azọrọ na ha bụ ndị Juu
N'otu oge n'etiti 128 na 132 AD, eze ukwu Hadrian yiri ka ọ machibidoro ibi úgwù nwa oge, n'ihe mgbu nke ọnwụ
Antoninus Pius hapụrụ ndị Juu na mmachibido iwu ahụ, yana ndị ụkọchukwu Ijipt, na Origen (d
253) na-ekwu na n'oge ya, ọ bụ naanị ndị Juu ka e kwere ibi úgwù
Iwu n'okpuru Constantine, eze ukwu mbụ nke Ndị Kraịst, tọhapụrụ ohu ọ bụla e biri úgwù; n'afọ 339, ibi ohu úgwù ghọrọ ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ

Ọ bụ ezie na ndị edemede mba Greece na ndị Rome na-ele ibi úgwù anya dị ka njirimara nke ndị Juu, ha kwenyere na omume ahụ sitere n'Ijipt, ma dekọọ ya n'etiti ndị ha chọpụtara dị ka ndị Arab, Siria, ndị Finishia, Colchian, na ndị Etiopia; ibi úgwù bụ akara nke 'Onye nke ọzọ'
Ndị Juu nọ ná mba ọzọ nwere ike ibi ndị ohu ha nwoke úgwù yana ụmụnwoke toro eto na ụmụnwoke ndị Juu

Dị ka Catherine Hezser si kwuo, ọ bụ ajụjụ na-emeghe ma ndị Juu nke oge ochie ezere ibi ndị ohu Jentaịl ha úgwù n'ike na ma ndị Rom ezere ire ndị Juu ndị ohu ha na mmeghachi omume na mmachibido iwu ahụ

Mishnah (nke e dekọtara n'ihe dị ka afọ 200 AD) gbachiri nkịtị na nke a, ebe Mekhilta de-Rabbi Ishmael (nke e dere na njedebe nke narị afọ nke anọ ma ọ bụ mgbe e mesịrị) na-atụ aro na ndị Juu nwere ike ịnwe ndị ohu a na-ebighị úgwù
A na-ekwughachi ntụgharị mmanye, nke gụnyere ibi úgwù mmanye, n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndị ọkà mmụta gbasara akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Islam
Ndị ọkà mmụta kwubiri na, n'oge mmeri ndị Alakụba nke Middle East na North Africa, ntọghata n'ike na Islam site na ime ihe ike ma ọ bụ iyi egwu ime ihe ike arụghị ọrụ dị mkpa
Otú ọ dị, a na-ewere ụtụ isi na ụkpụrụ na-achọ ka ndị nwere ọkwa dị elu bụrụ ndị Alakụba dị ka ụdị ntụgharị mmanye
Mgbe agha nke Pollilur nke afọ 1780 gasịrị, Haidar Ali na Tipu Sultan jidere ndị agha Britain 7,000 n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na ebe e wusiri ike nke Seringapatnam
N'ime ndị a, e biri ihe karịrị narị atọ úgwù n'ike
Cromwell Massey, onye debere akwụkwọ akụkọ nzuzo n'oge a dọọrọ ya n'agha, dere, sị 'Eji m apịtị nke ogige m tụfuo uru niile nke Onye Kraịst na onye Bekee nke bụ ma ga-abụ ebube m kachasị ukwuu
' A na-eme ka ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma a dọọrọ n'agha, na mgbakwunye na ibi úgwù, ka ha yi uwe nwanyị
James Bristow, onye agha na-eto eto, bọrọ onwe ya ọbọ site n'ibie nkịta úgwù, na-ekwere na nke a ga-emerụ mmetụta okpukpe nke ndị nche Alakụba
Atụmanya nke ntaramahụhụ egbochighị ya, n'ihi na 'ịmanye anyị ka anyị mee ihe a na-asọ oyi [bụ] omume ime ihe ike na nke obi ọjọọ, nke na ọ gaghị ekwe omume iji iwe tụgharịa uche na ya

' James Scurry, bụkwa onye mkpọrọ nke agha, kwadoro n'akwụkwọ ya, The Captivity, Sufferings, and Escape of James Scurry (1824), na e biri ndị agha Bekee, ndị Katọlik Mangalorean, na ndị mkpọrọ ndị ọzọ úgwù n'ike
N'afọ 1784, mgbe Tipu si Mangalore lọta, ọ kpọghachiri ọtụtụ iri puku ndị Katọlik Mangalorean site na Kanara ma mee ka ha bie úgwù

Dị ka Kativa Daiya si kwuo, n'oge nkewa nke India n'afọ 1947, '[f] ibi úgwù, ịkpụ ihu na ntutu isi (maka ụmụ nwoke Sikh), na ịkpụ ntutu ọdịnala Hindu Brahmin, mkpụmkpụ, ntutu isi (n'isi nkwọcha) bụ usoro ntụgharị ndị Alakụba maka ụmụnwoke na ụmụaka ndị nwoke
' Asia News kọrọ n'afọ 2004 na Kọmitii Ikpe Ziri Ezi na Udo nke Lahor kwuru okwu megide ụmụ okorobịa na-abụghị ndị Alakụba na Pakistan ka a tọghata ma bie ha úgwù megide uche ha
N'afọ 2005, Gulf Times tụlere ikpe nke ibi úgwù nke ụmụnwoke Nepal na Mumbai n'ihe gbasara ahia mmekọahụ na nnukwu obodo India
Ndị Mandae nke Iraq, ndị bi naanị na Baghdad na Basra, anaghị ebuli úgwù
Otú ọ dị, mmetụta okpukpe ha n'okwu a egbochighị ndị ọchịchị na-emegide onwe ha ido ụmụnwoke na ụmụaka ndị nwoke Mandaean ibi úgwù
Obodo ndị Mandaean, ọkachasị mgbe mwakpo nke Iraq gasịrị, anọwo na 'ogbugbu, ịtọrọ mmadụ, ndina n'ike, ntọghata mmanye, ibi úgwù na mbibi nke ihe onwunwe okpukpe'
Na mba Iraq n'afọ 2003, obere oge mgbe ọchịchị Saddam dara, e nyere ezinụlọ iri atọ na ise mejupụtara obodo Mandean na Falluja iwu na égbè nabata Islam; e biri ndị ikom ahụ úgwù n'ike
N'afọ 2007, Kọmitii US na nnwere onwe okpukpe mba ụwa nụrụ akụkọ akaebe 'Ntụgharị mmanye na-eme n'ụzọ dị egwu
A na-atọrọ ụmụnwoke, na-ebi ha úgwù n'ike - nnukwu mmehie n'okpukpe Mandaean - ma na-amanye ha ghọọ ndị Alakụba
N'afọ 2014, mgbe ọpụpụ nke Ndị Kraịst si Mosul na ndị Yazidis si n'Ugwu Sinjar, a kọrọ na ibi úgwù mmanye na-eme site na Islamic State
E nwere akụkọ banyere ụmụnwoke Ndị Kraịst a tọọrọ ma bie ha úgwù n'ike ọbụna na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu
N'afọ 1829, ndị agha Ottoman tọọrọ nwata nwoke Gris dị afọ itoolu bụ Alexandros Kitos na ụmụ okoro ndị ọzọ ma ree ha ka ha bụrụ ndị ohu n'Ijipt; e biri ha niile úgwù megide uche ha
A kwadoro nke ọma na, tupu na n'oge mgbukpọ nke Armenia, ntọghata mmanye (nke gụnyere ibi úgwù mmanye) nke ụmụnwoke na ụmụaka nwoke Armenia na-emekarị
'N'ọtụtụ ọnọdụ, ndị Turks nọ n'ógbè ahụ napụrụ ha n'aka ndị ezinụlọ ha zọpụrụ ụmụaka Armenia na-eto eto
A manyere ụmụaka ahụ ịkatọ Iso Ụzọ Kraịst ma ghọọ ndị Alakụba, e wee nye ha aha ndị Turkey ọhụrụ
Maka ụmụnwoke mba Armenia, ntọghata a manyere pụtara na onye nke ọ bụla n'ime ha ga-atachi obi ibi úgwù na-egbu mgbu dị ka omenala ndị Alakụba chọrọ

N'oge Istanbul Pogrom n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 1955, 'ọtụtụ ndị ikom Gris, gụnyere ma ọ dịkarịa ala otu onye ụkọchukwu, bụ ndị e bie úgwù n'ike' N'ihi pogrom ahụ, ndị Greece ole na ole mechara si mba Turkey kwaga
N'afọ 2002, e nwere akụkọ na a na-eyi ndị agha na-abụghị ndị Alakụba na Turkey egwu na a ga-ebi úgwù
A na-edekọ ikpe ebe a na-eyi ndị ikom Syro-Orthodox na-eje ozi na ndị agha Turkey egwu ibi úgwù
N'afọ 1991, otu onye na-eto eto Christian Turk, na-agba ọsọ site na ibi úgwù n'ike na ndị agha Turkey, e nyere ya ebe mgbaba na Germany

Ndị Yazidi (ọ bụghị ndị niile e biri úgwù) na Turkey kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ ka a na-akpagbu steeti kpọmkwem, gụnyere ntụziaka okpukpe mmanye n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ntọghata mmanye, ibi úgwù mmanye, na mmeso ọjọọ n'oge ọrụ agha
N'afọ 1999, e nwere akụkọ banyere ibi úgwù nke ụmụnwoke mba Yedizi na Turkish Kurdistan
John Rawlins ji ụgbọ mmiri gaa afọ iri abụọ na atọ n'enweghị ihe ọ bụla mere mgbe, n'afọ 1621, ndị ohi si Barbary Coast nke North Africa tọọrọ ya na ndị ọrụ ya
Rawlins mechara kọọ na, mgbe a kpọgara ha Algiers, ụmụ okorobịa abụọ 'site n'ike na mmekpa ahụ
manyere
ịtụgharị ndị Turks,' nke pụtara na e biri ha úgwù n'ike
Site n'ịhazi nnupụisi nke ọma, o nwere ike ịlaghachi n'ụlọ n'afọ 1622

Friar Jaono dos Sanctos nke Portuguese kwuru na, kwa afọ na Algiers n'afọ 1620, ihe karịrị narị ndị ohu Ndị Kraịst itoolu ghọrọ ndị Alakụba, 'n'akụkụ ihe dị ka ụmụnwoke iri ise a na-ebi úgwù kwa afọ megide uche ha
E biri ọtụtụ puku Ndị Kraịst úgwù n'ike na Moluccas iji mee ka ha ghọọ ndị Alakụba site n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1999 ruo ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2001
The Sydney Morning Herald kọrọ n'ụzọ zuru ezu banyere nke a, na-ekwu na 'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mmadụ niile' nke ndị obodo 3,928 a manyere ịtụgharị gaa Islam bụ ndị e biri úgwù
A na-eji agụba na mma eme ihe ọzọ, na-akpata ọrịa
Otu n'ime ndị e biri úgwù, Kostantinus Idi, kọrọ, sị 'Enweghị m ike ịgbanahụ
Otu n'ime ha jidere apịtị m n'etiti iberibe osisi ebe onye ọzọ ji agụba gbue m
nwoke nke atọ jidere isi m azụ, dị njikere ịwụsa mmiri n'olu m ma ọ bụrụ na m tie mkpu
Ma enweghị m ike ijide onwe m ma tie mkpu ma ọ wụsa mmiri ahụ
Anọgidere m na-eti mkpu ma na-agbọ agbọ
Enweghị m ike ịnagide ihe mgbu ahụ
' Ọ gara n'ihu kọọ na otu n'ime ndị ụkọchukwu ahụ kwara ahụ n'ọnyá ya, na-ekwu na ọ ga-akwụsị ibute ọrịa
The Sydney Morning Herald kọrọ na ndị isi ndị Alakụba dị nro katọrọ ntọghata na ibi úgwù mmanye bụ ndị kwuru na ha megidere ozizi Alakụba
Gọvanọ obodo ahụ nyochakwara ihe ndị ahụ merenụ
Marco Polo, na njem ya, na-akọ otú otu eze Ndị Kraịst nke Etiopia si megwara Sultan nke Aden, onye biri bishọp úgwù n'ike
Na Kenya, ọtụtụ ebo na-ebi úgwù
Ụmụnwoke Luo si n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Kenya bụ ihe dị ịrịba ama, n'ihi nke a na-amanye ha ibi úgwù mgbe niile
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2002, na-esote ihe ike na Butere / Mumias District, otu kọmishọna mpaghara nyere ndị uwe ojii ntụziaka ka ha 'na-egbu ndị dọkịta na-awa ahụ na-etinye aka na ibi úgwù n'ike'
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2005, Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ na Kenya kwupụtara na ọ ga-achọ ikpe megide ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka ịkpalite ime ihe ike dị otú ahụ
N'otu oge, otu onye minista kwuru, 'A ga-akpọrọ ndị a na-ebighị úgwù maka emume ibi úgwù' Kọmitii ahụ kwuru na nke a bụ ihe na-akpali ime ihe ike

Ná ngwụsị ọnwa Jenụwarị 2008, ntuli aka esemokwu nke ibi úgwù ghọrọ ihe iseokwu n'etiti Onye isi ala Mwai Kibaki, onye Kikuyu na onye mmegide Raila Odinga, onye Luo, 'eziokwu ahụ bụ na Odinga ebighị úgwù ghọrọ ihe iseokwu Ụfọdụ ndị Kikuyus hụrụ ya dị ka 'nwa' na-erughị eru ịchị n'ihi na ọ gafeghị ibi úgwù na mmalite
' A kọrọ na ime ihe ike mgbe ntuli aka gasịrị 'lekwasịrị anya na iro agbụrụ', ma gụnye ọtụtụ ikpe nke ibi úgwù mmanye
AFP kọrọ ahụmahụ otu nwoke Kenya 'Otu ndị ikom asatọ nwere pangas (machetes) batara
Ha rịọrọ maka ID m [iji chọpụta agbụrụ ọ bụ] Ha gbupụrụ m ma bie m úgwù site n'ike
M tiri mkpu nke ukwuu ma tie mkpu maka enyemaka' O mere mkpesa na ndị uwe ojii hapụrụ ya n'ọbara, were ngwá agha ndị otu Kikuyu hapụrụ

N'ọnwa Septemba 2010, na mba Malaba, West Kenya, a dọtara otu nwoke Teso dị afọ iri abụọ na otu n'ụlọ nkwari akụ, nye ya ọgwụ ọjọọ, tinye ya ntụ ọka millet na-eme ka ọtụtụ ndị Bukusu na-edu ya ka e bie ya úgwù mgbe ndị uwe ojii tinyere aka
Nwoke Teso, onye kwetara ibi úgwù ahụike, katọrọ ndị ntorobịa Bukusu maka ịnwa ịmanye omenala ha na Teso
Izu atọ gara aga, ndị agbata obi obodo dị na Aedomoru sub location na Teso north ji klọb ma gbochie otu nwoke dị afọ iri atọ na ise ibi úgwù n'ike

N'afọ 1999, otu nwanyị a na-atụ egwu na mpaghara Vaal Triangle nke South Africa, na-achịkwa otu ndị ntọ na-atọrọ ndị na-eto eto, na-ebi ụmụnwoke ahụ úgwù n'ike ma na-anapụnara ndị mụrụ ha ihe mgbapụta maka ntọhapụ ha
Otu onye uwe ojii obodo kwuru na a na-apụnara ihe ruru mmadụ iri na ụma kwa ụbọchị
N'afọ 2004, ndị ikwu jidere onye Rastafari dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ ma otu ndị okenye na ndị ikwu agbụrụ Xhosa bie ya úgwù n'ike
N'ọnwa Disemba 2004, e jidere Nceba Cekiso dị afọ iri anọ na ise ma bie ya úgwù n'ụzọ megidere uche ya
Omenala Xhosa na-enye ndị mmadụ ohere ibi ụmụnwoke úgwù n'ike nke a na-ewere na ha agafeela afọ mmalite
Ịmanye ndị mmadụ ime emume oge ochie
n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, kpatara nchegbu n'etiti òtù ndị ruuru mmadụ
(N'otu oge, ndị Rastafari abụọ megidere usoro ahụ n'ihi okpukpe
Ihe omume a kpalitere arụmụka banyere ma a ka ga-ekwe ka ndị ọdịnala mee ka ha manye ndị mmadụ n'ụzọ megidere uche ha n'ime ọhịa ka ha malite
N'agbanyeghị na e biri ya úgwù n'ụzọ ahụike, nna ya na ndị isi obodo ya bughachiri Christian Xhosa úgwù n'ike n'afọ 2007
O boro ebubo ịkpa ókè na-ezighị ezi n'ihi nkwenkwe okpukpe ya, na-achọ mgbaghara site n'aka nna ya na Congress of Traditional Leaders of South Africa

N'ime nkwekọrịta ahụ e nwetara, nke e nyere iwu nke Ụlọikpe Ịdị n'Otu, Congress of Traditional Leaders nabatara ikike nke ụmụ nwoke toro eto ịhọrọ ma ha ga-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ ibi úgwù ọdịnala dịka nkwenkwe okpukpe ha si dị
Ọ rịọrọ mgbaghara maka okwu onye bụbu onye isi oche ya kwuru na-agba ume ka a chụpụ ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma jụrụ ibi úgwù ọdịnala
Onye ọka ikpe ahụ kwupụtara, 'Ihe dị mkpa n'ihe gbasara Iwu na iwu bụ na ọ dịghị onye a pụrụ ịmanye ibi úgwù n'enweghị nkwenye ya'
Dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ South Africa si kwuo, ikpe ahụ sochirinụ ghọrọ 'ikpe dị ịrịba ama gbasara ibi úgwù mmanye'
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2009, Bhisho Equality Court (High Court) kpebiri na, na South Africa, ibi úgwù megidere iwu ọ gwụla ma emere ya na nkwenye zuru oke nke onye mbido
Dị ka Thembela Kepe si kwuo, ndị isi ọdịnala na-ebo ebubo na mmachibido ibi úgwù n'ike bụ 'mmebi ikike ọdịbendị dị na Iwu'
Enwere ọtụtụ ihe akaebe na, ruo ọtụtụ afọ, Ndị Kraịst nke Khartoum na ebe ndị ọzọ na Sudan ejiriwo ike ghọọ ndị Alakụba, nakwa na e bie ụmụ nwoke na ụmụnwoke Ndị Kraịst úgwù n'ike
A maara ihe atụ nke ụmụnwoke Dinka e biri úgwù n'ike n'afọ 1990 na afọ 2000 site na ọnọdụ ịgba ohu ọdịnala, ka dị na Sudan
N'afọ 1885, Kabaka Mwanga nyere iwu ka e gbuo Bishọp James Hannington na ọtụtụ Ndị Kraịst obodo
N'oge sochirinụ, Islamization mere ka e bie ọtụtụ Ndị Kraịst úgwù n'ike
Dị ka onye ọkà mmụta banyere mmadụ Suzette Heald na ndị ọkà mmụta ndị ọzọ tụlere, ndị Gisu (n'aka nke ọzọ, Bagishu) nke Uganda 'na-anya isi na ha anaghị anabata ndị ikom a na-ebighị úgwù'
N'ihi nke a, n'obodo Gisu, nwata nwoke ma ọ bụ nwoke ọ bụla nwere ike ịgbanahụ ibi úgwù (nke a na-akpọ 'imbalu') na-eche atụmanya nke ibi úgwù n'ike

Voice of America, na-ezo aka n'otu omume ahụ, na-akọ, sị 'N'etiti ndị Bagishu, a na-eleda ndị ikom a na-ebighị úgwù anya; a naghị ekwe ka ha nọrọ na ọha mmadụ ma n'ọtụtụ ọnọdụ, a na-ahụta ha dị ka ndị na-enwetaghị ụmụnwanyị obodo maka alụmdi na nwunye
Ndị Bagishu niile na-akwado nke a gụnyere ụmụnwanyị na-akọkarị ndị okenye agbụrụ ụmụ nwoke na-ebighị úgwù
A na-ewere ya dị ka ọdịnala na ọ dịghị nwoke ga-agbanahụ emume ahụ n'agbanyeghị ebe ọ bi, ihe ọ na-eme ma ọ bụ ụdị nchekwa o nwere
N'afọ 2004, e jidere nna nke ụmụ asaa ma bie ya úgwù n'ike mgbe nwunye ya gwara ndị agbụrụ Bagishu na e bighị ya úgwù
Otu onye ọrụ obodo kwuru na ndị ọchịchị enweghị ike itinye aka na omenala
E bie úgwù ndị ọzọ n'ike mere n'ọnwa Septemba 2006 na June 2008
N'ọnọdụ ndị a niile, ndị ezinụlọ nke ndị ahụ metụtara kwadoro ibi úgwù n'ike
Ndị agbụrụ ndị ọzọ na Uganda na Uganda Foundation for Human Rights Initiative na-ewere ibi úgwù mmanye dị ka mmegbu ikike mmadụ
Gọọmentị Uganda na Onye isi oche nke Uganda Law Society katọrọ ihe ahụ merenụ, mana onye ahụ jụrụ ebubo
A ka na-ebi úgwù ọdịnala na mpaghara agbụrụ ụfọdụ nke Australia

Ọkà mmụta asụsụ na ọkà mmụta banyere mmadụ bụ Peter Sutton, na-ekwu banyere ibi úgwù mmanye na enweghị ndị mmanye iwu na ebe obibi ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ, na-ekwu na e tinyewo iwu Australia n'ọrụ n'ụzọ na-adịghị mma 'Ọ dịla anya a nabatara ibi úgwù n'onwe ya dị ka nke na-abụghị nke iwu Australia
' Ná ngwụsị afọ 1996, Irwin Brookdale dị afọ iri atọ na anọ na otu ndị Aborigines Australia na-aṅụ mmanya n'akụkụ osimiri dị n'ebe ugwu Queensland
Mgbe ọ gafechara, otu nwanyị nọ n'òtù ahụ dara mbà n'akpa uwe ya, chọpụta na e bighị ya úgwù ma kpọkuo ndị enyi ya ka ha 'mee ya nwoke'
Ha nwara iji karama biya gbajiri agbaji bie ya úgwù
Brookdale mechara nọrọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ, a mara otu n'ime ndị wakporo ya ikpe maka mmerụ ahụ n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị ma nye Brookdale ụgwọ A $ 10,000 maka ụjọ
The breakup of Yugoslavia, according to Milica Z
Bookman, 'was extremely violent, producing some two million refugees, over 100,000 killed, and evidence of gang rape, impaling, dismemberment and forced circumcision'
Ngalaba na-ahụ maka steeti US kọrọ na ndị agha Alakụba na ndị Mujahedin na-adịghị mma 'na-ebiela ndị agha Bosnia Serb úgwù na-adịghị mma, nke na-emebi emebi, na-abụghị nke ahụike
' Otu onye agha Bosnia Serb dị afọ iri na asatọ 'e biri ya úgwù nke na n'ikpeazụ, a chọrọ ka e gbupụ akụkụ ahụ dum
A man was yesterday forcibly circumcised by traditional surgeons in Mumias-Butere District as police watched helplessly
Mr John Otieko
was cornered by a mob
stripped naked, frog-marched to a nearby river and covered with clay
then brought to Mayoni trading centre
to be circumcised as an excited crowd watched
Efforts by four traffic police officers who were manning a roadblock on the highway a few metres away from the scene failed when the crowd started stoning them
The victim was then left bleeding at the scene
District Commissioner Ernest Munyi expressed shock at the incident and told police to crack down on traditional surgeons involved in forcible circumcision
