Akwụkwọ ebipụtara n'afọ 2017, nke akpọrọ Njirimara nke Nanocrystallite-CdS Mepụta nke Low-Cost Electrochemical Technique maka Thin Film Photovoltaic Application Mmetụta nke Ntọala Volta, Eze mere nchọpụta njirimara nke ihe nkiri ise nanocrystallite- CdS pere mpe n’ime oge nwere oge
Nchọpụta X-ray gosipụtara ọdịdị na ọkpụrụkpụ nke crystallite
Nyocha ọzọ na-atụlekwa omume nke akụkụ nke Nchọpụta ahụ
Francis Duroy (amụrụ na 12 Septemba 1959) bụ onye na-eme violin na France

A mụrụ ya na Charenton-le-Pont, Duroy malitere ọmụmụ egwu ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ na conservatoire à rayonnement régional de Saint-Maur-des-Fossés [fr] ebe a matara ya violin, piano, French horn, ederede na egwu ụlọ
Ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ violin ya na Brussels na Maurice Raskin, mgbe ahụ na Conservatoire national supérieur musique et danse de Lyon, na Véda Reynolds
N'afọ 1985, Duroy natara agụmakwụkwọ iji mụọ na Banff Centre School of Fines Arts (Canada)

Ọ zụlitere nkà ya na nnukwu ndị ọkachamara dịka ndị na-eme violin Zoltán Székely na Ivry Gitlis, onye na-eme violon Raphael Hillyer, onye na na-eme cello Anner Bylsma na onye na-akpọ piano Menahem Pressler
N'afọ 1986, a họpụtara Duroy ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Opéra national de Lyon n'okpuru nduzi nke John Eliot Gardiner na Kent Nagano
Site na 1989 ruo 1991, ọ bụ onye na-eduzi egwu nke Orchestre national de Lyon, Emmanuel Krivine na-edu
Kemgbe afọ 1992, Duroy nwere ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke kpọgara ya na kọntinent niile
N'afọ 2005, o mere njem dị mkpa nke kpọgara ya n'ebe ndị kachasị ukwuu na Japan ma meghee ọnụ ụzọ Eshia
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Korea

N'afọ 2010, Duroy was invited to perform in a recital on the prestigious stage of New York's carnegie Hallna 2021 ,at the invitation of the Crech Philharmonic orchestra,he gave a recital at the Rudolfinum in Prague

A kpọrọ ya n'ọtụtụ ememme na ebe ndị a ma ama, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Japan na Kioi Hall na Tokyo, Shirakawa Hall na Nagoya, NHK Hall na Osaka, Kyoto Center Hall, na Korea na Poyang City Hall na Mahadum Pusan, USA na Carnegie Hall na (New York), Musical Bridges gburugburu World San Antonio Festival (Texas), Black Man Hall na Boston, Norway, Grieg im Bergen Festival, Slovenia, NH Lubto, Paris Musical To Tous, Paris Muscales, Paris Muscale, Paris Festival, Paris Mus Musical Tous, Fr Fr Frutes, Paris Musicals, Paris Musicas, Paris Musics, Paris Musikers, Paris Musie, Paris Musia, Paris Mustics, Paris Musikiles, Paris Musika, Paris Muski, Paris Musy, Paris Musisi, Paris Musks, Paris Muses, Paris Music Festival, Paris Paris Musical Festival, Paris, Paris Musid, Paris Muscle, Paris Musal, Paris Musques, Paris Muscles, Paris Musk, Paris Muska, Paris Musals, Paris Musike, Paris Muschi, Paris Mus, Paris Muscy Festival, Paris

A na-akpọ Duroy ka ọ bụrụ onye na-egwu egwu n'onwe ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-akụ egwú gburugburu ụwa Dnipro Philharmonic Orchestra na Kyiv Philharmonical Orchestra (Ukraine), Pohang Symphony Orchestra (Korea), San Luis Potosi Symphony orchestra na Aguascalientes Symphony Orkestra (Mexico), Ribeiro Preto Symphony orkestra (Brazil), Ico Magna Grecia Orchestra (Italy), Baden Bade, Romanian State Orchestra, Opéra de Lyon, Orchestra, Orchestra nke Orchestra, Orkestra, Orchestre National de Lyon, Orkestre Les Orchestra, Vienna, Orchestra na Chamber, Orchestra of Lyon, Orchestre, Orchestra ya bụ Orkestra nke France Orchestra, orchestre, Orchestre L's, Orchestra L's Proviel, Orchestra
Egwú Duroy sitere n'oge Baroque ruo n'egwú nke taa
He has collaborated with many composers including Michaèl lèvinas,Philippe leroux, Wolfgang motz and Nicolas vèrin who dedicated his work chasses croises// for violin and piano to him
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ egwu ya, Duroy nwere ọrụ nkuzi dị mkpa ọ bụ prọfesọ ugbu a na Conservatoire à rayonnement régional de Lyon [fr]
A na-akpọkwa ya ka ọ nye nkuzi na Eshia (Japan na Korea) na Europe ma bụrụ onye otu ndị ọka ikpe n'ọtụtụ asọmpi mba ụwa
Duroy bụ onye guzobere - na onye nduzi nka nke Musicalta kemgbe e guzobere ya na 1993
Francis Obiorah Obikwelu, GOIH (amuru 22 Novemba 1978) bu onye oso oso amuru na Naijiria bi na Portugal lara ezumike nka, onye ọkachamara na 100 mita na 200 mita
Ọ bụ onye ritere ọla ọcha Olympic na 2004 na 100 mita
N'otu oso ahụ, o debere ndeko maka egwuruegwu European kembu na ihe omume ahụ na 986 sekọnd, nke guzoro ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 17
A mụrụ Obikwelu na Onitsha, Nigeria
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, otu n'ime ndị nkuzi bọọlụ Obikwelu hụrụ ya wee tụrụ aro ka ọ nwalee egwuregwu
Ka afọ abụọ gachara, ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Junior Africa nke 1994 wee nweta nrite ọlaọcha na 400 mita
Obikwelu kwagara Lisbon, Portugal ka ọ dị afọ iri na isii
Mgbe egwuregwu Lisboa e Benfica na Sporting Clube de Portugal jụrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ewu ụlọ na Algarve
O kpebiri ịmụta Portuguese, na onye nkụzi ya tinye ya na kọntaktị na egwuregwu club Belenenses, ebe ọ maliteghachiri omume
Mgbe Obikwelu bi na Portugal, otu nwanyị nakweere ya nke ọ na-akpọ ugbu 'nne' ya

N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2000, onye na-agba ọsọ Naijiria nke nọ na Lisbon bụ Mercy Nku kwuru na Obikwelu ekpebiela ịsọ mpi na Portugal n'ihi ileghara anya ndị ọrụ egwuregwu Naịjirịa mgbe o merụrụ ahụ mgbe ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria na Sydney, Australia
'Ọ gara Canada ka a wara ya ahụ n'ikpere, ma-emefu ego nke ya' Obikwelu ghọrọ nwa amaala Portuguese na October 2001
Mmezu egwuregwu Obikwelu, akụkọ ndụ ya na àgwà ya mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama na Portugal, ebe a na-akpọ ya Chico, ụdị dị mkpụmkpụ nke ụdị Portuguese nke aha mbụ ya
Obikwelu nwere ndekọ Europe maka oge kachasị ọsọ na 100 m na 986 sekọnd
Ọ gụchara nke abụọ na 100 m n'egwuregwu Olimpik nke afọ 2004 na Athens, Greece, ihe nrite mbụ n'egwuregwu ịgba ọsọ maka Portugal
Ọ meriri 100 m na 200 m na 2006 na European Championship na Athletics wee bụrụ nwoke mbụ na-eme egwuregwu meriri na 100 m ya na 200 m na European Championship
N'asọmpi ntozu n'egwuregwu Summer Olimpik nke afọ 2004, Obikwelu gbara ọsọ ugboro abụọ n'okpuru sekọnd iri, na-esetịpụ ndekọ mba

Na mgbe ikpeazụ, ọ gbakere site na ọnọdụ na-abụghị nke nrite na ọkara nke abụọ na oso ahu nweta ọlaọcha, nanị otu narị sekond n'azụ Justin Gatlin na otu narị n'ihu Maurice Greene, na-eti ihe ndekọ mbụ nke Europe nke Linford Christie setịpụrụ
n'afọ 1993
Obikwelu gbara nke ise na 200m
A họpụtara Obikwelu Waterford Crystal European Male Athlete of the Year maka 2006 site na European Athletic Association, na ntuli aka ịntanetị imeghe ndị otu federations, mgbasa ozi na izugbe ọha

Obikwelu kwuputara maka ịla ezumike nka n'asọmpi egwuregwu ka o rughị eru maka 100 m finals na 2008 Beijing Olympics, ma ọ weghachitere nkwupụta ahu, na-ikweta nsọpụrụ afọ ikpeazụ nke nkwekọrịta ya na track club
Obikwelu meriri 100 m nrite ọla edo na egwuregwu Lusophony 2009

Obikwelu bụ onye mmeri ụwa junior n'afọ 1996 karịrị 100 m na 200 m

Francis Odega bụ onye na-eme ejije na-atọ ọchị nke Naijiria nke a maara nke ọma maka ihe nkiri vidio na-atọ ọchị nke ya nke gbasara ma kesaa n'Ịntanet
O mere ka ọ pụta ìhè ka ọ na-enweta nkwekọrịta nkwado na nkwanye ùgwù site n'aka ndị ama ama na mba ọzọ, ihe atụ bụ 50 cent, onye Odega kwuru na ọ gbasoro ya na Instagram
Francis nwetara nzere bachelọ na Economics mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ambrose Alli
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ na-eme ihe ọchị nke Night Of A Thousand Laughs comedy show
N'afọ 2013, Francis nwetara ihe nrite 'Best Actor' ya na Hlomla Dandala na 'Best African Collaboration' na 2013 Ghana Movie Awards

Francis bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama mgbe ihe nkiri sitere na usoro ihe nkiri Back From South Africa kụrụ ịntanetị na ndị ama ama dị ka 50 Cent na Tinie Tempah na-ekerịta vidiyo vidiyo nke ihe nkiri ahụ na Instagram
Mgbe eji vidio ahụ gbasasịrị, Francis bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwado na ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta Etisalat dị ka onye nnọchi anya ya
Francis Ogbonnaya Otunta (29 Eprel 1958 - 30 Machị 2021) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ na onye nchịkwa agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ bụ osote Onye isi oche nke ise nke Mahadum Ọrụ Ugbo Michael Okpara mgbe a họpụtara ya na Disemba 2015
Tupu nhọpụta ya dị ka onye isi oche nke ise nke Mahadum Ọrụ Ugbo Michael Okpara, Otunta rụrụ ọrụ dị iche iche dị Ka Prọfesọ nke mgbakọ na mwepụ na Machịbụrụ Benin
Ọ bụkwa onye bụbu Rector nke Akanu Ibiam Federal Polytechnic, Unwana, ọfịs o nwere site na 2006 ruo 2014
Prọfesọ Francis O
Otunta weghaara uwe ndu dị ka osote chancellor nke Mahadum Ọrụ Ugbo nke Michael Okpara, Umudike site na Prọfesọ
Hillary Edeoga n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro na 1 Machị 2016
Otunta si n'obodo Amangwu Nkpoghoro na Afikpo North Local Govamenti Area nke Ebonyi Steeti, Nijiria
Ọ lụrụ Bertha Otunta onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ isii
Ọ nwụrụ n'ihe mberede nke ụgbọala ama lie ya na mbge onwa Septemba gbara mbosi iri, na-afọ 2021, na Afikpo
Francis Odinaka Uzoho (bu onye amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 28 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1998), nke a maara dị ka Francis na Spen, bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa nke na-agbara Omonia na ndị otu mba Naịjirịa bọọlụ

A mụrụ ya na Nwangele, Uzoho sonyere alaka Senegal nke Aspire Academy n'afọ 2013, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ; na mbụ ọ bụ onye na-aga n'ihu, a gbanwere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nche mgbe e lere ya anya dị ka 'onye na-egbu oge' mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ
N'afọ 2016, mgbe ọ masịrị ya na asọmpi na Barcelona, ọ sonyeere ndị otu Juvenil nke Deportivo de La Coruña
Iwu afọ pụtara na Uzoho nwere ike ịbanye na nkwekọrịta na Dépor na Jenụwarị 2017; obere oge ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya, ọ malitere iso ndị otu mbụ zụọ
N'ịbụ onye a kwalitere na ndị otu nchekwa tupu oge 2017–18, o mere nke mbụ ya na 10 Septemba site na ịmalite na mmeri 3-0 Segunda División B n'ụlọ megide Real Madrid Castilla

Uzoho mere otu mbụ ya - na La Liga - nke mbụ na ụbọchị 15 Ọktoba 2017, malite na 0-0 pụọ megide SD Eibar Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ na ụbọchị iri atọ na abụọ na abụọ, ọ ghọrọ onye na-eche nche mba ọzọ kacha nta na-amalite na La Liga, na onye egwuregwu nke abụọ na-eto eto pụtara na league n'oge mkpọsa ahụ n'oge ahụ, naanị n'azụ Achraf Hakimi nke Real Madrid
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2018, Uzoho megharịrị nkwekọrịta ya maka oge atọ ma gbazinyere ya ozugbo na Segunda División n'akụkụ Elche CF maka otu afọ
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2019, ọ kwagara na mgbazinye ego na klọb Anorthosis Famagusta nke Saịprọs, n'ịchọ ọtụtụ egwuregwu bọọlụ mbụ na-aga n'ihu na 2019 Africa Cup of Nations
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ mbụ ya na klọb ahụ, enwere nchegbu banyere asambodo ahụike ya
N'ihi ya, e wepụrụ Anorthosis Famagusta akara itoolu, nke ha rịọrọ
A jụrụ arịrịọ mwepu nke klọb ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na arịrịọ Uzoho megide ntaramahụhụ ya nke mmachibido otu egwuregwu na ụgwọ € 1,000 gara nke ọma
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2019, ọ laghachiri na mgbazinye ego na Saịprọs, na nke ugbu a ya na Omonia
O kwuru na ya nwere olileanya na nlọghachi ya na mba ahụ ga-adị mma
Na Julaị 2020, Uzoho sonyeere APOEL na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ
Na 1 Septemba 2021, Uzoho kwagara Omonia na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ
Uzoho nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa na 2013 FIFA U-17 World Cup
Mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ iri na anọ, ọ bụ onye nkwado ozugbo nye Dele Alampasu
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2017 Uzoho natara oku mbụ ya na ndị isi ndị isi Naịjirịa
O mere egwuregwu izizi ya na mba ụwa na 14 Nọvemba, dochie Daniel Akpeyi na mmeri enyi na enyi 4–2 megide Argentina
A kpọrọ ya aha na ndị otu 23 nke Naịjirịa maka 2018 FIFA World Cup na Russia
Ka ọ na-erule n'oge ahụ, a na-ewere ya dị ka onye nche mbụ nke Naịjirịa
Ọ hapụrụ ndị otu mba ahụ na ọnwa nke iri na otu n'afọ 2018 n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu na 2019 Africa Cup of Nations Francis Uzoho nọ na goolu maka Naịjirịa na egwuregwu nke atọ megide Tunisia
N'ọnwa nke Ọktọba afọ 2019 ọ merụrụ ahụ na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Brazil, ma waa ya ahụ na Nọvemba afọ 2019
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2021, onye nlekọta onye nkuzi Eguavoen depụtara ya na 2021 AFCON Nations Cup dịka akụkụ nke 28-Man Nigeria Squad
Francisca Ashietey-Odunton bụ onye nta akụkọ Ghana, onye mgbasa ozi na onye nnọchi anya mba
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Ghana ma ugbu a ọ bụ nnukwu kọmishọna Ghana na Kenya
Francisca Ashietey-Odunton gara Aburi Girls 'Senior High School maka asambodo ọkwa nkịtị na ọkwa dị elu
Ọ gara Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelors of Arts na Social Sciences na isi na Bekee
Ashietey-Odunton bụ onye ọka iwu nakwa ihe mmuta na iwu,ihe dika ihe afọ iri na isii ebe a kpọrọ ya na Ghana Bar mgbe ọ nwetara LLB ya na Ghana School of Law na Afo 1997
O nwere nzere masta na London School of Economics
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum United Nations dị na Tokyo, Japan
Francisca Ashietey-Odunton nwere ihe Mmuta karịrị afọ iri abụọ dịka onye mgbasa ozi na Ghana Broadcasting Corporation

Ọ sonyeere Ghana Broadcasting Corporation n'afọ 1990 dị ka onye enyemaka mmepụta ihe na Ngalaba Mmepụta ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mmemme dị iche iche gụnyere Kyekyekule, Children's Own, Adult Education na Country Music
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe ngosi TV
Ọ gbagoro n'ọkwa dị ka onye mmepụta na onye nduzi, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, e bufere ya na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi TV na 1994
O jere ozi n'ọkwa dị iche iche n'ebe ahụ dị ka onye na-agụ akụkọ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye nta akụkọ onye isi ala ruo afọ asatọ
O mechara bụrụ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ ma bufee ya na ngalaba iwu dị ka onye isi ọrụ iwu
Ashietey-Odunton ekpuchiela nzukọ mba ụwa, gụnyere African Union Summit, Ecowas Summit na World Food Summit

Na ubochi wenesde na onwa august na Afo 2017 presidenti ndị obodo Ghana nana akuffo addo nyere francisca ashietey odunton onye nlekota dị elu na ghanaobukwa otu n,ime ndị puru iche ahoputara ga bu ndi nnochi Anya Ghanaian mission na uwa nille
Ashietey-Odunton lụrụ Olu Christopher Odunton ma bụrụ nne ụmụ nwanyị abụọ - Akushika na Duki
Francisca Ikhiede (amuru ya na 17 Jenuarị afọ 1996) bu onye egwu bọọlụ Naijiria nke na-agba n'otu egwu bọọlụ Naijiria na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa
A mụrụ Ikhiede na Kaduna n'afọ 1996
Ọ gbagoro otu bọọlụ Naịjirịa Customs Service
Ikhiede na-agba n'otu egwuregwu volleyball 'b' n'ụsọ osimiri maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa
Na mbido 2019, oṅọ na Yaoundé na Cameroon ebe ya na Tochukwu Nnourge nwetara nrite ọla edo na asọmpi Volleyball nke Camtel International Beach
Ha meriri n'asọmpi ikpeazụ n'agbanyeghị aṅụrị nke igwe mmadụ dịka mmegide ha bụ ndị otu Cameroon
Ndị otu Naijiria gbagoro agbago mgbe Kenya tozuru oke maka asọmpi Olimpik Summer nke afọ 2020 ebigharịrị
Naanị mba Afrịka anọ ezipụla otu n'asọmpi Olympic
Ndị otu Kenya bụ Yvonne Wavinya, Brackcides Agala, Phosca Kasisi na Gaudencia Makokha
Ndị otu mba Naijiria meriri na ngwụcha asọmpi iko mba Afrịka na Morocco na 2021

Otu ndị Kenya bụ Wavinga na Kasisi meriri Tochukwu Nnoruga na Albertina Francis, okpu abụọ megide efu (2-0) ebe Agala na Makokha meriri ebe abụọ nke Naijiria na nke Ikhiede na Amara Uchechukwu okpu abụọ megide otú (2–1)

Francisca Nneka Okeke bu nwada onye obodo Naijiria onye oka mmuta sayensi na profeso nke ana akpo physics na mahadum nke naijiria na Nsukkama buru kwa nwanyi nke mbu bu onye isi ndgalaba na mahadum na afor 2011, akpobatara ya na otu obodo anyi nke ndi okacha mara nke sayensi
Otu nke nu nke kachasi na mmuta otu sayensi
Akpobatara ya na ndi di ka Abba Gumel, onye profesor nke mgbako na nwepu nke biology burukwa onye otu afrikan akademik nke sayensi
Okeke nyefere onwe ya n' ihe gbasara ihe nke oguru na agu kwa maka ionosphere na equitorial electrojet phenomenom

ihe nkea bu na anyanwu ka osi enweta ike ya,electrojet bu mmiri nke oku latric nke kewara uwa na owuwa anyanwu na akukuihe ana akpo equator na emekwa ihe nke ana akpo magnetic fieldna ndanye nke equatorna eme ka odi iche ugboro ise na ebe obola ozo na uwa nile
ihe ndanye nkea nke ana akpo magnetic equator ji kwa tinkom ole na ole gafee akara nke ana akpo north pole
Okeke nyochara ma gukwa maka ihe gbasara anwu na ime ihe ana akpo ionosphere na emetuta ihe nke ne ejikote uwa onu
Nghota nke ga eme ka aghota ka maka ihu igwe na ihe mgbanwe na aputagasi na ya
Nghota nc kea ga enyere aka ighota ebe ogbu na igwe dika ala oma jijiji na ihe ndi di ka ya
IHE NRITE Nwada Francisca nwere ihe nrite nke L'oreal-UNESCO NKE AGALABA UMU NWANYI NKE IHE NRITE SAYENSI NKE LAUREATE NKE MBA AFRIKA NA AFO 2013
Francisca Oboh-Ikuenobe bụ onyea nyoputa ụwa na ala si Ubiaja dị na Esan South East Local Government Area nke Edo State

Ọ bụ ọkachamara na palynology na sedimentology, ọ bụkwa Ọkà mmụta nke Geology na Ngalaba nke Geosciences na Geological na Petroleum na Injinia, bụkwara Associate Dean of Academic Affairs na College of Engineering and Computing, Missouri University of Science and Technology
Oboh-Ikuenobe gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St
Maria Goretti Girls Grammer di na Benin-city, Naijiria

O nwetara BSc ntulugo nke mbụ na geology na afọ1983, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mmepụta ihe dị na ala na Shell Petroleum Development Company nke Nigeria na Lagos, na palynologist na Shell na ụlọ nyocha ha dị na Warri Delta State, tupu ọ laghachi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ maka MSc ya na applied geology na 1987, na Mahadum Ife Nigeria (nke bụzi Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo)
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ nọ n'ọkwa dị ka onye enyemaka nkuzi na Mahadum Ife

E nyere ya Commonwealth Scholarship Commission Award maka nzere doctorate ya na Ngalaba Sayensị Ụwa, Mahadum Cambridge (New Hall, ugbu a Murray Edwards College), nke e nyere na 1991 na thesis ya 'Palaeoenvironmental Reconstruction of the E20 Reservoir in the Kolo Creek Field, Niger Delta (Nigeria)'
Ọ sonyeere Missouri S&T, mgbe ahụ Ngalaba nke Geology na Geophysics na 1991 dị ka osote prọfesọ na geology

Her research falls under the categories of palynology and sedimentology, with the former including studies of pollen and other palynomorphs within sediments and sedimentary rocks as a proxy for biostratigraphic, palaeoecological and palaeoclimatic reconstructions
She also integrates palynofacies with organic geochemistry

Francisca Onaolapo Oladipo, (amụrụ na 15 Jenụwarị afo 1978) bụ onye Naijiria Prọfesọ nke Sayensị Kọmputa, onye nchịkwa na onye edemede
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2022, ọ bụ onye nduzi nke nkwenye dị mma na Mahadum Federal, Lokoja, Kogi Steeti, Naijiria
Ọ bụ onyeisi nchịkwa, nje Outbreak Data Netwọk Afrika and Asia (VODANA)
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ jere ozi dị ka onye otu Kansụl Na-achị na Mahadum Federal, Lokoja, na nwanyị mbụ bụ Onye isi nke Ngalaba Sayensị Kọmputa na mahadum ahụ
Àtụ Infobox football biography
Francisca Ordega (amụrụ 19 Ọktoba 1993) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa nke na-agba CSKA Moscow na asọmpi bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Russia
Ọ na-anọchi anya otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa (Super Falcons) na asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke FIFA na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Africa
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ kacha mma n'Africa
Ordega malitere ọrụ ya na ọkwa ntorobịa nke Bayelsa Queens, tupu ebuli ya n'akụkụ ọkachamara n'afọ 2008 ebe ọ gbara na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria
Na 2011, ọ kwagara Rivers Angels, otu n'ime klọb kacha elu na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria
N'afọ 2012, Ordega hapụrụ Naijiria ka ya na ndị mmeri Rọshịa bịanyere aka na ya bụ Rossiyanka nke asọmpi egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Russia
Na Nọvemba 2012, a mara ọkwa na Ordega na Rossiyanka kewara onwe ha ụzọ
Na 2013, Ordega bịanyere aka na Piteå Ọ BỤRỤ na Swedish Damallsvenskan
O meriri ihe mgbaru ọsọ mbụ ya na 26 May 2013 na mgbalị ịbịaru megide Vittsjö GIK
N'agbata 2013 na 2015, o mere ngosi 34 wee nweta ihe mgbaru ọsọ 4 n'oge ọ nọ na Sweden
Ordega wee gafee North Atlantic wee bịanye aka na Washington Spirit na National Women's Soccer League
N'oge mbụ ya na Mmụọ Nsọ, Ordega meriri ihe mgbaru ọsọ atọ ma mee enyemaka abụọ
Ọ laghachiri na 2016 iji nweta ihe mgbaru ọsọ abụọ n'oge oge
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ mmụọ nke Naijiria echefuru echefu bịara na Semifinal NWSL mgbe o meriri n'oge mgbakwunye iji ziga Mmụọ n'asọmpị NWSL mbụ ya
Na July 2017, Ordega nwere mmerụ ikpere nke ga-ejedebe nkeji ya maka oge fọdụrụnụ
N'agbanyeghị mmerụ ahụ, ọ ka ga-enweta ihe ngosi iri anọ wee nweta ihe mgbaru ọsọ anọ
Na Disemba 2016, Sydney FC bịanyere aka na Ordega na mbinye ego sitere na Washington maka oge fọdụrụ na 2016–17 W-League
Nbinye ego ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ onye Africa mbụ ga-egwu na Australian W-League
Ordega ga-eme ngosi isii wee nweta akara otu ugboro na-enyere Sydney aka irite ọnọdụ nke atọ na otu
Na 20 October 2017, Ordega sonyeere ụlọ ọgbakọ Spanish Atlético Madrid na mbinye ego ọnwa isii sitere na Washington
O mere mpụta mbụ ya na 1 November 2017 megide Barcelona
Ordega nwetara ịkwaga Shanghai WFC otu afọ
N'a April 2021, Ordega bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta Levante UD na-agba ọsọ ruo 2023, na mgbalị ịkwalite nchụso ha iru eru maka bọọlụ Champions League nke mbụ na akụkọ ntolite ha
Ordega mere mpụta mbụ ya na 22 Mee 2021 megide Madrid CFF, na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi na nkeji 67th na mmeri 3-2
Ordega nọchitere anya otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa n'ọkwa niile
N'okpuru 17, ọ gbara 2010 FIFA U-17 World Cup yana ndị nọ n'okpuru iri abụọ na 2012 FIFA U-20 World Cup
N'ọkwa dị elu ọ gbara na asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke FIFA nke 2011, 2015 na 2019
N'ikpeazụ, ọ mepere akaụntụ World Cup ya site n'itinye goolu nha Nigeria megide Sweden na 8 June 2015 na Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada
Ọ sokwa na ndị otu Naịjirịa na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka nke afọ 2010 na 2014, wee merie asọmpi abụọ ahụ

VN'afọ 2018, ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị Naijiria bụ ndị meriri asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke 2018 na Ghana, asọmpi ebe o jiri goolu abụọ na enyemaka abụọ wee nweta ihe nrite nwanyị nke egwuregwu na egwuregwu ikpeazụ ha na South Africa
Ọ so na ndị otu Super Falcons bụ ndị meriri asọmpi iko ụmụ nwanyị Turkish 2021 na Antalya, Turkey n'ọnwa Febụwarị wee si otú ahụ bụrụ ndị otu Africa mbụ meriri asọmpi ịkpọ òkù
Akara na rịzọlt a depụtara goolu Naịjirịa mbụ
Franck Abd-Bakar Fanny (1970– July 3, 2021) bụ onye Ivory Coast na-ese foto
N'afọ 2013 Fanny bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà anọ ahọpụtara ịnọchite anya Ivory Coast na 55th Venice Biennale

N'afọ 2014, a gụnyere ya na ihe ngosi The Divine Comedy Heaven, Purgatory, and Hell Revisited by Contemporary African Artists, nke gara na SCAD Museum of Art na Savannah, Georgia, na Smithsonian's National Museum of African Art, Washington, DC
N'afọ 2018 ọ natara ihe nrite Prix de l'Uemoa na mmemme Dak'Art nke iri na atọ
Ọ nwụrụ na Julaị 2, 2021 na Abidjan
Franck Yannick Kessié (amụrụ na 19 Disemba 1996) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke Ivorian nke na-agba dịka onye na-eme egwuregwu n'etiti maka Serie A club AC Milan na ndị otu mba Ivory Coast
A mụrụ ya na Ouragahio, Kessié malitere ọrụ ya na Stella Club d'Adjamé, sonyeere ndị ntorobịa ha n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2014, a kwalitere ya na otu mbụ
Na 29 Jenụwarị 2015, Kessié bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ na Serie A club Atalanta
E kenyere ya na ndị otu Primavera nke klọb ahụ mgbe ọ bịarutere, ma nye aka na mpụta asaa maka akụkụ ahụ
Kessié nọchitere anya Ivory Coast n'okpuru afọ 17 na n'okpuru 20, na-apụta na 2013 FIFA U-17 World Cup na 2015 Toulon Tournament
N'oge asọmpi mbụ ahụ, Royal Moroccan Football Federation tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa na FIFA na-azọrọ na Kessié dị afọ 22 ọ bụghị 16; FIFA mechara gọnahụ nkwupụta ahụ

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, Kessié gbara egwuregwu mba ụwa mbụ ya na ndị otu mba dị elu na 6 Septemba 2014, malite na mmeri 2 na 1 n'ụlọ megide Sierra Leone maka 2015 Africa Cup of Nations qualification
Na 4 Jenụwarị 2017, a gụnyere ya na ndị otu mmadụ iri abụọ na atọ nke Michel Dussuyer n'ihu 2017 Africa Cup of Nations, malite na egwuregwu niile ka a kụrụ ya n'akụkụ ya n'ọkwa otu
Na 2019 Africa Cup of Nations, ọ gwụchara dị ka onye na-enyere aka na asọmpi ahụ, n'akụkụ Ismaël Bennacer, na enyemaka atọ
Ndị otu ya meriri na nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ site n'aka ndị mmeri Algeria, mgbe ha tụfuru 4o3 na penalties na-esote 1o1 draw na 11 Julaị; Kessié gbanwere penalty mbụ nke mba ya na shoot-out
Mgbe Kessié dị afọ iri na otu, nna ya, onye bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ n'oge ọ bụ nwata tupu ọ banye n'usuu ndị agha Ivory Coast, nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa
Ya mere, otu n'ime emume ebumnuche ya bụ ekele ndị agha iji kwanyere nna ya nwụrụ anwụ ugwu

Àtụ 2020–21 Serie A Team of the Year
François Luambo Luanzo Makiadi (6 Julaị 1938 - 12 Ọktoba 1989) bụ onye egwu Congo

Ọ bụ onye isi na egwu Congo nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ, na egwu Afrịka n'ozuzu ya, ọkachasị dị ka onye ndu maka ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ nke TPOK Jazz, otu egwu Afrịka kachasị ewu ewu ma dị ịrịba ama n'oge ya
A na-akpọ ya Franco Luambo ma ọ bụ naanị Franco
A maara ya maka nkà ya nke African Rumba, ndị na-akwado ya na ndị nkatọ kpọrọ ya 'Sorcerer of the Guitar' na 'Grand Maître of Zairean Music', yana Franco de Mi Amor site n'aka ụmụ nwanyị Fans
Egwu ya a maara nke ọma, 'Mario', rere ihe karịrị 200,000 ma nweta ọla edo
A mụrụ ya n'ọnwa Julaị 6, afọ 1938 n'obodo nne ya nke Sona-Bata [fr] n'ihe bụ Belgian Congo n'oge ahụ, ọ tolitere n'isi obodo, Léopoldville (nke bụzi Kinshasa)

Mgbe nna ya, onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụgbọ okporo ígwè, nwụrụ n'afọ 1949, ọ kwụsịrị agụmakwụkwọ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri (10) ma ọ bụ iri na otu (11) ma nyere nne ya aka site n'ịkpọ ụbọ akwara, harmonica na ngwá egwu ndị ọzọ iji dọta ndị ahịa na ụlọ ahịa ya na mpaghara Ngiri-Ngiri nke Léopoldville
Ọ nụkwara egwu egwu ya site n'iso Paul 'Dewayon' Ebengo, enyi ya tọrọ ya nke nwere ezigbo guitar

N'afọ 1950, Franco (onye dị afọ iri na abụọ n'oge ahụ), Dewayon (onye dị iri na isii), na ndị ọzọ guzobere otu a na-akpọ Watam, nke na-egwuri egwu ọnụ ruo afọ atọ, na-egwú agbamakwụkwọ na olili ozu yana enyemaka nke onye nduzi Franco, onye egwu a ma ama Albert Luampasi, na-edekọ egwu ole na ole na akara ndekọ Ngoma 53

N'afọ 1953, Franco na Dewayon nyochara maka onye egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe Henri Bowane, mgbe ahụ na Leopoldville's Loningisa record label na studio, bụ ndị goro ha abụọ dị ka ndị na-eti egwu studio 54 Franco wepụtara ma ọ dịkarịa ala ndekọ atọ n'afọ 1953 na Watam na Loningisa, nke e nyere ya Lwambo François

Nakwa n'afọ 1953, Franco wepụtara na Loningisa ndekọ mbụ ya, 'Bolingo Na Ngai Na Beatrice' (ịhụnanya m nwere n'ebe Beatrice nọ), nke mere ka Franco bụrụ onye ama ama na Kinshasa 55 188 Bowane kwukwara na o nyere onye na-eto eto na-eti egwu aha ndụ ya, Franco 52
N'afọ 1955, Franco so n'otu ndị egwu Leopoldville nke malitere ịrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ n'okpuru nkwado nke Loningisa studio; a maara otu ahụ dị ka Bana Loningisa (ụmụ Loningisa)
N'afọ 1956, isi ntọala mbụ nke mmadụ isii n'ime ndị egwu ahụ, ya na Franco dị ka naanị onye na-egwu egwu, kwetara ịnakwere ọrụ a na-akwụ ụgwọ na OK
Bar, nke aha ya bụ onye nwe ya, Oskar Kashama
Izu ole na ole ka e mesịrị, na-achọ aha maka nkwekọrịta, ndị otu ahụ jiri OK Jazz, site na ebe ọ malitere (a na-ekwukwa na OK
pụtara Orchestre Kinois, ma ọ bụ ndị otu Kinshasa), e mekwara ha baptizim' n'okpuru aha ahụ na ihe ngosi n'ọnwa Juun 6, afọ 1956 na OK
Bar
Mgbe clarinetist Jean Serge Essous bụ onye ndu mbụ nke OK
Jazz, Franco bụ onye na-ede egwu; Essous kpọrọ ya 'ụdị ọgụgụ isi' maka ide ihe karịrị otu narị egwu na akwụkwọ edemede ya n'oge ahụ
Jazz ghọrọ ngwa ngwa onye na-emegide ndị isi obodo guzobere n'oge ahụ, African Jazz n'okpuru Joseph Kabasele
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1956, mgbe mgbanwe ụfọdụ nke ndị ọrụ gasịrị, usoro ọhụrụ (na obere oge) nke OK
Jazz wepụtara rumba nke Franco dere nke ga-abụ ụkpụrụ nduzi nke ìgwè ahụ 'On Entre OK, On Sort KO' 56–59
N'afọ 1957, OK

Jazz tụfuru onye ndú ya, Essous, yana onye na-agụ egwú mbụ Philippe 'Rossignol' Lando, mgbe Bowane were ha n'ọrụ maka akara ndekọ ọhụrụ ya, Esengo (Bowane hapụrụ Loningisa mgbe OK- Jazz meriri ya n'ebe ahụ) 64化65 Mgbe onye na-akpọ egwú Vicky Longomba ghọrọ onye ndú ọhụrụ nke otu ahụ, Franco sikwara
N'afọ 1958, mgbe OK

Jazz laghachiri Leopoldville mgbe otu afọ gachara na Brazzaville, e jidere Franco ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ maka 'mmebi iwu nke moto' 188 Mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya, ọ nwetaghachiri ma mee ka aha ya dị ka 'Onye Ọkachamara nke Guitar' 188 Usoro guitar ya nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu nke na ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha afọ 1950 na ọtụtụ afọ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ndị na-akpọ Guitarist Congo kewara n'ogige abụọ, otu nke Franco duziri na nke ọzọ nke Docteur Nico Joseph Kabasele's African Jazz
N'ime afọ 1960, Franco na OK
Jazz 'na-eme njem mgbe niile ma dekọọ ọtụtụ ihe 188 Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1967, Franco bụ onye isi otu egwu ahụ, ya na onye na-agụ egwú Vicky
Mgbe Vicky hapụrụ n'afọ 1970, Franco ghọrọ naanị onye ndú nke òtù ahụ
Mgbe ahụ, mgbanwe ọzọ na Tout Puissant OK
Jazz (TPOK
jazz) (nke na-anọ na French maka The Almighty OK'
Jazz)
N'afọ 1978, Onye isi ala Zaire bụ Mobutu tụrụ Franco mkpọrọ ọnwa abụọ maka okwu abụ ya 'Helene' na 'Jackie'
189 Ka e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ, Otú ọ dị, Onye isi ala Mobutu chọrọ ya mma maka onyinye egwu ya 189
Luambo dekọrọ egwu nkeji iri abụọ na otu, nke a na-akpọ Na Lingaka Yo Te
Ọ bụ abụ kachasị ogologo nke onye na-ese ihe na Congo dere
Franco gbara na United States otu ugboro, n'afọ 1983, na-apụta ugboro abụọ na Manhattan Center nke New York
N'ime afọ iri atọ na atọ ya na òtù ahụ, Franco na TPOK Jazz wepụtara ọtụtụ narị egwu na ihe karịrị 100 abọm 188
Luambo bụ onye na-akwado onye ọchịchị Zaire bụ Mobutu Sese Seko
Otú ọ dị, n'oge na-adịghị anya, ha ghọrọ ndị iro
Franco lụrụ di ugboro abụọ
A kọrọ na ọ mụrụ ụmụ iri na asatọ (iri na asaa n'ime ha bụ ụmụnwanyị) na ụmụnwanyị iri na anọ
Franco nwụrụ na 12 nke ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1989, na Namur na Belgium, n'ọrịa AIDS

(Ọ dịghị mgbe ọ kwetara n'ihu ọha na ya nwere ọrịa AIDS, ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ isi mmalite na-akọ ya dị ka ihe kpatara ọnwụ, ndị ọzọ na-akọ nke a dị ka ihe a na-ejighị n'aka, dịka, The New Yorker na-eji 'ọrịa e kwenyere na ọ bụ ọrịa AIDS') Mgbe ọ nwụrụ, Onye isi ala Mobutu kwupụtara ụbọchị anọ nke iru uju mba na Zaire
O siri ike ịchịkọta nnukwu ndekọ nke Franco wepụtara (ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ha niile na TPOK Jazz), a ka ga-arụkwa ọrụ na mpaghara a
Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke atụmatụ na-egosi ma nha nke, na ejighị n'aka, mmepụta ya

Otu ọnụ ọgụgụ a na-ekwukarị bụ na Graeme Ewens depụtara abọm iri asatọ na anọ na diski nyocha nke ọma (dabere n'ọrụ Ronnie Graham) na akụkọ ndụ Ewens nke afọ 1994 banyere Franco; ndepụta a anaghị agụnye abọm nchịkọta nke nwekwara ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe, ma ọ bụ abọm ụtụ na nchịkọta nke OK
Jazz wepụtara mgbe ọnwụ Franco gasịrị (Ewens kwuru banyere ọnụ ọgụgụ a bụ 'ọ na-erughị abọm ndị ahụ Franco kwuru na etiti afọ 1980, mana o doro anya na ụfọdụ n'ime nchịkọta nke ndị Afrịka')
E wepụtara abọm iri na ndepụta ahụ n'afọ 1983 naanị

Nkwupụta ndị ọzọ gụnyere 'ọ wepụtara ihe dịka abọm 150 na puku egwu atọ, nke Franco n'onwe ya dere ihe dịka otu puku;' 'Francoozi mmepụta na-aba ụba ruru TPOK wepụtara egwu abụọ n'izu n'ime ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri anọ ọ rụrụ ọrụ, nke mechara nwee ndepụta nke ihe dị ka otu puku egwu'; 'Site na otu egwu ya bụ OK Jazz wepụtara ọ dịkarịa ala 400 (ihe karịrị ọkara ka e mesịrị chịkọta ya na LP ma ọ bụ CD)
Ewens depụtara 36 CDs; Asahi-net nwere 83;' na 'site na June 1956 ruo August 1961 otu ahụ dekọrọ egwu 320 maka akara egwu 78 rpm Loningisa

Dị ka nkọwa siri ike banyere ọdịdị ya, na 1950s na 1960s Franco na TPOK Jazz wepụtara egwu egwu, ma ọ bụ 78rpm (1950s) ma ọ bụ 45rpm (1960s), yana ụfọdụ abọm ndị bụ nchịkọta nke egwu egwu, n'afọ 1970s nakwa afọ 1980s ha wepụtara abọm dị ogologo
Ihe a niile bụ nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ mere, na mba dị iche iche n'Africa na Europe yana United States
N'afọ ndị 1990, e wepụtara ọtụtụ n'ime abọm ndị ahụ n'ụdị CD site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ dị iche iche mana ha haziri ha n'ụzọ na-enweghị isi, na-ejikọkarị akụkụ dị iche iche nke ọtụtụ abọm n'otu CD

[citation needed] Kemgbe afọ 2000, ewepụtala ọtụtụ nchịkọta na-anakọta akụkụ nke ọrụ Franco, ọkachasị Francophonic, CD abụọ nke ndị dị mkpa nke Stern nyere n'afọ 2007 n'afọ 2009 ma na-agbasa ọrụ Franco dum
Site n'afọ 2020, akara ndekọ Planet Ilunga ka nwere ike ịnye (na vinyl na dijitalụ) nchịkọta nke gụnyere egwu ndị a na-ebipụtabeghị kemgbe a tọhapụrụ ha dị ka ndị na-egwu egwu
Egwú guitar nke Franco dị iche na nke ndị bluesmen dị ka Muddy Waters ma ọ bụ rock na rollers dị ka Chuck Berry
Kama nke na-enweghị isi, otu akara, Franco wuru ụdị egwu ya gburugburu ụda na-emeghe, nke na-abụkarị naanị akara abụọ, nke 'na-agba gburugburu ụda ahụ'
A na-ekwu na isi atọ na nke isii na oge ndị ọzọ na-arụ otu ọrụ ahụ n'ụdị Franco nke na-eme ka ụda olu na-ejupụta na rock na roll
Egwú Franco na-adabere na nnukwu ìgwè, nke nwere ihe ruru ndị na-agụ egwú isii na ọtụtụ ndị na-akpọ ụbọ

Dị ka nkọwa si kwuo, 'mpi nwere ike itinye aka na mkparịta ụka dị mma na guitar, ma ọ bụ guzobe ndị vamps hypnotic na-ebute abụ ahụ n'ihu dị ka ọ dị n'elu ebili mmiri,' ebe akụkụ ụda bụ 'ihe na-akwado òtù ahụ, kama ịbụ ihe na-eme ka ike dị elu'

Franco bụ onye otu ruo afọ iri atọ na atọ, site na ntọala ya n'afọ 1956 ruo ọnwụ ya n'afọ 1989, nke TPOK Jazz, nke a kpọrọ 'n'ụzọ doro anya ọ bụ òtù Afrịka kachasị emetụta na ọkara nke abụọ nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ, ọ bụkwa onye ndú ya ma ọ bụ naanị onye ndú maka ọtụtụ oge ahụ
A na-akọwakarị Franco dị ka onye egwu egwu Afrịka a ma ama na narị afọ nke 20
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọkachamara n'egwú ụwa bụ Alistair Johnston na-akpọ ya 'nnukwu egwu Afrịka nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ'
Otu onye nyocha na The Guardian dere na Franco 'bụ onye a ma ama dị ka onye egwu kachasị ukwuu na kọntinent ahụ, laa azụ n'afọ ndị bu Ali Farka Touré ma ọ bụ Toumani Diabaté ụzọ'
Ronnie Graham dere, na encyclopedic ya 1988 Da Capo Guide to Contemporary African Music, na 'Franco bụ onye egwu kachasị ewu ewu na nke kachasị emetụta n'Africa'
188 Nke a bụ na mgbakwunye na idepụta Franco nke mbụ na ngalaba akwụkwọ ya na Congo na Zaire, ma tinye ya n'ihu akwụkwọ ahụ, iji gosipụta egwu Africa, foto nke Franco na-akpọ ụbọ
Nke a bụ ndepụta mbụ, nke na-ezughị ezu
Abọm nchịkọta

Franconian mà ọ bụ Frankish bụ ókwú mkpokọta nkè ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ na-eji eme ìhè iji zoo áká n'ọtụtụ asụsụ West German, ụfọdụ n'ime há na-asụ n'ihe mejupụtara mpaghara akụkọ ìhè mere eme nkè Francia n'oge mmalite oge etiti
N'asụsụ, enweghị ụdị ihe ndị á na-ahụkarị màkà asụsụ dị ichè ichè niile a na-achịkọta dị kà Franconian
N'ihi nkè á, ọ na-emepụta ụdị fọdụrụ n'ime nnukwu akụkọ ìhè mere eme nkè West German dialect continuum kama ịbụ otu ìgwè nkè asụsụ ndị yiri yá
Màkà ọtụtụ n'ime ụdị ndị á chịkọtara n'okpuru okwu 'Franconian', njikọ diachronical ná asụsụ Frankish, nkè ndị Frank na-asụ, edoghị anya

Á na-ekewa Franconian n'ụzọ dị ichè ichè n'usoro nkè High German consonant shift, ná Low Franconian (gụnyere Dutch ná Afrikaans) anaghị esonye ébé Central Franconian (nke gụnyere Luxembourgish) mere, ná ogo dịgasị iche iche

Mà ókwú Franconian ná nkọwa yá ndị ọzọ na-egbochi iji há mee ihe ná ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ mà ndị na-asụ asụsụ ọ bụla anaghị eji ya dị kà endonym; mà e wezụga East Franconian German, nkè ndị na-ekwu yá na-akpọ Fränkisch, ọ bụ ezie na nke a sitere na ire okwu a na-asụrụ ná mpaghara Franconia

Ókwú Frankish mà ọ bụ Franconian (High German Fränkisch) dị kà ụdị asụsụ nkè oge á bụ nkè ónyé ọkà mmụta asụsụ German bụ Wilhelm Braune (1850ī 1926) chepụtara, onye jiri yá dị ka okwu iji kọwaa Ihe odide West German nkè akụkọ ìhè mere eme nkè ọ na-enweghị ike ịkọwa dị ka nke Saxon, Alemannic mà ọ bụ Bavarian
O kewara yá ná Low, Middle ná High Franconian (Nieder-, Mittel- na Oberfränkisch)

Omume nke ịkọwa áhà agbụrụ site ná Oge Migration mgbè á na-akpọ áhà otu dialect n'oge mmalite nkè German Philology abụghị naanị ná Germany ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ Dutch nkè narị afọ nke iri ná itoolu kewara ụdị German á na-asụ ná Netherlands ná Belgium n'ime ụdị Frisian, Saxon, ná Frankish
N'ọnọdụ abụọ ahụ, á na-eche ná ókèala asụsụ nkè asụsụ ndị nna nna n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na-egosipụta nkè ọma ndị á na-ekwu ná ha bụ ndị duchies nkè Alaeze Ukwu Frank na mmalite nkè Oge Ụwa Mbụ
Enwere ike ịchọta iji 'Franconian / Frankish' mee ihe n'oge gara aga dị kà ụdị asụsụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ónyé ọkà mmụta asụsụ Dutch bụ Jan van Vliet (16221666) jiri Francica mà ọ bụ Francks
Dị kà van Vliet si kwuo, ndị Frank sitere ná oud Teuts (German oge ochie)
N'otu áká ahụ, á na-ekwu ná ónyé ọkà mmụta Franciscus Junius chịkọtara iberibe vetere Francica ad illustrandam linguam patriam (n'asụsụ Old Frankish, màkà ịkọwapụta asụsụ nne) ná 1694
Ókwú 'Franconian' na-ezo áká ná nchịkọta nkè olumba, ọ bụghị asụsụ
Dị kà ụdị fọdụrụnụ, á na-akọwa Franconian site ná ihe ọ na-abụghị, karịa ìhè ọ dị ná yat n'onwe yá
Ọ bụ ezie ná nkọwa nkọwa nkè Franconian n'ozuzu yá adịghị adị, enwere ike ịkọwa mà gosipụta nkewa yá dị n'ime yá, mà ná ibe yá mà ná nnukwu ìgwè asụsụ ndị ọzọ
Low Franconian, Low Frankish, mà ọ bụ Netherlandic bụ ụdị asụsụ eji kewaa ọtụtụ akụkọ ìhè mere eme ná nkè oge á West German dị ichè ichè nwere njikọ chiri anya ná, gụnyere, asụsụ Dutch

Á na-asụ ọtụtụ olumba ná asụsụ ndị dị n'ime ụdị ahụ ná Netherlands, n'ebe ugwu Belgium (Flanders), ná ngalaba Nord nkè France, n'ọdịda anyanwụ Germany (Lower Rhine), yana ná Suriname, South Africa, na Namibia
Mpaghara mgbanwe n'etiti Low Franconian na Central Franconian sitere ná ìhè á na-akpọ asụsụ Meuse-Rhenish dị ná ndịda Dutch Limburg ná German Lower Rhine

Á na-asụ asụsụ Central Franconian ná steeti Germany nkè South-Western North Rhine-Westphalia, ọtụtụ n'ime Rhineland-Palatinate, Saarland, ngalaba Moselle nkè France, ná Luxembourg, yana ndị Transylvanian Saxons ná Romania

Á na-asụ asụsụ Rhine Franconian ná steeti Germany nkè Rhineland-Palatinate, Saarland, ugwu Baden-Württemberg, ndịda Hesse, ugwu Bavaria, ná mpaghara French Moselle, yana ndị Pennsylvania German ná North America
Asụsụ East Franconian bụ asụsụ na-agafe agafe n'etiti Central- na Upper German
Akụkụ asụsụ East Franconian bụ otú n'ime alaka asụsụ ndị á na-asụkarị ná Germany
Á na-asụkarị olumba ndị á ná mpaghara Franconia

Franconia nwere mpaghara Bavaria nkè Upper-, Middle-, ná Lower Franconia, mpaghara South Thuringia (Thuringia), ná akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nkè mpaghara Heilbronn-Franken (Tauber Franconia ná Hohenlohe) ná Baden-Württemberg

Ebe ndị na-asụ Franconian n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ bụ akụkụ Saxon nkè Vogtland, n'akụkụ etiti ya bụ East Franconian (Core Vogtlandian), ná n'akụkụ ọwụwa á na-asụrụ asụsụ mgbanwe (North Vogtlandien ná Southeast Vogtlan Indian)
Asụsụ ndị dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Franconian bụ naanị asụsụ ndị Franconian nke ndị na-asụ ha na-akpọ 'Franconian'
Naanị ndị na-asụ Saxon Vogtland na-ezo aka n'asụsụ ha dị ka 'Vogtlandian kama 'Franconian'
Obodo ndị kachasị ukwuu n'ógbè East Franconian bụ Nuremberg ná Würzburg
Á na-asụkarị South Franconian n'ebe ugwu Baden-Württemberg ná Germany, kamakwa n'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nkè mpaghara Alsace ná France
Ọ bụ ezie ná á na-ewere olumba ndị a dị kà olumba German na Baden-Württemberg, a na-ele ha anya dị ka olulu Alsatian na Alsace (olumba Alsatian ndị ọzọ bụ Alemannic ma ọ bụ Rhine Franconian)

Ndị na-asụ ha na-akpọ asụsụ ndịda Franconian 'Badian' n'akụkụ Badian, ná 'Unterländisch' (Unterland bụ mpaghara dị gburugburu Heilbronn) mà ọ bụ 'Swabian' (n'ihi mmetụta siri ike sitere ná isi obodo Stuttgart, ebe a na-asụrụ asụsụ Swabian) n'akụkụ Württembergian nkè Baden-Württemberg
Obodo ndị kachasị ukwuu ná mpaghara South Franconian bụ Karlsruhe ná Heilbronn
Franjo Krežma (4 Septemba 1862 - 15 June 1881), nke a makwaara dị ka Franz Krezma na mba ndị na-asụ German, bụ onye na-eme violin na onye na-ede egwu na Croatia
A mụrụ ya na Osijek, Alaeze Ukwu Austria, o gosipụtara mmasị maka egwu n'oge ọ bụ nwata na nkà ya doro anya n'ịkpọ violin ma nye ya aha nke ezigbo violin virtuoso
Mgbe ọ kwagara Zagreb, onye na-eme violin, onye na'ede egwu na onye nduzi Đuro (Gjuro) Eisenhuth kụziiri ya
Krežma mere egwu egwu mbụ ya n'ihu ọha na 1081870 na Sisak, mgbe ọ dị afọ 8, na-akpọ violin ya na nwanne ya nwanyị tọrọ ya dị afọ atọ Anka (mgbe e mesịrị Krežma-Barbot) na-akwado ya na piano

N'ịbụ onye onye na-ede egwu a mụrụ na Zagreb bụ Leopold Alexander Zellner chọpụtara ma tụọ aro ya, ọ banyere na Conservatory nke Vienna, Austria-Hungary mgbe ọ dị afọ 9, dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kachasị nta, malitelarị ide egwu, ma mechaa ọmụmụ ihe tupu ya eruo afọ 13, n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1875
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya, Krežma malitere ọrụ dị egwu na Europe, nke nwanne ya nwanyị ka na-akwado
Ọ dị afọ iri na isii, a na-enwe mmasị dị ukwuu n'obodo ndị dị na Europe dị ka Rome, Prague, Genoa, Paris na Venice
Na 1 Julaị 1879, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, ọ ghọrọ onye isi egwu na Benjamin Bilse'sche Kapelle, òtù ndị egwú nke ga-aghọ Berlin Philharmonic n'afọ ndị sochirinụ
After a successful concert in Frankfurt main, Germany na 6 junu 1881,krezma developed an information of the inner ear which developed into meningitis in the following days
following a belated surgery he never regained consciousness
Onwuru na ubochi iri na ise nke onwa junu n,afo iri na asato

Ndị egwu a ma ama dị ka Giuseppe Verdi, Henry Vieuxtemps, Franz Liszt bụ ndị a na-akwanyere ùgwù ma na-enwe mmasị dị ka onye na-eme violin na onye na-ede egwu, ọrụ Franjo Krežma dị ndụ, mgbe ọkụ gbara n'ụlọ ndị mụrụ ya bibiri ụfọdụ n'ime ya, tinyere violin ya dị ọnụ ala, ọnụ ọgụgụ otu symphony, ugboro atọ, ọtụtụ njem na ịgba egwu maka ndị egwú, ụfọdụ ọrụ maka ndị na-eme kịrị na ụfọdụ maka violin
Taa, a na-echeta ya n'aha ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na site na emume mba ụwa maka ndị na-eto eto na-akpọ ụbọ akwara n'obodo ya bụ Osijek
Rêverie za violinu na Ukwu orkestar u As-duru (1880)
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na otu Ghana bụ King Faisal Babes, n'okpuru nduzi nke Romain Krider, onye nkuzi mbụ ya
Sheikh Mansour, onye nwe Manchester City, kpọrọ ya maka nnwale, na isi ya na Abu Dhabi, ka Al-Jazeera, klọb ọzọ o nwere, hụ ya
O nwekwara nwa aha James Halto N'afọ 2010, ọ nọ n'ụlọ ikpe maka klọb Croatian NK Osijek mana ọ pụghị inweta ikike ọrụ
N'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2011, ọ sonyeere otu egwuregwu Thai League T1 bụ Buriram United
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị egwu na Thai League T1, a kpọrọ Acheampong maka nnwale na klọb Scotland Celtic na Disemba 2012
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2013, Acheampong kwagara na klọb Belgian RSC
Anderlecht na mgbazinye ego ruo na ngwụcha oge 2012-2013
Na 16 Eprel 2013, Acheampong bịanyere aka na ndị mmeri Belgian RSC
Anderlecht maka ego nke €1 nde
Na 28 Julaị, Acheampong mere ngosipụta mbụ ya maka Anderlecht megide KSC Lokeren; ọ batara na nkeji iri asaa na ọkpụ 2–3
Na 4–1 meriri KAA Gent, ọ batara na nkeji iri isii na itoolu wee nye goolu mbụ ya na Belgium
Na 17 Septemba Acheampong mere egwuregwu mbụ UEFA Champions League megide Benfica; ọ bịara dịka onye nnọchi anya na nkeji iri anọ na isii; ọ kwụsịrị dị ka mmeri Benfica
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2017, Anderlecht kwupụtara na Acheampong sonyeere ndị otu Chinese Super League bụ Tianjin TEDA na nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ọnwa isii
O mere nke mbụ ya na 22 Julaị 2017
Ọ gbara goolu anọ n'egwuregwu iri na abụọ n'afọ 2017 nke mere ka Tianjin Teda nọrọ n'elu ụgbọ elu maka oge ọzọ
Na 8 Nọvemba 2017, Tianjin Teda gosipụtara nhọrọ ịbịanye aka na Acheampong
Farouk 'Frank' Agrama (Arabic) (a mụrụ n'abalị 1, ọnwa Jenụwarị, afọ 1930 na Arish, Egypt) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye mmepụta ihe nkiri America a mụrụ n'Ijipt, onye edemede na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye bụbu 'Chief Executive Officer' (CEO) nke Harmony Gold USA, Inc
N'afọ 1970 na mmalite afọ 1980, Agrama mere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na-efu obere ego nke gụnyere The Godfather's Friend, Queen Kong na Dawn of the Mummy
Ọ malitekwara ire ikike mgbasa ozi site na Paramount Pictures, nke ọ resịrị enyi ya, onye bụbu praịm minista Ịtali Silvio Berlusconi, na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi nke Mediaset
N'afọ 1983, ya na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi South African ('SABC') nwetara nkwekọrịta iji kesaa obere ihe nkiri Shaka Zulu
N'otu afọ ahụ, o guzobere 'Harmony Gold USA, Inc'
N'agbanyeghị nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma Shaka Zulu n'ụwa niile, mkparịta ụka Agrama nwere nkà hapụrụ SABC ka ọ tụfuo ego n'ezie, ebe Harmony Gold nwere ọtụtụ uru
A ga-emecha mara Harmony Gold maka imepụta ihe nkiri dịka Robotech The Shadow Chronicles, ọrụ ndị ọzọ Robotech n'afọ 1993 miniseries Heidi

Dịka Los Angeles Times si kwuo, ndị ọkàiwu nke Milan, n'ọnwa Nọvemba 21, 2006, boro Agrama, tinyere onye bụbu praịm minista Ịtali Silvio Berlusconi na ndị ọzọ iri, ebubo n'ikpe maka igwu wayo ụtụ isi, mmefu ego na ndekọ ego ụgha na Mediaset

N'ezie, n'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2012, a mara Agrama ikpe mgbe ikpe a were ogologo oge, ebe Berlusconi, ma ọ bụ otu ya, kwuru na ọ zụtara ikike ihe nkiri USA site n'aka ya na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Mediaset na ọnụahịa dị elu
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ dị ihe karịrị afọ 70, a tọhapụrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ kpọmkwem ma ọ nọrọghị n'ụlọ ikpe n'ezie
Frank Amankwah (amuru 29 Disemba 1971, na Obuasi) bu onye egwu bọọlụ Ghana
Amankwah bụ onye otu ndị otu ụmụ nwoke nwetara ihe nrite ọla na 1992 Summer Olympics na Barcelona, Spain
Frank Amankwah bi na London ugbua
Gregory Artus Frank (amụrụ na Mee 4, 1979), nke a makwaara dị ka Frank Artus, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri West Africa
A mụrụ Frank na Montserrado County na mba Liberia
Mba ya bụ onye Liberia
Ọ gara kọleji na Mahadum AME dị na Monrovia, nweta nzere na Human Resources Management
Frank malitere ọrụ ya na Liberia
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gbasara ruo na Ghana ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Venus Films, wee mechaa gaa na-ese ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa (Nollywood)
Mgbe ọ rụchara obere ọrụ na Liberia, Artus dere, duzie, ma gosipụtakwa n'ihe nkiri Juetey (Children's Business)
N'afọ 2008, Jutey ritere ihe nrite isii gụnyere onye edemede kachasị mma, onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị mma, na ihe nkiri nke afọ
Juetey bụ mgbalị mbụ Frank mere maka ide ihe nkiri
Kemgbe ahụ, o meela ihe nkiri ihe karịrị otu narị
A họpụtara ya maka ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, ma o meriri ihe nrite Best International Actor maka 2012 na African Academy Awards
O nwetakwara ihe nrite Hall of Grace Award n'afọ 2013
Otu n'ime ihe nkiri ya a ma ama bụ 2012's Order of the Ring, nke ọ rụrụ na-agba ọtọ
N'afọ 2015, e nyere Frank ihe nrite Face of Africa dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama
O nwetakwara ọtụtụ ihe nrite nke gụnyere Humanitarian Figure Award site na Kọmitii Onyinye Continental maka onyinye ya na ọgụ megide ebola

Frank lụrụ onye ọ hụrụ n'anya n'oge ọ bụ nwata bụ Prima Cooper Frank ma di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ atọ ugbu a, ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na nwa nwoke ọ gụrụ aha onye nkuzi ya, onye India na-eme ihe nkiri Shah Rukh Khan
Frank Cavalier Braxton Jr
(Ubochí irí atọ n'otu n'ọnwa Machị, 1929 ̊̊̊̊ruo ubochí mbụ n'ọnwa Juune, 1969) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-eme ihe nkírí na ónyé nduzi na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mbido afọ 1950 ruo na ngwụcha afọ 1960
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkírí ojii mbụ nke Disney na Warner Bros goro ọrụ
A mụrụ Frank C
Braxton Jr
n'ubochí irí atọ na otu n'ọnwa Machi, 1929
Dị ka nwatakịrị nwoke, ọ zụlitere ịnụ ọkụ n'obi màkà ise ihe ma bụrụ ónyé a maara màkà iburu akwụkwọ eserese ya gburugburu, na-ese foto nke 1930s na 40s LA
Dị ka onye okenye na Manual Arts High School, o jupụtara n'akwụkwọ afọ 1947 na ihe ngosi ya nkè ndụ ụlọ akwụkwọ
Brazil nwéré mgbalị mbụ ya na mbido afọ 1950, nkè Disney wéré ya n'ọrụ dị ka ónyé a na-enye ọzụzụ ma hapụ ya n'ime ọnwa ole na ole
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè nkè áhụ gasịrị, Braxton maliteghachiri ọrụ animator ya na Warner Bros, n'akụkụ Ben Washam
Braxton na Washam zutere na klas abụ nke Lee Wintner na LA City College
Washam, n'oge ahụ, bụ ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na Chuck Jones na Warner Bros
Washam ghọtara ọrụ Braxton ozugbo mgbe Braxton na-anụ ọkụ n'obi gosipụtara Washam akwụkwọ ahụ

Iji jide n'aka na Braxton ga-enweta ọrụ na Warner Bros, Washam mepụtara asịrị banyere otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ si bụrụ ónyé na-akpa ókè agbụrụ ma ghara iwe ndị na-eme ihe nkírí ojii n'ọrụ iji kpasuo Eddie Selzer, ónyé isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ iwe
Na úbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 2019, e nyèrè Braxton Winsor McCay Award site na ASIFA (International Animated Film Association), nke kwuru, nkwenye nke ndụ ma ọ bụ onyinye ọrụ na nka nke animation
Frank Dorrel bụ onye America na-ahụ maka udo
Onye bụbu onye ọrụ United States Air Force, ọ bụzi Veteran for Peace
Dorrel bipụtara ma kesaa Addicted to War, Why The US
Can't kick Militarism nke Joel Andreas
Akwụkwọ a na-emegide agha bụ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke agha US ma ghọọ otu n'ime akwụkwọ kachasị ewu ewu na Peace Movement
A na-eji ya eme ihe na ọtụtụ narị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na kọleji na mba ahụ dum
Dorrel jikọtara ihe nkiri awa abụọ nke akpọrọ What I 've Learned About US
Foreign Policy The War Against The Third World, nke ihe ruru nde mmadụ abụọ ahụla kemgbe afọ 2000
Ọ na-ekesa ihe nkiri Arlington West nke Peter Dudar na Sally Marr
Dorrel bụ onye otu Veterans For Peace, ma mpaghara ma nke mba
Ọ nọ na US
Air Force
O nyere aka ịmalite Arlington West Memorial na Santa Monica, ọrụ nke Los Angeles Chapter of Veterans For Peace
E guzobere ihe ncheta Arlington West n'akụkụ Santa Monica Pier kwa Sunday kemgbe Febụwarị 2004
Ọ nọ na bọọdụ nke Coalition Against Militarism in Our Schools (CAMS) na Executive Board nke Office of the Americas
Dorrel na Cole Miller, onye guzobere No More Victims na ọtụtụ òtù Peace and Justice ndị ọzọ na Los Angeles na gburugburu mba ahụ arụkọwo ọrụ
Dorrel etinyela ọtụtụ ihe omume na-emegide agha na mpaghara Los Angeles n'ime afọ isii gara aga, ọtụtụ ugboro na-akwado Don White
N'otu oge a, Dorrel na nwunye ya Jane, anabatala ihe omume anọ ma ọ bụ ise kwa afọ n'ụlọ ha na Culver City
Frank E
Cummings III (amụrụ na 1938 61 ) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na prọfesọ nke nka fine arts na Mahadum California State, Fullerton
Cummings na-eji ihe ndị dị oké ọnụ ahịa eme arịa osisi na oche, nke sitere n'ihe ime mmụọ nke ihe ndị dị n'Africa
A mụrụ Cummings na Los Angeles, California na 1938
Ọ natara Master of Arts ya na Mahadum California State, Fullerton na 1971

N'afọ 1973, Cummings natara ònyínyé site na National Endowment for the Arts iji nọrọ ọnwa abụọ na Ghana na-enyocha myirịta dị n'etiti ọgụ njirimara nke ndị Africa America na ọgụ ndị ha chere ihu n'Africa
N'afọ 1981, ọ laghachiri Africa, gosipụta ọrụ ya na Gabon, Ghana, Madagascar, na Malawi
Ihe ngosi nka mbụ nkè Cummings, Sensitivity, dị na Long Beach Museum of Art na 1974 109 A ka na-egosi ọrụ ya na ebe ngosi nka
Nchịkọta Lipton nwèrè arịa osisi nke Cummings mere
Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, Minneapolis Institute of Art, na Smithsonian American Art Museum nwèrè ihe Cummings na nchịkọta ha
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na White House Collection of American Craft
